English: Eggplants always grow best under warm conditions.
Luganda: Bbiringanya lubeerera  asinga kukulira mu mbeera ya bugumu

English: Farmland is sometimes a challenge to farmers.

English: Farmers should be encouraged to grow more coffee.

English: Uganda is focusing on farming.

English: Some plants die due to lack of sunlight.

English: Where can we get good resistant varieties that are highly marketable?

English: The radio station has given us a platform to sell our vegetables.

English: Mobile phones have enabled me to get pesticide information for beans.

English: Last month, I needed passion fruit information.

English: Some of the shops where farmers can get fertilizers and good planting materials.

English: Farming programs on radio provide information on how to access cassava planting materials.
Luganda: Pulogulaamu z'obulimi ku laadiyo ziwa obubaka ku ngeri y'okufunamu ebikozesebwa mu kusimba  muwogo.

English: There are several cassava varieties that can grow in that area.
Luganda: Waliwo ebika bya muwogo eby'enjawulo ebisobola okudda mu kifo ekyo

English: When farmers get information about disease outbreaks early, it helps them to plan better.
Luganda: Abalimi bwe bamanyisibwa amangu ku kubalukawo kw'obulwadde, kibayambako okweteekateeka obulungi

English: Farmers can benefit a lot from advice on disease control.

English: Every Monday, farmers are given advice on coffee growing.
Luganda: Buli Mande, abalimi bawabulwa ku nnima y'emmwanyi

English: Farmers need weather advice to help them plan better.

English: Farmers are given a platform to ask any agricultural related questions.

English: Farmers are advised to grow crop varieties with high demand.

English: Information on how to grow citrus fruits and vegetables is very useful for farmers.

English: Information on weather forecasts and preparation of the garden for planting.

English: Farming programs aired on radio help farmers to know the good planting seasons.

English: Farmers gain knowledge on planting good seeds, and the diseases affecting their crops.

English: Certain organisations provide information to farmers on crop inputs and varieties via radio.

English: The birds have eaten all the maize cobs in that woman's garden.

English: The leaf has yellow linings and rust in the middle.

Runyankore: Omukyerebo gw'amababi g'ebicoori nigureetera akatwe k'eibabi kwoma.
Acholi: Gin manen calo nyal ma i boke anyogi en aye weko wii oboke two woko
Ateso: Aicucukate na akiot ijaikini aituk akiot aonere.
Lugbara: kaka bini ecazu warawararurini fe kaka ma bi drileni ꞌwiꞌwi.

English: Some of the diseased leaves have dried up.
Luganda: Ebimu ku bikoola ebirwadde bikaze.
Runyankore: Amababi gamwe agarwaire, goomire
Acholi: Oboke mogo ma two omako dong gutyeko two woko
Ateso: Acie akwi nu edekasi aokoto.
Lugbara: Ebikobi azi azo be 'diyi 'wi 'bo.

English: Some of the yellow leaves on this plant are folded on one side.
Luganda: Ebimu ku bikoola ebya kyenvu ku kimera kino byefunyizza ku luuyi lumu.
Runyankore: Amababi gamwe agiine erangi ya kinekye aha kimera eki, gefunyikire aharubaju rumwe.
Acholi: Oboke mogo ma oboke ma rangi ne yello tye ma odole i bute tung cel
Ateso: Acie akwii nudos kotoma oraasit kayen ekudukudo kosiep ediope.
Lugbara: Ebibiko azi amgbaza ori 'di ma pati rua 'diyi agbo eyi woko aluru.

English: One of the symptoms of maize leaf rust and maize blight is yellowing leaves.
Luganda: Akamu ku bubonero bwa maize leaf rust ne maize blight bye bikoola okufuuka ebya kyenvu.
Runyankore: Kamwe aha bubonero bw'endwara y'omukyerebo gw'amababi, amababi nigahinduka kinekye.
Acholi: Lanyut acel manonge I oboke anyogi manen calo nyal ki anyogi ma two omako en aye oboke ma rangi ne oloke odoko yellow
Ateso: Ediopet ojenuneta lu aicucuka na ekirididi ka adeka na ekirididi ituluori akwii nedos.
Lugbara: Wura kaka azo omvele leaf rust azini blight 'diyi ni eyi e'dazuri Kaka bi amgbaza ni.

English: The maize leaf is yellow however its colour tends to brown at the base.
Luganda: Ekikoola kya kasooli kya kyenvu wabula langi yaakyo etera okuba eya kitaka wansi.
Runyankore: Eibabi ry'ekicoori ni rya kinekye kwonka erangi neehinduka kitaka aha ntangiro y'eibabi
Acholi: Oboke anyogi nongo rangi ne oloke yellow ento i tere nongo olokke calo nyal
Ateso: Erai akiot na ekirididi nados konye egeuni akiot arengun okwap.
Lugbara: Kaka bi 'di ma wura amgbazaru te eri wura andraleruri ni 'ba i oja were inia ru.

English: The patches on the leaves is not a good sign for the crop.
Luganda: Obubalabala ku bikoola si kabonero kalungi ku birime.
Runyankore: Ebitobo aha mababi, tikari kabonero karungi aha kimera.
Acholi: Lakit alokaloka i rangi me oboke pe obedo lanyut maber pi anyogi ma tye ka dongo
Ateso: Atapacen nu ejaas akwii mam erai ejenunet loajokan lo iraasit.
Lugbara: Afa eyi olipi ebikobi eyi ma rua 'da adrini e'data muke ni i ku ori 'da eyini.

English: The top part of the maize plant has been eaten by these loitering goats.
Luganda: Ekitundu kya kasoolo ekya waggulu kiriiriddwa embuzi zino ezitaayaaya.
Runyankore: Akatwe k'ekicoori kariirwe embuzi ezirikuzengyerera.
Acholi: Wii anyogi ma malo ni , dyegi ma woto ma pe kitweyo, otyeko camo woko
Ateso: Akwii nu akou ekirididi anyamasi akinei nu ilatosi.
Lugbara: Endri acipi pililiru 'diyi nya kaka 'da ma dri te.

English: Termites have become a very big issue in this garden.
Luganda: Enkuyege zifuuse ensonga ennene ennyo mu nnimiro eno.
Runyankore: Emishwa ehindukire ekizibu omu musiri ogu.
Acholi: Okok odoko peko madit tutwal i poto man
Ateso: Ayautu ikok ationis komusiri kana.
Lugbara: Ojiriko eyi eca curu'do e'yo azi ambu ni amvu 'di ma alea.

English: Weeding is a good farming practice that everyone should know about.
Luganda: Okukoola kikolwa ky'okulima ekirungi buli omu kyalina okumanyaako.
Runyankore: Okwombera n'enkora nungi omu buhingi, buri omwe ei ashemereire kwejunisa.
Acholi: Doo obedo diro maber me gwoko poto ma dano weng omyero onge
Ateso: Erai aicap ewai loajokan lo akoru lo ekot nginitunganan aijen.
Lugbara: Afa azi lepi 'ba dria ma ni i ci amvu 'yaza ma alea ri eri amvu okuza ni.

English: The sorghum is good and healthy and this will give us better yields.
Luganda: Omuwemba mulamu bulungi era kino kijja kutuwa amakungula amalungi.
Runyankore: Omugusha nimurungi kandi nigureebeka gye, nigwija kutuha amasharuura marungi.
Acholi: Kabii man ber dok odongo ma kome yot dok man binyako nyige mapol
Ateso: Engalekitos imumwa ejok ido ijaikini oni aimi.
Lugbara: Ondu 'di ma ori muke azini rua be ala dika eri mu 'yaa amani muke.

English: I think this plant is diseased because all its leaves are yellow.
Luganda: Ndowooza ekimera kino kirwadde kubanga ebikoola byakyo byonna bya kyenvu.
Runyankore: Ninteekateeka ngu ekimera eki kiine oburwaire ahabw'okuba amababi gaakyo goona ni ga kinekye.
Acholi: Atamo ni tyen cam eni tye ki two pien pote weng oloke ma yellow
Ateso: Aomit eong edeka iraasit yen naarai idosoikitos akwii kere.
Lugbara: Eri ena mani ori 'di azo be ri le a'dusikuni eri ma bi eyi dria amgbazaru .

English: We are most likely to have no yield from this plant.
Luganda: Tuyinza butakungula mu kimera kino.
Runyankore: Nitubaasa kwija kuburwa ekitwasharuura kuruga omu kimera eki.
Acholi: Nen calo pe wabi kayo kac madit ki i kom tyen cam man
Ateso: Mam oni imina adumun idio ibore kotoma oraasit kayen.
Lugbara: Eri ena kile nyaka 'di cani mu kaa amani ku ri le.

English: Some of the groundnut plants have been eaten by termites.
Luganda: Ebimu ku bikolo by'ebinyeebwa biriiriddwa enkuyege.
Runyankore: Ebimera by'ebinyobwa ebimwe biriirwe emishwa.
Acholi: Tye tyen pul mukene ma okok ocamo woko
Ateso: Ecie emaido anyamasi ikok.
Lugbara: Ojiriko eyi nya funyo ori azi 'diyi te.

English: Brown spots in the middle part of the affected leaves.
Luganda: Amabala ga kitaka mu kitundu ky'omu makkati g'ebikoola ebirwadde.
Runyankore: Ebitobo bya kitaka ahagati, bisiisire amababi.
Acholi: Rangi ma oloke nen calo nyal tye i dye oboke ma two omako
Ateso: Ejai ne erengerenget kokiding na akwii nu edekasi.
Lugbara: Ori ma bi azoni bile ꞌbo ꞌdiyi ma rua yi odupi warawara agadria ꞌdiyi

English: The affected leaf might have been due to bad weather.
Luganda: Ekikoola ekyonoonese kiyinza kuba nga kivudde ku mbeera y'obudde mbi.
Runyankore: Amababi agasisikaire, nikibaasa kuba kirugire aha mbeera y'obwire
Acholi: Oboke ma rangi ne oloke ni twero bedo macalo adwogi me alokaloka piny
Ateso: Akiot na edeka aticepak erai kanu ekuse ka ecae.
Lugbara: Angu ma mile onziri eco azo fezu ebikobi azo beri ni ni ra.

English: The animals that loiter through the garden have damaged all the crops.
Luganda: Ensolo ezitaayaayiza mu nnimiro zoonoonye ebirime byonna mu nnimiro.
Runyankore: Amatungo agarikuzengyerera omu musiri gasiisire ebihingwa byona.
Acholi: Ler ma pe gidodo ma woto ka yenyo cam i dye poto obalo cam weng ma tye i poto
Ateso: Itiang lu ilatosi komisiri amunasi ikorion kere.
Lugbara: Anyapa acipi amvu alea si 'diyi eza ori eyi dria.

English: These diseased leaves are drying because they are being suppressed by the weeds.
Luganda: Ebikoola bino ebirwadde bikala kubanga bitataaganyizibwa omuddo.
Runyankore: Amababi agasisikaire gatandikire kwoma ahabwokuba gashwekirwe omwata.
Acholi: Oboke ma two omako tye ka to woko pien doo tye matek i poto
Ateso: Ejaas akwii nu aokere naarai aridaki edoan.
Lugbara: Ebikobi azo be 'diyi 'wi'wi a'dusikuni Odroo yi eyi ma okpo ndende .

English: The poor banana yields are as a result of maize leaf rust.
Luganda: Amakungula g'amatooke amabi gavudde ku maize leaf rust.
Runyankore: Ebitookye okuteera gye, kireesirwe omukyerebo gw'amababi g'ebicoori.
Acholi: Labolo ma pe onyak madwongi tye macalo adwogi me two anyogi ma loko rangi pot anyogi miyo bedo calo nyal
Ateso: Mam etaget lo iswamat ejok naarai kanu adeka na icucukai akwii ekirididi.
Lugbara: A'bua eyi awini ka kililiru ku kaka azo omvele leaf rust ru ri si.

English: Stunted growth of the bananas is a result of weeds in the garden.
Luganda: Okukonziba kw'amatooke kuva ku muddo mu nnimiro.
Runyankore: Okuguna kw'emitumba, kireesirwe omwata omu musiri
Acholi: Labolo ma tye odongo maceki tye macalo adwogi me doo ma tye madwong i poto
Ateso: Amugog nu igengeras erai kanu edoan loejai misiri.
Lugbara: A'bua eyi zo dulua ru odroo eyini aa'zu amvua ci ri si.

English: This damaged plant might have been eaten by the Fall armyworm.
Luganda: Ekimera kino ekyonoonese kiyinza okuba nga kyaliiriddwa akasaanyi ka armyworm.
Runyankore: Ekimera eki ekisisikaire, nikibaasa kuba kyariirwe ekakooko.
Acholi: Tyen cam man twero bedo ni kwidi aye ocamo
Ateso: Iraasit yen emunaara aticepak ikur enyamitos.
Lugbara: Le oꞌbu ma nya ori ꞌi ezapi ꞌbo ꞌdi ni.

English: The garden needs to be weeded because it is in a bushy environment.
Luganda: Ennimiro yeetaaga okukoolebwa kubanga ezise.
Runyankore: Omusiri gushemereire kwomberwa ahabw'okuba gushwekirwe ekishaka.
Acholi: Poto man mito adoya pien tye ma lum orumu tenge woko
Ateso: Ekot amisiri acapio naarai emutono.
Lugbara: Amvu 'di le 'ba ma oku i ra a'dusikuni eri angu aseru ni ma alea.

English: The top shoot has been eaten by the Fall armyworm.
Luganda: Ekitundu kya waggulu kiriiriddwa akasaanyi ka armyworm.
Runyankore: Akatwe k'ekimeera kariirwe ekishorobwa.
Acholi: Cwinye ma yom ma pud tye ka lot alota ni kwidi otyeko camo ne woko
Ateso: Kuju ke anyama ekutelek.
Lugbara: Oꞌbu nya ori agadria oru ꞌdani.

English: The maize is in a bushy garden and it has leaf rust.
Luganda: Kasooli ali mu nnimiro ezise era alina n'ebikoola ebimyukiridde.
Runyankore: Omusiri gw'ebicoori gukanzire, amababi gahindwire erangi.
Acholi: Anyogi ni tye i poto ma odin dok bene oboke ne tye ka loke calo nyal
Ateso: Ejai ekirididi amusiri na emutono ido ejaas keda adeka na icucukai akwii.
Lugbara: Kaka 'dayi amvu azi aseru ni ma alea dika eyi vu azo fepi eyi ma bi ni oka omvele leaf rust ru ri ci.

English: The potato plant has both purple stripes and brown spots on the leaves.
Luganda: Lumonde alina ebikuubo ebya kakobe n'amabala aga kitaka ku bikoola.
Runyankore: Ekimera ky'emondi kiine emisitaari ya kinekye n'ebitobo bya kitaka aha mababi.
Acholi: Tyen layata ni tye ki rangi ma obedo kwa-kwa ki bene nyal-nyal I oboke ne
Ateso: Ejaas akwii nu acok keda imaria lu erengak kotoma akwii.
Lugbara: Maku ꞌda ma bi osi ꞌi wara wararu azini papuluru.

English: This plant has yellow leaves with brown spots between the veins.
Luganda: Ekimera kino kirina ebikoola ebya kyenvu n'amabala aga kitaka mu bukuubo obutambuza amazzi.
Runyankore: Ekimera eki kiine amababi ga kinekye n'ebitobo bya kitaka ahagati y'obutsi
Acholi: Tyen cam man tye ki oboke ma rangi ne yellow ki mogo obedo nyal-nyal
Ateso: Ejaas iraasit yen keda akwii nudos ido itapitapa ne arengan kiding na imaria.
Lugbara: ori ꞌdi ma bi yeloru azini ewini agaduari odu ꞌi warawararu.

English: The tomato leaves are yellow and dry.
Luganda: Ebikoola by'ennyaanya bya kyenvu era bikalu.
Runyankore: Amababi g'enyaanya nigakinekye kandi goomire.
Acholi: Oboke nyanya man tye ki rangi ma yello dok bene otwo woko
Ateso: Idosoikitos akwii nu enyanya ido eokitos.
Lugbara: Nyanya ori 'da ma bi eyi angmbaza azini a'wi.

English: The leaves have pods because of the pests.
Luganda: Ebikoola birwadde olw'ebiwuka.
Runyankore: Amababi garimu obufumuka ahabw'obukooko.
Acholi: Oboke ne tye ki poke pien jami ma lak obalo woko
Ateso: Ejaas akwii keda aligo naarai kanuka ikur.
Lugbara: Afa ori bi ꞌdiyi ma rua kulu kulu ꞌdiyi yi ꞌye agbari afa ori ezapi ꞌdiyi dri.

English: Normally the white spots on the maize leaves are brought about by the pests.
Luganda: Bulijjo amabala ameeru ku bikoola bya kasooli galeetebwa biwuka.
Runyankore: Obutonatone oburikwera aha mababi g'ebucoori nibukira kureetwa obukooko.
Acholi: Pol kare, gin ma nen ma tar-tar I pot anyogi tye macalo adwogi me jami me lak I oboke
Ateso: Ne ekwangakwangat kotoma akwii ekirididi erai ikur eyangaunete.
Lugbara: Tutunisi, afa ori ezapi ꞌdiyi afa yi odupi kaka ma bi rua emve mve ꞌdiyi feni.

English: The maize leaves have been eaten by caterpillars.
Luganda: Ebikoola bya kasooli biriiriddwa ebisaanyi.
Runyankore: Amababi g'ebicoori gariirwe kanyogombwa
Acholi: Pot anyogini kwidi malak otyeko camo ne woko
Ateso: Anyamasi ikur akwii ekirididi.
Lugbara: O'bu eyi nyaki kaka 'da ma bi eyi te.

English: The white spots on the Maize leaves are as a result of the Fall armyworm.
Luganda: Amabala ameeru ku bikoola bya kasooli galeeteddwa akasaanyi ka armyworm.
Runyankore: Obutonatone oburikwera aha mababi g'ebicoori gareetsirwe obukooko
Acholi: Gin ma nen ma tar-tar ipot anyogi tye macalo adwogi me kwidi ma kilwongo ni Fall armyworm
Ateso: Ne ekwangakwangat kotoma okirididi erai kanuka ekutelek.
Lugbara: oꞌbu yi afa ru odupi kaka ma rua emve emve ꞌdiyi feni.

English: The cassava leaves have yellow stripes at the base.
Luganda: Ebikoola bya muwogo biriko ebikuubo bya kyenvu wansi.
Runyankore: Amababi ga muhogo gaine emisitaari ya kinekye ahantangiro.
Acholi: Pot gwana ne tye ki rangi ma yellow ci ongolo-ngolo i tere
Ateso: Ejaas akwii nu emwogo keda imaria ludos okwap.
Lugbara: Ola 'da ma ebikobi deria leru 'diyi amgbazaru .

English: One of the common deficiencies in orange plants is yellowing of the leaf tips.
Luganda: Obumu ku bulwadde obusinga mu micungwa bwe busongezo bw'ebikoola okufuuka kyenvu.
Runyankore: Okumanya ngu ekimera ky'omucugwa kirwaire, obutwe bw'amababi nibuhinduka kinekye.
Acholi: Lanyut me moc cam murem i tyen mucungwa en aye ni wii oboke mabiti loko rangi ne doko yellow
Ateso: Adiopet adekasinei nu emucuga nes akiot aluor nedos koingaren.
Lugbara: Afa azini ndima ma ori ezapi tuturi eri bi drileni yini ecazu yelori ꞌi.

English: The maize leaves are full of holes because they are being eaten by pests.
Luganda: Ebikoola bya kasooli bijjudde ebituli kubanga biriibwa obuwuka.
Runyankore: Amababi g'ebicoori gaijwire obufumuka ahabw'okutaahirirwa obukooko.
Acholi: Pot anyogi magi tye ma otuc-otuc pien jami malak tye ka camogi woko
Ateso: Epedepedo akwii ekirididi naarai enyamete ikur
Lugbara: Kaka bi 'da eyi dria 'bule ru a'dusikuni o'bu ki eyi nyani.

English: A farmer in Bukujju village showed us some of the diseased plants in his garden.
Luganda: Omulimi ku kyalo ky'e Bukujju yatulaze ebimu ku bimera ebirwadde mu nnimiro ye.
Runyankore: Omuhingi omukyaro kya Bukujju akatworeka bimwe aha bimera ebyabaire birwaire omu musiri gwe.
Acholi: Lupur acel manonge i caro ma kilwongo niBukujju onyutiwa tyen came mogo matwo obalo woko
Ateso: Abu akorion lo ocaalo lo Bukujju itodik iso icie kotoma okorion luedekasi komisiri ke.
Lugbara: Agu azi amvu 'yapi chalo bukujju niria ri i'da amani ori azi azo be ivile amvua 'diyi ma azi.

English: In Kayunga district, most of the gardens have diseased maize plantations.
Luganda: Mu disitulikiti y'e Kayunga, ennimiro ezisinga zirimu kasooli omulwadde.
Runyankore: Omu disiturikiti ya Kayunga emisiri erikukira obwngi ekashangwa erimu ebicoori ebiine oburwaire.
Acholi: I distric me Kayunga, pol poto tye ki anyogi ma two ocubu
Ateso: Ko disitrikt loko Kayunga ipu amusirin nu ekirididi nu esurokit adeka.
Lugbara: Districti Kayunga niri ma alea, amvu pari eyi ma alea Kaka azo be 'diyi.

English: There are very many bean diseased plants in this area.
Luganda: Waliwo ebijanjaalo bingi nnyo ebikwatiddwa obulwadde mu kitundu kino.
Runyankore: Omumwanya ogu harimu ebihingwa bingi byebihimba ebirwaire.
Acholi: Tye muranga mapol ma two omako i kabedo man
Ateso: Epol emaroge lo edeka kaiboisit kana.
Lugbara: Osu eyi ma pati azo be 'diyi ga angu 'di ma alea tre.

English: The brown colour on the coffee leaves is as a result of common rust.
Luganda: Langi ya kitaka ku bikoola by'emwanyi ereeteddwa bulwadde common rust.
Runyankore: Erangi ya kitaka ahamababi g'omwani ekarugirira ahandwara y'omukyerebo.
Acholi: Rangi ma obedo nyal-nyali manonge i pot mwanyi tye macalo adwogi me nyal ma jwi ni
Ateso: Arengus na akwii nu emwanyi erai adeka na icucukai.
Lugbara: Kawa ma bini eca wara wararu agbari afa omvele mundutisi common rust ri dri.

English: Fall Armyworm is feeding on the maize leaf.
Luganda: Akasaanyi ka armyworm erya ku bikoola bya kasooli.
Runyankore: Kanyagobwa eriyo neerya amababi g'ebicoori.
Acholi: Kwidi ma kilwongo ni Fall armyworm tye ka camo pot anyogi
Ateso: Enyami ekutelek akiot na ekirididi.
Lugbara: oꞌbuni kaka bi nyaria.

English: The presence of weeds in a garden causes the maizes leaves to turn into yellow.
Luganda: Omuddo okubeera mu nnimiro kireetera ebikoola bya kasooli okufuuka ebya kyenvu.
Runyankore: Omwata omumusiri nigareetera amababi g'ebicoori kuhinduka kinekye.
Acholi: Doo madwong i poto miyo pot anyogi rangi ne lokke ma yellow
Ateso: Aiswapite na edoan komisiri nes ituluori akwi ekirididi araun nedos.
Lugbara: Regi amvu alea 'diyi fe Kaka bi eyi ni amgbazu te.

English: This maize plant has rust because of the disease.
Luganda: Kasooli amyukiridde olw'ekirwadde.
Runyankore: Ekimera ky'ekicoori eki kiine omukyerebo ahabw'oburwaire
Acholi: Tyen anyogi man tye ki nyal macalo adwogi me two
Ateso: Icucukat ekirididi lo kanu adeka.
Lugbara: Kaka 'di amgbazaru azo si.

English: The grains of this maize plant are bigger in size which is not normal.
Luganda: Empeke z'ekikolo kya kasooli kino nnene mu kikula ekitali kya bulijjo.
Runyankore: Obuhango bwenjuma z'ekicoori eki tibwabutoosha.
Acholi: Nyig anyogi ma oa ki i tyen anyogi man gidongo tutwal dok man pe opore
Ateso: Eburok icok ekirididi kalo ejokuna.
Lugbara: Kaka 'di ma efi eyi ambu ndeni, dika 'di adrini piri ku.

English: Maize Streak Disease makes the middle line on the leaf to turn yellow.
Luganda: Obulwadde bwa maize streak bufuula layini y'omumakkati g'ekikoola okufuuka eya kyenvu.
Runyankore: Endwara y'ebicoori niereetera omusitaari gwahagati y'eibabi okuhinduka kinekye.
Acholi: Two anyogi ma kilwongo ni Maize streak weko dye pot anyogi loko rangi ne doko yellow
Ateso: Adeka na ekirididi ijaikini egura lo akiot ekirididi aijulakin nedos.
Lugbara: Kaka ma azo omvele mundutisi maiza streak Disease ruri ni fe kaka bi agadriari ni ecazu yeloni.

English: The goats have eaten the maize in the garden.
Luganda: Embuzi ziridde kasooli mu nnimiro.
Runyankore: Embuzi ziriire ebicoori omu musiri.
Acholi: Dyegi ocamo anyogi ma i poto
Ateso: Anyamasi akinei ekirididi komisiri.
Lugbara: Indri eyi nyaki kaka amvua ri te.

English: One of the symptoms of a plant affected by maize streak disease is yellow leaves.
Luganda: Akamu ku bubonero bw'ekimera ekirumbiddwa obulwadde bwa maize streak bye bikoola ebya kyenvu.
Runyankore: Kamwe aha bubonero bw'ekimera ekiine oburwaire bwa oburikukwata ebicoori n'okukyereba amababi.
Acholi: Lanyut acel manonge i tyen anyogi matwo maize streak omako en aye oboke ma rangi ne olokke odoko yellow
Ateso: Adiopet ijenuneta lu ekirididi lo esurokit adeka naka ekirididi nes aidosoikin na akwi.
Lugbara: Kaka pati azo kakani omvele maize streak ru ri be 'diyi ma bi amgbazaru.

English: The maize leaf has been eaten as a result of fall armyworm.
Luganda: Ekikoola kya kasooli kiriiriddwa oluvannyuma lw'okulumbibwa akasaanyi ka armyworm.
Runyankore: Eibabi ry'ekicoori ririirwe kanyogombwa.
Acholi: Pot anyogi man kicamo woko macalo adwogi me Fall armyworm
Ateso: Anyama ekutelek akiot na ekirididi.
Lugbara: Oꞌbu nya kaka bi ni.

English: This plant has been affected by the maize disease because the leaf has a grey colour.
Luganda: Ekimera kino kikwatiddwa obulwadde bwa kasooli kubanga ekikoola kirina langi ya kivuuvu
Runyankore: Ekimera eki kisisirwe endwara y'ebicoori ahabw'okuba erangi y'eibabi ehindukire rusaano.
Acholi: Tyen anyogi man two omako pien oboke ne olokke tye kadoko col woko
Ateso: Amuna adeka na ekirididi iraasit yen naarai ipurongong akiot.
Lugbara: Kaka ori 'di esu azo 'bo a'dusikuni eri ma ebikobi eyi inia ru.

English: Maize has been affected by the Fall Army Worm.
Luganda: Kasooli akwatiddwa akasaanyi ka armyworm.
Runyankore: Ebicoori bisisirwe akakooko akarikwetwa akashorobwa.
Acholi: Anyogi tye ma two Fall armyworm obalo woko
