English: Business owners in Uganda opt for online marketing to contain pandemic challenges.
Luganda: Bannannyini bizinensi mu Uganda baasazeewo okulangira ku mutimbagano okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Abaine za bizinesi omu Uganda bacwiremu kuguriza ebintu byabo aha intaneti ahabw'okwerinda oburwaire bwa COVID-19.
Acholi: Lutim biacara ma i lobo Uganda gucako tic ki intanet macato wil macalo yo acel me kwo i kare man ma peko me two ma opoto tye ka yelo wilobo kulu
Ateso: Agwelanarak luko Uganda ekotos aimo esokoni kotoma olago kanu aitikokin nu adeka.
Lugbara: ꞌBa tujara ꞌyepi Ugandaa ꞌdiyi curuꞌdo le asi ꞌba afa ozizu azini jezu initanetiasi eꞌyo ewaru azo koronaniri ni eji ꞌdiyisi.

English: Uganda's economy will grow once it starts extracting its oil in Western Uganda.
Luganda: Ebyenfuna bya Uganda bijja kukula bw'enaatandika okusima amafuta gaayo mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Obugaiga bwa Uganda nibwija kweyongyera, okutimba amajuta omu burengyerwizooba bwa Uganda kukuraije kutandika.
Acholi: Yo me timo biacara bi medde matek ka lobo Uganda ocako cato moo matye nonge i tung poto ceng me Uganda
Ateso: Ebuni bobo eiriago loko Uganda apolor arai egeun aipir akinyet ko too nako Uganda.
Lugbara: Lonyi kari Ugandaniri vileri ni nga zo sawa ꞌbani eꞌdozu odu Uganda ma kala etuni ꞌderialeruriari nzezu ꞌborisi ra.

English: Business owners need to find new ways of doing business during these days of quarantine.
Luganda: Bannannyini bizinensi beetaaga okunoonya engeri empya ez'okukolamu businensi mu nnaku za kkalantiini zino.
Runyankore: Abaine za bizinesi omu Uganda bashemeraire kusherura omuringo musya gw'okukoramu emirimo yaabo omu biro by'akeshereko.
Acholi: Lutim biacara omyero ocak nongo diro manyen me timo biacara i kare man ma gengo rwate i kin dano mapoli
Ateso: Agwelanarak ekot adumun iwaitin lu itetiak lu agwelanar apakio nu adeka.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba tujara ꞌyeꞌba ꞌdiyi ma esu geri oꞌdiru ꞌdiyi tujara ꞌyezu sawa ꞌbani lezu ꞌba ma fu amve ku ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌi

English: Ugandan businessmen should think of exporting beef to South Sudan
Luganda: Abasuubuzi bannayuganda balina okulowooza ku kutunda ennyama y'ente e  South Sudan.
Runyankore: Abashubuzi omu uganda, bashemereire kuteekateeka aha shonga y'okuguza enyama omu ihanga rya South Sudan.
Acholi: Lutim biacara me i lobo Uganda omyero gucak cato ringo dyang i lobo me kuping Sudan
Ateso: Ekot agwelanarak luko Uganda aomoom nu agwelanar akiring South Sudan.
Lugbara: Le kari anzi Uganda ni tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma ega e'yo eza jizu ozizaru kari sudani andraleruri ni ria ra.

English: Ankole clans make celebrations for their first annual harvest.
Luganda: Ebika bya Ankole bijaguza olw'amakungula gaabyo agasooka mu mwaka.
Runyankore: Enganda z'omu kya Ankole, ziine omukoro gw'okujaguza amasharuura g'okubanza buri mwaka.
Acholi: Anywali me i Ankole yubbe me kwero kac gi me acel me mwaka
Ateso: Atekerin nuka Ankole inumunumete nuka isakan kec lusodit kangol ekaru.
Lugbara: Suru Ankoleru ꞌdiyi omu ꞌba sawa yini ori yi vile oko ꞌdiyi okuzu ꞌborisi ci.

English: Makerere University performs well in the African region.
Luganda: Ssettendekero ya Makerere ekola bulungi ku ssemazinga wa Africa.
Runyankore: Yunivasite ya Makerere  neekora gye omu kyanga kya Africa.
Acholi: Makerere University pwonyo maber i lobo Africa
Ateso: Eunibasiti loko Makerere nes iswamai ejok kotoma akwap naka Africa.
Lugbara: Univasiti Makerere niri ni azi 'ye muke angu Afrika niri ma alea.

English: Uganda supports female scientist.
Luganda: Uganda ewagira bannassaayansi abakyala.
Runyankore: Uganda neeshagika abakazi abanyasayansa.
Acholi: Uganda miyo kony me cwako mon ma tye Scientist
Ateso: Uganda nes igangit angor nuisisiatos nuka sayanis.
Lugbara: Uganda ni atita fe oku sayanisi ꞌyeꞌba ꞌdiyini angiri.

English: Schools ought to fund their activities.
Luganda: Amasomero gateekeddwa okuteeka ensimbi mu mirimu gyago.
Runyankore: Amashomero gashemereire kushashurira emikoro yaago.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero gucul pi jami ma mite pi tic mapatpat
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi aigangit aswaminei kec kowai lo ikapun.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma ayu eyi ma robia e'yo ndundu 'diyi 'yezu i.

English: The reopening of universities has brought confusion amongst the students.
Luganda: Okuggulawo zi ssettendekero kureeseewo okuzaabuzibwa mu bayizi.
Runyankore: Okwiguraho amatendekyero ga Yunivasite kireesireho okuburabuzibwa omu beegi.
Acholi: Yabe pa university okelo anywena nywena i kin lutino kwan
Ateso: Apukorio naka Iunibasitin nes ayau abuonokin kanejaas asiomak.
Lugbara: E'yo Univasti eyi ma ti zizu ri eji abaza sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea tre.

English: Candidates are expected to go back to school soon.
Luganda: Abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'akamalirizo basuubirwa okudda ku masomero mu bwangu.
Runyankore: Ab'ebibiina by'akamaririzo nibaza kugaruka aha mashomero omu bwire butari bwa hare.
Acholi: Lutino ma gipenye i mwaka ni cok dok i gangkwan
Ateso: Asiomak lu angetakinak kes eyapie abongor osomero.
Lugbara: Sukulu anzi depi dede 'diyi eco ye go sukulua mbeleru ra.

English: The Uganda Examination Board are yet to decide when students will sit their exams.
Luganda: Uganda Examination Boarde naatera okusalawo ddi abayizi lwe banaatuula ebibuuzo byabwe.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'ebigyezo, tikikashaziremu, obu abeegi baraakore ebigyezo.
Acholi: Dul me Uganda Examination Board bimoko awene ma lutino omyero otim iye peny
Ateso: Erionget loiwadikai aingito ko Uganda nges ebeit aitemokin apak na iboikinotor esisiak aingito.
Lugbara: Amuti obeta fepi Uganda National Examination Board ru ꞌdiyi nga kiri ega anzi eco te obeta ꞌye nguare yarima dria ega.

English: The government says there is no money to help people to study online.
Luganda: Gavumenti egamba nti tewali ssente za kuyamba bantu kusomera ku mutimbagano.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neegamba ngu tihariho sente z'okuhwera abeegi kwegyera aha intaneeti.
Acholi: Gamente waco ni cente pe me weko dano okwan ki intanet
Ateso: Ebala apugan ebe emamete ikapun lu ingarakinet itunga aisisia kolago.
Lugbara: Gamete kini robia 'ba eyi ma aza kozu onita onizu oli aliasi yo.

English: Schools should not increase school fees.
Luganda: Amasomero tegalina kwongeza bisale.
Runyankore: Amashomero tigashemereire kwongyeza ebishare.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero pe gumed wel cente me kwan
Ateso: Mam isomeroi aiyat ikapun lu esomero.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma otuki sukulu fizi ku.

English: There are many newly established government schools this year.
Luganda: Amasomero ga gavumenti amapya mangi agazimbiddwa omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Hariho amashomero maingi masya ga gavumenti agaigwirweho omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Tye gangi kwan mapol pa Gamente ma pud oyabe ayaba i mwaka ni
Ateso: Epuata isomeroi luitetiak lu apugan okaru lo.
Lugbara: Eli 'disi, sukulu gamete ni e'dole o'di 'diyi tre.

English: The school headteacher has been arrested for beating the underage girls.
Luganda: Omukulu w'essomero akwatiddwa olw'okukuba abawala abatanneetuuka.
Runyankore: Mukuru w'eishomero akwasirwe ahabw'okuteera abaishiki abakiri bato omu myaka.
Acholi: Kimako laloc me gangkwan pi pwodo lutino anyira matino
Ateso: Ekamar apolokiton lo esomero kanu aida apesur nu edisiak.
Lugbara: Ba bi dricere 'da ci erini ezoanzi eli capiku 'diyi cozu ri si.

English: The ministry of education notified schools of the revised exam time table.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyenjigiriza yategeeza amasomero ku nkyukakyuka mu budde ebibuuzo kwe binaakolebwamu.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'ebyobwegyese ekamanyisa amashomero ebihindwirwe omu bwire bw'okukora ebigyezo.
Acholi: Gang kal ma mako lok kom kwan omiyo ngec bot gangi kwan pi time table me peny ma kilokoni
Ateso: Abu erionget loka aisisia itijenik isomeroi nuka ainapeta nuka aisisia  lo ejulakin.
Lugbara: Okalamvu onitaniri ece sukulu yi dri eꞌyo taimu tebulu obeta ꞌyezu ꞌbani ale andri ꞌbori ma dria ra.

English: Do u think this academic year should be cancelled?
Luganda: Olowooza omwaka gw'ebyensoma guno gulina okusazibwamu?
Runyankore: Nooteekateeka ngu omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ogu gushazibwemu?
Acholi: Itamo ni kwan me mwakani omyero ki ngol woko?
Ateso: Iwomit ijo ebe edolit aikisar asioman na ekaru kalo?
Lugbara: Mini egazurisi 'le 'ba ma li eli sukulu lazu 'di va?

English: The government refuses to comment on when educational institutions would resume.
Luganda: Gavumenti egaana okwogera ku ddi amatendekero lwe ganaggulawo.
Runyankore: Gavument teine eki egambire aha nshonga y'obwire obu amashomero gareije kwigurwa.
Acholi: Gamente pe tye ka waco awene ma gangi kwan biyabbe
Ateso: Abu apugan ogir alimor kanu ikamunit apak na ebongokinoto isomeroi
Lugbara: Gamete ga ti apeko e'yo anzi eyi go sukulua nguari ari ma dria si.

English: It is always important for the ministry of education to oversee all school issues.
Luganda: Bulijjo kya mugaso minisitule y'ebyenjigiriza okulondoola ensonga z'amasomero zonna.
Runyankore: Ni kikuru minisiture y'eby'obwegyese kukora aha nshonga ezirikukwata aha mashomero.
Acholi: Pire tek tutwal ni gang kal ma loyo lok kom kwan aye omyero okeme kilok weng ma kwako gangi kwan
Ateso: Epolok duc nu erionget loka aisisia aimaniman nuikamunitos kere nuka isomeroi.
Lugbara: Eri oꞌdu driasi orodriru okalamvu onitaniri ni asi ꞌbazu eꞌyo onitani ꞌdiyi ma dria ra.

English: The government has allowed educational institutions to open up for final year students.
Luganda: Gavumenti ekkirizza amatendekero okuggulirawo abayizi abali mu mwaka  ogw'akamalirizo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eikiriize amatendekyero kwiguriraho abeegi ab'ebibiina by'akamaririzo.
Acholi: Gamente oye ni gangi kwan oyabbe pi lutino kwan ma gitye i mwaka gi me agiki
Ateso: Acamaki apugan isomeroi apukor kanu asioman na ekaru kalo.
Lugbara: Gamete ai 'bani angu onitani 'diyi ma ti zizu sukulu anzi depi dede 'diyi ni ra.

English: Educational institutions are to be changed into treatment points.
Luganda: Amatendekero gaakufuulibwamu ebifo ebijjanjabirwamu.
Runyankore: Amashomero nigaza kuhindurwa emyanya y'okuraguriramu abarwaire.
Acholi: Kibiloko gangi kwan doko ka nongo yat
Ateso: Ebeit aijulakin isomeroi araun aiboisio nu imukere.
Lugbara: Ba mu angu onita ni 'diyi oja angu 'bani o'bi eyini aro fezu 'diyi ru.

English: Every student is awaiting the date when schools will eventually resume.
Luganda: Buli muyizi alindirira ennaku z'omwezi amasomero lwe galiddamu okuggulawo.
Runyankore: Buri mwegi arinzire eizooba eri bareije kwiguraho amashomero.
Acholi: Lutino kwan weng tye ka kuru nino dwe ma gangi kwan biyabbe
Ateso: Kangin asioman idarit aparan na epukorere isomeroi.
Lugbara: Sukulu mva dria ni o'du 'bani sukulu eyi ma ti zizu ri te.

English: Why are some school girls opting for abortion instead of keeping the pregnancy?
Luganda: Lwaki abawala abamu abasoma basalawo okuggyamu embuto mu kifo ky'okuzikuza?
Runyankore: Ahabw'enki abashiki abamwe nibenda ngu baihemu enda omu mwanya gw'okureka enda zikakura?
Acholi: Pingo anyira kwan mogo tye ka yero yo me kwanyo ic me kaka gwoko ne?
Ateso: Inyobo elemiatar acie apesur akoikes aiboisit na aidar akoik?
Lugbara: Ezoanzi kari Uganda ni sukulua 'diyi ma azi eyi anzi ofu te, anzi eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma paria a'du ma e'yosi?

English: Drama is very fun.
Luganda: Katemba anyuma nnyo.
Runyankore: Emizaano neeshemeza
Acholi: Tuku goga mit tutwal
Ateso: Eraas nu eumokina.
Lugbara: Avita eyi ndri saaru.

English: Wedding ceremonies are not for the rich only.
Luganda: Emikolo gy'embaga si gya bagagga bokka.
Runyankore: Embaga z'okugaitwa tiziri z'abagaiga bonka.
Acholi: Kwer me nyom pe obedo pi lulonyo keken
Ateso: Aiwen epeta mam erai kanu kalu ebaritos bon.
Lugbara: Aje bi kanisa 'diyi adrini 'ba robia be 'diyini a'dule ku.

English: What are the benefits of music nominations?
Luganda: Miganyulo ki egiri mu kusunsulwa kw'okuyimba?
Runyankore: Ni birungi ki ebiri omu kutoorana abeeshongozi?
Acholi: Adwogi ango ma nonge ki i yero lugo wer?
Ateso: Inyoin bo ajokis airam emuisik apak na ebwoere?
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba ongo ngopi onyiru tu ꞌdiyi opezuri ma efi ngoni ya?

English: Ceremonies are part of life.
Luganda: Emikolo kitundu ku bulamu.
Runyankore: Emikoro nikimwe aha bi abantu barikukira kukora.
Acholi: Kwer obedo yo me kwo
Ateso: Ipucito eraas ewai lo aijar.
Lugbara: Omuu eyi e'yo idri ma alea ni eyi.

English: Reality television shows usually come to an end unexpectedly.
Luganda: Pulogulaamu za ttivi eziraga embeera abantu gye bayitamu ziggwa mu ngeri gy'otasuubira.
Runyankore: Emizaano erikukira kworekwa aha televijoni neekira kuhendera kitaraariire.
Acholi: Tuku ma nyutu kit kwo pa dano ma ki nyutu i telebijon pol kare gik atura
Ateso: Aitodianareta nuka nuitelelete lo telebision edaunonos komam ituan ejeni.
Lugbara: Otita tivia ꞌbani eꞌyo ada yi eꞌdazu ꞌi ꞌdiyi oꞌdu vusi yi de mbeleru.

English: How was the comedy show?
Luganda: Ekivvulu kya bakazanyiikirizi kyabadde kitya?
Runyankore: Omuzaano ogurikushetsya gushushire ki?
Acholi: Goga obedo nining?
Ateso: Biyaibo aitodianareta nuisiyalete?
Lugbara: Avita komediru ꞌda te ngoni ya?

English: We have lost many talented artists over the years.
Luganda: Tufiiriddwa bannabitone bangi emyaka egyetoolodde.
Runyankore: Tufereirwe abeeshongozi abaine etaraanta omu myaka ehwaire.
Acholi: Warwenyo lugo wer mapol ma tye ki mic me wer i mwaki ma okaro angec
Ateso: Itwakia oni awook luejokuka okaru lu atuboros.
Lugbara: Eli agapi ꞌdiyi ma alia, ama avi ondou ongo ngopi ꞌdiyi tre tre.

English: It is my goal to be the leading movie actor.
Luganda: Kiruubirirwa kyange okubeera omuzannyi wa ffirimu asinga.
Runyankore: Nyine ekigyendererwa ky'okuhinduka omuzaani wa muvi mukuru.
Acholi: Obedo kwonge na ni omyero abed latuku me filim muywek
Ateso: Erai apeleikinet ka araun lo ingarenit kotoma aboliasinei.
Lugbara: Asiꞌbaza maniri eri ovuzu ꞌba avita ma alia asidrileruniriru.

English: The International dance event will be broadcasted live on television in September.
Luganda: Ekivvulu ky'amazina eky'ensi yonna kijja kulagibwa butereevu ku terefayina mu gwomwenda.
Runyankore: Omukoro gw'okuzina ogw'amahanga goona nigwija kworekwa aha terevijoni omu kwezi kwamwenda.
Acholi: Myel ma kelo wilobo kulu kacel kibinjutu ne i Telebijon i dwe me abungwen
Ateso: Elagano lo ekosio nes elosio aitodiar ko telebision olap lo ikanyetangon.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga avita ꞌbani ꞌye wudrikurusiri ꞌba tivia sawa erini ꞌi ꞌyezuria mba Oromisi.

English: Musicians have been denied permission to stage a show in Kampala.
Luganda: Abayimbi bammiddwa olukusa okutegeka ekivvulu mu Kampala.
Runyankore: Abeeshongozi baimirwe orusa rw'okutaho omukoro gw'okweshongora omuri Kampala.
Acholi: Ki gengo lugo wer pe me yubu myel i Kampala
Ateso: Emiki awook aitodianar awoere kec ko Kampala.
Lugbara: ꞌBa oga ꞌba ongo ngoꞌba ꞌdiyini ongo ꞌbako Kampalaa si.

English: We should make laws that can assist in fighting defilers.
Luganda: Tulina okubaga amateeka agasobola okutuyamba okulwanyisa abakabasanya abaana.
Runyankore: Tushemereire kukora ebiragiro ebirikuhwera omu kurwanisa abarikutoroboza abaana.
Acholi: Omyero wakati ki cik ma konyo lweny i kom dano maburu ki lutino anyira ma mwaka gi tino
Ateso: Ekot oni aswam ikisila lu ingarakinete aitiji lu esiolak idwe.
Lugbara: Le amama si azita ecopi 'ba anzi nyiri eyi obipi 'diyi ndezu ra 'diyi.

English: Nearly ten thousand girls were defiled between January and June.
Luganda: Kumpi abawala mutwalo baasobozebwako wakati wa Gatonnya ne Ssebaaseka.
Runyankore: Abaishiki haihi abarikuhika omutwaro nibo batoroboziibwe ahagati y'okwezi kw'okubanza n'okwa mukaaga.
Acholi: Anyira maromo alip apar kibuto kwedgi i kin dwe me acel ki dwe me abicel
Ateso: Nepetai apesur ilukumin itomon kes aponi isiolai kiding olap losodit ka olap lo ikanyetape.
Lugbara: Ba obi ezoanzi nyiri ogogo elifu mudri 'diyi imba alu pi ma eselea imba aro be.

English: Not all coronavirus test results come back accurately and in time.
Luganda: Si buli ebiva mu kukebera akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona nti bikomawo nga bituufu era mu budde.
Runyankore: Ebirikuruga omukukyebera oburwaire bwa Korona byona tibirikugaruka bihikire kandi tibirikugaruka omu bwire.
Acholi: Pe adwogi me pime pi two Corona weng dwogo ma kakare bene i nge kare manok
Ateso: Mam ainwaketa kere nuka ekorona ebongunete eraas nuabeit ido kotoma apak.
Lugbara: Azo koronani ꞌbani oꞌbi ꞌdiyi ma dria eꞌyo ada ꞌdiyi efuni oꞌdu driasi kililiru ku azini sawa kililiria ku.

English: Coronavirus test kits are being questioned by the public.
Luganda: Kiiti ezikebera akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona zitankanibwa abantu.
Runyankore: Ebyoma by'okukyebera Corona Virus abantu nibabibanganisa.
Acholi: Dano tye ki lapeny ma lubbe ki jami me pimo kwidi two Corona
Ateso: Inwakete luka ekorona ejaas itunga abuonokin nukec.
Lugbara: OꞌBi yi apini afa ꞌbani ayu azo koronani oꞌbizu ꞌdiyisi ku.

English: The task force has also been tasked to review the status of the remaining sector.
Luganda: Akakiiko akadduukirize kaweereddwa omulimu okwekenneenya y'abantu abasigaddewo.
Runyankore: Ab'akakiiko bashabirwe kugaruka bakareeba ekicweka ekisigaire
Acholi: Kimiyo tic bot dul me Task force me neno maber jami ma tye katime
Ateso: Atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce nes ecorakin airereor nu ideuna kotoma atukot kangin.
Lugbara: ꞌBa fe vini aꞌyota ꞌba eꞌyo koronani ma drileru ꞌdiyi dri ꞌba acepi ꞌdiyi esu azo ra ya kani esu azo ku yari ma ale andrizu.

English: Diseases spread and can also lead to deaths.
Luganda: Endwadde zisaasaana era zisobola okuviirako okufa.
Runyankore: Endwara nizijanjara kandi nizibaasa kwita.
Acholi: Two nya dok bene twero kelo to
Ateso: Adekasinei nu isiarakina eyangaunete atwanare.
Lugbara: Azo yi yi ere azini yi eco ecazu draru ra.

English: Health check-ups are a necessity.
Luganda: Okukeberwa endwadde kyetaago.
Runyankore: Okukyeberwa okamanya oku ori omu magara nikikuru munonga
Acholi: Pime i ot yat obedo gin ma mite
Ateso: Awanyanar awate eraas nuepolok noi.
Lugbara: Rua o'bita ta arojoa azo eyisi ri eri orodriru.

English: The whole world is in a pandemic.
Luganda: Ensi yonna eri mu kirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Ensi yoona eteganisiibwe oburwaire.
Acholi: Wilobo weng tye kaneno can me poto pa two
Ateso: Akwap kere eutas keda adeka.
Lugbara: Wudrikuru ndulu eri azo ma alia.

English: Pandemic diseases often spread faster and may most likely lead to deaths.
Luganda: Endwadde bbunansi zitera okusaasaana amangu era ebiseera ebisinga ziyinza okuviirako okufa.
Runyankore: Endwara ezirikubarukaho nizikira kunjaara ahonaaho kandi nizibaasa kwita.
Acholi: Two ma poto i wilobo weng nya oyot dok twero kelo to mapol
Ateso: Adeka nes ekora noi ido emina ayangaun atwanare.
Lugbara: Azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdinile ꞌdiyi sawa driasi yi ere mbele mbele azini yi eco ꞌba jizu dra ma alia ra.

English: What is the meaning of cholesterol?
Luganda: Kolesitulo kitegeeza ki?
Runyankore: Ebishaju by'omu mubiri niki?
Acholi: Cholesterol obedo gin ango
Ateso: Inyobo apolouke asiepai.
Lugbara: Afa omvele rua ma oso ru ri ma efi ngoni.

English: It is very possible for every woman to conceive naturally.
Luganda: Kisobokera ddala buli mukazi okufuna olubuto mu mbeera ya bulijjo.
Runyankore: Omukazi weena naabaasa kutwara enda.
Acholi: Mon ducu twero gamo ic labongo kony macen?
Ateso: Epatana kanginiberu apotuun.
Lugbara: oku driani mva esuzu aro kokoruri eri eꞌyo ꞌi ꞌyepi rani.

English: Exercises are very good for maintaining a healthy body.
Luganda: Dduyiro mulungi nnyo mu kukuuma omubiri nga mulamu.
Runyankore: Okukora ebisasaizi nikirungi, nikirinda gye amagara
Acholi: Jami calo wot onyo ngwec ber tutwal pi gwoko yot kom
Ateso: Ejok arionor kanu aidar akwan ongalei.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌyele rua ejuzu ꞌdiyi orodriru tu alata ruani ma tambazu

English: Milk has lots of health benefits.
Luganda: Amata galimu emiganyulo gy'ebyobulamu mingi.
Runyankore: Amate gaine omugasho aha magara.
Acholi: Cak tye ki jami mapol ma mite pi gwoko yot kom
Ateso: Ejaas akile keda iboro lu idarete akwan ongalei.
Lugbara: Lesu ma alea, orodri rua ma alata ni 'diyi tre.

English: Expand medical treatment units where necessary.
Luganda: Gaziya ebifo awajjanjabirwa  we kyetaagisiza.
Runyankore: Hagutsya emyanya y'okujanjaabiramu kyaba nikibaasika
Acholi: Kanongo yat omyero obed pol kace lare
Ateso: Iyatakisi aiboisio nu imukere kane ebeit.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ma ere pari aro esuzu ꞌdiyi angu ta siipira ꞌdiyi ma alia dria.

English: Medical professionals also need to be appreciated for their good work.
Luganda: Abakugu mu byobulamu nabo beetaaga okusiimibwa olw'omulimu gwabwe omulungi.
Runyankore: Abakugu omu by'amagara nabo baine kusiimwa ahabw'emirimo yaabo.
Acholi: Mite bene ni kipwo lutic me yot kom pi tic gi maber
Ateso: Ipirioitin lu amukian da ekotosi aisiyalamikino kanu aswam kec najokan.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe awa'difo o'bi azi ngapi arojoa 'diyini azi orodriru eyini 'ye diyisi ra.

English: Coronavirus deaths are increasing in Uganda.
Luganda: Abafa akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona beeyongera mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Abarikwitwa Korona beeyongyeire omu Uganda.
Acholi: To macalo adwogi me two Corona tye ka medde i lobo Uganda
Ateso: Iyata atwanare na ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba odrapi azo corona niri si 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu Kari Uganda niri ma alea tutu.

English: During the coronavirus outbreak, people began making masks out of clothes.
Luganda: Mu kubalukawo kw'akawuka ka sennyiga kolona abantu baatandika okukola masiki mu ngoye.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bwa Korona ku bwatandikire, abantu baatandika kukora masiki z'emyenda.
Acholi: I kare ma two Corona opoto, dano ocako yubu bongi me boyo um
Ateso: Kapak na abwangunor ekorona opotu itunga ogeutu aswam aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume keda igoen.
Lugbara: Sa'wa azo corona niri si, O'bi eyi e'do afa su omvua azini tia 'diyi ede bongo eyi si.

English: Coronavirus infections keep on increasing but also some people are recovering from the virus.
Luganda: Abalwala akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona beeyongera naye era abantu abamu bawona akawuka.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bwa Korona nibuguma nibweyongyera kwonka hariho abantu bamwe abarikukira.
Acholi: Wel dano ma tye kanongo two Corona tye ka nya ento bene dano mogo tye ka cang
Ateso: Adeka naka ekorona iyata konye ejaas icie itunga angaleun.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azo koronani esupi ꞌdiyi ma kalafeni dro tusi te ꞌba azi ꞌdiyi eꞌdo ati ani ꞌbo.

English: There is still no coronavirus vaccine.
Luganda: Tewannabaawo ddagala ligema kawuka ka ssennyiga kolona
Runyankore: Omubazi ogurikusirika Korona tigukareebekire.
Acholi: Yat agwera pi gengo two Corona pud peke
Ateso: Erongo ekia loka ekorona emamei.
Lugbara: Corona ma aro eri nga yo.

English: Hospital workers go on strike over delayed salary payments.
Luganda: Abasawo b'eddwaliro beediima olw'okulwawo okusasulwa omusaala.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'omu marwariro bagiire omu kesharingo ahabw'emishara yaabo kukyerererwa.
Acholi: Lutic me yot kom tye ka jemo pien cul ogale
Ateso: Alungata eswamak lu adekis aswam kanu eyapia atacio na eropit.
Lugbara: Aziꞌba ajojoa ꞌdiyi sawa driasi ngiringiri ꞌye ꞌbani yi vile oya ofezu mbele kurisi.

English: Men have been affected by coronavirus more than women.
Luganda: Abasajja bakoseddwa akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona okusinga abakyala.
Runyankore: Endwara ya eteganiise munonga abashaija okukira abakazi.
Acholi: Two Corona okelo peko madwong bot co ka i poro ki mon
Ateso: Ekamutu ikiliok adeka naka ekorona adepar angor.
Lugbara: Azo koronaniri fe ocoko agupi yi dri aga oku yi driri ra.

English: coronavirus deaths are nearing to a million.
Luganda: Abaakafa akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona bakunukkiriza akakadde.
Runyankore: Abaisirwe Korona bari haihi kuhika akakaikuru kamwe.
Acholi: To macalo adwogi me Corona cok karomo milion
Ateso: Ayapikisi atwakisia nuka ekorona emilionit.
Lugbara: Ba odrapi azo corona niri si 'diyi ma kalafe ni di 'ye ca milioni alu.

English: The Police post in kawempe closes after one arrested person was found with coronavirus.
Luganda: Poliisi y'e Kawempe eggaddwawo oluvannyuma lw'omu ku bakwate okuzuulibwa n'akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona.
Runyankore: Poriisi ya Kawempe ekingireho ahanyima y'okushangamu omuntu oine oburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Polic ma I Kawempe tye alora pien kinongo dano acel ma kimako tye ki two Corona
Ateso: Aponi ogolokinai police post loko Kawempe akaulo etunganan lo ekamunio ainwakun ekorona.
Lugbara: ꞌBa opi angu polisi yini Kawempeari ma ti ꞌbani ꞌba alu esuzu azo koronaniri be cirisi.

English: Research says that the coronavirus can attack the human brain.
Luganda: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti akawuka ka ssennyiga kolona kasobola okukwata obwongo bw'omuntu.
Runyankore: Okucondooza nikworeka ngu oburwaire bwa Korona nibubaasa kukwata obwonko bw'omuntu.
Acholi: Kwed ma okati nyutu ni two Corona twero donyo wa i adam pa dano
Ateso: Itodunit aingic ebe epedori ekorona amunar adam etunganan.
Lugbara: ꞌBani esu eꞌyo eti ondaza sirisi kini azo koronaniri eco ꞌba ma omi ezazu ra.

English: Coronavirus has no cure or vaccine of late.
Luganda: Akawuka ka sennyiga kolona tekannafuna ddagala likawonya oba okukagemebwa mu kaseera kano.
Runyankore: Endwara ya Korona tekatungire omubazi gw'okugitamba nainga kugisirika.
Acholi: Pe tye yat me cango onyo gengo two Corona
Ateso: Emamei ekorona ekia itoni kopana.
Lugbara: Aro azo koronaniri atizuni nga yo azini aro ꞌba osozu ani ꞌdiyi nga yo.

English: if you want to be healthy drink milk daily.
Luganda: Bw'oba oyagala okubeera omulamu nywa amata buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Waaba noyenda kugira amagara marungi, nywa amate buri izooba.
Acholi: Ka imito ni komi obed yot ci mat cak nino ducu
Ateso: Arai ikoto ijo angaleu omasenenei akile nginiparan.
Lugbara: Ika le adri rua ala be, imvu lesu O'du driasi.

English: We want to know if social distancing exists.
Luganda: Twagala okumanya oba okwewa amabanga weekuli.
Runyankore: Nitwenda kumanya yaaba enkora otampika haihi eriho.
Acholi: Wamito niang kace bedo bor i kin dano tye ka time
Ateso: Ikoto oni ajenun arai ejai alanakina otunga.
Lugbara: Ama le oni eꞌyo oꞌbi yini esele cozu yi ma eselea rereri ci ada yari.

English: Health workers were appreciated for the good work done.
Luganda: Abasawo baasiimiddwa olw'omulimu omulungi ogukoleddwa.
Runyankore: Abashaho bakasiimwa ahabw'emirimo ei bakozire.
Acholi: Kimiyo pwoc bot lutic me yot kom pi tic maber
Ateso: Aponi isiyalamikinai eswamak lu adekisia kanu aswam najokan.
Lugbara: Ba fe awa'difo o'bi azi ngapi arojoa 'diyini azi orodriru eyini 'ye ri si.

English: There are more cases from samples collected at the entry points of the country.
Luganda: Waliwo abalwadde abalala okuva mu sampolo ezaakungaanyiziddwa ku bifo by'eggwanga ewayingirirwa.
Runyankore: Kurugirira omu byakyebeirwe, abantu baingi aha nsharo z'eihanga bashangirwe baine akakooko ka korona.
Acholi: Kinongo two i kom dano mapol ma kipimo gi ki i boda mapatpat ma orumu Lobo Uganda
Ateso: Ipu itunga lu inwakunitai keda adeka kotoma aiboisio nu oikoru kakwap wok.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani esu azo koronani be ꞌdiyi ma kalafe angiri ndeniri ꞌba ꞌbani afa oꞌbile yi ma rua ꞌdiyi eꞌduzu engazu mupaka ma milea ꞌdiyi,

English: There will be a daily release of coronavirus results by the Ministry of Health.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu ejja kufulumyanga ebivudde mu kukebera akawuka ka kolona buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara neija kuguma neeshohoza ebirugire omu kukyebera korona buri izooba.
Acholi: Gang kal ma loyo lok me yot kom bimiyo adwogi me pime pi two corona nino ducu
Ateso: Ejaun duc alimonorio na akiro nuka ekorona korionget loka angaleu.
Lugbara: Okalmvu alataniri ni nga eꞌyo azo koronani ꞌbani oꞌbi oꞌdu vusi ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ofu oꞌdu driasi.

English: There are more coronavirus cases in the truck drivers.
Luganda: Waliwo abavuzi ba biroole abalala abazuuliddwamu akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abaine endwara ya korona omu bavugi b'ebiiruka ebihango beyongyeire.
Acholi: Dano madwong ma tye ki two corona ginonge i kin ludwo motoka trela
Ateso: Ejaas itunga luipu lu ejatatar keda ekorona lu itekerete alorei.
Lugbara: Ba esule azo corona niri be 'diyi ma pari dereva mutukari ambu 'diyi onzu pi 'diyi.

English: Some patients have not fully recovered from the sickness.
Luganda: Abalwadde abamu tebannawonera ddala okuva mu bulwadde.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abamwe tibakakiriire kimwe oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Lutwo corona mukene pud peya gucang maber
Ateso: Icie kotoma adekak mam engaleunitos ejok.
Lugbara: Ba azi azoru 'diyi esuni nga atita azo si deku.

English: Truck drivers from neighbouring countries contribute the highest number of coronavirus cases in Uganda.
Luganda: Abavuzi ba birooole okuva mu nsi ezitwetoolodde bongezza omuwendo gw'abalwadde bw'akawuka kolona mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Abavugi b'ebimootoka ebihango kuruga omu mahanga agatwetorwaire, nibo baretaire omubaro gw'abarwire Corona omu Uganda gwayeyongyera.
Acholi: Ludwor trela ma aa ki il obo mukene macok ki lobo Uganda aye wel gidwong loyo i kin dano ma tye ki two Corona
Ateso: Etekerak alorei kotoma akwapin nu idunyare kes eyaunitos enaba loepol lo adekak ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: ꞌBa mutukari ambo ꞌdiyi onzupi engazu suru azia ꞌdiyi ꞌba ꞌbani esu azo koronani be Ugandaa tutu ꞌdiyi

English: What are the signs and symptoms of coronavirus?
Luganda: Akawuka ka kolona kalina bubonero ki?
Runyankore: Obubonero n'obumanyiso bw'endwara ya Korona nibuuha?
Acholi: Lanyut me two corona aye mene?
Ateso: Anubo ijenuneta luka ekorona?
Lugbara: Wura ndundu azo corona niri ni i e'dazu 'diyi ngoni?

English: Frontline health workers have joined the number of individuals who have contracted coronavirus.
Luganda: Abasawo abali ku mwaanjo beegasse ku bannayuganda akawatiddwa akawuka ka kolona..
Runyankore: Abashaho abamwe abarikuragurira abakwatsirwe endwara ya Korona nabo bakwatsirwe oburwaire obu.
Acholi: Lutic me yot kom ma i dog lweny kikome dong gitye i kin jo magucakko nongo two Corona
Ateso: Eswamak lu angaleu lu isingarenitai kes alomasi onaba lo itunga kalu akatutu ekorona
Lugbara: ꞌBa azi ngapi arojoa eꞌyo azo Koronaniri ma alea agadua ꞌdiyi eci yi ꞌba azokoronani be ꞌdiyi ma aziru indi.

English: The samples for the contacts were taken for testing.
Luganda: Sampolo z'abo abaaliko n'abalwadde zaatwalibwa okukeberebwa.
Runyankore: Abahikaine nabakwatsirwe endwara ya Korona baihirweho eby'okukyebera byatwarwa kubikyebere.
Acholi: Dano ma obedo cok ki lutwo kikwanyo remogi me apima
Ateso: Aokot nuka itunga kalu agonganara keda lu adekasi aponi oyangarai kanu ainwak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌdu osolo ꞌba aꞌapi ꞌba azo koronaniri be ꞌdiyi pie ra ꞌdiyi vileri jizu oꞌbizu ra.

English: Thanks should be extended to health workers in the Northern region.
Luganda: Okwebaza kugende eri abasawo mu kitundu ky'obukiikakkono.
Runyankore: Abashaho b'omumatemba ga Uganda, bashemereire kusiimwa.
Acholi: Pwoc madit omyero kimi bot lutic me yot kom ma i tung kumalo me Uganda
Ateso: Ekot aisiyalamikin eswamak lu adekis luko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ma fe awaꞌdifo ꞌba azi ngapi arojoa Kari ꞌdi ma kala oruleruria ꞌdiyi dri.

English: The amount of money required to take a coronavirus test will be communicated.
Luganda: Omuwendo gw'ensimbi ogwetaagisa okukebera akawuka ka kolona gujja kwogerebwa.
Runyankore: Esente ezirikwetengwa kukyebera abaine Korona nigwiija kubamanyisibwa.
Acholi: Wel mamite me pime pi two corona kibimiyone lacen
Ateso: Etiai lo ikapun lu ipudai kanu ainwakia ekorona nes eponio aitijenikin yes.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga robia ꞌbani le azo Koronaniri oꞌbizuri ma omgbo lura.

English: There is a delay in releasing results for the samples that were tested.
Luganda: Waliwo okulwawo mu kufulumya ebyava mu samopolo ezaakeberebwa.
Runyankore: Hariho okukyerererwa omu kushohoza ebirikuruga omu kukyebera.
Acholi: Agala-gala tye i miyo adwogi me pime ma kitimo
Ateso: Iyapi aitolomuno na akiro naka aokot kanu ayangaritai ainwak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa sawa eza eꞌyo ꞌbani esu azo ꞌbani oꞌbi ꞌdiyi ma driari ecezu angiri

English: All tests from the eleven foreigners turned out to be positive.
Luganda: Byonna ebyakweberebwa ku bagwira ekkumi n'omu byazuuliddwamu akawuka.
Runyankore: Abarugire aheeru boona abakyebeirwe bakashangwa baine oburwaire.
Acholi: Jo aparacel ma pe anywali me Uganda kinongo ni weng gitye ki two corona
Ateso: Ainwakio kere na itunga kalu okinga itomonadiope aponi adumunai adeka.
Lugbara: ꞌBa esu ꞌba mudri drini alu ovupi kari anziru ku ꞌbani yi ma rua azo oꞌbizu ꞌdiyi dria azo be.

English: Truck drivers who tested positive for coronavirus were taken back to their home countries.
Luganda: Abavuzi ba biroole abaazuuliddwamu akawuka ka kolona baddiziddwayo mu nsi zaabwe.
Runyankore: Abavugi b'ebiiruka ebihango abashangirwe baine oburwaire, bakabagarura omu mahanga gaabo.
Acholi: Ludwor trailer ma kinongo gitye ki two corona weng kidwokogi cen i lobo gi
Ateso: Etekerak alorei lu aponi inwakunai ekorona aponi inyakarai akwapin kec.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ji dereva ovupi kari anzini ku mutukari ambo ꞌdiyi onzupi ꞌbani ndra azo koronani esuzu yi ma rua ꞌdiyi vile suru yi vile ꞌdiyi ma alia.

English: More coronavirus patients were realised after testing in June.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona abalala baazuulibwa oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa mu gw'omukaaga.
Runyankore: Bwanyima y'okukyebara omu kwezi kwa mukaaga abandi abarwaire ba korona baingi bakareebeka.
Acholi: Lutwo corona mukene kigonyogi ki i ot yat i dwe me abicel
Ateso: Aponi odumunai icie itunga lu adekasi ekorona akaulo na ainwak olap lo ikanyetape.
Lugbara: ꞌBa esu ꞌba azo koronaniri be ꞌdiyi ma azi karakara yi mba azia ma vutia ꞌdia.

English: Samples were taken from their immediate contacts and also from the health workers.
Luganda: Sampolo zaggyibwa ku bantu be baali baakabaako nabo n'okuva ku basawo.
Runyankore: Abantu ababahereraire hamwe n'abashaho nabo bakakyeberwa.
Acholi: Kikwanyo remo pa dano macok kwedgi ki bene ki bot lutic me yot kom
Ateso: Aponi oyangarai aokot nu itunga lu agongatar kesi keda nuka emukiak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌdu afa ꞌbani azo oꞌbizu engazu alenia ꞌdiyi ꞌba aꞌapi ꞌba azo be ꞌdiyi be inyia inyia ꞌdiyi vu azini ꞌba arojoa azi ngapi yi ma rua ꞌdiyi vu.

English: People were advised to wear a mask while in public.
Luganda: Abantu baaweebwa amagezi okwambala obukookolo nga bali mu bifo eby'olukale.
Runyankore: Abantu bakahaburwa kujwara masiki baaba bari omu bandi.
Acholi: Kimiyo tam bot dano me boyo umgi ka gitye i kin lwak
Ateso: Aponi icorakinai itunga anapenen aitabalan nurapis aituk keda akume ejaas otunga.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba eyini imbata afa sule tia azini omvua omvele masiki 'diyi suzu ci sa'wa dria si o'bi eselea.

English: The coronavirus test is very expensive.
Luganda: Okukebererwa kw'akawuka ka kolona kwa buseere nnyo.
Runyankore: Okukyebera oburwaire bwa korona nikutwara esente nyingi munonga.
Acholi: Pime pi two Corona wele tek
Ateso: Ainwakio naka ekorona erai na epol etiai.
Lugbara: Azo corona niri ma neta 'ba ma aria ri eri ajeru.

English: The government offered to distribute masks to all Ugandans countrywide.
Luganda: Gavumenti yeewaayo okugabira bannayuganda bonna obukookolo okwetooloola ggwanga.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ekeehayo kugabira abanya Uganda boona za Masiki z'okujwara.
Acholi: Gamente opoko laboo um onyo mask bot anywali me lobo Uganda weng
Ateso: Akapanakin apugan aikor aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume otunga kere luko uganada.
Lugbara: Gamete owi i afa sule tia azini omvua omvele masiki ru 'diyi awazu Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi dri dria kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

English: A few coronavirus recoveries have been realised.
Luganda: Abaawonye akawuka ka kolona abatono basiimiddwa.
Runyankore: Abantu bakye nibo baakizire oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Dano manok ma onongo tye ki two corona otyeko cang
Ateso: Ejaas lu angaleutu adeka naka ekorona
Lugbara: Ba esu 'ba azi atita esupi azo corona niri si ni eyi ma azi were ra.

English: Patients that tested negative for coronavirus in Gulu have been discharged.
Luganda: Abalwadde abataazuulibwamu kawuka ka kolona e Gulu basiibuddwa.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abakyebeirwe bakashangwa batakiine oburwaire bwa korona omuri Gulu babasiibwire.
Acholi: Dano ma kipimo ki Gulu ma kinongo ni gipe ki two corona ki tyeko gonyo gi woko
Ateso: itunga lu enwakunitai ebe amamei ekorona ko Gulu aponi otwarai.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba ebipi adripi azoru Gulua ni eyi arojoa ri si ra 'bani azo corona niri esuzu eyi ma aria ku ri ma vutia.

English: Nowadays every private hospital asks for a consultation fee.
Luganda: Ennaku zino buli ddwaliro ery'obwannannyini lisaba ssente z'okwebuuza.
Runyankore: Ebiro ebi, buri irwariro eritari rya Gavumenti nirishaba esente z'okureeba abashaho.
Acholi: Kin kareni odi yadi pa wegigi weng penyo pi cul me neno daktar
Ateso: Kwana ngin adekis na mam erai na apugan ingisit ikapun lu adolokin kes.
Lugbara: Ewuꞌdosi, arojo dria ꞌbani muzu alenia sendesi ꞌdiyi sende aꞌi dakitari nezu ci.

English: More coronavirus patients have been confirmed negative twice.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona abalala bakakasiddwa emirundi ebiri nga tebalina kawuka..
Runyankore: Abarwaire abandi baingi, kihamiibwe ngu tibaine Korona bwanyima y'okukyeberwa emirundi ebiri.
Acholi: Dano mapol ma onongo gi tye ki two corona kityeko nongo ni gipe ki two inge pimogi tyen ma aryo
Ateso: Itunga lu iyatakina adumun ebe emamiatatar keda ekorona
Lugbara: Ca di paale iri 'bani azo corona niri esuzu 'ba ebipi adripi azo nde be 'diyi ma aria ku 'bo.

English: More truck drivers entering from Mutukula are being diagnosed with coronavirus.
Luganda: Abavuzi ba biroole abalala abayingirira e Mutukula bakyakeberebwa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abavugi bebimotoka ebihango baingi abarikutaahiramu Mutukula nibashangwa baine akakooko ka Corona.
Acholi: Ludwo trela madwong ma tye ka donyo ki i Mutukula kitye kanongo ni gitye ki two corona
Ateso: Iderepan luipu lu elomunenete ko Mutukula inwakunono ekorona
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga kiri ꞌba mutukari ambo ꞌdiyi onzuꞌba efipi Mutukulaasi ꞌdiyi ma rua azo koronaniri esu esu.

English: There will be a live update on the coronavirus cases by the minister of Health.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo okumanyisibwa ku bipya ku kawuka ka kolona okuva eri minisita w'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho okumanyisibwa ebirikukwata aha burwaire bwa korona okwa boona, kuruga ahari minisita w'ebyamagara.
Acholi: Lawigang kal me yot kom bimiyo ngec ma lubbe ki lok me two corona
Ateso: Ejaun aitijenaret naikamunit ekorona kanejai aminista naka angaleu.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alataaniri ni nga eꞌyo ece ꞌba azo koronani esupi ra ꞌdiyi ma dria ra.

English: The public will get daily updates about coronavirus.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kufuna ebipya ku kawuka ka kolona buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Buriizooba abantu nibaija kuguma nibamanyisibwa ebirikukwata ahari Korona.
Acholi: Dano binongo lok ma lubbe ki two corona nino ducu
Ateso: Ebeit itunga adumunun aitijenareta nuka nginiparan nuka ekorona
Lugbara: Oꞌbi yi nga oꞌduko esu azo koronaniri ma dria oꞌdu vusi ra.

English: Doctors happily discharged all their patients who had initially tested positive for coronavirus.
Luganda: Abasawo mu ssanyu baasiibudde abalwadde baabwe bonna abaasooka okuzuulibwamu akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abashaho n'okushemererwa basiibwire abarwaire boona ababaire barwaire Corona kwonka  abaraaguriirwe kandi bakakira.
Acholi: Daktari gugonyo lutwo weng ma onongo gitye ki two corona ki yomcwiny madit
Ateso: Apotu imurok otwarasi adekak lu apotu ongaleutu ekorona kaiyalama.
Lugbara: Dakitari eyi ofuki 'ba ebipi adripi azo corona niri be te atipi ra 'diyi arojoa ri si ayikosi.

English: Only one health frontline worker has died.
Luganda: Omusawo ow'okumwanjo omu yekka ye yaakafa.
Runyankore: Omushaho omwe wenka ahari abo abarikujanjaba abarwaire ba Korona niwe afiire.
Acholi: Latic yot kom acel aye oto
Ateso: Ediopet eswaman bon lo adekis nges abu otwana.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi arojoa alu ni dra nga lu ni.

English: There is a continuous rise in the number of people with coronavirus disease.
Luganda: Waliwo okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abantu abalina obulwadde bw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Omubaro gw'abantu abarikukwatwa endwara ya Korona niguguma nigweyongyera.
Acholi: Wel dano ma tye ki two corona tye ka medde
Ateso: Iyata enaba lo itunga kalu edekasi ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Kalafe 'ba azo corona niri be ri ni tu O'du driasi.

English: More coronavirus patients have recovered from the disease.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona abalala bawoye obulwadde.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abandi baingi bakizire oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Lutwo corona mukene dok gityeko cang woko ki i kom two ni.
Ateso: Angaleutu itunga luipu kotoma adeka.
Lugbara: Ba ebipi adripi azo corona niri be 'diyi ma azi esu atita ra.

English: The sleep under a mosquito net campaign aims at preventing the spread of malaria.
Luganda: Kaweefube w'okwebaka mu katimba k'ensiri aluubirira kuziyiza okusaasaana kw'omusujja gw'ensiri.
Runyankore: Ehururu y'okubyama omu katimba k'ensiri, neegyenderera okuzibira omushwija gw'ensiri.
Acholi: Pwony pi buto ite net tye pi gengo nyayo two obe nyo maleria
Ateso: Alimonokino na apero toma aitiba erai kanu aitikitik eimidi.
Lugbara: Asisile ti odaza ꞌba ma la neti ma alia yori niri eri ꞌbani azo koronaniri ma ereta atrizu.

English: There are more coronavirus recoveries even with the increasing number of infections.
Luganda: Waliwo bangi abawona akawuka ka kolona wadde nga n'abalwadde beeyongera.
Runyankore: Hariho abantu baingi abakizire endwara ya Korona, n'obu abarikukwatwa endwara egi baraabe nibeeyongyera.
Acholi: Wel dano ma tye ki two corona magucang tye mapol kede bedi two tye ka nya
Ateso: Eyatakinos lu angaleutu kotoma ekorona araida iyatas lu edumununete.
Lugbara: Ba atita esupi azo corona niri si 'diyi ma kalafe ni tutu 'ba azo nde esupi 'diyi ma kalafe ni ta tro tuzu tutu ra ti.

English: There were more coronavirus samples tested in June.
Luganda: Waliwo Sampolo z'akawuka ka kolona nnyingi ezaakeberebwa mu mwezi gwomukaaga.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi bakakyeberwa korona omu kwezi kwa mukaaga.
Acholi: Sampol ma kikwanyo me apima pi two corona obedo dwong i dwe me abicel
Ateso: Ejaas itunga luipu lu inwakitai olap lo ikanyetape.
Lugbara: ꞌBa oꞌbi afa rua ma alia azo koronani ndazu ꞌdiyi ma azi yi mba aziasi dika.

English: Coronavirus patients who tested negative were discharged from the hospital in Entebbe.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona abaawonye baasiibulwa okuva mu ddwaliro Entebbe.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abashangirwe batakiine burwaire bwa Korona basiibwirwe kuruga omu irwariro rya Entebe.
Acholi: Lutwo corona ma kipimo kinongo gipe ki two kigonyogi woko ki i ot yat Entebbe
Ateso: Adekak ekorona lu apotu ongaleutu aponi otwarai adekis nako Entebbe.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba ebipi adripi azo corona niri be te atita esupi ra 'bani di ani azo nde esuzu eyi ma aria ku 'diyi engazu arojo Entebbe niri ma alea si ra.

English: Gas cylinders were provided as a donation towards the fight of coronavirus.
Luganda: Ggaasi siirinda zaaleeteddwa ng'obuyambi mu kulwanyisa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abarikuha obuhwezi bakahayo gasi sirinda kuhwera omukurwanisa oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Kimiyo cilinda me yamo me konyo lweny i kom two corona
Ateso: Aponi ijukunai ataagin nuka ekwam kanu aingarakin aitji ekorona.
Lugbara: ꞌBa yi fe silinda oli be ꞌdiyi aꞌdi ꞌdizu azo koronaniri be.

English: Samples were taken from individuals having coronavirus symptoms at a research institute.
Luganda: Sampolo zaggyiddwa ku bantu abalina obubonero bw'akawuka ka kolona ku kkeberero.
Runyankore: Abantu ababaire baine bubonero bw'endwara ya  Korona bakeihwaho eby'okukyebera aha aha itendekyero eririkukora aha by'okucoodoza.
Acholi: Kikwanyo sampol ki i kom dano ma obedo ki lanyut me two corona ki i ot yat ma kwedo pi niang two mapatpat
Ateso: Aponi oyangarai aokot itunga lu ajaas keda ijununeta luka ekorona ainwak orionget loka angic.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌdu afa ꞌba rua ꞌbani azo koronani oꞌbizu alenia ꞌdiyi ꞌba wura azo koronani eꞌdapi ꞌdiyi ma rua pari eꞌyo eti ondazuri ma alia.

English: The foreign nationals who tested negative for coronavirus will undergo self-isolation.
Luganda: Bannansi abagwira abataazuulwamu kawuka ka kolona bajja kugenda mu kweyawula.
Runyankore: Abanyamahanga abashangirwe bataine endwara ya Korona, nibaija kuza omu karatiini omu maka gaabo.
Acholi: Anywali lobo mukene ma kipimo kinongogi pe ki two bibedo kengi pi kare mo
Ateso: Itunga luko kinga lu mam aponi odumunai ekorona egitario kes nenicie.
Lugbara: ꞌBa kariꞌbaru ku ꞌbani esu azo koronani be ꞌdiyi nga aꞌa yi ma ngulupisi aꞌdule.

English: Do's and Don'ts have been put in place to actively control the spread of coronavirus
Luganda: Eby'okukola  n'ebitalina kukolebwa biteereddwawo okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka ka  kolona.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro by'okurwanisa oburwaire bwa Korona bitairweho kuzibira akakooko ka Korona kujanjaara.
Acholi: Kiketo jami atima ki jami ma pemyero atima me gengo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Nu ebeit aswam keda nu mam ebeit aswam kes aponi itegearai kanu aitikitik ekorona.
Lugbara: ꞌBa oti eꞌyo ꞌbani lele ꞌba ma ꞌyera azini ꞌbani lele ꞌba ma ꞌye ku ꞌdiyi ꞌbani ecozu azo koronaniri ma ereta atrizu ra.

English: Human resource personnel is needed for the upcoming mosquito net campaign.
Luganda: Omukozi avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z'abakozi yeetaagibwa ku kampeyini y'okugaba y'obutimba bw'ensiri ejja.
Runyankore: Abakozi baingi nibetengwa omuhururu y'okugaba obutimba bw'ensiri erikwiija.
Acholi: Dano ma loyo lok kom tic pa jo mukene tye ka mite pi pwony me tic ki net ma tye i anyim
Ateso: Ekotoi itunga lu eswamak kanu aitolot akorio na aitiban nu isiru.
Lugbara: ꞌBa le ꞌba azi ngapi aziꞌba yi ma drileruni eꞌyo ti odaza emba yiyiani emupiri ma alea ci.

English: Some journalists will be rewarded for creating awareness on health issues.
Luganda: Bannamawulire abamu bajja kusiimibwa olw'okumanyisa ku byobulamu.
Runyankore: Abanyamakuru abamwe nibaija kusiimwa ahabw'okumanyisa abantu eby'amagara.
Acholi: Lumi lok angeya mukene binongo mic pi miyo ngec me yot kom bot lwak
Ateso: Eponio airop arotak iyemuto icie kanu aisisianakin itunga akiro nu angaleu.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga ꞌba osisiani ꞌdiyi ma azi dri dria dria fe yini ꞌba yi ma mile ozizu eꞌyo alata ruaniri nisi risi ra.

English: Ambulances and firefighting equipment have been donated to the government.
Luganda: Emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde abayi n'ebyuma ebizikiza omuliro biweereddwa gavumenti.
Runyankore: Emotoka z'abarwaire eza ambyurensi hamwe n'ebyoma by'okurwanisa omuriro bigabirwe Gavumenti
Acholi: Ambulenc madwong ki mutoka me neko mac kimiyo bot gamente
Ateso: Ejukakisi lu ojokotau apugan amotokan nuka adekis ka iswamasialu itijere akim.
Lugbara: ꞌBa fe ambiulenisi pi afa aꞌdi ꞌdizu aci be ꞌdiyi pie gamete dri ra.

English: Handkerchiefs should either be washed well as a measure to prevent the spread of coronavirus.
Luganda: Obutambaala bulina okwozebwa obulungi ng'engeri y'okutangira ensaasaana y'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Obutambara bw'omungaro nabwo twine kubwozya kurungi okubaasa kwerinda endwara ya Korona.
Acholi: Latam cing mito alwoka pi gengo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Ekot ailosenen aitabalan ejok kanu aitikitik awear naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma oji kitambala dria ꞌdiyi teketeke ꞌbani ecozu azo koronaniri ma ereta atrizu ra.

English: An unborn baby can get hepatitis from its infected mother.
Luganda: Omwana atanazaalibwa asobola okufuna obulwadde bw'ekibumba okuva ku maama we abulina.
Runyankore: Omukazi oine enda yaaba aine oburwaire oburikukwata ekiine naabaasa kubuturiza omwana ari omunda.
Acholi: Latin ma pud tye i ic twero nongo two Hepatitis ki bot mine
Ateso: Imukeru yen mam idounitai epedori aikatun adeka naka emany kanejai totoke na edeka.
Lugbara: Odekua nga osipi kuri eco azo Hepatitis niri esu i ma ayia azo nde beri vu ra.

English: Alcohol-based sanitizers can be used to reduce coronavirus infections.
Luganda: Sanitayiza ezirimu omwenge zisobola okukozesebwa okukendeeza okukwatibwa kw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Sanitaiza ezirimu ekirungo kyamarwa, nizibaasa kukozesibwa omu kukyendeeza okukwatwa oburwaire bwa Korona
Acholi: Tic ki sanitiser awira icing gengo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Sanitizers luka ajon itwasamao kanu aitidisiar awea naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Odu edele ewa si omvele sanitayiza ruri eco azo corona niri ma ereta omvi ra.

English: Staying home when having flu-like symptoms can be a preventive measure against coronavirus.
Luganda: Okusigala awaka ng'olina obubonero obwefaanaanyiriza ssennyiga esobola okubeera engeri y'okuziyiza akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Okuguma omuka waaba oine obubonero senyiga nikibaasa kukora nk'omuhanda gw'okuzibira okujanjara kw'oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Bedo gang kace itye ki lanyut me aburu twero gengo nyayo two kwidi corona
Ateso: Asalakin aiboi ore ideka emusuja nes ediope ewai lo itidisiaret awea naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Aa'ta akua de isu mivu agbadria ci ri eco azo corona niri ma ereta atri ra.

English: The health task force is appreciated for its tireless work towards saving lives.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ebyobulamu akadduukirize kasiimibwa olw'okola n'obutaweera okutaasa obulamu.
Runyankore: Akakiiko k'eby'amagara akateirweho nikasiimwa ahabw'omurimo ogu kakozire omukukiza amagara g'abantu.
Acholi: Pwoc madit woto bot taskforce me yotkom pi tic matek magutimo me gwoko kwo pa lwak
Ateso: Isiyalamikitai atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce  kanu aswam kec na adiekun aijar.
Lugbara: Ba fe awa'difo angiri 'ba rua alata onepi 'diyini azi okporu eyini nga idri eyi opazu 'disi.

English: Hospitals are advised to start record digitalization for better management.
Luganda: Amalwaliro gaweebwa amagezi okutandika okukuumiro ebiwandiiko mu kompyuta okusobola okuddukanyizibwa obulungi.
Runyankore: Amarwariro nigahaburwa okurindira ebihandiiko omunkora eya digito kugira ngu bibaase kurindwa gye.
Acholi: Odi yadi omyero gucak tic ki Komputa me gwoko lok i kom lutwo
Ateso: Icorakitai adekisia aidar aiwadikaeta  kitosomaete akompiutan kanu aswam ejok.
Lugbara: ꞌBa arojo yi aꞌi otita eꞌyo driani ꞌdiyi ma tambazu komupiota ma alia driceza ni ngazu ovuzu onyiru beni.

English: There is ongoing health supervision in every district.
Luganda: Waliwo okulambula kw'ebyobulamu okugenda mu maaso mu buli disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Hariho abariyo nibarambura eby'amagara buri omuri Disiturikiti.
Acholi: Neno ko tic pa lutic yot kom tye kawot i distrik acel-acel
Ateso: Ejai kopana aimanimanio naka angaleu kangol edisitrikt.
Lugbara: Disitrikiti alu alu ma alia,ꞌba alataa ma pamvu andri ra.

English: Free mosquito nets will be distributed countrywide by the government of Uganda.
Luganda: Gavumenti ya Uganda ejja kugaba obutimba bw'ensiri obw'obwereere  mu ggwanga lyonna .
Runyankore: Gavumenti ya Uganda neeza kugaba obutimba bw'ensiri obwa busha omwihanga ryona.
Acholi: Gamente me Uganda obipoko net lageng obee me nono
Ateso: Ebuni apugan nako Uganda aikor aitiban nuatitai akwap wok kere.
Lugbara: Gamete Uganda niri ni mu imba yiyia ni 'diyi awa kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

English: The Ministry of Health has put in place guidelines for safe mass gatherings.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu etaddewo ennambika ku nkungaana z'abantu ennungi.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara eteireho engyenderwaho y'enterane z'abantu.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom okati ki cik me doro gure pa dano
Ateso: Erionget loka angaleu nes ebwaiki nu itupitono kanuka itunga kalu etukonokinos.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri 'ba azita eyi O'bi eyi ma okuta kililiru ri onezu.

English: The Ministry of Health issued coronavirus self-quarantine guidelines.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu yayisizza ennambika ku kweyawula kw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara ekataho enkora y'okweta omu karantiini naingashi okwetanisa aha bantu abandi.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom omiyo cik ma doro kit ma dano acel-acel twero gwokke ki gang
Ateso: Erionget loka angaleu nes abu ibwaik nutupitono kapak kana ejaar ituan okalitini kanuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alataniri fe otita ꞌba yini yi ma tambazu aꞌdule azo koronanirisi ra.

English: The general public has been informed of the upcoming sickle cell campaign.
Luganda: Abantu bonna bategeezeddwa ku kampeyini y'obulwadde bwa nnalubiri ejja.
Runyankore: Abantu baherize kumanyisibwa ehururu erikwija kubaho erikukwata aha ndwara y'akarande erikukwata emitsi.
Acholi: Lwak tye ki ngec pi pwony i kom two sickle cell matye kabino i anyim
Ateso: Edaunitai aitijenikin itunga kere nuka aisisianakino naka adeka naka akojo.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ece eꞌyo oꞌbi yini ti odaza azo sikulu seli niri ni ma dria ra.

English: All schools should follow health guidelines on mass gatherings.
Luganda: Amasomero gonna galina okugoberera ennambika y'ebyobulamu ku nkungaana z'abantu.
Runyankore: Amashomero goona gashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'enterane z'abantu.
Acholi: Gangi kwan ducu omyero gulub cik ma doro gure kacel
Ateso: Isomeroi kere kes ebeit aitup nu icorakitai kanu ikamunitos atukonokin.
Lugbara: Le sukulu dria eyi ma obi azita o'bale o'bi eyi ma okuta kililiru ri ma dria 'diyi.

English: A minister advised that schools remain open.
Luganda: Minisita yawabudde nti amasomero gasigale nga maggule.
Runyankore: Minisita ahabwiire ngu amashomero goona gagume gaigwire.
Acholi: Minista acel omiyo tam ni gangi kwan omyero obed ayaba
Ateso: Abu eminista icorak ebe ekot isomeroi asalakin epukoro.
Lugbara: Minisita azi fe imbata kini sukulu eyi ma awi ngmbo.

English: The Ministry of Health needs more equipment to enhance Uganda's preparedness on coronavirus.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu yetaaga ebikozesebwa ebirala okwongera ku kwetegeka kwa Uganda ku kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara eine kwongyera aha bintu by'okukozesa okwongyera kwetebeekanisa gye kurwanisa endwara ya Korona omu Uganda.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom mito jami tic mapol wek lobo Uganda obed ma oyubbe pi two corona
Ateso: Ekot erionget loka angaleu iswamasia luipu kanu aiyatakin akapakina kanu ekorona.
Lugbara: Le okalamvu alataniri ma Cuma azini ꞌdiyi ma azi dika otuta Ugandani azo koronaniri ma eꞌyosi ri ma azakozu.

English: An unknown resident of Kampala was put under mandatory self-quarantine.
Luganda: Omutuuze w'e Kampala atanategeerekeka yateekeddwa mu kwe yawula okw'obuwaze.
Runyankore: Omutuura gye wa Kampala otarikumanywa, akeetwara omu karantiini.
Acholi: Dano mo me Kampala ma kitucu nyinge obedo kagwoke kene i ot
Ateso: Aponi ibwaikinai itunganan icie ko Kampala okalitini.
Lugbara: ꞌBa fe ꞌba azini ꞌbani aji rusi ku Kampalaani dri aꞌazu aꞌdule azita palaa.

English: The coronavirus toll-free lines were provided by the Ministry of Health.
Luganda: Ennamba z'essimu ez'obwereere zaateereddwawo minisitule y'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara ekataho esimu z'okuteera hagira owaakwatwa endwara ya Korona  ezitari z'okushashurira
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom omiyo namba cim ma pe iculu pi lok me two corona
Ateso: Abu erionget loka angaleu ibwaik inabai lu isimun lu inomio atitai.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri fe simu namba 'bani eco omve tokoru e'yo corona nisi 'diyi ni.

English: We need a public demonstration of how the coronavirus screening process is done.
Luganda: Twetaaga omwoleso ogw'olukale ku ngeri akawuka ka kolona gye kakeberebwamu.
Runyankore: Twena nitwetenga kushomisibwa kugira ngu twetegyereze oku korona erikukyeberwa.
Acholi: Wamito neno kit ma kiyero kwede dano me apima pi two corona
Ateso: Ikoto oni itodikinai itunga eipone lo inwakere ekorona.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma ece oꞌbi yi dri ꞌba azo koronaniri oꞌbi ngoni ngoniru yari ra.

English: Please avoid gatherings and public places during these pandemic times.
Luganda: Bambi mwewale enkungaana n'ebifo by'olukale mu biseera bino eby'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Nyabura we yetantare enteerane z'abantu baingi, omubiro ebi eby'oburwaire.
Acholi: Tim ber ineni pe i bedo kama dano mapol gure iye i kare man matwo tye oporo matek
Ateso: Kilipitai kenacata aiboiso nuipu itnga kapak naka adeka kana..
Lugbara: Kirikirisi, emi ma ona emi pari ongulumu yini yi okuzu ꞌdiyisi sawa azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi ma alia.

English: The public has been urged to avoid handshaking and hugging at all times.
Luganda: Abantu basabiddwa okwewala okwekwata mu ngalo n'okwegwa mu kifuba obudde bwonna.
Runyankore: Abantu babagambire kwetantara okuramukanya omungaro n'okugwa omu kifuba obwire bwona.
Acholi: Kimiyo tam bot dano pe me moto cing ki gwakke i kare ducu
Ateso: Isinyikokitai iutnga ainyekikin ayogan keda akanin ka atunanakin apak kere.
Lugbara: Ba fe o'bi eyini imbata eyini eyi zizu drisi ku dika eyi amvuzu ku sa'wa driasi.

English: Those who showed signs and symptoms of coronavirus have tested negative.
Luganda: Abaalaze obubonero obw'akawuka ka kolona tebazuuliddwamu bulwadde.
Runyankore: Abayorekire obumanyiso n'obubonero bwa Korona, bakyebeirwe bashangwa batagiine.
Acholi: Dano ma obedo ki lanyut me two corona kipimo kinongo ni gipe ki two
Ateso: Ngul lu ajaas keda awanyuneta nuka ekorona aponi odumunai amamei.
Lugbara: Ba andra wura azo corona niri ni i e'dazu ri pie 'diyi azo nde koko.

English: The coronavirus toll-free line has been restored and issues have been rectified.
Luganda: Essiimu y'obwereere ku kawuka ka kolona ezziddwako era ensonga zitereezeddwa.
Runyankore: Esimu ey'okuteera aha bikwatairine n'endwara ya Korona yagarurwaho kandi eshonga zoona zatereera.
Acholi: Cim ma pe iculu pi lok ma lubbe ki two corona kityeko yubu dok bene peko ma onongo tye dong kityeko tiro ne woko
Ateso: Aponi inyakakinai isimun luka ekorona luatitai ido etemokinos iboro kere.
Lugbara: Ba otu di namba omvele tokoru e'yo corona nisi ri 'bo.

English: All travellers are being screened for coronavirus at the border points.
Luganda: Abasaabaze bonna bakeberebwa akawuka ka kolona ku nsalo.
Runyankore: Abarikuba bari aha rugyendo boona nibakyeberwa oburwaire bwa Korona aha nsharo zoona.
Acholi: Gitye ka pimo luwot ducu ma tye iwang boda pi two corona
Ateso: Alotok kere inwakio kanu ekorona kotoma oikoruon.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌba dria acipi aci ꞌdiyi ma rua azo korona niri oꞌbi mupaka ma milea

English: The permanent secretary will be live on television tonight.
Luganda: Omuwandiisi ow'enkalakalira ajja kubeera butereevu ku terefayina ekiro.
Runyankore: Omuhandiiki omukuru omu minisiture naaza kugambira aha terevijoni ekiro eki.
Acholi: Permanent Secretary onyo Karan madit me gangal me yot kom bimiyo ngec manyen tin I telebijon
Ateso: Elosi Ekalani lokapolon    einer ko telebision kware.
Lugbara: Pamaneniti sekuretari ni andri eꞌyo nze tivia andru.

English: A suspected coronavirus case from Masaka region has turned out to be negative.
Luganda: Ateeberezebwa okuba n'akawuka ka kolona okuva mu kitundu ky'e Masaka tazuuliddwamu kawuka.
Runyankore: Omuntu obeire naateberezibwa ngu aine endwara ya korona arikuruga omu kicweka kya Masaka baamukyebera yashangwa atagiine.
Acholi: Dano mo me Masaka ma onongo gitamo ni tye ki two corona gityeko pimo ne ci ginongo ni pe ki two
Ateso: Itunganan yen aomitai ebe ajaas keda ekorona ko Masaka adumun ebe emamei.
Lugbara: Ba esu 'ba azi 'bani ega azo corona niri be Masaka a ni azo nde koko.

English: The ministry of health has not yet confirmed any coronavirus case in Uganda.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu tennakakasayo mulwadde w'akawuka ka kolona yenna mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara, tikahamize oburwaire bwa Korona omu Uganda.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom peya omoko ni two corona opoto I Uganda
Ateso: Mam erionget loka angaleu itigogongoritor nuka idio itunganan yen edeka ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri esuni nga 'ba azi azo corona niri be ni Kari Uganda niri ma alea ku.

English: Wash hands with soap and water to prevent the spread of coronavirus.
Luganda: Naaba mu ngalo ne sabbuuni okutangira okusaasaanya akawuka ka korona.
Runyankore: Naaba omu ngaro orikukozesa sabuuni n'amaizi marungi obaase kuzibira okujanjara kw'oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Lwok cing ki cabun ki pii me gengo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Ilosenen akanin ka akip keda esabunyu kanu aitikitik akora na ekorona.
Lugbara: Mi ma oji mi dri eyi ala si azini sabuni si azo corona niri ma ereta atrizu.

English: The president will address the nation today to provide further guidance on coronavirus.
Luganda: Pulezidenti ajja kwogerako eri eggwanga leero okwongera okulambika ku kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi w'eihanga naaza kugambira abantu eriizooba okwongyera kubamanyisa ebiragiro ebi bashemereire kukuratira ahabwa korona.
Acholi: Ladit lobo bi tito lok bot lwak me Uganda pi doro kit ma gamente ki lwak omyero olweny kwede pi gengo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Ebeit lokapolon akwap einer ilolo kanu aijajikin itunga aicoreta nuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Purezidenti ni andru mu imbata fe kari anzi eyi dri drile azo corona virasi niri ma dria.

English: Blood samples are run three times to confirm the coronavirus negative result.
Luganda: Sampolo z'omusaayi zikeberebwa emirundi esatu okukakasa nti temuli kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Eshagama neekyeberwa emirundi eshatu kubaasa kuhamya ngu omuntu taine burwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Pi niang ni dano pe ki two corona, kipimo remo tyen adek
Ateso: Inwakio aokot irwanauni kanu aitidolikin ebe emamei ekorona.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ari oꞌbi paaleko na ka ꞌba di ꞌyo azo koronaniri yo ꞌdini ndo

English: The  Ugandan who arrived from Dubai is the first confirmed coronavirus case in Uganda.
Luganda: Munnayuganda eyavudde e Dubai ye muntu eyasoose okuzuulibwamu akawuka ka kolona mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Omunya Uganda owaarugire Dubai niwe muntu w'okubanza kuhamibwa ngu aine endwara ya Korona omu Uganda
Acholi: Anywali me Uganda ma oa ki I Dubai aye dano me acel ma gipimo ginongo tye ki two corona
Ateso: Etunganan loko Uganda lo abonguni ko Dubai nges losodit ainwakunio adeka naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Kari mva Uganda ni engapi Dubai a ri 'ba oko 'bani esu azo corona niri be kari Uganda niri ma alea ri i.

English: Everyone is advised to stay alert and calm in case they showcase coronavirus symptoms.
Luganda: Buli omu aweebwa amagezi okubeera bulindaala era nga mukkakkamu singa alaga obubonero bw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Buri omwe nahaburwa kuguma ayetekateekire kandi ayikaikiine ku yaakureeba oine obubonero bwa Korona.
Acholi: Dano ducu omyero obed ma cwinygi opye dok gubed ki ryeko me ngeyo jami atima ka gitye ki lanyut me two corona
Ateso: Itunga kere icorakitai acoikina ka ainapakina arai etakanutu awanyuneta nuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba ai 'ba dria aa'zu mile be azini e'yere eyi ka wura azo corona niri vu 'diyi ama ria.

English: A coronavirus case was confirmed in Uganda.
Luganda: Omulwadde w'akawuka ka korona yakakasiddwa mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Omurwaire w'endwara ya Korona ahamiibwe omu Uganda.
Acholi: Ginonong dano acel matye ki corona i lobo Uganda
Ateso: Aponi itigogongorai nuka ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba esu 'ba azi azo corona niri be ni Kari Uganda niri ma alea.

English: Entebbe International Airport was closed as a measure to curb the spread of coronavirus.
Luganda: Ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi eky' Entebbe kyaggalwa ngengeri y'okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka ka korona.
Runyankore: Ekishayi ky'enyonyi  ekya Entebbe kikakingwa, okubaasa kurwanisa okujanjara kwa Korona.
Acholi: Bar dege madit ma Entebbe obedo alora macalo yo acel me gengo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Aponi ogolokina Entebbe airport kwape ediope ewai lo itikokinere awea naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba opi pari ndege eyini orizu azini ongazu Entebbe niri ci azo corona niri ma ereta atrizu.

English: Eight new coronavirus cases have been confirmed by the Ministry of Health.
Luganda: Abalwadde abalala munaana bakakasiddwa Minisitule y'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kyahamya abarwaire ba Korona abasya munaana.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom omiyo lok ni gipimo ginongo two corona i kom dano aboro manyen
Ateso: Etigogongo bobo erionget loka angaleu itunga ikanyauni luejaas keda ekorona.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri esu 'ba o'diru aro ni eyi azo corona niri be.

English: People in urban areas have been heavily affected by the pandemic.
Luganda: Abantu b'omu bibuga bakoseddwa nnyo ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikutuura omundembo, bateganisiibwe munonga endwara ya Korona
Acholi: Dano mabedo i boma tye ka wot i peko madit macalo adwogi two ma oporo ni
Ateso: Itunga lu iboyete kotaunin kes eridakit adeka noi.
Lugbara: Azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi fe ocoko ꞌba aꞌapi tawunia ꞌdiyini angiri.

English: You can prevent the spread of coronavirus by practising social distancing.
Luganda: Osobola okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka ka korona ng'owa amabanga.
Runyankore: Noobaasa kuzibira okujanjara kw'endwara ya Korona obwo orikwetantara okuhikaana n'abandi.
Acholi: Itwero gengo nyayo two corona kun nongo i bedo mabor ki lawoti
Ateso: Ipedori ijo aitikitik awea naka ekorona kowai kalo alaikina kotunga.
Lugbara: Mi eco azo corona niri ma ereta atri geri mini esele cozu 'ba mi agei 'diyi pie risi.

English: Wash your hands with soap and water for twenty seconds three times a day.
Luganda: Naaba engalo zo ne sabbuuni n'amazzi okumala obutikitiki abiri emirundi esatu olunaku.
Runyankore: Naaba engaro zaawe orikukozesa sabuuni n'amaizi marungi kumara sekendi makumi abiri emirundi eshatu buri izooba.
Acholi: Lwok cingi ki cabun ki pii pi cekend maromo pyeraryo tyen adek i nino acel
Ateso: Ilot akanin kon keda akip ka esabunyu adaun itikitikin akaisarei irwan auni aparan.
Lugbara: Mi oji mi dri yi si sabuni be ogogo secondi kaliri 'dipi paale na o'du alu ri ma alea.

English: Every Ugandan has something to say about the coronavirus outbreak in Uganda.
Luganda: Buli munnayuganda alina ekyokwogera ku kubalukawo kw'akawuka ka kolona mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Buri omwe aine eki arikubaasa kugamba aha burwaire bwa Korona obwaizire omu Uganda.
Acholi: Lwak me Uganda ducu tye ki gin aloka pi two corona ma opoto i lobo Uganda
Ateso: Nginitunganan ejaas nu ekoto alimun kanu ikamunitos abwangun naka ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni dria 'diyi ma tia e'yo azi nzezaru azo corona niri ma dria ci.

English: The ministry of health is working with its partners on better sensitisation channels.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekolagana ne bannamikago baayo ku mpenda ezisingako ez'okubunyisa amawulire.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara eriyo neekorera hamwe n'abarikukwatanisa nayo okubaasa kutunga oburyo burungi bw'okushomesa abantu.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom tye katic ki dule mapatpat pi nongo yo me miyo pwony bot lwak pi gwoke ki gengo nyayo two
Ateso: Erionget loka angaleu nes iswamai keda egangitok ke kanu iwaitin lu isisianakinere itunga.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri tualu okalamvu azi erini 'diyi pie azi nga geri imbata fezu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.

English: He met with the Health Services Director-General.
Luganda: Yasisinkanye ne health Services Director-General.
Runyankore: Abugaine na Dayirekita w'eby'amagara.
Acholi: En orwate ki ladit dairekta genero matiyo pi lok me yot kom
Ateso: Apotu ngesi iriamunos keda lo epolokit nuka angaleu.
Lugbara: Fu dri ꞌba ambo azakoma fele eꞌyo alatanisiri ma drileari be ra.

English: The Virus Research Institute runs the Coronavirus samples.
Luganda: Ekkeberero ly'obuwuka obusirikitu likebera sampolo z'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ekirikukora aha kucoondoza aha kujanjara bw'endwara, nikyo kirikukora ahaby'okukyebera oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Virus Research Institute aye gipimo two corona
Ateso: Erionget loengici nuikamunitos adekasinei   nes inwaki aokot kanu ekorona.
Lugbara: Angu ꞌbani eꞌyo eti ondazu oꞌbu azo fepi ꞌdiyi ma driari ni azo koronaniri oꞌbini.

English: Why don't you stay at home if you are not feeling well?
Luganda: Lwaki tosigala ewaka bw'oba teweewulira bulungi?
Runyankore: Ahabw'enki otarikuguma omuka ku oraabe otarikwehurira kurungi?
Acholi: Pingo pe ibed gang ka pe iwinyo maber?
Ateso: Inyobo mam ijo isalakina ore arai mam ijo ipupi ejok?
Lugbara: Mi aa akua ika mi ama azoru ku a'dusi?

English: Coronavirus cases are increasing in Uganda.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona beeyongera mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Abaine endwara ya Korona  omu Uganda beyongyeire.
Acholi: Wel dano matye ki two corona tye ka medde
Ateso: Iyata enaba lo itunga kalu edekasi ekorona ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba azo corona niri be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu kari Uganda niri ma alea tutu.

English: Pregnant women need special attention while in the hospital.
Luganda: Abakyala ab'embuto beetaaga okufiibwako ennyo nga bali mu malwaliro.
Runyankore: Abakazi abaine enda, nibetenga okureebererwa okw'omutaano baaba bari omu irwariro.
Acholi: Mon muyac mito gwok maber ka ki gengogi i ot yat
Ateso: Angor nu epotiete ekotosi agangat na itegelikina ejaas adekis.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ne oku okporovu ru 'diyi kililiru eyini ovuria arojoa.

English: We have three new cases of coronavirus patients today.
Luganda: Tulina abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona abapya basatu leero.
Runyankore: Eriizooba twatungayo abarwaire basya ba Korona bashatu.
Acholi: Watye ki dano adek mukene ma two corona omakogi
Ateso: Ija oni keda itunga iuni luitetiak lu edekasi ekorona ilolo.
Lugbara: Ba esu andru 'ba azi na ni eyi azo corona niri be.

English: Company staff are now testing positive for coronavirus.
Luganda: Abakozi ba kkampuni kati bazuulibwamu akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abakozi ba zaakampuni, hati kubarikukyeberwa bashangwa baine endwara ya Korona.
Acholi: Lutic kamponi mapatpat tye ka nongo two corona
Ateso: Itunga lu okampunin inwakunono kwana ekorona.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azi ngaꞌba Kambuni yini ꞌdiyi ma rua ꞌba di curuꞌdo azo koronaniri esu.

English: The pandemic cases in that district are now reducing.
Luganda: Abazuulwamu ekirwadde bbunansi mu disitulikiti eyo kati bakendeera.
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba Korona omu Disiturikiti egyo bariyo nibakyendera.
Acholi: Wel dano ma  two mo oporo ni omakogi i distrik ca tye ka dwogo piny
Ateso: Ejai kwana enaba adisiar lo adekak ko disitrikt
Lugbara: ꞌKalafe ꞌba azo koronaniri be ꞌdiyini disitrikiti ꞌda ma alia ꞌdiyi yi omvi omvi.

English: The clinic has taken the baby's parents to the police because they failed to pay for the surgery.
Luganda: Eddwaliro litutte bazadde b'omwana ku poliisi kubanga baalemereddwa okusasulira okulongoosebwa.
Runyankore: Abashaho batwaire abazaire b'omwana ogwo aha poriisi ahabw'okuremwa kushashura esente z'okumushemeza.
Acholi: Klinik ocwalo lunyodo pa latini bot abili pien pe guculo pi yango latin
Ateso: Ayanga ekilinik auriak lu imukeru polis naarai apotu ipikosi aitac ikapun lu ajengio.
Lugbara: Arojo ꞌda ji odekua ꞌda ma tipika yi polosia aꞌdisiku yi awini sende ꞌbani operesoni ꞌyezuri ofe ku.

English: The health minister has emphasized the need to have good regional hospitals.
Luganda: Minisita w'ebyobulamu akkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'okuba n'amalwaliro g'ebitundu amalungi.
Runyankore: Minisita w'eby'amagara akihamize ngu okugira amarwariro marungi omu byanga n'ekyomugasho.
Acholi: Minista me yot kom oloko matek tutwal pi neno ni gamente oyubu ot yadi madongo i kabedo mapatpat
Ateso: Eminisita loka angaleu nges isinyikokit akote ajaut naka adekisia nuapolok.
Lugbara: Minisita alataniri ꞌyo kini le arojo ꞌwara ꞌdiyi ma adri rijoni alu alu ma alia ci.

English: Health centres should opt for more accurate ways of blood testing.
Luganda: Ebifo ebijjanjabirwamu birina okunoonya engeri endala entuufu ez'okukebera omusaayi.
Runyankore: Amarwariro amakye gashemereire kureeba ngu gatunga oburyo burungi bw'okukyebera eshagama.
Acholi: Odi yadi matino omyero gunong yo ma opore me pimo remo ma adwogi ne gene
Ateso: Ekot adekisia nudidik  amoun iwaitin luabeit lu inwaket aokot.
Lugbara: Le arojo eyi ma esu geri 'yeke azini kililiru ari o'bizu 'diyi.

English: It is absurd that people are still dying of diseases which are preventable.
Luganda: Kya nnaku nti abantu bakyafa endwadde ezeewalibwa.
Runyankore: N'eky'obusaasi okureeba ngu abantu bakiriyo nibeitwa endwara ezirikubaasa kuzibirwa.
Acholi: Winye marac ni dano madwong pwod tye ka too macalo adwogi me twoo magenge
Ateso: Eraas nu ican ebe erongo itunga etwakete kotoma adekasinei nu epedorio aitikitik.
Lugbara: Eri candiru o'bi eyini nga kiri odrazu azo 'bani ecole atri ra 'diyisi.

English: We should stand together with those who are suffering from heart diseases.
Luganda: Tulina okuyimirira wamu n'abo abalina endwadde z'omutima
Runyankore: Twine kufayo aha barwaire b'emitima.
Acholi: Omyero wacung kacel ki dano matye ki twoo adunu
Ateso: Ekot oni aibumakin nepepe kangul lu adekasi adekasinei nu etau.
Lugbara: Le amama so pa tualu 'ba azo asi niri pie 'diyi be.

English: Coronavirus cases and deaths have risen.
Luganda: Abalina akawuka ka kolona n'abafa beeyongedde.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bwa Korona n'okufa byeyongyeire.
Acholi: Wel dno ma Coronavirus omako ki dano ma otoo tye ka mede
Ateso: Eyatakinos adekak ekorona keda lu atwaka.
Lugbara: Ba esule azo corona niri be 'diyi azini 'ba odrapi azo corona niri si 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra.

English: The elections are likely to be violent and may lead to the spread of the virus.
Luganda: Okulonda kwandiba okw'akavuyo era kuyinza okuviirako okusaasaana kw'akawuka.
Runyankore: Akaruuru nikireebeka nikeija kubamu obwimukiriro oburikubasa kujanjaza endwara ya Korona.
Acholi: Bolo kwir ma tye kabino ni omaro kelo kuku-kuku dok bene twero medo nyayo two corona
Ateso: Emina amumu abwangun kotoma aseo ido emina awear ekorona.
Lugbara: Opeta eyi eco mu adri aco be dika eyi eco vini fe azo corona niri ma ere i ra.

English: Branded milk is safer for children compared to milk sold on the streets.
Luganda: Amata amasabike malungi ku baana okusinga ku ago agatundibwa ku nguudo.
Runyankore: Amate agu barikupakinga gabonaire aha baana okukira agu barikuguza aha muhanda.
Acholi: Cak ma tye i kiboce ber pi lutino loyo cak ma gipimo-apima ma kicato i yo
Ateso: Akile nu apapulai nu ocuma ejokuka kanu idwe itia nu egwelanario korotin.
Lugbara: Lesu amuti nilera 'diyi ni edeni ri eri anzi nyiri eyini muke ndeni aga lesu ozile nzila dria ri.

English: Teenage pregnancies are on the increase and something should be done about it.
Luganda: Embuto mu bavbuka zeeyongedde era walina okubaawo ekikikolebwako.
Runyankore: Okutwara enda omu baishiki bato kweyongyeire kandi haine ekishemereire kukorwa aha shonga egi.
Acholi: Anyira matino maguyac tye ka doko dwong tutwal dok omyero ginen ni gitimo gin mo pi lok man
Ateso: Eyatakin apotinikino na idwe kalu pesur ido ekot omounai nu iswama.
Lugbara: Ezoanzi nyiri ale isupi 'diyi ma kalafe ni tutu dika le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo azi drinia ra.

English: The number of coronavirus disease infections and deaths increases every now and then.
Luganda: Omuwendo gw'abalina akawuka ka kolona n'abafa gweyongera buli lukya.
Runyankore: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukwatwa oburwaire bwa korona n'abarikufa nigweyongyera buriizooba.
Acholi: Wel dano ma two corona omako ki ma guto tiko medde
Ateso: Enaba lo itunga kalu edekasi ekorona keda lu atwakata nes iyata.
Lugbara: Kalafe 'ba azo corona niri esupi 'diyi tualu 'ba odrapi azo corona niri si 'diyi ni tutu.

English: Government reports show that minors too can get infected with the coronavirus.
Luganda: Alipoota za gavumenti ziraga nti abankuseere nabo basobola okukwatibwa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Ripooti za Gavumenti nizooreka ngu n'abaana abatakahikize emyaka ikumi na munaana nabo nibakwatwa oburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Ripot pa gamente nyutu ni two corona mako lutino bene
Ateso: Ebala aitijenaret apugan ebe idwe da epedorete adekakin ekorona.
Lugbara: E'yo osiza gamete ni 'diyi e'da kini anzi eli capiku 'diyi eco vini azo corona niri esu ra.

English: A patient who died of coronavirus disease will be laid to rest this September.
Luganda: Omulwadde eyafa obulwadde bw'akawuka ka kolona ajja kuziikibwa omwezi guno ogwomwenda
Runyankore: Omurwaire owaisirwe oburwaire bwa korona naaza kuziikwa omu kwezi kwa mwenda oku.
Acholi: Dano acel ma two corona oneko gibiyiko i dwer me abungwen
Ateso: Adekan lo abu otwana ekorona nes eponio ainuk olap lo ikanyetangon.
Lugbara: Ba agu azi drapi azo corona niri si ni sa imba oromi 'disi.

English: You can only find out if you have coronavirus disease after being diagnosed.
Luganda: Osobala okukizuula nti olina obulwadde bw'akawuka ka kolona oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa.
Runyankore: Omuhanda gwonka ogu orikubaasa kumanya ngu oine korona n'okubanza wakyeberwa.
Acholi: Itwero ngeyo kace itye ki two corona nongo ipime
Ateso: Ipedori ijo bon ajenun ebe ijatatar ijo keda ekorona akaulo na ainwakio.
Lugbara: Geri mini ecozu nizu mivu azo corona niri ci ri lu dakitari ka mi ne ni ria.

English: If you want to keep healthy you have to do daily exercises.
Luganda: Bw'oba oyagala okusigala ng'oli mulamu olina okukola dduyiro buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Ku oraabe noyenda kugira amagara marungi, guma nookora ebisasaizi buri izooba.
Acholi: Ka imito ni komi obed yot ci omyero itim jami calo wot ki ngwec
Ateso: Arai ikoto ijo asalakin ingalei ekot ijo aiswamaenen ekisesais.
Lugbara: Mi ma le mi ma rua ma adri alaru, le mi ma ꞌye avita rua ejuzu ꞌdiyi oꞌdu dria.

English: In Uganda, online media platforms have to get authorisation nowadays.
Luganda: Mu Uganda, emikutu gy'amawulire egy'oku mutimbagano ennaku zino girina okufuna olukusa.
Runyankore: Omu Uganda okurabya eby'amahurire aha intaneeti noobaza waatunga orusa.
Acholi: I lobo Uganda i kareni, miyo lok angeya mawok ki intanet mito nongo twero ki bot gamente
Ateso: Ko Uganda, lueyaitos elago  kes ebeit adumun apedor.
Lugbara: Ewu curu ꞌdorisi Ugandaa, pari oyuyuani oli aleasi ꞌdiyi rukusa esu rakara, yi azi nga ndo.

English: The seminar for fighting fake news has been arranged.
Luganda: Omusomo gw'okulwanisa amawulire amafu gutegekeddwa.
Runyankore: Semina y'okurwanisa amakuru agatahikire eteebekanisiibwe.
Acholi: Kacokke me pwony i kit me lweny i kom lok ani gitye kayubu
Ateso: Airiamun na ebeitor aitijio iyemuto luarokok nes adaun aitemokin.
Lugbara: ꞌBa otu embataa eꞌyo kinikiniru ꞌdiyi be aꞌdi ꞌdizuri ꞌbo.

English: It is interesting that we now have to pay tax to use the phone.
Luganda: Kisanyusa nti kati tulina okusasula omusolo okukozesa essimu.
Runyankore: Nikitangaaza okureeba ngu hati nitubanza twashashura omushoro okukozesa esimu.
Acholi: Obedo lok awura mada ni dong omywero wacul mucoro me tic ki cim
Ateso: Kwana erai oni aitac esolo kanu aitwasam esimu.
Lugbara: Eri andruru nizu kini sa'wa 'disi le amama ofe musoro ci simu eyi ayuzu.

English: Uganda needs a good data privacy policy.
Luganda: Uganda yeetaaga etteeka eddungi ku data ow'ekyama.
Runyankore: Uganda neeyetenga ekiragiro birungi eby'okurinda gye ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha bantu n'ebintu byabo.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda mito pen cik maber me doro kit me gwoko lok mape ngat mo keken nongo

English: Garbage should be collected daily or burnt.

Acholi: Yugi ngwe ka otop

Luganda: Ebitundu by'oku nsalo byetaaga okubeera bulindaala nnyo mu kiseera kino eky'ekirwadde bbunansi.

Acholi: Kony lupeko manongo I kabedo ni

English: Most of the local defence unit recruits are youths.
