English: The local defence unit has cruel officers.
Luganda: Eggye ekkuuma byalo lirina abakungu ab'ettima.
Runyankore: Abatendekirwe kurinda ekyaro bari abarikutwariza kubi abantu.
Acholi: Ludito mony me Local Defence Unit gi ger tutwal
Ateso: Ejaas ajore naka itunga luidarete ayuwara keda itunga lu ededeng.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌwara local defence unit ni ꞌdiyi adraru

English: Adequate planning needs to be done in order to grow the education sector.
Luganda: Okuteekateeka okumala kwetaaga okukolebwa okusobola okukuza ekisaawe ky'ebyenjigiriza.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho enteekateeka nungi kubaasa kutunguura eby'obwegyese.
Acholi: Yub mite pi dongo lok malube ki kwan
Ateso: Ekot akapanakin naepol noi kanu aitopolor nuka asioman.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma 'ye otuta capira 'diyi kala onita niri ni zozu.

English: Sports and education work should be done hand in hand.
Luganda: Omulimu gw'ebyemizannyo n'ebyenjigiriza gulina kukolebwa kumu.
Runyankore: Eby'emizaano n'eby'obwegyese bishemerire kukorera hamwe.
Acholi: Tic malube ki tuku ki tic ma mako kwan omyero owot kacel
Ateso: Aboliasio ka asioman ekot oupanara.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma 'ye azi avita ni azini onita ni 'diyi dria dria.

English: The government of Uganda has availed lots of grants for public schools.
Luganda: Gavumenti ya Uganda etadde obuyambi bungi nnyo mu masomero ga gavumenti.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ya Uganda, amashomero ga Gavumenti egahereize ebintu bingi.
Acholi: Gamente me Uganda omiyo cente madwong pi gangi kwan ma en aye loyo
Ateso: Ejaiki apugan nako Uganda agangat nejaas isomeroi luipu.
Lugbara: Gamete Uganda niri fe robia tre sukulu o'biyini 'diyi dri.

English: What causes some children not to pass well in school?
Luganda: Ki ekireetera abaana abamu obutayita bulungi mu ssomero?
Runyankore: Ekirikureetera abaana bamwe kwega kubi omu mashomero n'enki?
Acholi: Ngo ma oweko lutino mukene pe timo peny maber?
Ateso: Inyobo ijaikini icie idwe mam etubete ejok kosomero?
Lugbara: A'du e'yo ni fe anzi azi 'diyi ni agazu sukulua muke ku ni?

English: Agricultural equipment is very expensive for farmers.
Luganda: Ebintu by'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bya buseere nnyo eri abalimi.
Runyankore: Ebirikukozesibwa omu buhingi n'oburiisa n'eby'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru aha bantu abarikubikozesa.
Acholi: Jami pur wele tek tutwal ki lupur
Ateso: Iboro lu akoru epol etiai kanuka akoriok icie.
Lugbara: Afa ndundu amvu azi ngazu 'diyi 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri ajeru.

English: Many children fail to complete school because of inadequate funds.
Luganda: Abaana bangi balemererwa okumaliriza okusoma olw'ensimbi ezitamala.
Runyankore: Abaana baingi nibaremwa kuhendera emishomo yaabo ahabw'eibura rya sente.
Acholi: Pol lutino pe gityeko kwano pi nok pa cente
Ateso: Ipu idwe ipikonorete angetanakin esomero naarai ikidioko ikapun.
Lugbara: Anzi karakara eyi deni sukulu ku robia ako si.

English: Getting involved in a business is one way of finding children's school fees.
Luganda: Okwenyigira mu bizinensi y'emu ku ngeri z'okufunamu ebisale by'abaana eby'essomero.
Runyankore: Okwejumba omu bizinesi n'omuringo gumwe gw'okutunga ebishare by'amashomero.
Acholi: Nongo yoo me timo biacara obedo yoo acel me nongo cente me culu kwan pa lutino
Ateso: Aswam na aicurusa nes ediope ewai lo idumunet isirigin lu esomero kanu idwe.
Lugbara: Tujari 'yeza eri geri azi 'bani ecozu anzi eyi ma sukulu fizi esuzu ra ni i.

English: Other sectors like agriculture and business support education in one way or the other.
Luganda: Ebitongole ebirala nga eky'ebyobulimi ne bizinensi biwanirira ebyenjigiriza mu ngeri emu oba endala.
Runyankore: Eby'obuhingi n'obushubuzi nibihwera eby'obwegyese omu miringo etari emwe.
Acholi: Tic calo pur ki timo biacara konyo ki culu kwan
Ateso: Icie iboro kwapenat akoru ka aicurus ingarakit ewai lo asioman.
Lugbara: Okalamvu ndundu ekile amvu 'yaza azini anyapa tambaza eyi tualu tujari 'yeza pie atita fe eyi dri geri ndundu 'diyi si.

English: Education should be affordable for everyone.
Luganda: Okusoma kulina okuba nga kusoboka eri buli omu.
Runyankore: Buri omwe ashemereire kuba naabaasa eby'obwegyese.
Acholi: Kwan omyero wele obed yot ki dano weng
Ateso: Ekot asioman orai na epatana kanu kanginitunganan kere aitac.
Lugbara: Le onita ma adri ajekoko 'ba dria dri.

English: The education sector requires funding.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza kyetaaga okuvujjirirwa.
Runyankore: Eby'obwegyese nibyeteega esente.
Acholi: Dul me lok me kwan mito cente
Ateso: ewai lo asioman ekot igangitete keda apiyai.
Lugbara: Okalamvu onita niri le robia tu.

English: The community should be sensitised on hygiene and sanitation-related issues.
Luganda: Abantu balina okutegezebwa ku nsonga ezeekuusa ku buyonjo.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kusomesibwa ahaby'obuyonjo n'ebihorooni.
Acholi: Dano ma ikabedo man omyero gunong pwony ikit me gwoko lengo
Ateso: Ekot itunga isisianakinete nuka aidar aila.
Lugbara: Le Ongulumu eyi ma esu imbata e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria ra.

English: Authorities have the obligation to prevent crime.
Luganda: Aboobuyinza balina omulimu okutangira omusango.
Runyankore: Ab'obushoborozi baine obujunaanizibwa kuzibira ebihagaro.
Acholi: Obedo tic pa lutela me genego timo bal
Ateso: Apugan nes ejaas keda apedor na aidar ayuara.
Lugbara: Ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma azi e'yo onzi atrizu.

English: There is an ongoing project to build toilets for people in the community.
Luganda: Waliwo pulojekiti y'okuzimbira abantu kaabuyonjo mu kitundu egenda mu maaso.
Runyankore: Hariho purogyekiti y'okwombekyera abantu ebihorooni erikugyenda omu maisho.
Acholi: Tye yub matye kamede pi yubu coron pi lwak ma ikabedo man
Ateso: Ejai kopana epelu lo itolosio kanu aiduk acolonin aiboisio itunga.
Lugbara: Otita azi ni mu drile 'bani coroni eyi sizu o'bi ongulumua 'diyi ni.

English: One needs a licence to operate legally.
Luganda: Omuntu yeetaaga layisinsi okukolera mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Omuntu nayeteega rayisinsi erikumwikiriza kukora emirimo ye.
Acholi: Mite ni inong lansis wek iti i te cik
Ateso: Ekotokin alasisi kanu itunganan aswam nabeit.
Lugbara: Le 'ba azi ma esu karatasi raka azi ngazu azita palaa beni.

English: Hygiene is one way of preventing diseases.
Luganda: Obuyonjo y'emu ku ngeri z'okutangira endwadde.
Runyankore: Obuyonjo n'omuhanda gumwe gw'okuzibira endwara.
Acholi: Gwoko lengo obedo yoo acel me gengo two
Ateso: Aila nes ediope ewai lo itikitikere adekasinei.
Lugbara: Alata eri geri azi ecozu azo eyi atrizu ni i.

English: Misplacement of human waste can lead to diseases.
Luganda: Okusaasaanya obubi bw'abantu kisobola okuleeta endwadde.
Runyankore: Okunaganaga obubi bw'abantu, nikibaasa kureeta endwara.
Acholi: Konye kama pe opore twero kelo twoo mapatpat
Ateso: Aicak agasia taitai eyangauni adekasinei.
Lugbara: Azakoza pari kililiru ma alea ku ri eco azo eji ra.

English: It is hard to find a clean market.
Luganda: Kizibu okusanga akatale akayonjo.
Runyankore: Kigumire okushanga akatare akayonjo.
Acholi: Nongo cuk maleng tek
Ateso: Etiono adumun esokoni lo elai.
Lugbara: Eri mbazaru cu ala ni esuzu.

English: A market attracts very many people from different societies and backgrounds.
Luganda: Akatale kasikiriza abantu bangi nnyo okuva mu bitundu n'esibuko ez'enjawulo
Runyankore: Akatare nikazamu abantu baingi kuruga omu bicweka ebitari bimwe na bimwe.
Acholi: Cuk obedo kakaracel makelo dano ma kitgi pat dok gi aa ki kabedo maptpat
Ateso: Iriuni esokoni itunga luipu lu aiboisio nuegelegela.
Lugbara: Cu eyi 'ba eyi oku engazu ongulumu ndundu 'diyi ma alea.

English: He was falsely accused but let us wait for the court ruling.
Luganda: Yavunaanibwa mu bukyamu naye ka tulinde ensala ya kkooti.
Runyankore: Bakamubeeherera kwonka ka turinde ebirikuza kuruga omu kooti.
Acholi: Gimoro adot i kome pi bal ma pe otimo ento kong dong wakuu adwogi tam pa kot
Ateso: Arai ngesi lo ereikitai areikit konye edarekisi ber oni etube kadieket.
Lugbara: Ba to eri enzosi te amama te ki nga e'yo liza duani driri.

English: Some companies failed to pay their workers during the lockdown period.
Luganda: Kkampuni ezimu zaalemererwa okusasula abakozi baazo mu kiseera k'omuggalo.
Runyankore: Kampuni ezimwe zikaremwa kushashura abakozi baazo omu keshereko.
Acholi: Kampuni mogo pe gutwero culu luticgi ikare ma gamente ogengo wot
Ateso: Icie ikampunin opotu ipikosi aitac eswamak kec apakio nuagolokinitere akwap
Lugbara: Amuti azi ꞌdiyi awini yi vile aziꞌba yi ofe sawa ꞌbani eꞌyo dria ti opizu azo koronaniri ma eꞌyosi ci risi ku ye.

English: Health workers have not been appreciated for their efforts.
Luganda: Abasawo tebasiimiddwa olw'amaanyi gaabwe.
Runyankore: Abashaho tibakasiimirwe ahabw'emirimo ei baakozire.
Acholi: Lutic me yotkom pwod peya gunongo pwoc pi tic matek
Ateso: Mam eswamak lu adekisia isiyalamikitai kanu aswamisinei kec.
Lugbara: Ba fe azi 'ba arojoa 'diyi dri awa'difo azi orodriru eyini nga ri si ku

English: Workers can now choose to work from home or come to the office.
Luganda: Abakozi kati basobola okulondako okukolera ewaka oba okujja ku woofiisi.
Runyankore: Abakozi hati nibabaasa kukorera omuka nainga baije aha ofiisi.
Acholi: Lutic dong kombedi twero yero me tic ki gang onyo cito i gang tic
Ateso: Epedorete kwana eswamak aseun arai aswam ore arai ayapiesi.
Lugbara: Azi 'ba eyi eco di pe azi ngaza akua ka adriku muzu azia ra.

English: Coronavirus has spread in every country in the world.
Luganda: Akawuka ka kolona kasaasaanidde mu buli ggwanga ly'ensi.
Runyankore: Korona ejanjaire omu mahanga g'ensi yoona.
Acholi: Two Coronavirus onya ibut lobo weng manonge i wi lobo
Ateso: Awear kwana ekorona kangin aiboisit kakwap kere.
Lugbara: Azo corona niri ere i kari wudrikuru ni 'diyi ma alea dria.

English: Every company is under pressure to provide a safe working environment for its workers.
Luganda: Buli kkampuni eri mu kaweefube okuteekawo abakozi baayo embeera ennungi ekolerwamu.
Runyankore: Buri kampuni neegyezaho munonga okureeba ngu abakazi baayo baine obusingye.
Acholi: Kampuni weng tye ka yele matek me neno ni luticgi tye ma komgi yot
Ateso: Kangol ekampuni kere epolokitos nu awanyun eswamae loajokan loka iswamak ke.
Lugbara: Amuti dria yi eꞌyo ewaru esu eꞌyo fezu azi ꞌba yi vile ꞌdiyini azi ngazu angu onyiru ma alia ri ma eꞌyosi.

English: Ugandans working abroad have been stopped from coming back due to the pandemic.
Luganda: Bannayuganda abakolera emitalawaamayanja bayimiriziddwa okudda olw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda abarikukorera aheeru, bazibiirwe okugaruka omu ihanga ryabo ahabw'oburwaire.
Acholi: Anywali me Uganda matye katic ilobe mukene gityeko gengo wotgi paco pi two ma opoto ni
Ateso: Itunga luko Uganda lu iswamaete kinga kes emiki abongun kanuka adeka.
Lugbara: ꞌBa Ugandaoru azi ngapi amve ꞌdale ꞌdiyi dri ꞌba oga emvizu akuasi agbari azo koronaniri dri

English: All contracts were terminated by the business owner.
Luganda: Endagaano zonna zaasazibwamu nnannyini bizinesi.
Runyankore: Abakozi boona bakemerezibwa mukama wa bizinesi.
Acholi: Rwod biacara ojuku tic pa lutice
Ateso: Aswamisinei kere aponi isibwounai, elope ebiasara
Lugbara: ꞌBa tujara ma eꞌiruri atri azi ꞌba driani ci

English: Employees are encouraged to take leave in order to improve their health.
Luganda: Abakozi bakubirizibwa okugenda mu luwummula okusobola okutereeza obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abakozi nibahigwa okutunga ekihuumuro kugira ngu baruhukye.
Acholi: Gimiyo tam ki lutic me kwanyo kare me yweyo pigwoko yot komgi
Ateso: Isinyikokitai eswamak ailip aiyengun kanu aitojokar angaleu kec.
Lugbara: Ba ai 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi lifu 'duzu eyini ani eyi ma rua ala otuzu be ni.

English: Most of the employees decided to resign from the radio station.
Luganda: Abakozi abasinga baasazeewo okulekulira ku mukutu gwa  laadiyo.
Runyankore: Abakozi baingi abaabire nibakora aha reediyo bakacwamu kurekura emirimo yaabo .
Acholi: Pol lutic gutamo ni omyero gicuk tic I redio station woko
Ateso: Eswamak luipu opotu olungata aswam kotoma oredio.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi karakara 'diyi ku azi rediyo 'da ma alea ri ja.

English: Very many people have lost their jobs during the lockdown.
Luganda: Abantu bangi bafiiriddwa emirimu gyabwe mu kaseera k'omuggalo.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi bafereirwe emirimo yaabo omu keeshereko.
Acholi: Dano mapol orwenyo ticgi ikare ma gamente ogengo wot pi gengo nyayo twoo
Ateso: Itunga luipu apotu otwakiasi aswamisinei kec kapak nagolokinetere akwap
Lugbara: ꞌBa dria azi ngapi redio ꞌda ma alia ꞌdiyi si waraga azi kuzu redio ꞌda ma aliari ra

English: The pandemic caused disruption to many business activities.
Luganda: Ekirwadde bbunansi kyaleetawo okutaataaganyizibwa mu mirimu gya bizinensi nnyingi.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bukarabanisamu emirimo mingi ya bizinesi.
Acholi: Poro pa two obalo tiyo baicara pa dano mapol
Ateso: Abu adeka itolitol aswamisinei nuipu.
Lugbara: Azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi eza tujara tre yi ra.

English: You should check with the lands office before you buy land.
Luganda: Olina okukebera mu woofisi y'ebyettaka nga tonnagula ttaka.
Runyankore: Oshemereire kubanza wakyebera omu ofiisi y'eby'eitaka otakakaguzire.
Acholi: Omyero iwot I office ma neno lok me ngom ma pwod peya iwilo ngom
Ateso: Ekot ijo awanyun keda eyapiesi loka alupok erongo ijo egwela alupok.
Lugbara: Le mi ma mu ofisi anguniri ma alea raka mi ma je angu ndo.

English: I received a message on my phone that money had been paid.
Luganda: Nafunye obubaka ku ssimu yange nti ssente zaabadde zisasuliddwa.
Runyankore: Nkatunga obutumwa aha simu yangye ngu esente zashashurwa.
Acholi: Anongo kwena icima ni giculu cente
Ateso: Abu eong adum emesej osimu ka ebe ataci ikapun.
Lugbara: Ma esu o'duko ma simua kini 'ba ofe robia 'bo.

English: Where can I find good furniture?
Luganda: Nyinza kusangawa ebibajje ebirungi?
Runyankore: Ebibaizirwe ebirungi nimbasa kubishanga nkahi?
Acholi: Kwene ma atwero nongo iye jami ot mabeco calo komgi ni?
Ateso: Aibo apedori eong adumakin icolongo luajokak.
Lugbara: Ma eco mesa azini kome muke 'diyi esu ngua?

English: I don't have the required qualifications for that job.
Luganda: Sirina bisaanyizo byetaagisa ku mulimu ogwo.
Runyankore: Tinyine ebirikwetangwa okutunga omurimo ogwo.
Acholi: Pe atye ki ngec mamite pi tic enoni
Ateso: Amamiatatar eong keda abaluwan nu asioman kanu aswam kangin.
Lugbara: Ma vu karatasi 'bani le azi 'dani 'diyi yo.

English: You need to register your business first.
Luganda: Weetaaga okusooka okuwandiisa bizinesi yo.
Runyankore: Oine kubanza waahandikisa bizinesi yaawe.
Acholi: Ma okwongo omyero kong ineni icoyo nying biacara ni malube ki pen cik
Ateso: Ekot ijo aiwadika ebiasara kon ber.
Lugbara: Le mi ma si mi ma tujari ma ru raka.

English: Very many small businesses in Uganda are not registered.
Luganda: Bizinensi entono nnyingi nnyo mu Uganda tezimanyiddwa.
Runyankore: Bizinesi nyingi omu Uganda tizihandikisize.
Acholi: Tye biacara matino mapol ilobo Uganda ma pe gicoyo nyingi kit malube ki pen cik
Ateso: Ibiasaran luipu ko Uganda mam iwadikatai.
Lugbara: Tujari nyiria karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi si eyi ru ku ye.

English: Refugees need to be helped while in a new country.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubuddamu beetaaga okuyambibwa nga bali mu ggwanga eppya.
Runyankore: Empungi ziine kuhwerwa zaaba ziri omu ihanga erisya.
Acholi: Luring ayeala omyero gikony gi kagitye ilobo mukene
Ateso: Ekot aingarakite ikerai kapak kana ejatatar akwap acie.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ko emunyale eyi ma aza kari azi o'dini ma alea.

English: I need to renew my driving permit.
Luganda: Neetaaga okuzza obuggya dulayivingi pamiti yange.
Runyankore: Nyine kugarura busya ekihandiiko ekirinyikiriza kuvuga ebiiruka.
Acholi: Amito nongo pamit manyen me dwoyo mutoka
Ateso: Akoto eong isiekikinai bobo apermit ka apak. Akot aisiteteun akapapula naka airenge.
Lugbara: Le ma ma oja ma vile kokobi mutukari ma ti ojizu oꞌdinisi ra.

English: Uganda has closed its borders to stop the spread of Ebola.
Luganda: Uganda egaddewo ensalo zaayo okukomya okusaasaana kwa Ebola.
Runyankore: Uganda ekingire ensharo zaayo, okubaasa kuzibira okujanjara kwa Ebola.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda otyeko loro wang boda ne pi gengo nyayo two Ebola
Ateso: Agoloki Uganda ikoruo ke kanu aitikitik awea naka ebola.
Lugbara: Uganda opi eri vile mupaka mile ꞌdiyi ci eꞌyo azo ebolanirisi.

English: Child neglect cases have increased during the lockdown.
Luganda: Emisango gy'okulagajjalira abaana gyeyongedde mu kiseera k'omuggalo.
Runyankore: Okunagaijura abaana kweyongyeire omu keeshereko.
Acholi: Peko me tenyo lutino labongo gwok maber omede madwong ikare ma gamente ogengo wot
Ateso: Eyatakin apalununio naka idwe kapak nagolokinitere akwap
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌbani anzi yi adizu nyai ꞌdiyi ma omgbo tu sawa koronani ꞌdi ma alea angiri.

English: It is wrong to release patient records to the public.
Luganda: Kikyamu okufulumya ebikwata ku mulwadde mu lujjudde.
Runyankore: Tikihikire okusheeshura ebirikukwata aha murwaire.
Acholi: Obedo gin marac me tito lok i kom lutwo bot lwak
Ateso: Erono aitijenar nuikamunitos akiro kayen adekan otunga.
Lugbara: Eri e'yo onzini e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria ri e'dazu o'bi eyi dri.

English: Every person needs privacy at a certain moment in time.
Luganda: Buli muntu yeetaaga obwekisize mu budde obumu.
Runyankore: Obumwe n'obumwe, buri omwe naaba naayenda kwehereera.
Acholi: Dano acel-acel mito ni giwor twero ne me bedo kene ikare mogo ikwo
Ateso: Kanginitunganan ekot nu aidar aiyeyea adio apak kere.
Lugbara: ꞌBa alu alu le sawa ima ngulupini aꞌdule ni idri iniri ma alea sawa azini ma alia ra.

English: There is an increasing habit of spreading fake news.
Luganda: Waliwo omuze ogweyongera ogw'okusaasaanya amawulire amafu.
Runyankore: Omuze gw'okushohoza amakuru agatahikire gweyongyeire.
Acholi: Tim me kubu lok anii tye ka mede
Ateso: Eyatakin kwana aweanario na iyemuto luarokok arai aisab.
Lugbara: Adriza azi o'duko enzoru 'diyi erezu ri ni curu 'do tutu.

English: You can not borrow money from that bank without a bank account.
Luganda: Tosobola kwewola ssente okuva mu bbanka nga tolina akaawunti ya bbanka.
Runyankore: Torikubaasa kweguza sente kuruga omu banka egyo oteinemu akawunti.
Acholi: Pe itwero deno cente ki ibank enoni ka ipe ki account botgi
Ateso: Mam ijo ipedori aikopaun ikapun kaingadis naka ikapun omamei akaunta.
Lugbara: Mi econi sende eꞌduzu mariru bengi ꞌdi ma alia mini akauniti zi kokoru ku.

English: Every company should make sure that its workers have insurance.
Luganda: Buli kkampuni erina okukakasa nti abakozi baayo  bayina yinsuwa.
Runyankore: Buri kampuni eshemereire kuhamya ngu abakozi baayo baine inshuwarensi.
Acholi: Kamponi ducu omyero obed ki yub me gwoko luticgi ki konyogi ka peko opoto atura
Ateso: Ekot ngol ekampuni awanyun ebe kangol eswaman etacitai ikapun luka ayuwara.
Lugbara: Le amuti alu alu ma ne kililiru kini yi mba aziꞌba yini ꞌdiyi ma ta eꞌyo drileonzi pinisi azini arosi ra.

English: Businesses in the city centre have been told to close until further notice.
Luganda: Bizinesi mu kibuga wakati zigambiddwa okuggalawo ekiseera ekitali kigere.
Runyankore: Bizinesi eziri omu rurembo ahagati zihabwirwe kukingaho kuhisya obubareije kwigura.
Acholi: Gimiyo cik meloro katimo biacara weng manonge idyer Kampala wang ma gimiyo twero me yabugi
Ateso: Ebakai agolokin agwelanar ko site itoni ne elimorere.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌyo kini tujara ꞌbani ꞌye tawunia ꞌdiyi ma ovu nga yo kpere ꞌbani azita feria tini zizu.

English: People should take caution before borrowing money from money lenders.
Luganda: Abantu balina okwegendereza nga tebannaba kwewola ssente okuva mu bawozi ba ssente.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kubanza bayetegyereza batakegurize sente kuruga omuri abo abarikuziguza.
Acholi: Omyero dano ogwoke mapeya gu deno cente bot lumii banya
Ateso: Ekot itunga acoite erongo ikopauna ikapun kanejaasi luekorete ikapun .
Lugbara: Le ꞌba yi ma ovu mile be yini sende ꞌduria mariru

English: Banks and telecom companies have been told to reduce fees on digital transactions.
Luganda: Bbanka n'ebitongole by'empuliziganya bigambiddwa okukendeeza ebisale by'okusasula okukolebwa ku mayenjo.
Runyankore: Za banka hamwe na kampuni z'amasimu baragiriirwe okukyendeza aha bishare by'okubiika n'okwihayo sente.
Acholi: Gimiyo lok bot bank weng ki kampuni me cim ni gudwok wel cat ki wil magitimo kun gitiyo ki cim
Ateso: Aingadisia nuka ikapun ka ikapunin lu isimun kes ecorakin aitidisiar itiaisinei lu eweanarere akiro okwamin.
Lugbara: ꞌBa aꞌi bengi yi ꞌba amuti azi ngapi simu be ꞌdiyi be aje yini li agu yini sende idrizu azini esuzuri ma dria ꞌdiyi omvizu ra.

English: Banks will be open for only six hours a day.
Luganda: Bbanka zijja kuba nzigule okumala essaawa mukaaga zokka olunaku.
Runyankore: Za banka niziija kwiguraho kumara eshaaha mukaaga zonka buri izooba.
Acholi: Bank weng bitic pi cawa abicel nino weng
Ateso: Aingadisia nuka ikapun kes ebeit anganar adaun isawan ikanyape bon aparan.
Lugbara: Erojo eyi lu nga aa mgbo sa'wa pi pi azia o'du alu alu vu si .

English: Bank of Uganda supervises all financial institutions in Uganda.
Luganda: Bbanka ya Uganda erondoola ebitongole by'ensimbi byonna mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Banka ya Uganda enkuru neereeberera ebitongore by'esnte byona omu ihanga.
Acholi: Bank of Uganda aye doro tic pa bank weng ku dul mukene mapatpat matiyo ilok kom lim
Ateso: Bank of Uganda nes imanimani aingadisia kere nu ikapun ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Bengi Ugandaniri ni azi pamvu amuti dria tujara ꞌyepi robiasi ꞌdiyiniri andrini.

English: The foreign exchange rates are increasing every day.
Luganda: Emiwendo gy'okuvungisa ensimbi engwira girinnya buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Ebishare by'okugura n'okuguza esente z'aheeru nibyeyongyera buri izooba.
Acholi: Wel me loko lim ma aa ki woko tye ka mede nino ducu
Ateso: Etiaisinei lu isiecere ikapun lu okinga nes iyatasi kanginiparan.
Lugbara: Aje ꞌbani robia ꞌba vileri ojazu robia kari azi ꞌdiyi vile ꞌdiyisiri tu ra.

English: Moneylenders are increasing interests every day.
Luganda: Abawozi ba ssente bongeza amagoba buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Abarikuguza esente nibongyera amagoba buriizooba.
Acholi: Lumii lim den tye kamedo wel cul nino ducu
Ateso: Itunga luekorete ikapun kes iyasete ameda kanginiparan.
Lugbara: ꞌBa sende feꞌba mariru ꞌdiyi otu aje sende ma dria orodriruri ra.

English: Courts are set to resume after the pandemic.
Luganda: Kkooti neetegefu okuddamu oluvannyuma lw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Kooti z'ebiragiro niziija kwiguraho ahanyima y'oburwaire.
Acholi: Kot bicako tic ka  two ma oporo ni orweny
Ateso: Adieketa kes ebeit abongokin aswam akaulo na adeka.
Lugbara: ꞌBa fe makata yini azi eꞌdozu azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi ma vutia.

English: Time management is very important during a court hearing.
Luganda: Okwata ebiseera kya mugaso nnyo mu kuwulirwa kwa kkooti.
Runyankore: Okurinda eshaaha n'eky'omugasho omushango gwaba niguhurirwa.
Acholi: Gwoko cawa pire tek tutwal ka lok tye me awinya I Kot
Ateso: Aidar apak nes ibore epol kakere kapak kana epupere imusagono adieket.
Lugbara: Sa'wa ta mbaza eri orodriru e'yo duani ma drilea 'diyi eri ria.

English: The judge said that the court will be closed early today.
Luganda: Omulamuzi yagambye nti kkooti ejja kuggalwawo mangu leero.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi agizire ngu kooti neeza kukingaho kare eriizooba.
Acholi: Langolkop owaconi gibiloro Kot con tini
Ateso: Ebala atubon ebe elingakino lolo aigol adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo liiri kini ꞌba andru nga makata ma ti opi drioru

English: Few people will be allowed in court today.
Luganda: Abantu batono abajja okukkirizibwa mu kkooti leero.
Runyankore: Eriizooba nibaza kwikiriza abantu bakye omu kooti.
Acholi: Dano manok aye bidonyo iot Kot tini
Ateso: Itunga idis bon ilolo ecamakino alomar toma adieket.
Lugbara: Ba lu andru 'ba eyi ai kotia were.

English: Bail applications will be heard by the court on Friday.
Luganda: Okusaba kw'okweyimirirwa ku kakalu kujja kuwulirwa kkooti ku lwokutaano.
Runyankore: Abashabire okwemerererwa nibaija kuhurirwa orwakataano.
Acholi: Kot biwinyo pido pi nongo bail iceng abic
Ateso: Alipan na alacakino nes elosi adieket aipup naikanyet.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga eꞌyo ꞌba ofuzu joarisi sendesi azini ꞌba nde ni acizu makata ma drilia aciri eri oꞌdu towisi

English: We need more judges to work on the very many pending cases.
Luganda: Twetaaga abalamuzi abalala okukola ku misango emingi egitannakolebwako.
Runyankore: Nitwetaga abaramuzi baingi kukora aha mishango esigaire.
Acholi: Wamito Lungolkop madwong wek gu winy lok mapol ma ojoge pi kare malac
Ateso: Ikoto iso atubok luipu kanu angetakin imusagon lu ediatunos.
Lugbara: Ama le ꞌba eꞌyo lipi ꞌdiyi ma azi karakau kesi yi trapi karakarau ꞌdiyi lizu..

English: The pandemic led to the suspension of all court proceedings.
Luganda: Ekirwadde bbunansi kyaviirako okuwera entuula za kkooti zonna.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bukatuma kooti zaayemerera.
Acholi: Two ma opoto ni obalo winyo lok ma onongo tye inyim kot
Ateso: Adeka nes abu oyau agolokino na apupio na imusagon.
Lugbara: Azo efupi wakakaruri fe ꞌbani eꞌyo liza dria ma ti opizu ci

English: The court judgements can be sent to the applicants via email.
Luganda: Ensala za kkooti zisobola okusindikirwa omuwaabi okuyita ku mmeyiro.
Runyankore: Encwa y'emanja neija kwoherezibwa aha intaneti.
Acholi: Adwogi me ngolokop gitwero cwalone bot Lakoko kun gitiyo ki email
Ateso: Etube nes epedorio aijukanakin lu ilipitos itoritere email koalago
Lugbara: ꞌBa eco eꞌyo ꞌbani li makata ma alia ꞌdiyi idri ꞌba waraga sipi ꞌdiyi dri imelisi ra.

English: He made his submission to court last week.
Luganda: Yawaayo okuwaaba kwe mu kkooti wiiki ewedde.
Runyankore: Akahayo ebi yaabaire aine kuhayo omu kooti esande ehweire
Acholi: En omiyo lok mamege inyim Kot icabit mukato
Ateso: Abu ngesi itatamik adieket nuke osabiti je.
Lugbara: Fe ima egata makata dri sabiti ajerisi.

English: The chief justice suspended the court hearings after the new presidential directives on Sunday.
Luganda: Ssaabalamuzi yayongezzaawo entuula za kkooti oluvannyuma lw'ebiragiro bya pulezidenti ku Sande.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi omukuru akabinga emishango omu kooti ahanyima y'ekiragiro kya Mukuru w'eihanga aha sande.
Acholi: Langolkop madit ojuko winyo lok weng matye inyim Kot inge lok ma ladit lobo omiyo iceng cabit
Ateso: Abu atubon isiekik aipup imusagon lu adieket akaulo na aicorakineta nuka lokapolon akwap nasabiti.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ambo ꞌba eꞌyo liꞌba ꞌdiyi ma drileruri atri kesi ꞌbani li makata ma alia ꞌdiyi azita purezideniti ni fele oꞌdiru sabatusi ꞌdia ꞌdiyi ma vutia.

English: Local governments are responsible to enforce regulations.
Luganda: Gavumenti z'ebitundu zirina obuvunaanyizibwa okukwasisa ebiragiro.
Runyankore: Gavumenti z'ebyanga nizijunanibwa okutaho ebiragiro.
Acholi: Obedo tic pa gamente mapiny me keto itic cik ma gimoko
Ateso: Apuganasi nu okwap kes ikamunitos nu aitwasam ikisila.
Lugbara: Eri azi gamete eleleru ꞌdiyi fezu azita yi ma nga azi ra.

English: The new health directives will be effective starting tomorrow.
Luganda: Ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu ebippya bijja kukola okutandika n'enkya.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro aha nshonga z'eby'amagara nibiija kutandika nyenkyakare.
Acholi: Cik manyen me gengo nyayo twoo pi cako tic diki
Ateso: Aicoreta nuka angeleu kes itegearo ageun moi.
Lugbara: Azita alatani o'di 'diyi e'do azi nga drusi.

English: The president has issued new health directives to the nation.
Luganda: Pulezidenti ayisizza ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu ebipya eri eggwanga.
Runyankore: Mukuru w'eihanga yaaha ebiragiro bisya ebirikukwata ahaby'amagara.
Acholi: Lawang Lobo okati ki cik manyen ma mako lok me yotkom
Ateso: Etolomu lokapolon akwap aicorakineta nuitetiak nejai akwap.
Lugbara: Purezidenti fe kari anzi eyini azita alata ni o'diru ni eyi.

English: The ministry of health can not fight this virus without help from the public.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu tesobola kulwanyisa kawuka kano nga teyambiddwako bantu.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara terikubaasa kurwanisa akakooko etaine buhwezi kuruga omu bantu.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom pe twero lweny i kom two man labongo kony pa lwak
Ateso: Mam erionget loka angaleu epedori aitiji ikur komamei agangat naka itunga.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri econi a'di 'di o'bu corona niri be atita Okalamvu eyini ri koko ku.

English: Please take note of the current circumstances before you go on to complain.
Luganda: Bambi faayo ku mbeera eriwo nga tonnagenda kwemulugunya.
Runyankore: Banza omanye embeera eriho obwahati otakagumiizemu kwetomboitwa.
Acholi: Tim ber ineni iniang maber aloka-loka me kwo ikareni mapeya icako lok mapol
Ateso: Irereo ber nuejaas erongo ijo egeuna angolopa.
Lugbara: Kirikiri le mi ma ne e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi sa'wa 'di ma alea 'diyi ra ka de nga po'di mi onu ku.

English: Make sure that your actions are within the law.
Luganda: Kakasa nti ebikolwa byo biri mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Reeba ngu ebikorwa byawe nibigyendera omu mateeka.
Acholi: Neni jami ma itimo ducu lubu cik
Ateso: Owanyu ebe aswamisinei kon iswamao kotoma okisila.
Lugbara: Le mi ma ne ra kini e'yo mini 'ye 'diyi dria azita ma palaa.

English: All the measures offered are within the law.
Luganda: Empenda zonna eziteereddwawo ziri mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Byona ebiteirweho, nibigyendera omu biragiro
Acholi: Yoo weng ma gimiyo pi lweny i kom two tye lube ki cik
Ateso: Nu ibwaikitai kere ejaas toma okisila.
Lugbara: Geri e'yo ma aza kozu fele 'diyi dria azita ma palaa.

English: New ways of working have come up during the pandemic.
Luganda: Engeri z'okukola empya zimeruse mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Emihanda misya y'okukoreramu emirimo ereebekire omu biro by'oburwaire.
Acholi: Yoo manyen me tic okati ikareman ma two opotoni
Ateso: Eswamae loitetet kere elomunit kapak naka adeka.
Lugbara: Geri azi ngazu oꞌdiru ꞌdiyi efu sawa azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi vileri ma alia.

English: The lawyer requested the judge to settle the case outside the court.
Luganda: Munnamateeka yasabye omulamuzi  okumalira omusango wabweru wa kkooti.
Runyankore: Puriida akashaba omuramuzi ngu omushango bagumarire aheeru ya kooti.
Acholi: Lapilida olego langolkop me kwanyo lok ki inyim Kot wek gityek ki woko
Ateso: Elipit epulida atubon aitemokin nu emusago kokinga na adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa kesi ma aga nyapiri aꞌi ꞌba eꞌyo lipiri ni eꞌyo ꞌbani lileri dezu makata ma aliarisi amveleru.

English: You need to get a lawyer if you want this issue to be resolved.
Luganda: Weetaaga okufuna munnamateeka bw'oba oyagala ensonga eno okugonjoolwa.
Runyankore: Noyetaaga puriida ku raabe noyetaaga ngu enshonga egi ekorweho.
Acholi: Omyero inong lapilida kace imito ni gityek lok man
Ateso: Ekot ijo adumun epulida arai ikoto ijo iboro lu itemokinai.
Lugbara: Mi ka le eꞌyo ꞌdi ma de ꞌi ra, le mi ma esu ꞌba kesi nzepi mi pariani.

English: What are the repercussions if he is convicted of fraud?
Luganda: Biki ebivaamu singa asingisbwa ogw'obufere.
Runyankore: Ekireije kubaho nenki ku araabe yaasharirwa orubanja rw'obushumankuzi?
Acholi: Adwogine obedo gin ango ka gitweye ibuc?
Ateso: Anubo atiokiso etakanunete arai etubokin nges kanu akoko?
Lugbara: ꞌBa ka eri ma dria eꞌyo li ogu akirisirisi, eꞌyo ewaru alenia ꞌdiyi nga andri ngoni ya?

English: They did not follow the formal process while applying for jobs.
Luganda: Tebaagoberera mitendera mitongole nga basaba emirimu.
Runyankore: Tibarakuratiire omuhanda oguhikire barikushaba emirimo.
Acholi: Pe gulubu yoo atir ikare ma gucoyo waraga pinongo tic
Ateso: Mam kes apotu otupata ewai lo ebeit kapak kana ailip aswamisinei.
Lugbara: Yi ngani geri kililiruri ꞌdu yini azi ndaria ku

English: You need to make a decision today.
Luganda: Weetaaga okukola okusalawo leero.
Runyankore: Oine kusharamu eky'okukora eriizooba.
Acholi: Omyero imok tami tin
Ateso: Ekot ijo aseun ilolo.
Lugbara: Le mi ma ꞌdu egata andru.

English: The court hearing for the murder case is next week.
Luganda: Okuwulirwa kwa kkooti okw'omusago gw'obutemu kwa wiiki ejja.
Runyankore: Okuhurira omushango gw'obwisi omu kooti, n'esande erikwija.
Acholi: Winyo pido pi lok me nek ca tye icabit manyen
Ateso: Apupio na emusago lo eyarit erai osabiti ngol.
Lugbara: Ba mu e'yo 'bani 'ba azi 'dizu 'da eri kotia weeki drisiri si.

English: I could not believe the court ruling was on our side.
Luganda: Nabadde sikkiriza nti ensala ya kkooti yabadde ku ludda lwaffe.
Runyankore: Tindikubaasa kukikiriza ngu omushango naitwe twagusingire.
Acholi: Pe onongo atwero yee ni Kot bingolo kop macwako wan
Ateso: Mam eong acamunit ebe atubio na emusago ejok ejaun owai wok.
Lugbara: Ma econi aꞌi kini ꞌba li eꞌyo onyiruni ama dri ꞌdini ku.

English: They need to get legal advice from the right lawyer.
Luganda: Beetaaga okufuna okuwabulwa ku by'amateeka okuva ku munnamateeka omutuufu.
Runyankore: Baine kutunga okuhaburwa kuruga ahari puriida ohikire.
Acholi: Omyero gunong tam kibot Lapilida
Ateso: Ekotokin kes adumun aicoreta nu okisila kanejai epulida loabeit.
Lugbara: Le yi ma esu embata kililiruri ꞌba eꞌyo liza ma aga nyapi kililiruri vu.

English: The fate of this court case is in hands of the judge.
Luganda: Ekinaava mu musango guno kiri mu mikono gya mulamuzi.
Runyankore: Ebirikukwata aha mushango ogu biri omu mikono y'omuramuzi.
Acholi: Adwogi me lok man ocung icing Langolkop
Ateso: Nuikamunitos emusago lo ejai akanin atubon.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ngapi efupi kesi ꞌdi ma aliari eri ꞌba eꞌyo lipiri ma dria.

English: What happened between them?
Luganda: Ki ekyatuukawo wakati waabwe?
Runyankore: N'enki ekyabaire ahagati yaabo?
Acholi: Gin ango ma otime ikingi?
Ateso: Inyobo obu otakanu okiding kec.
Lugbara: A'du e'yo 'ye i eyi ma eselea ni?

English: Everyone needs the freedom to freely express their ideas.
Luganda: Buli omu yeetaaga eddembe okwoleka endowooza ze mu bwetaaye.
Runyankore: Buri omwe naayenda obugabe bw'okugamba enshonga ze.
Acholi: Dano weng mito gubed ki twero me miyo tam ki lok kun nongo gibedo agonya
Ateso: Nginitunganan ekot ailajara kanu einer nukec aomisio.
Lugbara: Le 'ba dria ma esu driwala eyi ma egata eyi nzezu ori koko.

English: We had a very long discussion on phone.
Luganda: Twanyumizza ebbanga ddene nnyo ku ssimu.
Runyankore: Tukaganiira obwire buraingwa aha simu.
Acholi: Wa loko lok mabor icim
Ateso: Inerit iso noi kosimu.
Lugbara: Anze ki e'yo simu si sa'wa ezu.

English: Some of the court rules have nothing to do with the actual dispute.
Luganda: Amateeka ga kkooti agamu tegalina kya manyi kya kukola ku butakkaanya obuliwo.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro bya kooti ebimwe tibirikukwata aha mushango.
Acholi: Cilk mukene ma iKot pe rwate ki lok matye me alara
Ateso: Icie ikisila lu adieket mam ikamunitos engunget elopet.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ama kesi ꞌda ma alia ꞌdiyi ma azi awini yi bi eꞌyo yi ꞌyepi ngiringiriru ri be ku.

English: The court hearing is tomorrow before noon.
Luganda: Okuwulirwa kwa kkooti kwa nkya nga tezinnawera ssaawa mukaaga ez'emisana.
Runyankore: Okuhurira omushango omu kooti ninyencakare zitakahikire shaaha mukaaga.
Acholi: Winyo pido tye inyim Kot diki mapwod cawa abicel peya oromo
Ateso: Ejaun moi apupio na adieket eringa kiding paran edolo.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga eꞌyo eri kotia drusi denga sawa azia fini ku

English: When will the court ruling be made?
Luganda: Ensala ya kkooti kunaakolebwa ddi?
Runyankore: Okuhurira omushango omu kooti niryari?
Acholi: Kot bingolokop awene?
Ateso: Iworibo ejaunor etube adieket?
Lugbara: Ba e'yo liza fe nguari?

English: This is a very sensitive case.
Luganda: Guno omusango gwa maanyi nnyo.
Runyankore: Ogu n'omushango gw'okwegyendesereza.
Acholi: Man lok ma pek tutwal
Ateso: Erai lo emusago lo epol.
Lugbara: Kesi ꞌdi kesi azi ꞌbani ovuzu ani milesini.

English: You can not rely on everyone.
Luganda: Tosobola kwesigama ku buli omu.
Runyankore: Torikubaasa kwesiga buri omwe.
Acholi: Pe itwero jenge i kom dano weng
Ateso: Mam ijo ipedori amunokina nginitunganan.
Lugbara: Mi econi ovu asi'baza be 'ba dria ma dria ku.

English: Nothing said in this discussion should be disclosed to the public.
Luganda: Tewali kyogeddwa mu kubaganya birowoozo kuno kirina kwasanguzibwa mu lujjudde.
Runyankore: Ebyagambwaho omukuhanuura oku byona, tihaine ekishemeraire kushohora.
Acholi: Petye lok moo mawaloko kany ma omyero okati bot lwak
Ateso: Emamei ibore yen itatamitai kane yen ebeit alimor kinga otunga.
Lugbara: Le e'yo azi 'bani nze agbatara 'di ma alea ma fu amve o'bi eyidri ku.

English: The information in the mediation is very confidential.
Luganda: Obubaka mu kuteesaganya bwa kyama nnyo.
Runyankore: Byona ebirikukwata aha kuhikaanisa embaju zoona birindwe nk'ekihama.
Acholi: Lok magitye kalaro kiwoko ikin lukoko obedo lok me mung
Ateso: Akiro nu etemonokino eraas nu aiyeyea.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌbani nze kesi ꞌbani ꞌba erizu alenia eri ri ma ta mba zizaru.

English: The good thing about settling a case at mediation is confidentiality.
Luganda: Ekintu ekirungi ku kuteesaganya ku musango kwe kukuuma ebyama.
Runyankore: Ekirungi ebirikukwata kugarukanisa abantu nibiguma biri omu kihama.
Acholi: Gin maber ki lok ma gilaro kiwoko ikin lukoko aye ni loke bedo imung
Ateso: Ibore ejukunar aitemokin emusago kowai lo aineranar eraas nuka aiyeyea.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo onyiru ꞌbani kesi ma dria ꞌba erizu eri ri eri ꞌbani ovuzu asi ꞌbaza beri ꞌi.

English: To successfully settle the case outside court every party needs to give up something.
Luganda: Okugonjoola obulungi omusango wabweru wa kkooti buli ludda lwetaaga okubaako ne kye lweresa.
Runyankore: Omushango okugumariira aheeru ya kooti, buri bamwe ab'embaju zombi baine kugira eki bafeerwa.
Acholi: Me neno ni lok otum maber kiwoko labongo cito iKot omyero dano weng matye ki adot guyube me jalo jami mogo
Ateso: Kanu aitemokin emusago ejok kokinga na adieket ekot ngol ewai acamun atwaniar idiobore.
Lugbara: ꞌBani ecozu eꞌyo azini ma azakozu kesi ma aleasi amveleru ra, le ꞌba dria alenia ꞌdiyi ma fe afa azi ci.

English: Usually, the parties are given an opportunity to work out their relationships.
Luganda: Ebiseera ebisinga, abantu baweebwa omukisa okukola ku nkolagana zaabwe.
Runyankore: Abu kirikukwataho buriijo nibaheebwa omugisha kuteeraho kwikirizana omu nshonga zaabo.
Acholi: Pol kare, joo matye ki adot gimiyo ki gin kare me laro lok ikingi pi ber bedo
Ateso: Duc ijaikino iwaitin kere arerengu na acamanar.
Lugbara: Tutunisi ꞌba ꞌba eꞌyo esupi ꞌdiyi dri driwala fe yi truzu

English: When a case is settled at mediation it's different from a normal court case.
Luganda: Omusango bwe guggwera mu kuteesaganya gwawukana ku musango kkooti ogwa bulijjo..
Runyankore: Omushango baagumarira aheeru ya kooti, niguba gutarikushushana n'ogwacwerwa omu kooti.
Acholi: Ka lok otum ki woko ma pe gicwalo ikot nongo pat ki lok ma gingolokope iKot
Ateso: Karai itemokin emusago kowai lo ainerun egitakina keda lo etubitai kadieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ka kesi dria ꞌba eri akuasi ejini ꞌi kesi ꞌbani nze makata ma aliari be ku.

English: Parties rarely reconcile after settling these cases.
Luganda: Enjuyi zirwawo okutabagana oluvannyuma lw'okugonjoola emisango gino.
Runyankore: Abu kirikukwataho tibarikukira kugarukana omu manja nkezi.
Acholi: Joo ma tye ki adot polgi pe gi ribe inge tyeko lok
Ateso: Ecicing iwaitin acamanar akaulo na etubere imusagon lu.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo esupi ꞌdiyi ka sawa driasi eꞌyo oiu ꞌbo, truni yi tutunisi ku

English: You need proof before you take him to court.
Luganda: Weetaaga obukakafu nga tonnamutwala mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Oine kutunga obuhame otakamutweire omu kooti
Acholi: Omyero ibed ki lanyut me bal ma peya icwalo en ikot
Ateso: Ikotokin ijo ajenanut erongo ijo eyangara ngesi adieket.
Lugbara: Denga mi jini eri makata ma drilia ku, ama le afa ecepi eri eꞌyo adaniri ci.

English: Many become friends again after settling their cases at mediation.
Luganda: Bangi baddamu okufuuka ab'emikwano oluvannyuma lw'okumalira emisango gyabwe mu kuteesaganya.
Runyankore: Baingi abarikumarira emanja zaabo aheeru ya kooti nibakira kugaruka kuba amanywani.
Acholi: Dano mapol gi doko lurem odoco inge tyeko laro lok ki woko labongo cwalone ikot
Ateso: Luipu eraunos ipapero bobo akaulo na aitemokin imusagon kec kowai lo ainerun.
Lugbara: ꞌBa karakara yi eca agyiru yini eꞌyo otuzu ꞌbori ma vutia

English: Each party bears its costs when you settle the case at mediation
Luganda: Buli ludda lukola ku misoso gyalwo bwe mumalira omusango mu kuteesaganya.
Runyankore: Mwamarira orubanja aheeru ya kooti tihaine orikushashura mugyenzi we esente ezi akoriise.
Acholi: Lakoko acel-acel culu cente pi kelo adot kace wutye lok ki woko ma pe wucwalo ikot
Ateso: Kangol ewai eyangari luke igaraman karai itemokisi yesi emusago kowai lo ainerun.
Lugbara: ꞌBa alu alu ni eꞌyo iniri ma azako sawa ꞌbani eꞌyo oyuzu amveri ma alia.

English: Many people never recover the expenses of the trial.
Luganda: Abantu bangi  tebaddizibwa ssente ze bakozesa mu kulabikako mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Baingi tibarikugaruka kutunga esente ezi bakoreise omu kuhurirwa kw'omushango.
Acholi: Inge ngolokop, Pol dano pe twero nongo cente marom ki maguculu me laro lok ikot
Ateso: Itunga luipu mam inyakunete ikapun lu igaraman akaulo na aosan.
Lugbara: ꞌBa karakara yi esuni afa yini eza sawa eꞌyo lizaniria ꞌdiyi dika ku.

English: A lot of costs were incurred in paying lawyers and transporting of witnesses.
Luganda: Ssente nnyingi zaasaasaaanyizibwa mu kusasula bannamateeka n'okutambuza kw'abajulizi.
Runyankore: Bakashohoza sente nyingi omu kushashura ba puriida n'omu kureeta abajurizi.
Acholi: Cente ocito tutwal me culu Lupilida ki tingo caden
Ateso: Ipu ikapun itwasamaros atacia ipulidan ka ayanganaria ajenak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eza sende angiri ꞌbani ꞌba kesi ma aga nyapi ꞌdiyi ofezu azini ꞌba ndremaaziru ꞌdiyi ojizu.

English: He was asked for a lot of money to be bailed out.
Luganda: Yasabibwa ensimbi nnyingi nnyo okweyimirirwa.
Runyankore: Akashabwa esente nyingi kugira ngu abaase kwemerererwa.
Acholi: Gipenye wel madit wek onong bail
Ateso: Aponi ingitai ngesi ikapun luipu kanu alakunio.
Lugbara: ꞌBa aꞌi drinia sende angiri ꞌbani eri ofuzu.

English: Justice delayed is justice denied.
Luganda: Obwenkanya obulwisiddwa bwe bwenkanya obugaaniddwa.
Runyankore: Oburinganiza oburikukyerererwa nibwima omuntu oburinganiza obu aine kutunga.
Acholi: Kop ma girii kangolo rom ki kop ma gikwero ngolo
Ateso: Awosan na isiyapo nes awosan na imikitai.
Lugbara: eꞌyo liza ꞌbani sawa ezarari eri eꞌyo liza ꞌbani fele kuri ꞌi

English: The plaintiff wasn't satisfied with the court ruling.
Luganda: Omuwaabi teyali mumativu na nsala ya kkooti.
Runyankore: Kihababa tareikiriize ebi kooti yaacwiremu.
Acholi: Ladot lok pe obedo ki yomcwiny pi kop ma gingolo
Ateso: Mam lo ewosan emonikina kanu etube.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo topiri apini eꞌyo liza makatanirisi ku

English: The defendant may be dead before the next court meeting.
Luganda: Omuwawaabirwa  ayinza okuba omufu ng'olutuula lwa kkooti terunnaba.
Runyankore: Kihababirwa naabaasa kwija kuba yaafiire, kooti etakashutamire omurundi ogundi.
Acholi: Dano ma adot tye kinyinge twero too woko ma kot peya obedo kawinyo lok ipido matye kabino anyim
Ateso: Lo itepegit emusago emina atwanare erongo apupio na etupakini adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani toleri eco dra de nga makata vileri ma sawa ecani ku.

English: The wife and the husband will be brought to court on Monday.
Luganda: Omwami n'omukyala bajja kuleetebwa mu kkooti ku Mande.
Runyankore: Omukazi hamwe naiba nibaza kureetwa omu kooti orw'okubanza.
Acholi: Dako gin ki cware gibikelo gi inyim kot icen Baraja
Ateso: Aberu keda ekilokit eyauno adieket Nabalasa.
Lugbara: Ba oku 'da ki ji i ma agupi be duani drilea o'du alusi.

English: The judge usually decides what happens in court.
Luganda: Omulamuzi ebiseera ebisinga y'asalawo ekibaawo mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi buriijo niwe arikusharaho eby'omu kooti.
Acholi: Langolkop aye yero gin ma omyero otime ikot
Ateso: Atubon nges duc ejeni nu iswama adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo lipiri ni eꞌyo ꞌi ꞌyepi makata ma aliari nini.

English: Everyone is waiting for the court ruling.
Luganda: Buli omu alindiridde ensala ya kkooti.
Runyankore: Buri omwe ategyeriize eki kooti erasharemu.
Acholi: Dano ducu tye kakuru adwogi me ngolokop ma kot obimiyo
Ateso: Itunga kere idaritos etube adieket.
Lugbara: Ba dria ni duani ma e'yo liza te.

English: We prepared the evidence early enough before the next court sitting.
Luganda: Twateekateeka obujulizi amangu ddala ng'olutuula lwa kkooti olulala terunnaba.
Runyankore: Tukatebeekanisa obujurizi kare ekirikumara kooti etakashutamire omurundi ogundi.
Acholi: Wayubu lanyut me bal dong watye kakuru bedo pa kot
Ateso: Itemokit iso ajenanut sek erongo apupio na etupakini.
Lugbara: Ama otu eꞌyo ama vile ekizibitiru ꞌdiyi drioru de nga amuni makata vileri ma alia ku

English: This dispute can only be settled in the courts of law.
Luganda: Obutakkaanya buno busobola kugonjoolebwa mubuga z'amateeka mwokka.
Runyankore: Obutaikirizana obu nibubaasa kushobororwa omu kooti honka.
Acholi: Lok man twero tum ikot keken
Ateso: Engunget lo epedori bon aitemokin adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ecolu ngiringiri yi ma eseleari ma azako makata ma drilia.

English: The lawyer advised that settling the case at mediation will save time.
Luganda: Munnamateeka yawabudde nti okumaliriza omusango mu kuteesaganya kijja kutaasa obudde.
Runyankore: Puriida akahabura ngu okumarira orubanja aheeru ya kooti tikirikwija kushiisha obwire.
Acholi: Lapilida omiyo tam ni tyeko loki ki woko labongo cwalo ne ikot pe bi balo kare
Ateso: Abu epulida icorak ebe aitemokin emusago kowai lo ainerun eyuari apak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa kesi ma aga nyapiri kini ꞌbani eꞌyo otuzu akuarini sawa ma tambara.

English: The judge hasn't arrived yet.
Luganda: Omulamuzi tannatuuka.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi takeizire.
Acholi: Langolkop peya oo
Ateso: Mam atubon edolunit.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo lipiri ecani nga ku.

English: Some times court allows parties to resolve issues outside court.
Luganda: Emirundi egimu kkooti ekkiriza enjuyi okugonjoolera ensonga wabweru wa kkooti.
Runyankore: Obumwe kooti nikiriza abu kirikukwataho okushoborora eshonga zaabo aheeru ya kooti.
Acholi: Ikare mukene, kot yee ni joo matye ki koko gutyek lok gi kiwoko
Ateso: Acie apakio ecamakit adieket itunga aitemonokin akiro kokinga na adieket.
Lugbara: sawa azinisi makatani fe ꞌba yi eꞌyo yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ma ti de geri amvesi

English: They need to choose a mediator who has the relevant qualifications.
Luganda: Beetaaga okulonda omutabaganya alina ebisaanyizo ebyetaagisa.
Runyankore: Baine kutunga omuntu w'okubagarukanisa oine ebirikwetengyesa.
Acholi: Omyero guyee lalar lok matye ki rwom kwan mamalo dok hor ticce ne
Ateso: Ekot kes aseun lo epuri akiro loejaas keda aitutuoro.
Lugbara: le yi ma esu ojio azini onita be kililiruni ꞌi

English: The defendant requested an interpreter before he could say anything in court.
Luganda: Avunaanibwa yasaba omutapusi nga tannabaako ky'ayogera kkooti.
Runyankore: Kihababirwa akashaba omuvunuuzi atakagizire eki yaagamba.
Acholi: Dano ma koko tye i kome okwayo ni ginonge lagony leb mapwod peya eloko gin mo ikot
Ateso: Elipit lo etepegan ejulan erongo nges elimuno adio akirot adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani toleri aꞌi ꞌba ti ojapiri eꞌyo ojazu de nga poꞌdi nzeni eꞌyo azi ku.

English: Thirteen years have passed since mediation was introduced by the High Court.
Luganda: Emyaka kkumi n'esatu giyiseewo okuva okuteesaganya lwe kwateekebwawo kkooti enkulu.
Runyankore: Hahweireho emyaka 13, kuruga obu kooti enkuru yaatandikaho enkora y'okugarukanisa abantu.
Acholi: Mwaki aparadek otyeko kato nicake ma Court Mamalo oyee ni lok mukene gitwero tyeko ki woko
Ateso: Atuboros ikaru itomonauni agear ne etolomunere nu aitemonokin imusagon kokinga na adieket.
Lugbara: Eli aga di ca mudri drini na ꞌbo eꞌdozu ꞌba makata oruleruria ꞌdiyini eꞌyo ꞌba yini eꞌyo dezu akuasiri eꞌdozu

English: Twenty-five per cent of convicted criminals are not criminals.
Luganda: Ebitundu abiri mu bitaano ku buli kikumi eby'abasingisibwa emisango si bazzi ba misango.
Runyankore: Ebicweka makumi abiri na bitaano ebyabantu abarikujunaanwa, nibaba bataine mushango.
Acholi: pacent pyeraryo wiyabic pa dano ma tye ibuc pi bal madongo pe gitye lubal
Ateso: Akaisarei kanukany kotoma akwatat lu iwenan mam eraas lu ediakaritos.
Lugbara: Ba 'bani e'yo lizu eyi ma dria kaliri drini towi turu alu dria 'diyi 'ba 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ku.

English: Uganda produces the second-best lawyers in East Africa followed by Tanzania and Rwanda.
Luganda: Uganda efulumya bannamateeka abakwata ekyokubiri mu bulungi mu East Africa n'eddirirwa Tanzania ne Rwanda.
Runyankore: Ba puriida ba Uganda nibo barikusingayo oburungi omu burugw'izooba East Africa hakurateeho aba Tanzania na Rwanda.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda tye namba aryo me bedo ki Lupilida maber loyo I East Africa, Tanzania ki Rwanda olube kore
Ateso: Uganda nes eitolomunene ipulidan luajokak kakere ko East Africa otupakini Tanzania ka Rwanda.
Lugbara: Ka adri East Africaaria, Uganda ni ꞌba eꞌyo liꞌba onyiru tu ꞌdiyi ofuni vutinisi ꞌba Tanzania ꞌdiyi , vutinia ꞌba Rwandaa ꞌdiyi.

English: To avoid going to court one needs to avoid committing crimes.
Luganda: Okwewala okugenda mu kkooti omuntu yeetaaga okwewala okuzza emisango.
Runyankore: Okubaasa kwetantara kuza omu kooti, oine kwetantara kukora ebihagaro.
Acholi: Pi gengo cito ikot, omyero pe ibed ka timo bal
Ateso: Kanu mam alosit adieket mam igwauni edio emusago.
Lugbara: Muta kotia ri atrizu, le 'ba azi ma 'ye e'yo onzi ku.

English: You should file a suit against that company.
Luganda: Olina okuggulawo omusango ku kkampuni eyo.
Runyankore: Oshemereire kuhababira kampuni egyo.
Acholi: Omyero imor adot i kom kampuni enoni
Ateso: Ekot ijo awosan ekampuni ngol.
Lugbara: Mi ma to amuti ꞌda ꞌi

English: The prosecutor couldn't answer the judge's question.
Luganda: Omuwaabi yali tasobola kuddamu kibuuzo kya mulamuzi.
Runyankore: Omuhababi wa gavumenti tarabaasize kugrukamu ekibuuzo ky'omuramuzi.
Acholi: Lapilida pe otwero gamo lapeny pa Langolkop
Ateso: Mam etepesan abu opedo abongokin aingiset atubon.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani toleri oꞌbi zita ꞌba eꞌyo lipirini ziri omvi ti.

English: Everyone has a right to seek justice.
Luganda: Buli omu alina eddembe okunoonya obwenkanya.
Runyankore: Buri omwe aine obugabe kuronda oburingaaniza.
Acholi: Dano ducu tye ki twero me nongo kony labongo apokapoka
Ateso: Nginitunganan ejaas keda apedor awosan ka apupokino.
Lugbara: Eri drilemgbo ꞌba driani eꞌyo liza kililiruri esuzu.

English: Laws at times oppress and lead people to death.
Luganda: Amateeka olumu ganyigiriza ne galeetera abantu okufa.
Runyankore: Obumwe ebiragiro nibinyangaraza abantu bituma baafa.
Acholi: Ikare mukene cik diyo dano dok bene kelo too ki dano
Ateso: Aciepakio eridakitos iksila ido eminas aijaikin icie itunga atwanare.
Lugbara: Azita yi sawa azinisi ꞌba yi ocu azini yi ꞌba yi ma dri ce fizu dra ma alia.

English: The bail application is acceptable in court.
Luganda: Okusaba kw'okweyimiriwa kukkirizibwa mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Okushaba kwemerererwa nikwikirizibwa omu kooti.
Acholi: Kot yee waraga me kwayo nongo bail
Ateso: Ailip alakunio ecamakitai adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa waraga sile makata zizu efuzu arujoarisi sendesiri aꞌi makata ma alia ra.

English: Wrongdoers should be arrested.
Luganda: Abakozi b'ebikolobero balina okukwatibwa.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'ebihagaro bashemereire kukwatwa
Acholi: Lubal omyero gimak gi
Ateso: Itunga lu adiakanarak ekot aikam.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma obi 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ci.

English: Some people are exempted from punishment.
Luganda: Abantu abamu basonyiyibwa okubonerezebwa.
Runyankore: Abantu abamwe tibakuheebwa bifubiro.
Acholi: Tye dano mukene ma pe ginongo pwod pi bal magutimo
Ateso: Icie itunga mam itisilanaro.
Lugbara: Ba azi 'diyi esuni panga ku.

English: The court ruling is legal.
Luganda: Ensala ya kkooti eri mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Okusharaho kwa kooti nikuhikaana n'ebiragiro.
Acholi: Adwogi me ngolokop ikot tye malubu pen cik
Ateso: Etube lo adieket nes erai lo abeit.
Lugbara: E'yo liza kotia 'dari azita palaa.

English: Illegal acts are condemned by the court.
Luganda: Ebikolwa ebita mu mateeka bivumirirwa kkooti.
Runyankore: Ebikorwa ebirikuhenda ebiragiro nibijumirirwa kooti.
Acholi: Kot pe cwako tic moo keken me turu cik
Ateso: Aswam nu mam ebeitos itoroniaritai adieket.
Lugbara: makata aꞌini eꞌyo onzi ꞌdiyi ku

English: Criminals should not go unpunished.
Luganda: Abazzi b'emisango tebalina kugenda nga tebabonerezeddwa.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'ebihagaro, tibashemereire kugyenda bataheirwe kibonerezo
Acholi: Lubal omyero pe giwek guwot nono mape gunongo pwod
Ateso: Adiakanarak luarokok mam ebeit aiku aitisilario
Lugbara: Le 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma esu panga ku 'diniri ku.

English: Uganda's justice system discourages the use of violence in elections.
Luganda: Enkola y'amateeka ga Uganda tekkiriziganya na kukozesa ffujjo mu kulonda.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'ebiragiro omu Uganda neejumirira obwimukiriro omu karuuru
Acholi: Pen cik me Uganda pe cwako tim gero ikare me bolo kwir
Ateso: Ewai lo ikisila ko Uganda itoroniarit aitwasamao na amumu kotoma aseo.
Lugbara: Azita kari Uganda vileriniri leni ngiringiri ti odaza ma aliari ku.

English: Uganda now has a new chief justice.
Luganda: Uganda kati erina ssaabalamuzi omuggya.
Runyankore: Obwahati Uganda eine omuramuzi omukuru
Acholi: Uganda kombedi tye ki Ladit maloyo wii Lungolkop weng
Ateso: Ejaas Uganda kopana keda Atubon loapolon akere loitetet.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌba eꞌyo lipi ꞌdiyi ma drileru Ugandaari eri ꞌba oꞌdini.

English: The people who were involved in a church demolition case were released on bail.
Luganda: Abantu abeenyigira mu musango gw'okumenya ekkanisa baateereddwa ku kakalu ka kkooti.
Runyankore: Abantu abaabaire nibajunaanwa omushango gw'okushenya ekanisa bakeyemerererwa.
Acholi: Dano ma gutimo bal me muko otlega gityeko minigi bail
Ateso: Itunga lu abilibilete ekanisa aponi olakunai kosodete alacakin.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba andra e'yo 'bani kanisa azi anzuzu 'da ma alea 'diyi arujoa risi ra.

English: The president believes that a killer should also be killed.
Luganda: Pulezidenti akkiriza nti omussi naye asaana kuttibwa.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi weihanga naagira ngu omwitsi nawe ashemereire kwitwa.
Acholi: Ladit Lobo tye ki tam ni lanek omyero bene gineke
Ateso: Eomit lokapolon akwap ebe ekot aaran da oyarai.
Lugbara: Purezidenti ma egata kini le 'ba ma 'di vini 'ba 'ba azi 'dipiri te.

English: The lawyer has been moved to another court.
Luganda: Munnamateeka atwaliddwa mu kkooti endala.
Runyankore: Puriida bamutwaire omu kooti endiijo.
Acholi: Lapilida ni gityeko kobo ne ikot mukene
Ateso: Ejular epulida adieket acie.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ji ꞌba eꞌyo lipiri ni makata azini ma alia

English: The lawyers talked to the police about the opposition candidate.
Luganda: Bannamateeka baayogedde ne poliisi ku bikwata ku yeesimbyewo avuganya.
Runyankore: Ba puriida bakagamba na poriisi ebirikukwata aha muntu oyesimbire aharubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti.
Acholi: Lupilidani guloko ki abili pi Lacungu me opposition
Ateso: Apotu ipulidan inerakinos keda ipolisin kanu abwaan kalo itepegit apugan.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo lipiri nze eꞌyo polisi yi be ꞌba politikia gboronduaru ꞌdiyi ma dria

English: The leader has managed to swear in three new judges.
Luganda: Omukulembeze asobodde okulayizza abalamuzi basatu abaggya .
Runyankore: Omwebembezi yaabaasa kurahiza abaramuzi basya abandi bashatu.
Acholi: Laditi otyeko neno ni Lungolkop adek manyeni gukwonge
Ateso: Apedo eingarenon aisilair atubok iuni luitetiak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa drileruri ofi ꞌba eꞌyo lipi ꞌdiyi azi ngazu na.

English: My lawyer is lodging an appeal anytime from today.
Luganda: Munnamateeka wange ateekateeka okujulira obudde bwonna okuva leero.
Runyankore: Puriida wangye naaza kutayo okujurira eshaaha yoona kuruga hati.
Acholi: Lapilidana bicwalo waraga ikot cawa moo keken tin wek giwiny kokona odoco
Ateso: Ejai epulida ka aijukar alipan arai aijulira emusago ilolo.
Lugbara: ꞌBa kesi ꞌyopi ma pariari ni ꞌye apili si sawa ciria eꞌdozu andru.

English: A suspect was convicted trying to access the head of the legislature
Luganda: Ateeberezebwa okuzza omusango yasangiddwa ng'agezaako okutuukirira akulira ebyamateeka
Runyankore: Omusibe bakamusharira orubanja arikugyezaho kureeba omukuru omu biragiro.
Acholi: Dano ma gibyako ni lok tye i kome gitweyo ibuc pien otemo wot bot ladit me kot
Ateso: Aponi otubokinai lo ewenat kanu atamite adolokin lo epolokit adieket.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ombe agu ꞌbani tolerini de eri di ꞌye mu ꞌBa eꞌyo liꞌba ꞌdiyi ma drileni ne.

English: It's the taxpayer's money that is wasted when the government loses a court case.
Luganda: Ssente z'omuwi wa musolo ze zoonoonebwa buli gavumenti lw'esingisbwa omusango mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Omuhi w'omushoro niwe arikufeerwa esente, Gavumenti yaaheza kusingwa omushango.
Acholi: Cente ma lwak culu me mucoro en aye gilanyo ka lok oloyo gamente ikot
Ateso: Erai ikapun alemak esolo kes icanicanunos arai ibiror apugan emusago.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ka gamete nde kesisi, ꞌba ꞌbani eri vile sende ezazuri eri ꞌba musoro fepiri ꞌi

English: Rules are part of every community.
Luganda: Amateeka kitundu ku buli kitundu.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro nibikora omu buri kicweka.
Acholi: Cik obedo yoo me kwo ikabedo weng
Ateso: Eraas ikisila lu ikamunitos itunga kere.
Lugbara: Azita eyi ongulumu dria eyi ma azi.

English: Some teachers are usually biased.
Luganda: Abasomesa abamu ebiseera ebimu beetamwa.
Runyankore: Abegyesa abamwe nibagwera orubaju.
Acholi: Lupwonye mukene yero dano ma gicwako
Ateso: Icie isisianakinak eraas lu igangitos ediope ewai.
Lugbara: Embaꞌba azi yi ayamanduru

English: We need honest representatives.
Luganda: Twetaaga abakiise ab'amazima.
