Runyankore: Amabara tigarikwija kwigurwaho omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Pe ki biyabo ot mat mwaka enini
Ateso: Mam eponio apukor ibaan okaru lo.
Lugbara: Pari baaru ewa mvuzu diyi ma ti ngani ovu nzizaru eli 'disi ku

English: Closure of schools might lead to increased school dropouts.
Luganda: Okuggalwa kw'amasomero kuyinza okwongera ku muwendo gw'abawanduka mu masomero.
Runyankore: Okukinga amashomero, nikibaasa kureetra abaana baingi kuruga omu mashomero.
Acholi: Loro gangi kwan twero medo wel lutino ma kwangi ogik
Ateso: Agolio na isomeroi emina aijaikin idwe luipu elakanakinete esomero.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌbani sukulu yi ma ti opizu ꞌdi eco nga fe anzi karakara yini sukulu kuzu ra.

English: Public gatherings can lead to the spread of the disease.
Luganda: Enkungaana z'abantu ziyinza okuviirako okusaasaana kw'obulwadde.
Runyankore: Enteerane z'abantu baingi nizibaasa kunjanza oburwaire.
Acholi: Guru dano kacel twero nyayo two
Ateso: Atukonokin na itunga emina awear adeka.
Lugbara: Okuta ongulumuru 'diyi eco fe azo 'dini i erezu ra.

English: Uganda put a ban on the importation of commodities that are locally manufactured.
Luganda: Uganda yawera okuggya ebweru ebyamaguzi ebikolebwa kuno.
Runyankore: Uganda ekazibira okushubura ebintu aheeru, obwo birikukorerwa omu makorero gaayo.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda otyeko gengo kelo jami acata ki woko kun nongo jami meno yue ma giyubu kany
Ateso: Abu Uganda isimik agwelunono na iboro kalu okinga lu iswamao kane.
Lugbara: Uganda atri eꞌyo ꞌbani afa ꞌbani ede Ugandaa ogogorura ꞌdiyi ejizu engazu suru amve ꞌdiyi ma alia ri ci.

English: The truth will always set you free.
Luganda: Amazima gali kufuula ow'eddembe.
Runyankore: Amazima nigeija kukuhindura ow'obusingye.
Acholi: Lok ada polkare weko ibedo agonya
Ateso: Abeit nes ilacakini ijo.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo adari ni nga oꞌdu driasi mi truni.

English: Offences are done by people.
Luganda: Emisango gizzibwa bantu.
Runyankore: Ebihagaro nibikorwa abantu.
Acholi: Dano aye timo bal
Ateso: Itunga kes egwaunenete imusagon.
Lugbara: Ba eyi e'yo onzi eyi 'ye ni

English: Medical information should be accessible to everyone.
Luganda: Obubaka bw'ekisawo bulina okufunibwa buli omu
Runyankore: Buri omwe ashemereire kuhikwaho amakuru agarikukwata ahaby'amagara.
Acholi: Ngec me nongo kony pi yotkom omyero obed manongo yot
Ateso: Akiro nu angaleu ekot nginitunganan opedorite adumun.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba dria ma esu oꞌduko eꞌyo aro ma dria ꞌdiyini ꞌdiyi ra.

English: Advice from medical officers is crucial to our healthy wellbeing
Luganda: Amagezi okuva mu basawo ga mugaso eri bulamu bwaffe.
Runyankore: Okuhaburwa kuruga omu bashaho, n'eky'omugasho aha magara gaitu.
Acholi: Ngec ma aa kibot lutic me yotkom pire tek pigwoko yotkomwa
Ateso: Aicoreta nuka imurok ejokuka kanu angaleu wok.
Lugbara: Imbata engazu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi vuri eri okporu ama ma rua ala ni.

English: Medical officers monitor the health state of their patients.
Luganda: Abasawo balondoola embeera y'abalwadde baabwe.
Runyankore: Abashaho nibareebuuza amagara g'abarwaire.
Acholi: Lutic yotkom ngiyo kit alokaloka matye ka time i kom lutwogi
Ateso: Ewanyanarete imurok ejautene lo adekak kec.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azi ngapi arojoa ꞌdiyi alata ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma ruaniri ma eꞌyo ondreni

English: Quarantining patients helps with diseases control.
Luganda: Okuteeka abalwadde mu kalantiini kiyamba okiziyiza endwadde.
Runyankore: Okuta abantu omu karantiini nikizibira endwara kujanjara.
Acholi: Miyo lutwo obed kengi gang labongo rwate ki dano konyo gengo nyayo two
Ateso: Aibwaikin adekak okalitini ingarakini aitikitik adekasinei.
Lugbara: ꞌBani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma tambazu aꞌdulerini azo ma ereta atri ni

English: Different categories of people enter into Uganda.
Luganda: Ebika by'abantu ab'enjawulo bayingira mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Abantu b'emiringo mingi nibaija omu Uganda.
Acholi: Sano mapatpat donyo ilobo Uganda
Ateso: Atekerin itunga kalu egelegela elomete Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba ndundu eyi efi kari Uganda niria ni.

English: Immigrants in Uganda could be one of the leading causes of diseases.
Luganda: Abayingira mu Uganda bayinza okuba nga be bamu ku basinga okuleeta endwadde.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikwija omu Uganda , nibabaasa kuba barikureeta endwara.
Acholi: Anywali lobo mukene ma gudak ilobo Uganda twero bedo yoo acel matye ka nyayo two
Ateso: Amecak ko Uganda kes aticepak eyangaunenete adekasinei.
Lugbara: ꞌBa emvipi Uganda engazu kari amve ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi eco ovu eꞌyo fepi azoni efizu tutu ꞌdiyini ra.

English: Foreigners are welcomed in Uganda.
Luganda: Abagwira baanirizibwa mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Abarikuruga aheeru y'eihanga, nibatangirirwa omu Uganda.
Acholi: Anywali lobo mukene tye ajola me bino iUganda
Ateso: Itunga luko kinga ijaunitai ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba ai Kari anzi suru azi 'diyini 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma alea ra.

English: Law and order must be followed and obeyed by the public.
Luganda: Amateeka n'obutebenkevu birina okugobererwa n'okugonderwa abantu.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro n'obutebekana nibiteekwa kukuratirwa abantu boona.
Acholi: Lwak omyero olub dok guwor cik magiketo
Ateso: Ekot itunga atupit ikisila ka ainapara.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma obi azita o'bale eyi ma vuti.

English: Caution must be taken to avoid the spread of diseases.
Luganda: Tulina okwegendereza okwewala okusaasaana kw'endwadde.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho okwegyendesereza okubaasa kuzibira endwara
Acholi: Omyero dano ogwoke pi gengo nyayo two
Ateso: Ekot acoit kanu aitikokin awearo na adekasinei.
Lugbara: Le ama ma aa mile be mgbo azo eyi ma ereta atrizu.

English: Living in a clean environment prevents diseases.
Luganda: Okubeera mu kitundu ekiyonjo kitangira endwadde.
Runyankore: Okutuura omu myanya emiyonjo, nikizibira endwara.
Acholi: Bedo kama leng gengo two
Ateso: Aiboi kane elai itikokini adekasinei.
Lugbara: Aa'ta angu ala ma alea ri ni azo eyi atri.

English: Patients ought to follow instructions as given by the doctor.
Luganda: Abalwadde balina okugobereea ebiragiro nga bwe bibaweebwa omusawo.
Runyankore: Abarwaire baine kukuratira ebiragiro ebibaheirwe abashaho.
Acholi: Lutwo omyero olub lok pa dakta
Ateso: Ekot adekak atupit aicoreta kwape ijaikitotor imurok.
Lugbara: Le 'ba azoru 'diyi ma obi azita dria dakitari eyini fele eyidri 'diyi ma vuti.

English: A healthy community is the joy of the nation.
Luganda: Abantu abalamu ly'essanyu ly'eggwanga.
Runyankore: Abantu abaine amagara marungi, nikwe kushemererwa kwa ihanga.
Acholi: Kabedo ma dano ma iye komgi yot obedo awaka me lobo
Ateso: Ateker arai itunga lu engalete nes iyalamar akwap.
Lugbara: Ongulumu rua ala be 'diyi ayiko kari niri

English: Prevent diseases early in order to avoid later repercussions.
Luganda: Tangira endwadde nga bukyali okwewala ebinaddirira oluvannyuma.
Runyankore: Zibira endwara bukiri kare, obaase kwetantara ebihikiirizi eby'omumaisho.
Acholi: Geng nongo two con pi gengo peko ianyim
Ateso: Olingak aitikitik adekasinei kanu ainac nu eminas atakanun.
Lugbara: Emi ma atri azo yi drioru emi ka le eꞌyo ewaru azoni ejile ꞌdiyi esu ku

English: Laws are implemented for the good of the public.
Luganda: Amateeka gateekebwa mu nkola ku lw'obulungi bw'abantu.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro nibabita omu nkora ahabw'oburungi bw'abantu.
Acholi: Cik gimoko pi ber pa lwak
Ateso: Itwasamao ikisila kanu ajokis na itunga.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azita yisi azi nga oꞌbi yi ma tambazu

English: Employment boosts the economy.
Luganda: Okukola kutumbula ebyenfuna.
Runyankore: Emirimo neeyongyera ahaby'entaatsya.
Acholi: Tic konyo me medo rwom me timo biacara
Ateso: Aswamusinei ikeuni eiriago.
Lugbara: ꞌBani azi fezu ꞌba yi dri rarini lonyi suruniri ma omgbo otu.

English: Employers need to show concern for their employees.
Luganda: Abakozesa balina okulaga okufaayo eri abakozi baabwe.
Runyankore: Abakozesa bashemereire kufayo aha bakozi baabo.
Acholi: Wegi tic omyero onyut cwiny maber pi luticgi
Ateso: Ekot ikulepek aswam apodokinit eswamak kec.
Lugbara: Le 'ba azi fepi 'diyi ma asi 'ba azi ngapi eyidri 'diyi si indi.

English: Unemployment is as a result of various factors.
Luganda: Ebbula ly'emirimu lireetebwa ensonga ez'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Okuburwa emirimo, nikirugirira aha shonga nyingi.
Acholi: Bedo labongo tic tye macalo adwogi me peko mapol
Ateso: Amamus aswam nes eyangaunit iboro luegelegela.
Lugbara: Azi ako eri e'yo ndundu 'diyisi.

English: A job is a source of financial hope for most employees.
Luganda: Omulimi nsibuko ya ssuubi lya ssente eri abakozi abasinga.
Runyankore: Abakozi abaingi nibareeba omurimo nk'oburugo bw'esente.
Acholi: Tic miyo gen me nongo cente pi lutic mapol
Ateso: Aswam nes ewai lo amuno kanu adumun ikapun kanejaas eswamak luipu.
Lugbara: Azi eri asiꞌbaza ꞌba azia ꞌdiyini lonyi esuzuri ꞌi

English: In some companies, employees work on schedule.
Luganda: Mu kkampani ezimu, abakozi bakolera ku budde.
Runyankore: Omu kampuni ezimwe, abakozi nibakora obwire obu barikwetengwa.
Acholi: iKampuni mukene, lutic leyo tic aleya malube ki nino onyo cawa
Ateso: Ko kampunin icie, ebeinikinos eswamak aswam.
Lugbara: Kambuni azi ꞌdiyi ma alia, aziꞌbayi azi nga sawa otizaru ꞌdiyi ma alia

English: Employees are obligated to work during working hours.
Luganda: Abakozi bateekeddwa kukola mu ssaawa ez'okukola.
Runyankore: Abakozi nibaragiirwa kukora omu bwire obu baine kuba nibakora.
Acholi: Tye macik ni lutic omyero gutii icawa me tic
Ateso: Ebeit eswamak aswam osawan lu aswam.
Lugbara: Eri azita ni 'ba azi ngapi 'diyini azi ngazu sa'wa fele azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea.

English: Employees assist in company decision making.
Luganda: Abakozi bayambako kkampuni mu kukola okusalawo.
Runyankore: Abakozi nibahwera kampuni omu kucwamu eby'okukora.
Acholi: Lutic konyo ki miyo tam ikit ma jami omyero otime iKampuni
Ateso: Ingarakitos eswamak ekampuni kowai kalo ailem aomisio.
Lugbara: Aziꞌba yi azakoma ko eꞌyo amaza ma alia.

English: Every business aims at making a profit.
Luganda: Buli bizinensi eruubirira kukola magoba.
Runyankore: Buri bizinesi neeba eine ekigyendererwa ky'okukora amagoba.
Acholi: Biacara weng tye pi nongo magoba
Ateso: Kangol ebiasara erai kanu aswam ameda.
Lugbara: Tujari dria le orodri esu.

English: An employee can not rejoice upon termination.
Luganda: Omukozi tasobola kusanyuka ng'agobeddwa.
Runyankore: Omukozi tarikubaasa kushemerererwa yaabingwa aha murimo.
Acholi: Latic pe twero bedo ki yomcwiny ka orwenyo ticce
Ateso: Mam eswam ebuni alakanar akaulo na alemario kotoma aswam.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi ri econi ayiko zu azi aviza si ku.

English: Informally hired employees are just fired without a termination contract.
Luganda: Abakozi ab'ekimpatiira bagobwa nga tewali endagaano esaziddwamu.
Runyankore: Abakozi abarikuraba omu mihanda etahikire, nibabingwa aha mirimo bataine baruha y'okubemereza.
Acholi: Dano magicoyo itic labongo nongo waraga me tic, giryemogi labongo miyo waraga macimo tyen lok me juko ticgi
Ateso: Eswamak lu emamiatatar keda apapulai elemario, alemar komam aisiengun.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani azi fezu yi dri otita kililiru kokoru ꞌdiyi dro azi tiarisi kokobi ꞌbani yi ofuzu aziari fe kokoru yi dri.

English: I will not resign this year.
Luganda: Sijja kulekulira omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Tindikuza kurekura omurimo omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Pe abi weko dogtic imwakani
Ateso: Mam eong ajali aswam okaru lo.
Lugbara: Aku ni azi eli 'disi ku.

English: You should throw a party for your employees before this year ends.
Luganda: Olina okuteekayo akabaga k'abakozi bo ng'omwaka guno tegunnagwako.
Runyankore: Oshemereire kukorera abakozi baawe akabaga omwaka ogu gutakahweire.
Acholi: Omyero ilwong yub pi lutici ma mwaka ni peya otum
Ateso: Ekot ijo aijaikin eswamak kon epucit erongo ekaru lo engetakina.
Lugbara: Le mi ma 'ba 'ba mini azi ngapi 'diyini Omu denga po'di eli 'di deni i ku ru ra.

English: You have a right to work.
Luganda: Olina eddembe okukola.
Runyankore: Oine obugabe kukora.
Acholi: Itye ki twero me tic
Ateso: Ijaas ijo keda apedori na aswam.
Lugbara: Eri drilemgbo mini azi ngazu

English: What are some of the economic difficulties facing businesses?
Luganda: Biki ebimu ku bizibu ebyenfuna ebiri mu bizinensi?
Runyankore: Oburemeezi bumwe na bumwe omu by'entaasya oburikushangwa omu bizinesi nibuuha?
Acholi: Peki ango me cente ma biacara mapatpat tye kawok iye?
Ateso: Anubo atiokisio etereikina keda agwelanar?
Lugbara: eꞌyo ewaru yi bipi lonyi be tuajayini esu ꞌdiyi aꞌdini ya?

English: A four weeks notice should be given to employees before termination.
Luganda: Ekimanyiso kya wiiki nnya kirina okuweebwa omukozi nga tannagobebwa.
Runyankore: Abakozi bashemereire kumanyisibwa hakiriyo esande ina batakemereziibwe aha murimo.
Acholi: Lutic omyero gunong waraga me juko ticgi cabit angwen mapwod peya gi juko ticgi
Ateso: Ekot aikwenyar eswamak isabitin iwongon erongo isibwouna kaswam.
Lugbara: De nga ꞌba droni aziꞌba yi ku, le ꞌba ma fe yi dri oꞌduko mba su drioru.

English: Factories with more than ten employees are thinking of laying off workers.
Luganda: Amakolero agalina abakozi abasukka mu kkumi galowooza kusalako bakozi.
Runyankore: Amakorero againe abakozi abarikuhingura ahari ikumi, nibateekateeka okushara aha bakozi baabo.
Acholi: Factori mapol matye ki lutic makato apar tye katamo kit me juko gi idogtic
Ateso: Icuman lu ejatatar keda eswamak lu edeparitos itomon ejaas aomoom nu alemanar eswamak icie.
Lugbara: Okalamvu yi vile aziꞌba yi ma kalafeni mudrini agazu ra ꞌdiyi eꞌyo ega aziꞌba yi ofuzu

English: Why don't you work from home instead of going to the office?
Luganda: Lwaki tokolera waka mu kifo ky'okugenda ku woofiisi?
Runyankore: Ahabw'enki otarikukorera omuka, omu mwanya gw'okuza omu ofiisi?
Acholi: Pingo pe itii ki gang me kaka cito igang tic?
Ateso: Inyo mam ijo iswama kore itia alosenen oyapiesi.
Lugbara: Enga Te azi akua si ku a'dusi muzu azi paria ri ma paria.

English: Non-essential workers will be affected by the pandemic.
Luganda: Abakozi abateetaagisa nnyo bajja kukosebwa ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Abakozi abatarikweteengwa munonga nibaija kuteganisibwa embeera eretsirweho oburwaire.
Acholi: Dano ma ticgi pire pe tek tutwal birwenyo ticgi macalo adwogi me two ma opoto ni
Ateso: Eswamak lu mam epolok aswamisinei ebeit adeka aitolitol.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi vilerini nga aziꞌba ovupi azi tia orodriru tu ku ꞌdiyi bi ra.

English: Employees will not work during leave periods.
Luganda: Abakozi tebajja kukola mu biseera by'oluwummula.
Runyankore: Abakozi tibarikwija kukora omu bwire bw'ekihuumuro.
Acholi: Lutic pe bitic ikare ma gitye iyweyo
Ateso: Mam eswamak ebeit aswam kapak kana aiyeng.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi 'diyi mu ni azi nga lifu si ku.

English: When are you planning to start a business?
Luganda: Otegese ddi okutandika bizinensi?
Runyankore: Noteekateeka kutandika bizinesi ryari?
Acholi: Itye kayube macako biacara mamegi awene?
Ateso: Iwori bo ikapanakinor ijo agear ebiasara?
Lugbara: I le tujari e'do nguari?

English: Employees are entitled to paid sick leave.
Luganda: Abakozi bateekeddwa okusasulibwa mu luwummula nga balwadde.
Runyankore: Abakozi baine kushashurwa baaba bahuumwire ahabw'okurwara.
Acholi: Lutic tye ki twero me nongo mucara kadi bedi gipeke katic pien komgilit
Ateso: Ebeit eswamak atacio kapak kana ijaikitere aiyeng kanu adeka.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azia ꞌdiyi drilemgbo be ꞌbani yi ofezu lifu azo nirisi ofe

English: Employers and employees should discuss paid or unpaid leave.
Luganda: Abakozesa n'abakozi balina okuteesa ku luwummula olw'okusasulibwa oba olutali lwa kusasulibwa.
Runyankore: Abakozesa n'abakozi bashemereire kuganiira aha nshonga y'okushashurwa omu kihuumuro nainga obutashashurwa
Acholi: Wegi tic ki lutic omyero gunywak lok malube ki yweyo ki cul ki yweyo labongo cul
Ateso: Ikulepek aswam keda eswamak kes ebeit eineranar kanu ikamunitos aiyeng na etacio keda na mam etacio.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ma nya eꞌyo ale ꞌba yini azi fezu yi dri ꞌdiyi be lifu ꞌbani ꞌba ofezu ofe kaniku ꞌbani ꞌba ofezu ku ꞌdiyi ma dria ra.

English: We are in dangerous times.
Luganda: Tuli mu budde buzibu.
Runyankore: Turi omubwire bw'akabi.
Acholi: Watye ka kwo ikare ma piny tye marac
Ateso: Ija oni apakio nu epagal.
Lugbara: Ama 'di sa'wa azi onzi 'dinile diyi ma alea.

English: Employees were advised to take annual leave during the lockdown days.
Luganda: Abakozi baasabiddwa okuwummulamu oluvannyuma lw'omwaka mu nnaku z'omuggalo.
Runyankore: Abakozi bakahaburwa kuza omu kihuumuro ekya buri mwaka omu biro by'akeeshereko.
Acholi: Gimiyo tam ki lutic ni gukwany yweyo ki idog tic ikare ma gamente ogengo wot pi gengo nyayo two
Ateso: Eswamak kes ecorakitai alosite aiyeng kapak naka agolokinere akwap
Lugbara: ꞌBa fe ndra ꞌba aziꞌbaru ꞌdiyi dri embata lifu ꞌduzu sawa ꞌbani eꞌyo dria ma ti opizu azo koronanisi ciri ma alia.

English: Paid or unpaid leave should be justified.
Luganda: Oluwummula olw'okusasulibwa oba olutali lwa kusasulibwa zirina okwawulibwa.
Runyankore: Okushashurwa nainga obutashashurwa omu kihuumuro, kishemereire kumanywa.
Acholi: Yweyo ki idog tic ma giculu pire onyo ma pe giculu pire omyero tyen loke obed tye
Ateso: Aiyeng na etacio arai na mam etacio nes ekoto aitigogongor.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma fe asisile ꞌbani ꞌba ofezu lifusi ofe kaniku ꞌbani ꞌba ofezu ku ꞌdiyi ecezu ci

English: Employers should not force employees to go on leave.
Luganda: Abakozesa tebalina kukaka bakozi kugenda mu luwummula.
Runyankore: Abakozesa tibashemereire kugyemesereza abakozi kuza omu kihuumuro.
Acholi: Wegi tic pe omyero gudii luticgi pi kwanyo yweyo
Ateso: Ikulepek aswam mam ebeit abuikin eswamak alosite aiyeng.
Lugbara: Le 'ba azi fepi 'diyi ma omi 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi lifu 'duzu okpo alea ku.

English: Employee leave is only granted when requested.
Luganda: Oluwummula lw'omukozi luweebwa wokka ng'olusabye.
Runyankore: Omukozi naheebwa ekihuumuro yaaba akishabire.
Acholi: Yweyo ki idog tic gimiyo nongo gipenyo pire
Ateso: Ijaikinio eswaman aiyeng arai ilipit.
Lugbara: ꞌBa lifu fe aziꞌba yini pelu yi aꞌi aꞌi ka.

English: Employees can reject leave suggested by employers.
Luganda: Abakozi basobola okugaana oluwummula olubaweereddwa abakozesa.
Runyankore: Abakozi nibabaasa kwanga ekihuumuro ekiragiriirwe omukozesa.
Acholi: Lutic twero kwero kwanyo yweyo kede bedi wegi tic miti gunong yweyo
Ateso: Epedorete eswamak aigir aiyeng na elimokitos ikulepek aswam.
Lugbara: ꞌBa aziꞌbaru ꞌdiyi eco lizu ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyini ꞌyo ma ꞌduniri gazusi ra.

English: We don't have enough financial capacity.
Luganda: Tetulina busobozi bwa nsimbi bumala.
Runyankore: Titwine sente ezirikumara.
Acholi: Pe watye ki kero me cente muromo
Ateso: Emamete iso ikapun lu edolitos.
Lugbara: ama vile robia ma omgbo caku.

English: Some workers can work from home.
Luganda: Abakozi abamu basobola okukolera ewaka.
Runyankore: Abakozi abamwe nibabaasa kukorera omuka.
Acholi: Lutic mukene twero tic ki gang
Ateso: Icie eswamak epedorete aswam ore.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma azi eyi eco azi nga akua si ra.

English: Some employees receive an hourly pay based on daily completion of work.
Luganda: Abakozi abamu basasulwa ssaawa okusinziira ku mulimu ogumaliriziddwa olunaku.
Runyankore: Abakozi abamwe nibashashurwa buri shaaha kurugirira oku barikuhendera omurimo buri izooba.
Acholi: Lutic mukene nongo cul pi cawa magutiyo inino acel-acel dok malube ki kit ma gutyeko kede tic
Ateso: Icie eswamak edumununete atacio otupitete isawan lu edaunit nges iswamai nginiparan arai engetaki epelu.
Lugbara: ꞌBa aziꞌba azi ꞌdiyi ofe sawa alu alu vusi azi oꞌdu alu aluni yini ꞌye ꞌdiyi vusi

English: Patients visitors' are going to be affected by the new guidelines.
Luganda: Abakyalira abalwadde bagenda kukosebwa ebiragiro ebipya.
Runyankore: Abarikutayayira abarwaire, nibazakuteganisibwa ebiragiro ebisya.
Acholi: Cik manyeni bi kelo alokaloka ikit me limo lutwo
Ateso: Ipejok lu adekak kes ebeit ikisila lu itetiak aitolitol.
Lugbara: Azita oꞌdiru yi nga ꞌba omuru mu ꞌba ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi andripi ꞌdiyini ovu ewaru ra.

English: I need a job that pays me a monthly salary.
Luganda: Neetaaga omulimu ogunsasula buli mwezi.
Runyankore: Ninyenda omurimo ogurikunshashura omushara buri kwezi.
Acholi: Amito tic ma anongo iye mucara itum dwe
Ateso: Akoto eong aswam na atacere eong eropit kangol elap.
Lugbara: Ale azi azi ecopi mani musara ofepi imba alu alu si ra ni i.

English: The recruitment of a new employee will take some time.
Luganda: Okuleeta omukozi omupya kijja kutwalamu obudde.
Runyankore: Okutaho omukozi omusya, nikiija kutwara obwire.
Acholi: Coyo latic manyen bitero kare
Ateso: Aitolomio na eswaman loitetet eyangaikini apak.
Lugbara: ꞌBani azi fezu aziꞌba oꞌdini driri ni nga sawa ꞌdu.

English: My employers reasons for terminating my contract are not sufficient.
Luganda: Ensonga za mukama wange ez'okusazaamu endagaano yange tezimatiza.
Runyankore: Eshonga ezi bakama bangye barikumpa eziretsire banyemereza aha murimo, tiziine makuru.
Acholi: Tyen Lok ma ladit tica omiyo pi juko tica pe lok ma romo weko dano rwenyo tic
Ateso: Nu ebalas luapolok ka kanu aisiyengun eong aswam mam ilosikino.
Lugbara: Asisile ꞌba azi fepi mani ꞌdiyini ma ofuzu azia ꞌdiyi sini ta ku.

English: Every business is struggling in this pandemic.
Luganda: Buli bizinensi erwana okubeerawo mu kaseera kano ak'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Bizinesi zoona ziriyo niziteganisibwa omu biro by'oburwaire ebi.
Acholi: Biacara weng tye ka kite akita i kare man ma two oporo ni.
Ateso: Kangol ebiasara kere eutara kapak naka adeka kana.
Lugbara: Tujara dria yi ocoko esu azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi ma eꞌyosi angiri.

English: There should be a reason for employee termination just as there was for employment.
Luganda: Walina okubaawo ensonga okugoba omukozi nga bwe kyali nga aweebwa omulimu.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kuba hariho enshonga erikubingisa omukozi nk'oku yaabaire eriho obu yaaheebwa omurimo.
Acholi: Omyero tyen lok me juko tic obed tye kit ma obedo tye icoyo dano itic
Ateso: Ekot ojaas akiro nu elemarere eswaman kaswam kwape ka apak kana itolomarere aswam.
Lugbara: Le asisile ꞌbani ꞌba drozu aziari ma ovu kililiru kile asisile ꞌbani ndra azi fezurini ni ndra adrizurile.

English: There should be justifiable reasons for employee termination.
Luganda: Walina okubaawo ensonga ez'essimba okugoba omukozi.
Runyankore: Eshonga ezirikubingisa omukozi zishemereire kuba nizihurika.
Acholi: Omyero tyen lok obed tye pi juko tic pa dano
Ateso: Ekot ojaas akiro nu edolitos nu elemarere eswaman.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma fe asisile ꞌbani ꞌba ofuzu azia ꞌdiyi kililiru

English: Some employers are using the pandemic as a reason to terminate employee contracts.
Luganda: Abakozesa abamu bakozesa ekirwadde bbunansi ng'ensonga y'okusazaamu endagaano z'abakozi.
Runyankore: Abakozesa abamwe hati nibekwatsa oburwaire bwa Korona okubinga abakozi baabo.
Acholi: Wegi tic mukene tye ka juko tic pa dano kun gipido ni two mupotoni aye okelo peko
Ateso: Ikulepek aswam icie itwasamaete nuka adeka kanu aitanangia eswamak kaswam.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azi ꞌfeꞌba ꞌdiyi ma azi yi di eꞌyo azo korona niri vileri ayu ꞌba yi ofuzu azia.

English: Some employers are using coronavirus losses as an excuse to terminate employee contracts.
Luganda: Abakozesa abamu bakozesa okufiirizibwa kawuka ka kolona nga ekyekwaso okusazaamu endagaano z'abakozi.
Runyankore: Abakozesa abamwe bariyo nibekwasa amagoba agu bafeereirwe omubwire bwa Korona nk'eshonga y'okubinga abakozi baabo.
Acholi: Wegi tic mukene tye ka juko tic pa dano kun gipido ni girwenyo cente madwong macalo adwogi me two Coronovirus
Ateso: Ikulepek aswam icie itwasamaete atwaniar kanuka ekorona kanu aitanangia eswaman kaswam.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ma azi yi lonyi yini avi sawa azo koronaniarisi ꞌdiyi ayu asisile yini ꞌba yi ofuzu aziari ru ꞌi

English: Businesses need some financial support from the government to survive this period.
Luganda: Bizinensi zeetaaga okuyambibwako mu byenfuna okuva mu gavumenti okuvvuunuka akaseera kano.
Runyankore: Bizinesi nizetaaga obushagiki bw'esente kuruga omu Gavumenti okubaasa kweyemerezaho omu bwire obu.
Acholi: Biacara mapol mito kony pa gamente wek gumede ki tic
Ateso: Ekot aswam na agwelanar agangat na ikapun kanejai apugan kanu apedor apakio nu.
Lugbara: Tujara yi nga atita robiasiri le engazu gamete vu yini ecozu agazu eꞌyo ewaru sawa ꞌdiniri ma aleasi.

English: You should mind your employee's health.
Luganda: Olina okufaayo ku bulamu bw'omukozi wo.
Runyankore: Oshemereire kufayo aha magara g'omukozi waawe.
Acholi: Omyero ipaa pi yotkom pa lutic mamegi
Ateso: Ekot ijo apodokite angaleu na eswaman kon.
Lugbara: Le mi aa egata be 'ba azi ngapi mini ri ma rua ala ma dria.

English: It is illegal for an employee to work without taking leave.
Luganda: Kimenya mateeka omukozi okukola nga taweebwa luwummula.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro tibirikwikiriza omukozi kukora atarikutunga ekihuumuro.
Acholi: Cik pe cimo ni latic omyero otii labongo nongo yweyo
Ateso: Mam ecamakitai eswaman aswam komam ilipi alosite aiyeng.
Lugbara: Azita le ni ku agu azi ngapi ri ni azi ngazu lifu 'duzu kokoru.

English: I'm going to close this business next year.
Luganda: Ngenda kuggalawo bizinensi eno omwaka ogujja.
Runyankore: Ninza kukingaho bizinesi egi omwaka ogurikwija.
Acholi: Abiloro biacara eni imwaka manyen
Ateso: Alosi eong agolokin ebiasara lo okaru ngol.
Lugbara: Ma mu tujari 'di ma ti opi eli 'disi.

English: Have you thought about recruiting a new team?
Luganda: Olowoozezza ku ky'okuleeta ttiimu endala?
Runyankore: Wateekateekire aha nshonga y'okutasyamu tiimu ensya?
Acholi: Itamo dong picoyo lutic manyen?
Ateso: Iwomomot ijo nu aitolom icie eswamak?
Lugbara: Mi ma egata azini ꞌba oꞌdi yi eꞌduzu azia ci ya?

English: You can terminate the employee's contract if they fail to fulfil their obligations.
Luganda: Osobola okusazaamu endagaano y'omukozi singa balemererwa okutuukiriza emirimu gyabwe.
Runyankore: Noobaasa kwemereza omukozi aha murimo yaremwa kuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwe.
Acholi: Itwero juko tic pa latic kace pe gitye katimo jami malube kidog tiicgi
Ateso: Ipedori ijo aitanang aswam na eswaman arai mam itodolikit nu ebeitos.
Lugbara: Mi eco aziꞌba yini azi ti li aga yi ka oꞌbi eꞌyo ꞌbani lele yi vu ꞌdiyi ꞌye tiria.

English: We shall settle this matter in courts of law.
Luganda: Ensonga zino tujja kuzimalira mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Nitwiija kutereeza enshonga egi omu kooti y'ebiragiro.
Acholi: Wabityeko lok man inyim kot
Ateso: Itemokini oni akiro nu adieket.
Lugbara: Ama mu e'yo 'di otu kotia.

English: How many people do you employ?
Luganda: Okozesa abantu bameka?
Runyankore: Nokozesa abantu bangahi?
Acholi: Icoyo dano adii idog tic?
Ateso: Itunga idi itolomikit ijo aswam?
Lugbara: Mi fe azi 'ba kalafe si pi dri?

English: You need to recruit new employees.
Luganda: Weetaaga okuyingiza abakozi abapya.
Runyankore: Noyetenga okutasyamu abakozi abasya.
Acholi: Omyero icoo lutic manyen
Ateso: Ekot ijo aitolom icie eswamak.
Lugbara: Le mi esu 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma azi dika.

English: I'm tired of going to the office every Monday.
Luganda: Nkooye okugenda mu woofiisi buli lwa Mande.
Runyankore: Nduhire kuza omu ofiisi buri rw'okubanza.
Acholi: Aol ki cito igangtic iceng baraja ducu
Ateso: Apas eong alosenen ofisi kangin balasa.
Lugbara: Ma ande acita azia o'du alu driasi ri si 'bo.

English: Transparency is very important in a relationship.
Luganda: Obwerufu kya mugaso nnyo mu nkolagana.
Runyankore: Okugamba amazima nigeteegwa omu bushwere.
Acholi: Bedo ki lok ada piretek pi gwoko lurem
Ateso: Epolok nu aitodunit iboro lu ecaete kotoma ajanara.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo dria ꞌyezu mgboruri eri orodriru agyi ma alia

English: All seasonal markets should close in order to stop the spread of the disease.
Luganda: Obutale bw'omubuulo bwonna bulina okuyimirizibwa okusobola okutangira ensaasaana y'ekirwadde.
Runyankore: Obutare bw'ebikomera bushemereire kwemerezibwa kugira ngu tuzibire okujanjara kw'oburwaire.
Acholi: Ceng cuk mabedo kare ki kare omyero gijuk woko pi gengo nyayo two man
Ateso: Isokonin kere lu apakio ekot agolokin kanu aitikokin awea na adeka.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma opi cuu ꞌbani fizu alenia oꞌdu dria ku ꞌdiyi ma ti ci ꞌbani azo ma ereta atrizu.

English: She is on maternity leave up to next year.
Luganda: Ali mu luwummula lw'okuzaala okutuusa omwaka ogujja.
Runyankore: Ari omu kihuumuro ky'okuzaara kuhisya omwaka oguri kwija.
Acholi: En tye okwanyo yweyo inge nywal dok obibedo gang wa imwaka mabino
Ateso: Ejai ngesi aiyeng na aidar akoik itoni okaru ngol.
Lugbara: Eri lifu osita niri ma alea kpere eli drusi ri si.

English: I need to find a job before the year ends.
Luganda: Neetaaga okufuna omulimu ng'omwaka tegunnaggwako.
Runyankore: Nyine kuronda omurimo omwaka gutakahweire.
Acholi: Omyero anong tic ma mwaka peya otum
Ateso: Akoto eong adumun aswam erongo ekaru engetakina.
Lugbara: Le ma esu azi ra denga po'di eli 'di oko ku.

English: I can't wait to sign a new contract with this company.
Luganda: Neesunze okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano ne kkampani eno.
Runyankore: Nyine ekihikaa kuta kukora endagaano na kampuni egi
Acholi: Pe atwero kuru keto cinga iwaraga me cako tic I Kampuni man
Ateso: Mam eong akoto aiyap aidokokin akan kanu aswam kana itetet keda ekampuni lo.
Lugbara: Ma econi te dri tizu azi ngazu kambuni ꞌdi be ku

English: Contract terms will guide employers on how to deal with employees.
Luganda: Ebikkiriziganyizibwako mu ndagaano bijja kulambika abakozesa mu ngeri y'okukwatamu abakozi.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro ebiri omu ndagaano, nibyo bireije kworeka abakozesa oku bareije kukorengana n'abakozi.
Acholi: Waraga me tic konyo wegi tic me niang kit me tic ki lutic ma gucoyo
Ateso: Ainapeta nu acamanar kanu aswam kes ingarakinete ikulepek aswam eipone lo iswamanaret keda eswamak.
Lugbara: Azita ꞌbani dri tizu ani ꞌdiyi nga azi ꞌba yi ma azako geri yini azi ngazu ꞌba azia ꞌdiyi be ꞌdiyisi ni.

English: Employers must refer to the employment contract before making any employment decisions.
Luganda: Abakozesa balina okutunula ku ndagaano y'omulimu nga tebannakola kusalawo kwonna ku mulimu.
Runyankore: Abakozesa bashemereire kushwijuma ebirikukwata aha endagaano y'abakozi batakateireho omukozi weena.
Acholi: Wegi tic omyero gulub lok ma iwaraga moko tic ma pwod pe gumoko tam moo keken malube ki lok me tic
Ateso: Ebeit eswamak airereor ainapeta nu ebeitor acamanar kanu aswam erongo egeuna aswam.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ma ndre kokobi aziꞌba yini dri tizu azi ngazuri raka yi ma ꞌdu egata azi fezu ꞌdiyi ndo

English: Businessmen are not happy with the new tax on imports.
Luganda: Abasuubuzi si basanyufu n'omusolo omupya ku byamaguzi ebiyingizibwa mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Abashubuzi tibashemerereirwe omushoro musya ahabintu ebirikwija omu ihanga.
Acholi: Wegi biacara cwinygi pe yom pi mucoro ma giketo i kom jami ma aa ki woko
Ateso: Agwelanarak mam iyalamasi kanu esolo lo egwelere iboro kokinga.
Lugbara: Ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi aa ni ayikosi musoro 'bani o'bale afa ejile kari 'di ma alea egazu suru azi eyi ma alea o'diru 'diyi si ku.

English: Employer decisions will affect all employee.
Luganda: Okusalawo kw'omukozesa kujja kukosa abakozi bonna.
Runyankore: Okusharaho kw'omukozesa nikwija kukwata aha bakozi boona.
Acholi: Tam ma wegi tic omoko adwogine biwinye i kom lutic
Ateso: Nu itutubitos ikulepek aswam kes eyangaritos eswamak.
Lugbara: Egataa ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyini ꞌdu ꞌba yini azi fezu ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi eco ovuzu onyiru kaniku onzi ꞌba ꞌbani azi fezuri dri ra.

English: Employer decisions on employees have legal implications.
Luganda: Okusalawo kw'abakozesa ku bakozi kulina ebikuvaamu mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Abakozesa ebi barikushariramu abakozi baabo, haine oku ebiragiro birikubigambaho.
Acholi: Tam ma wegi tic omoko tye ki adwogi me cik
Ateso: Nu itutubitos ikulepek aswam kanu eswamak iminas atereikin keda ikisila.
Lugbara: Egataa ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyini ꞌdu ꞌba yini azi fezu ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma alia eꞌyo yi bipi azita be ꞌdiyi ci.

English: The coronavirus pandemic has forced employers to cut employees salaries.
Luganda: Ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona kiwalirizza abakozesa okusala emisaala gy'abakozi.
Runyankore: Endwara ya korona ereteire abakozesa okukyendeeza emishaara y'abakozi baabo.
Acholi: Peko me two Coronavirus oweko wegi tic ongolo mucara pa luticgi
Ateso: Adeka naka ekorona ejaiki ikulepek aswam aitub eropit eswamak.
Lugbara: Azo koronaniri fe ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyini ꞌba azia ꞌdiyi ma oya olizu ra.

English: The coronavirus pandemic has disrupted the seasonal market activities.
Luganda: Ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona kitaataaganyizza emirimu gy'obutale obw'emibuulo..
Runyankore: Endwara ya korona eteganiise emirimo y'akatare.
Acholi: Peko me two Coronavirus obalo yub me cengcuk matime kare ki kare
Ateso: Adeka naka ekorona etolitol isokonin lu apakio.
Lugbara: Azo koronaniri eza azi cuu fipi oꞌdu driaku ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ra

English: People have been advised to stay home because of the coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Abantu baweereddwa amagezi okusigala awaka olw'ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abantu bahabwirwe kuguma omumaka gaabo ahabw'oburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Gimiyo tam ki dano me bedo gang pi peko ma two Coronavirus okelo
Ateso: itunga kes ecorakin asalakite ore kanu adeka naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba eyini imbata aa'zu akua azo corona niri ma e'yosi.

English: Customers should be protected from unreasonable price hikes.
Luganda: Abaguzi balina okutaasibwa ku miwendo egirinnya awatali nsonga.
Runyankore: Ba kasitoma bashemereire kubangirwe ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu eyehanikire.
Acholi: Lukastoma omyero gigwok gi ki ipeko me wel ma mede tutwal
Ateso: Ekot ayuarite ikasitomas kotoma otiaisinei lu ikianaro tai tai.
Lugbara: Le kasitoma eyi ma esu tambaza aje otule efile kokoru 'diyi si ra.

English: There should be security measures on the storage and usage of data.
Luganda: Walina okubaawo obukuumi obussibwa ku nkuuma n'enkozesa y'obubaka.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho oburyo bw'okurinda gye ebihandiiko n'okubikozesa.
Acholi: Omyero ginong diro ikit me gwoko ki tic ki lok mapire tek
Ateso: Ekot oyuaritete aingadio ka etwasamae lo akiro.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma oꞌba azita ageyitema ni ꞌdiyi eꞌyo ꞌbani tambale ꞌdiyi ma dria geri yi ayuzu ꞌdiyi be ci.

English: Data collection can only be done after consent from the owners.
Luganda: Okukungaanya obubaka kusobola kukolebwa oluvannyuma lw'abuuzibwa okukkiriza.
Runyankore: Okurundana ebihandiiko kushemereire kukorwa bakama babyo baaheza kwikiriza.
Acholi: Coyo lok pa dano pi nongo ngec manyen twero timme ka dano oyee gamo lapeny
Ateso: Atukio na akiro ekot ojai acamanara kanejaas itunga ikulepek.
Lugbara: ꞌBani oꞌduko eꞌyo eti ondazu ꞌdiyi esuzu le ꞌba ꞌbani ozi ꞌdiyi ma ati eꞌyoni ra ka

English: Public health should be the government's priority.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina kukulembeza byabulamu by'abantu.
Runyankore: Amagara g'abantu nigo Gavumenti eshemereire kwebembeza
Acholi: Yotkom pa lwak omyero obed gin ma pire tek bot gamente
Ateso: Angaleu na itunga nes nusodit ekoto ti apugan apodokinit.
Lugbara: Le eꞌyo gameteni ꞌba okporu ndeniri ma ovu alataa oꞌbiyiniri ꞌi

English: Every patient's details are confidential.
Luganda: Buli ebikwata ku mulwadde biba bya kyama.
Runyankore: Ebirikukwata aha murwaire byona n'eby'ekihama.
Acholi: Lok i kom latwo acel-acel obedo lok me mung
Ateso: Akiro nuka ngin adekan eraas nu aiyeyea.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma ta mba dria zizaru

English: I have heard rumours that a new land bill is coming soon.
Luganda: Mpulidde engambo nti etteeka eppya ku ttaka lijja.
Runyankore: Mperize kuhurira orugambo ngu ekiragiro kisya ahaby'eitaka kiriyo nikiija.
Acholi: Awinyo nguru-nguru lok nia cik manyen mamako lok i kom ngom cok kati
Ateso: Apupuit eong nuabe ebe ebunit ekisil loitetet lo alupok.
Lugbara: Ma eri eꞌyo azini nguru nguru kini ꞌba ꞌye azita azi angu ma dria oꞌdini ꞌba.

English: Information about this issue is very sensitive.
Luganda: Obubaka ku nsonga eno bwa nkizo nnyo.
Runyankore: Amakuru agarikukwata ahashonga egi, n'agokwegyendesereza.
Acholi: Ngec me lok man obedo lok ma tek ma pe omyero okat woko
Ateso: Akiro nuikamunitos nu eraas nu eposik.
Lugbara: Oꞌduko eꞌyo ꞌdi ma dria ꞌdiyi dria eca eꞌyoru mbelekocici.

English: Landlords need to be patient with their tenants.
Luganda: Bannannyini mayumba beetaaga okubeera abagumiikiriza n'abapangisa baabwe.
Runyankore: Bakama bamaju baine kugira obugumisiriza aha bapangisa baabo.
Acholi: Wegi ot apanga omyero gutee lupang ot i yo mupore
Ateso: Ekot ikulepek itogoi atitingikite keda epagisak kec.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba angu eꞌipiru ꞌdiyi ma aꞌa asi tezasi ꞌba yi vile angu ayupi ꞌdiyi be

English: Tenants need to endeavour to pay their landlords in time.
Luganda: Abapangisa beetaaga okufuba okusasula bannannyini mayumba mu budde.
Runyankore: Abapangisa bashemereire kufayo bakashashura bakama b'amaju omu bwire.
Acholi: Lupang ot omyero guyele matek me culo wegi odi
Ateso: Ekot epagisak aitac ikulepek itogoi kotoma apak.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ꞌba azini ma angu ayupiri ma ofe ꞌba angu eꞌiruri sawa kililiria.

English: Tenants may not effectively pay landlords because of the coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Abapangisa bayinza obutasasula bulungi bannannyini mayumba olw'ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abapangisa nibabaasa kutashashura gye bakama b'amaju ahabw'embeera ereetsirweho endwara ya Korona.
Acholi: Lupang ot twero bedo ki peko me culu ot pi peko ma Coronavirus okelo

English: Everyone should ideally take part in policymaking.

Lugbara: Le te adanisi ꞌba dria ma adri egata ꞌduza ma alia ci

English: Government intervention in agriculture can be through farmer cooperatives.
Luganda: Okwenyigira kwa gavumenti mu byobulimi kusobola okuyita mu bibiina by'abalimi eby'obwegassi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neebaasa kwirukirira eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, erikwejunisa ebibiina by'okweteerana.

English: Cooperatives offer technical support to farmers.

English: Their vision and mission highlight development.

English: East Africa greatly benefits from Lake Victoria economically.
Luganda: East Africa efunamu nnyo mu nnyanja Nalubaale mu byenfuna.

English: It is always good to have a role model.

English: What age should one stop being single?
Luganda: Myaka emeka omuntu gy'alina okukomako nga tannafumbirwa?

Lugbara: Ba anzu bita 'da te agupi pi eyini esuzu arusu be eyi 'ba'ba ni 'bo ri ma vutia.

English: The current heavy rains are causing floods which are destroying people's property.
Luganda: Enkuba ennyingi ennaku zino eviirako amataba agoonoona ebintu by'abantu.
Runyankore: Enjura nyingi eriho obwahati ereesire okushandara kw'amaizi agarikushisha ebintu by'abantu.
Acholi: Kot matye kacwe ikin kareni tye kagure ma pemol ci man tye ka balo jami pa dano
Ateso: Idowon lu etepete noi kopana eyangaunitos ebulone lo emunamunae iboro itunga.
Lugbara: Ozo curu'do 'dipi okposi 'diyi yi rapi rara 'ba eyi ma afa eyi ezapi 'diyi fe.

English: Traffic officers stay in rain trying to direct cars in order to prevent traffic jam.
Luganda: Abaserikale b'oku nguudo babeera mu nkuba nga bagezaako okulagirira emmotoka okusobola okuziiyiza akalippagano k'ebidduka.
Runyankore: Abaserukare abarikujunanizibwa aha biiruka , nibateerwa enjura , obwo barikugyezaho kworekyereza ebiiruka kugira ngu bireke kureetaho omwijuzo omu ruguuto.
Acholi: Abili me doro ngwec i yo cung iwi kot katic ki nyutu kwene ma mutoka omyero owot ki iye wek mutoka pe ojoge mapol tutwal igudu
Ateso: Engirikitos ipolisin luka erot edou kanu atamite aitetenit amotokan tetere mam inyutakinos.
Lugbara: polisi trafikia ꞌdiyi te ozoo alia mutukari yi dri geri eꞌdazu yini mutukari yi trapi turi ma omgbo esizu.

English: Kampala roads flood whenever it rains heavily.
Luganda: Enguudo za Kampala zijjula amazzi buli enkuba lw'etonnya ennyo.
Runyankore: Enguuto z'omuri Kampala niziijura amaizi enjura nyingi ku erikugwa.
Acholi: Gudu ma Kampala pii pong iye ka kot ocwe
Ateso: Ilelebunonos irotin luko Kampala akip akaulo na etepia edou.
Lugbara: Nzila Kampala 'diyi ga yi si tre sa'wa dria ozo ni 'dizu okposi ri si.

English: Car accidents are common during rainy seasons.
Luganda: Obubenje bw'emmotoka bubeera bungi mu biseera by'enkuba.
Runyankore: Butandu z'ebiiruka nizikira kubaho omu bwire bw'enjura.
Acholi: Yoke pa mutoka bedo pol kace kot ocwe matek
Ateso: Idilas akangasia nu imotokan apakio nu etepia edou.
Lugbara: Drileonzi mutukari si 'diyi tre sa'wa ozo ni ri si.

English: The bride should be mindful of her wedding dress.
Luganda: Omugole omukyala alina okufaayo ku kiteeteeyi kye eky'embaga.
Runyankore: Omugore ashemereire kufayo aha kijwaro kye ky'okugaitirwamu.
Acholi: Dako ma gibinyomoni omyero otam pi bongo ma obiruku
Ateso: Ekot amugolet apodokinit egoe ke lo epeta.
Lugbara: Le arusu ma ega e'yo bongo ivile aje niri ma dria indi.

English: The lady got married at an old age.
Luganda: Omukyala yafunbirwa ku myaka emikulu.
Runyankore: Omukazi akashwerwa akuzire
Acholi: Dako ca onyome madong mwakane dit
Ateso: Abu aberu odukokin omojongite.
Lugbara: Oku 'da mu agupia de isu eri de 'bo.

English: The government is not issuing national identity cards due to coronavirus.
Luganda: Gavumenti tegaba ndagamuntu olw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Gavumenti terikugaba endanga muntu ahabw'endwara ya Korona.
Acholi: Gamente pe tye ka poko National identity cards pi peko me Coronavirus
Ateso: Mam apugan aijanakini akadin nu akwap kanu adeka naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Gamete feni ꞌdoria aidenititi kadi karisiri ku agbari azo korona niri ma eꞌyosi

English: The government nowadays is trying to control what is said in the media.
Luganda: Gavumenti ennaku zino egezaako okufuga eby'ogerebwa mu mawulire.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ebiro ebi eriyo neegyezaho kurwanisa ebirikugambwa omu mahurire
Acholi: Gamente ikinkareni tye ka temo me gengo lok mogo ma lumi lok angeya kelo bot lwak
Ateso: Etamit apugan apakio nu aitikitik nu itolomunono ko oyemuto.
Lugbara: Gamete ꞌba ꞌdoria azita eꞌyo ꞌbani oji pari osisiani azini oyuyuani ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ma dria ci

English: All organisations make financial reports at the end of each year.
Luganda: Ebitongole byonna bikola alipoota z'ebyensimbi ku buli nkomerero y'omwaka.
Runyankore: Ebitongore byona nibikora embaririra y'esente ahanyima ya buri mwaka.
Acholi: Dule tic ducu yubu waraga manyuto cente ma gunongo ki yoo ango ma cente man giketo itic
Ateso: Iriongeta kere itolomunenete eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kangeset na kangol ekaru.
Lugbara: Amuti dria yi ripoti robia ma driari fe elini ꞌi deria.

English: Entebbe airport will be opened in October.
Luganda: Ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi eky' Entebbe kijja kuggulwawo gw'ekkumi.
Runyankore: Ekishayi ky'endegye Entebbe nikiza kwigurwaho omukwezi kwaikumi
Acholi: Bardege madit me Entebbe gibiyabu idwer me apar
Ateso: Epukorio esawe loka idegei loko Entebbe olap lo itomonet
Lugbara: Ba angu ndege eyini orizu azini ongazu Entebbe a ri ma ti zi imba mudri si.

English: I have just seen the best bridal dresses in Kampala at a certain shop.
Luganda: Naakalaba ebiteeteeyi by'obugole ebisinga obulungi mu Kampala ku dduuka erimu.
Runyankore: Niho naaheza kureeba ebiteteeyi by'abagore ebirikukirayo oburungi omuduuka emwe omuri Kampala.
Acholi: Pwod aneno kombedi bongi pa mon me nyom mabeco loyo iKampala idukan moo acel
Ateso: Awanyu eong kopana igoen lu elaete lu amugolen oiduka ecie ko Kampala.
Lugbara: Ma ebi nga lu arusu eyi ma bongo ndripi Kampala ndeni 'diyi ne dukani azi ma alea sa'wa 'disi.

English: After the heavy rains, the arcades in Kampala were flooded with water.
Luganda: Oluvannyuma lw'enkuba ennyingi, akeedi mu zajjuude amazzi.
Runyankore: Ahanyima y'enjura nyamwingi, ebyombeko bihango by'omuri Kampala bikajanjaaramu amaizi.
Acholi: Inge kot mucwe matek tutwali, dukan maKampala opong ki pii
Ateso: Akaulo na idowon kalu ipu, opotu akip ilelebunos oidukai lu ko Kampala.
Lugbara: Ozoo ma vutia, yi ti dukani kambalaa ꞌdiyi ma alia ci

English: Where is Uganda headed with its citizens being mistreated?
Luganda: Uganda eraga wa n'abatuuze baayo abatulugunyizibwa?
Runyankore: Uganda neetoora nkahi, nabatuuragye baayo abarikubonabonesibwa?
Acholi: Kwene ma Uganda tye ka cito iye ki kit auna ma anywali lobo man tye ka nenoni?
Ateso: Aibodo elosi Uganda itisilanario iketunga?
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri fe dri ngole geri 'bani kari anzi eyini candi fezu 'disi.

English: Who is the owner of the land where the church was demolished?
Luganda: Ani nnannyini ttaka ewaamenyebwa ekkanisa?
Runyankore: Mukama waitaka ahu ekanisa yashenyirwe nooha?
Acholi: Anga ma rwod ngom kama otlega gimuku iyeni?
Ateso: Ingaibo ilope alupok nu ejai ekanisa lo abilibilio?
Lugbara: Nyaku 'bani kanisa anzuzu 'da ma ei ni a'di i?

English: This letter was written by my young daughter.
Luganda: Ebbaluwa eno yawandiikibwa muwala wange omuto.
Runyankore: Ebaruha egi ekahandiikwa muhara wangye omuto.
Acholi: Waragaman nyara matidin en aye ocoyo
Ateso: Ebaluwa lo akoka nadidi nes iwadikat.
Lugbara: Ma ezi werea ri si waraga 'di ni.

English: You need somewhere to keep your clothes.
Luganda: Weetaaga ewantu ew'okutereka engoye zo.
Runyankore: Noyetenga omwanya gw'okubiikamu emyenda yaawe.
Acholi: Omyero inong kamo me gwoko bongini
Ateso: Ekotokin ijo aingadakin igoen kon nenicie.
Lugbara: Le mi esu pari azi mi bongo eyi ma ta mbazu ra.

English: Design your house the way you want it.
Luganda: Wunda ennyumba yo mu ngeri gy'ogyagalamu.
Runyankore: Hunda enju yaawe omu muringo ogu orikwenda
Acholi: Yub oti kit moo keken macwinyi mito
Ateso: Igiru etogo kon koipone kalo ikotor ijo.
Lugbara: Mi ede mi jo geri mini le ri si.

English: Here are the good things in using good quality construction materials.
Luganda: Bino bye birungi ebiri mu kukozesa ebizimbisibwa eby'omutindo omulungi.
Runyankore: Ebi nibyo birungi ebiri omu kwombekyesa ebintu birungi.
Acholi: Man aye lok mabeco malube ki tic ki jami gedo marwomgi malo
Ateso: Iboro luejokuka lu kanu aitwasam adukio.
Lugbara: E'yo muke 'bani afa jo sizu muke 'diyi ayuzu i ri eyi 'di.

English: The compound will look nice if well designed.
Luganda: Oluggya lujja kufaanana bulungi singa lunaawundibwa bulungi.
Runyankore: Embuga neeza kureebeka gye ku baragiteereze gye
Acholi: Dyekal binen maleng ka giyubu maber
Ateso: Ibusuuni alaro arai igirun ejok.
Lugbara: Akudri 'di ni mu e'da ndrizaru 'ba ka ede kililiru ri ya.

English: Small houses can be well organised to fix many things.
Luganda: Ennyumba entono zisobola okutegekebwa obulungi okugyamu ebintu ebingi.
Runyankore: Obuju bukye nibabaasa kubutereeza buzemu ebintu bingi.
Acholi: odi matino gitwero cano iye jami madwong kagitiyo ki diro
Ateso: Eminas itogoi ludidika ajokis kanu ainapakin iboro luipu.
Lugbara: Ba eco jo werea 'diyi o'ba kililiru eyini ani ecozu afa karakara eyi ma ta mbazu ra.

English: The president's lawyer has died at a very old age.
Luganda: Munnamateeka wa pulezidenti afudde mukadde nnyo.
Runyankore: Omunyabiragiro w'omwembenbezi weihanga afiire aine emyaka mingi munonga.
Acholi: Lapilida pa ladit lobo oto ma mwaka ne dit tutwal
Ateso: Atwana epulida loka epuresident emojongit noi.
Lugbara: Agu dricere kari vileri vile kesi ma aga nyapiniri dra de de teketeke ꞌbo

English: Teenagers are not interested in what I have to say but I have to talk to them.
Luganda: Abatiini tebalina bwagazi mu bye nnina kwogera naye nnina okwogera nabo.
Runyankore: Eminyeeto terikukunda ebi ndikwenda kugamba kwonka nyine kubagambira
Acholi: Lutino ma mwakagi tye aparkiwiye pe mito winyo loka ento omyero alok kwedgi
Ateso: Mam atumunak isiyslamikitos nu alosi eong alimun konye ejai eong einer keda kes.
Lugbara: Anzi eli be mudri ni alu kpere mudri ni oromi 'diyi ma ava e'yo ma ni mu nze ri ma dria yo te le ma nze e'yo eyi be ra.

English: Marriage pressure can cause some people to hire grooms and guests for weddings.
Luganda: Puleesa y'obufumbo esobola okuleetera abantu abamu okupangisa abagole n'abagenyi bakole embaga.
Runyankore: Okunyigirizibwa kw'obushwere nikureetera abantu kupangisa ba kishwera hamwe n'abagyenyi aha mukoro.
Acholi: Keto dano ilyeto pi lok me nyom weko joo mukene pango coo ki wele me nyom
Ateso: Aridakina na edukone ijaikini icie itunga aipagisa ikiliok ka ipejok kanu ipetai.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌba omipi aje ma eꞌyosi ꞌdiyi eco fe ꞌba azi yini agupi jezu ꞌba omvele omuru ꞌdiyi be sendesi omu oku bizani ma alia ra.

English: Working at home is going to change the way bosses perceive work.
Luganda: Okukolera ewaka kugenda kukyusa engeri abakozesa gye balabamu emirimu.
Runyankore: Okukorera omuka nikiija kuhindura omuringo ogu abakozesa barikutwaramu emirimo.
Acholi: Tic ki gang biloko kit ma ludito tic niang kede tic
Ateso: Aswam ore ebuni aijulakin eipone lo iswamatatar luapolok.
Lugbara: Azi nga akua ri ni mu ambo eyi ma egata azi dria ri oja ra.

English: Give people their money.
Luganda: Wa bantu ssente zaabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu bahe esente zaabo.
Acholi: Mi ki dano centegi
Ateso: Ijaik itunga ikec ikapun.
Lugbara: Ife 'ba eyi ni eyi ma robia.

English: We need to find out why the issue is taking longer than expected.
Luganda: Twetaaga okuzuula lwaki ensonga etwala obudde buwanvu ku bwe twasuubira.
Runyankore: Nitwenda kumanya ahabw'enki enshonga egyo etweire obwire bwingi obu twabaire tutarikuteekateeka.
Acholi: Omyero waniang gin ango ma oweko lok man tye ka tero kare madwong tutwal
Ateso: Ekot oni ajenun ibore ayangaikinor akirot apak naepol adepar ne aomitai.
Lugbara: Le ama ma esu e'yo nde ni sa'wa 'du ezu aga egaleri ra a'dusi ya ri ra.

English: Even as work is ongoing, people are still celebrating.
Luganda: Newankubadde emirimu gigenda mu maaso, abantu bakyajaguza.
Runyankore: Omurimo nobu guraabe nigugyenda omu maisho, abantu bariyo nibajaguza
Acholi: Kede bedi tic tye mede, dano mapol pwod gitye ka kwer
Ateso: Araida elosi aswam, erongo itunga inumunumete.
Lugbara: Azi ni ta tro muzu drile ra ti, 'ba azi 'diyi nga po'di ayiko zu.

English: Consider the situation of people in other areas.
Luganda: Ffaayo ku mbeera y'abantu abali mu bitundu ebirala.
Runyankore: Teekateeka aha embeera y'abantu ab'omu bicweka ebindi.
Acholi: Pa pi kit ma dano tye ka kwo kwede ikabedo mukene
Ateso: Ite ejautene lo itunga kaiboisio acie.
Lugbara: Mi ega e'yo e'yo 'ba azi pari azi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ni aa'zu ri ma dria indi.

English: I get sad at times by the things people do.
Luganda: Nnakuwala ebiseera ebimu olw'ebintu abantu bye bakola.
Runyankore: Obumwe nimpurira kubi ahabw'ebi abantu barikukora.
Acholi: Cwinya cwer ikare mukene ka aneno jami ma dano timo
Ateso: Akadanakini eong acie apakio kanu iswamaete itunga.
Lugbara: Sa'wa azi 'diyisi ma aa candisi e'yo 'ba eyini 'ye 'diyisi.

English: They should receive rewards for a higher ranking.
Luganda: Balina okufuna obusiimo olw'okubeera ku daala erya waggulu.
Runyankore: Bashemereire kutunga ebiconco ahabw'amadaara gaabo.
Acholi: Omyero gunong pwoc pi bedo ikin joo ma rwom ticgi malo
Ateso: Ekot kes adumun ainakinet kanu adoketait na okuju.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma fe yini dria dria orodri be angiri ꞌdinile ꞌdiyi

English: We are thankful for the meals provided to soldiers.
Luganda: Tusiimye nnyo olw'emmere eweebwa abasirikale.
Runyankore: Nitusiima eby'okurya ebirituheebwa abaserukare.
Acholi: Watye ki pwoc pi cam ma gimiyo ki lumony
Ateso: Iyalama iso kanu inyamat lu ijaikitai ajore.
Lugbara: Ama ovu ayikosi nyaka fele asikari eyidri 'disi.

English: The patient was discharged from hospital last month.
Luganda: Omulwadde yasiibulwa mu ddwaliro omwezi oguwedde.
Runyankore: Omurwaire akasibuurwa kuruga omu irwariro okwezi okuhweire.
Acholi: Ki tyeko gonyo latwo woko ki i ot yat i dwe ma okaro ni
Ateso: Aponi otwarai adekan kadekis olap je.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba engapi suzaruri arojoarisi mba ajeria.

English: Frontline health workers' salaries should be trippled.
Luganda: Omusaala gw'abasawo abali ku mwanjo gulina okukubisibwamu emirundi esatu.
Runyankore: Emishaara y’abashaho abeebembeire omu kujanjaba eshemereire kwongyezibwa kashatu.
Acholi: Ludaktari ma gitye in dok lweny ki two omwero ki nya mucara gi tyen adek
Ateso: Ibusakinit aiyatakin irwan auni eropit loka eswamak lukapolok luka angaleu.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma o'tu azi'ba alatani azi ngabaa e'yo ewaru talasi diyi ma oya paleko na.

English: A lady's claim will be clarified.
Luganda: Okwemulugunya kw'omukazi kujja kugonjoolwa.
Runyankore: Omukazi eki arikugamba nikiija kushobororwa.
Acholi: Lok ma dako acel okati kwede, gibineno adane
Ateso: Alipan na aberu ebeit aitacaun.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga eꞌyo waꞌdi ꞌdini ꞌyoleri ma azako ra.

English: There is high traffic on the toll-free lines.
Luganda: Waliwo akalippagano k'amaanyi ku layini z'amasimu ag'obwereere..
Runyankore: Esimu eza busha eziriho tizirikurabamu.
Acholi: Dano mapol tye ka goyo cim inamba ma pe iculu
Ateso: Inyutakina isimun inomio kosimun luatitai.
Lugbara: ꞌBa yi simu egba simu aje ofele kurisi tre tre

English: The president has appeared more than twenty times on television.
Luganda: Pulezidenti abadde ku terefayina emirundi egisukka amakumi abiri.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi w’eihanga yahitsya emirunda erikurenga makumi abiri arikugambira aha tivi.
Acholi: Ladit wilobo otyeko nen i telebijon tyen makaro pwera ariyo
Ateso: Itodiaritai lokapolon akwap kotelebision irwan akaisaarei kadepar.
Lugbara: Drile kari niri ebi e'da e'yo nzezu TV ma alea aga pale kaliri ra

English: A team delivered a consignment at the Entebbe International Airport using the Ethiopian Airlines.
Luganda: Tiimu yawerezza ekitereke ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi Entebbe ng'ekozesa ennyonyi ya Ethiopian Airlines.
Runyankore: Tiimu ehikize ebintu aha kishayi ky'endegye Entebbe barikukozesa endegye y'ekitongore kya Ethiopian.
Acholi: Damo mogo gukelo tee i bardege madit me Entebbe kun gutiyo ki dege me Ethiopian Airlines
Ateso: Abu etimu oyanga iboro oisawe loka idegei koEntebbe itwasamai edege loka Ethiopian Airlines.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azini ongulumuru eji afa azini yi fe ndege pari wudrikurusi Entebbearia ndege Ethiopia vilerisi

English: We need new information sources in order to keep up to date.
Luganda: Twetaaga ensibuko z'obubaka empya tusobole okwekuumira mu kumanya.
Runyankore: Nitwetenga oburugo bw'amakuru kugira ngu tugume nitumanya ebintu ahu byahika.
Acholi: Omyero wanong dano manyen mamiyo iwa lok wek waniang gin ma tye katime con
Ateso: Ikoto oni ewai loitetet lo idumunenet akiro tetere oni ijeni nu iswamas.
Lugbara: Ama le oꞌduko oꞌdiru ꞌdiyi amani ngazu eꞌyo dria oꞌdiru ꞌdiyi nizu ci beni

English: Floods have displaced several refugees.
Luganda: Amataba gasengudde abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi.
Runyankore: Amataba gaburize empungi nyingi obutaaho.
Acholi: Pii kot madwong oryemo luring ayela mapol
Ateso: Esiarisiar ebulone ikerai luipu.
Lugbara: Yi rapi rara 'diyi odro emunyale karakara 'diyi ni.

English: Taxi operation in Kampala has been halted.
Luganda: Okukola kwa takisi mu Kampala kuyimiriziddwa.
Runyankore: Takisi omu Kampala zeemereziibwe kukora.
Acholi: Tic pa taxi ma Kampala gityeko juko
Ateso: Esibwoun aswam naka atakisin ko Kampala.
Lugbara: ꞌBa atri azi ngaza takisi yini kambalaari ci

English: Taking over church land is not a good idea.
Luganda: Okutwala ettaka lya kkanisa si kirowoozo kirungi.
Runyankore: Okutwara eitaka ry'eiramizo tikirungi.
Acholi: Mayo ngom me otlega pe obedo gin ma atir
Ateso: Arobiar alupok nu ekanisa mam erai ibore yen ejok.
Lugbara: Kanisa ma angu paza adrini e'yo muke ni ku.

English: During the introduction ceremonies, it is important to have good songs.
Luganda: Mu mikolo gy'okwanjula, kirungi okuba n'ennyimba ennungi.
Runyankore: Aha mukoro gw'okwanjura, nikirungi kugira ebyeshongoro birungi.
Acholi: Ikare me cwalo keny onyo yubu nyom magang, pire tek me bedo ki wer mabeco
Ateso: Kapak naka epucit lo aitodiaro, ejok ajaut keda ikosisinei luejokuka.
Lugbara: Omu aje vile 'diyisi, eri orodriru adrizu ongo ala 'diyi be.

English: With my new car, I can easily avoid all the traffic in Kampala.
Luganda: N'emmotoka yange empya, nsobola mangu okwewala obulippagano bwonna mu Kampala.
Runyankore: Naaba nyine emotoka yangye ensya nimbaasa kwetantara omwijuzo gw'ebiiruka omu Kampala.
Acholi: Ki mutokana manyeni, atwero weyo gudu mukene ma mutoka pol iye
Ateso: Keda emotoka ka loitetet, apedori eong ainac ejam ko Kampala.
Lugbara: Ma vile mutukari oꞌdirisi, ma eco jamu kampalaa ri otru tua ra.

English: The communications company should allow us to operate freely.
Luganda: Kkampuni y'eby'empuliziganya erina okutukkiriza okukola nga twetaaya.
Runyankore: Kampuni y'empurizagana eshemereire kutwikiriza tukakora hatariho ekirikututeganisa.
Acholi: Kampuni me cim omyero owek wa bed agonya me mede ki tic
Ateso: Ekot ekampuni lo isimun acamakin oni aswam kailajara.
Lugbara: Le kambuni oꞌduko idripi ꞌdi ma fe ama ma nga azi oga kokoru

English: Which car brand do you prefer?
Luganda: Kika kya mmotoka ki ky'oyagala?
Runyankore: Ekika ky'emotoka eki orikukunda nikiiha?
Acholi: In imaro mutoka mamene?
Ateso: Emotoka bo aputo ani ikoto ijo?
Lugbara: Ile mutukari wura ngoleri i??

English: The paint needs to dry first before you cover it.
Luganda: Langi yeetaaga okusooka okukala nga tonnagibikka.
Runyankore: Erangi neeyetenga kubanza yaayoma otakagishwekire.
Acholi: Rangi ma giweroni omyero kong otwo woko ma peya iumu
Ateso: Ekot eraagi ber aonore erongo ijo erapakina.
Lugbara: le rangi ma ꞌwi raka ꞌba ma opi drini ndo.

English: Let us talk to him and get the truth of the matter.
Luganda: Ka twogere naye tufune amazima g'ensonga.
Runyankore: Reka tugambe nawe tumanye amazima.
Acholi: Wa lok ki laconi wek waniang ada pa lok
Ateso: Enerakinos ber oni keda nges terere idumuni nuabeit.
