English: Why is it so difficult to find true love?
Luganda: Lwaki kizibu nnyo okuzuula omukwano ogwannamaddala?
Runyankore: Ahabwenki kigumire okutunga rukundo ey'amazima
Acholi: Pingo obedo tek tutwal me nongo mar ma tye ada?
Ateso: Inyober etionor adumun amina na abeit?
Lugbara: Eri ewaru Leta adari esuzu a'dusi??

English: A long-distance relationship needs a faithful partner.
Luganda: Omukwano ogw'ewala gwetaaga omwagalwa omwesigwa.
Runyankore: Rukundo eyahare, neeyetenga omukundwa orikwesigwa
Acholi: Bedo ki larem ma kin wu boo mito dano magene dok pe mito mit woko
Ateso: Amina na elwana ekot ipaupa yen emunono.
Lugbara: ꞌBani aꞌazu agyiru sawa ezu ra, le ꞌba ma esu agyi aꞌita beni.

English: I wonder why she's more open to my friend than me.
Luganda: Neewuunya lwaki yeeyabiza nnyo mukwano gwange okusinga nze.
Runyankore: Nikintangaaza okureeba nayanguhirwa kuganiira na munywani wangye kunkira.
Acholi: Pe aniang pingo en tye agonya ki larema loyo an
Ateso: Aumokit eong ibore ecamunitor ngesi ener keda opapero ka adepar eong.
Lugbara: Ani eri eꞌyo nze ma agyi be ori kokoru te nze ma be ꞌdile ku aꞌdi eꞌyosi yari ku

English: My wife constantly looks at me in the morning.
Luganda: Mukyala wange antunuulira entakera kumakya.
Runyankore: Omukazi wangye naaguma nandeeba omukasheeshe
Acholi: Dakona maro nena tutwal odiko
Ateso: Etenenei akaberu eong tipuruc.
Lugbara: Ma okuni ni ma ne mile nze kokoru o'bitisi .

English: Oil companies need to observe proper means of waste disposal.
Luganda: Kkampuni z'amafuta zeetaaga okulaba engeri ennungi ez'okukwatamu kasasiro.
Runyankore: Kampuni z'amajuta zishemereire kuronda oburyo bw'okunaga ebitokoozi
Acholi: Kampuni me moo omyero obed ki diro maber me onyo yugi
Ateso: Ekot ikampunin lu akinyet atupite iwaitin lu ebukonorere agasia.
Lugbara: Le kambuni azi ngapi odu be ꞌdiyi ma obi geri kililiru afa okurunyaru ꞌdiyi dazu ꞌdiyi ma vuti

English: My neighbour narrowly survived death last night.
Luganda: Muliraanwa wange yawonedde watono okufa ekiro kya jjo.
Runyankore: Mutaahi wangye akiriire hakye okufa nyekiro.
Acholi: Jiranina oloyo too lawor idyewo
Ateso: Obu eidunyet ka oku atwanare akware na bian.
Lugbara: Ma vile jo ejele ri ipa i dra sia ri si 'biko be ini ajeri si.

English: Our company gives awards to the best performers annually.
Luganda: Kkampuni yaffe ewa ebirabo eri abakozi abasinze buli mwaka.
Runyankore: Kampuni yaitu neehereza abakozire gye ebiconco buri mwaka
Acholi: Kampuniwa miyo mic ki lutic makwiri loyo mwaka ki mwaka
Ateso: Ekampuni kosi ijanakini ainanakineta nejaas lu iswamaete ejok kangol ekaru.
Lugbara: Kambuni ama vilerini dria dria fe ꞌbaazi ngapi onyiru tu ꞌdiyi dri eli vusi.

English: He still maintains his word despite the allegations against him.
Luganda: Akyalemedde ku kigambo kye newankubadde waliwo ebimwogerwako.
Runyankore: Tarikuhindura aha bigambo bye n'obu haraabe hariho ebi barikumugambaho.
Acholi: En pwod pido ni en pe labal kede bedi gikelo adot i kome
Ateso: Eringa je ikamakina akekirot ngipengin araida ebakai ejaas nu iswamat ngesi.
Lugbara: Eri so pa e'yo erini nze ri ma dria kiri kiri 'bani ta tro eri tozu ra ti.

English: There are many land wrangles in Uganda.
Luganda: Waliwo enkaayana z'ettaka nnyingi mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Omu Uganda harimu obwimukiriro bwingi bw'eitaka.
Acholi: Tye lara ngom mapol tutwal ilobo Uganda
Ateso: Ipu ingungeta lu alupok ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Baka seza nyaku dria 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma alea karakara.

English: It requires a good wedding planner to have a successful function.
Luganda: Kyetaagisa omuteesiteesi w'embaga omulungi okusobola okuba n'omukolo omulungi.
Runyankore: Okugira omukoro murungi gw'okugaitwa  nikyetenga omutebekanisa murungi.
Acholi: Mite ni inong ladiro mangeyo yubu nyom wek yubi owot maber
Ateso: Ekotokin itunganan yen ejeni akapanakin ejok kanu ajaun keda epucit lo ejok.
Lugbara: Omu oku bizaniri ni ovuzu onyiru, le ꞌba omu otupi onyiruni ma out eri ni.

English: She truly deserved the award for the best arts reporter in the country.
Luganda: Mazima yagwanira ekirabo kya munnamawulire omusasi w'ebifaananyi asinga mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: N'amazima akaba ashemereire kutunga ekiconco ky'okwanjura eby'emyoga omwihanga
Acholi: I kom lok ada, dako ni opore me nongo mic pi bedo lami lok angeya maber makwako lok kom goyo cal, wer, ki tuku googa
Ateso: Abeit ibecokino nges ayangar ainakinet kanuka araut arotan iyemuto loajokan kakwap.
Lugbara: Erini dria dria esuzu erini ovuzu ꞌba eꞌyo ti idripi onyiru ndeni kari ꞌdi ma aleari ꞌirisiri sitara.

English: Try him, he is one of the good photographers we have around town.
Luganda: Mugezeeko, y'omu ku bakubi b'ebifaananyi abalungi be tuyina okwetoloola kibuga.
Runyankore: Mugyezeho n'omwe aha bateezi b'ebishushani abarungi abu twine omu tawuni.
Acholi: Tem tic ki laconi, en tye ikin lumak cal maticgi beco loyo iboma man
Ateso: Otamak nges, ngesi ediopet kotoma enomak aputosia ejok kotaun.
Lugbara: Mi o'bi nga eri, eri 'ba 'ba e'da gba pi ala ndeni tawuni 'di ma alea 'diyi ma azi.

English: I would be happy to provide much information as possible.
Luganda: Nandibadde musanyufu okuwa obubaka mu bungi bwonna obusoboka.
Runyankore: Nikiza kunshemeza okukuhereza amakuru maingi nk'oku kirikubaasika.
Acholi: Cwinya bibedo yom me miyo lok mukene mamite
Ateso: Eyalamikin ti eong kanu aijaikin akiro nuipu kwa ipudare.
Lugbara: Ma nga aꞌa ayikosi oꞌduko fezu kile erini ovuzu cirile.

English: My neighbour's roof was damaged by the heavy rains.
Luganda: Akasolya ka muliraanwa wange kaayonooneddwa enkuba ennyingi.
Runyankore: Ekisasi ky'amutaahi wangye kikashishwa enjura nyingi
Acholi: Wii ot pa jiranina obale pi kot mucwee mateki
Ateso: Abu edou lo apol omunamuna atunuru eidunyet ka.
Lugbara: Ma vile jo ejele ri ma jo dri eza i te ozo 'dipi okposi 'diyi si.

English: The mayor's wife encouraged us to work hard for a better future.
Luganda: Mukyala wa mmeeya yatukubiriza okukola ennyo ku lw'ebiseera by'omu maaso ebirungi
Runyankore: Omukazi wa meeya akatuhiga ngu tukore n'amaani ahabw'ebiro birungi bya nyensya.
Acholi: Dako pa meya ocuku cwinywa me tic matek pi anyim maber
Ateso: Abu aberu emeya isinyikok iso aswam agogong kanuka oingaren.
Lugbara: Meya ma okuni fe ama dri imbata azi ngazu okposi ewu drusi ri ni aa'zu muke.

English: Will our friendship be damaged if you don't get that job?
Luganda: Omukwano gwaffe gunaakosebwa singa tofuna mulimu ogwo?
Runyankore: Rukundo yaitu neija kusiisikara waaba otatungire murimo?
Acholi: Lurem ma ikinwa bibale ka pe inongo tic meno?
Ateso: Biyai emunar eipaperoni wok arai mam ijo idumuni aswam ngin?
Lugbara: Ama ma agyi ni mu i eza ra eka azi 'da esu ku ri ya?

English: My grandparents also benefited from government aid last year.
Luganda: Bajjajjange nabo baaganyulwa mu buyambi bwa gavumenti omwaka oguwedde.
Runyankore: Ba shwenkuru na ba nyokwenkuru nabo bakagasirwa omu buhwezi bwa gavumenti omwaka oguhweire.
Acholi: Kwarina bene gunongo kony pa gamente mwaka mukato
Ateso: Apotu luapapaaka keda luatataaka da imedautu kanejaas iboro apugan okaru je.
Lugbara: Eli ajerisi ma aꞌbi pi esu vini drileba ma di be afa gameteni fele ajekokoru risi ra.

English: Are all employees at your workplace offered a special training course?
Luganda: Abakozi bonna ku mulimu gy'okolera baweebwa okutendekebwa okw'enjawulo?
Runyankore: Aha murimo gwawe, abakozi boona nibatunga okutendekwa okw'omutaano?
Acholi: Lutic weng ma igangtici ginongo kwan ma lube ki ticgi?
Ateso: Biyai eswamak kere lu aswam kus ijanakino aitutuoro?
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌba dria emi vile azi angua ꞌdiyini embata azi wura be nduni fe ra ya.

English: The family of a man who died after jumping from the lorry are speechless.
Luganda: Famire y'omusajja eyafudde oluvannyuma lw'okubuuka ku loole ebigambo byagiweddeko.
Runyankore: Ab'eka y'omushaija owafiire ahanyima y'okuhanuka aha roore, tibaine bigambo.
Acholi: Joo gang pa laco mutoo inge pye ki iwi lorry gitye madogi otwo
Ateso: Ekale etunganan kalo obu otwana akaulo na asukun olore emamikitos nulimuno.
Lugbara: Aku agupi drapi erini embuzu mutukari ambu Lorri ruri ma alea 'bo ri ma vutia 'diyi ma ti ca ku.

English: Flooding caused the mine to collapse.
Luganda: Amataba gaaviiriddeko ekirombe okugwamu.
Runyankore: Okushandara kw'amaizi kukareetera ekirombe kuhirima.
Acholi: Pii mupong oweko kakwinyo jami otuk olwiny woko
Ateso: Abu ebulone otiaik ne ebokere ibokan.
Lugbara: Iyi rapi rara ru fe angu oni orodri be saaru 'diyi nzezu ri anzu te.

English: It is one of the newly created cities.
Luganda: Kye kimu ku bibuga ebiggya ebyakatondebwawo.
Runyankore: N'emwe aha marembo agaherize kutandikwaho.
Acholi: Obedo ikin citi manyen magiyubu
Ateso: Erai ediopet kotoma ositei lu etigogongorio pacu.
Lugbara: Eri aku ambo ꞌbani eꞌdo oꞌdi ꞌdiyi ma azi

English: The solution to load shedding is building more dams.
Luganda: Okugonjoola okuvaako kw'amasannyalaze kuzimba mabibiro malala.
Runyankore: Ekirikubaasa kumaraho eibura ry'amashanyarazi n'okwombeka daamu ezindi.
Acholi: Yoo me giko rwenyo pa mac aye me gero dam mukene mapol me yubu mac
Ateso: Eipone lo ebeitor aitanangia alemanario na akim nes aiduk dams nuipu.
Lugbara: Geri ꞌbani ecozu aci oliza ma azakozuri eri ꞌbani damu azi yi sizu dika.

English: I suggest you get rid of all gadgets when its sleeping time.
Luganda: Nteesa weggyeko ebintu byonna ebikozesa amasannyalaze mu budde bw'okwebaka.
Runyankore: Ninteisa ngu ebyoma byona obiiheho ahabwire bw'okubyama.
Acholi: Amiyo tam ni inek jami weng me tic calo cim gini ka cawa me nino oromo
Ateso: Aomit eong ekot ijo alemar iboro kere kapak kana ajo.
Lugbara: Ma ega kini mi ma oꞌdu afa aci ayupi ꞌdiyi dria ra sawa mini oꞌdu kozuri ma alea.

English: It is unnecessary for one to dress excessively in order to look stylish
Luganda: Tekyetaagisa muntu kwambala kisusse okusobola okufaanana ng'ali ku mutindo.
Runyankore: Nikyenda ngu omuntu ajware amare aha mugoye okubaasa kureebeka gye.
Acholi: Pe opore ki dano me ruke tutwal me nyute
Ateso: Mam ebeit itunganan ainap noi kanu aibusesu.
Lugbara: ꞌBani ꞌba tizu kayi ꞌbani ani eꞌdazu ndrizaru beniri ma orodri yo.

English: I enjoy being at work and checking to know how things are going.
Luganda: Nyumirwa nnyo okubeera ku mulimu n'okukebera okumanya engeri ebintu gye bitambulamu.
Runyankore: Ninshemererwa, naaba ndi ahamurimo ndikureeba ebintu okubirikugyenda.
Acholi: Amaro bedo idog tic ki bene me neno kit ma tic tye ka wot kwede
Ateso: Aminakit eong ajaut aswam ka awanyanar eipone lo elosiotor iboro.
Lugbara: Ale aa'ta azia azini e'yo azia 'diyi mu ngonia ri ma oneta saaru.

English: It is with sorrow that we announce the death of our beloved father
Luganda: Mu nnaku, tubika taata waffe omwagalwa.
Runyankore: N'ekyobusaasi okureeba ngu nituranga okufa kwa taata .
Acholi: Obedo ki cwercwiny madit ma wa miyo kwena too pa wonwa me amara
Ateso: Erai nuka aiturur oni alimor atwanare naka papa wok lominan.
Lugbara: Eri candi amboru be amani ama ati leleturi ma dra ecezu.

English: Sir, this is the truth.
Luganda: Ssebo, gano ge mazima.
Runyankore: Sebo, aga nigo mazima.
Acholi: Ladit, man aye lok ada
Ateso: Ipa, nuabeit kes nu.
Lugbara: Ba ambo, e'yo adari eri 'di i.

English: He worked hard for his wife's happiness.
Luganda: Yakolerera nnyo essanyu lya mukyala we.
Runyankore: Akakora munonga kugira ngu omukazi ashemererwe
Acholi: Laconi otiyo matek pi yomo cwiny dakone
Ateso: Abu ngesi iswama agogongu tetere aberu iyalama.
Lugbara: Eri nga azi okporu i ma okuni ni aa'zu ayikosi.

English: What challenges did you face during the conference?
Luganda: Kusoomozebwa ki kwe wasanze mu lukungaana?
Runyankore: Omu ruteerane, n'enki ekyakuteganisize?
Acholi: Peko ango ma inongo ikare me kacoke man?
Ateso: Anubo atiokisio obu ijo odum kapak na airianet?
Lugbara: E'yo ewaru mini isu okuta 'di ma alea 'diyi a'duni?

English: Investigations are ongoing on the embezzlement of Coronavirus disease funds.
Luganda: Okunoonyereza kugenda mu maaso ku kubulankanya kw'ensimbi z'ekirwadde ky'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Okucondooza aha sente z'okurwanisa oburwaire Korona ezaibirwe, kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho.
Acholi: Gitye ka kwedo lok me niang kit ma kwo cente me lweny i kom two Coronavirus otime kwede
Ateso: Elosi aingic akonye kanuka aimidicario na ikapun luka adeka naka ekorona.
Lugbara: E'yo eti ondaza eyi mu drile anyamgbolo ngale robia fe azo corona virasi siri 'diyi ma dria.

English: There are families in Uganda which have only one meal per day.
Luganda: Waliyo famire mu Uganda ezirya omulundi gumu olunaku.
Runyankore: Omu Uganda harimu amaka agarikurya omurundi gumwe omu izooba.
Acholi: Tye gangi mapol ilobo Uganda macamo kicel inino acel
Ateso: Ejaas ikalia Uganda lu enyamete irwanatipet aparan.
Lugbara: Aku azi kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma azi eyi nyaka nya o'du aluri ma alea pa ale alu.

English: Youths and children need daily advice from their parents and guardians.
Luganda: Abavubuka n'abaana beetaaga okuwabulwa okwa buli lunaku okuva eri bazadde baabwe n'ababalabirira.
Runyankore: Eminyeeto n'abaana nibetaaga okuhaburwa kuruga omu bazaire baabo n'abakuza.
Acholi: Bulu ki Lutino mito gunong tam inino ducu kibot lunyodogi
Ateso: Atumunak keda idwe ekotosi aicorio kanginiparan kanejaas iuriak keda edarak kec.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ode eyi azini anzi nyiri eyi ma esu imbata eyi ma tipika eyi vu azini 'ba eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi vu o'du driasi.

English: Dead bodies have been recovered after the heavy rainfall resulted in strong floods.
Luganda: Emirambo gizuuliddwa oluvannyuma lw'enkuba eyatonnye ennyo n'ereeta amataba.
Runyankore: Emitumbi yeherize kureebeka ahanyima y'enjura nyamwingi eyarugiremu okushandara kw'amaizi.
Acholi: Kom dano mutoo gityeko nongo inge kot mucwe matek tutwali mukelo pong pa pii
Ateso: Adumun itunga lu etwakitos akaulo na edou loepol lo akaale aitep.
Lugbara: Ba esu avu eyi ozo 'dipi okposi 'da ni i ojazu yi rapi rara ru 'bo ri ma vutia.

English: Any institute with proper accountability strategy is eligible for funding.
Luganda: Ekitongole kyonna ekiyina enteekateeka y'embalirira ennungi kigwana okuvujjirirwa.
Runyankore: Eitendekyero ryona eriine embaririra nungi niribaasa kuheebwa esente.
Acholi: Dul moo keken ma nyutu koo tic ki cente twero nongo lim
Ateso: Esomero edio kere lo ejaas keda erwom loajokan lo itwasamere ikapun ijaikino ikapun.
Lugbara: Amuti ci otita kililiru be robia ma ayuta ma driarini ꞌba eco robia fezu ra.

English: The government should lower the retirement age for its workers.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okukendeeza ku myaka gy'okuwummulirako agy'abakozi baayo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kushara ahamyaka ei abakozi baayo bashemereire kuhuumuriraho.
Acholi: Gamente omyero odwok piny mwaka ma lutice weko tic
Ateso: Ekot apugan aijesun ikaru lu iyenguta eswamak ke aswam.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma esi eli 'ba azi ngapi edri ri pi ma eli azi kuzu ri ra.

English: Fights between brothers and sisters are common these days.
Luganda: Okulwanagana wakati w'abooluganda abalenzi n'abawala kungi ennaku zino.
Runyankore: Endwano ahagati y'abantu abarikuzaarwa hamwe ebiro ebi nizireebeka munonga.
Acholi: Lweny ikin omego ki lumego pol tutwal ikn kareni
Ateso: Ijisinei kiding inacan keda ainacan kes idilas aparasia nu.
Lugbara: Aco adripika eyi ma eselea amvupika eyi pie 'diyi curu 'do karakara.

English: Please make sure that the bride and groom arrive early at church this Saturday.
Luganda: Bambi kakasa nti omugole omusajja n'omukazi batuuka mangu ku kkanisa olwomukaaga luno.
Runyankore: Nyabura we, reeba ngu omugore na kishwera bahika aha kanisa /kereziya bukiri kare aha rwa mukaaga.
Acholi: Timber inenni Dako ki Laco go oo con iotlega icengabicel eni
Ateso: Owanyu ebe elingunos emugolet ka amugolet okanisa namukaga na.
Lugbara: Kirikiri le mi ma ne ra kini arusu ki agupi be eca kanisa drio ru o'du azia 'disi.

English: Investigations show that members of the legislature earn the biggest salary amongst public servants.
Luganda: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti ab'ekitongole ky'amateeka be basinga okufuna omusaala omungi mu bakozi ba gavumenti.
Runyankore: Okubuririza nikworeka ngu ba memba ba ishengyero nibatunga omushaara ogurikukirayo obwingi omu bakozi ba gavumenti boona.
Acholi: Kwed mutime nyutuni Lucungudwa gamo mucara madit loyo ikn lutic pa gamente
Ateso: Itodunit aingic ebe eswamak luka owai lo ikisila edumununete eropit loepol koswamak luka apugan.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo eti ondaza ꞌbani ꞌyerisi,ꞌBa esu ꞌba azita sipi ꞌdiyi oya esu angiri ndeni aga ꞌba dria azi ngapi gamete ma palaa ꞌdiyi ra.

English: This the time Ugandans will decide who their leaders will be.
Luganda: Kino kye kiseera bannayuganda we bajja okusalawo b'ani abanaabeera abakulembeze baabwe.
Runyankore: Aha murundi ogu, abanya Uganda nibaza kusharamu batoorane omuntu oraije kubebembera.
Acholi: Man aye kare ma anywali me Uganda biyero anga me bedo lutelagi
Ateso: Kapak kana eseunete itunga luko Uganda engarenok kec.
Lugbara: Sa'wa 'di di kari anzi Uganda niri eyini eyi ma drice'ba eyi opezu ri.

English: It's true that anyone can run unopposed in primaries.
Luganda: Kituufu nti omuntu yenna asobola okuyitawo mu kamyufu nga tavuganyiziddwa
Runyankore: Namazima ,omuntu nabaasa kuguma ayesimbireho wenka hataine omwesimbireho omu karuuru
Acholi: Tye lok ada ni ngat moo keken twero kato kwir me cung ite party labongo pyem ki ngat mukene
Ateso: Erai abeit ebe idio itunganan kere epedori araun yen mam etepegitai kotoma abolobol nasodit na aseo.
Lugbara: Kini ꞌba azini eco lu pa so politikia voti piremariniria aꞌdule rari eri eꞌyo adani.

English: In primaries, you expect to win or lose.
Luganda: Mu kamyufu, olina okusuubira okuwangula oba okuwangulwa.
Runyankore: Omu karuuru akarikutandikirwaho, noobaasa kusinga nainga osingurwe.
Acholi: ibolo kwir me party, bed atera me loyo onyo coko
Ateso: Kotoma abolobol nasodit na aseo, ebeit ijo aitub arai aibiror.
Lugbara: voti piremari niria, mi eco nde kaniku eꞌde ra.

English: He is the longest-serving president of Uganda.
Luganda: Ye pulezidenti wa Uganda asinze okulwako.
Runyankore: Niwe mwebembezi otegyekire emyaka mingi omu Uganda
Acholi: Laditi aye tye ladit lobo madong orii itela me Uganda loyo weng
Ateso: Ngesi lokapolon akwap lo epuga noi ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Eri purezidenti kari Uganda niri ma dri cepi sa'wa ezu ndeni ri i.

English: Many youths are joining political parties.
Luganda: Abavubuka bangi beegatta ku bibiina byobufuzi.
Runyankore: Eminyeeto mingi eyegaisire aha bibiina by'obutegyeki
Acholi: Bulu mapol tye kadonyo iparty mapatpat
Ateso: Atumunak luipu alomasi opatei.
Lugbara: Ba ode karakara 'diyi fi amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alea.

English: Performance is key for political aspirants
Luganda: Obukozi kya nkizo eri abeesimbawo mu byobufuzi.
Runyankore: Okukora gye nikyo kirikukira kwetengwa omu bantu abesimbire omu by'obutegyeki.
Acholi: Kor tic pire tek tutwal pi dano matye kacung pi bedo luteal
Ateso: Aswam najokan nes elacet loka abwaak lu ipatei.
Lugbara: Azi pamvu ꞌbaniri eri orodriru ꞌba fipi politikia ꞌdiyi dri.

English: Losing an election should be expected of a prudent candidate.
Luganda: Okuwangulwa mu kalulu kirina okusuubirwa mu yeesimbyewo omugezi.
Runyankore: Omuntu ow'amazima oyesimbireho, ashemereire kumanya ngu naabaasa kusingurwa.
Acholi: Coko iyer pa lutela obedo gin ma latela makwiri omyero onge ni time
Ateso: Aibiror kotoma aseo erai ibore yen ebeit aijen ebe emina atakanun kanuka abwaan edio.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌba pa sopi politikiari ni eꞌdezuri eri eꞌyo ꞌbani nile rani.

English: Anyone is capable of winning an election.
Luganda: Omuntu yenna alina obusobozi obuwangula akalulu.
Runyankore: Buri omwe naabaasa kusingura omu karuuru.
Acholi: Ngat moo keken twero loyo iyer
Ateso: Idio itunganan kere epedori aitelekar aseo.
Lugbara: Ba ciri eco opeta eyi ndera.

English: Losing an election is a shame to some contestants.
Luganda: Okuwangulwa mu kalulu kya buswavu eri abavuganya abamu.
Runyankore: Abantu bamwe abesimbireho, okusingurwa nikubashwaza.
Acholi: Coko iyer pa lutela obedo lok me lewic bot lucungu mukene
Ateso: Aibiror kotoma aseo isurumit abwaak icie ileic.
Lugbara: E'deta opeta eyi ma alea ri 'ba azi pa tupi 'diyini drinza ru.

English: Cheating in elections must come to an end.
Luganda: Okukumpanya mu kulonda kulina okukoma.
Runyankore: Okwiba akaruuru kushemereire kuhwaho.
Acholi: Kwalo kwir omyero ogik woko
Ateso: Akoko aseo ekot osangak.
Lugbara: Le amama nga sa'wa opeta ni ri si ri ma asi ra.

English: Vote rigging should be condemned in the community.
Luganda: Okubba obululu kulina okuvumirirwa mu bitundu.
Runyankore: Okwiba oburuuru kushemereire kujumirirwa omu byanga.
Acholi: Kwalo kwir omyero pe dano ocwaki
Ateso: Akoko na aseo ekot aitoroniar kotunga.
Lugbara: Le voti oguza sawa ꞌbani voti ꞌbezurisiri ma asi ra.

English: Free and fair elections are the joy of all political candidates.
Luganda: Okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya ly'essanyu lya buli eyeesimbyewo.
Runyankore: Akaruuru akarimu amazima n'oburinganiza, nikwe kushemererwa kwa buri omwe oyesimbireho.
Acholi: Yer ki kuc labongo ayela obedo yomcwiny pa lucungu wii bye ducu
Ateso: Aseo na najokan ka ailajara nes iyalamatar abwaak kere lu ipatei.
Lugbara: ꞌBani voti ꞌbezu onyamatara kokoru azini eꞌyo adasiri eri eꞌyo ꞌba dria pasopi ꞌdiyini leleri ꞌi

English: Violence during elections must stop.
Luganda: Emivuyo mu biseera by'okulonda girina okukoma.
Runyankore: Obwimukiriro omukuteera akaruuru bwine kurekyera aho.
Acholi: Tim gero ikare me bolo kwir omyero ogik woko
Ateso: Ekot aitanang amumu kotoma aseo.
Lugbara: Le aco sa'wa opeta ni ri si 'diyi ma tu pa ra.

English: Engaging in national politics takes time.
Luganda: Okwetaba mu byobufuzi by'eggwanga lyonna kutwala obudde.
Runyankore: Okwejumba omuby'obutegyeki bw'eihanga nikitwara obwire.
Acholi: Donyo ka pyem itela me lobo tero kare
Ateso: Alomar toma politiks eyangaikini apak.
Lugbara: ꞌBani fizu politiki wudrikurusiri ma aleari ni sawa ꞌdu ezu

English: Violent free elections are possible.
Luganda: Okulonda okutaliimu ffujjo kusoboka.
Runyankore: Akaruuru akatarimu bwimukiriro, nikabaasika
Acholi: Yer labongo tim gero obedo gin ma twero time
Ateso: Aseo na emamei amumu kotoma epedorio aitolot.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eco Voti ꞌbezu ngiringiri kokoru ra.

English: Some election methods are not fair.
Luganda: Enkola z'okulonda ezimu si za bwenkanya.
Runyankore: Emiringo emwe ey'okuteera akaruuru teri mirungi.
Acholi: Yoo me yer mogo pe tye mupore
Ateso: Icie iwaitin lu itolosere aseo mam ejokuka.
Lugbara: Geri ꞌbani vori ꞌbezu ꞌdiyi ma azi ovuni onyiru ku.

English: Every after an election, candidates results are announced.
Luganda: Buli luvannyuma lw'okulonda, ebivudde mu nkulonda kw'abeesimbyewo birangirirwa.
Runyankore: Ahanyima y'akaruuru koona akarikuteerwa, ebyarugamu biine kurangirirwa.
Acholi: Inge bolo kwir ducu, gimiyo adwogi kwi pa lucungu weng
Ateso: Akaulo na kangin aseo, elimorio akiro abwaak.
Lugbara: Voti dria ma vutia, ꞌba agata ꞌba pa sopi ꞌdiyini ꞌdiyi olu

English: The incumbent shall lose if not careful.
Luganda: Ali mu buyinza bajja kuwangulwa bw'ateegendereze.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi oriho obwahati naabaasa kusingwa yaaba ategyendesereize
Acholi: Latela matye I loc ite kare ni ka pe ogwoke obi poto
Ateso: Epedori lo lem ejai sek aibiror arai mam ecoot.
Lugbara: ꞌBa engapi paliamenitia niri ka adri mile be ku eri nga eꞌdera.

English: Are public rallies necessary?
Luganda: Enkungaana z'olujjudde zeetaagisa?
Runyankore: Enteerane ezirikubaho abantu baingi nizetengwa?
Acholi: Guru dano kacel pi winyo lok pa lutela mite?
Ateso: Biyai edolit atukonokin itunga?
Lugbara: Eꞌyo ꞌbani oꞌbi yi ma ti odazuri eri orodriru ya?

English: It is okay for one to be politically independent.
Luganda: Tekirina buzibu omuntu kwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina.
Runyankore: Nikikirizibwa omuby'obutegyeki omuntu kuguma ateine kibiina.
Acholi: Opore pi ngat moo keken me bedo mapejenge i kom dul moo keken matye kamito tela
Ateso: Emamei ationis kanu itunganan abwaa kwape obonipe.
Lugbara: Eri orodriru ꞌba alu aluni adrizu eꞌyo politikinisi ima ngulupisi

English: Voters should be informed about elections to avoid chaos.
Luganda: Abalonzi balina okutegeezebwa ku bikwata ku kulonda okusobola okwewala obuvuyo.
Runyankore: Abateezi b'akaruuru bashemereire kwegyesibwa babaase kwetantara obwimukiriro.
Acholi: Lubolkwir omyero giminigi ngec me bolo kwir wek lweny obed pe
Ateso: Ekot aitijeninikin aseak nu ikamunitos aseo kanu aitikokin amumu.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba ma ece eꞌyo ꞌba voti ꞌbepi ꞌdiyi dri ngiringiri kalulu ꞌbezaniri ma dria ra

English: Village mobilisers are recruited ahead of time.
Luganda: Abakunzi b'omu byalo balondebwa ng'obudde bukyali.
Runyankore: Abarikuraarika abantu omubyaro, nibabataho bukiri kare.
Acholi: Joo ma kelo lwak kacel icaro mapatpat gicoyogi itic con
Ateso: Itolomio aramak itunga ocaaloi erongo apak.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌba ꞌbayi ma ti okupi enyatia ꞌdiyi si drioru

English: Do you know the roles for the member of parliament?
Luganda: Omanyi emirimu gy'omubaka wa paalamenti?
Runyankore: Obujunanizibwa bw'omukiiki omu ishengyero n'obumanya?
Acholi: Ingeyo tic pa lamema me Parliament?
Ateso: Ijeni ijo aswam naka emeeba loka airabet kotoma airabet?
Lugbara: Mi ni azi ꞌba azi ngapi paliamenitia ꞌdiyini ꞌdiyi ra ya?

English: Many youths have decided to join politics in Kampala.
Luganda: Abavukuba bangi mu Kampala basazeewo okuyingira ebyobufuzi.
Runyankore: Eminyeeto emingi eshaziremu kwegaita omu by'obutegeki omu Kampala.
Acholi: Bulu mapol iKampala gumoko tamgi pidonyo ilok me tela
Ateso: Atumunak luipu alomasi toma politiks ko Kampala.
Lugbara: Ba ode karakara 'diyi fi politiki Kampala ni.

English: You can not vote if you don't have the National Identity Card.
Luganda: Tosobola kulonda nga tolina ndagamuntu.
Runyankore: Torikubaasa kuteera akaruuru waaba oteine endanga muntu.
Acholi: Pe itwero bolo kwir ka ipe ki lanyut ma megi onyo naconol ID
Ateso: Mam ijo ipedori aise arai mam ijo ijatatar keda akadi na akwap.
Lugbara: Mi econi voti 'be ku mi vu kadi omvele national ID ruri ka adri yo ri ya.

English: Every politician needs to be knowledgeable about their constituency.
Luganda: Buli munnabyabufuzi alina okuba ng'amanyi ebifa ku kitundu ky'akiikirira.
Runyankore: Omuntu weena omu by'obutegyeki ashemereire kuba naamanya byona ebiri omu omu kicweka eki arikujwekyera.
Acholi: Lucungu weng omyero gubed kingec mamako kabedo magity kacung iyeni
Ateso: Ekot kangol abwaan aijen nuikamunitos aiboisit ke.
Lugbara: Le ꞌba pa sopi ꞌdiyi ma ni pari yini pasozu aleniari kililiru.

English: Everyone can stand for a political office as long as they have the requirements.
Luganda: Buli muntu asobola okwesimbawo ku kifo ky'obukulembeze kasita aba ng'alina ebyetaagisa.
Runyankore: Buri omwe naabaasa kwesimba aha ntebe y'eby'obutegyeki, yaaba aine ebirikwetengwa.
Acholi: Ngat moo keken twero cung wek giyere ka ineni tye ki jami weng mamite me cungu
Ateso: Nginitunganan epedori aibwo kanu edio ofisi lo aseo bon ebe ijatatar ijo keda apapulai ka iboro lu ipudai.
Lugbara: Ba ciri eco pa tu ofisi politiki ni ni ma alea ni eri vu afa lele pa tuzu 'diyi ka aa dria ci ria.

English: Some politicians rigged elections to become members of parliament.
Luganda: Bannabyabufuzi abamu babba obululu okufuuka ababaka ba paalamenti.
Runyankore: Ab'eby'obutegyeki abamwe bakaiba akaruuru kugira ngu bahinduke abakiiki omwishengyero.
Acholi: Lutela mukene gukwalo kwir pi doko lumema me parliament
Ateso: Abwaak icie apotu okokwata aseo kanu araun imeeban luka airabet
Lugbara: ꞌBa pa sopi ꞌdiyi ma azi ogu ndra voti ogu ka mu paliamenitia ndo

English: Hospitals lack resources to treat patients of coronavirus.
Luganda: Amalwaliro tegalina bikozesebwa kujjanjaba balwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Amarwariro tigaine eby'okukozesa ebirikumara omu kuragurira abarwaire ba Korona.
Acholi: Odi yadi pe ki jami mamite pi tic i kom dano ma twoyo Coronavirus
Ateso: Emameatatar adekisia keda iswamasia kanu amukian adekak ekorona.
Lugbara: Arojo yi ma alea afa ꞌbani lele azo koronaniri atizu ꞌdiyi yo.

English: The ruling party strongly believes that they are going to win the upcoming elections.
Luganda: Ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kirina okukkiriza nti bajja kuwangula okulonda okujja.
Runyankore: Ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki kiine obwesigye bwingi ngu nikiza kusingura omu karuuru akarikwija.
Acholi: Party ma tye iker iloboman tamoni gibiloyo kwir matye kabino ianyim
Ateso: Apate lo ipugai eomit cut ebe ebuni aitelekar aseo na abunit.
Lugbara: Amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepiri eri aita be tre kini eyi mu opeta emupi 'diyi nde ni.

English: During elections, candidates spend more money on people to try and get their votes.
Luganda: Mu biseera by'okulonda, abeesimbyewo basaasaanya ssente nyingi mu bantu okugezaako okufuna obululu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Omu bwire bw'akaruuru, abesimbireho nibaha abantu esente nyingi ngu babasherurire oburuuru.
Acholi: Ikare me bolokwir, lucungu balo cente mapol me culu dano wek gubol igi kwir
Ateso: Kapak kana aseo, itwasamaete abwaak ikapun luipu kanu agwelegwelet abotin aseak.
Lugbara: Sa'wa opeta vurisi, 'ba karakara pa tu pi 'diyi robia ayu ndeni o'bi eyi ma dria eyi ma voti esuzu.

English: People in Entebbe did not turn up for youth elections.
Luganda: Abantu b' Entebbe tebajjumbira kulonda kw'abavubuka.
Runyankore: Abantu ba Entebe tibarejumbire omu karuuru k'okutoorana abebembezi b'eminyeeto.
Acholi: Dano matye Entebbe pe gunen iyub me yero lutela ba bulu
Ateso: Itunga luko Entebbe mam apotu opotu aseo naka atumunak.
Lugbara: Ba Entebbe a 'diyi emu opeta 'ba ode ni 'diyini 'diyi ma alea ku ye.

English: Current ministers are losing in the party elections.
Luganda: Baminisita abaliko bawangulwa mu kulonda kw'ebibiina.
Runyankore: Ba minisita abariho obwahati bariyo nibasingwa omu karuuru akarikubanza.
Acholi: Minista mapol matye igamente man tye ka poto matek ibolo kwir me party
Ateso: Iminisatan luejaas kopana ibironoros kotoma aseo naka ipatei
Lugbara: Minisita sawa ꞌdisi opia ꞌdiyi eꞌderia politikia eꞌde.

English: Politicians hire many village people to look for votes.
Luganda: Bannabyabufuzi bapangisa bannakyalo bangi okunoonya obululu.
Runyankore: Ab'ebyobutegyeki nibapangisa abantu baingi omu byaro kubasherurira oburuuru.
Acholi: Lucungu pango dano mapol ikin gangi me yenyo lubol kwir
Ateso: Itwasamaete abwaak itunga luko ocaalo aimo abotin.
Lugbara: Ba politikia 'diyi 'ba karakara caloa 'diyi ofe voti ndazu.

English: Politicians tell a lot of lies during campaigns.
Luganda: Bannabyabufuzi balimba nnyo mu biseera by'okunoonya obululu.
Runyankore: Ab'ebyobutegyeki nibagamba munonga ebishuba omu bwire bw'ehururu
Acholi: Lucungu loko lok goba mapol ikare me yenyo kwir
Ateso: Ineras abwaak iboro lu aisab kapak kana isupere aseeta
Lugbara: Ba politikia 'diyi enzo nze karakara sa'wa voti ndazu ri si.

English: Many secrets get revealed during campaigns.
Luganda: Ebyama bingi byogerebwa mu biseera by'okunoonya obululu.
Runyankore: Ebihama bingi nibishohora omu bwire bw'ehururu.
Acholi: Mung mapol kati ikare me yenyo kwir
Ateso: Ipudunos nuipu nu aiyeyea kapak kana isupere aseeta.
Lugbara: Siri karakara eyi efu sa'wa voti ngaza vurisi.

English: Chaos erupted when the chairman of electoral commission announced two winners for the same position.
Luganda: Akavuyo kaabalukawo ssentebe w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda bwe yalangirira abawanguzi babiri ku kifo kimu.
Runyankore: Hakabaho akaimukiriro, mukuru w'entebe yakakiiko k'eby'oburuuru kuyarangiriire abahanguzi babiri omu mwanya gumwe.
Acholi: Kuku-kuku obedo tye ikare ma wonkom me bolo kwir I party me NRM olwongo nying luloyo aryo pi kom acel
Ateso: Abu amumu obwangun ne abunio lokaplon eicolong loka erionget lo aseo olimoria elekarak iyarei lu aiboisit adiope.
Lugbara: Ngiringiri eꞌdo sawa ꞌba voti ma drileruri ni ꞌba iri yi lazu ꞌba agapi ꞌdiyi rurisi coti.

English: Shots were fired during the political party elections.
Luganda: Amasasi gaavuga mu kulonda kw'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi.
Runyankore: Omu karuuru k'ebibiina by'obutegyeki, amasasi gakateerwa.
Acholi: Gibayo ricac ikare me bolo kwir me yero lucungu ite party
Ateso: Aponi inomanarai imudun kuju kapak naka aseo.
Lugbara: Ba ogbi osu efi eyi sa'wa amuti politiki ni 'diyi ni eyi ma opeta eyi 'yezu ri si.

English: The least supported party in Ugandan also wants to participate in the upcoming elections.
Luganda: Ekibiina ekisinga obuwagizi obutono mu Uganda nakyo kyagala kwetaba mu kulonda okujja.
Runyankore: Ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekiine abashagiki bakye munonga nakyo nikyenda kwejumba omu karuuru akarikwija.
Acholi: Party ma dano macwako nok loyo weng bene mito cung iyer matye kabino ianyim
Ateso: Epate lo mam igangitai noi da ko Uganda ekot ajaikina toma aseo na ebunit.
Lugbara: Amuti politiki ni atita be werea ndeni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri le vini pa tu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea indi.

English: The members of parliament also have to go for nominations.
Luganda: Abakiise mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olukulu nabo balina okugenda okusunsulwa.
Runyankore: Abakiiki omu ishengyero nabo baine kugyenda omu kutooranwa
Acholi: Lumema me parliament bene omyero guwot kacone ite partygi ni gimito cung
Ateso: Imeeban luka airabet da ajai ber alosit kanu aiwadikaun.
Lugbara: Memba kolosenini ꞌdiyi vini mu opeta ru sizuri ma alia indi.

English: The ruling party is ready to compete in the upcoming elections.
Luganda: Ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kyeteefuteefu okuvuganya mu kulonda okujja.
Runyankore: Ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki kyetekateekire kuhajaana omu karuuru akarikwija.
Acholi: Party matye iker tye atera me pyem I yer matye kabino anyim
Ateso: Epate lo ipugai ekapakina abolobol kotoma aseo na ebunit.
Lugbara: Amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepiniri eri ngonde baka sezu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea.

English: The president observed the chaos in the party elections.
Luganda: Pulezidenti yeetegerezza obuvuyo mu kulonda kw'ekibiina.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi w'eihanga aketegyereza akavuyo omu karuuru k'ekibiina.
Acholi: Ladit lobo oneno kuku-kuku ma obedo tye ikare me yer ite party
Ateso: Abu lokapolon akwap owanyu amumu kotoma aseo na epate.
Lugbara: Dricere kariniri ngiringiri opeta ma alia ꞌdiyi ndre lili.

English: Many of the current member of parliaments lost in their party elections.
Luganda: Bangi ku bakiise abali mu paalamenti baawangulwa mu kulonda kw'ekibiina kyabwe.
Runyankore: Abakiiki b'omwishengyero baingi abariho obwahati, bakasingwa omu karuuru k'ebibiina byabo akabandize.
Acholi: Pol lumema me parliament man gupoto kwir iye me party
Ateso: Imeeban luka airabet luipu apotu ibiroros kotoma aseo na ipatei kec.
Lugbara: Memba kolosenini sawa ꞌdisi ꞌdiyi ma azi karakara ꞌdiyi eꞌde votia ra

English: Nowadays people go in for politics because they want a good salary.
Luganda: Ennaku zino abantu bagenda mu byobufuzi kubanga baagala omusaala omulungi.
Runyankore: Ebiro ebi abantu nibaza omu by'obutegyeki ahabw'omushaara mwingi.
Acholi: Ikinkareni, dano donyo itela pien gimito mucara madongo
Ateso: Apakio nu alomasi itunga toma politiks naarai ekotosi kesi eropit loepol.
Lugbara: O'du diyisi 'ba eyi pa tu politiki ma alea a'dusikuni eyi le musara ala ni.

English: Here are the political aspirants from the different parts of the country.
Luganda: Bano be beesimbyewo okuva mu bintundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Aba nibo besimbireho omu by'obutegyeki kuruga omu bicweka byeihanga ebitari bimwe.
Acholi: Man aye lucungu me kabedo mapatpat me Uganda
Ateso: Kane ejaas abwaak luka aiboisio nuegelegela kakwap.
Lugbara: Ba pa so pi politiki 'di ma alea angu ndundu kari 'dia ri eyi 'di.

English: Election malpractice is on the increase in that district.
Luganda: Emivuyo mu kulonda gyeyongera mu disitulikiti eyo.
Runyankore: Okwiba oburuuru kweyongyeire omu Disiturikiti.
Acholi: Kwalo kwir tye kamede matek tutal idistrict enoni
Ateso: Akoko na aseo iyata noi kodisitrikt.
Lugbara: voti oguza ma omgbo tu disitrikiti ꞌda ma alia angiri

English: The supporters protested over the women member of parliament results.
Luganda: Abawagizi beekalakaasa oluvannyuma lw'ebyava mu kulonda kw'omukiise omukyala.
Runyankore: Abashagiki bakahakanisa ebyarugire omu kutoorana abakazi abakiiki omu ishengyero
Acholi: Lubolkwir gujemo ikarema gimiyo adwogi me yer pa Luwang Mon iParliament
Ateso: Apotu egangitok idiyata kanu akiro nu aseo nuka angor.
Lugbara: ꞌBa voti ꞌbepi ꞌdiyi ngiringiri ꞌye agata oku memba koloseniniri ru ꞌdiyi vileri ma eꞌyosi

English: The mayoral seat elections have only the youth.
Luganda: Okulonda kw'entebe y'obwa mmeeya eriko bavubuka bokka.
Runyankore: Abarikuhajaanira entebe y'obwa meeya, n'eminyeeto yonka.
Acholi: Bulu keken aye tye kacung me bedo meya
Ateso: Aseo naka emeya erai atumunak bon ajaas.
Lugbara: Opeta meya ni 'diyi ma alea lu 'ba ode eyi.

English: Mayor elections will be carried out tomorrow.
Luganda: Okulonda kwa mmeeya kujja kubaawo enkya.
Runyankore: Akaruuru ka ba meeya, nikaza kuteerwa nyenkyakare
Acholi: Bolo kwir pi yero Meya kibi timo diki
Ateso: Aseo naka emeya itolosio moi.
Lugbara: Ba opeta meya ni 'diyi 'ye drusi.

English: Elections have to always be free and fair.
Luganda: Okulonda bulijjo kulina kuba kwa mazima na bwenkanya.
Runyankore: Akaruuru buriijo kaine kuba karungi kandi kaine oburinganiza.
Acholi: Yer omyero obed labongo kuku-kuku
Ateso: Ekot aseo orai najokan na ailajara.
Lugbara: Le kalulu ma aꞌa oꞌdu driasi eꞌyo kokoru azini onyiru.

English: The confusion in the elections has left me wondering if we have the best leaders.
Luganda: Okubuzaabuzibwa mu kulonda kundese neewuunya oba nga tulina abakulembeze abalungi.
Runyankore: Okuburabuzibwa omu karuuru kindeteire okwebuuza yaaba twine abeebembezi barungi
Acholi: Kuku-kuku mubedo tye iyer mukatoni oweko pwod atye ka tam kace watye ki lutela maber
Ateso: Eiguro lo ejai aseo alakaki eong abuonokin arai ija oni keda engarenok luabeit.
Lugbara: Abaza opeta 'diyi ma alea ri ku ma egata be tre kani drice'ba amavile 'diyi drice'ba kilili ndeni diyi yari.

English: A man is competing against his daughter in the general elections.
Luganda: Omusajja avuganya muwala we mu kulonda kwa bonna.
Runyankore: Omushaija ayetsimbire n'omuhara omu karuuru aka boona.
Acholi: Laco moo tye ka pyem ki nyare iyer matye kabinoni
Ateso: Eboloboloete etunganan keda akooke kotoma aseo napolon.
Lugbara: Agupi azi ni baka se i ma izi be opeta 'diyi ma alea.

English: Voter bribery is not a good thing.
Luganda: Okugulirira balonzi si kirungi
Runyankore: Okutugira abateezi b'akaruuru tikihikire.
Acholi: Wilo kwir pe gin maber
Ateso: Agwelegweleo na abotin mam erai ibore yen ejok.
Lugbara: Kalulu jeza robia feza 'ba kalulu 'bepi 'diyi ni risi ri eri e'yo kililiru ni ku.

English: Election results are supposed to be announced as soon as possible.
Luganda: Ebivudde mu kulonda biteekeddwa okulangirirwa amangu ddala nga bwe kisoboka.
Runyankore: Ebirugire omu karuuru, bishemereire kurangirirwa ahonaaho.
Acholi: Adwogi yer omyero gimi ngece con
Ateso: Akiro nu aseo nes ebeit alimor katipet.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma olu a'di eyi nde ki opeta eyi ma alea ni yari mbeleru

English: It requires unity within the party to win an election.
Luganda: Kyetaagisa obumu mu kibiina okuwangula akalulu.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho obumwe omu kibiina, okubaasa kusinga akaruuru.
Acholi: Omyero winye obed tye iparty pi kato yer
Ateso: Ekot aimorikikina kotoma opate kanu aitelekar aseo.
Lugbara: Eri le ti ecita ni amuti politiki ni 'diyini opeta eyi ndezu.

English: It is fair to give new candidates a chance to represent their parties.
Luganda: Kiba kya bwenkanya okuwa abeesimbyewo abaggya omukisa okukiikirira ebibiina byabwe.
Runyankore: N'eky'oburinganiza kuha abasya abeesimbireho omugisha okujwekyera ebibiina byabo.
Acholi: Ber kagimiyo kare ki dano manyen micung ite partygi
Ateso: Ejok aijaikin abwaak luitetiak arerengu kanu abwoikin ipatei kec.
Lugbara: Eri kililiru 'ba pa sopi opeta eyi ma alea o'diru 'diyini driwala fezu pa tuzu eyi ma 'ba eyi ma paria.

English: It has now become usual for politicians to conflict over positions.
Luganda: Kati kifuuse kya bulijjo bannabyabufuzi okukuubagana ku bifo.
Runyankore: Hati kihindukire ekya butoosha, okurwanira emyanya y'eby'obutegyeki.
Acholi: Odoko gin majwi pi lutela me bedo ka lweny ikingi pi tela
Ateso: Erai do kwana engunget kanejaas abwaak amaria aiboisio.
Lugbara: Eri curu'do e'yo azi i 'yepi sa'wa dria ni 'ba politikia 'diyini baka sezu driceta ma dria.

English: In their region, the mayoral seat has attracted four aspirants.
Luganda: Mu kitundu kyabwe, entebe y'obwammeeya yeesimbiddwako abantu bana.
Runyankore: Omu kyanga kyabo, entebe y'obwa meeya, abantu bana nibo bagyesimbireho.
Acholi: Ikabedogi, dano angwen tye kacung pi bedo meya
Ateso: Kaiboisit kec, itunga iwongon kes eboloboloete kanu emeya.
Lugbara: Eyi vile angua, 'ba su eyi tu pa ecazu meya ru ni.

English: We didn't vote because of failure to supply ballots at the polling station in our area.
Luganda: Tetwalonda olw'okulerererwa kutuusa obukonge mu kifo awalonderwa mu budde.
Runyankore: Titurateire karuuru, ahabw'okuba obupapura bw'okuteeza akaruuru tiburareesirwe omu  kicweka kyaitu.
Acholi: Pe wa bolokwir pien pegikelo jami bolokwir ikabedowa
Ateso: Mam iso apotu aseata kanu mam eyaunitere apapulai aboisit kosi na eseere.
Lugbara: Ama awi ni voti 'be kuye adusikuni 'ba awi ni karatasi kalulu 'bezu 'diyi eji ama vile angu kalulu 'bezuri ma alea kuye.

English: Our city mayor collapsed after he lost to his opponent.
Luganda: Meeya w'ekibuga kyaffe yazirika oluvannyuma lw'okuwangulwa amuvuganya.
Runyankore: Meeya w'orurembo rwaitu akagwa kihuumura, ahanyima y'okusingwa owaabaire amwesimbireho.
Acholi: Meya me citywa opoto owile woko inge rwenyo kwir bot lacungu mukene
Ateso: Abu emeya lo osite kosi iilor akaulo na etelekaria nges oupake.
Lugbara: Soki gba agu amavile aku ambo ri ma dri cepiri te 'ba erini agati otizu eribe ri ni eri ndezu 'bo ri ma vutia

English: I didn't vote because my name did not appear on the voters' register.
Luganda: Saalonda kubanga erinnya lyange teryalabikira mu lukalala lw'abalonzi.
Runyankore: Tindateire karuuru ahabw'okuba eiziina ryangye tirirareebekire omu kitabo ky'abateezi b'akaruuru.
Acholi: Pe abolokwir pien nyinga pe okati ikin nying lubolkwir
Ateso: Mam eong abu ase naarai emamei ekakiror oitabo kalo aseak.
Lugbara: Ma awi kalulu 'be kuye adusikuni ma ru awini e'da 'ba kalulu 'bepi 'diyi ma eselea kuye.

English: You should enter politics to serve not to exploit.
Luganda: Olina okuyingira ebyobufuzi kuweereza sso si kunyuunyuuta.
Runyankore: Oshemereire kuza omu by'obutegyeki kuheereza abantu, kutari kukyenkuuza abantu.
Acholi: Omyero idony itela pi tic pi lwak pe pi buru dano
Ateso: Ekot ijo alomar politiks kanu aijanakin mere aitwasam itunga.
Lugbara: Le mi ma fi politikia o'bi eyi dri azi ngazu adrini o'bi eyi onyazu ku.

English: l wonder why there is too much nepotism in the politics of our country.
Luganda: Neewuunya lwaki waliwo obusosoze bungi mu byobufuzi by'eggwanga lyaffe.
Runyankore: Ninyebuuza ahabw'enki hariho omuze gwa "ni mwene oha" omu by'obutegyeki bw'eihanga ryeitu.
Acholi: Pe angeyo pingo tic me yero wat tye madwong ikit me tela ilobo wa kany
Ateso: Mam eong ajeni ibore ilelebar ajena toma politiks lu akwap wok.
Lugbara: Ani ni e'yo suru suru ni 'diyi ga tre politiki kari ama vile 'di vuri ma alea 'dini a'dusi yari ku.

English: He asked us to go to the polling place and act as his poll watchers.
Luganda: Yatusaba okugenda awalonderwa tukole ng'abalondoozi be ab'okulonda.
Runyankore: Akatushaba ngu tuze omu mwanya gw'okuteereramu akaruuru tugume tukamukuumiire.
Acholi: Laconi olegawa me cito kama gibolo iye kwir wek wabed macalo luwange
Ateso: Abu ngesi alimok iso alosite aiboisit na eseere kanu aswam kwape angicak ke lu aseo.
Lugbara: Eri ai ama muzu pari 'bani kalulu 'bezu ri ma alea aa'zu 'ba i ma kalulu onepi 'diyiru.

English: After declaring her the winner, she threw a victory party right away.
Luganda: Oluvannyuma lw'okumulangirira ng'omuwanguzi, yategekerawo akabaga ak'obuwanguzi.
Runyankore: Ahanyima y'okumurangirira nk'omusinguzi, akakora akabaga k'obusinguzi ahonaaho.
Acholi: Inge waconi en aye oloyo, dakoni otugi lwongo yub me kwero loyone
Ateso: Akaulo na alimor etelekaran, abu ya ibwaik epucit lo ainumunum.
Lugbara: Bani agu ndepiri luzu 'bori ma vutia, oku 'da 'ba omu ima agata si.

English: There wasn't any kind of violence in elections at our home village.
Luganda: Tewaaliwo ffujjo lyonna mu kulonda ku kyalo kyaffe.
Runyankore: Omu kyaro kyaitu, tiharabairemu omuringo gw'akaimukiriro koona omu karuuru .
Acholi: Tele moo keken obedo pe ibolokwir ma icarowa
Ateso: Amamei amumu adio kotoma aseo na ocaalo kosi.
Lugbara: E'yo azi Aco ru ni andra sa'wa opeta vurisi ama vile caloa yo.

English: One of the supporters was severely injured while jubilating his win.
Luganda: Omu ku bawagizi yakosebwa nnyo bwe yali ajaguza obuwanguzi bwe.
Runyankore: Omwe aha bahagizi, akahutaazibwa munonga, ariikujaguza obusinguzi.
Acholi: Labolkwir acel onongo awano marac tutwal ikare ma en tye ka kwero loyo pa latelane
Ateso: Idiopet kotoma egangitok ke abu imusungun inumunumei aitelekar ke.
Lugbara: Agu azi eri atipi ni esu nya'biliko eyi onzi onzi erini ayiko zuria eri ma agata si.

English: A given section of Ugandans has violated the voting guidelines this year.
Luganda: Bannayuganda abamu bavvodde ebiragiro by'okulonda omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda abamwe, baribatiriire ebiragiro by'okuteera akaruuru omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Tye dano mukene iUganda ma guturucik ma lube ki lok me bolokwir imwakani
Ateso: Itunga luipu ko Uganda, amengata ikisila luka aseo okaru lo.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma azi onyo azita 'bale kalulu ni eli 'disi 'diyi ra.

English: The contestants have not agreed with the results declared in the elections.
Luganda: Abavuganya tebakkiriziganya n'ebyavudde mu kulonda ebyalangiriddwa.
Runyankore: Ababaire beesimbireho tibakaikiriize ebirangiriirwe kuruga omu karuuru.
Acholi: Lucungu peye guyee adwogi me yer maokatini
Ateso: Mam abwaak apotu ocamutu akiro nu alimorio kotoma aseo.
Lugbara: Ba agati otipi kalulua ri gaki agata 'bani ofu kalulu nde ma alea ri si.

English: His popularity made him a successful politician in the country.
Luganda: Obumanyifu bwe bwamufuula munnabyabufuzi ow'amaanyi mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Okukundwa kwe, kumuhindwire omusinguzi omu by'obutegyeki omu ihanga.
Acholi: Yweka mamege aye oweko en obedo latela ma kwiri ilobo man
Ateso: Abu akejenara iajaik nges araun abwaan lo erereng kakwap.
Lugbara: Nita o'biyi ni eri nizuri fe erini ecazu drileba ru ni ru politiki kari 'dini ri ma alea.

English: He retained the card for the party flag bearer for the upcoming general elections
Luganda: Yasigaza kkaadi y'okukwatira ekibiina bendera mu kulonda kwa bonna okujja.
Runyankore: Akasigaza kaadi y'ekibiina, okukikwatira bendera omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija.
Acholi: Giyero en doki pi cungu ite partyne iyer matye kabinoni
Ateso: Abu ngesi ibwoko bobo amedera na epate kanu aseo kana ebunit.
Lugbara: Eri esu karatasi pa sozu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea ivile amuti politiki niri vuri dika.

English: Journalists have been urged to cover the coming elections without fear.
Luganda: Bannamawulire basabiddwa okulondoola okulonda okujja awati kutya.
Runyankore: Abanyamahurire, bashabirwe kuheereza omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija bataine kutiina kwona.
Acholi: Gilego lumii lok angeya me tic labongo lworo kun gimiyo lok i kom yer matye anyimi
Ateso: Arotak iyemuto kes esinyikokin airot akiro nu aseo kana ebunit komam akurianu.
Lugbara: Ba ai 'ba osisia ni 'diyi e'yo sizu azini e'yo nzezu opeta emupi 'diyi ma dria ori koko.

English: Small voter involvement in the district and mayoral polls is attributed to no campaigns.
Luganda: Obwetabi bw'abalonzi abatono mu disitulikiti n'okulonda okw'obwa mmeeya kyesigamiziddwa ku butanoonya bululu.
Runyankore: Omuhendo mukye gw'abantu abeejumbire omu karuuru ka disiturikiti hamwe n'entebe y'obwa meeya, gureesirwe eibura ry'ehururu nainga kampeini.
Acholi: Dano manok matye ki miti me niang lok pa lucungu me tela idistrik ki bedo meya obedo adwogi me bitokwir ma pe ka time
Ateso: Ajaikina na itunga kalu ikidioko aseo kodisitrikt ka aseo na emeya nes erai kanu amamus na aisup itunga.
Lugbara: E'yo 'ba were eyini kalulu 'bezu opeta districti ni azini meya ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri ti odaza ako si.

English: Violence in elections can be caused by a number of unlawful acts.
Luganda: Obutabanguko mu okulonda busobola okuleetebwa ebikolwa bingi ebitali mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Obwimukiriro omu karuuru, nikirugirira aha bikorwa bingi by'okutakuratira mateeka.
Acholi: Lweny ikare me yer twero bedo macalo adwogi me turucik mapol
Ateso: Ipu iboro luarokok eyangaunenete amumu kotoma aseo.
Lugbara: E'yo ngiringiri ni opeta eyi ma alea 'diyi efu e'yo 'yeza azita palaa ku ri si.

English: The leaders have come together to develop their nations.
Luganda: Abakulembeze beegasse wamu okukulaakulanya amawanga gaabwe.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi bakwataniise hamwe, okutunguura amahanga gaabo.
Acholi: Lutela lobo guribe kacel pi dongo lobegi
Ateso: Apotu engarenok aimorikikin nepepe aitopol akwapin kec.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'diyi eciti tualu eyi vile kari 'diyi ezozu.

English: Political parties should evaluate themselves to improve.
Luganda: Ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi birina okwekubamu ttooki okwetereeza.
Runyankore: Ebibiina by'obutegyeki bishemereire kweshwijuma, kugira ngu bitunguuke.
Acholi: Party acel-acel omyero gungi maber kor ticgi wek gunen kwene ma mito ayuba
Ateso: Ekot ipatei aining eswamae kec kanu ajokiar.
Lugbara: Le amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma one e'yo eyi ma driari eyini ani zozu.

English: That political party has lost its value.
Luganda: Ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekyo kiweddemu ensa.
Runyankore: Ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekyo tikikiine mugasho.
Acholi: Party enoni dong odoko goro tutwal
Ateso: Adaun epate ameda ke.
Lugbara: Amuti politiki ni 'da ma orodri curu'do yo.

English: Every politician is trying to gain support because of the upcoming elections.
Luganda: Buli munnabyabufuzi agezaako okunoonya obuwagizi olw'okulonda okujja.
Runyankore: Buri muntu omu by'obutegyeki, naagyezaho kutunga abashagiki, omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija.
Acholi: Lucungu weng tye ka mito cwak pi kwir matye kabinoni
Ateso: Ngol abwaan ekot aikeun agangat kanu aseo kana ebunit.
Lugbara: Ba politikia 'diyi dria atita nda opeta emu pi 'diyi ma e'yo si .

English: We are in the last week of campaigns for presidential elections.
Luganda: Tuli mu wiiki esembayo ey'okunoonya akalulu k'obwa pulezidenti.
Runyankore: Turi omu sande y'ahamuheru, omu hururu z'akaruuru k'okutoorana omwebembezi w'eihanga.
Acholi: Watye icabit me agiki me bito kwir pi Tela me bedo ladit lobo
Ateso: Ija oni osabiti lo awasia lo isupere aseeta kanuka lokapolon akwap.
Lugbara: Di weeki asizu opeta purezidenti vuri ni voti ndazu ri i.

English: This election race is between the two prominent families in Kasubi.
Luganda: Okuvuganya kw'okulonda kuno kuli wakati  wa famire ebbiri ez'amaanyi mu Kasubi.
Runyankore: Akaaruuru aka, kari ahagati y'amaka abiri agarikumanywa munonga omuri Kasubi.
Acholi: Pyem me tela man tye ikin gangi aryo muywek I Kasubi
Ateso: Erai aseo na kiding ikalia iyarei lu ejenara ko Kasubi.
Lugbara: Baka seza opeta 'di ma alea ri eri aku azi iri okporu kasubi a ni eyi ma eselea.

English: The two opposition candidates are working on a coalition before the national elections.
Luganda: Abeesimbyewo biri abali ku ludda oluvuganya bali mu nteesaganya y'okwegatta ng'okulonda tekunnatuuka.
Runyankore: Babiri abeesimbireho omu bibiina ebirikuhakanisa Gavumenti, nibateekateeka kukora omukago, akaruuru k'Eihanga aka boona katakatandikire.
Acholi: Lucungu me party aryo ma pe gitye iker gitye ka yenyo yor me tic kacel ma bolokwir peya otime
Ateso: Abwaak iyarei lu itepegitos apugan iswamaete nepepe erongo aseo.
Lugbara: Ba azi iri pa tupi politikia amuti kari ma dri cepiri niri ma tikitiki si ku 'diyi azi nga tiecita ma dria de nga po'di opeta eyi ecani ku.

English: A tight parliamentary race in the East is normally characterised with the violation of the law
Luganda: Okuvuganya okw'amaanyi ku bubaka bwa paalamenti mu buvanjuba kutera okubeeramu okumenya amateeka.
Runyankore: Okuhakanira entebe y'eishengyero omu burugw'izooba, buriijo nikuba kurimu akeimukiriro n'okuhenda ebiragiro.
Acholi: Pyem me tela pi cito I parliament itung wok ceng me Uganda polkare bedo matek tutwal dok turu cik bene time
Ateso: Abolobolo naka Imeeban luka airabet na etiono ko East Africa eupanara duc keda amengenen naka
Lugbara: Baka seza okporu 'ba memba koloseni ni etuni efuria leru ri ni sawa driasi ovu e'yo azita nyoza niri be.

English: Enrolment of unproven people into politics by the president will break the ruling party.
Luganda: Pulezidenti okuyingiza abantu abatakakasiddwa mu byobufuzi kijja kusuula ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza.
Runyankore: Enkora y'Omwebembezi weihanga okwikiriza abantu abatahikiriire omuby'obutegyeki, neija kushisha ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki.
Acholi: Coyo dano ma ticgi pengene i tic tela ma ladit lobo tye katimo bi kelo peko madit i kom dul matye i ker ni
Ateso: Aiwadikao na itunga lu mam itigogongoritai toma politiks lokapolon akwap emunari epate.
Lugbara: Ba nile ku Purezidenti ni ofi politikia 'diyi nga amuti politiki ni kari ma dri cepiri anzu ra.

English: Former members of Cabinet are in the race to become members of parliament.
Luganda: Abaaliko bammemba ba kabinenti bali mu kuvuganya kufuuka babaka ba paalamenti.
Runyankore: Abaabaireho ba minisita b'eihanga, obwahati besimbireho kuhakanira entebe y'okujwekyera abantu omwishengyero.
Acholi: Dano macon gubedo minista gutyeko kati ka cungu me dok iparliament
Ateso: Ejaas iminisitan lusek abolobol kanu araun imeeban luka airabet
Lugbara: Agu ndra minisita ru 'diyi sa'disi di agati otiria ecazu memba koloseni ni ru.

English: With a few resources, teachers continue delivering exciting and effective lessons.
Luganda: N'ebyokukozesa ebitono, abasomesa bakyagenda mu maaso n'okusomesa mu ngeri ennyuvu era ennungi.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa bagumiizemu nibeegyesa abaana omu muringo murungi ogurikushemeza, n'obu baraabe bateine bikwato ebirikumara.
Acholi: Kuna cente ki jami pwony pe tye maber, lupwonyo tye kamede ki miyo pwony i yo maber
Ateso: Keda ikapun lu ikidioko, inyikokitos isianakinak aswam kec ejok.
Lugbara: Afa ayule imbatani capi ku 'diyi ma tala si, imba'ba eyi mu drile imbata ndrizaru azini azi ngapi ra 'diyi fe.

English: As athletics fans, we are proud to have the fastest runner from our country.
Luganda: Nga abanyumirwa emisinde, twenyumiriza mu kubeera n'omuddusi asinga okuva mu nsi yaffe.
Runyankore: Nkaitwe abarikukunda omuzaano gw'okwiruka, nitwesiima okureeba ngu omwiruki osingire, arugire omu Ihanga ryaitu.
Acholi: Macalo dano mamaro neno pyem ngwec, watye ki awaka matek pi bedo ki langwec madwir loyo weng iwilobo ma oa ki iUganda
Ateso: Kwape egangitok akiro nu akerit, ipoga iso ajaut keda akeran lo etirono kakere kakwap wok.
Lugbara: Ba ongu ma abala lepi saaru 'diyiru, ama ovu ayikosi agu ongu be ndeni ri ni engazu kari amavile ri ma alea ri si.

English: I  salute to our nation!
Luganda: Nteekamu ekitiibwa ensi yaffe!
Runyankore: Eihanga ryeitu nindiha ekitiinisa.
Acholi: Acwalo mot bot lobowa man
Ateso: Esiyalamikit eong akwap wok.
Lugbara: Afe inzita kari ama dri 'dini.

English: This day is celebrated on October ninth of every year.
Luganda: Olunaku luno lukuzibwa nga mwenda ogwekkumi buli mwaka.
Runyankore: Eizooba eri nirijaguzibwa ebiro mwenda okwezi kweikumi buri mwaka.
Acholi: Nino man gikwero I ninodwer abungwen me dwer me apar imwaka ducu
Ateso: Erai na aparan na inumunumio olap lo itomonet ngol ekaru.
Lugbara: Ba o'du 'diri inzi imba mudri imba o'du oromi si eli driasi.

English: She is anxiously waiting for the release of the results.
Luganda: Yeesunze okufulumizibwa kw'ebyavuddemu.
Runyankore: Arindiriire ebirugire omu kubuuzibwa n'ekihika kingi.
Acholi: En tye kakuru adwogi peny maotimo
Ateso: Idarit ngesi noi alimorio na akiro.
Lugbara: Eri o'du 'bani obeta eyi ma agata oluzuri te rua yaza be.

English: The headteacher was awarded a token of appreciation.
Luganda: Omukulu w'essomero yaweereddwa akalabo okumwebaza.
Runyankore: Mukuru weishomero akaheebwa ekiconco kumusiima.
Acholi: Ladit Gangkwan onongo mic pi tic matek
Ateso: Aponi oropai apolon esomero keda ainakinet na isiyalamikinet.
Lugbara: Ba fe dricere ni afa azi were awa'difo 'yozu.

English: After the announcement of her results, she collapsed.
Luganda: Oluvannyuma lw'okulangirira ebyavuddemu bye, yazirise.
Runyankore: Ahanyima y'okurangirira ebyarugiremu, akagwa kihuumura.
Acholi: Ingeye ma gityeko tito adwogi yer, dakoni opoto piny owile woko
Ateso: Akaulo alimorio na akiro ke, abu ngesi ibiror kwap.
Lugbara: Bani erima agata oluzu 'bori ma vutia soki gbaa oku nde te.

English: The minister gives tokens of appreciation to the best teachers every year.
Luganda: Minisita awa obulabo bw'okwebaza eri omusomesa abeera asinze buli mwaka.
Runyankore: Minisita naahereza abeegyesa abarungi munonga ebiconco buri mwaka
Acholi: Minista miyo mic me pwoyo lupwonye matiyo matek mwaka ki mwaka
Ateso: Ijanakini eminista ainanakineta nu isialamikitere isisianakinak ngol ekaru.
Lugbara: Minisita ni afa were eyi fe awa'difo 'yozu imba'ba ala ndeni 'diyi dri eli driasi.

English: Poverty is one of the reasons that led to child marriage.
Luganda: Obwavu y'emu ku nsonga eziviirako abaana okufumbirwa.
Runyankore: Obworo niyo nshonga eyaatumire abaishiki bashwerwa bakiri bato.
Acholi: Can obedo lok acel ma weko lutino nyome con
Ateso: Ican kes idiopet koboro ijaikit idwe edukonokinos.
Lugbara: Alio ni e'yo azi fepi anzi eyi ma elini cazu ku diyini eyi 'duzu ni.

English: It is good to improve skills and promote the talents of the girl child.
Luganda: Kirungi okwongera ku bukugu n'okukulaakulanya ebitone by'omwana omuwala.
Runyankore: Nikirungi okutunguura emyoga n'okushagika etaraanta y'omwana w'omwishiki.
Acholi: Ber me miyo diro tic ki anyira ki konyogi me tic ki diro maginywalo gi kwede
Ateso: Ejok aikeun acoa kanu aitopoloria aswamisinei nuka ikoku yen ipese.
Lugbara: Eri muke ondua otuzu azini ava fezu ezuanzi yini ani ecozu e'yo eyini 'ye drisi geri ndusi 'diyi 'yezu.

English: Our teachers who put in more efforts in teaching learners were greatly rewarded.
Luganda: Abasomesa baffe abateekamu ennyo amaanyi mu kusomesa abayizi baasiimiddwa nnyo.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa baingi abarikuta amaani maingi omu kwegyesa abaana, bakasiimwa munonga.
Acholi: Lupwonyewa magutiyo matek gunongo mic mabeco
Ateso: Isisianakinak wok lu iswamaete agogong aisisianakin esisiak aponi oropai ejok noi.
Lugbara: Ama imba'ba ava 'bapi ndeni anzi eyi imbaria 'diyi esu driadria eyi saaru.

English: Good luck to all candidates.
Luganda: Mikisa myereere eri bakandidetisi bonna.
Runyankore: Abarikwenda kugyezesibwa boona nimbendeza obusinguzi.
Acholi: Walego gum maber pi lutino ducu matye kapenye
Ateso: Amunor eong arerengu najokan nejaas esisiak.
Lugbara: Ba dria agati otipi 'diyi ma drile ma susu.

English: She handed in incomplete documents which led to the rejection of her loan application.
Luganda: Yawaddeyo empapula ezitawera ekyaviiriddeko okugaana okusaba kwe okwa looni.
Runyankore: Akatayo ebihandiiko bitahikire, ekyatumire okushaba kwe kwa rooni kuteikirizibwa.
Acholi: Dakoni pe otito lok weng mamite iwaragane en aye oweko pe ogamo lim den
Ateso: Abu ngesi oyanga apapulai nu mam adolitos nuda opotu ijaikisi egirio alipan ke na eloni.
Lugbara: Eri feni karatasi lele 'diyi dri ku ye 'bani ani eri ma waraga mari aizu ri lizu va.

English: Uganda Cranes are warming up for a match with Burundi.
Luganda: Ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere yeetegekera mupiira ne burundi.
Runyankore: Aba tiimu y'omupiira ey'Eihanga eya Uganda, nibeteekateekyera omupiira gwabo na Burundi.
Acholi: Lutuk odilo me Uganda Cranes tye kayube me tuku ki Burundi
Ateso: Uganda Cranes kes ekapanakinos aboliakin keda etimu loko Burundi.
Lugbara: Anzi mupira avipi kari Uganda niri ni omvele Uganda cranes ru 'diyi eyi otu mupira abala ni kari Burundi niri be.

English: District officers are ready to provide free services to the needy.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti beetegefu okuwa obuweereza obw'obwereere eri abeetaavu.
Runyankore: Abakozi baha Disiturikiti, beteekateekire kuhisya obuheereza obwa busha aha booro.
Acholi: Ludito ma idistrik tye atera me miyo kony me nono bot lupeko
Ateso: Eswamak luko disitrikt kes ekapakina aijanakin itunga lu ican.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi districtia 'diyi ngonde atita fezu 'ba lepira 'diyi ni aje kokoru.

English: The teachers should attend to the learner's needs equally.
Luganda: Abasomesa balina okufa ku byetaago by'abayizi kyenkanyi.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa bashemereire kuhurikiza abeegi boona ebi barikwetenga batarikushoroora.
Acholi: Lupwonye omyero gumii pwony ki lutino weng marom
Ateso: Ekot esisianakinak aingaranakin esisiak ne ejaunor eipuda.
Lugbara: Le imba'ba eyi ma fe dri e'yo anzi onita onipi 'diyi niri ma dria trotro.

English: Immunisation is important to prevent the killer diseases.
Luganda: Okugema kwa mugaso okutangira endwadde zi nnamutta.
Runyankore: Okusirika n'okw'omugasho, okuzibira endwara ezirikwita.
Acholi: Gwere piretek me gengo two maneko dano
Ateso: Ejok aikis ekato kanu aitikitik adekasinei.
Lugbara: Aro soza eri orodriru azo 'ba o'dipi ewakoko 'diyi atrizu.

English: Early childhood centres should emphasize reading skills.
Luganda: Amasomero g'abaana abato galina okussa essira ku bukugu mu kusoma.
Runyankore: Emyanya yoona erikutendeka abaana bato eshemereire kuta omutima aha kubeegyesa emyoga y'okushoma.
Acholi: Kabedo magiyubu pi konyo lutino matino omyero guneni lutino tye ka pwonyo kwan
Ateso: Isomeroi lu idwe ekot aisingarenit nu aisiom.
Lugbara: Le pari anzi nyiri eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma 'ba okpo laata ma dria.

English: There is a new way of checking learners academic progress.
Luganda: Waliwo engeri empya ey'okukebera ku nsoma y'abayizi.
Runyankore: Hariho enkora nsya y'okukyebera emishomere y'omwana.
Acholi: Tye yoo manyen me neno niang ki ngec pa lutino kwan
Ateso: Ejai eipone lo irereonerere esisiae lo asiomak.
Lugbara: Geri azi o'dini curu'do anzi onita onipi 'diyi ma omgbo onita alea ri o'bizu ci.

English: Ugandans are happy for the achievement of their football team.
Luganda: Bannayuganda basanyufu olw'obuwanguzi obutuukiddwako ttiimu yaabwe ey'omupiira gw'ebigere.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda bashemereirwe ahabw'okusingura kwa tiimu yaabo y'omupiira.
Acholi: Anywali me Uganda tye ki yomcwiny pi kit ma lutuku odilo tye katuku kwede
Ateso: Iyalamasi itunga luko Uganda kanu eswamae loka etimu kec lo emopira.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ayikosi agata anzi mupira avipi kari Uganda ni 'diyi vurisi.

English: The ministry should improve supervision to uplift the standard of public schools.
Luganda: Minisitule erina okwongera ku kulambula amasomero ga gavumenti okusobola okutumbula omutindo gwago.
Runyankore: Minisiture eshemereire kwongyera eby'okurambura amashomero, okubaasa kwimusya omutindo gw'amashomero ga Gavumenti.
Acholi: Ministry omyero omed rwom me doro tic pa gangikwan pa gamente wek rwom me kwan omede
Ateso: Ekot erionget aiteteun emanimane kanu aikeun adoketait na isomeroi.
Lugbara: Le arakala onita niri ma 'ba okpo sukulu yi andrizi ani ecozu agata sukulu o'biyi niria ri engazu uru beni.

English: Parents have offered five water dispensers to boost hygiene in the school.
Luganda: Abazadde bawaddeyo disipensa z'amazzi ttaano okutumbula obuyonjo mu ssomero.
Runyankore: Abazaire bahaireyo obwoma butaano bw'okunyweramu amaizi , okwongyera aha mutindo gw'obuyonjo omu ishomero.
Acholi: Lunyodo gumiyo jami abic me jolo pii amata pi mede rwom me lengo igangkwan
Ateso: Auriak kes ejaikisi esomero aboro nu akipi kanu aidaria aila.
Lugbara: Tipika eyi owi afajo yi ta mbazu azini yi awazu towi ni eyi alata ma omgbo sukulu 'da ma alea ri otuzu.

English: Officials have given opening remarks for a two days education conference.
Luganda: Abakungu bawadde obubaka obuggulawo olukiiko lw'ebyensoma olw'ennaku ebbiri.
Runyankore: Abakuru bahaire orubazo rw'okwiguraho oruteerane rw'eby'obwegyese orw'ebiro bibiri.
Acholi: Luloc gumiyo lok pi yabo kacoke man ma mako lok i kom kwan
Ateso: Eswamak kes ejaikisi nukec aomisio kanu ikamunitos airiamun na ajaikina naka aisisia.
Lugbara: Drice'ba eyi nze e'yo 'ba eyi aizu okuza azi onita ni ni ma ti zizu 'bo.

English: Educational institutions should put more emphasis on practical education and skills.
Luganda: Amasomero galina okuteeka essira ku masomo g'emikono n'obukugu.
Runyankore: Amatendekyero agaheiguru, gashemereire kuta amaani omu kwegyesa eby'emikono.
Acholi: Gangi kwan mamalo omyero gutii matek me miyo pwony ki diro tic bot lutino
Ateso: Isomeroi kes ekoto aibwaikin agogong naepol toma aisisia na etamanario ka acoa.
Lugbara: Le pari onita vile 'diyi ma 'ba okpo angiri onita afa edele drisi 'diyi vuri ma dria.

English: The minister is determined to improve the education system.
Luganda: Minisita mumalirivu okutumbula ebyensoma.
Runyankore: Minisita ayehaireyo kwimusya omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese.
Acholi: Minista tye katic matek me nenoni kit me kwan oyube
Ateso: Eminista nges ekapakina aikeun adoketait na asioman.
Lugbara: Minisita eri adri ava be angiri onita ma e'yo otuzu.

English: Candidates have received guidelines for their final examinations.
Luganda: Abayizi abali mu bibiina eby'akamalirizo bafunye okulambikibwa mu bigezo byabwe eby'akamalirizo.
Runyankore: Abarikweteekateekyera ebigyezo by'ahamuheru, baheirwe ebiragiro by'okukuratira.
Acholi: Lutinokwan ma gubipenye otyeko nongo kic mamako penygi me agiki
Ateso: Esisiak kes adumutu aicoreta kanu aingito kec.
Lugbara: Anzi obeta 'yepi 'diyi esu azita obeta eyini dezu ri ma dria 'bo.

English: Schools have been urged to put the new curriculum into practice.
Luganda: Amasomero gasabiddwa okuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka y'ebisomesebwa empya.
Runyankore: Amashomero gashabirwe okuta engyenderwaho y'okwegyesa ensya omu nkora.
Acholi: Gityeko ka lego gangikwan wek guket itic pwony manyen magilokoni
Ateso: Isomeroi kes esinyikokitai aitwasam ainapeta nuka aisisiaeta nutetiak.
Lugbara: Ba ai sukulu eyi e'dozu geri 'bani 'ba embazu ofule o'diru 'di ayuzu.

English: The minister has awarded the best teachers in the country.
Luganda: Minisita awadde abasomesa abasinga mu ggwanga ebirabo.
Runyankore: Minisita, asiimire abegyesa abarikukirayo oburungi omu Ihanga
Acholi: Minista omiyo mic me pwoyo lupwonyo makwiri loyo weng iUganda kulu
Ateso: Eminista nges arop isisianakinak luajokak kakere kakwap.
Lugbara: Minisita fe driadria imba'ba ala ndeni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.

English: The Rugby Cranes are one of the best teams in the tournament.
Luganda: Ttiimu y'eggwanga eya lagibe y'emu ku ttiimu ezisinga mu mpaka.
Runyankore: Tiimu eya Rugby Cranes n'emwe ahari tiimu ezirikukirayo oburungi omu mpaka ezi.
Acholi: Lutuku me Rugby Cranes obedo dul acel ikin dule mukene matuku maber tutwal
Ateso: Etimu loka Rugby Cranes nes ediopet lo egogong kakere kotoma abolobol.
Lugbara: Kari anzi avita omvele rugby ru 'di avipi kari Uganda ni 'diyi amuti abala 'da ma alea ala ndeni 'diyi ma azi.

English: City authorities urge schools to support children's talents.
Luganda: Aboobuyinza mu kibuga basaba amasomero okuyambako mu kutumbula ebitone by'abaana.
Runyankore: Ab'obushoborozi omu rurembo, nibashaba amashomero okushagika etaranta z'abaana.
Acholi: Lutela me city kwayo gangikwan wek gukony lutino me ngeyo diro maginywalogi kwede
Ateso: Apedorosio nuka osite kes isinyikokitos isomeroi aigangite aswamisinei idwe.
Lugbara: Drileka aku amboa 'diyi aiki sukulu ki ecozu anziyi ma 'eyo 'yeza geru ndundu si geri avita si 'diyi atizu

English: Performing arts has been boosted in schools.
Luganda: Ebitone bitumbuddwa mu masomero.
Runyankore: Eby'emizaano byongyeirwemu amaani omu mashomero.
Acholi: Tuku googa ki wer otyeko nongo kony madit igangikwan
Ateso: Aswamisio nuegelegela kes egangi kosomero.
Lugbara: Ba edri e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma omgbo sukulu eyi ma alea.

English: Namboole stadium is the Uganda cranes official home ground.
Luganda: Ekisaawe ky'e Namboole ge maka amatongole aga ttiimu ya Uganda cranes.
Runyankore: Ekishaayi kya Namboole, nigo maka ga tiimu ey'Eihanga rya Uganda agarikumanywa.
Acholi: Bar tuku me Namboole en aye katuku pa Uganda Cranes
Ateso: Namboole stadium nes erai alaro na ore naka Uganda Cranes.
Lugbara: Pari avita eyi avizu omvele Namboole stadiamu ruri eri amuti mupira avipi kari Uganda ni omvele Uganda cranes ru 'diyi ma mupira pari avizu akua ri i.

English: The rugby team has qualified for many international tournaments.
Luganda: Ttiimu ya lagibe eyiseemu okuzannya mu mpaka z'ensi yonna nnyingi.
Runyankore: Tiimu ya Rugby, erabiremu kwejumba omu mpaka z'ensi yoona.
Acholi: Dul me tuku Rugby me lobo man oloyo tuku mapol mepyem ituku ki lobo mapatpat
Ateso: Etimu loka rugby nes eteleka kanu abolobol nako kinga.
Lugbara: Amuti rugby ni ri aga muzu abala karakara avile suru azi amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ni ra.

English: The government has established new classroom blocks to public schools in Kampala.
Luganda: Gavumenti ezimbye ebibiina ebipya mu masomero ga gavumenti mu Kampala.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eimukize ebyombeko bisya by'okushomeramu omu Kampala.
Acholi: Gamente otyeko yubu odikwan mapol pigangi kwan me en aye loyo iKampala
Ateso: Apugan nes aduku adukena nuitetiak kanu isomeroi luko Kampala.
Lugbara: Gamete si kilasi o'di eyi sukulu o'biyini Kampala 'diyi ma alea.

English: Schools have employed quality teachers to improve results.
Luganda: Amasomero gawadde abasomesa abatendeke emirimu okwongera ku bubonero.
Runyankore: Amashomero gataahizemu abeegyesa barungi babaase kwimusya omutindo gw'abeegi.
Acholi: Gangikwan gucoyo itic lupwonye makwiri pi ilo rwom kwan malo
Ateso: Isomeroi kes etolomata isisianakinak luajokak kanu aikeuna etube.
Lugbara: Sukulu eyi fe azi imba'ba ala ndeni 'diyi dri agata ma omgbo otuzu.

English: Parents have agreed to support schools in nurturing the learners during holidays.
Luganda: Abazadde bakkirizza okuyambako amasomero mu kugunjula abaana mu luwummula.
Runyankore: Abazaire baikiriize kuhwera amashomero okureeberera gye abaana omu kihuumuro.
Acholi: Lunyodo otyeko yee me konyo gangikwan pi pwonyo lutinogi ikare me yweyo
Ateso: Auriak kes acamutu aigang isomeroi kanu aisisianakin esisiak kapak na aiyeng.
Lugbara: Tipika eyi ai ra sukulu eyi atizu anzi onita onipi 'diyi dri imbata fezu sa'wa lifu vurisi.

English: Nigeria lost four to one to Uganda in the African national championship.
Luganda: Nigeria yawanguddwa Uganda nnya ku emu mu mpaka African national championship.
Runyankore: Uganda ekasiga Nigeria na goora ina ahari emwe, omu mpaka za Africa.
Acholi: Nigeria orwenyo tuku bot Uganda kun omoto odilo kicel i kom angwen ma Uganda omoto ituku me African National Championship
Ateso: Nigeria nes aponi itelekarai iwongon kanu idiope kotoma abolobol naka abolia kiding akwapin nuko Africa .
Lugbara: Uganda nde kari Nigeria niri su ogbi ni abala omvele African national championship ru ri ma alea.

English: Uganda football players are admired by international club players.
Luganda: Abasambi b'omupiira mu Uganda beegombebwa abazannyi ba ttiimu zi nnaggwedda.
Runyankore: Abateezi b'omupiira aba tiimu eya Uganda nibegombwa abazaani ba kiraabu za amahanga agandi.
Acholi: Lutuk odilo ma klab madongo woko gigomo Lutuk odilo me Uganda
Ateso: Aboliak lu emopira luko Uganda kes imielasi aboliak luko okilabun luko kinga.
Lugbara: Ani olima ngulu olipi kari Uganda nia 'diyi e'da agu olimangulu olipi kari amvele ru ria 'diyi ni ndriza

English: The team displayed good football skills in the tournament.
Luganda: Ttiimu yayolesezza obukodyo bw'omupiira obulungi mu mpaka.
Runyankore: Tiimu ekooreka emyoga mirungi y''omumuzaano gw'omupiira omu mpaka ezabaireho.
Acholi: Lutuk odilo gunyutu diro tuku mabeco ipyem tuku mukatoni
Ateso: Abu etimu itodu aipet najokan kotoma abolobol.
Lugbara: Amuti mupira avizu 'da e'da geri azi ala mupira avizuni eyi ma azi mupira abala 'di ma alea.

English: The foot ballplayers have awarded the best players for the season.
Luganda: Abasambi b'omupiira bawadde omusambi asinze okusamba omupiira ekirabo mu sizoni.
Runyankore: Abazaani b'omupiira basiimire abazaanire kurungi omu sizoni.
Acholi: Lutuk odilo gumiyo mic bot lutukugi ma otuku maber loyo ikare tuku maotumi
Ateso: Apotu aboliak emopira oropata aboliak luajokak.
Lugbara: Ba mupira avipi 'diyi fe driadria 'ba mupira avipi ala ndeni mupira abala 'di ma alea 'diyi dri

English: Sexual violence affects both girls and boys in schools.
Luganda: Okukuluusanyizibwa mu by'okwegatta kikosa abawala n'abalenzi mu masomero.
Runyankore: Okunyangarazibwa omuby'okuteerana, nikureetera aboojo n'abaishiki oburemeezi omu mashomero.
Acholi: Tim me butu ki lutino obedo peko madit ma balo kwo pa lutino anyira ki awobe matye igangkwan
Ateso: Amoromoro na aelo emunari apesur keda isap.
Lugbara: E'yo 'bani 'ba o'bizu 'diyi candi fe ezoanzi eyidri tualu agupianzi eyi pie sukulu eyi ma alea.

English: We are proud to have the fastest runner in our country.
Luganda: Twenyumiriza mu kubeera n'omuddusi asinga mu nsi yaffe.
Runyankore: Nikitwehuriza kugira omuzaani orikukirayo kwiruka omu ihanga ryaitu.
Acholi: Watye ki awaka madit pi bedo ki langwec madwir loyo weng ilobowa
Ateso: Ipoga iso kanu ajaut keda akeran lo etirono kakwap wok.
Lugbara: Ama ovu afusi agu ongu be ndeni ri ni engazu ama vile.

English: He has won the race again.
Luganda: Azzeemu okuwangula empaka.
Runyankore: Yaagaruka yasingura empaka omurundi ogundi.
Acholi: Laconi dok oloyo pyem ngwec
Ateso: Eteleka ngesi akerit bobo.
Lugbara: Nde abala 'da dika

English: Despite the  heavy rains, they continued with the running competition
Luganda: Newankubadde yatonnye nnyo, beeyongeddeyo n'empaka z'okudduka.
Runyankore: Oihireho enjura nyingi, bakagumizamu n'empaka z'okwiruka.
Acholi: Kede bedi kot ocwe mtek, gin omede ki pyem ngwec
Ateso: Karaida ejaas idowon luipu, apotu kesi inyikokisi keda abolobol.
Lugbara: Ozo ni ta tro 'dizu okporu ti, eyi mu ongu ma abala be drile.

English: Their team won the football championship.
Luganda: Ttiimu yaabwe yawangudde empaka z'omupiira gw'ebigere.
Runyankore: Tiimu yaabo ekasinga empaka z'omupiira
Acholi: Tim mamegi aye oloyo pyem madit me gweyo odilo
Ateso: Abu etimu kec iteleka emopira.
Lugbara: Eyi vile amuti ri nde mupira abala 'da ni.

English: Such people should be respected in the soccer world.
Luganda: Abantu ng'abo balina okuweebwa ekitiibwa mu nsi y'omupiira.
Runyankore: Abantu nkaabo bashemereire kuheebwa ekitiinisa omuby'emizaano.
Acholi: Dano ma kumeno mito woro madit ikin dule ma tuku odilo
Ateso: Itunga kwa ngul ekot ajikite angosibib kowai lo emopira.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe inzita 'ba 'dile 'diyini e'yo mupira vu 'diyi ma alea.

English: My daughter has been awarded a scholarship because of her very good performance.
Luganda: Muwala wange aweereddwa sikaala olw'okusoma obulungi ennyo.
Runyankore: Muhara wangye atungire akasiimo ahabw'okukora gye munonga.
Acholi: Nyara otyeko nongo skolaship onyo mic me kwan nono piryekone
Ateso: Ejaikin akooka asioman natitai kanu iponesio ke luajokak.
Lugbara: Ba fe ma ezi dri drileba sukulu lazu pirina eri ma agata muke ri si.

English: The minister has allowed foreigners to invest in the education instructions of Uganda.
Luganda: Minisita akkiriza abagwira okusiga ensimbi mu masomero ga Uganda.
Runyankore: Minisita aikiriize abarikuruga omu mahanga agandi okuta esente zaabo omu matendekyero ga Uganda.
Acholi: Minista otyeko yee ni anywali me lobo mukene twero yabo gangi kwan I Uganda
Ateso: Acamaki eminista itunga lu okinga aitolot nu asioman ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Minista ai 'ba enghapi kari azinia 'diyi ni robia 'bazu geri 'bani anzzi yi imbazu kani Ugandania ria ra.

English: Is it true that she bribed student voters to vote for her?
Luganda: Kituufu nti yawa abayizi abalonzi enguzi okumulonda?
Runyankore: N'amazima kugira ngu akatugira abeegi ngu bamuteerere akaruuru?
Acholi: Obedo lok ada ni nyakoni oculu lutinokwan luwote me bole kwir?
Ateso: Erai abeit ebe abu ngesi ogwelegwel esisiak kanu aseun nges?
Lugbara: Eri dere e'yo adani kini fe sukulu anzi voti 'bepi 'diyini robia eyini ani voti 'bezu i ni??

English: My daughter is contesting for the post of the head girl at her school.
Luganda: Muwala wange avuganya ku kifo ky'okukulembera abawala ku ssomero lye.
Runyankore: N'amazima kugira ngu akatugira abeegi ngu bamuteerere akaruuru?
Acholi: Nyara tye kacung me bedo Headgirl igangkwangi
Ateso: Ejai akooka abwaa kanu araun apese na epolokit esomero.
Lugbara: Ma ezi tu pa aa'zu sukulu anzi eyi ma drile zamva ruri ru eyi vu sukulua.

English: I thank you for being part of us this year.
Luganda: Nkwebaza okubeera ekitundu ku ffe omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Ninkwebaza ahabw'okuba naitwe omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Apwoyi pi bedo kacel kwedwa imwaka man
Ateso: Esiyalamikit eong ijo kanu ajaut keda iso okaru lo.
Lugbara: Afe mini awa'difo mini aa'zu ama azi ni eli 'disi risi.

English: I come from the pearl of Africa
Luganda: Nva mu kkula lya Africa
Runyankore: Ninduga omu ntima y'oburungi bwa Africa.
Acholi: An aa ki Iuganda, lobo ma Rubanga omiyo gum maloyo weng iAfrica
Ateso: Abunit eong kotoma akwap naka pearl of Africa
Lugbara: Ma enga angu drizaru ndeni Afrikaa 'dia ria

English: We should be cautious  before we get involved
Luganda: Tulina okuba abeegendereza nga tetunnabyegattamu
Runyankore: Tushemereire kwegyendesereza tutakakitaahiremu.
Acholi: Omyero wagwoko mapeya wadonyo iye
Ateso: Ekot oni acoit erongo elomara.
Lugbara: Le ama ma aa mile be de nga po'di asu ki ama alenia ku.

English: Relevant states were represented by different personnel
Luganda: Ensi ezeetaagisa zaakiikiriddwa abantu ab'enjawulo
Runyankore: Amahanga gatari gamwe gakajwekyerwa abantu batari bamwe.
Acholi: Lobe mamite gucwalo luwanggi
Ateso: Akwapin nuegelegela kes abwoikitos eswamak luagelegela.
Lugbara: Ba ndundu yi emu ndra pa so kari ndundu yima paria ni

English: The chief justice ensured the smooth running of the appointment

English: A leader was appointed

English: This is my responsibility as the President of Uganda
Luganda: Buno buvunaanyizibwa bwange nga pulezidenti wa Uganda

Luganda: Tulina okukolaganira awamu n'ensi zinnaffe tusobole okukulaakulana mu byenfuna

English: East African states should be integrated with  clear goals and objective
Luganda: Ensi za East Africa zirina okwegatta n'ebiruubiriwa wamu n'ekigendererwa ebirambulukufu.

English: The pandemic would have run out of control but we managed to coerce it
Luganda: Ekirwadde bunnansi kyanditulemye okutangira naye twasobola okukirwanysa.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bukaba nibuza kujanjaara munonga, kwonka tukabuzibira.

Ateso: Abeit adeka aroniar noi konye apotu oni apedosi aitikitik.
Lugbara: Azo onzi 'di ecota eca atri kokoru ra te ama arudrini eri omvizu ele ra.

English: We thank the schools which have joined the fight against the pandemic
Luganda: Twebaza amasomero ageegasse ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Nitusiima amashomero agegaisire aharugamba rw'okurwanisa oburwaire.

Lugbara: Afe awa'difo sukulu eyi ecipi amabe tualu a'di'dizu azo onzi 'di be ri pini

English: The auditor general will inspect the products distributed to ensure its quality product
Luganda: Omubalirizi wa gavumenti ajja kulondoola ebintu ebigabibwa okukakasa omutindo gwabyo.

English: They are greedy and selfish people
Luganda: Bantu baluvu era tebaagaliza.
Runyankore: N'abantu abaine omururu, kandi nibeyendeza.
Acholi: Gin obedo dano ma maro jami dok gi paro pirgi kengi
