English: Those who spent money wisely on our people should be commended
Luganda: Abo abaasaasaanya obulungi ensimbi ku bantu baffe balina okutenderezebwa.

English: Let us work together to defeat this challenge with collective efforts.

English: Ugandans are very strong people

Acholi: Anywali me Ugandagubedo dano matek tutwal

English: People have greed for money which will make them lose a life

Luganda: Abakulembeze balina okubeera n'obuvunaanyizibwa n'okwongera ku buweereza.

English: Quality food should be distributed in a proper way without contamination

English: We need to put in place proper mechanisms and food will be brought on the door
Luganda: Tulina okuteekawo enkola ennambulukufu era emmere ejja ku leetebwa ku luggi.

English: It is one of the few schools I went to in my high school days

Ateso: Erai ediopet kosomeroi lu abu eong asiomite apakio nu ajaar eong osinia.

Acholi: Meno aye kama aa ki iye

English: I was at Ntale one year before independence
Luganda: Nali Ntale omwaka gumu nga tetunnafuna bwetwaze

English: They have been able to control this pandemic
Luganda: Basobodde okutangira ekiwadde kino bbunansi

Acholi: Gulwenyo matek pi gengo nyayo  two ma oporo ni

English: The medical staff and engineers are important in our Ugandan setting
Luganda: Abasawo ne bayinginiya baamugaso mu ntekateeka ya Uganda yaffe.

English: We bought it for road construction
Luganda: Twakigula kuzimba luguudo.

English: The machinery imported from Japan helped us to handle the situation

English: They effortlessly sacrificed and put their lives at risk

English: This kind of behaviour is completely disallowed and unlawful

English: The task force should work hand in hand with the police
Luganda: Akakiiko akadduukirize kalina okukolagana ne poliisi.

English: The district task force should be in charge of distribution and resource allocation
Luganda: Akakiiko ka disitulikiti akadduukirize ke kalina okuvunaanyizibwa ku kubunyisa n'okugaba ebintu.

Luganda: Ssente zirina okukomezebwawo.

Acholi: Cente ni omyero gicul wange

Acholi: Cente ni onongo omyero pe gidwok bute

English: Let us not relax people we can fight off the coronavirus
Luganda: Abantu tuleme kugayaala tusobola okulwanyisa akawuka ka kolona.

English: The auditor general will  have to inspect the expenditures
Luganda: Omubalirizi wa gavumenti ajja kulondoola ensaasaanya.

Acholi: Langii kor tic ki cente pa Gamente bi kwedo kit ma gitiyo ki cente

English: We cannot tolerate improper  behaviour
Luganda: Tetusobola kukkiriza mpisa mbi

English: They should be commended for being selfless

Runyankore: Bashemereire kusiimwa ahabw'okwehayo.
Acholi: Omyero gipwogi pi tic kiny acel
Ateso: Ekot aitur kes kanu amunokina.
Lugbara: Le ama ma fe eyi dri awa'difo eyini adrizu ikpere kokoru ri si.

English: Their good work was reflected in these difficult times
Luganda: Omulimu gwabwe omulungi gweyolekera mu biseera ebyo ebizibu.
Runyankore: Omurimo gwabo gukareebeka omu biro bigumire nk'ebi.
Acholi: Ticgi maber onen ikareman ma kwo tye mateki
Ateso: Aswam kec najokan kotoma aparasia nu, nu etiokotor iboro.

English: They were saving lives
Luganda: Baali bataasa bulamu
Runyankore: Bakaba nibakiza amagara.
Acholi: Gubedo ka gwoko kwo pa dano
Ateso: Ayuaritos kesi aijar.

English: He appreciated their good work
Luganda: Yasiimye omulimu gwabwe omulungi.
Runyankore: Akasiima omurimo gwabo murungi.
Acholi: En opwoyo ticgi magutiyo maber ni
Ateso: Abu ngesi itur aswam kec najokan.
Lugbara: Eri fe awa'difo azi onyiru eyini nga ri si ra.

English: He wanted to understand their problems
Luganda: Yayagadde okutegeera ebizibu byabwe.

Acholi: En omito niang peko magitye kwede

English: They do the work that no one can be able to do
Luganda: Bakola omulimu omuntu omulala yenna gw'atasobola kukola.
Runyankore: Nibakora omurimo ogu buri omwe atarikubaasa kukora.
Acholi: Gin timo tic ma ngat mo pe twero timo

English: They need to be motivated
Luganda: Beetaaga okuzzaamu amaanyi
Runyankore: Baine kugarurwamu amaani.
Acholi: Mite ni gunong yomcwiny ki kero me tic
Ateso: Ekot kesi aigangakite.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe eyini ava ra.

English: Health workers have done a very good job
Luganda: Abasawo bakoze omulimu omulungi ennyo
Runyankore: Abashaho bakozire omurimo murungi.

Ateso: Eswamata eswamak lu adekis aswam najokan.

English: They are extensively living a good life

Ateso: Ejarete kesi aijar najokan.

English: Politicians should never distribute food but should be part of the task force
Luganda: Bannabyabufuzi tebalina kugaba mmere naye balina okuba ku kakiiko akadduukirize.

English: The auditor general will monitor the allocation of funds
Luganda: Omubalirizi wa gavumenti ajja kulondoola engabanya y'ensimbi.

English: They will be part of the task force since they know problems better
Luganda: Bajja kuba kitundu ku kakiiko akadduukirize kubanga bamanyi bulungi ebizibu.

English: On orders from above, the district task force had to control the situation
Luganda: Ku kiragiro ekiva waggulu, akakiiko ka disitulikiti akadduukirize kaalina okutereeza embeera.

Ateso: Kotupitete nu eponitos kokuju, ajai atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce kodisitrikt  ainapakin ationis.

English: We then tried to make sure things are done in the right way
Luganda: Oluvannyuma twagezezzaako okukakasa ng'ebintu bikolebwa mu ngeri entuufu.

Ateso: Apotu iso atamakisi awanyutu ebe iswamao iboro oipone kalo ebeitor.

English: The local politicians tried to engage in food distribution.
Luganda: Bannabyabufuzi ba kuno baagezaako okwenyigira mu kugaba emmere.

Luganda: Abasomesa batulungamya n'okutukubiriza okutuuka ku binene.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa nibatuhiga ngu tuhindukye ab'omugasho.
Acholi: Lupwonye miyo tekcwiny weko wa yele me doko dano ma pirgi tego
Ateso: Isinyikokitos isisianakinak oni aswam agogongu.
Lugbara: Imba'ba eyi ama dri ava fe azi ngazu ecazu 'ba okporu 'diyi ru.

English: Ugandans are overjoyed with the victory of their fastest runners.
Luganda: Bannayuganda basanyufu nnyo olw'obuwanguzi bw'omuddusi waabwe asinga.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda bashemereirwe ahabw'okugira abeiruki ruranganwa.
Acholi: Anywali me Uganda tye ki yomcwiny pi loyo pa lungwecgi madwir loyo
Ateso: Iyalamasi itunga luko Uganda noi kanu etelekarata akerak kec.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ga ayikosi tre agata eyi ma 'ba ndepi ongu si ni 'diyini ri si.

English: He gives more energy to the pupils.
Luganda: Awa nnyo abayizi amaanyi.
Runyankore: Nagaruramu abeegi amaani.
Acholi: En miyo guvu madwong ki lutinokwane
Ateso: Ijanakini ngesi idwe agogongu naepol.
Lugbara: Eri sukulu anzi 'dayi ni okpo fe.

English: Teachers help in preparing for the road ahead in our lives.
Luganda: Abasomesa bayamba mu kuteekateeka olugendo mu bulamu bwaffe eby'omu maaso.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa nibatuteekatekyera omuhanda omu magara gaitu.
Acholi: Lupwonye konyo me yubuwa pi yoo ma anyim ikwowa
Ateso: Ingarakitos isisianakinak aitemonokin erot kanuka oingaren wok.
Lugbara: Imba'ba eyi azokoma fe nzila ama edri eyi ma alea ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi otuzu.

English: It is the teacher that makes the difference, not the classroom.
Luganda: Musomesa y'akolawo enjawulo si kibiina.
Runyankore: Omwegyesa niwe arikuhwera kihango, kitari kibiina.
Acholi: Lapwony en aye kelo alokaloka ikwo, pe otkwan
Ateso: Erai esisianakinan nges eyauni atiaket mere atukot.
Lugbara: Imbapi ni ojata ejini adrini kilasi ni ku.

English: The minister said teachers sacrifices don't go unnoticed.
Luganda: Minisita yagamba kwewaayo kw'abasomesa tekugenda nga tekutegeerekeseeko.
Runyankore: Minisita akagira ngu okwehayo kw'abegyesa kwine kusiimwa.
Acholi: Minista owaconi; Dyere ma lupwonye miyo pe kato ma pe gineno
Ateso: Ebala eminista ebe; aswamisinei isisianakinak mam eoliorete komam ewanyunitai.
Lugbara: Minista kini; owita emba'ba pini eyi owizu ri alini 'dani nikokoru ku.

English: Our mathematics teacher inspired us to do better.
Luganda: Omusomesa waffe ow'okubala yatuzzaamu amaanyi okukola obulungiko.
Runyankore: Omwegyesa w'okubara, akatuhiga kukora kurungi.
Acholi: Lapwony cuura wa omiyiwa tekcwiny me kwan matek
Ateso: Esisianakinan kosi lo aimar nges esinyikokit iso aswam ejok.
Lugbara: Ama imbapi namba vuri fe amani ava e'yo yezu muke ndeni.

English: My teacher thank you for making me a good human being.
Luganda: Musomesa wange weebale okunfuula omuntu omulungi.
Runyankore: Ninsiima omwegyesa wangye kumpindura omuntu ow'obujunaanizibwa.
Acholi: Lapwonya, apwoyo tutwal me weko an adoko dano maber
Ateso: Esisianakinan ka eyalama kanu aitaraun eong itunganan yen ajokuna.
Lugbara: Awa'difo imbapi ma vileri dri erini fezu ma eca 'ba ada kililiru ni risi.

English: We have to rectify the mistakes that we made
Luganda: Tulina okutereeza ensobi ze twakola
Runyankore: Twine kutereeza enshobi ezi twakozire.
Acholi: Omyero wayub jami ma wabalo ikwo wa
Ateso: Ekot oni aitemonokin adiakanareta nu iswama oni.
Lugbara: Le ama ma otu onzi amani 'ye 'diyi ra.

English: We are in an extremely difficult situation
Luganda: Tuli mu kaseera akazibu ennyo ddala
Runyankore: Embeera ei turimu nimbi munonga.
Acholi: Watye ikare ma kwo tek tutwal
Ateso: Ijai oni toma ojautene loaronon noi.
Lugbara: Ama e'yo azi ewaru saaru ni ma alea.

English: It is the ruling party in Uganda
Luganda: Kye kibiina ekiri mu buyinza mu Uganda
Runyankore: Nikyo kibiina ekiri omu butegyeki omu Uganda.
Acholi: Meno aye party matye iker iUganda
Ateso: Nes epate lo ipugai ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Diri amuti politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma dri cepiri.

English: We shall employ the necessary people to strategize
Luganda: Tujja kussaako abantu abeetaagisa okutema empenda
Runyankore: Nituza kutaho abantu abarikwetengwa twine ekigyendererwa.
Acholi: Wabi coyo dano mamite me neno kit ma tic omyero owot kwede
Ateso: Ilosi oni aitwasam itunga lu epote aswam teni.
Lugbara: Ama nga azi fe 'ba kilili ri pini otita muke 'bazu ra.

English: We have to look for remedies
Luganda: Tuyina okunoonya eky'okukola okutereeza embeera.
Runyankore: Twine kutunga oburyo bw'okukimaraho.
Acholi: Omyero wanong diro me cobo peko
Ateso: Ejai oni amoun iwaitin.
Lugbara: Le ama ma esu geri e'yo aza kozu 'diyi ra.

English: It cannot sustain its activities in difficult times like wars
Luganda: Tesobola kuyimirizaawo mirimu gy'ayo mu biseera ebizibu ng'entalo.
Runyankore: Tikirikubaasa kubaisaho emirimo yakyo na munonga omu biro by'endwano.
Acholi: Petwero mede ki tice ikare ma kwo tye ma tek calo ikare me lweny
Ateso: Mam eong apedori angirikit aswamisinei ke apakio nu atiokok kwanu ijisinei.
Lugbara: Econi mu 'yeta ima ngulupi niri pie drile sawa ewaru ekile a'di pile ri ma alea ku.

English: It mostly depends on foreigners
Luganda: Esinga kwesigama ku bagwira
Runyankore: Okukira munonga nibubasibwaho abanyamahanga.
Acholi: Pole jenge i kom anywali me lobo mukene
Ateso: Elomuni kotoma otunga lu okinga.
Lugbara: Eri tutuni atita esu kari anzi suru azi 'diyi ni ri vu

English: The tourism sector faces a number of challenges as they lack capital
Luganda: Ebyobulambuzi bisanga okusoomozebwa nga bibulwa ensimbi
Runyankore: Eby'oburambuzi biine oburemeezi bwingi ahabwaibura rya sente.
Acholi: Dul ma keme ki lok me neno piny pi galo wang tye ka wot ipeki mapol pien gi pe ki cente
Ateso: Ewai lo elatok etereikina keda atiokisio nuipu naarai emamete ikapun.
Lugbara: Arakala angu ama ageyia ndriza ruri onepi ri ni dri osizu esu ekile attita azingazu ri ni ovuzu eyivu yo ri le

English: Food runs the lives of people in every situation
Luganda: Emmere etambuza obulamu bw'abantu mu mbeera yonna
Runyankore: Eby'okurya nibyo birikubaisaho amagara g'abantu.
Acholi: Cam pire tek pi kwo pa dano ikare ducu
Ateso: Inyamat kes itajarete itunga nginiparan.
Lugbara: Nyaka ni 'ba eyi ma edri ma ta mba ni e'yo dria ma alea.

English: Food security is key to a better economy
Luganda: Okubeera n'emmere kya nkizo mu byenfuna ebirungi.
Runyankore: Okutunga eihanga rirungi, rwanisa eibura ry'eby'okurya.
Acholi: Bedo ki cam muromo pire tek pi dongo lobo
Ateso: Ayuarit inyamat nes elacet lo apolo kana ajokan.
Lugbara: Nyaka ni cazu 'ba woro ni sawa driasi ra ri eri e'yo ecopi fezu angu ma zo geri lonyi vusi ri i.

English: We had a better increase in income per capita
Luganda: Twafuna okwoyongera mu mugatte gw'ensimbi eziyingizibwa buli muntu.
Runyankore: Entaatsya yaitu omu maka ekeyongyera.
Acholi: Wel dano ma omako cente omede imwakani
Ateso: Ija oni keda apol najokan kowai kalo edumune arai ikapun.
Lugbara: Amavu 'ba alualu ma lonyi ma omgbo tu cika

English: There is high milk production in Kenya
Luganda: Waliyo enfulumya y'amata amangi mu Kenya
Runyankore: Omuri Kenya baine amate maingi.
Acholi: Kenya tye ki cak madwong
Ateso: Itolomio akile nuipu ko Kenya.
Lugbara: Lesu ma edeta eri Kenya 'bua.

English: There is high consumption of milk products
Luganda: Ebintu ebiva mu mata byettanirwa nnyo.
Runyankore: Hariho okukozesa ebintu bingi ebirikuruga omu mate.
Acholi: Wilo cak ki jami ma giyubi ki icak tye kamede
Ateso: Emasete itunga akile noi keda icieboro lu akile.
Lugbara: Afa edele lesu si 'diyi ma cu 'bua.

English: The problem is about high production and low consumption
Luganda: Obuzibu buli ku kufulumya nnyo ng'obwetaavu butono.
Runyankore: Oburemeezi oburiho n'ahabw'okugira ngu nihakorwa bingi kwonka abarikubikoresa nibakye.
Acholi: Peko matye aye ni jami acata dwong ento luwil nok
Ateso: Ationis nes aitolomunono naepol ido odite aitwasam.
Lugbara: E'yo ewaru ri 'bani afa ofuzu angiri te 'ba ayu were ri i.

English: It is rich in a lot of minerals and it is part of proteins foods
Luganda: Mulimu ebirungo bingi era kitundu ku mmere ezimba omubiri
Runyankore: Gaine emyonyo mingi, hamwe n'enyombeka mubiri narishi protein.
Acholi: Tye ki moc cam mapatpat ma mite pi yotkom
Ateso: Ejaas keda iboro luitogogongoete akuan luipu ka iboro lu edukete akwan.
Lugbara: Nyaka rua ma azakopi 'diyi alenia karakara azini eri nyaka 'bama rua sipi ri ma azi

English: They are needed by local manufacturing companies to sustain production
Luganda: Byetaagibwa amakolero g'omunda mu ggwanga okuyimirizaawo emirimu.
Runyankore: Nibyetengwa amakorero g'omwihanga okubaisaho emirimo yaabo.
Acholi: Tye ka mite ikampuni mapatpat me weko gumede ki tic
Ateso: Ikotosi icuman ludidika noi kanu aiyatakite aswam.
Lugbara: Okalamvu afa edepi ogogo 'diyi eyi ayu ani ecozu muzu afa edeza be drile.

English: Eggs have no market this time around
Luganda: Amagi tegalina katale omulundi guno.
Runyankore: Amahuri tigaine katare obwahati.
Acholi: Tongweno cuke opoto ikareni
Ateso: Emamei abee esokoni kopana.
Lugbara: Augbe eyi ma cu yo sa'wa 'di ma alea.

English: Many other products are available on the market
Luganda: Ebintu ebirala bingi weebiri ku katale
Runyankore: Hariho ebindi bintu bingi omu katare.
Acholi: Tye jami mapol mukene magitye ka cato
Ateso: Ipu icieboro lu iswamao kosokoni.
Lugbara: Afa azi edele 'bo ndundu 'diyi cu a ci.

English: Hotels were closed because of the pandemic
Luganda: Amawooteeri gaggalwa olw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Za hoteeri zikakingwa ahabw'oburwaire.
Acholi: Kacam madongo gilorogi woko pi  two ma oporo ni
Ateso: Aponi ogolokinai iwoterin kanu adeka.
Lugbara: Ba opi ndra omujo lazu 'diyi ma ti azo onzi 'di dri ci.

English: There is low agricultural output
Luganda: Amakungula g'abalimi n'abalunzi matono.
Runyankore: Ebirikuruga omuby'obuhingi bikiri bikye.
Acholi: Jami ma aa ki ipoto tye manok
Ateso: Ekidioko iboro lu itolomio akoru.
Lugbara: Afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ma omgbo ele.

English: There is a high demand for coffee
Luganda: Obwetaavu bw'emmwanyi bungi.
Runyankore: Omwani nigwetengwa munonga.
Acholi: Mwanyi tye cuke malo
Ateso: Epol eipuda noi lo emwanyi.
Lugbara: Kawa ma cu 'bua.

English: People are now protective of themselves
Luganda: Abantu kati beekuuma
Runyankore: Abantu hati nibeerinda.
Acholi: Dano dong tye ka gwoko kwogi
Ateso: Eyuaritos kwana itunga awate kec.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi sa'wa 'disi eyi ma ta mba.

English: They are thinking about  us
Luganda: Batulowoozaako
Runyankore: Bariyo nibatuteekateekaho.
Acholi: Gitye ka tamo piwa
Ateso: Eomomoete kesi nuikamunitos oni.
Lugbara: Eyi e'yo ega ama ma dria.

English: We were able to meet at last
Luganda: Twasobodde okusisinkana oluvannyuma.
Runyankore: Tukaheza twabugana.
Acholi: Wanongo kare me rwate twal
Ateso: Apotu do konye oni apedosi airiamun.
Lugbara: Asizu ama esu di ama ra.

English: There are a lot of cars coming inside the country
Luganda: Waliwo emmotoka nnyingi eziyingira mu ggwanga
Runyankore: Hariho emotoka nyingi ezirikwija omu ihanga.
Acholi: Mutoka mapol tye kabino ilobowa
Ateso: Ipu amotokan elomunenete akwap wok.
Lugbara: Mutukari karakara eyi efi kari 'di ma alea ni.

English: We shall handle this situation and the number of health workers shall increase
Luganda: Embeera tujja kugikwasaganya era n'omuwendo gw'abajjanjabi gujja kweyongerako
Runyankore: Ebiriho nituza kubitereeza kandi n'omuhendo gw'abashaho niguza kweyongyera.
Acholi: Wabi tyeko lok man dok bene wel lutic yotkom bimede
Ateso: Ipedori oni atemokin ejautene lo ido ipuakaros eswamak lu adekis.
Lugbara: Ama nga e'yo 'di ma aza ko ra dika 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma kalafe ni nga tu ra.

English: Let us hope they agreed on priorities
Luganda: Ka tusuubire nti bakkiriziganya ku byetaagisa.
Runyankore: Ka tugire amasiko ngu baikirizaine aha bikuru.
Acholi: Waleg ni gumoko tamgi pi lok ma pirgi tegu
Ateso: Ekot oni aomite ebe apotu kesi ocamanaros kanu epolok.
Lugbara: Bama 'du 'ba asia kini eyinga ti out e'yo okporu ndeni ri ki ngiki yari ma dria ra.

English: What did they talk about?
Luganda: Baayogedde ku ki?
Runyankore: Bakagamba ahari ki?
Acholi: Guloko lok ango?
Ateso: Anubo ineritos kesi?
Lugbara: Eyi nze e'yo a'du ma dria??

English: Uganda is working on a countrywide railway line to connect markets
Luganda: Uganda eri mu kaweefube w'okuzimba oluguudo lw'eggaali y'omukka mu ggwanga okusobola okugatta obutale.
Runyankore: Uganda eriyo neekora aha ruguuto rw'egaari y'omwika okuhikaanisa obutare.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda tye ka tic me yubu koogar me kubu cuk mapatpat
Ateso: Ejai Uganda aswam nuka erot lo agali kanu aruconokin osokonin.
Lugbara: Uganda ni azinga karamosi pamvu edezu karisi ndulu ani ecozu cu ndundu yi ecizu beni.

English: They give us the market despite the transport problems
Luganda: Batuwa akatale ng'oggyeko bizibu mu byentambula.
Runyankore: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bw'engyenda nibatuha akatare.
Acholi: Giminwa cuk me cato jamiwa kede bedi watye ki peko me ginwot
Ateso: Ijaikit kesi oni esokoni araida ejai ationis na elosi.
Lugbara: Eyi amani cu fe ra, geri ndundu acizu 'diyi ni ta tro aa'zu mbazaru ra ti.

English: They provide us with timber
Luganda: Batuwa  embaawo.
Runyankore: Nibatuhereza embaho.
Acholi: Giminiwa bawo
Ateso: Ijanakinete oni abaoi.
Lugbara: Eyi amani mbawu fe.

English: There are movements of people in and out of the neighbouring country.
Luganda: Waliwo okutambula kw'abantu abayingira n'okufuluma eggwanga erituliraanye.
Runyankore: Hariho okugyenda kw'abantu, barikuza omu ihanga erituherereire kandi barikurugamu.
Acholi: Dano tye wot me donyo ki kato ki ilobo acel ma ingetwa
Ateso: Epol elose lo itunga toma keda kinga akwap na idunyare.
Lugbara: Ba ndundu yi efi azini fu kari jo ejelea ri ma alea risi ni.

English: Uganda will construct a railway line towards the Tanzanian border and Kenya respectively
Luganda: Uganda ejja kuzimba oluguudo lw'eggaali y'omukka olugenda ku nsalo za Tanzania ne Kenya
Runyankore: Uganda neija kwombeka oruguuto rw'egaari y'omwika orurikuza aha nsharo ya Tanzania na Kenya.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda obi yubu korgaa madonyo iboda me Tanzania ki Kenya
Ateso: Elosi Uganda aiduk erot lo agali aitenarite oikoru loTanzania keda kenya.
Lugbara: Uganda ninga geri garamosi ni acizu ri si kpere eyima esele Tanzania be ria azini vini kenya beria.

English: People are now able to use various means of transport.
Luganda: Abantu kati basobola okweyambisa entambula ez'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Abantu obwahati nibabaasa kukoresa emiringo mingi y'engyenda.
Acholi: Dano dong twero tic ki yoo mapatpat me wot
Ateso: Epatanikit kwana itunga aitwasam elose loegelegela.
Lugbara: Ba eyi eco di geri ndundu acizu 'diyi ayu ra.

English: Sacrificing ourselves will not be necessary, we need better solutions.
Luganda: Okwesaddaaka tekijja kwetaagisa, twetaaga eky'okukola ekisingako.
Runyankore: Okwehayo tikirikwija kuhwera nitwetenga kutereeza gye enshonga.
Acholi: Dyero kwowa pe bi mite, omyero wanong diro mukene me tyeko lok
Ateso: Oni angirikin awate wok mam erai ibore edolit, ikoto iso iwaitin lu abeit.
Lugbara: Amani ama owizu ri ma azi ni nga adri yo, amani leri eri geri e'yo aza kopi muke ndeni 'diyi.

English: We will stop after we have reached the final destination.
Luganda: Tujja kuyimirira oluvannyuma nga tutuuse we tulaga.
Runyankore: Nituza kurekyeraho twaheza kuhika ahu turikuza.
Acholi: Wabi cung nongo wa oo ka ma wacito iye
Ateso: Ipalari iso akaulo na adolere ne ebeit.
Lugbara: Ama mu pa tu de isu aca ki di angu asizu ria 'bo.

English: The ministry will provide us with the means of transport.
Luganda: Minisitule ejja kutuwa entambula.
Runyankore: Minisiture neija kutuheereza oburyo bw'engyenda.
Acholi: Ministry biminiwa gin wot
Ateso: Ebuni erionget aijaikin oni eipone lo alosit.
Lugbara: Arakala acipa niri ni nga amani acipa feni

English: Diabetes is a dangerous disease with no cure.
Luganda: Obulwadde bwa sukaali bwa bulabe ate tebulina ddagala libuwonya.
Runyankore: Sukaari n'endwara y'akabi kandi terikukira.
Acholi: Two cukari obedo two marac tutwal dok pe cang
Ateso: Erai adeka na esukali naronon emamei ekia.
Lugbara: Sukari azo eri azo azi onzi 'bani eco ati ku ni i.

English: They amended the constitution amidst controversial times.
Luganda: Baakyusa ssemateeka mu kaseera  akazibu.
Runyankore: Bakahindura engyenderwaho y'eihanga omu omu kuhakana kw'amaani.
Acholi: Guloko pen cik ikare ma ayela tye mapol
Ateso: Oponi oburokinai aitutuket konye apol eiguro.
Lugbara: Ojaki azita nyaku ocepi ri sawa e'yoni drizu karakara 'dima tala si

English: He will park the car in a secure place.
Luganda: Ajja kusimba emmotoka mu kifo ekirungi.
Runyankore: Nituza kwemereza emotoka omu mwanya ogwine oburinzi.
Acholi: En obi keto mutoka ka maber
Ateso: Elosi ngesi asipokin emotoka ne eyuara.
Lugbara: Eringa mutukari ma 'ba angu afazi ni ecozu eri 'yezukuni ma alea ra.

English: Hotels and lodges are facing a difficult time during the pandemic.
Luganda: Zi wooteeri ne zi loogi bisanze akaseera akazibu mu bulwadde bunansi.
Runyankore: Aba hoteeri hamwe n'emyanya y'okuraaramu baine oburemeezi omu bwire bw'endwara.
Acholi: Kacam ki kabuto magiculo pirgi tye ka wok ipeko pi two mupotoni
Ateso: Iwoterin keda ne eperio itereikina ationis kapak kana adeka.
Lugbara: Omujo eyi ali sawa e'yo ewaru ni 'dile ri ma aleasi sawa azo onzi 'divuri ma alea.

English: I need to get a driving permit this year.
Luganda: Neetaaga okufuna ppamiti y'okuvuga omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Nyine kutunga ekihandiiko eki kunyikiriza kuvuga ebiiruka omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Omyero anong waraga me dwoyo mutoka imwaka ni
Ateso: Akoto eong adumun alasisi na aiteker emotoka okaru lo.
Lugbara: Le ma esu karatasi 'bani ani mutukari onzuzu ri eli 'disi ra.

English: How often do you go to church?
Luganda: Ogenda ddi mu kkanisa?
Runyankore: Omu iramizo nookira kuzayo ryari?
Acholi: In icito igang lega tyen adii?
Ateso: Irwan mwasai ilosiono ijo okanisa?
Lugbara: Acita mini acizu kanisa ri ma sa'wa ngoni?

English: Prayer transforms people's way of life.
Luganda: Essaala ekyusa embeera z'abantu.
Runyankore: Okushaba nikuhindura aha magara g'abantu.
Acholi: Lega loko kwo pa dano
Ateso: Ijulakini ailip eipone lo aijar lo itunga.
Lugbara: Izita ni 'ba eyi ma edri oja.

English: All believers ought to be generous.
Luganda: Abakkiriza bonna balina okuba bagabi.
Runyankore: Abaikiriza boona, bashemereire kugira embabazi.
Acholi: Dano weng matye ki niyee omyero gumii kony ki dano
Ateso: Eyunak kere ekot araut lu esiyaka.
Lugbara: Le 'ba dria aita alea 'diyi ma aa fetaru.

English: To fight the coronavirus, you need to feed well and also pray to Jesus Christ.
Luganda: Okulwanyisa akawuka ka kolona weetaaga okulya obulungi era n'okusaba Yesu Kristo
Runyankore: Okurwanisa endwara ya Korona, oine kurya eby'okurya ebiine ekirisa, kandi oshabe Yesu Kristo.
Acholi: Pi lweny i kom kwidi Corona, omyero icam maber dok bene ileg bot Yesu Kristo
Ateso: Kanu aitiji ekorona, ekot ijo ainyam ejok keda ailip Iyesu.
Lugbara: A'di 'dizu azo corona virasi niri be, Le mi ma nya nyaka muke dika le mi ma izi yesu kristo vu.

English: I declare a wonderful, and prosperous today.
Luganda: Nangirira olunaku olw'essanyu era olw'emikisa leero.
Runyankore: Nindangirira eizooba rirungi kandi eririmu okutunga.
Acholi: Alego pi nino maber ma obikela lonyo tini
Ateso: Akoto lolo eong orai aparan na ejokuna ido na arerengesio.
Lugbara: Ma 'yo dini kini le o'du andruri ma ovu osutaru azini ma ga lonyi si tre.

English: Lord, I thank you for yesterday and I declare a new blessed day.
Luganda: Mukama nkwebaza olw'olunaku lw'eggulo era nangirira olunaku olw'emikisa olugya.
Runyankore: Mukama, ninkusiima ahabwa nyomwebazyo kandi nindangirira eizooba rirungi.
Acholi: Rwot Rubanga, apwoyi pi laworo dok bene akwonge inyingi pi nino manyen mupong ki lar maber
Ateso: Edeke Papa, esiyalamikit eong ijo kanu aparan nabian ido arai na esirerengitai.
Lugbara: Opi, Afe mini awa'difo o'du ajeri si dika ma ai mivu o'du o'diru ni asindriza be tre.

English: You need a blessing from God.
Luganda: Weetaaga omukisa okuva eri Katonda.
Runyankore: Noyetenga embabazi kuruga ahari Ruhanga.
Acholi: Imito gum mu aa ki bot Rubanga
Ateso: Ikotokin ijo aisirerengio kanejai Edeke.
Lugbara: Le mi ma esu asi ndriza engazu mungu vu.

English: We need prayers in our daily lives.
Luganda: Twetaaga essaala mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo.
Runyankore: Nitwetenga eshaara omu magara gaitu aga burizooba.
Acholi: Wamito lega ikwo wa ma jwi
Ateso: Ikoto oni ailipasinei kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan.
Lugbara: Idri amani o'du driasi 'diyi le Izita ra.

English: Being faithful and trustworthy are should be every Christian core values.
Luganda: Okubeera omukkiriza era omwesigwa ze zirina okuba empagi enkulu eza buli Mukrisitaayo.
Runyankore: Obwesigwa n'amazima, nibyo bishemereire kwebembera omukristaayo.
Acholi: Bedo ki ada ki gen omyero obed jami ma Lukristo ducu jenge iye
Ateso: Ajaut keda aiyuun ka amuno nes ipudai kenejai ngin ikurisitayot.
Lugbara: Ovuzu aita be azini 'bani ecozu asi 'bazu 'bazini ma dria rari eri kristiani alualu ma egata asisi ri i.

English: Teargas and live bullets were used at demonstrators.
Luganda: Omukka ogubalagala n'amasasi aga ddala byakozeseddwa ku beekalakaasi.
Runyankore: Omwika ogurikureeta emiziga hamwe n'amasasi, nibyo byakoresiibwe omu kediimo.
Acholi: Gitiyo ki tiyagas ki ricac me ryemo lujemo
Ateso: Etwasamao ekwam lo itomonyi akonye ka asasin nejaas itunga lu idiyaete.
Lugbara: Oli acika le 'ba mile nyapi riki rasasi mupira ru ri be 'ba ayu agu acipi e'yima awoko e'dapi 'diyi ma rua.

English: Tanks and heavy artilleries are used in the demonstrations.
Luganda: Tanka ne byokulwanyisa eby'amaanyi bikozesebwa mu kwekalakaasa.
Runyankore: Bya tanka na rugogoma, nibyo birikukoresibwa omu kesharingo.
Acholi: Tanka pa mony ki muduku madongo gitiyo kwedgi me keto jemo
Ateso: Itwasamao ataagin ka imudun luapolok airengiara lu ediyak.
Lugbara: Ba ayu osu 'wara-'wara 'diyi agu yini aciria eyima awoko e'daria.

English: Killing others is very intolerable.
Luganda: Okutta abalala tekikkirizibwa n'akatono.
Runyankore: Okwita abantu abandi, tikirikwikirizibwa.
Acholi: Neko dano mukene pe gin ma gicwako
Ateso: Aiyar luce mam ecamakino cut.
Lugbara: Ba eyini eyi o'dizu eyi ma eselea ri e'yo azi 'bani ti taa ku ni i.

English: Threats are rampant among people in the community.
Luganda: Okutiisibwatiisibwa kweyongedde mu bantu mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Okutiinatiinisa nikwo kwijwire omu bantu.
Acholi: Bura tye mapol ikin dano ma ikingang
Ateso: Epol aitukurianono na itunga kotoma akwap.
Lugbara: Ori gbaza 'bama asia ri ni i awaria okposi o'biyi ma eselea si.

English: Attempted murder is also considered a criminal case.
Luganda: Okugezaako okutta nagwo gutwalibwa okuba omusango gw'obumenyi bw'amateeka
Runyankore: Okugyezaho kwita nagwo nigubarwa nk'omushango gw'obwisi.
Acholi: Temo nek bene gikwano ikin bal madongo
Ateso: Aibuc aiyar itunganan eyangaritai kwape emusago loti noi.
Lugbara: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba 'dizu ri eri vini e'yo onzini azita palaa

English: Police should manage increasing gun cases.
Luganda: Poliisi erina okukola ku misango gy'emmundu egyeyongera.
Runyankore: Poriisi eshemereire kutuubya y'embundu eyeyongyeire.
Acholi: Abili omyero gunen lok me muduku matye kanya icing lwak
Ateso: Ekot ipolisin aitikokin imusagon lu imudun lu iyatasi.
Lugbara: Le polisi eyi ma ko e'yo osu eyi vu tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza ra.

English: Theft is a great threat to the community.
Luganda: Obubbi bwa ntiisa nnyo eri abantu.
Runyankore: Obushuma n'ekintu kibi munonga omu bantu.
Acholi: Kwo obedo peko madit ikabedowa
Ateso: Akoko nes itukuriani itunga noi aiboisio.
Lugbara: Ogu eri e'yo azi onzi ni i ongulumu eyi ma alea.

English: Of late, many people die of gun shootings.
Luganda: Emabegako abantu bangi bafudde nga bakubibwa amasasi
Runyankore: Omu bunaku obu abantu nibaitwa amasasi g'embundu.
Acholi: Ikin kareni, dano mapol too macalo adwogi me ricac
Ateso: Aparasia nu, etwakete itunga luipu ainomonomo ka emudu.
Lugbara: Curu'do, 'ba karakara eyi odra 'bani eyi ogbizu osu si ri si.

English: A man was shot three times in the stomach while on his way to work.
Luganda: Omusajja yakubibwa amasasi emirundi esatu mu lubuto bwe yali agenda ku mulimu.
Runyankore: Omushaija akateerwa amasasi ashatu ahanda arikuza aha murimo.
Acholi: Gicelo lacoo moni tyen adek iiye ma onongo tye ka cito itic
Ateso: Aponi inomai etunganan akoik irwan auni elosi aswam.
Lugbara: Ba gbi agupi azi alea paale na erini muria azia.

English: The president does not like the police to use guns in public.
Luganda: Pulezidenti tayagala poliisi ekozese mmundu mu lujjudde.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi w'eihanga tarikukunda ngu poriisi ekorese embundu omu bantu.
Acholi: Ladit lobo pe mitoni abili otii ki muduku ikin lwak
Ateso: Mam lokapolon akwap ekoto ipolisin aitwasam imudun otunga.
Lugbara: Purezidenti leni polisi eyi ma ayuki osu eyi o'bi alea ku.

English: Police have been heavily deployed to prevent riots and strikes from people.
Luganda: Poliisi eyiiriddwa mu bungi okusobola okwewala obwegugungo n'okwekalakaasa mu bantu.
Runyankore: Hateirweho abaporiisi baingi, okuzibira obwimukiriro n'akesharingo omu bantu.
Acholi: Gi cwalo abili mapol me gengo jemo
Ateso: Ebwaikin ipolisin luipu kanu aitikokin aidiya ka amumu na itunga.
Lugbara: Ba o'ba arumadri ki karakara ani ecozu drionzi azini acita awoko e'dazu ri atrizu 'bayivu risi beni.

English: Police should learn from these party primaries.
Luganda: Poliisi erina okuyigira ku kamyufu k'ebibiina.
Runyankore: Poriisi eshemereire kureebera aha karuuru aka akarikubanza ak'ebibiina.
Acholi: Abili omyero gupwonye ki iyer me party ma otimeni
Ateso: Ekot ipolisin aisisiaun kotoma aseo nuitegearete nuka ipatei.
Lugbara: Le polisi eyi ma oni e'yo azi opeta amuti politiki ni 'diyi vu ri ma alea ra.

English: Uganda police will do reshuffles any time this year.
Luganda: Poliisi ya Uganda ejja kukola enkyukakyuka obudde bwonna mu mwaka guno.
Runyankore: Poriisi ya Uganda neija kukora empindahinduka omu bakozi omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Giboloko ludito Abili cawa moo keken imwakani
Ateso: Ebeit Uganda polis aijulujul ipolisin adio apak okaru lo.
Lugbara: Ba nga 'ba polisi ru kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi oja sa'wa cirisi.

English: The gun which the robbers used was stolen from the prison warden.
Luganda: Emmundu ababbi gye baakozesa yabibbwa ku mukuumi w'ekkomera.
Runyankore: Embundu ei abashuma bakoresize ekaibwa aha mukuumi w'abasibe.
Acholi: Muduku ma lukwo gutiyo kwedeni gikwalo kibot lawoda me buc
Ateso: Emudu lo etwasamaete ikokolak, ekokounitai kanejai esilikalet loka adieket
Lugbara: Ba ogu osu ogua 'da eyini ayuri engazu polisi azi arujo agei tepi ni vu.

English: Security operatives were arrested yesterday for killing a civilian.
Luganda: Ab'ebyokwerinda baakwatiddwa eggulo olw'okutta omutuuze.
Runyankore: Ab'eby'okwerinda bakwatsirwe nyomwebazo ahabw'okwita omuntu.
Acholi: Gimako lumony lawor pi neko dano acel
Ateso: Aponi ikamunai luka ayuara ibian kanu aiyar etunganan loka reya.
Lugbara: Ba obi aje 'ba azi agei tema ni 'diyi ma azi eyini 'ba azi agei tema ni ku ni 'dizu ri si.

English: Police have delayed releasing a report from investigations on the recent murder cases.
Luganda: Poliisi eruddewo okufulumya alipoota eva mu kunoonyereza ku misango gy'obutemu egibaddewo gye buvuddeko.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekyerereirwe kushohoza ripoota kuruga omu kucondooza aha mishango y'obwisi eherize kubaho.
Acholi: Abili gurii kamiyo lok ma okati ki ikwedgi ma lube ki lok me nek mapol ma otime cok-coki
Ateso: Eyap polis aitolomun eripota lo aingic lo iyarito lu pacu.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi eza sa'wa o'duko siza ofuzu e'yo eti ondaza e'yo 'bani ebizu 'bayi o'dizu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ra.

English: How many motorcycles will be distributed?
Luganda: Ppikipiki mmeka ezinaagabibwa?
Runyankore: Pikipiki ezirikwija kugabwa nizingahi?
Acholi: Piki-piki adii ma gibipoko?
Ateso: Ipikipikin idi ebeit akorakin?
Lugbara: Ba mu pikipiki si eyi awa ?

English: It is not good to eat alot of beef.
Luganda: Si kirungi okulya ennyo ennyama ya nte.
Runyankore: Okurya enyama nyingi tikiri kirungi.
Acholi: Pe ber me camo ringo madwong
Ateso: Mam ejok ainyam akiring naepol.
Lugbara: Eri adrini muke ku iza ibi nyazu ambamba.

English: What are the challenges that hinder good hygiene?
Luganda: Kusoomozebwa ki okulemesa obuyonjo?
Runyankore: Ebirikuremesa obuyonjo n'enki?
Acholi: Peko ango ma gengo lengo?
Ateso: Anubo atiokisio isimikitos nuka aila najokan?
Lugbara: E'yo alata atripi 'diyi a'du ma e'yo eyi?

English: How do you overcome poor hygiene?
Luganda: Ovvuunuka otya obujama?
Runyankore: Oburofa noobaasa kubwetantara ota?
Acholi: Itwero yubu lengo nining?
Ateso: Eipone ali itanangia ijo amamus aila?
Lugbara: Mi eco alata ako nde geri ngo eyi si?

English: Some business owners try to dodge paying taxes.
Luganda: Bannanyini bizinensi abamu bagezaako okwebalama okusasula emisolo.
Runyankore: Abaine bizinesi abamwe nibakira kweshereka okushashura omushoro.
Acholi: Wegi biacara mukene weyo culu mucoro
Ateso: Icie agwelanarak etamitos ainac aitacanen isolosinei.
Lugbara: Tujari werea 'diyi ma azi ma ei eyi o'bi musoro otru.

English: Good leadership impacts people's lives.
Luganda: Obukulembeze obulungi bukyusa obulamu bw'abantu.
Runyankore: Obwebembezi burungi nibutwaza gye amagara g'abantu.
Acholi: Tela maber loko kwo pa dano
Ateso: Eingarenone loajokan nes itojokari aijar itunga.
Lugbara: Driceta kililiru ri ni 'ba eyi ma edri oja.

English: Why is good hygiene important?
Luganda: Lwaki buyonjo bwa mugaso?
Runyankore: Ahabwenki obuyonjo buri obw'omugasho?
Acholi: Pingo lengo pire tek?
Ateso: Inyobo epolokotor nuka aila najokan?
Lugbara: Alata onyiru ri eri orodriru a'du ma e'yosi ?

English: What diseases are caused by eating overstayed meat?
Luganda: Ndwadde ki ezireetebwa okulya ennyama eruddewo?
Runyankore: Nindwara ki ezirikuruga omu kurya enyama etwireho?
Acholi: Two ango ma dano nongo ka ocamo ringo ma orii?
Ateso: Anubo adekasinei edumuno kowai lo ainyam akiring na iboyit?
Lugbara: Azo esule nyaka aa'pi 'bori ma nyata si 'diyi azo ngo eyi?

English: The prices of beef are high because of the Christmas season.
Luganda: Ebbeeyi y'ennyama eri waggulu olwa sizoni ya Ssekukkulu.
Runyankore: Emihendo y'enyama eri ahaiguru ahabwebiro bikuru by'okuzarwa kwa Yesu Kristo.
Acholi: Wel ringo omede pien kare me Karama dong cok
Ateso: Epolok itiaisine lu akiring kanu ebaga.
Lugbara: Eza ma aje tura a'dusikuni Natali eca di enyia 'bo.

English: Why are there few meat sellers in this town?
Luganda: Lwaki abatunzi b'ennyama mu kibuga kino batono nnyo?
Runyankore: Ahabwenki abarikuguza enyama omu tawuni egi nibakye?
Acholi: Pingo lucat ringo nok I taun man?
Ateso: Inyobo ikidiokotor itunga lu egwelanarete akiring otaun kalo?
Lugbara: Ba eza ozipi 'diyi ma kalafe tawuni 'di ma alea were ru a'du ma e'yosi ?

English: People now prefer buying meat from the city abattoir to community butcheries.
Luganda: Abantu kati baagala okugula ennyama mu lufula okusinga ku zi bbukya z'oku byalo.
Runyankore: Abantu hati nibakunda kugura enyama kuruga omu ibaagiro ery'omururembo, bagitwara omu mabaagiro ag'ebyaro.
Acholi: Dano dong komedini maro wilo ringo ki ikaneko lee ka iporo ki kacato ringo ma ikingangi
Ateso: Eminas kwana itunga egwelet akiring olufura itia aiboisio nu ocaalo.
Lugbara: O'biyi leki di 'doria tutunisi eza je agu iza olipi aku amboa 'diyivu aga agu iza olipi akueseleasi 'diyivu ru ra.

English: There is a need to regulate the prices in the market.
Luganda: Waliwo obwetaavu bw'okukendeeza ebbeeyi y'ebintu mu katale.
Runyankore: Hariho ekyetengo ky'okutereeza emihendo omu katare.
Acholi: Mite me yubu wel jami ma ikacat
Ateso: Ejai eipuda lo aitikitik itiaisinei kosokoni.
Lugbara: Eri orodriru afa ozile cu a 'diyi ma aje eyi onezu ra.

English: The city abattoir will be opened tomorrow.
Luganda: Lufula y'omu kibuga ejja kuggulwawo enkya.
Runyankore: Eibaagiro ry'omururembo nirigurwaho nyenkyakare.
Acholi: Kaneko ringo bibedo ayaba diki
Ateso: Engario moi ne etubutubere akiring.
Lugbara: Ba nga angu izaozizu aku ambua ri ma ti zi drusi.

English: All women will be given cows as a way to boost family income.
Luganda: Abakyala bonna bajja kuweebwa ente ng'engeri y'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'omu maka.
Runyankore: Abakazi boona nibaija kuheebwa ente, kugira ngu bongyere aha ntaatsya y'amaka.
Acholi: Mon weng binongo dyangi macalo yoo me medo cente gang
Ateso: Angor kere eponio aijaikin akituk kwape ewai lo ikeunet edumune lo okale.
Lugbara: Ba mu oku dria eyini ti oku eyi fe geri ecozu robia akua ri ma omgbo otuzu.

English: Butchers are advised to sell fresh meat to customers.
Luganda: Bbukya ziweebwa amagezi okutunda ennyama ennamu eri abaguzi baazo.
Runyankore: Abamabaagiro nibaragiirwa kuguza ba kasitoma enyama etatwireho.
Acholi: Lucat ringo omyero gucat ringo ma pwod ber bot lukastoma gi
Ateso: Aiboisio nu egwelanerere akiring kes icorakitai agwelanar akiring na epalal.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba eza ozipi 'diyini imbata eyi ma kasitoma eyini eza aa'pi ku ri ozizu i.

English: Most butchers have their own customers to whom they sell their meat.
Luganda: Bbukya ezisinga zirina abaguzi baazo be ziguza ennyama yaazo.
Runyankore: Amabaagiro agamwe, gaine bakasitoma baago abu garikuguza enyama.
Acholi: Pol lucat ringo tye ki lukastomagi ma gicato ringo botgi
Ateso: Aiboisio nuipu nu egwelanarere akiring ejaas keda ikasitomas kec lu itwegelete kesi akiring kec.
Lugbara: Angu eza ozizu 'diyi ma kasitoma eyini eza ozizu 'diyi ci.

English: Who are the responsible citizens?
Luganda: Abatuuze ab'obuvunaanyizibwa be b'ani?
Runyankore: Abatuuragye ab'obujunanizibwa nibaaha?
Acholi: Anywali lobo ma kwiri aye anga gi?
Ateso: Lubo angai eraas itunga lu emunoko?
Lugbara: Kari anzi e'yo vapira riki a'diki?

English: How do I maintain good health?
Luganda: Nsobola kukuuma ntya obulamu obulungi?
Runyankore: Nimbaasa nta kuguma nyine amagara marungi?
Acholi: Atwero gwoko yotkom nining?
Ateso: Eipone ali edaria eong angaleu najokan?
Lugbara: Ma eco ma rua ma ta mba alaru geri ngosi??

English: Pregnant mothers should be handled with care.
Luganda: Abakyala b'embuto balina okukwatibwa n'obwegendereza.
Runyankore: Abakazi b'enda bashemereire kureebererwa gye n'obwegyendesereza.
Acholi: Mon muyac omyero gunong gwok maber
Ateso: Ekot angor nu epotiete aidar ejok.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma mba oku okporovu ru 'diyi ma ta geri kililiru 'diyisi.

English: Babies bring honour to the family.
Luganda: Abaana baleeta ekitiibwa mu maka.
Runyankore: Abeereere nibareeta ekitiinisa omu maka.
Acholi: Lutino onyu kelo awaka igang
Ateso: Eyaunete idwe aibusesu ore.
Lugbara: Odekua eyi inzita eji aku ma alea.

English: It was a painful moment when I was giving birth.
Luganda: Kaali kaseera ka bulimi bwe nali nzaala.
Runyankore: Nkashaasha munonga obu naabaire ninzara.
Acholi: Obedo kare me arem matek ikare ma atye ka nywal
Ateso: Arai aipup apipilu kapak kana edouno eong.
Lugbara: Mva osita andra ma dri azo be tre.

English: Where can I get immunised from yellow fever?
Luganda: Wa gye nsobola okwegemeseza omusujja gw'enkaka?
Runyankore: Ninkaahi ahu ndikubaasa kusirikirwa omushwija ogurikwetwa Yellow Fever?
Acholi: Kwene ma aromo nongo yat agwera pi gengo two yellow fever
Ateso: Aibo apedori eong adumakin ekato loka eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
Lugbara: Ma eco aro soza esu azo yellow fever niri si ngua?

English: How can I get my medical records from the hospital?
Luganda: Nsobola ntya okufuna ebikwata ku bulamu bwange okuva mu ddwaliro?
Runyankore: Nimbaasa kutunga nta ebihandiiko byangye kuruga omwirwariro?
Acholi: Atwero nongo ripot me yotkoma nining ki iotyat?
Ateso: Eipone ali adumunia eong aiwadikaeta ka kadekis?
Lugbara: Ma eco e'yo siza ma rua ala ma dria 'diyi esu engazu arojoa geri ngo si?

English: Is it normal for feet to swell during pregnancy?
Luganda: Kya bulijjo ebigere okuzimba ng'oli lubuto?
Runyankore: Noogira ngu kihikire omuntu kuzimba ebigyere yaaba aine enda?
Acholi: Tyen makwot ikare ma dako oyac obedo gin matime bot mon weng?
Ateso: Biyai ebeit akeje abuonor kapak kana epotiere?
Lugbara: Eri we piri oku eyi ma pa eyini otuzu eyini adri ria okporovu ru?

English: Breastfeeding is good for both the baby and its mother.
Luganda: Okuyonsa kulungi eri omwana ne maama we.
Runyankore: Okwonsya  nikurungi aha mwana na nyina.
Acholi: Doto latin ber pi latin ki mine
Ateso: Erai aitanak na ejok kanu ikoku keda toto.
Lugbara: Mva endruza eri ala odekua ni tualu i ma ayia be.

English: Why is the dropout rate so high?
Luganda: Lwaki okuwanduka mu ssomero kungi ennaku zino?
Runyankore: Ahabw'enki okuruga abaana abarikuruga omu ishomero beeyongyeire?
Acholi: Pingo wel lutino magiko kwan tye ka mede?
Ateso: Inyobo epolor aibironor kosomeroi?
Lugbara: Anzi sukulu ku pi 'diyi karakara 'dini a'du ma e'yosi.?

English: There is another training today for those that missed out.
Luganda: Waliwo okutendekebwa okulala leero okw'abo abaasubwa.
Runyankore: Erizooba hariho omushomo gwabo abaabaire batariho.
Acholi: Tye pwony mukene magiyubu tin pi joo ma okeng
Ateso: Ejai bobo aitutuoro acie ilolo kanu angul lu opotu otwakiasi.
Lugbara: Imbata azi andru ci 'ba andra ecepi ra 'diyi ni.

English: There is a low women representation in parliament.
Luganda: Okukiikirirwa kw'abakyala mu paalamenti kutono.
Runyankore: Abarikujwekyera abakazi omu omwishengyero nibakye.
Acholi: Lutela pa mon matye iparliament ginok
Ateso: Edit abwoikinio na angor kotoma airabet.
Lugbara: Kalafe okuyi ma o'dukoti idripi paliamentia 'diyi ma kalafe caniku.

English: How does domestic violence affect a woman?
Luganda: Obutabanguko mu maka bukosa butya omukyala?
Runyankore: Obutabanguko omu maka nibuteganisa buta omukazi?
Acholi: Kuku-kuku ma iot kelo peko ango ikwo pa dako?
Ateso: Eipone ali ejaunor aberu kanu amumu na okale?
Lugbara: Ngiringiri aku eselea si ri ni oku yi 'ye ngoni?

English: What challenges are faced by women today?
Luganda: Kusoomozebwa ki abakyala kwe basanga ennaku zino?
Runyankore: Obwahati abakazi baine buremeezi ki?
Acholi: Peki ango ma mon tye ka nongone ikare man?
Ateso: Anubo atiokisio etereikina keda angor ilolo?
Lugbara: E'yo ewaru oku eyini esu andru 'diyi a'du ma e'yo eyi?

English: It is unfortunate that even today women are being oppressed.
Luganda: Kya nnaku nti ne leero abakyala bakyatulugunyizibwa.
Runyankore: N'eky'obusaasi okureeba ngu n'obwahati abakazi nibabonabonesibwa.
Acholi: Obedo lok me par tutwal me nenoni wa ikin kareni gitye ka diyo mon
Ateso: Eraas nu ican araida itoni ilolo eridakitai angor.
Lugbara: Eri candiru nizu kini 'ba nga po'di oku eyini candi fe kpere andru.

English: A girl child is as important as a boy child.
Luganda: Omwana omuwala wa mugaso ng'omwana omulenzi.

Ateso: Uganda nes ejatatr keda ekabi loepol lo ikerak kakwap.
Lugbara: Emunyale karakara ndeni angu 'di ma alea 'diyi kari Uganda niria.

English: How many cows are they giving out?
Luganda: Nte mmeka ze bagaba?
Runyankore: Bariyo nibagaba ente zingahi?
Acholi: Dyangi adii ma gitye ka poko?
Ateso: Akituk adi ijaikinete kesi?
Lugbara: Ti 'bani fe 'diyi si?

English: What is the difference between the two candidates?
Luganda: Njawulo ki eriwo wakati w'abeesimbyewo ababiri?
Runyankore: Entaaniso eri ahagati y'abesimbireho babiri neeha?
Acholi: Apoka-poka ango matye ikin lucungu aryoni?
Ateso: Inyobo atiaketait kiding abwaak iyarei?
Lugbara: Esele coza 'ba baka sepi iri 'dayi eyi vuri a'duni

English: Who are the vulnerable people in the community?
Luganda: Mu kitundu kyammwe b'ani abeetaaga obuyambi?
Runyankore: Abantu abataine kihwera omu kyanga nibaahi?
Acholi: Dano mene ma peko twero poto i kom gi oyot ikabedo man?
Ateso: Alubo itunga ewanyunitos ican katutubet?
Lugbara: Ba e'yoni nde enyaenya riki enyatia 'dia a'diki?

English: Why should you speak on that matter?
Luganda: Lwaki olina okwogera ku nsonga eyo?
Runyankore: Ahabw'enki oshemereire kugamba aha nshonga egyo?
Acholi: Pingo omyero ilok i kom lok meno?
Ateso: Anuinyo ebeitor ijo einer nuikamunitos ngun?
Lugbara: Le mi ma nze e'yo e'yo 'da ma dria ci a'dusi?

English: Why should you comment on that?
Luganda: Lwaki olina okwogera ku ekyo?
Runyankore: Ahabwenki oshemereire kuhayo ekiteiso aha nshonga egyo?
Acholi: Pingo omyero ilok i kom lok meno?
Ateso: Anuinyo ebeitor ijo alimun adio nuikamunitos ngun?
Lugbara: Le mi ape ti e'yo 'da ma dria ci a'dusi?

English: You must be a hard working person.
Luganda: Olina okubeera omuntuo mukozi nnyo.
Runyankore: Nooteekwa kuba ori omuntu omukozi.
Acholi: Nen calo ibedo dano ma tiyo matek tutwal
Ateso: Ekot ijo orai itunganan yen ikukurana.
Lugbara: Le mi ma adri 'baazi azi ngapi okporu ni i.

English: We are issuing out fertilizers to the most active farmers.
Luganda: Tugabira abalimi abasinga okufaayo ebigimusa.
Runyankore: Abahingi abarikukora n'amaani nitubagabira orwezo.
Acholi: Wa tye ka poko fertlizer bot lupur ma kwiri loyo
Ateso: Ijanakini iso ikee nueyaunete ebolia nejaas akoriok lu iswamaete noi.
Lugbara: Ama afa nyaka ezozu 'diyi fe agu amvu 'yapi avasi ndeni 'diyi pini.

English: We need exemplary leaders.
Luganda: Twetaaga abakulembeze abalabirwako.
Runyankore: Nitwetenga abeebembezi abari eky'okureeberaho kirungi.
Acholi: Wamito lutela ma miyo lanyut maber
Ateso: Ikoto iso engarenok lu ejokuka.
Lugbara: Ale drice'ba ecetaru 'dileni eyi i.

English: The opposition leader was against that bill.
Luganda: Omukulembeze w'oludda oluvuganya yali tawagira tteeka eryo.
Runyankore: Orikukurira orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti akaba naarwanisa ekiteiso ekyo.
Acholi: Latela me opposition pe ocwako cik eno ni
Ateso: Etepegit engarenon loka etepegak apugan ekisil ngol.
Lugbara: Drile 'ba agbatara gbaapi gamete be 'diyi niri ga ndra azita 'da si

English: This election is going to be very interesting.
Luganda: Okulonda kuno kugenda kunyuma nnyo.
Runyankore: Akaruuru nikaza kuba ak'omutaano.
Acholi: Yer man neno ne bibedo mit
Ateso: Ebeit aseo na araun na itegelikina nuke.
Lugbara: Opeta 'dini mu ndri saaru.

English: How can the government increase the cattle population?
Luganda: Gavumenti eyinza etya okwongera ku bungi bw'ente?
Runyankore: Gavumenti neebaasa kwongyera eta aha matungo?
Acholi: Gamente twero medo wel dyangi nining?
Ateso: Eipone ali iyatakina apugan enaba lo akituk?
Lugbara: Gamete eco ti eyi ma kalafe otu geri ngo eyi si?

English: Bad politicians always engage in illegal activities.
Luganda: Bannabyabufuzi ababi bulijjo beenyigira mu mirimu egimenya amateeka.
Runyankore: Ab'eby'obutegyeki ababi buriijo nibeejumba omu bikorwa ebitahikire.
Acholi: Lutela ma kitgi racu polkare timo tic ma turu cik
Ateso: Ipolitisians luarokok iswamete duc nu mam ibusanikitos.
Lugbara: Ba politikia onzi 'diyi sa'wa dria eyi su e'yo azita ni leleku 'diyi ma alea.

English: These leaders are selfish.
Luganda: Abakulembeze bano beeyagaliza bokka.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi aba nibeyendeza.
Acholi: Lutela man paro pi gi kengi
Ateso: Ibitioko engarenok lu.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'diyi eyi ikpere ru.

English: Every woman should find some non government organisation to work with.
Luganda: Buli mukazi alina okunoonya ekitongole ky'obwannayewa okukola nakyo.
Runyankore: Buri mukazi ashemereire kusherura ekitongore kitari kya gavumenti eky’okukora nakyo.
Acholi: Mon weng  omyero gunongo tic ki dul ma pe jenge i kom gamente
Ateso: Ibusakinit anginiberu adumun aswam kotoma oriongeta lumam eraasi luka apugan.
Lugbara: Le oku alu alu ma esu amuti gamete ma pala ku diyi ma azi ecozu azi ngazu yi be.

English: Banana wastes are being used in the production of biogas.
Luganda: Ebikuta by'amatooke bikozesebwa okukola amasannyalaze ga nnakavundira.
Runyankore: Ebishushu by'ebitookye nibikozesibwa omu kukora Biogas.
Acholi: Yugi labolo gitye katic kwede me yubu gas me tedo
Ateso: Akuleta nu etaget itwasamao aiswama ekwam lo inoka.
Lugbara: Ba a'bua ma gasia ayu ali vepi aciru ri idezu.

English: There is an increase in the growing of bananas in western Uganda.
Luganda: Okulima amatooke kweyongedde mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Okuhinga ebitookye omu burengyrw'izooba bwa Uganda kweyongyeire.
Acholi: Pito labolo tye ka mede matek itung poto ceng me Uganda
Ateso: Apolor akoru na amugog ko too nako Uganda.
Lugbara: A'bua ezoza ma omgbo tu kari Uganda niri ma woko etu ni 'deria le ruri ma alea ra.

English: Vanilla is in high demand.
Luganda: Vvanira ali nnyo ku katale.
Runyankore: Vannila eri aha katare.
Acholi: Cuk me vanilla tye malo
Ateso: Epol eipuda noi loka banila
Lugbara: Afa omvele vanilla ru ri ma cu 'bua.

English: New species of bananas have been introduced to ensure continuous productivity.
Luganda: Ebika by'amatooke ebipya bireeteddwa okusobola okukakasa nti okulima amatooke kusigala kugenda mu maaso.
Runyankore: Embibo nsya z'emitumba zireesirwe kugira bigumizemu nibyera.
Acholi: Kodi labolo mukene gityeko kelo ne pi neno ni pito labolo obed kamede
Ateso: Etolomun ibegoi lu amugog luitetiak kanu aitopoloria akoru.
Lugbara: Ba iji a'bua ori o'dini ki ani neza kilili ru kini 'abua ofuta nimu drile.

English: Very few people have joined cotton farming.
Luganda: Abantu batono nnyo abeenyigidde mu kulima ppamba.
Runyankore: Abantu bakye nibo beejumbire omukuhinga pamba.
Acholi: Dano manok odonyo ipito pama
Ateso: Ikidioko itunga lu alomasi akoru epaba.
Lugbara: Ba were eyi fi pamba ma 'yata alea ni.

English: People in urban areas can use small spaces for poultry farming.
Luganda: Abantu abali mu bibuga basobola okulundira enkoko awafunda.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omundembo nibabaasa kukoresa eitaka rikye okutunga enkoko.
Acholi: Dano mabedo itaun twero tic ki ngom manok me gwoko gweni
Ateso: Epedorete itunga luko otaun aitwasam aiboisit na edite kanu aipisia ikweny.
Lugbara: Ba angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eco pari werea 'diyi ayu au eyi ezozu ra.

English: The project will support banana growers to continue with banana production.
Luganda: Pulojekiti ejja kuyamba abalimi b'amatooke okugenda mu maaso n'okulima amatooke.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti neeza kuhwera abahingi b'ebitookye okugumizamu nibabihinga.
Acholi: Project meno bikonyo lupit labolo me mede ki pito labolo
Ateso: Elosi epurojeckt aingarakin itunga lu akoriok amugog ainyikokite aitolom etaget.
Lugbara: Otita 'dini mu atita fe 'ba a'bua ezopi 'diyini eyini ani muzu a'bua ma edeta be drile.

English: Farmers have improved on the quality of banana products on the market.
Luganda: Abalimi bongedde ku mutindo gw'ebintu ebiva mu matooke ebiri ku katale.
Runyankore: Abantu bongyeire aha mutindo gw'ebitokye omu katare.
Acholi: Lupur gumedo rwom me labolo ki jami mukene manonge ki ilabolo ma tye ikacat
Ateso: Ekeutu akoriok adoketait na etaget kosokoni.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'yaba 'diyi otuku onyi afa edele a'buasi 'diyi dri cua ri 'bo.

English: Commercial agriculture will increase Uganda's exports.
Luganda: Obulimi bw'ebirime ebitundibwa bujja kwongera ku muwendo gw'ebintu ebitundibwa ebweru w'eggwanga.
Runyankore: Okuhinga eby'obushubuzi, nikiza kwongyera ahabintu ebirikuguzibwa aheeru y'eihanga.
Acholi: Pur ipoto madongo kun gitiyo ki Cuma bi medo cente ma lobo Uganda nongo ki icato jami ilobo ma woko
Ateso: Akoru na agwelanar ebuni aiyatakin agwelanario na iboro kinga nako Uganda.
Lugbara: Amvu 'yaza agbari sende isuzu ri fe Uganda ma nyaka ozile uganda risi amveleru ri tu 'bo.

English: Every village should have a tractor that can be used by farmers.
Luganda: Buli kyalo kirina okubeera ne ttulakita abalimi gye basobola okukozesa.
Runyankore: Buri kyaro kishemereire kugira karakita yokukozesibwa abahingi.
Acholi: Caro acel-acel omyero obed ki tractor ma lupur tiyo kwede
Ateso: Ekot ngol ecaalo ajaut keda aturakita na itwasamaete akoriok.
Lugbara: Le calo dria ma adrala 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyini eco ayu ni ma aa ci.

English: Farmers have to be supported to address existing challenges.
Luganda: Abalimi balina okuyambibwa okusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa okuliwo.
Runyankore: Abahingi bashemereire kuhwerwa, bakabaasa kumaraho oburemeezi bwabo.
Acholi: Lupur omyero gunong kony pi cobo peko mapatpat ma ginongo
Ateso: Ekot akoriok aigangakite kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas.
Lugbara: Leta 'bama fe 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ni atita ra ani ecozu e'yo ewaru e'yini alizu alenia si 'diyi ma ti ndezu.

English: Youth and women have generated income from banana growing.
Luganda: Abavubuka n'abakyala bafunye ensimbi mu kulima amatooke.
Runyankore: Abakazi n'eminyeeto batungire sente omu kuhinga ebitookye.
Acholi: Bulu ki mon gunongo cente ki ipito labolo
Ateso: Atumunak keda angor eswamautu ikapun kotoma akoru etaget.
Lugbara: Ba ode diyi tualu Oku eyi be esu robia a'bua ezoza si.

English: There is increased demand for local products on the international market.
Luganda: Ebyamaguzi ebikolebwa  kuno byeyongedde okwettanirwa ku katale k'ensi yonna.
Runyankore: Ebintu ebirikukorerwa omwihanga biine akatare kahango omu mahanga goona.
Acholi: Cuk tye malo me wilo jami ma aa ki kany ci gicwalo ilobo mawoko
Ateso: Apolor eipuda lo iboro kalu iswamao ore kosokonin luko kinga.
Lugbara: Cu afa 'bani ofu amavile 'dia ogogo 'diyi dri angu amveleru ria angiri.

English: It involves analysing cash inflow and outflow.
Luganda: Kizingiramu okwekenneenya ennyingiza ya ssente n'enfulumya yaazo.
Runyankore: Harimu okushwijuma sente ezirikushohora n'ezirikwija.
Acholi: Tic ce mito neno ki diro cente ma tye ka donyo ki cente ma gitye ka kwanyo pi tic
Ateso: Ekot airereonor eitolome lo ikapun ka etwasamae.
Lugbara: Alenia indiri silingi ifipi ripima ale andrizu silingi fupi ribe ri i.

English: The number of palm oil growers is increasing in the country.
Luganda: Enamba y'abalimu b'ebinazi yeeyongera mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuhinga ebijuma ebirikugamu buto gw'eyongyeire omu ihanga.
Acholi: Wel lupit yat gasi me yubu moo dek tye ka doko pol ilobo Uganda
Ateso: Enaba itunga kalu ekoriete idukudukun kanu akinyet eyatakinos kakwap.
Lugbara: Ba mbela ezopi 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu kari 'di ma alea tutu.

English: The challenges faced by oil palm growers will be addressed.
Luganda: Okusoomoozebwa abalimi b'ebinazi kwe basanga kujja kugonjoolwa.
Runyankore: Oburemeezi oburikushangwa abahingi b'ebinazi, nibwija kukorwaho.
Acholi: Peki ma lupit yadi gasi pi yubu moo dek ginongo be bedo ki lagam
Ateso: Atiokisio nu itereikina keda akotiok luka idukudukun eponio aitemokin.
Lugbara: Ba nga e'yo 'ba mbela ezopi 'diyi ni esu 'diyi ma aza ko ra.

English: People have to engage in economic activities to acquire income.
Luganda: Abantu beenyigidde mu mirimu egivaamu ssente okusobola okufuna ssente.
Runyankore: Abantu baine kwejumba omubushubuzi babaase kutunga entaasya.
Acholi: Dano omyero oyele ki tic wek onong cente
Ateso: Ekot itunga ajaut akiro aswamisinei kanu adumun ikapun.
Lugbara: Le 'bama fiki e'yo ecopi lonyi ejipi ra 'diyi 'ye ani ecozu lonyi isuzu

English: People will be given land and seeds to increase palm oil growing.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kuweebwa ettaka n'ensigo okusobola okwongera ku bulimi bw'ebinazi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibaija kuheebwa eitaka n'embibo okwongyera okuhinga ebijuma ebirikukorwa buto.

Ateso: Eponio itunga aijaikin alupok keda ikinyom kanu aiyatakina akoru idukudukun.
Lugbara: Ba mu o'bi eyini nyaku fe ori eyi be mbela ezoza ma omgbo otuzu.

English: The local processors will provide a market for the palm oil farmers.
Luganda: Amakolero ga wano gajja kuwa abalimi b'ebinazi akatale.
Runyankore: Amakorero ag'omwihanga nigaija kuha abahingi b'ebinazi akatare.
Acholi: Luyub moo bi mmiyo cuk me wil pi lupur ma opito yadi gasi
Ateso: Etemonokinak kes epote adumakin akoriok idukudukun esokoni.
Lugbara: Ba odu edepi ogogo 'diyi nya cu fe agu mbela ezopi o'duni 'diyini ra.

English: People got an income-generating opportunity which has improved their social life.
Luganda: Abantu baaafuna ebintu bye baggyamu ensimbi ekibaganyulidde awamu.
Runyankore: Abantu bakagira omugisha gw'okutunga entaasya, ekireesire entunguuka aha magara gaabo.
Acholi: Dano onongo tic ma kelo cente icing gi ma oloko kit ma gikwo kwede ikin dano
Ateso: Apotu itunga odumutu arerengu na aswamaunun ikapun ido ekeu aijar kec.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi esu geri robia esuzu eyi ma edri 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri otu pi saaru ni i.

English: Improvement of people's lives should be a priority for this new program.
Luganda: Okutumbula embeera y'obulamu bw'abantu kirina okubeera ku mwanjo mu nteekateeka eno empya.
Runyankore: Okutunguura omutindo gw'abantu, nikyo kishemereire kwebembera omu nteekateeka ensya egi.
Acholi: Medo rwom me kwo pa dano omyero obed lok ma pire tek loyo iyub manyen matye kabino ni
Ateso: Aitojokario naka aijar itunga nes ebeit kanu ainapeta  nuitetiak .
Lugbara: Bayi ma idri otuta ma ovu e'yo otita 'dinin 'du angiri ndeni ri i

English: What is happening in Uganda?
Luganda: Ki ekigenda mu maaso mu Uganda?
Runyankore: N'enki ekiriho omu Uganda ?
Acholi: Ngo ma tye ka time iUganda?
Ateso: Inyobo iswama ko uganda?
Lugbara: A'du e'yo ni i 'ye Kari Uganda niri ma alea ni??

English: The ministry will distribute palm oil seeds to the farmers.
Luganda: Minisitule ejja kugabira abalimi ensigo z'ebinazi.
Runyankore: Minisiture neija kugabira abahingi b'ebinazi embibo.
Acholi: Ministry bi poko ki lupur kodi gasi me apita pi yubu moo
Ateso: Ebuni erionget akoranakin icok luka idukudukun nejaas akoriok.
Lugbara: Gamete ni mu mbela ori eyi awa 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri.

English: The government will increase funds for palm oil production.
Luganda: Gavumenti ejja kwongera ku nsimbi z'essa mu kulima ebinazi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, neeza kwongyera aha sente z'okuhinga ebinazi.
Acholi: Gamente bi medo cente pi neno ni giyubu moo gasi maromo
Ateso: Ebuni apugan aiyatakin ikapun kanuka aitolomunono naka akinyet.
Lugbara: Gamete ni mu robia mbela odu edezuri ma omgbo idri.

English: Palm oil growing has been encouraged locally.
Luganda: Okulima ebinazi kubadde kukubirizibwa wano.
Runyankore: Okuhinga ebinazi, kweyongyeire omu byaro.
Acholi: Gitye ka konyo lupur mapol me donyo ipito yadi gasi me yubu moo dek
Ateso: Isinyikokitai akorio naka idukudukun kocaaloi.
Lugbara: Ba ebi o'biyini ava fe mbela odu ezozu enyia 'dia

English: The minister showed the president the progress in the Agricultural sector.
Luganda: Minisita yalaze pulezidenti ebituukiddwako mu byobulimi.
Runyankore: Minisita akooreka mukuru w'eihanga entunguuka ahu yaahika omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Minista onyutu ki Ladit lobo kit ma jami tye ka yube kwede malube ki lok i kom pur
Ateso: Abu eminista itodik lokapolon akwap eipone lo elosio akoru akonye.
Lugbara: Minista e'da amboo kari dri ocepi ri ni zota arakala amvu'yaza niria ri i

English: Every farmer should rear animals in addition to growing crops.
Luganda: Buli mulimi alina okulunda ebisolo okwongereza ku kulima ebirime.
Runyankore: Buri muhingi ashemerire kugira n'amatungo.
Acholi: Lapur acel-acel omyero ogwok lee omed ki pito cam
Ateso: Ekot ngol akorion aipit ibaren kanu aiyatakina ikorion.
Lugbara: Le 'ba dria amvu 'yapiri ma mba anyapa eyi ma ta nyaka ezoza ma dria.

English: All local council chairpersons need to at least have a bicycle.
Luganda: Bassentebe b'ebyalo bonna beetaaga waakiri okubeera n'obugaali.
Runyankore: Bakuru b'entebe ahabukiiko bw'ebyaro haakiri baine kugira egaari.
Acholi: Lukancila mapiny omyero olo twal gubed ki gari
Ateso: Itunga luejaas lukapok eiclong katutubena  ekot ajaut keda igalin.
Lugbara: Leta 'ba woro LC ru ri ma gari ma ovu ci

English: Extension workers need new vehicles and motorcycles.
Luganda: Abakozi abatambuza ebintu beetaaga emmotoka ne ppikipiki empya
Runyankore: Abahingisa nibetengaga emotoka nsya na za Pikipiki.
Acholi: Lumii ngec bot lupur mito mutoka ki piki=piki
Ateso: Eswamak lu iyakitai kes ebeit ajaut keda imotokan ka ipikipikin. luitetiak
Lugbara: Agu azi ngapi amvu'yaza be enyatia 'diyi ma mutuka o'di azini pikipiki ma avu ci

English: Farmers need help to reach certain markets.
Luganda: Abalimi beetaaga obuyambi okutuuka ku butale obumu
Runyankore: Abahingi nibetenga obuhwezi kubaasa kuhika omu butare obumwe.
Acholi: Lupur mito kony me nongo kacato jami gi
Ateso: Ekotosi akoriok agangat kanu adumun isokonin icie.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi le azakoma eyini ani ecozu cazu cu azi 'diyi ma alea ra.

English: It can preserve the milk for a long time.
Luganda: Kisobola okukuuma amata okumala ebbanga eggwanvu.
Runyankore: Nikibaasa kurinda amate kumara obwire buraingwa.
Acholi: Twero gwoko cak pi kare malac
Ateso: Epedori aidar akile ayangaikin aojau naepol.
Lugbara: Eco lesu ma tamba eza kokoru sa'wa ezu ra.

English: It is reliable and can assess the quality of all milk products.
Luganda: Kyesigamibwako era kisobola okwekenneenya omutindo gw'ebintu byonna ebikolebwa mu mata.
Runyankore: Nikeesigwa kandi nkashwijume omutindo gwa byona ebirikuruga omu mate.
Acholi: Gene dok bene nyuto rwom me jami mapatpat ma ki yubu ki i kom cak
Ateso: Erai lo emunoi ido epedori awanyanar adoketait na iboro lu akile.
Lugbara: Ba eco asi 'ba drinia ra azini eco afa edele lesusi 'diyi ma onyi one woro ra.

English: It is efficient and gives instant feedback.
Luganda: Kakola bulungi era kazza mangu obubaka.
Runyankore: Nikeesigwa kandi nikareeteraho ebyarugamu.
Acholi: Tiyo maber dok bene miyo adwogi lok cut
Ateso: Iswamai ejok itodikini ijo akiro atipet.
Lugbara: Eri azi nga ala azini eri o'dukoti ogo cotocoti

English: What nutrients are found in the milk?
Luganda: Biriisa ki ebisangibwa mu mata?
Runyankore: Ni biriisa ki ebirikushangwa omu mate?
Acholi: Moc cam ango manonge icak?
Ateso: Alubo iboro edumakino akile.
Lugbara: Afa orodriru esule lesu ma alea 'diyi a'du afa eyi?

English: There is a device which analyzes the quality level of milk.
Luganda: Waliwo akuuma ekyekenneenya omutindo gw'amata.
Runyankore: Hariho ekyoma ekirikukyebera omutindo gw'amate.
Acholi: Tye Cuma moo ma pimo kit ma rwom pa cak tye kwede
Ateso: Ejai acuma na ipimae adoketait na akile.
Lugbara: Masini azi lesu ma muke ma omgbo o'bipi ni ci

English: Every government school should have a laboratory.
Luganda: Buli ssomero lya bonnabasome lirina okuba n'ekkeberero.
Runyankore: Buri ishomero rya Gavumenti rishemereire kugira rabaratore.
Acholi: Gangkwan pa gamente ducu omyero obed ki laboratory
Ateso: Ekot ngol esomero lo apugan ajaut keda aiboisit naitetemonorere ainwak iboro.
Lugbara: Le sukulu dria gamete ni 'diyi ma pari afa eyi o'bizu omvele laboratory ru 'diyi ci

English: Every farmer can be able to test their own milk for marketing purposes.
Luganda: Buli mulimu asobola okwekeberera amata ge nga tannagatunda.
Runyankore: Buri muriisa naaba naabaasa kukyebera amate ge g'okuguza.
Acholi: Lapur acel-acel twero pimo cak ma mege pi konyo ki kit me nongo yoo me cat
Ateso: Ekot ngol akorion opedorite aiwany akile ke kanu esokono.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi eco di eyi ma lesu o'bi ra e'yo cu ni 'diyisi

English: Farmers will be able to preserve milk and prevent contamination.
Luganda: Abalimi bajja kusobola okutereka obulungi amata n'okugakuuma obutayonooneka.
Runyankore: Abariisa nibaija kuba nibamanya okurinda gye amate n'okuzibira ebitokoozi.
Acholi: Lupur bibedo ki kero me gwoko cak ki me gengo bale ne
Ateso: Ebeit akoriok apedor aidar akile tetere mam emunaros.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'ya'ba azini anyapa ta mba'ba 'diyi eco di eyi ma lesu ma ta mba alaru ra dika eyi ma ezata atri ra

English: Farmers were able to learn how to produce quality milk and how to preserve it.
Luganda: Abalimi baasobola okuyiga engeri y'okufulumyamu amata agali ku mutindo n'engeri y'okugakuumamu.
Runyankore: Abariisa bakegyesibwa oku bashemereire kugira amate g'omutindo n'okugarinda gatasisikaire.
Acholi: Lupur gunongo pwony ikit me yubu cak ma rwome malo ki bene kit me gwoko ne wek pe obale
Ateso: Apotu akoriok opedosi aisisia eipone lo itolomere akile ejokuka ka eipone lo idaris aojau.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'ya'ba azini anyapa ta mba'ba 'diyi oni ndra geri lesu edezu kililiru 'diyi azini lesu ta mbazu ezakokoru 'diyi ra

English: It will help farmers with milk products to access the international market.
Luganda: Kijja kuyamba abalimi abalina ebintu ebikolebwa mu mata okufuna akatale k'ensi yonna.
Runyankore: Nikiija kuhwera abariisa abaine ebirikuruga omu mate okuhika aha katare k'amahanga goona.
Acholi: Bikonyo lupur mayubu jami mukene ki i kom cak me nongo yoo me cato jami gi ilobo mawoko
Ateso: Ingarakini akoriok lu ejaas keda iboro lu akile adumun esokoni lo kinga.
Lugbara: Eri nga 'ba amvu 'ya'ba azini anyapa ta mba'ba afa edele lesusi 'diyi ozipi 'diyi ma aza ko cu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri esuzu

English: The dairy farmers will now have access to mobile laboratories.
Luganda: Abalunzi b'ente kati bajja kusobola okufuna amakeberero agatambuzibwa.
Runyankore: Abariisa b'ente z'amate, nibaija kutunga obuheereza bwa rabaratore ezirikugyenda nizetoroora.

Lugbara: Ba lesu ozipi 'diyi eco di nga angu afa eyi o'bizu omvele laboratory ru 'bani oji angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra 'diyi esu ra

English: The laboratory will test the quality levels of milk.
Luganda: Ekkeberero lijja kukebera omutindo gw'amata.
Runyankore: Rabaratore neeza kukyebera oburungi bw'amate.
Acholi: Ka pimo cak bi pimo rwom me cak
Ateso: Inwakio kaiboisit nainwakere adoketait na akile.
Lugbara: Angu afa eyi o'bizu omvele laboratory ru 'diyi nga lesu eyi ma muke o'bi

English: Agriculture has developed with the introduction of new equipment and dairy processors.
Luganda: Ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikulaakulanye nnyo olw'okujja kw'ebikozesebwa ebipya n'ebikozesebwa mu kulongoosa amata.
Runyankore: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bitunguukire ahabw'okureetamu ebyoma bisya hamwe n'ebirikwongyera omutindo aha mate.
Acholi: Tic malube ki pur odongo nicake ma gikelo Cuma manyen ki luwil cak madongo
Ateso: Eteteun akoru kanu ayaunere iswamasia luitetiak lu itemonokinere akile.
Lugbara: Agirikica zo afa ndundu ayule agirikica ni edele o'diru 'diyisi tualu afa lesu edezu edele o'diru 'diyi be

English: The Dairy development authority has spearheaded milk production, processing and supply.
Luganda: Ekitingole kya Dairy Development Authority kiwomye omutwe mu kufulumya amata, okugalongoosa n'okugasaasaanya.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ekirikukora aha by'amate kyebembeize okukora amate, okugongyera omutindo n'okugaha abantu.
Acholi: Dul me Dairy Development Authority tye ka doro tic me gwoko lee pi nongo cak madwong, yubu jami ma aa i kom cak, ki dong lok me cat
Ateso: Erionget Loitojokaarit Akile  nes isingarenit aitolomio na akile, aitemonokino ka aikor.
Lugbara: Amuti gamete ni e'yo lesuni ma kale ondrepi Dairy development authority niri ni e'yo lesu zoza ongmbo angirisirini, edeza kililirini azini awazu diyi ma dri ce ni.

English: One of the government's priority is to provide agricultural equipment to the farmers.
Luganda: Ekimu ku gavumenti by'ekulembezza kwe kuwa abalimi ebyeyambisibwa mu kulima.
Runyankore: Kimwe aha bintu bikuru ebi Gavumenti eine kukora n'okuha abahingi ebyoma by'okukoresa.
Acholi: Tic acel ma gamente tye ka yele pire matek aye me neno ni lupur tye gi jami ma konyo gi ki pur
Ateso: Idiopet kotoma oboro lu ekot apugan nes aijaikin akoriok iswamasia lu akoru.
Lugbara: Gamete ma e'yo azi erini 'ba e'yo okporu ri eri afa ndundu agirikica 'yezu 'diyi fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri

English: More and more farmers will acquire better and improved services throughout the country.
Luganda: Abalimi bangi nnyo okwetooloola eggwanga bajja kweyongera okufuna empeereza  ennungi.
Runyankore: Abahingi baingi munonga nibaza kutunga obuheereza burungi obw'omutindo, omu ihanga ryona.

Lugbara: Ba karakarawu amvu 'yabaa diyi nga azi ngaza muke azini ojata kililliru be dileni esu kari ma alia dria

English: Farmers were equipped with relevant knowledge to conduct activities in a profitable manner.
Luganda: Abalimi baaweereddwa amagezi ku nzirukanya y'emirimu mu ngeri ewa amagoba.
Runyankore: Abahingi bakabangurwa n'obwengye oburikwetengwa omukukora emirimo yaabo, omu muringo ogurikubareetera amagoba.
Acholi: Lupur gunongo ngec mamite pi mede ki pur i yo ma kelo magoba madit
Ateso: Aponi isisianakinai akoriok acoa na itolosere aswamisinei nu imedaikinete kes.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini ondua ecozu 'yeta orodri ogopi ra 'diyi ma 'yeta ma dria

English: Farmers in Lira were trained to manage and control crop pests and diseases.
Luganda: Abalimi mu Lira baatendekebwa ku kuziyiza n'okutangira ebiwuka ebyonoona ebimera n'endwadde.
Runyankore: Abahingi omuri Lira bakeegyesibwa oku bashshemereire kurwanisa obukooko n'endwara omu bihingwa.
Acholi: Lupur ma Lira gunongo pwony ki diro me lweny i kom two ki lee ma balo jami apita
Ateso: Aponi isisianakitai akoriok luko Lira apedor ka aitikitik ikur ka adekasinei.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'ya'ba Lira 'diyi esu imbata ecozu o'bu azo ejipi nyaka eyini 'diyi azo nyaka eyini 'diyi pie ri eyi ma aza kota azini atrita ma dria

English: Farmers need better roads to transport their goods to the markets.
Luganda: Abalimi beetaaga enguudo ennungi okutambuza ebyamaguzi byabwe okubitwala mu butale.
Runyankore: Abahingi nibetaaga enguuto nungi kutwara ebintu byabo omu katare.

Ateso: Ekotosi akoriok irotin luajokak kanu aitolosio iboro kec osokoni.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'yapi diyi le nzila muke 'diyi eyini ani ecozu eyi ma afa ndundu 'diyi jizu cu a ra beni.

English: Farmers need to target both local and international markets.
Luganda: Abalimi beetaaga okuluubirira abutale obw'awaka n'obwensi yonna.
Runyankore: Abahingi baine kugyenderera obutare obw'omu ihanga hamwe n'obw'aheeru.

Ateso: Ekoto akoriok aitebeikite isokonin luko ore keda luko kinga.
Lugbara: Le 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma one cu kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi cu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi pie

English: Farmers acquired knowledge about good and bad soils.
Luganda: Abalimi baafuna amagezi ku ttaka eddungi n'ebbi.
Runyankore: Abahingi bakegyesibwa ebirikukwata ahaitaka rirungi n'eritari rirungi.
Acholi: Lupur gunongo ngec i kom kweyo/ngom ma beco ki maracu me pur

English: The people of Northern Uganda have increased their participation in Agriculture.

Luganda: Ebigimusa by'obutonde bisinga ebikolerere.

Ateso: Ejok ebolia adepar ikee lueyaunete ebolia.
Lugbara: Fataliyiza Mungu ni o'bale ni 'diyi onyiru ndeni aga fataliyiza edele ede 'diyi

Luganda: Abalimi balina okwongera ku bugimu bw'ettaka okusobola okufuna amakungula amalungi.

Acholi: Wamito dule ma mito konyo anywali me Uganda labongo unu gi

English: There is a lot of poverty in rural areas
Luganda: Obavu bungi nnyo mu byalo
Runyankore: Hariho obworo bwingi omu myanya y'ebyaro.
Acholi: Can tye matek tutwal icaro
Ateso: Ipu ican noi kocaaloi.
Lugbara: Alio ga calo eyi ma alea tre.

English: Communication skills should be part of the education curriculum.

English: Many Ugandans know how to speak English.
Luganda: Bannayuganda bangi bamanyi okwongera Olungereza.

Acholi: Anywali Uganda mapol ngeyo loko leb munu

English: We need to work on deadlines.

Ateso: Ekot oni aswam kotoma apak alopet.
Lugbara: Le ama ma nga azi sa'wa fele ri ma dria.

Luganda: Bannayuganda balina okuyiga okukozesa kompyuta.

English: Most hotels in Uganda have good managers.

Runyankore: Hoteeri nyingi omu Uganda ziine bamanegya barungi.

English: There will be the supervision of the project activities.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo okulondoola emirimu gya pulojekiti
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho okurambura emirimo ya purogyekiti.

Lugbara: Ba nga 'yeta otita 'da ni 'diyi ma pamvu onera

English: We need to identify the key stakeholders.

English: How can we help people who have hearing problems?
Luganda: Tuyinza kuyamba tutya abantu abalina obuzibu bw'okuwulira?
Runyankore: Nitubaasa kuhwera tuta abantu abaine oburemeezi omukuhurira?
Acholi: Watwero konyo dano ma luding it nining?
Ateso: Eipone ali ingarakina oni itunga lu mam epupete ejok?
Lugbara: Ama eco 'ba e'yo eripi kilili ku 'diyi ma aza ko geri ngo 'diyisi.

English: Ugandans are still safe from the ebola virus outbreak
Luganda: Bannayuganda bakyali bulungi ku kubalukawo kw'akawuka ka ebola.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda tibakatandikire kukwatwa oburwaire bwa Ebola.
Acholi: Dano me Uganda pwod gitye labongo lworo moo me poto pa ebola
Ateso: Erongo itunga luko Uganda eyuara kanejai adeka naka ebola.

English: We should embark on informing people and encouraging them to vaccinate
Luganda: Tulina okwenyigira ku ky'okutegeeza abantu n'okubakubiriza okugema
Runyankore: Tushemereire kutandika kumanyisa abantu n'okubaha omuhimbo gw'okusirika endwara.

Ateso: Ekot oni aitijeninikin itunga ka aisinyikokite kes adumunun ekato.
Lugbara: Le ama ma e'do o'bi eyini imbata fe azini ava fe aro soza esuzu.

English: Let us go for check-ups
Luganda: Ka tugende tukeberebwe
Runyankore: Reka tugyende tukyeberwe.
Acholi: Wa cit wunu ka pime
Ateso: Alototo awanyanar awate.
Lugbara: Ama ma mu ki ama rua o'bi.

English: Women will have access to free medical services which will improve their lives
Luganda: Abakyala bajja kusobola okufuna obuweereza ku byobulamu ku bwereere ebinaalongoosa obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abakazi nibaija kutunga obuheereza bw'amarwariro obwa busha, ekireije kutunguura amagara gaabo.

Lugbara: Oku eyi mu azakoma fele e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi esu pirini dika eyi ma edri otuzu

English: The full dose for tuberculosis is taken for a long period of time
Luganda: Ddoozi y'akafuba ennamba emiribwa okumala ebbanga ddene
Runyankore: Doozi y'akakwonko eijwiire, nekozesibwa kutwara obwire bureingwa.
Acholi: Yat amunya me cango two aona opio gi munyu pi kare malac

Lugbara: Ba aro tibi niri oki sa'wa ezu

English: Women have to be empowered to access and carry out different activities
Luganda: Abakyala balina okuweebwa omukisa okufuna n'okukola emirimu egy'enjawulo

Ateso: Ekot angor aitigogongio kanu adumunun ka aswam aswamisinei nuegelegela.

English: New health facilities have been established to improve medical services
Luganda: Ebifo ebijjanjabibwamu ebibya bizimbiddwa okutumbula obuweereza bw'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Amarwariro masya gombekirwe okwongyera ahabuheereza bw'eby'amagara.

English: The commissioner has served the people of Uganda very well
Luganda: Omukungu aweerezza bannayuganda bulungi nnyo
Runyankore: Kamishana ahereize abantu ba Uganda kurungi.
Acholi: Ladit matye Commissioner otiyo maber tutwal pi lobo Uganda
Ateso: Ejanaki ekomisiona itunga luko Uganda ejok.
Lugbara: Komissona 'da nga azi onyiru kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi dri

English: Let us applaud his contribution to the country
Luganda: Ka tusiime byakoledde eggwanga
Runyankore: Reka tusiime eby'akoreire eihanga.
Acholi: Wa mii wunu pwoc pi tic maber ma en otiyo pi lobo wa

Lugbara: Le ama ma fe awa'difo e'yo erini 'ye kari 'di niri si ra.

English: General cleanliness is a basic requirement in every home.
Luganda: Obuyonjo kintu ekikulu ekyetaagisa mu buli maka.
Runyankore: Buri maka gashemereire kuba gaine obuyonjo.
Acholi: Gwoko lengo obedo tic ma pire tek pi gangi weng
Ateso: Aila nes ibore ebeit kangol ere.
Lugbara: Alata e'yo driasiri eri afa lele aku dria ma alea ni

Luganda: Eddwaliro lya kkookolo likoze omulimu omusuffu ennyo.
Runyankore: Irwaririro ry'abarwire b'ekokoro rikozire omurimo gw'amaani munonga.
Acholi: Dul me Cancer Institute otimo tic ma ber tutwal

English: Health workers will be given the support they need to find solutions for existing challenges.
Luganda: Abasawo bajja kuweebwa obuyambi bwe beetaaga okusobola okumalawo okusoomoozebwa okuliwo.
Runyankore: Abashaho nibaija kuhebwa obuhwezi bwona obu barikwetenga babaase kutungo oburyo bw'okumaraho oburemeezi oburiho.
Acholi: Lutic me yotkom binongo kony ma gimito pi nongo yoo me cobo peko matye
Ateso: Eponio aijaikin eswamak lu adekis agangat na ekotokinos kesi kanu amoun eipone lo itemokinete atiokisio nu ejaas.
Lugbara: Ba nga atita azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini le azakoma esuzu e'yo ewaru 'diyisi ri fe eyidri ra

English: New facilities will be established to assist in fighting specific medical problems.
Luganda: Ebifo ebipya bijja kuzimbibwa okuyambako mu kulwanyisa endwadde ezimu.

Lugbara: Ba mu arojo o'diru ni eyi si a'di 'dizu azo nile ra 'diyi be

English: Medicine will be manufactured locally which will ease accessibility.
Luganda: Eddagala lya kukolebwa wano mu ggwanga ekinayanguya mu kulifuna.
Runyankore: Emibazi neija kukorerwa omwihanga ebaase kuhikwaho juba.
Acholi: Yadi me cango two gi bi yubu gi ki kany ma man be weko nongo yat bedo yot
Ateso: Elosio aswam ikee kane ore ido epatanar adumun.
Lugbara: Ba nga aro eyi ede 'dia ogogo aro eyi ma esuta 'bazu ewakokoru beni

English: The medical and the newspaper team are running health adverts this week.
Luganda: Abasawo n'empapula z'amawulire zikolo bulango obukwata ku byobulamu wiiki eno.
Runyankore: Tiimu y'eirwariro n'empapura z'amakuru, nibaza kushohoza ebirango birikukwata ahaby'amagara esande egi.
Acholi: Dul pa lutic me yot kom kacel ki dul pa lucoo lok angeya gubi coyo lok angeya igazeti icabit eni
Ateso: Ewai lo angaleu keda etimu lo iyemuto lu apapulai kes itolosete alimonoreta osabiti lo.
Lugbara: Amuti arojo ni tualu karatasi e'yo laza be 'diyiniri eyi e'yo mile oziza e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi 'ye wiki 'disi

English: People are being provided with knowledge about the disease
Luganda: Abantu bali mu kuweebwa magezi ku bikwata ku bulwadde.
Runyankore: Abantu bariyo nibashomesibwa aha ndwara egyo.
Acholi: Gitye ka miyo ngec ki dano i kom two man
Ateso: Ijanakino itunga acoa naikamunit adeka.
Lugbara: Ba o'bi eyini imbata fe ria azo 'di ma dria.

English: The medical body seeks to understand how citizens manage amidst having the disease.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kyetaaga okumanya engeri bannansi gye babeerawo n'obulwadde.
Runyankore: Abamarwariro nibenda kumanya oku abatuuragye barikubaasa kutwaza endwara egi.
Acholi: Dul ma loyo lutic me yot kom mito niang kit ma dano tye ka kwo kwede ki two man

English: Citizens will be engaged to create a solution for disease control.
Luganda: Bannansi bajja kwebuuzibwako okusobola okufuna engeri y'okuwonya obulwadde.
Runyankore: Abatuuragye nibaija kushabwa kutaho oburyo bw'okuzibira endwara.

Ateso: Eponio aitemitem keda itunga amoun iwaitin lu itikitikere adeka.

English: This kind of disease will be eradicated soon.
Luganda: Ekika ky'obulwadde kino kijja kumalibwawo mangu.

Acholi: Two ma kuman gibi lweny iye oyot
Ateso: Elosio aikisar aputo adeka ana.
Lugbara: Ba mu azo wura 'di dro mbeleru
