Luganda: Amaanyi ag'enjawulo gali mu kukolebwa okwongeza embeera z'ebyobulamu okuyita mu kusasaanya amawulire.
Runyankore: Hateirweho amaani maingi okureeba ngu habaho okushomesa abantu bongyere omutindo omuby'amagara.
Acholi: Tye yoo mapol ma gitye ka tic kwede me pwonyo lwak pi gwoko yotkom gi
Ateso: Iswamao nu epedorio kere kanu awanyun ebe itojokaro nuka angaleu kowai lo aicor itunga.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo karakara eyi 'ye mile oziza 'yezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ma dria

English: Our pharmacists will inform the public about how hardened some diseases are to drugs.
Luganda: Abakugu mu by'eddagala bajja kutegeeza abantu engeri eddagala gye litasobola kukola ku ndwadde ezimu.

English: This disease affects mostly women in different ways.
Luganda: Ekirwadde kino kisinga kukosa bakyala mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Oburwaire obu nibukira kuteganisa abakazi omumiringo etari emwe.
Acholi: Two man yelo pole mon i yo mapatpat
Ateso: Arai na adeka na esuronokini noi angor kowaitin kalu egelegela.

English: The facility established will mostly work on surgical operations.

English: Our medics are working hand in hand with centres for disease control.
Luganda: Abasawo baffe bakolagana n'ebitongole ebiziyiza endwadde.
Runyankore: Abashaho baitu bariyo nibakorera hamwe n'ab'ekitongore ekirikurwanisa okujanjaara kw'endwara.

Runyankore: Omuringo gwa kokoro ogu nigukira kuteganisa abakazi abarikuteerana n'abashaija abaine abakazi baingi.

Ateso: Erai lo ekansa lo esuronokini noi angor nu eyelosi keda ikiliok luipu.

English: This disease has a number of complications.

Acholi: Two man tye kelo peko mapol tutwal
Ateso: Ejaas adeka na keda atiokisio nuipu.

English: Malaria takes lives and affects pregnant women.

Runyankore: Omushwiija gw'ensiri nigwita kandi niguteganisa abakazi b'enda.

Acholi: Alegi yomcwiny pi cengabicel ki ceng cabit

English: Various prevention measures have been put in place.

Runyankore: Hateirweho oburyo bwingi bw'okuzibira.

Ateso: Ebwaikin iwaitin luipu lu itikitikere.
Lugbara: Ba o'ba geri ndundu azo ma esuta atrizu 'diyi

English: The health summit will enforce strategies in order to tackle health challenges
Luganda: Olukungaana lw'ebyobulamu lujja kuteeka essira ku kwenganga okusomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu

English: The minister calls upon people not to believe in false information running on social media
Luganda: Minisita akubiriza abantu obutakkiririza mu mawulire ga kifere agatambulira ku mikutu gy'amawulire

Ateso: Itijenikit Eminista itunga mam acamun nu abekoi nuejaas social media.
Lugbara: Minisita ai o'bi eyi asi bazu o'duko enzoru esule geri o'dukoti ofezu olialiasi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku

English: We shall not rest  until people are free from malaria
Luganda: Tetujja kuwummula okutuusa ng'abantu tebakyayina musujja gwa nsiri.

Acholi: Pe wabi ywee wang ma dano ducu ogiko twoyo malaria
Ateso: Mam iso ilosi aiyengun itoni ne eyuarototor itunga kanejai eimidi.

English: People in Africa are not bothered about the dangers associated with hepatitis
Luganda: Abantu mu Africa tebeefiiriddeyo ku bulabe obuleetebwa obulwadde bw'ekibumba.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omu Africa tibarikufayo aha kabi akarikubaasa kuruga omu ndwara ya Hepatitis.

Lugbara: Ba suru Afrika niri a 'diyi asi ni e'yo onzi i ecipi azo hepatitis niri be 'diyi si ku.

English: Ugandans should be careful because new cases have been found in Congo
Luganda: Bannayuganda balina okwegendereza kubanga abalwadde abapya bazuuliddwa e Congo
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda bashemereire kwegyendesereza ahabw'okuba omu ihanga rwa Congo bashangireyo abarwaire basya.

Ateso: Ekot itunga luko Uganda acoit naarai adumun itunga icie lu edekas ebola.

English: It is a very dangerous disease with dangerous symptoms
Luganda: Ndwadde nkambwe nnyo erina n'obubonero bwayo bukambwe.
Runyankore: N'endwara y'akabi munonga kandi eine obubonero bw'akabi.
Acholi: Two man rac tutwal dok lanyute bene rac
Ateso: Erai adeka na erono noi na eupas keda awanyununeta nuarokok.
Lugbara: Eri azo azi onzi wura azi onzi ni eyi be ni

English: Parents should be educated on how to protect the girl child.
Luganda: Abazadde balina okusomesebwa ku ngeri y'okukuumamu omwana ow'obuwala.
Runyankore: Abazaire bashemereire kwegyesibwa oku barikubaasa kuhwera omwana w'omwishiki.
Acholi: Lunyodo omyero gipwony gi ki kit me gwoko lutino anyira ki ipeko

English: Ugandans should not be worried.
Luganda: Bannayuganda tebalina kweralikirira.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda tibashemereire kwerarikirira.
Acholi: Anywali me Uganda omyero pe gubed ki par
Ateso: Mam ekoto itunga luko Uganda aiyalongong.
Lugbara: Le kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma adri orata be ku.

English: People have acquired knowledge on how to protect themselves from this disease.
Luganda: Abantu bafunye amagezi ku ngeri gye bayinza okwekuumamu ekirwadde kino.
Runyankore: Abantu begyesiibwe nibamanya oku barikubaasa kwerinda endwara.

Lugbara: Eri onduaru mini mi ma ta mbazu azo eyi si de esu eri nga po'di drioru.

English: Many Ugandans would be so disciplined if coronavirus was like Ebola.
Luganda: Bannayuganda bangi bandibadde n'empisa singa akawuka ka kolona kaali nga Ebola.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda baingi bakabaire nibakuratira ebiragiro by'eby'amagara, kuri noogira ngu Korona eri nka Ebola.
Acholi: Dano me Uganda madwong onongo kono giwinyo lok kace two CoronaVirus onongo obedo calo Ebola
Ateso: Ti itunga luko Uganda ecoitos noi karai orai ekorona kwa ebola.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni karakara 'diyi ta aa inzitaru saaru azo corona niri ka ta adri azo ebola niri le ria.

English: Uganda is always on high alert when it comes to diseases like Ebola.
Luganda: Uganda eri ku bwerinde obwa waggulu bwe kituuka ku ndwadde nga Ebola.
Runyankore: Uganda buriijo neeba eyeteekateekire, ku harikwija oburwaire oburi nka Ebola.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda ikare ducu tye atera ka lok ma dok i kom two Ebola
Ateso: Erai Uganda duc akwap na ekapakina kanu adekasinei kwa ebola.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri ma mile eyi sa'wa driasi mgbo azo ekile ebola le 'diyisi

English: There will be a mass vaccination campaign in Uganda.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo enteekateeka y'okugema okw'ekikungo mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho ehururu y'okusirika okwamaani omu Uganda.
Acholi: Agwera bibedo tye pi dano ducu iUganda
Ateso: Ejaun aitolot nuka akis ekato ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Otita 'ba karakara eyi osozu ri ni mu aa kari Uganda niri ma alea ci.

English: Male partners can attend antenatal care as a way to support pregnant mothers.
Luganda: Abaami basobola okubeera mu bifo ab'embuto we banywera eddagala ng'engeri y'okuyambako bamaama ab'embuto.
Runyankore: Abashaija nibabaasa kugyenda n'abakazi baabo omwirwariro baaba baine enda, Nk'omuhanda gw'okubabangira.
Acholi: Coo twero wot ka pime ki mongi muyac macalo yoo acel me konyo mongi
Ateso: Epedorete ikiliok aupanar keda angor kec kanu awanyanario epotiete kwape ewai lo aigangakite kes.
Lugbara: Acita arojoa imbata esuzu ri geri azi alu agupi eyini ecozu oku okporovu 'diyini atita fezu ni.

English: There is no political or religious affiliation when it comes to health.
Luganda: Bwe kituuka ku byobulamu tetufa ku byabufuzi oba ku nzikiriza.
Runyankore: Tihariho rubaju rweby'obutegyeki nainga ediini, kukirikuhika ahaburwaire.
Acholi: Pe tye lok me diini onyo party ka odok ilok me yotkom
Ateso: Emamete nuka politiks arai nu ediini kowai kalo ikamunitos angaleu.
Lugbara: E'yo rua ala niri adrini e'yo azi politiki ni kani ku aita ni ni ku.

English: Buganda kingdom is being praised for its participation in raising awareness against sickle cells
Luganda: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwebazibwa olw'okwenyigra mu kusaasaanya amawulire g'okulwanyisa nnalubiri.
Runyankore: Obwa Kabaka bwa Buganda, nibusiimwa ahabw'okwejumba omukumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'endwara ya sickle cell.
Acholi: Gang ker madit me Buganda tye ka nongo pwoc madit pi tice me miyo ngec me two Sickle cells
Ateso: Ajakanut nako Buganda nes ituritai kanu aiwe akiro nuikamunitos adeka naka akojo.
Lugbara: Ba fe awa'difo angu opi nyaza ni Buganda niri dri e'yo erini ti suzu mile oziza azo omvele sickle cells niri ma alea risi

English: Parliament officials have been denied access to the International Specialized Hospital.
Luganda: Abakungu ba paalamenti bagaaniddwa okuyingira mu ddwaliro lya International specialized Hospital.
Runyankore: Abakiiki omu ishengyero, babazibiire kuhika omu International Specialized Hospital.
Acholi: Lumemba me Parliament gityeko gengo gi pe me donyo ka neno ot yat manyen magi tye ka yubu pi cango two ma miro diro matek
Ateso: Eswamak luko airabet kes emiki adolere adekis nako International Specialised Hospital.
Lugbara: Ba oga azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyini fizu arojo ambo 'ba dria engapi angu ndundua 'diyini ri ma alea si

English: We need to create a conducive environment for feeding mothers at parliament.
Luganda: Twetaaga okuteekawo ekifo ekirungi ekya bamaama abayonsa ku paalamenti
Runyankore: Twine kutaho oburyo burungi bw'okuriisa abazaire ahaishengyero.
Acholi: Omyero wayub katic maber iparliament ma weko mon madoto lutino gi bedo agonya
Ateso: Ikoto oni aitolomun ewai lo epatanar aitania nuatoto ko airabet.
Lugbara: Le ama ma ede angu azi ra sipi ra azini kililiru ni ayia anzi endrupi 'diyini paliamentia

English: Staff recruitment was strictly by merit and given to those who passed interviews.
Luganda: Okuyingiza abakozi kw'akoleddwa okusinziira ku busobozi era gyaweereddwa abo abaayise okugezesebwa.
Runyankore: Okutasyamu abakozi kukakorwa omu biragiro kandi emirimo ekahebwa abahikire ebigyezo.
Acholi: Coyo dano itic olube ki rwom kwan ki diro tic dok bene gimiyo ki dano mukato peny
Ateso: Aitolomio na eswamak erai owai kalo aingito aponi itolomarai ngul lu apotu otuboto.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba eyini azi lu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra risi tualu eyini zita ozile azi esuzu 'diyi agazu ra risi

English: Wishing all Muslims a happy Eid
Luganda: Twagaliza abasiraamu bonna Eid ey'essanyu
Runyankore: Abasiraamu boona Eid ehinduke ey'eihoreere.
Acholi: Wa cwalo mot bot Silam ducu dok walego ni gu kwer nino Idi ki yomcwiny
Ateso: Amunor isiramun kere Idi loajokan.
Lugbara: Le isilamu eyi ma inzi o'du idi niri muke

English: Medical interns are being admitted to the internship training program
Luganda: Abayizi abali mu kugezesebwa mu busawo bawandiisibwa ku nteekateeka z'okugezesebwa
Runyankore: Abashaho abarikutendekwa bariyo nibataahibwa omu nteekateka y'okubatendeka omu mirimo.
Acholi: Lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwan me bedo Dakta gitye ka gamo gi purogram me tic pa Daktari ma pwod otyeko kwan atyeka
Ateso: Esisiak lu ejaas aitutuoro na akiro kanu amukian kes itolomio .
Lugbara: Ba dakitari sukulu anzi ru azi onipi 'diyi 'du otita azi onizu 'da ma alea

English: Women and young adults are advised to take on family planning methods.
Luganda: Abakyala n'abaana abakula bakubiriziddwa okukozesa enkola za kizaalaggumba.
Runyankore: Abakazi hamwe nabaishiki abakuzire, nibahaburwa okukozesa emiringo y'okuteekateekyera amaka.
Acholi: Gimiyo tam bot mon ki bulu me tic ki yoo me lago nywal
Ateso: Angor keda atumunak kes icorakitai aitwasam ewai lo alanakin aur.
Lugbara: Ba ai oku eyi tualu 'ba ode eli capira 'diyi be geri ndundu anzi eyi ma esele cozu omvele family planning ru 'diyi ayuzu

English: A memorandum has been signed to promote cooperation in Health.
Luganda: Enzikiriziganya eteekeddwako omukono okutumbula enkolagana mu byobulamu.
Runyankore: Ekihandiiko kiteirweho omukono, okushongyera enkwatanisa omuby'amagara.
Acholi: Gityeko keto cing pi moko lok me medo ribe pi lok me yotkom
Ateso: Adaun aidok akanin toma acamanara na aimorikikin aitopolor nuka angaleu.
Lugbara: Ba eyi ti dri kokobi 'ba ombe pi tualuri ma dria ti ecita e'yo rua ala nisi ri ma omgbo otuzu

English: There will be training on how to do health sensitization using social media.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo okutendekebwa ku ngeri y'okubunyisaamu amawulire ku byobulamu ku mikutu emigattabantu.
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho okutendeka abantu okubashemereire kukozesa intaneti okuhutuura abantu ahaby'amagara.
Acholi: Pwony bibedo tye ikit me miyo ngec me yotkom kun gitiyo ki social media
Ateso: Ejaun aitutuoro kanu aicor itunga nuka angaleu itwasamaete elago.
Lugbara: Imbata azi ni mu aa geri imbata fezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria geri o'dukoti ofezu olialiasi 'diyi siri ma dria ci

English: Ugandan men play an important role in reproductive decisions.
Luganda: Abasajja abannayuganda bakola omulimu munene mu kusalawo mu byokuzaala.
Runyankore: Abashaija omu Uganda , nibakora omurimo muhango omukureeta ebiteiso ahashonga z'okuzaara.
Acholi: Coo me Uganda tic gi pire tek ilok ma mako yac pa mon
Ateso: Ikiliok luko Uganda kes ejaas keda eporoto kanu ikamunitos aur.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni agupi ru 'diyi azi okporu ni nga e'yo anzi tiza ni 'diyi ma dria.

English: An Executive director has been congratulated upon securing the leadership role.
Luganda: Nankulu ayozaayozeddwa olw'okufuna ekifo ky'obukulembeze.
Runyankore: Mukuru w'ekitongore bamutabarusya ahabw'okutunga obujunanizibwa bw'okwebembera.
Acholi: Ladit matye Executive Director kulu onongo pwoc pi nongo tic man ma rwome diti
Ateso: Aponi isiyalamikinai Ekengarenikiniton lokapolon kakere kanu engarenone loajokan.
Lugbara: Ba fe awa'difo kamboni ma drile azi ni erini pari driceza ni 'da esuzu risi

English: Menstrual hygiene is essential for girls to be able to participate in schools.
Luganda: Obuyonjo mu bakyala nga bali mu nsonga kikulu nnyo eri abawala okusobola okubeera mu masomero.
Runyankore: Abaishiki okuba abayonjo omushonga zaabo eza buri kweezi, nikyetenwa kugira ngu bagume bashemereirwe omumashomero.
Acholi: Lengu pa anyira ma gucako neno dwer pire tek tutwal me weko gumede ki kwan
Ateso: Aidar aila kapak kana adeka elap nes ejok noi kanu apesur ajaut osemero.
Lugbara: Alata e'yo ezoanzi eyini imba nezurisi 'diri orodriru ezoanzi eyini ecozu aa'zu sukulua

English: There is another senior leadership retreat in the health sector.
Luganda: Waliwo olusirika olulala olw'abakugu mu byobulamu.
Runyankore: Hariho akandi keshereko ka'bebembezi abaharurengo rw ahaiguru omu kitongore ky'ebyamagara.
Acholi: Tye kacoke mukene pa ludito ma tiyo ilok me yotkom
Ateso: Ejai bobo acie airiamun na engarenok luapolok kowai lo angeleu.
Lugbara: Mitingi driceta arakala rua alataniri ma dria ni ci

English: There is need to expand the emergency unit because of the increasing number of patients.
Luganda: Waliwo obwetaavu bw'okugaziya ebifo awatuukira abayi olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde abeeyongera.
Runyankore: Hariho ekyetengo ky'okushanjuura omwanya ogurikuhikirwamu abaine oburemeezi obwija butamanyirwe ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire kweyongyera.
Acholi: Mite ni gimed kama gi jolo iye dano matwo obwoyo gi matek pi wel lutwo matye kamede ni
Ateso: Ejai eipud aitanyanyar ewai lo engeso kanu eyatakinor enaba lo adekak.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma edri wadi azakoma mbeleru ri fezu ri ra 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu risi

English: Upgrading the health centre will mitigate congestion in general hospitals
Luganda: Okuddaabiriza amalwaliro g'ebitundu kijja kukendeeza omujjuzo mu malwaliro amanene
Runyankore: Okwongyera ahamutindo gw'akarwariro akakye, nikiija kutuubya ahamwijuzo , omwirwariro erihango.
Acholi: Ilo rwom ot yat meno malo bi dwoko piny wel dano ma cito ka nongo kony iodi yadi madongo pa gamente
Ateso: Aitopolor adekisia nudidika elosi aitidisiar einyopa lo adekak kadekisia nuapolok.
Lugbara: Arojo werea 'da ma omgbo otuza ni nga omita arojo amburi ma alea ri esi

English: Challenges faced in the quality of service delivery to pregnant mothers is being investigated.
Luganda: Okusoomoozebwa okusangibwa mu buweeereza bwa bamaama ab'embuto kunoonyerezebwako.
Runyankore: Oburemeezi oburikushangwa omu mpereza y'abakazi abaine enda , bakweise nibabuburirizaho.
Acholi: Gitye ka kwedo lok me peko ma mon muyac nongo malube ki kony me yotkom
Ateso: Atiokisio nu ejanakine nu itereikina keda angor nu apotiok kes ejakai aingic.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo ewaru esule azakoma fele okporovu eyini ri ma alea 'diyi ma eti onda

English: Abstracts are needed for the national Health promotion conference.
Luganda: Ebinokole byetaagibwa olw'olukiiko olutumbula ebyobulamu mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho okucencura omu bantu abareije kwetaba omuruteerane rw'by'amagara.
Acholi: Gitye ka mito coc ma miyo lok matut pi nywako tam ma bibedo ikacoke madit me medo rwom tic me yotkom
Ateso: Ekotoi aomisio kanuka airiamun naka angaleu kakwapuwok .
Lugbara: Ba le e'yo 'bani Sile aliaru 'diyi imbata rua ala ma otuza ni kari 'disi ndulu ri ni

English: A plan for health security has been launched in Uganda.
Luganda: Enteekateeka z'okukuuma ebyobulamu zitongozeddwa mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Enteekateeka y'okubangirwa omuby'amagara, etongoziibwe omu Uganda.
Acholi: Yub me gwoko yot kom gityeko moko ne iUganda
Ateso: Aitemonokino naka ayuara na angaleu nes etegear ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba e'do otita azi ageitema e'yo alatanisi 'diyini risi ni kari Uganda niri ma alea.

English: Uganda received a thermoscanner that will be positioned at the airport.
Luganda: Uganda yafunye akuuma akakebera ebbugumu akajja okuteekebwa ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi.
Runyankore: Uganda etungire ekyoma ky'okukyebera ekireije kutwarwa ahakishaayi ky'endegye.
Acholi: Uganda otyeko nongo lapim lyeto i kom dano ma gibiketo ibar dege
Ateso: Abu Uganda odum acuma nainwaki amwanis naka akwan nada elosio asipokin osawe loka idegei.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri esu afa 'ba rua driza amazuri dika 'ba mu eri 'ba ndege pari kari ni ambo ri ma alea

English: The American embassy is appreciated for its contribution towards the health of Ugandans
Luganda: Ekitebe kya America mu Uganda kisiimiddwa olw'obuyambi bwakyo eri ebyobulamu bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Ekitebe kikuru kya America omu Uganda nikisiimwa ahabw'obuhwezi obu kirikuhayo ahabw'amagara g'abanya Uganda.
Acholi: Embassy me lobo America gicwalo pwoc botgi pi kony madit ma gumiyo me gwoko yotkom pa dano me Uganda
Ateso: American embassy nes eturi kanu agangat ke kanu angaleu naka itunga luko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba fe awa'difo embasi amerika niri ni e'yo eyini 'ye rua ala kari Uganda niri ni 'diyisi

English: Kawempe hospital is being discussed on a radio program
Luganda: Eddwaliro ly'e Kawempe likubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo ku pulogulaamu ya laadiyo.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rya Kawempe, ririyo nirihanuurwaho omu puroguraamu aha reediyo.
Acholi: Gitye ka lok i kom otyat Kawempe ipurogram me rediyo
Ateso: Itatamio nuikamunitos adekis nako Kawempe kainapeta nuka oredio.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo nze arojo kawempe niri ma dria Otita azi radio ni ma alea.

English: Ugandans are urged to join the blood donation cause.
Luganda: Bannayuganda bakubirizibwa okwegatta ku mulanga gw'okugaba omusaayi.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda nimushabwa kwejumba omunkora y'okugaba eshagama.
Acholi: Gilego lwak me Uganda me cito ka miyo remo
Ateso: Itunga luko Uganda kes icorakitai aijaikin aokot.
Lugbara: Ba ai Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ari fezu.

English: A donation plan has been launched with Rotarian malaria partners.
Luganda: Enteekateeka y'obuyambi etongozeddwa ne bannamukago ba lotale abalwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri.
Runyankore: Enteekateeka y'okugaba obuhwezi yaatongozibwa n'ekibiina kya Rotare abarikurwanisa omushwija gw'ensiri.
Acholi: Gityeko kati ki yub me miyo jami kun gitiyo kacel ki dul pa Rotary club ma tiyo ki dule mukene me lweny i kom two malarua
Ateso: Aitemonokineta nu aijaikin agangat nes etegear keda luka Rotarian malaria Partners.
Lugbara: Ba e'do otita azi robia trazani ni 'ba amuti rotary niri ma alea 'diyi be

English: A jigger treatment lotion will be made by the Saraya company.
Luganda: Loosoni ejjanjaba envunza ejja kukolebwa kkampuni ya Saraya.
Runyankore: Amajuta agarikutamba emira nigaija kukorwa kampuni ya saraya.
Acholi: Kamponi ma gilwongoni Saraya obiyubu yat awira me neko jwinya
Ateso: Akinyet na isutio omujai nes ebuni ekapuni loka Saraya aswam.
Lugbara: Kamboni saraya niri ni mu aro efiza ede o'bu ofipi 'ba eyi ma pa'alea 'diyi ni

English: More specialists are being trained to reduce both referrals abroad and mortality rates.
Luganda: Abakugu abalala batendekebwa okukendeeza ku kutwala abalwadde ebweru w'eggwanga n'abaana abafa nga bato.
Runyankore: Abakugu abandi bariyo nibatendekwa okutuubya omubaro gw'abarwaire abarikutwarwa aheeru n'okutuubya aha kufa kw'abantu.
Acholi: Gitye ka miyo pwony bot Daktari ma tiyo i kom two matego pi dwoko wel dano ma cito ka nongo yat ilobo ma woko ki bene me dwoko piny wel dano ma too
Ateso: Itutuonoro ipirioitin icie kanu aitidisiar aijukanaro na adekak kinga ka aitidisiar atwakisia.
Lugbara: Ba azi'ba e'yo nipi azo eyi ma dria angiri 'diyini imbata fe e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ti opezu arojo azi 'diyi ma alea azini 'ba eyini odrazu ri ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria

English: Sanitary towels are being made out of sugarcane residues in Uganda.
Luganda: Ppamba w'ekikyala akolebwa mu bisigalira by'ebikajjo wano mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Tahuro ezi abakazi kukozesa omushonga zaabo eza buri kwezi, nizikorwa omu bishushunga by'ebikweijo omu Uganda.
Acholi: Gitye katic ki cung tyang me yubu bongi ma mon tiyo kwede ikare me neno dwer
Ateso: Ataulon kes iswamao keda ararasia nu eitola ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba padi eyi ede ikaka ma ezaki si kari Uganda niri ma woko etu ni 'deria leruri ma alea

English: Discussions are ongoing on how to implement solutions against disease outbreaks.
Luganda: Enteesaganya zigenda mu maaso ku ngeri y'okwewalamu ebirwadde ebibalukawo.
Runyankore: Okuhanuura ahaburyo obuturikubaasa kurwanisa endwara ezirikubarukaho, kuriyo nikugyenda omumaisho omu Uganda.
Acholi: Nywako lok tye ka time me neno kit me lweny i kom two ma poto
Ateso: Ineresinei kes itolosio kanuikamunitos eipone lo itegearet nu itikitikere abwangun na adekasinei.
Lugbara: Agbatara eyi mu drile geri e'yo otuzu 'diyi ma ayuta azo eyi ma efuta si 'diyi ma dria

English: lessons learnt are being revised to improve Ebola preparedness.
Luganda: Essomo eriyigiddwa lyetegerezebwa okulongoosa  ku kwetegekera Ebola.
Runyankore: Emishomo ebeire neegarukwamu okwongyera aha muringo gw'okweteekateekyera endwara ya Ebola.
Acholi: Gitye ka yubu pwony ma dano onongo pi medo rwom me bedo atera pi two Ebola
Ateso: Nu aponi itoroi toma kes irereonoro kanu aitojokara akapanakina kanuka ebola.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo onile ra 'diyi ma ale andri dika otuta azo ebola ni siri fezu ecazu muke ndeni

English: Uganda has an Ebola case confirmed in Kasese district
Luganda: Uganda erina omulwadde wa Ebola eyakakasibwa okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Kasese.
Runyankore: Kihamiibwe ngu Uganda eine omurwaire wa Ebola omu Disiturikiti ya Kaseese.
Acholi: Uganda tye ki dano acel ma ginongo tye ki Ebola iKasese
Ateso: Uganda nes ejatatar keda itunganan yen edeka ebola ko kodisitrikt loko Kasese.
Lugbara: Ba esu 'ba azi azo ebola niri be ni districti Kasese ni kari Uganda niri ma alea.

English: Vomiting and bleeding from openings are some of the signs of Ebola.
Luganda: Okusesema n'okuvaamu omusaayi okuva mu buli katuli k'omubiri bumu ku bubonero bwa Ebola.
Runyankore: Okutanaka n'okujwa omubwina bw'omubiri nibumwe aha bubonero bwa Ebola
Acholi: Ngok ki cwer pa remo ma kato ki kama oyabe obedo lanyut mogo me Ebola
Ateso: Ailek keda aiwii aiboisio kanu epukonoro kes icie kotoma ojenuneta luka ebola.
Lugbara: Ogbe azini ari rapi rua ma afa mbgo 'diyi ma alea si 'diyi wura ebola ni i e'dazu 'diyi ma azi.

English: The new board of directors for Soroti referral hospital have been inaugurated.
Luganda: Olukiiko olw'oku ntikko oluggya olw'eddwaliro ekkulu e Soroti lulayiziddwa.
Runyankore: Abari aha kakiiko k'eirwariro rya Soroti erihango batongoziibwe
Acholi: Ludito me bi doro tic me ot yat madit me Soroti gityeko kwongo go idog tic
Ateso: Atukot naitetet naka engarenok lu adekis nako Soroti kes asipokin.
Lugbara: Drice'ba o'diru arojo ambu soroti ni ri ma alea 'diyi e'do azi 'bo.

English: A female from Congo that was confirmed to have Ebola virus has passed on.
Luganda: Omukyala okuva e Congo eyakakasibwa okuba n'obulwadde bwa Ebola afudde.
Runyankore: Omukazi owaarugire omu ihanga rya Congo kandi akahamibwa ngu ayine oburwaire bwa Ebola, afiire.
Acholi: Dako acel ma oa ki iCongo ma onongo tye ki Ebola otyeko too woko
Ateso: Aberu na Congo na etigogongorio ejaas keda ebola nes atwana.
Lugbara: Oku azi engapi Congo a andra 'bani esu ebola be ni dra 'bo.

English: A professor has been congratulated on winning the health award
Luganda: Pulofeesa ayozaayozeddwa olw'okuwangula omudaali gw'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Purofeesa bamutabarukize ahabw'okuhangura ekiconco ky'ebyamagara.
Acholi: Ladit ma okwane matek tutwal irwom pa Profesa kulu onongo pwoc pi loyo mic me tic me yotkom
Ateso: Esiyalamikin epurofesa kanu aitelekar ainakinet naka angaleu.
Lugbara: Ba fe imba'ba azi e'yo sukulu lapi angiri ni ni awa'difo erini feta e'yo rua ala nisi ri ndezu nirisi

English: Health workers have been named heroes for subjecting individuals to handwashing and screening.
Luganda: Abasawo batuumiddwa abazira olw'okukubiriza abantu okunaaba mu ngalo n'okwekebeza.
Runyankore: Abashaho babeesire emanzi ahabw'okuhiga abantu kunaaba omu ngaro n'okukyeberwa.
Acholi: Lutic me yotkom gunongo woro madit pi neno ni dano ducu gitye ka lwoko cingi
Ateso: Eswamak lu adekis kes amaikin etelekarak kanu aijaikin itunga ailosenen akanin.
Lugbara: Ba olu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma ru 'ba e'yo mukeni 'yepi 'diyiru eyini fe o'bi eyi ma oji dri sa'wa driasirisi azini o'bi eyi ma rua o'biza si

English: Poor communication between men and women could lead to failed family planning methods.
Luganda: Empuliziganya embi wakati w'abaami n'abakyala eyinza okuleeta okulemesa enkola za kizaalaggumba.
Runyankore: Obutahurizana ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi kiremesa enkozesa y'emiringo y'okubariira ruzaaro.
Acholi: bedo labongo nywako lok ikin mon ki coo twero weko yoo me lago nywal pe tiyo maber
Ateso: Aineranara na mam ejok kiding ikiliok ka angor epedori ayangaun amamus naka alanakin aur.
Lugbara: Erita ako oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi be 'diyi eco fe aro anzi eyi ma esele cozu omvele family planning ru 'diyini azi ngazuku ra.

English: A booster dose of oral Polio vaccine will be given to all children under five.
Luganda: Ddoozi ya ppooliyo ey'omu kamwa eyongera amaanyi ejja kuweebwa abaana bonna abali wansi w'emyaka etaano.
Runyankore: Doozi y'omubazi ogurikwongyera amaani ogwa Poliyo neija kuheebwa omu kanwa abaana boona abari ahansi y'emyaka etaano.
Acholi: Yat atona idog lutino gibi miyo ki lutino weng ma mwaka gi peya oromo abic me medo yat ma gunongo con pi gengo two akweya
Ateso: Edos lo iyatakitai lo ekato loka polio nes elosio aijaikin idwe lu okwap na ikaru ikany.
Lugbara: Ba mu aro ti tia azo polio ni si ri fe anzi nyiri dria nga eli capi towi ku 'diyi ni.

English: Interventions have been put in place to address the outbreak of cholera.
Luganda: Kaweefube ateekeddwawo okwengaanga okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kya kkolera.
Runyankore: Hateirweho oburyo obw'okuzibira okubarukaho kw'endwara ya korera.
Acholi: Giketo yoo me tic pi lweny i kom two cholera
Ateso: Iwaitin kes ebwaikin kanu aitikitik abwangun naka ekolera.
Lugbara: Ba 'ye e'yo ndundu eyi azo kolera niri ma efuta ma aza kozu

English: The Health Ministry continues to advocate for a malaria-free country.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekyagenda mu maaso ne kaweefube w'okumalirawo ddala omusujja gw'ensiri mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'ebyamagara ebiteiremu amaani neeza kurwanisa omushwija gw'ensiri.
Acholi: Ministry me yotkom pwod mede ki miyo lok me lweny i kom two malaria wek two man orweny woko ki ilobo man
Ateso: Eerionget loka ngaleu nes isinyikokit nuka aikisar eimidi kakwap.
Lugbara: Minisita alataniri ni nga po'di a'di 'di kari azi malaria niri koko ri esuzu

English: There is an improvement in the transportation of blood samples.
Luganda: Waliwo okutereezebwa mu ntambuza ya sampolo z'omusaayi.
Runyankore: Enkora y'okutwara eshagama y'okukyebera eyeyongyeiremu amaani.
Acholi: Alokaloka tye ikit me cwalo remo ma ki kwanyo ki i kom dano
Ateso: Ejai atamakinet kowai kalo itolosere aokot.
Lugbara: Geri 'bani afa yiru njele 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizaru azosi 'diyi ma ojita otu i ra

English: A company is being appreciated for its contribution towards improving maternity services for females.
Luganda: Kkampuni yeebazibwa olw'okukola ennyo okutumbula embeera abakyala mwe bazaalira.
Runyankore: Kampuni neesiimwa ahabw'obuhwezi bwerikuheereza okwongyera omutindo gw'obuheereza omu bakazi abaine enda n'okuzaara.
Acholi: Tye kamponi acel ma gitye ka pwoyone pi tice me ilo rwom me kony me yotkom ma mon muyac ginongo
Ateso: Ekampuni nes isiyalamikitai kanu agangat ke kanu aitojokara ejanakine loka angor kanu epotiete.
Lugbara: Ba awa'difo fe kamboni azi ni atita erini fe azakoma fele okporovu eyidri ri ma otuta si

English: Submit your abstract for the national health Promotion conference.
Luganda: Waayo ebirowoozo byo eby'olukiiko olubunyisa ebyobulamu mu ggwanga lyonna.
Runyankore: Heerezayo abatorainwe kwejumba omu ruteerane rw'eihanga orw'okutunguura eby'amagara.
Acholi: Cwal coc ma icoyo ma neno matut lok me ilo rwom me yotkom ma gibi nywako iye tam ikacoke madit
Ateso: Ijuka aomisio kon kanuka airiamun naka aisingarenit angaleu .
Lugbara: Le mi ma fe mi e'yo mini Sile aliaruri embata rua ala ma otuza ni kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri ni

English: Abstinence should be practised to delay the first pregnancy
Luganda: Obuteegatta kirina okuteekebwa mu nkola okulwisaawo okufuna olubuto olusooka.
Runyankore: Okwerekyesa eby'okuteerana kishemereire kukorwa okubaasa kuzibira okutwara enda omurundi gw'okubanza.
Acholi: Ber me gwoko kom pi gengo yac me acel kun nongo ibedo labongo butu ki ngat moo keken
Ateso: Ekot amamus aelo kanu aisiyap apotu nasodit.
Lugbara: Aa'zu ali'baza kokoru ri geri azi 'bani ecozu mva esule okori ma sa'wa ezazu ni

English: The Household head has a role in disease prevention
Luganda: Akulira amaka alina obuvunaanyizibwa mu kutangira ensaasaana y'obulwadde.
Runyankore: Nyineka aine obujunaanizibwa omu kuzibira endwara.
Acholi: Latela wii paco tye ki tic madit me atima me gengo two
Ateso: Engarenon lo ekale nes ikamunitos nu aitikitik adeka.
Lugbara: Aku drile ma azi azo eyi ma ereta ma atriza ma alea ci

English: The country is preparing for a Measles-Rubella free community
Luganda: Eggwanga liteekateeka okumalawo Olukusense-Kikutiya mu bantu
Runyankore: Eihanga ririyo niryeteekateekyera okumaraho endwara y'obusheru na kikutiya omubantu.
Acholi: Lobo me Uganda tye ka yube me neno ni two Anyo ki Rubella orweny woko ki ilobo man
Ateso: Ekapanakin akwap wok kanu aikisar adeka na akwap otunga.
Lugbara: Kari 'di ni i otu ongulumu azo kajuka azini rubella niri koko 'diyini

English: Activities to ensure a healthy population are being advised by the Ministry of Health
Luganda: Ebintu by'okutumbula obulamu mu banti bikolebwako minisitule y'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara neehabura abantu okukora kyona ekirikubaasika okureeba ngu abantu baaguma baine amagara marungi.
Acholi: Ministry me yot kom tye ka miyo tam me tic ki yoo mapatpat wek dano gubed ma komgi yot
Ateso: Aswamisinei nu ekotore awanyun angaleu kotoma otunga nes icori eerionget loka angaleu.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri ni imbata fe 'yeta ecopi ongulumu rua ala be 'diyi fepi ra 'diyi ma dria

English: Discussions on Ebola, human immunodeficiency virus and Malaria are underway.
Luganda: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Ebola, akawuka akaleeta mukenenya n'omusujja gw'ensiri biri mu nteekateeka.
Runyankore: Okuhanuura aha ndwara ya Ebola, akakooko ka siriimu hamwe n'omushwija gw'ensiri, biriyo nibigyenda omumaisho.
Acholi: Nywako tam tye ka time ma mako lok i kom two Ebola, two jonyo ki malaria
Ateso: Ineresinei luka ebola, eiseny ka eimidi kes itemonokino.
Lugbara: Agbatara ebola, izia azini malaria ma dria 'diyi mu drile.

English: Family planning services will be offered to females and adolescents in Northern Uganda.
Luganda: Obuweereza bw'ekizaalaggumba bujja kuweebwa abakyala n'abaana abavubuka mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Obuheereza aha nkora y'okuteekateekyera amaka, nibwija kuheebwa abakazi n'eminyeeto omukicweka ky'amatemba ga Uganda.
Acholi: Gibimiyo kony me yoo me lago nywal pi mon ki bulu ma pwod tino ma itung kumalo me Uganda
Ateso: Iwaitin luka alanakin aur kes eponio aijanakin angor ka atumunak ko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba nga aro anzi esele coza ni omvele family planning ruri ni 'diyi fe oku eyini azini ezoanzi zopi zozo 'diyini kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea

English: There is a growth of Palliative care and access to controlled medicines in Uganda.
Luganda: Waliwo okugenda mu maaso ku kulwanyisa ensaasaana y'obulwadde n'obwangu okufuna eddagala eryetaagisa mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Omu Uganda harimu enkora nungi y'okureeberera abarwaire hamwe n'okwehisyaho emibazi omu bipimo ebihikire.
Acholi: Dano madwong dong tye ka nongo kony ikit me kwo ki two mategu ma pe cang ki bene kony me nongo yadi ma pe gicato ata labongo waraga pa dakta
Ateso: Ejai apolo naka eidare lo adekak ka adumunun ikee ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Tambaza fele 'ba azo okporu 'diyi be 'diyiniri ni zo kari Uganda niri ma alea zozo tualu aro esuza oneza ru ri be

English: People in the Northern region need free health services like family planning and HIV testing.
Luganda: Abantu b'omu bukiikakkono beetaga okufuna ebyobulamu eby'obwereere nga enkola y'ekizaalaggumba n'okukeberebwa akawuka akaleeta mukeenenya.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omumatemba ga Uganda, nibetaaga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obwa busha n'okuteekateekyera amaka, hamwe n'okwekyebeza akakooko ka siriimu.
Acholi: Dano ma tung kumalo me Uganda mite ni gunong kony me yotkom labongo cul ma calo yoo me lago nywal ki pime pi two jonyo
Ateso: Ekotosi itunga luko Nyakoi aijanakino natitai kwape alanakin aur ka ainwak ekurut lo eseny.
Lugbara: Ba kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleruri ma alea 'diyi le azakoma e'yo rua ala nisi pirini ekile aro anzi esele coza ni 'diyi tualu ari o'biza azo ondrindria niri si 'diyi

English: The United Nations General Assembly continues to do its work in Uganda.
Luganda: Olukiiko lw'omukago ogutaba ensi zonna lukyagenda mu maaso okukola omulimu gwalwo mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Orukiiko rw'amahanga ageteraine ,rugumiizemu okukora omurimo gwarwo omu Uganda.
Acholi: Dul madit me United Nations ma kelo lobe ducu kacel tye ka mede ki timo ticgi iUganda
Ateso: United Nations General Assembly nes inyikokit aswam ke ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Amuti United Nations niri ni mu azi erini ngaza be kari Uganda niri ma alea drile

English: Play your part to fight Non-Communicable Diseases
Luganda: Tuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwo okulwanyisa obulwadde obutasiigibwa okuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala
Runyankore: Hikiiriza obujunaanizibwa bwawe omu kurwanisa endwara ezitarikuturira.
Acholi: Tim gin ma itwero me lweny i kom two ma pe kobo
Ateso: Iswam nu owaikon kanu aitiji adekasinei nu engopito.
Lugbara: Le i'ye e'yo mini eco 'yeri a'di 'dizu azo ecopi eyi erepi 'ba eyi ma eselea ku 'diyi be

English: A roadmap to Universal Health Coverage has been developed
Luganda: Olugendo olututuusa ku kwetegereza ebyobulamu eby'awamu lutongozeddwa
Runyankore: Engyenderwaho y'okuhitsya amarwariro buri hamwe ekozirwe.
Acholi: Gityeko yubu lok manyuto kit ma dano ducu twero nongo kede kony me yotkom
Ateso: Etolomun erot lo ebuni aisiriamikite nuka amukian.
Lugbara: Ba gba geri muzu e'yo rua ala ni wudrikurusi ri ma 'yeta niri 'bo

English: The nationwide health sensitization program will be launched
Luganda: Okusomesa eggwanga lyonna ku byobulamu kujja kutongozebwa
Runyankore: Enteekateeka y'okwegyesa abantu ahaby'amagara omu ihanga ryona, neija kutongozibwa.
Acholi: Gityeko moko Yub me miyo ngec me yotkom ikabedo mapatpat me Uganda
Ateso: Eponio aitegear aisisianakino naka angaleu kakwap kere.
Lugbara: Ba mu otita imbata feza e'yo rua ala ni si kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri e'do

English: A new maternity centre will be built in a district in Uganda
Luganda: Ekifo ekizaalirwamu ekipya kijja kuzimbibwa mu disitulikiti emu mu Uganda
Runyankore: Eizariro ry'abakazi erisya niriija kwombekwa omu disiturikiti y'omu Uganda.
Acholi: Ot yat manyen ka ma mon nywal iye gibi yubu idistrik mo acel iUganda
Ateso: Emateneten arai iwodin lu idootor angor kes eponio aiduk odisitriktan
Lugbara: Ba nga angu okporovu eyini azakoma esuzu o'diru ni si distrikiti 'da ma alea kari Uganda niria

English: Government has decided to support farmers in the northern part of Uganda.
Luganda: Gavumenti esazeewo okuyambako abalimi mu bitundu by'obukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshaziremu kuhwera abahingi omu bicweka by'amatemba ga Uganda.
Acholi: Gamente otamo pi konyo lupur ma tung kumalo me Uganda
Ateso: Apugan nes egangaki akoriok luko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
Lugbara: Gamete ai atita fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru 'diyi ma alea 'diyini

English: When is Uganda's independence?
Luganda: Ameefuga ga Uganda ga ddi?
Runyankore: Okwetegyeka kwa Uganda niryari?
Acholi: nino me kwero loc-ken me Uganda tye awene?
Ateso: Iworibo ejaar aipugaikin bon nako Uganda?
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri esu driwala nguari?

English: Refugees should be allowed to come into the country.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu balina okukkirizibwa okujja mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Empungi zishemereire kwikirizibwa zikagaruka omu ihanga.
Acholi: Luring ayela omyero giye wek gudony iUganda
Ateso: Ekot ikerai ocamakinai alomun toma akwap.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ai emunyale eyini emuzu kari 'di ma alea.

English: People in Uganda are now forging national identity cards.
Luganda: Abantu mu Uganda kati bajingirira endagamuntu.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omu Uganda, obwahati nibagingirira endanga muntu.
Acholi: Dano me Uganda dong kombedi gitye ka yubu National ID ma pe ma kakare
Ateso: Emojirete kwana itunga luko Uganda akadin nu akwap.
Lugbara: O'bi Uganda a 'diyi curu'do national Id enzoru 'diyi ede.

English: A well-built septic tank shouldn't be a threat to anyone.
Luganda: Ekinnya kya kazambi tekirina kweraliikiriza muntu yenna.

Acholi: Buu ma gi kwinyo ci giyubu maber me guru cilo ma mol ki icoron ma iot pe omyero omii lworo ki ngat moo keken
Ateso: Ecoloni lo okwap lo edukuk ejok mam ebeit aitukurian idio itunganan.
Lugbara: Le angu yi ondi eyini razu sile kililiru 'diyi ma aa e'yoru ba ciri ni ku

English: There is a rise in theft and killings in the rural parts of the country.
Luganda: Obubbi n'okutta byeyongedde mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'omu byalo.
Runyankore: Obushuma n'obwisi bigyenzire nibyeyongyera omu bicweka by'ebyaro omu ihanga.
Acholi: Tim me kwo ki nek tye ka mede ikabedo ma icaro me lobo man
Ateso: Eyatakin akoko ka eyarit kotoma ocaaloi luka akwap.
Lugbara: Ogu azini 'ba o'diza ma omgbo kari ma angu calo ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi tutu.

English: The widow takes half of the deceased's property.
Luganda: Nnamwandu atwala ekitundu ku bintu by'omugenzi.
Runyankore: Omufakazi naatwara ekicweka ky'ebintu by'omufu.
Acholi: Dako pa latoo kwanyo nucu jami pa latoo
Ateso: Eyangari apuserut atutubet na iboro kalo atwan.
Lugbara: Awizi ni agu drapiri ma lonyi 'du aga vusi.

English: A person can go to exile either by force or willingly.
Luganda: Omuntu asobola okugenda mu buwanganguse ng'akakiddwa oba nga yeeyagalidde.
Runyankore: Omuntu nabaasa kugyemeserezibwa kuza omu buzaahe nari ayekundiire.
Acholi: Dano twero ngwec me cito ilobo mawoko nongo gi ryemo-aryema onyo nongo ocito pire kene
Ateso: Epedorio abuikin itunganan akerit kinga na akwap arai nges bon kanuke.
Lugbara: Ba azi eco kari ivileri ku muzu kari azi nduni ma alea ceni ra kaniku 'ba eco eri dro okposi ra

English: Creating jobs for Ugandans by building factories is good for Uganda.
Luganda: Okutonderawo bannayuganda emirimu nga bazimba amakolero kirungi eri Uganda.
Runyankore: Okuteeraho abanya Uganda emirimo obwo barikwombeka amakorero, nikirungi ahabw'eihanga rya Uganda.
Acholi: Yubu factori mapol obed gin maber tutwal pi nyayo tic ki dano me Uganda
Ateso: Aitolomun aswamisinei kanu itunga luko Uganda kowai lo aiduk icuman nes ejok kanu itunga.
Lugbara: Azi eyi ma edeta angu afa edezu 'diyi ma sita siri muke tu kari Uganda niri ni

English: The government tries to intervene when media companies publish false news.
Luganda: Gavumenti egezaako okuvaayo nga kkampuni z'amawulire zifulumya amawulire amafu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti negyezaho kwimukiramu, ebitongore by'amakuru byaheza kushohoza agatahikire.
Acholi: Gamente temo donyo ka doro tic pa dul ma miyo lok angeya kace gumiyo lok anii
Ateso: Etamenenei apugan alomunun karai itolomutu lu iyemuto akiro nu aisab.
Lugbara: Gamete ni o'bi ti apezu e'yo eyi ma alea amuti o'dukoti feza ni 'diyi ka o'duko enzoru 'diyi ofuria

English: Protecting human rights has many benefits.
Luganda: Okukuuma eddembe ly'obuntu kirina emiganyulo mingi.
Runyankore: Okubangira obugabe bw'abantu kiine emigasho mingi.
Acholi: Gwoko twero pa dano tye ki kony mapol
Ateso: Ayuarite apedorosio nu itunga ipu ajokisio.
Lugbara: Drilemgbo eyi ma tambaza ma orodri eyi karakara

English: It is very hard to survive a highway car accident
Luganda: Kibeera kizibu nnyo okuwona akabenje k'emmotoka ku luguudo lwa mwasanjala.
Runyankore: Kigumire okwetantara butandu ey'aharuguuto nyeigyendwa.
Acholi: Obedo tek tutwal me loyo awano manonge igudi madit
Ateso: Etiono aiku akangas na ogudo loapolon.
Lugbara: Eri mbazaru mini mi pazu drileonzi nzila 'diyi ma alea.

English: There are some concerning issues with our law system
Luganda: Waliwo ensonga ezimu ezeekuusa ku nkola y'amateeka gaffe.
Runyankore: Hariho ebintu ebitashoborokire, omu nkora yaitu y'ebiragiro
Acholi: Tye lok mukene ikit me ngolokop ilobo man ma pe tye atir
Ateso: Ejaas iboro lu mam etenitos keda ikisila wok.
Lugbara: E'yo azi okporu ni eyi arakala azita ni Amavuri be ci

English: With this new machinery, road construction will become easier.
Luganda: Okukola enguudo kujja kwanguwa olwa kino ekyuma ekipya.
Runyankore: Okukora enguto nikwija kworoba ahabw'okugira ebyoma bisya.
Acholi: Ki Cuma man manyeni, yubu gudi bibedo gin mayot
Ateso: Keda acuman nuitetiak nu, epatanar aiduk irotin.
Lugbara: Masini o'diru 'diyi si, Nzila eyi ma sita ni mu eca ewakokoru

English: Members of parliament are always requesting for money.
Luganda: Ababaka ba paalamenti buli kaseera basaba ssente.
Runyankore: Ba memba b'eishengyero buriijo nibashaba esente.
Acholi: Lumemba me parliament ikare ducu nongo gitye ka lego cente
Ateso: Ingisitos duc imeeban luka airabet ikapun.
Lugbara: Azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi robia ai

English: Members of Parliament can decide either to support or not to support the motion.
Luganda: Ababaka ba paalamenti basobola okusalawo okuwagira oba obutawagira kiteeso.
Runyankore: Ba memba b'omu ishengyero nibabaasa kusharamu kushagika ekiteiso nainga okwanga kukishagika.
Acholi: Lumemba me parliament twero yero me cwako onyo pe me cwako lok magikelo inyimgi iot moko cik
Ateso: Epedorete imeeban luka airabet aigang arai aitepeg nu epesikitai kairabet.
Lugbara: Azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyi eco pe e'yo dri agbatara niri atira kaniku atiku

English: The government wants to construct a big hospital where students can also study.
Luganda: Gavumenti eyagala okuzimba ddwaliro ddene abayizi nabo gye bayinza okusomera.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neeyenda kwombeka eirwariro rihango, eri abaana barikubaasa kwegyeramu.
Acholi: Gamente mito yubu ot yat madit adeda kama lutino kwan twero bene kwan iye
Ateso: Ekot apugan adukun adekis napolon na epedorete esisiak da aisisia.
Lugbara: Gamete le arojo azi ambu sukulu anzi eyini ecozu imbata esuzu ra ni sii.

English: In Uganda, nobody is above the law.
Luganda: Mu Uganda tewali ali waggulu w'amateeka.
Runyankore: Omu Uganda, tihaine omuntu ori ahaiguru y'ebiragiro.
Acholi: iUganda, pe tye ka ngat moo keken ma dit loyo cik
Ateso: Ko Uganda, emamei itunganan ejai kuju na ekisil.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, 'ba azi azita drilea ni yo.

English: Having swimming pools at home is dangerous.
Luganda: Okubeera n'ekidiba omuwugirwa ewaka kya bulabe.
Runyankore: Okugira ebidiba byokwibira omumaka n'ekyakabi.
Acholi: Yubu ka kwang manonge gang twero kelo peko
Ateso: Ajaut keda ne iduere kore, emina ayangaun akangas.
Lugbara: Eri adrini muke ku angu eyi saazu 'buleru 'diyi ni aa'zu akua.

English: The matter is still in court.
Luganda: Ensongo ekyali mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Eshonga zikiri omu kooti.
Acholi: Loke pwod tye ikot
Ateso: Erongo akiro ejaas adieket.
Lugbara: E'yo nderi nga kiri duani ma drilea.

English: The government is looking for other ways to get taxes.
Luganda: Gavumenti enoonya ngeri ndala za kufunamu misolo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eriyo neeronda emihanda endiijo y'okutunga emishoro.
Acholi: Gamente tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me nongo mucoro
Ateso: Emoi apugan icie iwaitin lu itelemet isolosinei.
Lugbara: Gamete ni geri azi 'diyi nda musoro eyi esuzu.

English: Parents are advised to protect their children from strangers.
Luganda: Abazadde baweebwa amagezi okukuuma abaana baabwe okuva eri abalabe.
