English: A minister's child has been immunised against Measles-Rubella
Luganda: Omwana wa minisita agemeddwa obulwadde bw'olukusense-Kikutiya
Runyankore: Omwana wa Minisita asirikirwe obusheru-kikutiya na poliyo.
Acholi: Latin pa minista acel gityeko gwero ne pi gengo two Anyo ki Rubella
Ateso: Aponi ikisai ikoku eminista ekato lo adeka na akwap.
Lugbara: Minisita ma mva esu aro soza azo kajuka azini rubella nirisi

English: Children in schools  have been vaccinated against Measles-Rubella and Polio
Luganda: Abaana mu masomero bagemeddwa obulwadde bw'Olukusense-Kikutiya ne ppooliyo
Runyankore: Abaana abari omu mashomero basirikirwe obusheru-kikutiya na poliyo.
Acholi: Gityeko gwero lutinokwan pi gengo two Anyo, Rubella ki two Akweya
Ateso: Aponi ikisai idwe lu isomeroi ekato lo adeka na akwap ka polio.
Lugbara: Bo oso anzi nyiri sukulua 'diyi azo kajuka niri si tualu polio be.

English: Discussion on what Rubella is and how it can be transmitted
Luganda: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bulwadde bwa Kikutiya kye ki n'engeri gye busaasaanamu
Runyankore: Okuganiira aha burwaire bwa kikutiya amakuru gabwo, n'okuburikubaasa kukwata.
Acholi: Nywako lok me niang gin ma Rubella obedo ki kit ma kobo kwede
Ateso: Ejaas ineresinei kanu ikamunitos Rubella ka eipone lo ikopar.
Lugbara: Agbatara azo rubella niri ma dria azini geri erini ecozu i awazu ri ma dria

English: Congratulations to the health workers
Luganda: Tuyozaayoza abasawo
Runyankore: Abashaho mutabaaruke.
Acholi: Pwoc bot lutic me yotkom
Ateso: Isiyalamikitai eswamak lu adekis.
Lugbara: Awa'difo 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi dri.

English: Measles vaccines should be provided without fail.
Luganda: Eddagala erigema Olunkusense lirina okugabibwa.
Runyankore: Emibazi y'okusirika obusheru eshemereire kuheebwa hatariho kihakanisa.
Acholi: Yat agwera me gengo anyo omyero gi mii labongo keng
Ateso: Ekot aijanakin ekato lo adeka na akwap komam atwaniar.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe aro soza azo kajuka niri si 'diyi ece kokoru.

English: Extension of the Measles-Rubella immunization campaign.
Luganda: Okwongezaayo kwa kampeyini y'okugema obulwadde bw'Olukusense-Kikutiya.
Runyankore: Okujanjaza ehururu y'okusirika obusheru-Rubella na Poliyo.
Acholi: Medo kare me pwony pi gwero dano me gengo two Anyo ki Rubella
Ateso: Aisiekikin ekampein loka ekato lo adeka na akwap.
Lugbara: Ba mu e'yo mile oziza ni azo kajuka ni azini azo rubella niri ma dria ri ma o'du eyi otu

English: Cross border collaboration is to be discussed on Ebola virus disease.
Luganda: Enkolagana busukkansalo yaakuteesebwako ku kawuka akaleeta ekirwadde kya Ebola.
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho okuteisa ahankorengana y'amahanga okurwanisa Ebola.
Acholi: Gibi nywako tam ma mako lok me tic kacel ki lobo macok kwedwa pi lweny i kom two Ebola
Ateso: Apuponoro na oikoruon nes ebeit aitemitem kanuka adeka naka ebola.
Lugbara: Ba mu agbatara gba ti ecita kari bodaa 'diyini ti ecizu azo ebola nirisi ri ma dria

English: All children under fifteen years are supposed to receive Measles and Polio vaccines
Luganda: Abaana bonna abali wansi w'emyaka kkumi n'etaano balina okugemebwa Ppoliyo n'Olukusense.
Runyankore: Abaana boona abari ahansi y'emyaka ikumi neetaano bashemereire kutunga omubazi gw'okusirika obusheru na Polio.
Acholi: Lutino ducu ma peya guromo mwaka aparabic omyero gunong yat agwera pi gengo two Anyo ki two Akweya
Ateso: Idwe kere lu ikaru itomonakany kwap kes ebeit adumun ekato lo adeka na akwap ka epolio.
Lugbara: Le anzi nyiri dria eli capi mudrini towi ku 'diyi ma esu aro soza kajuka si azini polio si ri ra.

English: Parliament should put health issues first above anything else.
Luganda: Paalamenti erina okuteeka ebyobulamu ku mwanjo okusinga ebintu ebirala byonna.
Runyankore: Eishengyero rishemereire kwebembeza eshonga z'eby'amagara, hataine ekindi kyona ekyakozirwe.
Acholi: Ot moko cik onyo parliament omyero oket lok me yot kom obed gin ma pire tek loyo weng
Ateso: Ekot airabet aisingarenit nuka angaleu adepar icie iboro.
Lugbara: Le paliamenti ma 'ba e'yo rua alata ni 'diyi oko e'yo azi 'diyi ma drilea dria

English: Polio is quite common in children under the age of five.
Luganda: Ppooliyo ali nnyo mu baana abakka wansi w'emyaka etaano.
Runyankore: Poliyo neekira kukwata abaana abari ahansi y'emyaka etaano.
Acholi: Two akweya pol kare mako lutino ma mwaka gi peya oromo abic
Ateso: Idila polio kanejaas idwe lu ikaru ikany kwap.
Lugbara: Kalafe 'ba polio niri be 'diyi ma omgbo angiri anzi eli capi towi ku 'diyi be

English: School children should be vaccinated against Polio and Measles.
Luganda: Abaana b'essomero balina okugemebwa Ppooliyo n'Olukusense.
Runyankore: Abaana b'amashomero bashemereire kusirikwa endwara ya Poliyo n'obusheru.
Acholi: Lutinokwan omyero gunong yat agwera pi gengo two Akweya ki two Anyo
Ateso: Ekot idwe lu esomero aikis ekato lo adeka na akwap ka epolio.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma oso sukulu anzi eyi kajuka atrizu polio be ra.

English: I am grateful for the ongoing support from the ministry of health to Ugandans.
Luganda: Nsiima obuwagizi bw'ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu eri bannayuganda.
Runyankore: Ninsima obushagiki oburikuhebwa abanya Uganda kuruga omu minisiture y'eby'amagara.
Acholi: Atye ki pwoc madit pi kony ma tye ka mede kun aa ki bot ministry me yot pi dano me Uganda
Ateso: Eyalama eong noi kanu agangat na elosi akonye naka erionget loka angaleu nejaas itunga luko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ma aa ayikosi atita Okalamvu alata niri ni fe kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi dririsi.

English: Accident and emergency units are being equipped.
Luganda: Ebifo awajjanjabirwa ab'obubenje n'abali mu mbeera embi biwereddwa ebyetaagisa.
Runyankore: Emyanya y'okuraguriramu aba butandu n'ebihikiirizi , eriyo netunga ebintu by'okukozesa.
Acholi: Gitye ka medo jami mamite ika jolo dano ma gunongo awanu ki ma two obwoyogi
Ateso: Ejakai aibwanakin iswamasia nejai ewai loka akangasia ka engeso.
Lugbara: Ba wadi drileonzi eyini tualu wadi e'yo ma aza kozu mbele diyi ma alea afa dria lele 'diyi oturia

English: It's two days to the 1st National Health Promotion and Disease Conference.
Luganda: Ebula ennaku bbiri okutuuka ku lukungaana lw'eggwanga olusooka ku kutumbula ebikwata ku bulamu n'endwadde.
Runyankore: Hasigaireyo ebiro bibiri okuhika aha ruteerane rw'okubanza rw' eihanga orurikukwata aha kutunguura eby'amagara n'okurwanisa endwara.
Acholi: Odong nino aryo me oo iKacoke me acel madit me nywako tam malube ki kit me ilo rwom me yot kom ki lweny i kom two
Ateso: Ideuna aparasia aarei alomar airiamun naka Aitojookar Angaleu Keda Adekasinei.
Lugbara: O'du eyi ace iri Otita Rua ala otuza azini azo eyini kari ma alea ndulu ri ni

English: There is a need for innovation around testing kits for various diseases.
Luganda: Waliwo obwetaavu bw'okutondawo ebikozesebwa okukebera endwadde ez'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Hariho ekyetengo ky'okujumbura ebyoma by'okukyebera endwara ezitari zimwe.
Acholi: Mite ni ginong ryeko onyo diro manyen ikit me pimo dano pi two mapatpat
Ateso: Ejai eipuda lo aiteteun iboro lu inwakere adekasinei nuegelegela.
Lugbara: Le 'ba 'ye e'yo azi o'diru ni afa azo ndundu eyi o'bizu 'ba ma rua 'diyi edezu ra

English: Support from the technical and financial team is appreciated by the Ministry of Health.
Luganda: Obuwagizi okuva mu bakugu n'abakola mu byensimbi busiimibwa ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara n'esiima obushagiki kuruga omu bakugu hamwe nabarikuheereza esente.
Acholi: Ministry me yot kom miyo pwoc pi kony me tic ki kony me cente
Ateso: Isiyalamikitai agangat naka etiimu loka etatai keda ikapun ko erionget loka angaleu.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri fe awa'difo atita engazu amuti afa edepi 'diyi vu tualu amuti robia vu 'diyi vurisi

English: A quick emergency response demonstration will be conducted at Kololo Independence Grounds.
Luganda: Okwolesa obudduukirize obw'amangu obujja okukolebwa ku kisaawe ky'ameenunula e Kololo.
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho omukoro gw'okworekyereza ogw ahonaaho ahari Kololo Independence Grounds.
Acholi: Yub ikit me konyo dano ka peko opoto atura obibedo tye ibar madit me Kololo
Ateso: Eponio aitetemonor ekapanakine lo atipet kanu engeso koisawe loka Kololo Indepedence Grounds.
Lugbara: Ba nga geri e'yo aza kozu mbeleru ri ma azi e'da angu driwalani Kololo niri ma alea

English: Pneumonia can be caused by viruses, bacteria and fungi.
Luganda: Lubyamira aleetebwa obuwuka obw'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Emishonga nikireetwa obukooko, bakitiria n'oruhumbwe.
Acholi: Two Pneumonia kwidi mapat pat twero kelo ne
Ateso: Adeka naka iukoi nes epedorete ikur ka emurat ayangaun.
Lugbara: O'bu ndundu omvele virasi ru, bakitiria ru azini fangayi ru 'diyi azo nimoniya niri fe ni

English: The Medical implementation plan has been launched.
Luganda: Enteekateeka z'obujjanjabi zitongozeddwa.
Runyankore: Enteekateeka y'okuta omu nkora eby'amagara, etongoziibwe.
Acholi: Gityeko cwako yub ma mako kit ma tic me miyo kony me yotkom biwot kwede
Ateso: Etegear nuikamunitos amukian.
Lugbara: Ba e'do otita e'yo aro ni 'diyi 'bazu azi ngazu ri 'bo.

English: A tool kit to improve the quality of Tuberculosis care has been launched.
Luganda: Akabookisi k'ebikozesebwa okutumbula ku mutindo gw'endabirira y'abalina akafuba katongozeddwa.
Runyankore: Ebikwato by'okujanjaba endwara y'akakoonko bitongoziibwe.
Acholi: Pwony manyen ma miyo ngec ikit me gwoko dano matye ki two aona opio otyeko kati
Ateso: Etegear iswamasia lu iteteunet amukian naka eluera.
Lugbara: Ba ede masini azi o'diru tambaza fele azo tibi nirisi ri otuzu

English: Recently land grabbing has become very common in society.
Luganda: Gye buvuddeko ekibbattaka kibadde kingi mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Okwita eitaka kugyenzire nikweyongyera omu bantu.
Acholi: Ikin kareni lok me mayo ngom odoko pol tutwal ikin piny
Ateso: Ademio na alupok nes edilu kotoma otunga pacu.
Lugbara: Sa'wa 'disi, e'yo nyaku paza vu 'diyi curu'do karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea.

English: The tour was concluded by the honourable minister.
Luganda: Okulambula kwafundikirwa minisita.
Runyankore: Orutayaayo rukahenderwa Minisita.
Acholi: Ladit minista otyeko wot me ngiyo piny
Ateso: Abu eminista ongetak nuka eilat.
Lugbara: Minisita 'da ombe acii acizu afa eyi onezu 'da ma eti ni

English: The project is focusing on suppliers in different parts of the country.
Luganda: Pulojekiti essira eritadde ku bakitunzi mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti neehwera abarikureeta ebintu omu bicweka bitari bimwe omu ihanga.
Acholi: Projek man tiyo ki dano ma cato jami mapatpat ikabedo ducu me lobo man
Ateso: Erai lo epelu lo itereikitai akorak atutubena nuegelegela kakwap.
Lugbara: Otita 'di 'ba asi 'ba afa eyi awapi kari 'di ma woko ndundu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria

English: There is an increase in the production of foods rich in vitamins.
Luganda: Waliwo okweyongera mu kufulumya emmere erimu vvitamiini.
Runyankore: Okukora ebyokurya ebiine ekiriisa kya vitamini kweyongyeire.
Acholi: Yubu cam matye ki vitamin muromo tye ka mede
Ateso: Apolor akoru na inyamat lu ejaas keda ibitamins luipu.
Lugbara: Nyaka vitamini eyi be 'diyi ma ofuta ma omgbo tu ra

English: There will be a two-day discussion about the pest outbreak.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwa nnaku bbiri ku kubalukawo kw'ebiwuka .
Runyankore: Nihaza kubaho omukoro gw'okuhanuura aha kubarukaho kw'obukooko, kumara ebiro bibiri.
Acholi: Nywako lok mamako jami matye ka balo cam apita bibedo tye pi nino aryo
Ateso: Ejaun airiamun na aparasia aarei kanu ikamunitos abwangun na ikur.
Lugbara: Agbatara azi ni nga adri o'du iri e'yo o'bu ori eyi ezapi 'diyi ma efuta ma dria

English: Various issues were addressed by the speaker during the meeting.
Luganda: Ensonga ez'enjawulo zaayanjulwa omukubiriza w'olukiiko.
Runyankore: Omugambi omukuru akagamba aha nshonga nyingi omu rukiiko.
Acholi: Ladit ma miyo lok ogamo lapeny ducu ma okati ikacoke
Ateso: Abu eraban itemitem nuikamunitos iboro luipu kotoma airiamun.
Lugbara: Anzenzea ei nze e'yo e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria okuta 'da ma alea.

English: This is the only way of reaching out to farmers in those areas.
Luganda: Eno y'engeri yokka ey'okutuuka ku balimi mu bitundu ebyo.
Runyankore: Ogu nigwo muhanda gwonka ogw'okuhikiirira abahingi omu mwanya ogwo.
Acholi: Man aye yoo acel keken me kube ki lupur ma ikabedo meno
Ateso: Lo bon nes eipone lo idolokinet akoriok kotoma aiboisio kangun.
Lugbara: Di lu geri ci ama o'duko ni ecozu cazu 'ba amvu 'yapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vuri i.

English: Different means of communication are used to educate farmers about pest outbreaks.
Luganda: Empuliziganya ez'enjawulo zikozeseddwa okusomesa abalimi ku kubalukawo kw'ebiwuka.
Runyankore: Oburyo bwingi bw'empurizagana nibukoresibwa okushomesa abahingi ebikwatiraine n'okubarukaho kw'obukooko.
Acholi: gitiyo ki yoo mapatpat me miyo ngec bot lupur ikit me lweny i kom jami mabalo gin apita
Ateso: Iwaitin luegelegela itwasamao aisisianakina itunga nuka abwangun na ikur.
Lugbara: Ba geri o'dukoti edrizu ndundu 'diyi ayu imbata fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini o'bu ndundu ori eyi ezapi 'diyi ma efuta ma dria

English: There is an outbreak of maize destroying pest in that district.
Luganda: Waliwo okubalukawo kw'ekiwuka ekyonoona kasooli mu disitulikiti eyo.
Runyankore: Habarukireho akakooko akarikushiisha ebicoori omu Disiturikiti.
Acholi: Two opoto ma tye ka camo anyogi idistrik eno ni
Ateso: Ejai abwangun na ikur lu enyamete ekirididi odisitrikt kangol.
Lugbara: O'bu kaka eyi ezapiri efu distrikiti 'da ma alea

English: Fake insecticides are flooding the market these days.
Luganda: Eddagala ly'ebiwuka lingi ku katale ennaku zino.
Runyankore: Omubazi gw'okwita obukooko ogugingiriire gujanjaire akatare ebiro ebi.
Acholi: Tye yat ma gitye kacato ma pe en ki kome ma gitiyo kwede me neko kwidi ipoto
Ateso: Ileleba kwana ikee luarokok osokoni aparasia nu.
Lugbara: Aro osasa eyi ogbizu enzoru 'diyi curu'do cu a karakara.

English: Experts are searching for the best ways of stopping the spread of the disease.
Luganda: Abakugu banoonya engeri ezisinga obulungi ez'okukomya okusaasaana kw'endwadde.
Runyankore: Abakugu bariyo nibacondooza okutunga emihanda mirungi ey'okuzibira okujanjara kw'endwara.
Acholi: Ludiro tic tye ka yenyo yoo maber loyo me gengo nyayo two
Ateso: Emoete ipirioitin iwaitin lu itikokinere akora na adeka.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo ni'ba ali 'diyi geri eyi onda azo 'da atrizu

English: Diseases in animals can also be controlled by vaccination.
Luganda: Endwadde mu nsolo zisobola n'okuziyizibwa nga tugema.
Runyankore: Endwara omu nyamaishwa nazo nizibaasa kuzibirwa barikuraba omu kuzisirika.
Acholi: Two ma nonge i kom lee bene gitwero lweny iye kun gitiyo ki yat agwera
Ateso: Adeka na akituk epedorio aitikitik keda ekato.
Lugbara: Ba eco azo anyapa eyini 'diyi atri aro soza si ra.

English: Rural farmers have not adopted irrigation during dry seasons.
Luganda: Abalimi b'omu byalo tebettanidde kufukirira mu biseera by'ekyeya.
Runyankore: Abahingi b'omubyaro tibakatandikire enkora y'okwitirira omu bwire bw'ekyanda.
Acholi: Lupur ma icaro peya gucako tic ki Cuma me kiro pii ipoto ikare me ooro
Ateso: Akoriok lu ocaalo mam egaritos aitwasam ewai lo aicokicok akipi kamu.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'ya'ba caloa 'diyi curu'do yi oda ori eyi ma dria sa'wa eli nirisi

English: Watering supports crops to grow during the dry season.
Luganda: Okufukirira kuyamba ebimera okukula mu biseera by'ekyeya.
Runyankore: Okwitirira nikuhwera ebihingwa kukura omu bwire bw'ekyanda.
Acholi: Kiri pii ipoto konyo weko jami apita dongo maber ikare me ooro
Ateso: Aicokicok akipi ingarakini ikorion apolor ejok kamu.
Lugbara: Yi odaza ori eyi ma dria ri ni fe eyi dri zozu eli si .

English: There is no electricity in my home area.
Luganda: Teri masannyalaze mu kitundu gye nzaalibwa.
Runyankore: Omu kyaro kyangye tihariyo mashanyarazi.
Acholi: Mac peya kikubu ikabedowa
Ateso: Emamei akim na ekipie kaiboisit ka.
Lugbara: Aci ama vu angu akua ri ma alea yo.

English: Farm schools have been set up to support the agricultural sector.
Luganda: Amasomero g'ebyobulimi gagguddwawo okuyambako okutumbula ebyobulimi.
Runyankore: Amashomero agarikwegyesa eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa gatandikirweho okuhwera minisiture y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Gityeko yubu kanongo pwony me pur mapatpat me konyo tic ma mako lok i kom pur
Ateso: Ageun nuka isomeroi lu ekoriete kanu aigang ewai lo akoru.
Lugbara: Ba e'do sukulu agirikica ni 'diyi atita fezu arakala agirikica niri dri

English: Water tank dealers are enjoying the market across the country.
Luganda: Abatunda ttanka z'amazzi beeyagalira mu katale mu ggwanga wonna.
Runyankore: Abarikuguza tanka z'amaizi baine akatare omu ihanga ryona.
Acholi: Lucat tank me gwoko pii tye kanongo cuk maber me cato wil iUganda kulu
Ateso: Agwelanarak apipai nu akipi kes elelete keda esokoni kakwap.
Lugbara: Ba tanki yi tambazu 'diyi ozipi 'diyi ma cu kari 'di ma alea ndulu

English: Government has constructed boreholes to reduce the water problem.
Luganda: Gavumenti ataddeewo zi nnayikondo okukendeeza ekizibu ky'amazzi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eyombekire za naikondo okukyendeeza ahaibura ry'amaizi.
Acholi: Gamente ocweyo tangi mapol pi dwoko piny peko me nongo pii
Ateso: Abok apugan agilon kanu aitidisiar ican lu akipi.
Lugbara: Gamete si bowaholu eyi e'yo yi ako niri esizu.

English: The organization has given us disease-resistant cassava stems.
Luganda: Ekitingole kituwadde emiti gya muwogo egitalumbibwa ndwadde.
Runyankore: Ekigombe kituhaire ebiti bya muhogo ebirikugumira endwara n'ebindi.
Acholi: Dul meno gumiyo ki wan tyen gwana me apita ma two pe mako oyot
Ateso: Abu erionget ijaik oni akito nu emuogo nu mam adeka esurokini.
Lugbara: Amuti 'da fe amani ola pati azo bipi ku 'diyi.

English: Not every pesticide should be used to spray ticks.
Luganda: Si buli ddagala nti lirina okukozesebwa okufuuyira enkwa.
Runyankore: Toshemereire kukozesa buri mubazi gw'okufuuhirira omu kufuuhirira engoha.
Acholi: Pe yat akira ducu omyero gi tii kwede me neko okwodo
Ateso: Mam ikee kere itwasamao kanu asik omadang.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ayu aro dria ogbiza 'diyi oga eyi ogbizu ku.

English: All farmers should spray their cattle to fight off ticks.
Luganda: Abalunzi bonna balina okufuuyira ente zaabwe okusobola okulwanyisa enkwa.
Runyankore: Abariisa boona bashemereire kufuuhirira amatungo gaabo okurwanisa engoha.
Acholi: Lupuu ducu omyero gukir yat i kom dyangi gi me lweny i kom okwodo
Ateso: Akoriok kere ekot aisik akituk kec kanu aiyar imadang.
Lugbara: Le 'ba anyapa ta mbapi 'diyi ma ogbi eyi ti eyi aro si oga eyi o'dizu.

English: Health officers warn meat sellers about the poor hygiene of butcheries.
Luganda: Ab'ebyobulamu balabudde abatunzi b'ennyama ku bukyafu mu zi bbucca.
Runyankore: Ab'ebyamagara barabwiire abarikuguza enyama okwetantara oburofa omumyanya ei barikubaagiramu .
Acholi: Lutic me yotkom gi ciko lucat ringo pi lok me lengo ika cat gi
Ateso: Apotu imurok luka angeleu ikwenyasi agwelanarak akiring nuikamunit amamus aila kotogoi lu egwelanarere akiring.
Lugbara: Drice'ba alata ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza 'ba za ozipi 'diyi dri alata ako angu iza ozizu 'diyi vu ri ma dria.

English: Veterinary officers have supported animal keepers across the nation.
Luganda: Abasawo b'ebisolo bayambye abalunzi okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna.
Runyankore: Abashaho b'enyamaishwa bahweraire abariisa omu ihanga.
Acholi: Daktari ma tiyo i kom lee gumiyo kony bot lugwok lee manonge ilobo man
Ateso: Apotu imurok lu itiang igangata epitak akituk kakwap kere.
Lugbara: Ba anyapa osopi 'diyi fe atita 'ba anyapa ta mbapi 'diyi ni kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

English: Many people in rural areas grow food for home consumption.
Luganda: Abantu bangi mu byalo balima mmere ya kulya waka.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi omubyaro nibahinga ebykurya by'okukozesa omumaka gaabo
Acholi: Pol dano matye icaro pito cam me acama igangi gi
Ateso: Itunga luipu ocaaloi ekoriete inyamat kanu ainyam.
Lugbara: Ba karakara caloa 'diyi nyaka 'ya nyazaru akua.

English: They have engaged farmers to help them learn when to carry out spraying.
Luganda: Beetabizzaamu abalimi okubayamba okuyiga ddi lwe balina okufuuyira.
Runyankore: Bagambire n'abahingi kubaasa kubamanyisa obu bashemereire kufuhirrira.
Acholi: Gu tyeko miyo ngec bot lupur wek gunge awene ma omyero gukir yat
Ateso: Esisianakin akoriok ajenun apakio nu isikere.
Lugbara: Ba tra 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi eyi ma azakozu eyini onita fezu sa'wa aro ogbiza niri ma dria

English: Coffee is one of the major cash crops in Uganda.
Luganda: Emmwanyi kimu ku birime eby'okutunda ebisinga mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Omwani ni kimwe aha bihingwa ebirikurugwamu esente omu Uganda.
Acholi: Mwanyi obedo jami apita acel ma kelo cente madwong iUganda
Ateso: Erai emwanyi ediopet okorion lu egwelanario kinga ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Kawa eri nyaka ozizaru okporu Kari Uganda niri ni 'diyi ma azi

English: District governments need to agree on what's best for their communities
Luganda: Gavumenti z'ebitundu zirina okukkaanya ku kisinga obulungi eri ebitundu byazo
Runyankore: Gavumenti z'ebyanga ziine kwikirizana aha bintu ebishemereire ebyanga byazo.
Acholi: Gamente ma itedero me districts omyero guwinye i kom gin ma ber pi lwak gi.
Ateso: Ekot apuganasia nu odisitrikt acamanar aseun nu ejokuka kanu itunga kec.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba districtia 'diyi ma otu ti e'yo eyi ma ongulumu eyidri ala ndeni 'diyi ma dria ra.

English: Civil servants often ask for salary increments
Luganda: Abakozi ba gavumenti batera okusaba okubongeza emisaala
Runyankore: Abakozi ba Gavumenti buriijo nibashaba kubongyeza omushaara.
Acholi: Lutic pa gamente ipol pa kare gilego ni ki med mucara gi
Ateso: Ingisenenete duc eswamak lu apugan aiyasio na iropito.
Lugbara: Azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi curu'do ai 'bani eyi ma musara otuzu.

English: Salary increments often spark off a debate among members of the public
Luganda: Okwongeza emisaala kutera okukubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo mu bantu
Runyankore: Okwongyera omushaara, nikureetaho okuhaajaana omu bantu.
Acholi: Lok kom medo mucara ipola kare kelo nyamo lok madit ikin lwak
Ateso: Aiyasio na iropito duc eyaunene epeget kanejaas itunga.
Lugbara: E'yo bani musara otuzu ri ni o'du driasi agbatara eji o'bi eyi ma eselea.

English: Lecturers have put down their tools until their salary is increased.
Luganda: Basaabasomesa beediimye okutuusa ng'omusaala gwabwe gwongezeddwa.
Runyankore: Abashomesa omu yunivasite bataire ahansi ebikwato byabo okuhisya obu omushaara  gwabo gurayongyerwe.
Acholi: Lupwonye me gangi kwan I rwom ma malo gujuku tic nikwanyo ka ki medo mucaragi
Ateso: Apotu esisianakinak luko Unibasiti opalasi aswam itoni ne iyatakinere eropit kec.
Lugbara: Imba'ba univasiti ni 'diyi ga anzi eyi imbako si kpere 'bani e'yi ma musara oturia .

English: The government should increase the salary of local councillors
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okwongeza e misaala gy'abakansala b'ebitundu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, eshemereire kwongyeza omushaara gwa baakansara b'ebyaro.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omed mucara pa lutela ma itedero
Ateso: Ekot apugan aiyatakin eropit loka ikansilan
Lugbara: Le gamete ma otu kansila eyi ma musara ra.

English: Lack of consensus among council members affects the members of the community
Luganda: Obutakkaanya mu bakiise ku lukiiko bukosa abatuuze b'ekitundu
Runyankore: Obuteikirizana ahagati ya bamemba b'akakiiko, nibutamba eikono abantu ba omu kyanga
Acholi: Bedo pe pa winye ikin lutela ma itedero keto dic i kom lwak gi
Ateso: Aikidiokus na ikansilan kotoma airiamun itolitoli aswamisinei itunga.
Lugbara: Ti ecita ako kansila eyi ma eselea ri ni e'yo eji 'ba ongulumua 'diyini

English: Councillors need to agree on social policy for their communities
Luganda: Bakansala beetaaga okukkaanya ku mateeka agafuga abantu mu bitundu
Runyankore: Ba kansara baine kwikirizana aha biragiro , ebiraije kukora omu byanga byabo.
Acholi: Lutela ma itedero omyero guwinye i kom yoo me tic pi lwak ma ikabedo gi
Ateso: Ekot ikansilan acamanar nu ainapeta kanu itunga kec
Lugbara: Le kansila eyi ma eciti otita eyi siria eyi ma ongulumu eyini.

English: District councillors are poorly paid which affects service delivery
Luganda: Bakansala ba disitulikiti basasulwa bubi ekikosa empeereza
Runyankore: Ba kansara aha Disiturikiti nibashashurwa kubi, ekirikutamba eikono enkora y'okuhisya obuheereza aha bantu.
Acholi: Lutela ma itedero ki culu gi ma goro ma eni tye ki adwoki marac i kom tic gi
Ateso: Ikidioko ikapun etacio ikansilan lukodisitrikt  ido itolitoli aswam.
Lugbara: Ba ofeni kansila distrikitia 'diyi muke ku fezu azo ngaza azini azakoma feza o'bi eyini ri ni ecazu ewaru.

English: The government should increase the money allocated for district budgets
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okwongera ku ssente eziweebwa mu mbalirira ya disitulikiti
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera aha sente ezirikuheebwa zaa disiturikiti.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omed cente ma ki miyo pi byek lim me districts
Ateso: Ekot apugan aiyatakin ikapun lu ijanakino edisitrikt.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma otu robia fe distrikiti eyi ma bajeti eyini ri ma omgbo ra.

English: Women are not equally represented in leadership positions
Luganda: Abakyala tebakiikiriddwa bulungi mu bifo by'obukulembeze
Runyankore: Abakazi tibarikujwekyerwa ekirikumara omu myanya y'obwebembezi.
Acholi: Lucung ka wang mon well gi pe rom gi wel coo I kabedo me tella
Ateso: Mam angor ebwoikitai eirianu kotoma aiboisio nuapolok
Lugbara: Ba pa tupi oku eyini 'diyi e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea were.

English: Allowances of District councillors should be raised to improve service delivery
Luganda: Ensako ya bakansala ba disitulikiti erina okubaweebwa okusobola okutumbula obuweereza.
Runyankore: Enshako ya baakansara aha Disiturikiti eshemereire kwongyerwa, okubaasa kuhisya gye obuheereza aha bantu.
Acholi: Mucara pa lutela me tedero omyero ki med wek omed rwom me tic
Ateso: Ekot aikeun ikapun lu aswam luka ikansilan kodisitrikt kanu aitojokar aswam.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma otu robia fele kansila distrikitia 'diyini ri ra azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu.

English: Councillors are looked at as low-income civil servants
Luganda: Bakansala batunuulirwa ng'abakozi ba gavumenti bamufunampola
Runyankore: Ba kansara nibareebwa nk'abakozi ba Gavumenti abarikutunga omushaara gw'ahansi.
Acholi: Lutela ma itedero kineno gi macalo joo ma nongo mucara ma nok
Ateso: Eteo ikansilan kwape eswamak lu edite etace.
Lugbara: Ba kansila eyi be azi'ba gamete robia esupi were 'diyi ru.

English: District officials should pass economic policies that are beneficial to their communities
Luganda: Abakulembeze ba disitulikiti balina okuyisa amateeka g'ebyensimbi agaganyula ebitundu byabwe.
Runyankore: Ba kansara Disiturikiti bashemereire kureeta ebiteiso ebirikugasira ebyanga byabo.
Acholi: Lutic me distrik omyero gukati ki cik ma kwako lok kom lim ki biacara ma konyo kabedogi
Ateso: Ekot eswamak luko disitrikt aitutub ainapeta ejokuka kanu itunga kec.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ma ofu e'yo robia esuzu ecopi adripi orodriru eyi ma ongulumu eyini ra 'diyi.

English: There are reports of high rates of corruption in district governments
Luganda: Waliwo alipoota ku buli bw'enguzi obungi mu gavumenti z'ebitundu
Runyankore: Hariho ripoota ezirikworeka obushomankuzi bwingi omu Gavumenti z'ebyanga.
Acholi: Adot tye matye ka bino mapol i kom rwom ma dit me cam cana ki I gamente ma itedero pa districts
Ateso: Ejaas iripotan luka ekorapusion loepol kotoma apuganasia nuka odisitrikt.
Lugbara: E'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma omgbo districti eyi ma alea angiri.

English: Road safety campaigns are aimed at reducing road accidents
Luganda: Kaweefube w'enkozesa y'enguudo ennungi agendereddwamu kukendeeza ku bubenje ku makubo
Runyankore: Ehururu z'okwerinda aha nguuto, nizigyenderera okukyendeza za butandu aha nguuto.
Acholi: Yub me rweyo lwak i kom gudi tye pi dwoko piny rwom me peko ma dona nongo itic ki gudu
Ateso: Ekapein lo ayuara na irotin nes erai kanu aitidisiara akangasia.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo nzila eyini aa'zu muke ri eyi oyu drileonzi eyi ma omgbo esi esizu.

English: Road signs and symbols also help in reducing road accidents
Luganda: Obubonero bw'oku nguudo nabwo buyamba mu kukendeeza obubenje bw'oku nguudo.
Runyankore: Obubonero n'obumanyiso bwa ahanguuto nabwo nibuhwera omu kukyendeeza butandu.
Acholi: Alama ma ki keto iteng gudu bene konyo dwoko piny rwom me peko me gudu
Ateso: Apadei nu orotin ingarakitos aitidisianar akangasia.
Lugbara: E'da nzila geri 'bani nzila ayuzuri e'dapi 'diyi aza koma fe drileonzi nzila 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.

English: The high number of accidents are a result of bad driving
Luganda: Obubenje obungi buva ku kuvuga bubi
Runyankore: Omuhendo gwa butandu oguri ahaiguru, nikirugirira aha kuvuga kubi.
Acholi: Wel peko me gudu matye malo ni tye macalo adwoki me dwoyo mutoka marac
Ateso: Akangasia nuipu erai aiteker naronon eyauni
Lugbara: E'yo drileonzi eyi ma omgbo ni aa'zu 'bua ri fepi ri eri e'yo mutukari onzuzu geri onzi si ri i.

English: Zebra crossings are helpful to primary pupils for safe road crossing
Luganda: Ebifo ab'ebigere we basalira biyamba nnyo abayizi ba pulayimale okusala obulungi oluguudo.
Runyankore: Obumanyiso bw'okucwekanisa enguuto nibuhwera abaana b'amashomero ga puraimare okucwekanisa enguuto bataine kabi.
Acholi: Rangi ma ki lingo arii idi gudu onyo Zebra Crossing tye pi konyo lutino kwan me primary ngolo gudu labongo peko mo keken
Ateso: Agireta nuiriokok keda neakwangak korotin eraas lu ingarakitos idwe luko primary aitub egudo ejok.
Lugbara: Rangi gbale nzila dria inisi emve be omvele Zebra crossing ru 'diyi azakoma fe anzi nyiri primaria 'diyini nzila dri alizu kililiru.

English: Always have a driving permit whenever you're driving
Luganda: Beera ne ppamiti yo ekukkiriza okuvuga buli lw'oba ovuga
Runyankore: Waaza kuvuga, hamya ngu oine ekihandiiko erikukwikiriza kuvuga
Acholi: Nen ni itye ki waraga ma yee iti me dwoyo mutoka ikare ducu ka itye ka dwoyo mutoka
Ateso: Ekot ajaut keda apapula naecamakinit ijo airenge nginipak na itekeria ijo.
Lugbara: Le mi aa mi ma karatasi mutukari onzuzu ri be sa'wa dria mini mutukari onzuzu ri si.

English: Bodaboda operators can be helpful in road safety campaigns since they are mobile
Luganda: Abavuzi ba booda booda basobola akuba ab'omugaso mu kaweefube w'enkozesa y'enguudo ennungi kubanga batuuka buli wamu.
Runyankore: Abavugi ba bodaboda nibabaasa kuhwera omu kutwara ehururu z'okwerinda aha ruguuto, ahabw'okugira ngu bo nibatuura nibagyenda.
Acholi: Odwo boda twero miyo kony ma dit ikare me rweyo dano i kom tic ki gudu pien ni gin gi-oo kamo keken
Ateso: Epedorete etekerak ibodai aingarakite kanu ekampein lo ayuara na orotin.
Lugbara: Ba Bodaboda onzupi 'diyi eco adri orodriru e'yo nzila ni aa'zu ala 'diyi ma alea ra e'yo eyini acizu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri si.

English: Pedestrians should be sensitized on road safety guidelines to reduce accidents
Luganda: Abakozesa ebigere ku nguudo balina okutegeezebwa ku mateeka g'enkozesa y'oluguuddo okusobola okukendeeza ku bubenje
Runyankore: Abarikugyendesa ebigyere, bashemereire kwesibwa ahabiragiro by'enguuto kugira ngu batuubye ahari butandu.
Acholi: Luwot ki tyen omyero bene ki rwee gi i kom kit me gwoke ka gitye ka wot I gudu wek odwok piny rwom me peko me gudu
Ateso: Ekot asisianakin alotok akej nuikamunitos ayuara na alosit korot kanu aitidisiar akangasia.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe imbata o'bi aci'ba pasi ' 'diyini azita nzila ni di'yi ma dria ra drileonzi eyi esizu

English: Bodaboda riders through their association can get loans for capital
Luganda: Abavuzi ba booda booda okuyita mu bibiina byabwe basobola okufuna looni z'entandikwa.
Runyankore: Abavugi ba Boda Boda nibabaasa kutunga za rooni, barikurabira omu bibiina byabo.
Acholi: Odwo boda ka gukato ki I dul ma ribo gi, gitwero gamo lim adena pi medo i kom tic gi onyo capital
Ateso: Epedorete ibodai adumunun ilonin itoritos atukona kec.
Lugbara: Ba Bodaboda onzupi 'diyi eco loni eyi e'du geri eyi ma amuti vurisi tujari e'dozu ra.

English: Zebra crossings should regularly be painted after a while to better visibility
Luganda: Ebifo ab'ebigere we basalira birina okusiigibwa buli luvannyuma lw'ekiseera okulabibwa obulungi.
Runyankore: obumanyiso bw'okucwekanisa enguuto buriijo bushemereire kusiigwa erangi ahanyima y'akanya kakye , kugira ngu abavugi bagume bazireebe gye.
Acholi: Rangi ma ki lingo arii idi gudu onyo zebra crossing omyero kibed ka lingo ne tere tere wek onene maber
Ateso: Ekot ameet aisut eraagi toma agireta nuakwangak ka nuiriokok nuetubere irotin  tetere ecai ejok.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma gba Zebra crossimg eyi rangi si sa'wa driasi 'bani ani ecozu eyi nezu muke beni

English: Bodaboda riders should work closely with traffic authorities to reduce road accidents
Luganda: Abavuzi ba booda booda balina okukolera awamu n'abaserikale b'oku nguuddo okukendeeza obubenje ku nguudo.
Runyankore: Abavugi ba Boda bashemereire kukorera hamwe n'abaserukare b'ebiiruka kugira ngu bakyendeeze butandu aha nguuto.
Acholi: Odwo boda omyero gubed ki winye ki abili ma doro tic ki gudu wek rwom me peko me gudu odok piny
Ateso: Ekot ibodai aiswamanar keda luka ipolisin luka irotin kanu aitidisiar akangasia.
Lugbara: Le 'ba Bodaboda onzupi 'diyi ma nga azi 'ba e'yo nzila dria 'diyi onepi 'diyi be drileonzi nzila 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.

English: More road safety sensitization is a need in rural areas as it's done in urban communities
Luganda: Okumanyisibwa mu nkozesa y'enduudo ennungi kwetaagibwa mu byalo nga bwe kikolebwa mu bitundu by'ekibuga
Runyankore: Okweyongyera kushomesa abantu aha nkozesa y'enguuto, nikyetengwa omu byaro, nk'oku kirikukorwa omu ndembo.
Acholi: Omyero kimed rwom me rweyo lwak idi caro wek odwok piny rwom me peko me gudu
Ateso: Ekot aiyatakin aisisianakino na ayuara orotin kocaaloi kwa iswamaere otaunin.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe imbata nzila ayuza ma dria 'ba caloa 'diyini drile ko'bo 'bani 'ye tawuni eyi ma alea ri le.

English: Private bodaboda owners should also adhere to the road safety guidelines
Luganda: Bannannyini booda booda ez'obwannanyini balina okugoberera amateeka agafuga enkozesa y'enguudo.
Runyankore: Abarikuvuga pikipiki ezaabo ahabwabo, nabo bashemereire kuhamira aha biragiro by'enguuto.
Acholi: joo matye ki piki piki gi kengi bene omyero gu lub cik magi me gwoke igudu
Ateso: Ekot ibodai da atupit nuka ayuara kotoma orotin
Lugbara: Le Bodaboda ipika eyi ma obi azita nzila ayuta ni 'diyi ma vuti indi.

English: Road safety drives can also include community cleaning activities and sanitation awareness
Luganda: Enkozesa y'enguudo ennungi esobola okuzingiramu emirimu gy'okuyonja n'okubunyisa amawulire ku buyonjo.
Runyankore: Okwegyesa aha biragiro by'enguuto, hashemereire kubamu okwegyesa okuyonja ebyaro, hamwe n'okwegyesa aha bugira ebihorooni n'amaizi.
Acholi: Tic me rweyo lwak i kom kit me tic ki gudu i yo maber omyero obed iye bene yub me tic lengo ikin lwak
Ateso: Aisinyikokite nuka ayuara orotin epedori aimoriarit ewai lo itunga aitala aiboisio.
Lugbara: Ba eco e'yo ongulumu eyi 'bazu alaru azini imbata feza e'yo alatanisi 'diyi 'ye sa'wa 'bani imbata nzila ayuza ma dria ri 'feria ra.

English: We should buy locally made products to help build our local economy
Luganda: Tulina okugula ebintu ebikolebwa wano okuyamba okuzimba ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
Runyankore: Tushemereire kugura ebintu ebikorairwe omu ihanga, kugira ngu entaasya omwihanga eyeyongyere.
Acholi: omyero wawil jami ateta ma kiyubu ki kany wek okony odong lobo wa i yo me biacara
Ateso: Ekot oni agwela iboro lu iswamao ore kanu aikeuna eiriago wok.
Lugbara: Le ama ma je afa edele angu amani aa'zu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi angu nde amani aa'zu 'diyi ezozu.

English: Construction of the state of the art stadiums will help boost sports activities
Luganda: Okuzimba ebisaawe ggaggadde kijja kutumbula ebyemizannyo.
Runyankore: Okwombeka ebizaaniro by' omutindo ogw'aheiguru nikiija kwongyyera aha mutindo gw'eby'emizaano.
Acholi: Yubu bar tuku me rwom ma malo obi konyo medo rwom me tuku ilobo wa
Ateso: Adukio na isawen lu adoketait kana okuju nes ebuni aitojokar aboliasio.
Lugbara: Angu avita ni 'diyi ma sita ni nga e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.

English: Children in refugee camps should get an education like normal citizens
Luganda: Abaana mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu balina okutuusibwako ebyenjigiriza nga bannansi
Runyankore: Abaana abari omu miginda y'empungi, bashemereire kutunga obwegyese nk'abatuura gye abandi.
Acholi: Lutino ma luring ayella omyero gunong kwan ma rom ki lutino me ilobo kany
Ateso: Ekot idwe luko okabin adumun asioman kwa luce.
Lugbara: Le anzi nyiri aa'pi angu emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea 'di eyi ma alea 'di ma esu onita kari anzi azi 'diyi le.

English: The government should award contracts to local manufacturers to create more local jobs
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okuwa endagaano eri bannamakolero wano okusobola okutondawo emirimu mu nsi emirala
Runyankore: Empatani, Gavumenti eshemereire kuziheereza abanyamakorero ab'omwihanga, kugira ngu abantu bamwo batunge emirimo.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omii contract me tic bot lutet jami ma kany wek onyaa wel tic pi lwak
Ateso: Ekot apugan aijaikin aswamisinei nejaas icuman ludidika kanu aitanyanyaar aswamisinei.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma fe kontrakiti eyi 'ba afa edepi Kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi dri azi fezu 'ba Kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.

English: The good road network makes the delivery of support to refugees easier
Luganda: Amakubo amalungi gasobozesa okutuusa obuyambi eri abanoonyiboobubudamu okwangu.
Runyankore: Oburungi bw'enguuto, nibuhwera omu murimo gw'okuhisya obuhwezi aha mpungi.
Acholi: Rwom me gudu mabeco weko cwalo kony bot luring ayella doko yot
Ateso: Igudoi lu ejokuka kes itapatanitos ekore lo iboro nejaas ikerai.
Lugbara: E'yo nzila eyini aa'zu ala ri ni fe atita feza emunyale eyini ri ni eca ewakoko.

English: Many refugees suffer from malnutrition due to lack of a balanced diet
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi bakosebwa endya embi olw'ebbula ly'emmere erimu ebiriisa.
Runyankore: Empungi nyingi nizirwara mutuku ahabwokubura ebyokurya bingi ebirimu ekirisa
Acholi: Pol pa luring ayella gi two two neto pien ni pe gitye ki kero me camo dek matye iyee moc cam ma padi padi
Ateso: Ikerai luipu edakasi adeka na abukalal naarai emamei ainyam naejok.
Lugbara: Emunyale karakara eyi azo esule nyaka ako si 'diyi esu eyini nyaka ndundu 'diyi nyazu kurisi.

English: Self-diagnosis kits help in early disease detection in rural communities
Luganda: Ebikozesebwa mu kwekebera enddwadde biyamba mu kukenga amangu enddwadde mu byalo.
Runyankore: Ebyoma by'okwekyebera endwara, nibihwera abantu ba omubyaro kumanya endwara bukiri kare.
Acholi: Jami tic ma yee ni itwoye keni konyo iniang two matye con ikin lwak
Ateso: Iswamasia lu iwanyanaria ijo akwan kon bon ingarakinete alingakin angicuna adeka kocaaloi.
Lugbara: Afa mini ecozu mi rua o'bizu ceni ra 'diyi fe 'bani azo eyi esuzu drioru calo eyi ma alea.

English: The war in South Sudan has led to a refugee influx in Uganda
Luganda: Olutalo mu South Sudani luleetedde abanyoonyiboobubudamu abangi okuyingira mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Orugamba omuri south Sudan rutumire empungi nyingi zaayeshuka omu Uganda.
Acholi: Lweny ma ilobo South Sudan oweko luring ayella mapol gudonyo ilobo uganda
Ateso: Ejaiki ejie lo South Sudan ikerai ailelebun Uganda.
Lugbara: A'di kari sudani andraleruria ri fe emunyale eyini emuzu kari Uganda niri ma alea kalafe tre si.

English: International Organizations often come out to donate food to refugees
Luganda: Ebitongole by'ensi yonna bitera okuvaayo ne biwa emmere abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Ebigombe by'amahanga goona, nibikira kwimukiramu okuha empungi eby'okurya.
Acholi: Dulle ma aa ki woko gukati me miyo kony me cam pi luring ayella
Ateso: Iriongeta luko kinga eyangaunenete agangat na inyamat nejaas ikerai.
Lugbara: Amuti engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi efu nyaka fezu emunyale eyini.

English: The government should follow up on education for children refugees
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okulondoola ensoma y'abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kureeba ngu abaana b'empungi baaza omu mashomero.
Acholi: Gamente omyero onen lok kom kwan pa lutino ma luring ayella
Ateso: Ekot apugan atupakit nuka asioman na idwe ikerai.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma obi e'yo onita anzi emunyale ru 'diyi ni ri ma vuti ra.

English: Refugee children should be trained in carpentry and welding to earn a living
Luganda: Abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu bayina okuteendekebwa mu kubajja n'okwokya ebyuma okusobola okufuna ssente.
Runyankore: Abaana b'empungi bashemereire kutendekwa omu by'okubaija hamwe  n'okwosya ebyoma, kugira ngu babaase kwebeisaho.
Acholi: Lutino ma luring ayella omyero ki pwony gi ki tic diro cing macalo payo bawo ki wango nyo nyo wek okony gi ki nongo lim
Ateso: Ekot aisisianakin idwe ikerak aike ka aicwe aswa kanu ajaria.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma emba anzi emunyale ru 'diyi afa edele bawu si 'diyi ma edeza onizu tualu afa eyi eveza be eyini ani ecozu robia esuzu.

English: Schools should adopt online learning during this pandemic
Luganda: Amasomero gayina okwettanira okusomeseza ku mitimbagano mu biseera by'ekirwadde bbunansi kino.
Runyankore: Abaana bashemereire kwejunisa enkora ya intaneeti  omu kushoma kwabo ahabw'oburwaire oburi omu nsi obwahati.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero gu cak pwony me wi yamo lapore internet, radio ki telebijon ikare man me two ma oporo ni.
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi ageun aisisia naka elago kapak naka adeka.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma e'do onita onile oli aliasiri sa'wa korona ni 'di ma alea.

English: Refugee children also deserve an education so they can take care of their families
Luganda: Abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu nabo basaana okusomesebwa basobole okulabirira amaka gaabwe.
Runyankore: Abaana b'empungi nabo nibetenga obwegyese, kugira ngu babaase kureeberera amaka gaabo.
Acholi: Lutino ma luring ayella bene omyero gukwan wek omii it gi kero me gwoko jo gang gi
Ateso: Idwe ikerai ipudasi kesi da asioman tetere kesi igangakitos ireria kec.
Lugbara: Le anzi nyiri emunyale ru 'diyi ma esu vini onita ra eyini ani ecozu eyi ma aku eyi ma ta mbazu.

English: The government should allocate more money to refugee budgets
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okwongera ku ssente z'eteeka ku mbaririra y'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera sente omu mbaririra y'eby'empungi.
Acholi: Gamente omyero oket cente ma downg I byek me lim pi luring ayella
Ateso: Ekot apugan aijaikin ewai loka ikerai arai ikerai ikapun icie.
Lugbara: Le gamete eyi ma otu robia eyini fe bajeti emunyale eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ra.

English: Vocational skills are an important form of education for refugees
Luganda: Okuyiga eby'emikono nsoma nnungi eri abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Emyoga y'eby'emikono, nigwo muringo murungi kandi ogw'omugasho omu kwegyesa empungi.
Acholi: Kwan me tic cing obedo gin ma pire tek pi kwan pa luring ayella
Ateso: Aswamisinei luka akanin arai asisia ikosin lu etatai ejokuka kanuka ikerai.
Lugbara: Afa edele drisi 'diyi ma onita eri orodriru tu emunyale eyini.

English: Money allocated for disaster relief should not be swindled as this affects the country
Luganda: Ensimbi eziteekebwa ku bibamba tezirina kubbibwa kubanga kino kikosa eggwanga.
Runyankore: Esente ezirikubaririrwa ahabw'ebihikiirizi tizihemereire kwibwa, ahabw'okuba eki nikiteganisa eihanga.
Acholi: Cente ma gimiyo pi konyo ikare me peko ma time atura omyero pi ki kwal pien eni adwoki ne rac i kom lobo
Ateso: Ikapun lu ijaikitai kanu agangat na engeso mam ebeit anyamar naarai emunari akwapwok.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ogu robia 'bale e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi sa'wa cirisi 'diyini ri ku a'dusikuni eri candi fe kari dri fefe.

English: Quality assurance inspections ensure students are getting the best education services
Luganda: Okulondoola omutindo kigenderera okulaba nti abayizi bafuna okusoma okusingayo.
Runyankore: Okurambura omuringo ogu abeegi barikweegamu, nikituma abaana batunga obwegyese obubashemereire.
Acholi: Ngiyo rwom me kwan konyo me neno ni lutino kwan tye ka nongo rwom me kwan ma ber loyo
Ateso: Aimaniman nuka aisisia itojokari asiomam najokan naka eisisiak.
Lugbara: Le e'yo sukulu eyi andrizu 'diyi ma ne ra kini sukulu anzi eyi onita muke ndeni 'diyi esu.

English: Early child marriages have resulted in many girls dropping out of school
Luganda: Okufumbirwa amangu mu baana kireetedde abawala bangi okuva mu masomero.
Runyankore: Abaana okuza omu by'obushwere bakiri bato, nikituma abaishiki baingi baruga omu mashomero.
Acholi: Nyomo lutino con oweko lutino mapol oweko kwan woko
Ateso: Idwe alinganakin edukone ayangau apesur nuipu aibironor kosomero.
Lugbara: Ezoanzi karakara eyi ku sukulu ja e'yo eyini eyi 'duzu drioru risi.

English: Teacher accommodation facilitation ensures teachers never run late for classes
Luganda: Ebisulo by'abasomesa biyamba abasomesa tebatuuka kikeerezi mu bibiina
Runyankore: Okuha abegyesa oburaaro nikirungi, ahabw'okuba nibarahuka kuhika omu kibiina tibarikukyerererwa.
Acholi: Miyo lupwonye kama gibedo iyee konyo me neno ni lupwonye pe gugale ki oo I gangi kwan
Ateso: Ajaut keda itogoi lu isisianakinak, ijaikitos kes mam iyapenenete alomanar atukono.
Lugbara: E'yo 'bani jo sizu imba'ba eyini 'dini fe imba'ba eyini emuzu sukulua vule ku.

English: We all need to welcome refugees in our country.
Luganda: Ffenna twetaaga okwaniriza abanoonyiboobubudamu mu nsi yaffe.
Runyankore: Twena twine kwakiira empungi omu Ihanga ryeitu.
Acholi: Wan weng omyero wajol luring ayela i lobo wa pien wang weng wabedo dano me lobo del col onyo Africa.
Ateso: Ekot oni kere aisukunyun ikerai akwap wok.
Lugbara: Le ama dria ma ai emunyale eyi kari amavile ri ma alea ni

English: Refugee agricultural projects ensure that these communities can now feed themselves
Luganda: Polojekiti z'abanoonyiboobubudamu ez'ebyobulimi zigenderera okulaba nga ebitundu bino kati bisobola okwerabirira.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti z'empungi okwejumba omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, nikyoreka ngu obwahati nibabaasa kwetungira eby'okurya.
Acholi: Yub me pur pi luring ayella konyo me neno ni luring ayella twero pite kengi
Ateso: Ipurojektin lu akoru lu ikerai itodunit ebe epedorete itunga lu aitan akec awate.
Lugbara: Le otita agirikica ni Emunyale eyidri 'diyi ma ne ra kini 'ba 'diyi eco di nyaka esu eyisi ra.

English: Refugee communities should engage with host communities to build social relationships
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bayina okukwatagaana n'ababasenzezza okusobola okuzimba ekolagana.
Runyankore: Abantu empungi, bashemereire kukorengana n'abantu abu bashangire omu ihanga.
Acholi: Luring ayella omyero gu winye joo ma ikabedo ma olworo gi wek wat obed tye ikingi
Ateso: Ekot atukono nu ikerai aiswamanar keda atukono ikulepek akwap.
Lugbara: Le ongulumu emunyale eyini 'diyi ma eciti o'bi angu fepi 'diyi be aa'zu kililiru.

English: Doctors need to sleep in staff houses to have immediate access to patients
Luganda: Abasawo beetaaga basule mu nnyumba z'abakozi okusobola okukola amangu ku balwadde.
Runyankore: Abashaho nibetenga kuraara omu nju ezaheirwe abashaho, kugira ngu babaase kuhika aha barwaire juba nk'okukirikwetengwa.
Acholi: Daktari omyero gubut I odi pa lutic wek gubed nongo gitwero ka konyo lutwo cut cut
Ateso: Ekot imurok apero otokoi lu edokokitai kanu odolonokin adekak atipet.
Lugbara: Le dakitari eyi ma aa'ki jo Sile azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma alea eyini azakoma fezu 'ba azoru 'diyini mbeleru beni.

English: The health sector is staff deficient creating a large doctor to patient ratio
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu tekirina bakozi bamala ekireetera omusawo omu okukola ku balwadde abangi.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara, tikiine bakozi abarikumara, ekirikutuma abashaho bakye baakora aha barwaire baingi.
Acholi: Dul me yot kom ilobo ni petye ki lutic ma oromo ma oweko daktari ma tye wel gi nok ka iporo ki lutwo
Ateso: Ikidioko eswamak kowai lo angaleu ido ijaikit ediope emuron amukian adekak luipu.
Lugbara: Ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma kalafe ca ku, e'yoni dri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe nde dakitari eyi ma kalafe te.

English: Doctors need free accommodation as an incentive
Luganda: Abasawo beetaaga ebisulo eby'obwereere nga ekibasikiriza.
Runyankore: Abashaho nibeetenga oburaaro obwa busha kugira ngu bagire omuhimbo.
Acholi: Daktari omyero gimi itgi kabedo menono macalo yoo me medo miti gi me tic
Ateso: Ekotos imurok luadekis ojai neperot.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe dakitari eyi dri jo eyi aa'zu pirini eyini ani ava esuzu.

English: Surgeons are very rare in hospitals hence creating a huge demand
Luganda: Abasawo abalongoosa batono nnyo mu malwaliro ekireetera obwetaavu bwabwe okubeera waggulu.
Runyankore: Abashaho abarikushemeza abarwaire tibarikukira kureebeka omu marwariro, ekirikutuma haabaho ekyetengo ky'amaani.
Acholi: Daktari ma luyango gi nok tutwal oweko miti pi gin tye malo
Ateso: Ecicing ajengak adekisia apolouke epol eipuda.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba asipi 'diyi arojo eyi ma alea were e'yoni dri e'yo 'bani eyi lezu 'diyi karakara.

English: Regular inspection of newly constructed roads is needed for quality assurance
Luganda: Okulondoola entakera enguudo empya ezizimbiddwa kwetaagibwa okusobola okukuuma omutindo.
Runyankore: Okuguma nibarambura enguuto nsya ezikozirwe, okubaasa kuhamya ngu ziri aha mutindo.
Acholi: Neno rwom me gudu ma kiyubu manyen tere tere ber pi ngeyo rwom me tic
Ateso: Ekot ameet aimanaiman irotin lu adukio luitetiak kanu ejautene kec.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma andri nzila 'bani si o'diru 'diyi inyia inyia nezu kini 'ba si eyi kililiru.

English: The government should reduce borrowing and use local revenue
Luganda: Gavumenti eyina okukeendeeza ku kwewola ekozese ku ssente z'ejja mu misolo gya kuno.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kukyendeeza aha nkora y'okweguza sente, reero ekozese ezirikutungwa omu Ihanga.
Acholi: Gamente omyero odwok piny rwom me den dok ocak tic ki lim ma nongo ki icing lutedero
Ateso: Ekot apugan aitidisiar aikopa ikapun kosodi aitwasam lu isolosinei.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma esi i ma omgbo ai'ia niri ra dika eyi ma ayu robia esule kari ma alea ogogo ri i.

English: The general public has distrust in law enforcement institutes
Luganda: Abatuuze tebalina bwesige mu bitongole ebikwasisa amateeka.
Runyankore: Abantu boona tibaine bwesigye omu bitongore  by'okukwatisa ebiragiro.
Acholi: Lwak pe gitye ki gen i kom dulle ma neno ni cik olube ilobo ni
Ateso: Emamei itunga amuno kanejaas iriongeta lu ikisila.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi ma asi'baza 'ba agei tema ni 'diyi ma alea yo.

English: Poaching harms the tourism industry as species keep reducing
Luganda: Okuyigga ebisolo by'oku ttale kikosa ebyobulambuuzi kubanga ebika by'ebisolo bikeendera.
Runyankore: Okwiba enyamaishwa omu marindiro gaazo, nikiteganisa eby'oburambuzi, ahabw'okuba emiringo y'enyamaishwa ezitari zimwe, eriyo neehwamu.
Acholi: Neko lee tim iwi ali tye ki adwoki marac i kom i kom dul ma neno lok kom limo piny pien ni kwayi lee ma pat pat nongo welgi tye ka dok piny
Ateso: Aiyar itiang emunari ewai loka elatok naarai ikidiokoros itiang.
Lugbara: Anyapa asea 'diyi ma o'diza eri e'yo Omu eyini emuzu eyi nezu 'di eza eza adusikuni anyapa wura ndundu 'diyi ani avi avi.

English: Mob violence should strongly be condemned as an innocent life may be lost
Luganda: Okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo kirina okuvumirirwa ennyo kubanaga abantu abatalina musango bayinza okufiirwa obulamu.
Runyankore: Obwimukiriro bw'okutwarira amateeka omu ngaro,bushemereire kujumirirwa munonga ahabw'okuba abantu abamwe, nibafa bataine rubanja.
Acholi: Tim gero i kom joo ma byek tye ni gutimo bal omyero ogikoo pien ni ngat ma balle pe mogo rwenyo kwo ne
Ateso: Amumu na itunga kalu ipu, ekot aitoroniar naarai etwaniaro aijar itunganan kayen mam ediakarit.
Lugbara: Le 'ba nze e'yo okporu e'yoni o'bi eyini 'ba o'dizu 'diyi ma dria a'dusikuni 'ba azi e'yo onzi 'yepi kuni eco dra 'dani ra.

English: Business people are often assassinated due to business wrangles
Luganda: Abasuubuzi batera okuttibwa n'amasasi olw'enkaayana mu bizinensi.
Runyankore: Abantu bakuru omubizinesi nibakira kwitwa kirikurugirira aha ntongane eziri omu bizinesi.
Acholi: Lutim biacara ipola kare ki neko gi ki muduku pi telle me biacara
Ateso: Idila aiyar itunga kanu ingungeta lu agwelanar.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba tujari ni 'diyi o'di curu'do ngiringiri tujari eyi ma dria 'diyisi.

English: Being a Ugandan businessman attracts enemies
Luganda: Okubeera omusuubuzi omunnayuganda kikuleetera abalabe.
Runyankore: Okuba omuntu wa bizinesi omu Uganda, nikikureetera abantu bakwanga.
Acholi: Bedo latim biacara ilobo uganda kelli mone
Ateso: Araut agwelanaran ko Uganda iriuni ijo luasurup.
Lugbara: Aa'zu 'ba tujari 'yepini ru kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ni 'ba dri ariboo eji eji.

English: Hotels should step up their security to protect their guests
Luganda: Wooteli ziyina okunyweza obukuumi bwazo okukuuma abagenyi.
Runyankore: Za hoteeri zishemereire kutaho abaserukare b'ebyokwerinda, kugira ngu abagyenyi baabo barekye kuhikwaho akabi koona.
Acholi: Hotel omyero gu med rwom me gwoko welle gi
Ateso: Ekot lu iwoterin aikeun ayura kanu ayuarit ipejok kec.
Lugbara: Le hoteli eyi ma otu e'yo eyini agei tema niri ma omgbo ra eyini ani eyi ma omu eyi ma ta mbazu.

English: Assassins in Uganda obtain guns illegally and use Bodabodas
Luganda: Abatta n'emmundu mu Uganda bafuna emmundu mu bumenyi bw'amateeka era bakoseza booda booda.
Runyankore: Abarikwiita abantu b'ebitiinisa omu Uganda, nibatungac emundu omu buryo butahikire kandi nibakoresa za boda boda.
Acholi: Lunek ki muduku gi nongo muduku iwi alii dok gi tiyo ki boda boda
Ateso: Edumunenete aarak imudun koipone ecie ko Uganda ido itwasamaete ibodabodan.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba o'dipi kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi osu eyi esu geri azita palaa ku 'disi dika eyi Bodaboda eyi ayu.

English: Mob violence has resulted in the deaths of innocent people
Luganda: Okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo kiviiriddemu abantu abatalina musango kufa.
Runyankore: Obwimukiriro bw'okutwarira ebiragiro omu ngaro niburugwamu okufa kw'abantu abataine rubanja.
Acholi: Tim gero i kom joo ma byek me timo bal tye i kom gi owek joo ma bal gi pe gu rwenyo kwo gi
Ateso: Amumu na itunga ejaiki itunga luipu etwakete atitai.
Lugbara: E'yo 'ba eyini 'ba o'dizu ongulumuru 'diyi fe 'ba karakara avi eyi ma edri enzosi azini tokoru.

English: The law states that someone is innocent until proven guilty
Luganda: Etteeka ligamba nti omuntu taba na musango okutuuka nga asingisiddwa.
Runyankore: Amateeka nigagira ngu omuntu naaba ataine rubanja, kuhisya obu arajunaanwe.
Acholi: Cik me lobo nyutu ni ngati bedo labongo bal wang ma ki ngolo kop iwiye
Ateso: Ebala ekisil ebe mam itunganan ediakarit itoni ne engicuna ekisil ebe ediakarit.
Lugbara: Azita kini 'ba azi eri e'yo koko kpere koti ni esuria eri e'yo be.

English: Gangs often obtain guns illegally from security guards
Luganda: Ebibinja by'ababbi bifuna emmundu mu bumenyi bw'amateeka okuva ku bakuumaddembe.
Runyankore: Ebiguruupu by'enkozi z'ebibi, obumwe n'obumwe embundu nibaziiha aha bakuumi omu buryo butahikire.
Acholi: Aranyi ipol kare gi nongo muduku iwi ali ki bot lutic me security
Ateso: Edumununete abenyak imudun kanejaas isilikalei lu edarak.
Lugbara: Ogua eyi tutuni osu eyi esu 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi vu geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi.

English: Some guns obtained illegally come from cattle rustlers in Karamoja region
Luganda: Emmundu ezimu ezaafunibwa mu bumebyi bw'amateeka zaava ku banyazi b'ente mu kitundu ky'e Karamoja
Runyankore: Embundu ezi barikutunga omu buryo butahikire, obumwe n'obumwe nibaziiha aha bashuma b'ente omu kyanga ekya Karamoja.
Acholi: Muduku mukene ki nongo iwi alii kibot ojong ma gi tiyo kwede me mayo dyangi pa dano
Ateso: Iciei imudun lu edumununo koipone kalo aronon eyaunono kanejaas angatak akituk ko Karamoja.
Lugbara: Osu azi esule geri azita palaa ku 'disi 'diyi enga 'ba ti eyi ogupi karamojoa 'diyi vu.

English: Community policing is important in reducing crime
Luganda: Okulawuna ebitundu kya mugaso okukendeeza ku buzzi bw'emisango.
Runyankore: Okwegyesa abantu  eby'okwerinda, n'eky'omugasho omu kukyendeeza ebihagaro.
Acholi: Kube pa Abili ki lwak pire tek tutwal I dwoko piny rwony me bal ma time
Ateso: Aisianakin itunga nu ikisila ejok kanu aitidisiar iboro luarokok.
Lugbara: Azita siza ongulumu ru 'di ri orodriru e'yo onzi ma omgbo esizu.

English: People shouldn't engage in mob violence but call the police to take charge
Luganda: Abantu tebayina kwenyigira mu kutwalira mateeka mu ngalo naye bayite poliisi ekikoleko.
Runyankore: Abantu tibashemereire kutwarira ebiragiro omu ngaro, bashemereire kweta poriisi ekaba niyo yaakora aha shonga nkezo.
Acholi: Dano omyero pe gutim tim gero i kom otim bal onyo joo ma byek tye i kom gi ento gulwong abili
Ateso: Mam ebeit itunga ajanakin toma amumu konye icorakitai aiworoun ipolisin.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma fi e'yo 'ba cozu ongulumuru 'diyi ma alea ku kani eyi ma omve polisi eyi i.

English: Always move with your National Identity card for easy identification
Luganda: Bulijjo tambulanga n'endagamuntu yo okumanyibwa amangu.
Runyankore: Gyenda n'endanga muntu, kugira oyanguhize abantu kukumanya.
Acholi: Nen ni iwoto ipola kare National ID ni wek niang i komi obed yot
Ateso: Ekot duc aitingit akadi kon na akwap tetere epatana ajenun ijo.
Lugbara: Le mi aci mi ma national ID be sa'wa driasi 'bani ani mi nizu mbeleru beni.

English: Police investigations usually take long hence leaving us with no answers
Luganda: Okunoonyereza kwa poliisi kutera okulwawo ne tusigala nga tetulina kyakuddamu.
Runyankore: Okubuuririza kwa poriisi buriijo nikutwara obwire bureingwa, reero tusigara tutagarukirwemu.
Acholi: Kwed pa abili ipol kare galle ma eni weko wa labongo lagam
Ateso: Aingic duc na ipolisin eyangaikini aojau ijaikini oni isalakit emamete abongonokineta.
Lugbara: E'yo eti ondaza polisi eyini 'diyi sa'wa dria si sa'wa du ezu dika eyi ama ku ama zita eyi omviza kokoru.

English: Land wrangles have often resulted in deaths and evictions
Luganda: Enkaayana ku ttaka zizze zifiiramu abantu n'okusengulwa.
Runyankore: Entongane zaitaka buriijo nizirugwamu okufa n'okurituntumurwaho.
Acholi: Laro ngom ipol kare kelo too ki ryemo dano ki ingom
Ateso: Ingungeta lu alupok ayautu atwakisia ka aitonyoo na itunga.
Lugbara: Ngiringiri nyaku dria 'diyi fe dra karakara 'ye eyini dika 'ba odro 'ba karakara eyi.

English: Tribalism can often lead to war if it is not brought under control
Luganda: Okusosola mu mawanga kusobola okuvaamu entalo singa tekukomezebwa.
Runyankore: Okushoroora abantu omu nganda, nikibaasa kurugwamu engamba kyaba kitakozirweho.
Acholi: Apoka poka me leb ipol kare kello lweny ka pe ki tero maber
Ateso: Atiakatiaka kotoma atekerin ayangauni ejie arai mam itanangio.
Lugbara: E'yo suru suru ni 'diyi eco a'di eji ra 'ba ka eyi ne kililiru ku ria.

English: Authorities should solve land wrangles to prevent violence
Luganda: Aboobuyinza balina okugonjoola enkaayana ku ttaka okumalawo obutabanguko.
Runyankore: Ab'obushoborozi bashemereire kukora aha nshonga z'eitaka okwetantara obutabanguko.
Acholi: Lutela omyero gunong yoo me tyeko lok me lara ngom maber wek pe okel tim gero
Ateso: Ekot apedorosio aitemokin enguingui lo alupok kanu aitikitik amumu.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba eyi ma otu e'yo ngiringiri nyaku dria 'diyi ra ari adaza atrizu.

English: A land title helps one prove that they own the land they have
Luganda: Ekyapa ky'ettaka kiyamba okukakasa nti be bannannyini ttaka lye balina.
Runyankore: Ekyapa ky'eitaka nikihwera omuntu kworeka ngu niwe mukama waryo.
Acholi: Waraga me ngom weko ngat moni bedo ki caden ni ngom eni obedo meg gi
Ateso: Land title nes ingarakini ituan aitodun ebe nges ilopet alupok.
Lugbara: Karatasi fele nyaku ipika eyini ri ni e'da ra kini nyaku eyini aa'zu 'da eyini

English: Clear boundaries should be demarcated to prevent land encroachment
Luganda: Ensalo ennungi zirina okuteekebwawo okutangira okwesenza ku ttaka.
Runyankore: Ensharo ezetongoire zishemereire kurambwa ahaitaka kugira ngu baremwe kuritaahirira.
Acholi: Wang ngom omyero ki nyut maber wek ogeng dano donyo ingom pa luwot gi

English: Cultural leaders should sensitize their communities to take part in commercial Agriculture
