Luganda: Amagye gakakasizza nti obutonde butaasiddwa n'okukuumibwa.
Runyankore: Amahe gareebire ngu obuhangwa bw'ensi bubangirwe kandi burinzirwe.
Acholi: Mwony gu neno ni kabedo ma olworo wa ki gwoko maber
Ateso: Etigogong ajore ebe eyuaritai ka aidar aiboisio.
Lugbara: Asikari eyi ne ra kini o'bi eyi angu eyi ma agei 'diyi ma tamba

English: People need to get alternative sources of fuel.
Luganda: Abantu beetaaga okufuna engeri endala ez'okufunamu amafuta.
Runyankore: Abantu baine kutunga obundi burugo bw'amajuta.
Acholi: Dano omyero gunongo yoo mukene me tedo mapat ki ma balo kabedo wa
Ateso: Ekot itunga adumun ewai ecie lo idumunet iboro lu inoka.
Lugbara: Le o'bi e'yi ma esu geri ndu ecozu nyaka a'dizu 'diyi.

English: The lawbreakers are under police custody.
Luganda: Abamenyi b'amateeka bali mu mikono gya poliisi.
Runyankore: Abahenzi b'ebiragiro bari omu kihome aha poriisi.
Acholi: Otur cik gi tye icing abili
Ateso: Abilibilak ikisila ewenitai ko polis.
Lugbara: Ba obi 'ba azita onyopi 'diyi polosia.

English: All people who were encroaching on forests are under arrest.
Luganda: Abantu bonna abaali beesenza mu bibira bakwatiddwa.
Runyankore: Abantu ababaire nibatahirira ebibira bakwasirwe.
Acholi: Joo weng ma onongo gitye ka donyo ingom me me bunga ki mako gi-oo
Ateso: Itunga kere lu acedanakinos aijep ikito ekamun.
Lugbara: Ba obi 'ba dria fipi angu jereru 'da ma alea 'diyi ci.

English: They have been charged against breaking the forest law.
Luganda: Bavinaaniddwa ogw'okumenya etteeka ly'ekibira.
Runyankore: Bajunanirwe omushango gw'okuhenda ebiragiro by'amahamba.
Acholi: Ki ngolo kop iwi gi pi turu cik me bunga
Ateso: Aponi itepesenai kes kanu aibil ekisil lo amagoron.
Lugbara: Ba mu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra 'diyi ji kotia.

English: The suspects will be taken to court for a fair hearing.
Luganda: Abateeberezebwa bajja kutwalibwa mu mbuga z'amateeka okuwulirwa obulungi.
Runyankore: Abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro, batwairwe omu kooti kugira ngu batungye oburinganiza.
Acholi: Joo ma kimako gi ki tero gi I court pi winyo adot matye i komgi
Ateso: Eponio lu ilopatai ayangar adieket kanu aipup emusago.
Lugbara: Ba mu 'ba 'bani ega onyo azita eyi 'diyi ji kotia duani drilea e'yo eyi ma dria ri erizu.

English: The police confiscated the machinery used in cutting trees.
Luganda: Poliisi ewambye ebintu ebyeyambisibwa mu kutema emiti.
Runyankore: Abaporiisi bakakwata ebyoma ebyakoresiibwe omu kutema emiti.
Acholi: Abili gumako jami ma kitiyo kwedgi me ngolo yadi onyo tongo bunga
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin ikamasi acuman nu lem itwasamao ajepia ikito.
Lugbara: Polisi biki aya 'bani ayule pati olizuri ci

English: The government issued guidelines on how forestry activities should be carried out.
Luganda: Gavumenti yayisa okulambikibwa ku ngeri emirimu gy'ekibira gye girina okukolebwamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ekataho ebiragiro by'okukuratirwa, emirimo y'eby'amahamba yaaba neegyenda omu maisho.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo yoo me tic me i kom kit ma tic omyero otime kwede I bunga
Ateso: Abu apugan itijena eipone lo ebeitor aitolosio aswamisinei nuka amagoron.
Lugbara: Gamete ofu azita eyi geri ndundu e'yo eyi bipi jere pie 'diyi ma dria.

English: The government has taken the initiative to protect the different tree species.
Luganda: Gavumenti etutte obuvunaanyizibwa okukuuma ebika by'emiti eby'enjawulo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti etweire obujunanizibwa okubangira emiringo y'emiti etari emwe n'emwe.
Acholi: Gamente omako tic me gwoko kwayi yen ma pat pat
Ateso: Abu apugan itijena nu ayuarite ikito luegelegela.
Lugbara: Gamete 'du e'yo pati ndundu eyi ma ta mbazu ri iniru.

English: Adjumani district officials interdicted charcoal trade in a move to protect forests.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti y' Adjumani baakomya okusuubula amanda n'ekigendererwa eky'okukuuma ebibira.
Runyankore: Abakuru omu disiturikiti ya Adjumani bakemereza okuguza amakara kugira ngu babaase kuhwera ebibira.
Acholi: Lutic me Adjumani gu juku biacara me makar I yoo me gwoko bungi
Ateso: Apotu eswamak luapolok luko disitrikt loka Adjumani isibwoutu agwelanario naka atotole kanu aitam ayuar amagoron.
Lugbara: Azi'ba adjumania 'diyi oga maka ma oziza ja pati eyi ma ta mbazu.

English: The people of Adjumani need a stable water supply.
Luganda: Abantu ba Adjumani beetaga okuweebwa amazzi agatavaako.
Runyankore: Abantu ba Adjumani nibetenga okutunga amaizi omu buryo buterereire.
Acholi: Joo Adjumani mito kony me pii
Ateso: Ekotosi itunga luko Adjumani akipi ojaas duc.
Lugbara: Ba Adjumania 'diyi le geri yi esuzu piri ni ra.

English: People take hours to get water for home use.
Luganda: Abantu batwala essaawa n'essaawa okufuna amazzi ag'okukozesa ewaka.
Runyankore: Abantu nibamara obwire bwingi barikusherura amaizi g'okukozesa omu maka gaabo.
Acholi: Dano cwalo cawa ki cawa pi nongo pi pii me tic ipaco
Ateso: Eyangaikinete itunga isawan kanu adumun akipi kanu aitwasam ore.
Lugbara: Ba eyi sa'wa 'du angiri yi esuzu ayuza ru akua.

English: People need water extension services.
Luganda: Abantu beetaaga okwongezebwa mu buweereza bw'amazzi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibetenga obuheereza bw'okubahisyaho amaizi.
Acholi: Dano mito konyo me diro me pii
Ateso: Ekotosi itunga aiyatakin ejanakine lo akipi
Lugbara: Ba eyi le 'ba ma eji yi eyi ma agei enyia ra

English: People are many on water points which limits the quantity they can fetch.
Luganda: Abantu bangi mu bifo awaggyibwa amazzi ekikendeeza obungi bw'amazzi bwe basobola okufuna.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi nibaba berundaniire aha burugo bw'amaizi ekirikugareetera kutokoora.
Acholi: Dano dwong I ka twomo pii ma eni dwoko piny dit pa pii ma omyero gutwom
Ateso: Ipu itunga kane icoriere akipi aso ikidioko akipi nu icoriete kesi.
Lugbara: Ba karakara eyi yi ko angu alu ri ma alea ni dika yi ma omgbo eyini eko ri ni ani aa'zu were.

English: The district should establish new boreholes in the area.
Luganda: Disitulikiti erina okuteekawo nnayikondo empya mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwombeka za naikondo omu mwanya ogwo.
Acholi: Dsitrict omyero gutuc tangi ma nyen I kabedo eni
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt aibok agilon nuitetiak atutubet.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma si bowaholu o'di eyi angu 'da ma alea

English: The water is not fit for domestic use.
Luganda: Amazzi si malungi kukozesa waka.
Runyankore: Amaizi tigabonaire kugira ngu gakozesebwe omu maka.
Acholi: Pii eni pe opore me tic ipaco
Ateso: Mam akipi ejokuka kanu aitwasam ore.
Lugbara: Yi 'da eri adrini muke ayuzaru akua ku.

English: The refugees lack water for domestic use.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu tebalina mazzi ga kukozesa waka.
Runyankore: Empungi tiziine maizi g'okukoresa omu maka gaabo.
Acholi: Luring ayella gi peke ki pii me tic ipaco
Ateso: Emamikitos ikerai akipi nu itwasama.
Lugbara: Emunyale eyini yi ayuzaru akua yo.

English: People, especially women, compete to get water.
Luganda: Abantu, naddala abakyala, bafuba okufuna amazzi.
Runyankore: Abantu n'amunonga abakazi nibaba nibarwanira omugisha gw'okutunga amaizi.
Acholi: Dano, tutwalle mon, gilwenyo pi nongo pii.
Ateso: Itunga, kacut angor, emariete adumun akipi.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi, tutuni oku eyi ebaka se yi esuzu.

English: People use small amounts of water to sustain their lives.
Luganda: Abantu bakozesa amazzi matono okubeezawo obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibakoresa amaizi makye okubaisaho amagara gaabo.
Acholi: Dano tiyo ki pii manok pi gwoko kwo gi
Ateso: Itwasamaete itunga akipi nu ikidioko kanu ajaria.
Lugbara: Ba eyi yi ayu omgbo were si eyi ma edri ma ta mbazu.

English: The district is planning to establish new sources of water for the people.
Luganda: Disitulikiti eri mu nteekateeka okuteerawo abantu ebifo empya we baggya amazzi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eriyo neekora enteekateeka z'okutandikiraho abantu oburugo busya bw'amaizi.
Acholi: District tye ki yub pi ka nongo pii manyen pi lwak
Ateso: Ekapanakin edisitrikt abokun icorin lu akipi kanu itunga.
Lugbara: Distrikiti 'da le angu yi kozu o'diru 'diyi si o'bi 'da eyini.

English: The district needs to provide safe and clean water for the people.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yeetaaga okuwa abantu amazzi amalungi era amayonjo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kutungira abantu amaizi marungi agataine kabi.
Acholi: District omyero onong yo me miyo pii maber dok maleng bot lwak
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt adumakin itunga akipi nu ejokuka olaete.
Lugbara: Distrikiti 'da le geri yi ala esuzu 'diyi fe 'ba 'da eyini

English: The leaders should lobby funds from the Ministry of water to aid the cause.
Luganda: Abakulembeze balina okusaka ensimbi okuva mu Minisitule y'amazzi okukola ku ensonga.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi bashemereire kuperereza esente kuruga omu minisiture y'eby'amaizi, babaase kuhikiiriza omurimo ogu.
Acholi: Lutela omyero gu peny pi cente kibot ministry ma neno lok pa pii me konyo I tic eni
Ateso: Ekot engarenok ailip ikapun kanejai eerionget loka akipi kanu aitemokino ewai lo aikipi.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma ai robia engazu Okalamvu yi niri vu e'yo nde 'yezu.

English: The district officials are doing everything to control the situation.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti bali mu kukola buli kimu okutaasa embeera.
Runyankore: Abakuru aha disiturikiti bariyo nibakora kyona ekirikubaasika okutereeza eshonga egi.
Acholi: Lutic me district gitye katimo jami weng ma twere pi konyo I peko eni
Ateso: Iswamaete eswamak luko disitrikt nu epedorete kanu aitemokino ejautene.
Lugbara: Azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi e'yo dria eyini eco 'yera 'diyi 'ye e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.

English: The district officials have to simplify water accessibility for the people.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti balina okugonza mu engeri abantu gye bafunamu amazzi.
Runyankore: Abakuru aha disiturikiti, baine kworobeza abantu omuringo gw'okutungamu amaizi.
Acholi: Lutic me district omyero guwek nongo pii obed yot pi lwak
Ateso: Ajai eswamak luko disitrikt aitapatan edumune lo akipi kanu itunga.
Lugbara: Le Azi'ba distrikitia 'diyi ma esu geri ewakoko o'bi eyini ecozu yi esuzu 'diyi ra.

English: The Prime minister orchestrated the establishment of a new borehole.
Luganda: Ssaabaminisita yateekateeka okussaawo nnayikondo empya.
Runyankore: Enganzi y'eihanga ekatwara eshonga y'okwombeka za naikondo nk'enkuru munonga kugira ngu abantu batunge amaizi.
Acholi: Prime minister okati ki yub me tucu tangi manyen.
Ateso: Abu eminista lokapolon igang nu abokio agilo naitetet.
Lugbara: Pirimu Minisita e'do e'yo bowaholu o'di sizu ri ma eti ni.

English: The district will relocate refugees to areas with adequate water supply.
Luganda: Disitulikiti ejja kusengula abanoonyiboobubudamu okubazza mu bifo ebirimu amazzi agamala.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neija kufurura empungi, ebatware omu myanya eine amaizi agarikumara.
Acholi: District obi kobo luring ayella tero gi kama pii dwong iye
Ateso: Ebeit edisitrikt aitwobwot ikerai aiboisio nu ejaas akipi nu edolitos.
Lugbara: Distrikiti ni mu emunyale eyi oja angu yi ni cazu ra 'diyi ma alea.

English: People in Moyo have acquired skills and business knowledge.
Luganda: Abantu b'e Moyo baafunye obukugu n'amagezi mu byobusuubuzi.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omuri Moyo batungire emyoga n'obwengye bw'okukora bizinesi.
Acholi: Dano me Moyo gunong diro ki ngec me biacara.
Ateso: Adumutu itunga luko Moyo aitutuoro ka acoa na ebiasara.
Lugbara: Ba moyoa 'diyi esu imbata azini onita tujari eyi ma dria.

English: The people will be able to start up and engage in business.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kuba basobola okutandikawo n'okwenyigira mu busuubuzi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibaija kuba nibabaasa kutandika, n'okwejumba omu bizinesi.
Acholi: Dano gubi bedo ki keto me cako ki mede I biacara
Ateso: Ebeit itunga agear ka aswam ebiasara.
Lugbara: Ba nde eyi eco di yima vuti otii tujari 'yezu ra.

English: The skills acquired will enable people to get money.
Luganda: Obumanyirivu obufuniddwa bujja kuyamba abantu okufuna ensimbi.
Runyankore: Emyoga eyi abantu batungire, neija kubabaasisa kutunga esente.
Acholi: Diro ma gunongo ni obi konyo gi tiyo cene.
Ateso: Acoa na edumunitai ijaikini itunga adumun ikapun.
Lugbara: Ondua esule 'dani nga fe 'ba eyini ecozu robia esuzu ra.

English: People have acquired capital to help them engage in business activities.
Luganda: Abantu bafunye entandikwa okubayamba okwenyigira mu mirimu gy'obusuubuzi.
Runyankore: Abantu batungire esente z'okutandikisa ezireije kubabaasisa okwejumba omu mirimo ya bizinesi.
Acholi: Dano gunongo capital me konyo gi bedo I biacara
Ateso: Adumutu itunga ikapun lu ingarakinete kes aswam ebiasara.
Lugbara: Ba eyi esu robia eyini ani tujari 'yezu beni.

English: People will have job security and the capacity to take care of their families.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kubeera bakakafu ku mirimu gyabwe n'obusobozi bw'okulabirira abantu baabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibaija kuhamya ngu baine emirimo kandi nibaija kuba nibabaasa kureeberera amaka gaabo.
Acholi: Dano gubi tiyo labongo lworo me rwenyo tic gi dok gubi bedo ki kero me gwoko jo otgi
Ateso: Elosete itunga adumun ayuara na aswamisinei kec keda apedor aidar ikalia kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyi eco nga eyi ma azi tambara dika eyi ma Familia eyi ma tambara

English: People will get the income and improve their standards of living.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kufuna ensimbi batumbule embeera y'obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibaija kutunga entaasya, reero beyongyere omu ntuura yaabo.
Acholi: Dano gubi nongo cene dok eni obi ilo malo rwom me kwogi
Ateso: Elosete itunga adumun ikapun kanu aitojokara aiajar kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyi nga robia esu ra dika eyi ma geri edri vuri otuzu.

English: The district will continue supporting people's activities to improve their welfare.
Luganda: Disitulikiti ejja kweyongera okuyamba mirimu gy'abantu okutumbula  embeera zaabwe.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti neija kuguma neeshagika emirimo y'abantu okutunguura entuura yaabo.
Acholi: District obi mede ki konyo dano itic gi me yubu rwom me kwo gi
Ateso: Ebuni edisitrikt ainyikokite aigangite aswamisinei itunga kanu aitojokara aijar kec.
Lugbara: Distrikiti ni nga mu atita feza o'bi eyini ri be drile eyi ma edri otuzu.

English: The people were sensitized to work hard and manage their businesses well.
Luganda: Abantu baasomeseddwa okukola ennyo n'okukwata bizinesi zaabwe obulungi.
Runyankore: Abantu bakahutuurwa kugira ngu bakore munonga kugira ngu babaase kureeberera gye bizinesi zaabo.
Acholi: Ki rweyo lwak me tic matek dok me doro biacara gi maber
Ateso: Aponi itunga isisianakinai aswam agogong kanu apedor aswamisinei kec ejok.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba 'da eyini imbata azi ngazu okposi dika eyi ma tujari eyi ocezu kililiru

English: The districts have poor health care services.
Luganda: Disitulikiti ziyina ebyobulamu ebibi
Runyankore: Obuheereza omu by'amagara nibubi munonga omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Districts tye ki rwom me miyo kony me yot kom ma goro
Ateso: Eroko akiro nu amukian ko disitriktan
Lugbara: E'yo alatani distrikiti 'da ma alea 'diyi muke ku.

English: The district officials have to be commended for controlling tuberculosis.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti balina okwebazibwa olw'okutangira obulwadde bw'akafuba.
Runyankore: Abakuru omu disiturikiti baine kusiimwa ahabw'okugira ngu babaasize kukora aha ndwara y'akakonko.
Acholi: Lutic me district omyero ki pwo gi pi lweny i kom two aona opio
Ateso: Eswamak luko disitrikt kes ebeit aitur kanu aitikitik adeka na atapong.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe awa'difo azi'ba distrikitia 'diyi ni eyini azo Tibi niri ma aza kozu ra risi.

English: The officials did a very wonderful job.
Luganda: Abakungu baakoze omulimu omulungi ennyo.
Runyankore: Abakungu bakakora omurimo ogurikutangaaza.
Acholi: Lutic gutiyo tic maber tuwal
Ateso: Apotu eswamak iswamata aswam na ejok.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'da eyi 'ye azi onyiru.

English: The district was able to control and eradicate the disease, unlike other districts.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yasobodde okukendeeza n'okumalawo ekirwadde, ekitali mu disitulikiti endala.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ekabaasa kukora ekirikwetengwa okureeba ngu yamaraho endwara, ekitarabaasize kukorwa disiturikiti ezindi.
Acholi: Distrik eni obedo ki kero me doro ki jwayo woko two eni, pe calo distrik mukene.
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt opedo aitikitik ka aikisar adeka, adepar idisitriktan icie.
Lugbara: Distrikiti 'da ko azo 'da ma aza ra, dika dro vini azo 'da angu 'da ma alea si ra adrini distrikiti azi 'diyi le ku.

English: Adjumani has better and skilled health care practitioners.
Luganda: Adjumani eyina abasawo abalungi era abakugu.
Runyankore: Adjumani eine abashaho barungi kandi abaine obukugu.
Acholi: Adjumani tye ki lutic yoto kom mabeco ka iporo ki distrik mukene
Ateso: Ejaas Adjumani keda eswamak lu ejokuka lu emisiaritos
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni adjumania 'diyi muke ndeni.

English: The districts need skilled and capable health workers to control tuberculosis.
Luganda: Disitulikiti zeetaaga abasawo abakugu era abasobola okukendeeza ekirwadde ky'akafuba.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti neyetaaga abakozi abaine emyoga kandi barikubaasa kumaraho endwara.
Acholi: Distrik gimito lutic ma ludiro dok matye gi kero me tic i kom two aona opio
Ateso: Ekotosi idisitriktan eswamak lu adekis lu emisiaritos kanu aitikitik adeka na atapong.
Lugbara: Distrikiti 'da le azi'ba ecopi ra 'diyi azo tibi niri ma aza kozu.

English: Health workers lack protective gears and materials when treating patients.
Luganda: Abasawo tebalina bya kwekuumisa n'eby'okukozesa nga bajjanjaba abalwadde.
Runyankore: Abashaho tibaine bintu by'okukoresa baaba nibaragurira abarwaire.
Acholi: Lutic yoto kom pe gitye ki jami ma gwoko gi ki jami tic i kom lutwo
Ateso: Emamete eswamak lu adekis iswamasia lu eyuaritos awate keda lu itwasamao imukeo adekak.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi vu afa sule rua tambaza fepi azo si 'diyi yo eyini aro feria 'ba azoru 'diyini.

English: Health workers have limited knowledge about tuberculosis.
Luganda: Abasawo bayina amagezi matono ku kafuba.
Runyankore: Abashaho tibarikwetegyereza gye endwara y'akakonko.
Acholi: Lutic yot kom tye ki ngec manok i kom two aona opio
Ateso: Edite eswamak lu adekis aijen kanuikamunitos adeka na atapong.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma e'yo ni azo tibi niri ma dria ri caku

English: The ministry needs to provide health care services in every community.
Luganda: Minisitule yeetaaga okuwa obujjanjabi mu buli kitundu.
Runyankore: Minisiture eine kugaba obuheereza omuri buri kyanga.
Acholi: Gangkal omyero oyelle me cwalo kony me yot kom I kabedo weng
Ateso: Ekot eerionget adumanakin itunga amukian kangin aiboisit.
Lugbara: Le Okalamvu alata niri ma si arojo eyi ongulumu dria eyi ma alea.

English: The district needs to encourage more medical check-ups in the area.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yeetaaga okwongera okukubiriza okukebera endwadde mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Minisiture eine kwongyera amaani omu kukyebera abantu omu myanya yoona.
Acholi: Distrik omyero orwee lwak me bedo ka pime i kabedo eni
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt aisinyikokite awanyanario na itunga kaiboisio.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma fe ava e'yo rua oneza ni 'diyini angu 'da ma alea drile.

English: The high influx of refugees is likely to encourage the spread of the disease.
Luganda: Okweyongera okw'abanoonyiboobubudamu kwandiviirako okusaasaana kw'obulwadde.
Runyankore: Okweyongyera kw'empungi ezirikwija omu ihanga, nikubaasa kujanjaza endwara.
Acholi: Medde pa luring ayella I kabedo ni omaro medo nya pa two ni
Ateso: Aipuar na ikerak emina aiyatakin akora na adeka.
Lugbara: Emunyale eyi ma emuta okposi ri eco fe azo 'da ni i erezu ra.

English: People do not trust the coronavirus results from the task force.
Luganda: Abantu tebeesiga biva mu ku kebera kw'akawuka ka kolona okuva mu kakiiko akadduukirize.
Runyankore: Abantu tibarikwesiga ebirugire omukukyebera endwara ya Korona ebirikugambwa akakiiko akatairweho.

Lugbara: Ba e'yi ai ni e'yo efupi rua o'biza azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma dria ri ku

English: People believe some of the results have been made up by the district.

Runyankore: Abantu nibateekateeka ngu ebirugiremu, bikorairwe aha Disiturikiti.
Acholi: Dano mukene gi tamo ni adwoki me pim mogo eni ki teto gi ateta ki I distrik
Ateso: Eomitos itunga ebe acie kotoma akiro erai edisitrikt nes esubunit.

English: Some district officials tested positive to the coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti abamu baasangiddwamu ekirwadde ky'akawuka ka kolona.

Ateso: Icie kotoma otunga luka odisitrikt aponi inwakunai adeka na ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba esu azi'ba districtia 'diyi ma rua azo corona niri ra.

English: The ministry showed its weakness when positive cases tested negative in other areas.

Acholi: Gangkal onyutu goro ne i kare ma joo ma ki pimo ki nongo gitye ki two dok ki pimo ki nongo ni gipe kwede I kabedo mukene
Ateso: Abu erionget itodu ake anonok ne enwakunere itunga lu abakai ajaas keda adeka adumun emamei adeka.
Lugbara: Distrikiti e'da okpo ako ivileri 'bani 'ba azi esule azo be distrikitia 'diyi esuzu azo koko angu azi 'diyi ma alea risi.

English: Some people are negative, and then they are marked positive.
Luganda: Abantu abamu si balwadde ne balagibwa nti balwadde.
Runyankore: Abantu abamwe tibarwaire kandi nibahandikwaho nk'abarwaire.
Acholi: Joo mukene peke ki two, ento ki nyutu ni gitye kwede
Ateso: Icie itunga emamei adeka, konye ekwetaritai ebe ejaas keda adeka.
Lugbara: Ba azi 'diyi azo koko te 'ba e'yi la 'ba azo be 'diyiru.

English: The elections results from Arua district have lots of questions.
Luganda: Ebyavudde mu kulonda mu disitulikiti y'a Arua birina ebibuuzo bingi.

Ateso: Aseo naka edisitrik loka Arua ejai abuonokin toma.

English: The district does not follow up on the positive cases within the district.

English: People are doubtful of the positive tests released by the district.

English: The district does not provide any help to the positive cases at the district.

English: The farmers get poor quality seed varieties.

English: Fifty per cent of seeds sold on the Ugandan market are counterfeit.

English: Many farmers in the same region bought the fake seeds.

English: The two-day workshop was organized to train farmers about the fake seeds.

English: Human rights are the freedom that belongs to everyone in the world.

English: The farmers did not know that they also have their rights.

Ateso: Itwegelete kesi akoriok ikinyom lu eomitai epote aimii konye ogirete alomun cut.
Lugbara: Amuti karakara eyi

English: Media and social media platforms have greatly helped in spreading the word of God.

Acholi: En onongo tye gi gen ni kwo pa lwak me arua obi roce i yo me bedo ki lim
Ateso: Aomit ngesi cut ebe epote itunga luka Arua adumun aijulakino toma akiro nu apol.
Lugbara: Eri ndra asiꞌbaza be kini ꞌba Arua ꞌdiyi nga ojata esu zota oꞌbi yini aꞌata yini yi ma eselearisi azini lonyisi ꞌdi ma alia ra.

English: He needed to support the ruling party for the people of West Nile to benefit.
Luganda: Yayaggala okuwagira ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza abantu ba West Nile baganyulwe.
Runyankore: Akaba nayenda kushagika ekibiina ekiri omubutegyeki, kugira ngu abantu ba west Nile ,babaase kugasirwa.
Acholi: En omyero ocwak party matye iloc pi lwak me Westnile me nongo ber pa tella ne
Ateso: Akoto ngesi ti aigang epate lo ipugai kanu itunga luka Arua aimedaun.
Lugbara: Le ndra eri ma fe atita amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepi niri dri 'ba westnilea 'diyini ecozu orodri esuzu

English: The parliamentarian was exemplary to other leaders.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yali kyakulabirako eri abakulembeze abalala.
Runyankore: Omukiiki omwishengyero, akaba ari eky'okureeberaho ahabwabebembezi abandi.
Acholi: Lamemba me paliament obedo lanyut maber bot lutela mukene
Ateso: Arai emeeba lokairabet lo etodunit aswamisinei nuajokak nejaas engarenok icie.
Lugbara: Agu azi ngapi paliamentia 'da ni ndra ecetaru drice'ba azi 'diyi ni dria.

English: The parliamentarian joined politics life at a young age.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yayingira ebyobufuzi ku myaka emito.
Runyankore: Omukiiki omwishengyero, akegaita ahaby'obutegyeki akiri muto.
Acholi: Lamemba ma parliament odonyo itella ma onongo pwod tidi
Ateso: Elomarit emeeba loka airabet toma politiks orongo edite.
Lugbara: Agu azi ngapi paliamentia 'da fi ndra e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea de esu eri ma eli nga were.

English: He got the experience which gave him the confidence to contest for the parliamentary seat.
Luganda: Yafuna obumanyirivu ekyamuwa obuvumu okuvuganya ku kifo ky'omubaka wa paalamenti.
Runyankore: Akaba amanyiriire omurimo, ekyamureteire kugira amasiko ngu ayesimbe ahantebe yomukiiki omwishengyero.
Acholi: En onongo ngec me tic ma oweko omiye tek cwiny me cung pi cito I parliament
Ateso: Abu ngesi odum amisiar nes ejaikini nges egogongor aibwo kwape emeeba loka airabet.
Lugbara: Eꞌyo erini esu oniri fe erini asi mba pa sozu memba koloseniniriru ni.

English: The army is used to intimidate the opposition leaders.
Luganda: Amagye gakozesebwa okutiisatiisa abakulembeze b'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti.
Runyankore: Amahe gakaba nigakira kutinisa abarikukurira orubaju orurikuhakanisa Gavumenti.

Ateso: Itwasamao ajore kanu aitukurian engarenok lu itepegitos apugan.
Lugbara: Ba asikari eyi ayu ori fezu drice'ba pa tupi gamete ni ku 'diyi dri

English: The army wants opposition leaders to be aligned to the ruling party.
Luganda: Amagye gaagala abakulembeze b'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti bakwatagane n'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza.
Runyankore: Amahe nigenda ngu abarikukurira orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti, begeite ahakibiina ekiri omubwebembezi.
Acholi: Mwony mito ni lutela ma jemo i kom gamente gutim gin ma gamente mito
Ateso: Ekot ajore engarenok luka oposition aitolomario opate lo ipugai.
Lugbara: Asikari eyi le drice'ba amuti politiki ni kari ma dri cepiri ma alea ku 'diyi ma fe atita amuti politiki ni kari ma dri cepi 'diyini

English: The army is playing political cards against opposition leaders.

Runyankore: Amahe gariyo nigareeta akakodyo k'eby'obutegyeki okurwanisa abarikukurira orubaju orurikuhakanisa Gavumenti.

Lugbara: Asikari eyi avi drice'ba atita fepi amuti politiki azi 'diyini 'diyisi

English: The army has started laying strategies to influence the coming elections.

Runyankore: Amahe gatandikire kutaho oburyo bw'okubuzabuza akaruuru akarikwiija.

Lugbara: Asikari eyi e'do e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye eyini ani dri suzu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea

English: The army will be used to help the ruling party win the elections.

Runyankore: Amahe nigeija kukozesibwa okuhwera ekibiina ekiri omubutegyeki, okusingura akaruuru.
Acholi: Kibitiyo ki mwony me konyo party matye I loc loyo kwir
Ateso: Eponio aitwasam ajore aingarakin epate lo ipugai aitelekar aseo.
Lugbara: Ba nga asikari eyi ayu amuti politiki ni kari ma dri cepiri ma aza kozu eyini ani ecozu opeta eyi ndezu ra.

English: The commander explained that the army is non-partisan, and the accusations are baseless.
Luganda: Omudduumizi yannyonyodde nti amagye tegegalina kyekubiira era ebiriwo tebirina kwe byesigamizibwa.

Ateso: Abu ekomanda olimu ebe mam ajore igangit edio ewai, nu erekitai ajore eraas amamiak.
Lugbara: Komanda 'da kini asikari eyi ma amuti politiki ni 'diyi yo dika kini e'yo 'bani eyi tozu 'dayi enzo eyi.

English: The commander explained that the army is concerned about peace and order.
Luganda: Omudduumizi yannyonyodde nti amagye gafaayo ku mirembe n'obutebenkevu.
Runyankore: Omuduumizi akashoborora ngu amahe nigagyenderera okureeta obusingye n'obutereera.
Acholi: Lador wi mwony owaco ni tic gitye me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo

Lugbara: Komanda 'da 'yo kini asikari eyi ma azi asianzu ejizu dika azita eyi ma tambazu

English: The incumbent is worried about the increasing number of officers in the area.
Luganda: Omukulembeze aliko mweraliikirivu ku muwendo gw'abasirikale ogweyongera mu kitundu
Runyankore: Omwebembezi oriho obwahati, ayerarikiriire omuhendo gwa ba ofiisa abari omumwanya.

English: The army should not get involved in politics and politicking.

Ateso: Mam ajore ebeit alomar akiro nuka politiks arai aisup aseeta.

Ateso: Kanu edisitrikt apol, ekot iwaitin lu apugan kere aimorikikin.
Lugbara: Distrikiti azi ni tuzu, eri le arakala dria gamete ni 'diyi ma eciti tualu.

English: We need more cities in Uganda which look like Kampala.
Luganda: Twetaaga ebibuga ebirala mu Uganda ebifaanana nga Kampala.
Runyankore: Nitwetenga ezindi ndembo omu Uganda, ezirikushusha Kampala.
Acholi: Wamito city mapol I Uganda macal ki Kampala
Ateso: Ikoto oni isitei luipu ko Uganda lu eputosi keda kampala.
Lugbara: Ale ki aku ambo e'dapi kambala le ni eyi Kari Uganda niri ma alea dika

English: District councillors and members of parliament, both deliver different plans for the district to people
Luganda: Ba kansala ba disitulikiti n'ababaka ba paalamenti bonna bawa enteekateeka ez'enjawulo eri abantu ba disitulikiti
Runyankore: Abakiiki aha Disiturikiti hamwe nabanyeishengyero bombi nibaheereza abantu enteekateeka za disiturikiti.
Acholi: Lutela me district ki lumemba me parliament weng gi kati ki yub ma pat pi lwak
Ateso: Ikasilas luko disitrikt ka  imeeban luka airabet kere ijukanarete ipulanin luegelegela kanuka itunga luko disitrikt.
Lugbara: Kansila distrikiti ni 'diyi tualu 'ba azi ngapi paliamentia 'diyi be otita ndundu distrikiti ni 'diyi fe o'bi eyidri ni

English: Not all the leaders will have a common goal for their area
Luganda: Si bakulembeze bonna nti bajja kubeera n'ekigendererwa eky'awamu eky'ekitundu kyabwe
Runyankore: Abeebembezi boona nibaba bateine kigyendererwa kimwe omu kutunguura ebyanga byabo.
Acholi: Pe ni lutela weng gubi bedo ki miti acel pi kabedo ni
Ateso: Mam engarenok kere ejaunos keda adiope apeleikinet kanuka aiboisit.
Lugbara: Adrini drice'ba dria eyi ma e'yo eyini lele angu eyini 'diyini ri alu ku.

English: There is still an increase in corruption in the government
Luganda: Wakyaliwo okweyongera mu bukenenuzi mu gavumenti
Runyankore: Hakiriho obushumankuzi bwingi omu Gavumenti.
Acholi: Rwom me camcana pwod tye kamede I gamente
Ateso: Erongo ekorapusion iyata kotoma apugan.
Lugbara: E'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni nga po'di tu gametea tutu.

English: The government is doing its best to fight corruption
Luganda: Gavumenti ekola ky'esobola okulwanyisa obukenenuzi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eriyo neekora ekirikubaasika omu kurwanisa obushomankuzi.
Acholi: Gamente tye ka yele me lweny i kom camcana
Ateso: Etamit apugan nu epedori kere kanu aitiji ekorapusion.
Lugbara: Gamete ni isi ri o'bi a'di 'dizu anyamgbolo be.

English: Improving agriculture is one of the things the government is focusing on
Luganda: Okwongela ku mutindo gw'ebyobulimirunzi ky'ekimu ku bintu gavumenti by'etaddeko essira
Runyankore: Okutunguura ahaby'obuhingi, nikimwe ahabintu ebi gavumenti eteiremu amaani.
Acholi: Gamente tye ka keto cwinye i kom ilo malo rwom me pur
Ateso: Aikeun ewai lo akoru nes idiopet koboro kalu itereikina apugan.
Lugbara: E'yo agirikica ma omgbo otuzu ri eri e'yo azi gamete ni asi fezu drinia ni i

English: Public hospital doctors are not well paid
Luganda: Abasawo b'amalwaliro ga gavumenti tebasasulwa bulungi
Runyankore: Abashaho b'omu marwariro ga gavumenti, tibarikushashurwa gye.
Acholi: Lu daktari ma I odi yadi pa gamente pe ki culu gi maber
Ateso: Imurok lu adekisia apugan mam etacio ejok.
Lugbara: Ba ofeni dakitari azi ngapi arojo o'biyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi muke ku.

English: The government take long to pay doctors in public hospitals
Luganda: Gavumenti erwawo okusasula abasawo mu malwaliro gaayo
Runyankore: Gavumenti nekyerererwa kushashura abashaho omu marwariro ga Gavumenti.
Acholi: Gamente galle ki cullu daktari ma I odi yadi gi
Ateso: Eyangaikini apugan aojau kanu aitac imurok lu adekisia nu apugan.
Lugbara: Gamete ni sa'wa 'du ezu dakitari azi ngapi arojo o'biyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma musara ofezu.

English: Nowadays people are recovering from the coronavirus
Luganda: Ennaku zino abantu bawona akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Ebiro ebi, abantu nibakira oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: Ite kare ni dano tye ka cang ki i kom two Corona
Ateso: Aparasia nu engaleunenete itunga ekorona.
Lugbara: Curu'do, 'ba eyi atita esu azo corona niri si.

English: Doctors and nurses put in a lot to make sure people are treated and healed
Luganda: Abasawo ne ba kiyambi baabwe bateekamu nnyo okukakasa nti abantu bajjanjabwa era bawona
Runyankore: Abashaho bakozire kihango okureeba ngu abantu baragurirwa kandi baakira.
Acholi: Daktari ki nurses gi tiyo matek me neno ni dano kitiyo i komgi dok gucang
Ateso: Iswamaete imurok keda anasin noi kanu awanyun ebe imukeo ka aitangaleun itunga.
Lugbara: Dakitari eyi Nasi eyi be e'yo karakara eyi 'ye nezura kini 'ba eyi aro esu azini atita esu.

English: It seems there is still fund embezzlement in the government
Luganda: Kirabika wakyaliwo okukumpanya ensimbi mu gavumenti
Runyankore: Nikireebeka hariho obushuma bw'esente omu Gavumenti.
Acholi: Nen calo kwo cene pwod tye I gamente
Ateso: Esubit bala erongo ikapun ekoko apugan.
Lugbara: Eri ena kile robia ogule lokirisi ri nga po'di gametea ci

English: Paying people's salaries in time motivates them to work more
Luganda: Okusasula abantu mu budde kibazzaamu amaanyi okukola ennyo
Runyankore: Okushashura abantu omu bwire, nikibagaruramu amaani g'okukora munonga.
Acholi: Culu dano con medo miti gi me tic
Ateso: Aitac iropito itunga kotoma apak isinyikokit kes aswam noi.
Lugbara: Azi'ba eyi ma musara ofele sa'wa dria ri ni eyidri ava fe azi ngazu drile.

English: Workers can strike if not paid in time
Luganda: Abakozi basobola okwekalakaasa singa tebasasulwa mu budde
Runyankore: Abakozi nibabaasa kwediima ku barikuba batashashwirwe omu bwire.
Acholi: Lutic pwod giromo jemo ka inen pe ki culu gi ikare ki kome
Ateso: Epedorete eswamak aigir aswam arai mam etacio kotoma apak.
Lugbara: Azi'ba eyi eco ga azi ngako si ra 'ba ka eyi ma musara ofe ku ria

English: It is not a must to pay all workers at the same time.
Luganda: Si kya tteeka okusasula abakozi bonna mu kaseera ke kamu
Runyankore: Tikirangiro ngu oshashura abakozi boona omu bwire bumwe.
Acholi: Pe ni omyero icul lutic weng lawang acel
Ateso: Mam erai ebe ebeit aitac eswamak kere adiope apak.
Lugbara: Eri adrini azitaru azi'ba eyi ofezu sa'wa aluri ma alea ku.

English: It is a good thing to have a bank account if you are working for the government
Luganda: Kirungi okubeera n'akawunti mu bbanka singa okolera gavumenti
Runyankore: Nikirungi okugira akawunti omu banka waaba nookorera gavumenti.
Acholi: Opore me bedo ki account I bank ka itye ka tic ki gamente
Ateso: Ejoka ajaut keda akaunta aingadis naka ikapun arai iswamaete ijo keda apugan.
Lugbara: Eri orodriru mi akawunti ni aa'zu erojo azi ma alea ci ika azi nga gamete be ria

English: You only get paid if you complete the tasks assigned to you
Luganda: Osasulwa singa omaliriza obuvunaanyizibwa obukuwereddwa
Runyankore: Nooza kushashura waaheza emirimo eyoheirwe.
Acholi: Ki culi ka ce inen itimo jami ma kilegi ni itim
Ateso: Itacio ijo bon arai idaunit ijo aswamisinei kere nu ijaikitai ijo.
Lugbara: Ba lu nga mi ofe mini azi fele mi dri 'diyi dezu risi .

English: The government usually sends out money to local councils to pay their workers
Luganda: Gavumenti bulijjo esindika ssente mu gavumenti z'ebitundu okusasula abakozi babwe
Runyankore: Gavumenti buriijo neyohereza sente omu bukiiko bw'ebyaro kugira ngu bashashure abakozi baabo.
Acholi: Gamente ipol kare cwalo lim bot lu tella me council wek gucul lutic gi
Ateso: Ijukanari duc apuagan ikapun local councils kanu aitac eropit kec.
Lugbara: Gamete ni tutuni robia edri kansili eyidri eyi ma azi'ba eyi ofezu.

English: During the coronavirus, outbreak doctors and nurses received an increase in their salaries
Luganda: Mu biseera by'okubalukawo kw'akawuka ka kolona , abasawo n'abayambi baabwe baayongezebwa emisaala.
Runyankore: Omu bwire obu Korona yabarukireho, omushara gwaba dokita naba naasi gukongyerwa.
Acholi: Ikare me poto pa two corona, daktari ki nurses ma gubedo ka tic ki medo mucara gi
Ateso: Kapak naka abwangun na ekorona, apotu imurok ka anasin odumutu aiyasio na iropito.
Lugbara: Sa'wa azo korona nirisi, 'ba otu dakitari eyi ma musara Nasi eyi be ra.

English: If work is done, accountability is required
Luganda: Singa omulimu guggwa, embalirira yeetagisa
Runyankore: Omurimo ku gurikukorwa embaririra neba neyetengwa.
Acholi: Ka tic otum, nyutu kor tic mite
Ateso: Karai iswamai aswam, ekotoi aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
Lugbara: Ba ka azi nga 'bo, Le 'ba e'da geri azi nde ngazu ri ci

English: The government tries to educate its people on the various diseases in the country
Luganda: Gavumentuti egezaako okusomesa abantu baayo ku ndwadde ez'enjawulo mu ggwanga
Runyankore: Gavumenti negyezaho kwegyesa abantu baayo ebikwatiraine n'endwara nyingi omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Gamente tye ka pwonyo lwak i kom two ma padi padi matye I lobo
Ateso: Etamit apugan aisisianakin itunga ke nuikamunitos adekasinei nuegelegela akwap.
Lugbara: Gamete ni o'bi i ma 'ba eyini imbata fe azo ndundu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.

English: Majority of the people in Uganda use motorcycles as a form of transport
Luganda: Abantu abangi mu Uganda bakozesa pikipiki ng'entambula
Runyankore: Abantu baingi omu Uganda, nibakozesa munonga pikipikink'omuringo gw'eby'engenda.
Acholi: Pol pa dano ma I uganda tiyo ki piki piki pi wot gi
Ateso: Itunga luipu ko Uganda itwasamaete ipikipikin alosio.
Lugbara: Ba karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi pikipiki eyi ayu acizu i.

English: Instead of people motorcycles are instructed to carry only cargo
Luganda: Mu kifo ky'abantu pikipiki ziragirwa kusitula migugu gyokka
Runyankore: Za Pikipiki niziragiirwa kwekorera ebintu batari bantu.
Acholi: Mekaka dano tingo te, piki piki aye kicimo gi ni gutim
Ateso: Aiboisit na ainap itunga icorakitai ipikipikin aibwokite iboro bon.
Lugbara: Ba eyi o'duzu ri ma paria, 'ba fe azita pikipiki eyini lu muziko olizu i.

English: A small issue can cause people to strike
Luganda: Ensonga entono esobola okuleeterea abantu okwegugunga
Runyankore: Enshonga nkye neebaasa kureetera abantu akediimo.
Acholi: Lok ma tidi twero weko dano jemo
Ateso: Epedori ibore yen didi aijaikin itunga amumuor.
Lugbara: E'yo were ni eco fe 'ba eyini ecazu awoko si ngiringiri ejizu ra

English: The president isn't the only one who makes decisions on the country's affairs
Luganda: Omukulembeze w'eggwanga si yeyekka akola okusalawo ku bikwatagana ku nsonga z'eggwanga
Runyankore: Mukuru weihanga tiwe wenka orikusharaho aha nshonga ezikwatiraine neihanga.
Acholi: Ladit lobo keken aye pe moko tam i kom ngo matime ilobo
Ateso: Mam erai lokapolon akwap bon elemi aomisio nu itwasamao akwap.
Lugbara: Purezidenti pe ni e'yo ndundu kari ni 'diyi a'dule ku

English: Majority of the youth in the country are motorists
Luganda: Abavubuka abasinga obungi mu ggwanga bavuzi ba pikipiki
Runyankore: Eminyeeto mingi omwihanga neevuga Piki.
Acholi: Pol pa buli matye ilobo mi gidwoyo piki piki onyo mutoka
Ateso: Atumunak luipu akwap eraas etekerak.
Lugbara: Ba ode karakara ndeni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi pikipiki onzu.

English: The public is also free to suggest ideas for the government to look into
Luganda: Abantu nabo baddembe okuwa gavumenti ebiteeso okutunulamu
Runyankore: Abantu nabo baine obugabe kureeta ebiteiso, ebi Gavumenti eshemereire kuranzyamu.
Acholi: Lwak tye agonya me miyo tam ki gamente i kom gin me atima
Ateso: Ejaas itunga apedor na aleminikin apugan aomisio nu ebeit airereonor.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi drilemgbo be egata eyi fezu gamete dri

English: The government does what it can to protect its people from the coronavirus
Luganda: Gavumenti ekola ky'esobola okukuuma abantu baayo okuva eri akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neekora eki erikubaasa okurinda abantu baayo kutakwatwa endwara ya Korona.

Ateso: Iswamai apugan nu epdori kere kanu ayuarite iketunga kanejai ekorona.
Lugbara: Gamete ni e'yo i ni eco 'ye ra ri 'ye kari anzi eyi ma ta mbazu azo corona niri si.

English: The poverty rates in Uganda increased during the lockdown
Luganda: Obwavu mu Uganda bweyongera mu kaseera k'omuggalo
Runyankore: Obworo omu bantu omu Uganda bukeyongyera omubiro by'akeshereko.

Ateso: Apotu ican ikeunos noi ko Uganda kapak naka agolokinio.
Lugbara: Alio ma omgbo kari Uganda niri ma alea ri tura sa'wa 'bani acicia lezu kurisi

English: When will the vaccine for coronavirus come out?
Luganda: Eddagala erigema akawuka ka kolona lifuluma ddi?
Runyankore: Omubazi gw'okusirika Korona, nigwija kubaho ryari?

Ateso: Iworibo itolomunere ekia arai ekato loka ekorona?
Lugbara: Aro soza azo corona niri ni efu nguari?

English: We need new directives to assist in preventing the spread of coronavirus.
Luganda: Twetaaga ebiragiro ebigya okuyamba mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Nitwetenga ebiragiro ebisya, okutuhwera kuzibira okujanjaara kwa Korona.

Ateso: Ikoto oni ikisila luitetiak kanu aigangakin oni aitikitik awea na ekorona.

English: A small issue can cause problems.
Luganda: Ensonga entono esobola okuleeta ebizibu.
Runyankore: Enshonga nkye neebaasa kureeta oburemeezi.
Acholi: Gin ma tidi twero kelo peko
Ateso: Ibore yen didi epedori ayangaun atikisio.
Lugbara: E'yo azi werea ni eco e'yo eji ra.

English: We have very many people in our family
Luganda: Tulina abantu bangi mu maka gaffe
Runyankore: Twine abantu baingi munonga omuka yaitu.
Acholi: watye ki dano ma pol I gang wa
Ateso: Ija oni keda itunga luipu okale wok
Lugbara: Ama vu akua 'ba eyi karakara.

English: Which kind of music do you like most?
Luganda: Kika kya nnyimba ki ky'osinga okwagala?
Runyankore: Ni muringo ki gw'eby'eshongoro ogu orikukunda munonga?
Acholi: I maro winyo lakodi wer mene?
Ateso: Anibo emuisik ikoto ijo noi?
Lugbara: Ongo mini le ndeni 'diyi Ongo ngole 'diyi?

English: Who is your role model?
Luganda: Ani gwe wenyumirizaamu?
Runyankore: Omuntu ori eky'okureeberaho kirungi nooha?
Acholi: Nga ma in igomo kwo ne loyo?
Ateso: Ingaibo atalata kon?
Lugbara: Ba mini lezu aa'zu eri le ewu drusiri ma alea ri a'di i?

English: This is a rainy season.
Luganda: Bino biseera bya nkuba
Runyankore: Obu n'obwire bw'enjura.
Acholi: Eni kare me kot
Ateso: Eraas nu apakio nu edou.
Lugbara: Di sa'wa ozo vuri i.

English: Leadership is an opportunity given to serve the people.
Luganda: Obukulembeze mukisa ogukuweebwa okuwereza abantu.
Runyankore: Obwebembezi n'omugisha ogukuheirwe kuheereza abantu.
Acholi: Tela obedo gum ma kimiyo me tic pi dano
Ateso: Erai engarenone arerengu na ijaikitai kanu aijanakin itunga.
Lugbara: Driceza eri drileba fele o'bi eyi dri azi ngazu ri i.

English: Christians purchased a brand new lorry for the diocese.
Luganda: Abakulisitu baaguze loole empya eyekigo.
Runyankore: Abakristaayo bakagura roore nsya ey'obureeberezi.
Acholi: Lucristayo guwilo lorry manyen pi diocese
Ateso: Apotu ikrisitayon ogwelata elore loitetet kanu edaiosis
Lugbara: Kristiani eyi je mutukari ambu Lorri ruri kanisa ni.

English: The lorry was bought at two hundred eighty-five million shillings.
Luganda: Loole yagulwa obukadde bwa siringi ebikumi bibiri mu kinaana mu butaano
Runyankore: Roore ekagurwa sente ezirikuhika obukaikuru magana abiri kinaana na butano.
Acholi: kiwilo lorry ni cilling million miya ariyo ki pyera boro wiye abic
Ateso: Egwelitai elore imilionin akwat aarei akaisakanyauni ikany.
Lugbara: Ba je mutukari Lorri nde milioni turu iri kali aro drini towi.

English: The church will provide hiring services which will generate income.
Luganda: Ekkanisa ejja kuteekawo obuweereza bw'okupangisa ekinaaleta enyingiza.
Runyankore: Ekanisa neija kutaho obuheereza bw'okupangisa, ekireije kurugwamu entasya.
Acholi: Kanica obi weko bedo me apanga ma eni obi kello cente
Ateso: Ebuni ekanisa aipagisanar iboro icie kanu idumununa ikapun .
Lugbara: Kanisa ni mu e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye o'bi eyini eyini ani robia esuzu

English: The clergy need to engage in business activities to improve their welfare.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'amadiini beetaaga okwenyigira mu mirimu gy'obusuubuzi okulongoosa obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abaahure baine kwejumba omu mirimo y'ebyobushuubuzi babaase kutunguura entuura yaabo.
Acholi: Lupwonye dini omyero gutim biacara mo kelo itgi cene
Ateso: Ekot imakio lu ekanisa ajaut akiro nuka agwelanar kanu aitojokar ejautene kec.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ma fi e'yo tujari ni 'diyi ma alea eyini ani eyi ma edri otuzu.

English: Christians came together to respond to the needs of the clergy.
Luganda: Abakrisitu begasse okuddamu eri ebyetaago by'abakulembeze b'eddiini.
Runyankore: Abakristaayo baketeerana hamwe, okuhanuura ahabyetaago by'abahure.
Acholi: Lucristayo gukati me tic i kom jami ma onongo lupwonye gi mito
Ateso: Apotu ikurisitayon imorikikinos kanu aitemokin eipuda loka imakio lu ekanisa.
Lugbara: Kristiani eyi ti eci tualu kanisa ma drice'ba eyi ma aza kozu e'yo eyi ndepi 'diyi ma alea.

English: The lorry will be used to carry out business activities in Arua.
Luganda: Loole ejja kukozesebwa okukola eby'obusuubuzi mu Arua
Runyankore: Roore neeza kukozesibwa omu mirimo y'eby'obushubuzi omuri Arua.
Acholi: Lorry ni kitwero tic kwede me timo biacara I Arua
Ateso: Eponio aitwasam elore kanu ebiasara kotoma Arua.
Lugbara: Ba mu lorri 'dari ayu tujari 'yezu Arua.

English: The diocese will decrease on income spent on transferring clergies.
Luganda: Essaza lijja kukendeeza sente zerisaasaanya ku kyusa bannaddiini.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi nibwija kutuubya aha sente ezirikushohora aha ngyenda z'abahure.
Acholi: Diocese obi dwoko piny wel cene ma rweny ikare me kobo lupwonye
Ateso: Ebuni edaiosis aitidisiar ikapun lu itwasamanaro kanu aijulanar imakio ekanisa.
Lugbara: Dayasesi ni mu robia ayule atalo eyi ojaria ri ma omgbo esi ra

English: The diocese has started to engage in business activities.
Luganda: Essaza litandise okwenyigira mu mirimu gyobusuubuzi.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi butandikire kwejumba omumirimo y'eby'obushubuzi.
Acholi: Diocese ocako timo tic me biacara
Ateso: Ageu edaiosis akiro nuka ebiasara.
Lugbara: Dayasesi e'do tujari eyi 'ye 'bo.

English: The diocese bought a brand new lorry to solve transport issues.
Luganda: Esaza lyaguze loole empya okugyawo obuzibu bw'entambula.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi bukagura roore nsya, okukora aha nshonga z'eby'engyenda.
Acholi: Diocese owilo lorry manyen me konyo icobo peko me wot
Ateso: Abu edaiosis ogwel elore loitetet kanu aitemokin nu elose.
Lugbara: Dayasesi je Lorri azi O'di e'yo acicia ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.

English: The bishop team will embark on purchasing a brand new double cabin.
Luganda: Ttiimu y'omulabirizi ejja kugenda okugula ddabo kabini empya ttuku.
Runyankore: Tiimu y'omureeberezi, naija kukurasaho okugura dabo'kabini ensya'.
Acholi: Jo pa bishop gubi cako yub me wilo mutoka double cabin manyen
Ateso: Ebuni etimu ebisop agwel double cabin loitetet.
Lugbara: Amuti Bisopi niri ni nga mutukari eti be mgbo omvele dabulu kebeni ruri ma jeta e'do

English: The diocesan office was enclosed in a fence.
Luganda: Yafesi y'essaza yetoolozeddwa olukomera.
Runyankore: Ofiisi y'obureeberezi bakagyetorooza orugo.
Acholi: Office pa diocese tye ki cel ma olworo woko
Ateso: Egoloro eyapesi loka edaiosis toma alukunet.
Lugbara: Ofisi dayasesi niri eri abi ma alea

English: Friends of the bishop is a group which was established in two thousand eighteen.
Luganda: Mikwano gy'omulabirizi kibinja ekyatandikibwawo mu nkumi bbiri kkumi na munaana
Runyankore: Banywani b'omureeberezi, ni guruupu eyatandikirwe omu mwaka enkumi ibiri, ikumi na munaana.
Acholi: Lurem pa bishop obedo group ma ocake imwaka alib ariyo ki apar aboro
Ateso: Ipapero ebishop erai egurupu lo erauno okaru lo ilukumin iyarei itomonakanyauni.
Lugbara: Ba e'do amuti omvele agyipika bisopi ni ri eli elfu iri mudrini aro si.

English: Madi and West Nile dioceses are the largest in the Church of Uganda.
Luganda: Madi ne West Nile ge masaza agasinga obunene mu kereziya ya Uganda.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi bwa Madi na West Nile, nibwo burikukirayo obuhango omuri Church of Uganda.
Acholi: Madi ki westnile diocese en aye dong lac loyo I Church of Uganda
Ateso: Idaiosin luka Madi ka West Nile kes epolok noi ko Church of Uganda.
Lugbara: Dayasesi Ma'di ni azini Westnile niri eri ambo ndeni kanisa Uganda niri ma alea ri i

English: The diocese covers six districts.
Luganda: Essaza litwala disitulikiti mukaaga.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi nibutwariramu Disiturikiti mukaaga.
Acholi: Diocese ni tye ki districts abicel
Ateso: Enyamiarit edaiosisi idisitriktan ikanyape.
Lugbara: Dayasesi 'da ma alea distrikiti eyi azia.

English: There is the improved power supply in Arua through the Rural electrification agency.
Luganda: Waliwo okulongooka mu kusaasaanya kw'amasannyalaze mu Arua okuyita mu kitongore ekisasanya amasannyalaze mu byalo.
Runyankore: Amashanyarazi geyongyeire kujanjaara omuri Arua, kuraba omunkora eyatandikirweho kuhitsya amashanyarazi omu byaro.
Acholi: Mac tye dong I Arua pi dul me Rural Electrification Agency
Ateso: Etojokar ekore lo akim kotoma Arua itoritete Rural electrification agency.
Lugbara: Aci feza Arua ri ma omgbo tura geri amuti omvele Rural electrification company niri si

English: A five hundred kilovolts generator was installed to boost power generation.
Luganda: Genereeta ey'amaanyi ga kiro vooloti bitaano yateekebwawo okwongeza ku masannyalaze agakolebwa.
Runyankore: Gyenerereeta ya kirovorutisi' magana ataano, ekombekwa, kubaasa kwongyera ahamaani g'amashanyarazi.
Acholi: Ki keto generator ma buku mac ma romo kilo volts miya abic
Ateso: Ejenereta loka kilovolts akwatakany nes aponi ibwaikinai kanu aiyatakina akim.
Lugbara: Ba su genereta azi kilowati be turu towi ni aci ofuleri ma omgbo otuzu.

English: Six generators will increase the power supply up to nearly three megawatts.
Luganda: Genereeta mukaaga zijja kwongeza ku masannyalaze okutuuka ku megawaati ssatu.
Runyankore: Gyenereeta mukaaga, niziija kwongyera ahabwingi bw'amashanyarazi kuhisya haihi 'megawaati ishatu'.
Acholi: Generators abicel obi weko mac ma ki buku oo megawats adek
Ateso: Ijeneretan ikanyape iyatakinete akorio na akim nepetai megawatts iuni.
Lugbara: Genereta azia 'diyi nga aci awale ri ma omgbo otu megawatti na si

English: Two four megawatts generators will be installed after their transportation from Tororo.
Luganda: Genereeta bbiri ez'amaanyi aga megawaati nnya zijja ku tekebwawo oluvannyuma lw'okuleetebwa okuva e Tororo.
Runyankore: Gyenereeta za megawaati ibiri ina niziza kuteebwaho bwanyima y'okureetwa kuruga Tororo.
Acholi: Generators ariyo me megawatts angwen kibi keto gi itic ka gu oo ki Tororo
Ateso: Ageneratan nuitosomaete akim naka imegawats iare kiwongon kes eponio aibwaikin akaulo na ayangar ko Tororo.
Lugbara: Ba mu genereta azi iri megawatti eyi be su ni eyi su 'bani eyi ejizu engazu Torooa si 'bo ri ma vutia

English: A new generator will be installed at the factory.
Luganda: Genereeta empya ejja kuteekebwa ku kkolero.
Runyankore: Gyenereeta nsya neija kwombekwa ahaikorero.
Acholi: Ki biketo genereta manyen I factori
Ateso: Eponio aibwaikin egenereta loitetet ocuma.
Lugbara: Ba mu genereta o'dini su angu 'bani afa eyi edezuri ma alea

English: The limited power supply in the area has discouraged business from taking place.
Luganda: Amasannyalaze amatono mu kitundu galemesezza eby'obusuubuzi okugenda mu maaso
Runyankore: Amashanyarazi makye omumwanya, garemesize bizinesi kubaho.
Acholi: Nok pa mac I kabedo meno oweko biacara pe obedo ka wot maber
Ateso: Adisieu na akim kaiboisit nes etotoliki nuka ebiasara atutubet.
Lugbara: Aci ako angu 'da ma alea ri eza tujari ma e'dota angu 'da ma alea ri ra

English: There have been unlimited cases of power outages in West Nile.
Luganda: Wabaddewo embeera y'okuvaako kw'amasannyalaze mu West Nile.
Runyankore: Amashanyarazi gatwire nigarugaho munonga omuri West Nile.
Acholi: Mac obedo ka rweny tere tere I westnile
Ateso: Epol lem alemanar na akim ko West Nile.
Lugbara: E'yo aci ako ni westnilea 'diyi ga tre

English: The government of Uganda has encouraged power transmission in the area.
Luganda: Gavumenti ya Uganda ekubirizza okutambuza kw'amasannyalaze mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ya Uganda eheire omuhimbo enkora y'okujanjaaza amashanyarazi omukicweka ekyo.
Acholi: Gamente me uganda ocwako yub me kubu mac ikabedo meno
Ateso: Esinyikoki apugan nako Uganda akorio na akim kaiboisit.
Lugbara: Gamete Uganda niri ai 'bani aci sezu angu 'da ma alea

English: People are worried that power may be costly.
Luganda: Abantu beeraliikirivu nti amasannyalaze gandiba ag'ebbeeyi.
Runyankore: Abantu berarikiriire ngu amashanyarazi nigabaasa kuba ag'ebeeyi y'ahaiguru.
Acholi: Dano tye ka lworo ni mac koni wele doko tek
Ateso: Ebunokinos itunga ebe ebuni akim etiai apolor.
Lugbara: Ba eyi adri asi otiza be kini aci eco mu adri ajeru ra.

English: Improved supply of power will encourage the establishment of industries in the West Nile.
Luganda: Okulongoosa amasannyalaze agasaasaanyizibwa kujja kutumbula okuteekebwawo kw'amakolero mu bugwanjuba bwa Nile.
Runyankore: Okwongyera okujanjaaza amashanyarazi, nikiija kureetaho amakorero maingi omuri West Nile.
Acholi: Bedo tye pa mac obi cuku cwiny dano me bino ka yabo factory I West Nile
Ateso: Aiyatakino na akim isinyikokini itunga adukun icuman ko West Nile.
Lugbara: Geri aci awazu kililiru 'diyi nga ava fe 'bani angu afa ndundu 'diyi edezuri eyi e'dozu westnilea

English: People lack enough money to sustain their lives.
Luganda: Abantu tebalina ssente zimala kuyimirizaawo bulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu tibaine sente zirikumara kwebaisaho.
Acholi: dano pe gitye ki cene ma oromo pi kwo gi
Ateso: Emamete itunga ikapun lu idaret aijar kec.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi vu robia eyini eyi ma edri ta mbazu yo.

English: Some businesses cannot operate without power supply.
Luganda: Bizinesi ezimu tezisobola kukola nga tewali masannyalaze.
Runyankore: Bizinesi ezimwe tizirikubaasa kukora hatariho mashanyarazi.
Acholi: Biacara mukene pe twero tic labongo mac
Ateso: Icie aswamisinei mam epedorete aiswamaun komamei akim.
Lugbara: Tujari azi 'diyi econi azi nga aci koko ku.

English: The power generated in the region is insufficient for business and home use.
Luganda: Amasannyalaze agakolebwa mu kitundu tegamala kuyimirizaawo bya busuubuzi n'okukozesa ewaka.
Runyankore: Amashanyarazi agari omukyanga ekyo, tigarikumara bizinesi hamwe n'okukozesa omuka.
Acholi: Mac ma kibuku ni nok tutwal pi biacara ki tic ipaco
Ateso: Akim na itolomio kaiboisit kana mam ilosikino kanu ebiasara ka aitwasam ore.
Lugbara: Aci edele angu 'di ma alea ri cani tujari 'yezu azini ayuzaru akua ku.

English: Electricity generation in Karuma will increase the supply of power in West Nile.
Luganda: Amasannyalaze agakolebwa mu Karuma gajja kwongeza amasannyalaze agagenda mu West Nile.
Runyankore: Amashanyarazi agarikuruga Karuma, nigaija kwongyera obwingi bwago omu West Nile.
Acholi: Buku mac I karuma obi medo mac I West Nile
Ateso: Aitolomio na akim ko Karuma elosi aiyatakin akorio na akim ko West nile.
Lugbara: Aci edeza karuma ri ni nga aci jile westnilea ri ma omgbo otu

English: The cost of power will not change.
Luganda: Ebbeyi y'amasannyalaze tejja kukyuuka.
Runyankore: Omuhendo gw'amashanyarazi tigurikwija kuhinduka.
Acholi: Wel mac pe obi loke
Ateso: Mam etiai lo akim ijulakin.
Lugbara: Aci ma aje ngani mu i oja ku.

English: Arua catholic diocese lost a staunch Christian.
Luganda: Essaza ly'ekereziya ey'ekikatoliki erya Arua lyafiirwa omukulisitu omugundiivu.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi bwa Arua obwabakaturiki, bufereirwe omukiristu ruranganwa.
Acholi: Diocese me Arua orwenyo la cristayo gi ma ocwiny
Ateso: Abu edaiosisi lo Arua otwania ekrisitayot lomunon.
Lugbara: Dayasesi katulika eyini Arua niri avi i ma kristiani azi okporu ni

English: The doctor was suffering from malaria.
Luganda: Omusawo yali yalwala omusujja.
Runyankore: Omuhaho, akaba arwaire omushwija gw'ensiri.
Acholi: Dakta onongo tye ka twoyo corona
Ateso: Edeka emuron eimidi.
Lugbara: Dakitari 'da ri dri ci azo malaria niri si.

English: May his soul rest in eternal peace.
Luganda: Omwoyo gwe guwummule mirembe.
Runyankore: Omwiisyo gwe guhuumure omu busingye.
Acholi: Kwo ne oywee ikabedo me kuc
Ateso: Isiengu loasuban emoyo ke toma aijar na mam edaun.
Lugbara: Le eri ma orindi ma li ava pari muke ria.

English: The deceased was against the church, so the people refused to attend his burial.
Luganda: Omugenzi yali tawagira kkanisa, n'olwekyo abantu baagaanye okumuziika.
Runyankore: Owaafiire akaba nahakanisa ekanisa, nahabwekyo abantu bakanga kwija aha kuziika.
Acholi: Latoo ni onongo tye ka lweny i kom kanica, ci dano okwero cito iyik mege woko
Ateso: Arai loatwan lo angeronoro keda ekanisa, aso mam itunga apotu olototo aronis ke.
Lugbara: Agu drapi 'da ni andra a'di 'di kanisa ma rua e'yoni dri o'bi eyi ga ki mu eri ma dra si.

English: The Christian was expelled from the church for demanding rent arrears.
Luganda: Omukulisitu yagobwa mu kkanisa lwa kubanja ssente z'obupangisa ezasooka.
Runyankore: Omukristaayo akabingwa omu kanisa , ahabw'okushaba esente z'obupangisa.
Acholi: Lacristayo ni ki ryeme pi kwayo pi cene me ot kama kanica onongo tye kapango
Ateso: Aponi irengiarai ekrisitayot okanisa kanu aingisit ikapun lu aipagisa.
Lugbara: Ba dro Kristiani 'da kanisaa si te erini robia ofele ku renti ruri aizu risi

English: The church needed an apologetic letter from the excommunicated Christian.
Luganda: Ekkanisa yali yeetaga ebbaluwa y'ekisonyiwo okuva eri omukulisitaayo eyagobebwa.
Runyankore: Ekanisa ekaba neeyenda ebaruha erikushaba okusaasirwa kuruga aha mukristaayo owabingirwe omu kanisa.
Acholi: Kanica onongo mito waraga kibot la memba ma ki ryemo woko ni
Ateso: Akoto ekanisa aiwadikaet na aitironikin kanejai ekrisitayot.
Lugbara: Kanisa le ndra waraga truta aizu ni engazu Kristiani 'bani dro 'da vu

English: The Christian explained that he did not commit any crime when he demanded rent.
Luganda: Omukulisitaayo yanyonyola nti teyazza musango gwonna bwe yabanja ssente z'obupangisa.
Runyankore: Omu Kristaayo akashoborora ngu taine kihagaro ekiyakozire obu yashabire esente z'obupangisa.
Acholi: La cristayo owaco ni en pe otimo bal mo ikare ma openyo pi cene me pango kabedo kibot kanica
Ateso: Abu ekrisitayot otema ebe mam nges ibore ediakarit ne engisia ngesi ikapun.
Lugbara: Kristiani 'da kini i eza e'yo ku ini robia renti ruri aizu risi

English: The clergy refused to pray for him before he was laid to rest.
Luganda: Bannaddiini baagaana okumusabira nga tannatwalibwa magombe.
Runyankore: Omwahure akanga kumushabira batakamuziikire.
Acholi: Lupwonye gu kwero woko cito ka lega pire ikare ma kitye ka yik
Ateso: Abu Ekimat onger alipakin nges erongo nges enuka.
Lugbara: Drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ga ki erini Mungu zi ko denga po'di 'ba saa eri ku si.

English: The church lost another member.
Luganda: Ekkanisa yafiridwa omukulisitu omulala.
Runyankore: Ekanisa ekafeerwa memba ondiijo.
Acholi: Kanica dok orwenyo lamemba mukene
Ateso: Abu ekanisa otwania ecie etunganan
Lugbara: Kanisa avi i ma 'ba azi dra dri dika.

English: He was also suffering from yellow fever.
Luganda: Era yali alwadde omusujja gw'enkaka.
Runyankore: Nawe akaba arwaire omushwija ogurikwetwa yellow fever.
Acholi: En onongo bene tye ka two i kom yellow fever
Ateso: Adeka ngesi da emusuja loidosoikini akonye.
Lugbara: Eri vu andra azo yellow fever ru ri vini ci.

English: The clergy will not tolerate people who are against the church.
Luganda: Omuwereza tajja kugumiikiriza bantu batayagaliza kkanisa.
Runyankore: Abaahure tibarikwija kugumisiriza abantu abarikurwanisa ekanisa.
Acholi: kanica pe biyee jo ma lwenyo i komgi
Ateso: Mam imakio ekotos itunga lu egiritos ekanisa.
Lugbara: Drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ngani mu 'ba a'di 'dipi kanisa be 'diyi ta ku.

English: The church congregation has lost six children since the beginning of the year.
Luganda: Ekkanisa effiriddwa abaana mukaaga okuva omwaka we gwatandika.
Runyankore: Abarikuteeranira aha kanisa, bafereirwe abaana bataano kuruga omwaka nigutandika.
Acholi: Lutino abicel ma lego ikanica ni aye gutoo imwaka ni
Ateso: Atwakiasi ikurisitayon lu okanisa idwe ikanyape agear ne ageunor ekaru.
Lugbara: Ba fipi kanisa 'di ma alea 'diyi avi ca anzi aro dra dri eli 'di ni e'dozu.

English: The lease for the land given to them is expired.
Luganda: Liizi y'ettaka gye baabawa yaggwako.
Runyankore: Emyaka y'obupangisa eibahairwe ahaitaka, ehweireyo.
Acholi: Kare ma kiminigi me tic ki ngom dong otum oo
Ateso: Acamanara na ijaikitere kesi alupok atub apak ke.
Lugbara: kokobi ꞌbani ndra fele yi dri angu yiniri ma eꞌyosiri ma eli agara.

English: The Italian missionaries failed to pay for the lease over the land.
Luganda: Abaminsane aba yitale baalemererwa okusasula liizi y'ettaka.
Runyankore: Ababuurizi b'engiri aba Italy, bakaremwa kushashura esente z'obupangisa ahaitaka.
Acholi: Lutuc jiri me lobo italy pe guculu pi ngom eni
Ateso: Apotu imisionarin luko Italy ipikosi aitac ikapun lu epagisatere alupok.
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo adroni ekupi Italianioru ꞌdiyi awini sende ofe kokobi ꞌbani fele yi dri angu yiniri ma eꞌyosi risi ku ye.

English: The church's failure to pay resulted in condemning the Christians.
Luganda: Ekkanisa okulemererwa okusasula kwe kwavirako okuvumirira abakulisitu.
Runyankore: Ahabw'ekanisa kuremererwa kushashura,abakristaayo bakakyenwa.
Acholi: Kanica pe culu pire okello cimo wang i kom lu cristayo
Ateso: Aponi itoronarai ikristayon kanu epikora ekanisa aitac ikapun.
Lugbara: E'yo kanisa ni o'bizu robia ofezu ti ri fe 'bani e'yo nzezu Kristiani eyi ma rua

English: The role of the church is to spread the gospel.
Luganda: Omulimu gw'ekkanisa gwa kusaasaanya njiri.
Runyankore: Omurimo gw'ekanisa n'okujanjaaza engiri.
Acholi: Tic pa Kanica obedo tucu jiri
Ateso: Aswam na ekanisa erai aiwe eijiri.
Lugbara: Kanisa ma azi eri e'yo bari munguniri erezu.

English: People want to rescue their land from the Church.
Luganda: Abantu baagala kununula takka lyabwe okuva eri ekkanisa.
Runyankore: Abantu nibenda kukokora eitaka ryabo kuruga omu mikono y'ekanisa.
Acholi: Dano mito gamo ngom gi kibot kanica
Ateso: Ekotosi alakun alupok kec aknejai ekanisa.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi le eyi ma nyaku ma ta mba engazu kanisa vu.

English: The parish council held a meeting to discuss the land dispute.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'omuluka katuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku nkaayana z'ettaka.
Runyankore: Orukiiko rw'omuruka, rukabugana kuhanuura aha ntongane zaitaka.
Acholi: Lutela me parish gubedo ki kacoke pi nyamo lok kom ngom eni
Ateso: Abu eparish council iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuka alupok.
Lugbara: Drice'ba parisi ni 'diyi 'ba mitingi agbatara gbazu ngiringiri nyaku nisi 'da ma dria

English: Those who were against building a new church were expelled from the committee.
Luganda: Abo abaali batakiriziganya na kuzimba kkanisa mpya baagobebwa ku kakiiko.
Runyankore: Abo abaabaire nibahakanisa okwombeka ekanisa nysa, bakabingwa omukakiiko.
Acholi: Jo ma gubedo ka jemo i kom yub me gero kanica manyen ki ryemo gi-oo ki I committee
Ateso: Ngul lu mam akotosi odukoi ekanisa loitetet aponi irengiarai okomiti.
Lugbara: Ba dro 'ba lepi 'ba ma si kanisa o'diru ni ku 'dayi Komiti ma alea risi te

English: People with names on the list were supposed to confess their sins.
Luganda: Abantu abaalina amannya gaabwe ku lukalala baali balina okwatula ebibi by'abwe.
Runyankore: Abantu, abu amaziina gaabo gahandiikirwe, bakaba bashemereire kweteisa ebibi byaabo.
Acholi: Dano ma onongo nying gi kicoyo piny omyero onongo gu ngut pi bal gi
Ateso: Itunga lu ajaas ikiroria kec apapula akotoi alosit aisilar arokisio kec.
Lugbara: Ba leta 'ba 'bani ru osile 'da eyi ma egaa eyi ma ezata.

English: The church will turn the disputed land into freehold.
Luganda: Ekkanisa ejja kukyusa ettaka ly'enkaayana erizze mu ly'ekyapa.
Runyankore: Ekanisa neija kuhayo eitaka eririkutonganirwa, omu mikonoya Gavumenti.
Acholi: Kanica obi weko ngom ma lara tye iye ni bedo meg gi pi kombedi
Ateso: Elosi ekanisa aijulakin alupok nu ejai engunget toma araun nuka Freehold.
Lugbara: Kanisa ni nga angu eꞌyo be ꞌda oja gamete ni eri fezu yi dri pilaru.

English: People should be informed about the significance of the budget in the country.
Luganda: Abantu balina okutegezebwa amakulu g'embalirira y'egwanga.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kumanya omugasho gw'embaririra omwihanga.
Acholi: Omyero ki rwee lwak i kom ber pa byek lim I lobo
Ateso: Ekot aitijenikin itunga ajokis na ebajet akwap.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma oni e'yo orodri bajeti ni kari ma alea ri ma dria

English: People would be able to demand accountability from the government.
Luganda: Abantu bandibadde basobola okubanja gavumenti embalirira.
Runyankore: Abantu bakabaire nibabaasa kushaba embaririra kuruga omu Gavumenti.
Acholi: Dano onongo twero penyo pi kor tic kibot gamente
Ateso: Ebeit ti itunga aipudakin aitijenikino nuka eswamae ka apugan.
Lugbara: ꞌBa yi gameteni aꞌi eꞌyo ecezu yi dri afa yini ꞌdiyi ma dria.

English: Citizens have a duty to monitor and regulate the operations of the government.
Luganda: Bannansi bayina omulimu gw'okulondoola n'okulungamya enkola za gavumenti.
Runyankore: Abatuuragye, baine omurimo gw'okureebuuza n'okumanya emikorere ya gavumenti.
Acholi: Anywali tye ki twero me neno ki doro tic pa gamente
Ateso: Ejaas itunga keda aswam na aimaniman ka aitikitik aswamisinei apugan.
Lugbara: Kari anzi eyi ma azi 'yeta ndundu gamete ni 'diyi onezu

English: People in west Nile should be informed about how and why they should pay taxes.
Luganda: Abantu mu West Nile balina okutegezebwa ngeri ki na lwaki balina okusasula omusolo.
Runyankore: Abantu ba West Nile, bashemereire kumanya ahabwenki baine kushashura emishoro.
Acholi: Lwak me west nile omyero ki niang gi i kom kit ma gitwero culo mucoro kwede ki kwene
Ateso: Ekot itunga luko west Nile aitijenikino aipone ka ibore ebeitor kes aitac isolosinei.
Lugbara: Le o'bi west Nile a 'diyi ma esu onita geri eyini ecozu musara ofezu azini sa'wa musara ofezu 'diyi ma dria ra

English: Uganda revenue authority has set up various conferences to educate people about taxation.
Luganda: Ekitongole ekikungaanya omusolo mu Uganda kitegeseewo enkungaana ez'enjawulo okusomesa abantu ku by'emisolo.
Runyankore: Ab'ekitongore ky'okushoroza omu Uganda, kitireho enteerane nyingi, okubaasa kwegyesa abantu ebirikukwata aha kushashura omushoro.
Acholi: Dul ma jogo mucoro I uganda oyubu kacoke mapol me pwonyo lwak i kom mucoro
Ateso: Etemoki Erionget Loka Ikapun airiamunun na asisianakinere itunga nuka isolosinei.
Lugbara: Amuti musoro trapi omvele Uganda revenue authority ruri e'do otita karakara eyi o'bi eyini imbata fezu musoro traza azini ofeza ma dria

English: People should give out their views on the taxation policies in the country.
Luganda: Abantu bayina okuwa endowoza zaabwe ku mpa y'omusolo mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kuhayo ebiteiso byabo, ebikwatiraine n'ebiragiro by'okushashura omushoro omwihanga.
Acholi: Dano omyero gulok i kom cik ma kwako mucoro ilobo ni
Ateso: Ekot itunga aijaikin aomisio kec nuikamunitos ainapeta nu esolo kakwap.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma fe eyi ma egata azita musara ofeza ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra.

English: People are not concerned about the regularities and irregularities in the tax policy.
Luganda: Abantu tebafaayo ku butuufu n'obutali butuufu bw'ennambika y'omusolo.
Runyankore: Abantu tibarikujunanizibwa aha bintu ebihikire n'ebitahikire omu biragiro by'omushoro.
Acholi: Dano pe tamo pi jami matye katime maber ki matye katime marac I cik man me mucoro
Ateso: Mam itunga epodokitos nu iswamas ejok keda nu iswamas erono kotoma ainapeta nu esolo.

Runyankore: Ebintu by'okukozesa omumashomer , nibiija kugabwa omumashomero ana, agarikushangwa omukicweeka kyamatemba ga Uganda.
Acholi: Jami me kwan magi kibi poko gi bot gangi kwan angwen I kumalo me uganda
Ateso: Eponio aikor iboro lu itwasamao osomero, osomeroi iwongon ko Nyakoi.
Lugbara: Ba mu afa ndundu ekile buku eyile kalamu eyi pie 'diyi awa sukulu azi su woko oruleru ri ma alea ni eyi ma alea.

English: Six other schools from that region will also benefit from the project.
Luganda: Amasomero amalala mukaaga okuva mu kitundu ekyo gajja kuganyulwa mu pulojekiti.
Runyankore: Amashomero agandi mukaaga, kuruga omukyanga ekyo, nago nigeija kugasirwa kuruga omu purogyekiti.
Acholi: Gangi kwan abicel mukene I twok piny enuni bene gubi nongo ber pa yub man
Ateso: Isomeroi icie ikanyape lu ari kangin epote kesi da aimedaun ko project kangol.
Lugbara: Sukulu azi azia engazu angu 'da ma alea ni eyi vini mu orodri esu otita 'da si indi

English: The distribution of these scholastic materials will begin next week on Tuesday.
Luganda: Ensaasaanya y'ebikozesebwa mu masomero ejja kutandika ssabbiiti ejja ku lw'okubiri.
Runyankore: Okugaba ebintu ebi eby'okukozesa omumashomero, nikwiija kutandika orwakabiri, esande erikwiija.
Acholi: Poko jami magi obi cake cabit manyen iceng ariyo
Ateso: Akorio na iboro kalu itwasamao kosomero egear osabiti ngol naiyareit.
Lugbara: Afa ndundu buku eyile kalamu eyi pie 'diyi ma awata ni e'do o'du iri si wiki drusirisi.

English: The organization has used huge sums of money to buy these materials.
Luganda: Ekitongole kikozeseza ssente nnyingi okugula ebintu bino.
Runyankore: Ekitongore, kikozesize esente nyingi ,okugura ebintu ebi.
Acholi: Dul meno otiyo ki cene madwong me wilo jami magi
Ateso: Etwasam erionget ikapun luipu noi kanu agwelia iboro lu.
Lugbara: Amuti 'da ayu robia angiri afa 'da eyi jezu

English: That will be a way of motivating young children to continue with their studies.
Luganda: Eyo ejja kuba ngeri y'okuzaamu abaana abato amaanyi okweyongera mu maaso n'emisomo gyabwe.
Runyankore: Ogwo nigwiija kuhinduka omuhanda gw'okwongyera abaana omuzimbwe , kugira ngu bagumizemu n'emishomo yaabo.
Acholi: Enuni obi bedo yoo acel me cuku cwiny lutino mede ki kwan
Ateso: Erai ngol eipone lo isinyikokitere idwe ainyikokite keda asioman kec.
Lugbara: Da ni mu aa geri azi anzi nyiri eyini ava fezu muzu onita ne drile ni i

English: With the help of these materials, children will attend school every day.
Luganda: N'obuyambi bw'ebikozesebwa bino, abaana bajja kugenda ku ssomero buli lunaku.
Runyankore: Abaana nibeija kwejunisa ebintu ebi, okugyenda ahaishomero buri zooba.
Acholi: Ki kony pa jami magi,lutino gubi bedo igang kwan labongo keng
Ateso: Keda agangat na iboro kalu, epote idwe alosenen osomero nginiparan.
Lugbara: Azakoma afa 'diyini risi, anzi eyi nga aci sukulua O'du driasi

English: An educated woman has the skills to be a better worker.
Luganda: Omukyala omuyigirize ayina obukugu okubeera omukozi asingako.
Runyankore: Omukazi orikuba ayegire, naaba aine emyoga y'okuhinduka omukozi murungi.
Acholi: Dako ma okwano tye ki diro me doko latic maber
Ateso: Aberu na esiomit ejaas keda acoa na araut eswaman na abeit.
Lugbara: Oku sukulu lapi rari vu ondua aa'zu azi'ba muke ni ru 'diyi ci

English: Children do better at school when their parents are involved in their academic lives.
Luganda: Abaana bakola bulungi nnyo ku ssomero singa abazadde baabwe bwe beetaba mu bulamu bwabwe obw'okusoma.
Runyankore: Abaana nibakora gye ahaishomero, abazaire baabo kubarikuba bejumbire omumagara gaabo g'okwega.
Acholi: Lutino kwano maber ka inen lunyodo gi timo gin mo
Ateso: Iswamaete idwe ejok osomero arai ingaranakinete auriak kec kesi kowai lo asioman.
Lugbara: Anzi eyi 'ye sukulua muke ndeni eyi ma tipika eyi ka ti su e'yo eyi ma Onita ni 'diyi ma alea indi ria

English: The district is supporting education to children in refugee communities.
Luganda: Disitulikiti eri mu kuyamba ku by'enjigiriza y'abaana mu bitundu by'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti, nehweera abaana omushonga z'eby'obwegyese bw'abaana omubicweeka ebirimu empungi.
Acholi: District tye ka miyo cwak i kom yub me kwan pa lutino pa luring ayella ki kama gibedo iye
Ateso: Igangit edisitrikt nuka aisisia na idwe kalu ejaas okabin.
Lugbara: Districti ni atita fe onita feza anzi nyiri ongulumu emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri.

English: There is economic competition over scarce resources.
Luganda: Waliwo okuvuganya kw'ebyenfuna ku bikozesebwa eby'ebbula.
Runyankore: Hariho okuhakahakana omubyobugaiga obutarikumara.
Acholi: Lara tye pi lonyo lobo manok matye ni
Ateso: Ejai abolobolo naepol kanu aiman ikapun naarai ikidioko iboro.
Lugbara: Abala ꞌbaza lonyi werea ꞌdiyi ma dria angiri

English: Some parents don't feel the importance of education.
Luganda: Abazadde abamu tebamanyi mugaso gwa kusoma.
Runyankore: Abazaire abamwe, tibarikumanya mugasho gw'eby'obwegyese.
Acholi: Lunyodo mukene pe gi neno ber pa kwan
Ateso: Auriak icie mam ejenete ajokis na asioman.
Lugbara: Tipika azi eyi ama ni onita ma orodri ku.

English: The parents are grateful for the support given to the children by the organisation.
Luganda: Abazadde basiimu nnyo olw'obuyambi okuva mu kitongole obuwereddwa abaana.
Runyankore: Abazaire nibasiima obuhweezi obwaheirwe abaana baabo kuruga omukitongore.
Acholi: Lunyodo tye ki pwoc pi kony ma dul eni omiyo ki lutino
Ateso: Iyalamasi auriak kanuka agangat na ejaikini erionget idwe.
Lugbara: Tipika 'da eyi tia awa'difo be tre atita amuti 'da ni fe anzi nyiri eyi dri ri si.

English: Parents should encourage their children to read more.
Luganda: Abazadde bateekeddwa okukubiriza abaana baabwe okusoma ennyo.
Runyankore: Abazaire bashemereire kwongyera abaana baabo omuhimbo bashome munonga.
Acholi: Lunyodo omyero ocuk cwiny lutino gi me mede ki kwan
Ateso: Ekot auriak aisinyikokin idwe kec aisiom noi.
Lugbara: Le tipika eyi ma fe eyi ma anzi eyi dri ava muzu lata be drile.

English: The town is full of shops selling clothes.
Luganda: Ekibuga kijjudde amadduuka agatunda engoye.
Runyankore: Orurembo, rwijwiire amaduuka agarikuguza emyenda.
Acholi: Town opong ki dukan ma cato bongi
Ateso: Ipu idukai otaun egwelanarete igoen.
Lugbara: Tawuni 'da ga dukani bongo ozipi 'diyisi tre.

English: There is a competition between shops selling new clothes and second-hand clothes.
Luganda: Waliwo okuvuganya wakati w'amadduuka agatunda engoye empya n'engoye ezambaddwamu.
Runyankore: Hariho okuhakahakana kw'amaduuka agarikuguza emyenda misya , naago agarikuguza eyenda eyakozesiibweho.
Acholi: Pyen tye ikin dukan ma cato bongi manyen ki dukan ma cato bongi ma ki tiyo kwede
Ateso: Ejai abolobol kiding idukai lu egwelanarete igoen luitetiak keda lumojonga.
Lugbara: Baka seza dukani bongo o'di eyi ozipi 'diyi ma eselea dukani ozaze ozipi 'diyi pie ci.

English: It's healthier to put on new clothes than second-hand clothes.
Luganda: Kya bulamu nnyo okuteekako engoye empya okusinga enyambalemu.
Runyankore: Nikirungi ahamagara gaawe okujwara emyenda misya , okusinga emyenda eyakozireho.
Acholi: Opore iyo me yot kom me ruku bongo manyen me kaka ma kitiyo kwede
Ateso: Ejok ainap igoen lu itetiak adepar lumojonga.

English: Second-hand clothes are cheaper.

Runyankore: Emyenda eyakozesiibweho, terikugurwa esente nyingi.
Acholi: Bongi ma ki tiyo kwedgi wel gi yot

English: A swimmer was disqualified from the race for how their swimsuit fitted their bodies.
Luganda: Omuwuzi yagibwa mu lwokaano olw'engeri by'awugirwamu gye byakwata omubiri ggwe.

Lugbara: Ba dro 'ba azi yi weza ma abala ni e'yo eri ma bongo yi wezu ri ni eri ombe ombe risi

English: Shops with wedding attires have been opened in their village towns.
Luganda: Amadduuka agayina engoye z'embaga gaguddwawo mu bibuga by'oku kyalo kyabwe.

Ateso: Angaar idukai lu egwelanarete igoen lu ewenere epeta otaunin lu ocaalo kec.
Lugbara: Ba zi dukani 'bongo bita kanisa ri ni 'diyi ozipi 'diyi calo eyi ma alea 'bo

English: These shops also sell office clothes and other accessories.
Luganda: Amadduuka gano era gatunda engoye za yafesi n'ebintu ebirala.
Runyankore: Amaduuka aga, nigaguza n'emyenda erikuza omu ofiisi hamwe n'ebindi.

English: The shops basically deal with women's wear.

English: There is a fashion show to launch these clothes in the town hall.

English: There will be a lot of eats, drinks and entertainment.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo eby'okulya, eby'okunwya bingi n'ebisanyusa.

Lugbara: Afa nyaza, afa mnvuza azini avita eyi mu GA tre

English: Women interested in participating in the fashion show should register with the woman leader.
Luganda: Abakyala abaagala okwetaba mu mwolese gw'emisono bateekeddwa okwewandiisa n'omukulembeze w'abakyala.

English: Farmers should be careful about what their animals eat in the dry season.

Runyankore: Abahingi n'abariisa bashemereire kwegyendesereza ahaby'okurya by'enyamaishwa zaabo omubwiire bw'ekyanda.

English: Because of feed poisoning, animals may go down and die suddenly.

English: There is a shortage of pasture for the cattle during the dry season.
Luganda: Waliwo ebbula ly'omuddo gw'ente mu kiseera ky'ekyeya.
Runyankore: Hariho eibura ry'obunyasi bw'amatungo,
Acholi: Tye nok pa lum pi dyangi ikare me oro

Ateso: kapak kana ewonitor akwap, etiono aitan ibaren.

English: The municipality leaders have failed to plan for the district.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ba Munisipaali balemereddwa okuteekateekera disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi b'endembo, baremirwe kuteekateekyera ndembo.

English: The district should be transparent in service provision.

Acholi: Town clerk omyero otii ki ada ka timo ticce
Ateso: Ekot etaun kilak aitodun eswamae lo ecai.
Lugbara: Le dricere omvele Town Clerk rurima eꞌda azi pamvu iniri ndiri erini azi ngaria.

English: People should bring receipts to make follow-ups.
Luganda: Abantu bateekeddwa okuleeta lisiiti okukola okugobererwa.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kureeta za risiiti kugira ngu habeho okukuratiriza.
Acholi: Dano omyero gubin ki receipt ka gitye ka lubu kor cene
Ateso: Ekot itunga ayaun arisitin kanu atupakinitor iboro.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma eji risiti eyi e'yo vuti obizu

English: There is a lot of corruption in Arua district.
Luganda: Waliwo obuli bw'enguzi bungi mu disitulikiti ya Arua.
Runyankore: Hariho obushumankuzi bwingi omu disiturikiti ya Arua.
Acholi: Tim camcana dwong tutwal Arua
Ateso: Epol ecamusana disitrikt loka Arua
Lugbara: Anyamgbolo ga districti Arua niri ma alea tre.

English: People involved in corruption will be charged according to the law.

Runyankore: Abantu abarikwejumba omubushumankuzi, nibeija kujunaanwa nk'oku amateeka garikuragiira.

Ateso: Itunga lu ejaas toma akiro nu ekorapusion ebeit aitepesen kwa ebalar ekisil.
Lugbara: Ba anyamgbolo azi ngapi 'diyi nga panga 'yeke ri esu azita palaa.

English: People use government projects for their own gain.
Luganda: Abantu bakozesa pulojekiti za gavumenti okufunamu ebyabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibakozesa purogyekiti za Gavumenti, okwetungira ebyaabo.
Acholi: Dano tiyo ki yub pa gamente me cobo miti gi kengi
Ateso: Itwasamaete itunga ipurojekts lu apugan kanu adumunia kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyi otita gamete ni 'diyi ayu eyi ma ngulupi ma orodri ni.

English: The anti-corruption unit arrested several people.
