Runyankore: Ekitongore ekirikurwanisa obushumankuzi, kikakwaata abantu baingi.
Acholi: Dul ma lwenyo i kom camcan omako dano ma dwong
Ateso: Abu atukot naitepegit ecamusana ikam itunga luipu.
Lugbara: Ba azi nga'ba a'di 'dizu e'yo anyamgbolo niri be 'diyi obi 'ba karakara eyi

English: People should uphold the ethics of public administration.
Luganda: Abantu bayina okusitula enneeyisa y'okuweereza abantu.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kukuratira emitwarize ehikire omukwebembera abandi.
Acholi: Dano omyero gubed ki woro i kom dog tic gi
Ateso: Ekot itunga aikeun loajokan lo oyapesin apugan.
Lugbara: Le oꞌbi yi ma obi azita ongulumu ma dricezuri ma vuti.

English: The district chairman of Arua is incompetent.
Luganda: Omukulu wa disitulikiti ya Arua talina busobozi.
Runyankore: Mukuru w'entebe omu disiturikiti ya Arua, taine ekyarikubaasa.
Acholi: Won kom me Arua district peke ki kero me tic maber
Ateso: Echairman lo edistirct lo Arua mam itolosi aswam ke ejok.
Lugbara: Distrikiti ambo Arua niri nini azi caku

English: The government has provided income to the refugees to engage in Agricultural production.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewadde abanoonyiboobubudamu ensimbi okwenyigira mu byobulimi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ehereize empungi esente, kugira ngu bejumbe omumirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo cene bot luring ayella wek okony gi I pur
Ateso: Ejaiki apugan ikerai ikapun kanu akoru.
Lugbara: Gamete fe Robia emunyale eyini 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi 'yezu.

English: The government should properly plan for the refugees.
Luganda: Gavumenti eteekeddwa okutegekera obulungi abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, eshemereire kutebekanisiza kurungi empungi.
Acholi: Gamente omyero oyube maber pi luring ayela
Ateso: Ekot apugan aitemonokin ejok nuka ikerai.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma o'ba otita kililiru 'diyi emunyale eyini

English: The government has provided funds for accommodating the refugees.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewaddeyo obuyambi okubeezaawo abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, ehereize sente ez'okureeberera empungi.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo cene pi gwoko luring ayela
Ateso: Ejaiki apugan ikapun kanu aidaria ikerai.
Lugbara: Gamete fe robia 'bani emunyale eyini angu aa'zu 'diyi fezu.

English: Refugee leaders have been involved in the planning process.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'abanoonyiboobubudamu beetabye mu nkola z'okuteekateka.
Runyankore: Abarikukurira empungi, bejumbire omumurimo gw'okukora enteekateeka.
Acholi: Lutela pa luring ayela kube tye ikare me yub eni
Ateso: Engarenok lu ikerai ejaas lem nuka aitemonokin.
Lugbara: Ba su drice'ba emunyale eyini 'diyi e'yo Otita ni 'diyi ma alea indi

English: Government has provided refugees with beans and cassava seeds to engage in Agricultural production.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewadde abanoonyiboobubudamu ensigo z'ebijanjalo ne mawongo okwenyigira mu byobulimi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, ehereize empungi embibo y'ebihimba na muhogo kugira ngu bejumbe omuby'obuhingi .
Acholi: Gamente omiyo kodi muranga ki gwana ki luring ayella wek gutim pur
Ateso: Ejaiki apugan ikerai emaroge ka emuogo kanu akoru.
Lugbara: Gamete fe emunyale eyini ori osu azini gbanda ni 'diyi si eyini ani ecozu agirikica 'yezu indi beni.

English: Farmers have been equipped with skills and knowledge to manage farming activities.
Luganda: Abalimi baweereddwa obukugu n'amagezi mu kukwasaganya emirimu gy'obulimi.
Runyankore: Abahingi babangwirwe n'emyoga ,oteireho n'amagyezi g'okukora emirimo y'obuhingi.
Acholi: Kimiyo ngec ki lupur me timo tic gi
Ateso: Ejaikin akoriok acoa na ipedorete aitolosio aswamisinei nuka akoru.
Lugbara: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi esu onita azini ondua geri ndundu eyini ecozu e'yo amvu 'yaza ni 'diyi ma azakozu 'diyi ma dria

English: The Ministry of Agriculture will verify and supply planting materials.
Luganda: Minisitule y'eby'obulimi n'obulunzi ejja kukakasa n'okugaba ebikozesebwa mu kusimba.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'obuhingi, neija kuhamya kandi egabe embibo y'okubyara.
Acholi: Ministry me Pur obi ngiyo rwom me jami tic me pur ka obi mede anyim poko ki lupur
Ateso: Ebuni erionget loka akoru airereor ka aikor iboro.
Lugbara: Okalamvu agirikicaniri ni nga afa ꞌbani ori sazu ꞌdiyi andri yi onyiru yari nezu azini eri nga yi awani.

English: The government aims at improving the livelihoods of refugees.
Luganda: Gavumenti egenderera okulongoosa obulamu bwa banoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti negyenderera okwimusya omutindo gw'emituurire y'empungi.
Acholi: Gamente tye ki miti me yubu rwom me kwo pa luring ayella
Ateso: Ejai apugan akapakin aitojokar aijar naka ikerai.
Lugbara: Gamete 'ba asi geri emunyale eyini aa'zu muke ri edezu.

English: Wetlands should not be destroyed.
Luganda: Entobazi tezirina kusaanyizibwawo.
Runyankore: Ebisharara tibishemereire kushishwa.
Acholi: Omyero pe ki bal kabedo ma obedo dago dago
Ateso: Mam ekoto amunar iswama.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma eza angu yi ru 'diyi ku.

English: Government has provided funds to support refugee farmers and vocational skills for the refugees.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewaddeyo ensimbi okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu abalimirunda n'obukugu mu by'emikono eby'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumentieheireyo sente ezokuhwera empungi omumirimo y'okuhinga n'okutunga emyoga y'eby'emikono.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo cene me konyo luring ayela me lupur ki bene miyo ngec me tic cing bot gi
Ateso: ejaiki apugan ikapun kanu aigangia ikerai lu eraas akoriok ka acie aitutuonoro kanuka ikerai.
Lugbara: Gamete fe robia atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba emunyale eyi ru 'diyini tualu onita afa edele drisi 'diyi ri be.

English: The local people are optimistic about hosting the refugee communities.
Luganda: Abantu b'ekitundu basuubira birungi mu kusenza abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omubyaro, baine amasiko omunkora y'okutuura hamwe n'empungi.
Acholi: Lwak ma tye inget kama luring ayella bedo iye gitye ki miti madit i komgi
Ateso: Ikulepek akwap ejenete nuka aijaun ikerai.
Lugbara: Angu eipi ayikosi angu fezu emunyale eyini

English: The ministry of agriculture should provide refugees with the best seed varieties.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi eteekeddwa okuwa abanoonyiboobubudamu ensigo ez'enjawulo ennungi.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eshemereire kuheereza empungi embibo z'okubyara ezirikukirayo oburungi.
Acholi: Ministry me pur omyero omi kodi ma beco bot luring ayela
Ateso: Ekot erionget loka akoru aijaikin ikerai ikinyom luejokuka.
Lugbara: Le okalamvu agirikica niri ma fe emunyale eyini ori ndundu ala ndeni 'diyi.

English: The refugees should engage in agriculture to get something to eat.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bateekeddwa okwenyigira mu bulimi n'obulunzi okufuna eky'okulya.
Runyankore: Empungi zishemereire kwejumba omuby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, babaase kutunga ekyokurya.
Acholi: Luring ayela omyero gucak puru cam wek gunongo gin mo me acama
Ateso: Ekot ikerai alomar akiro akoru kanu adumun inyamat lu enyamio.
Lugbara: Le emunyale eyi ma 'ye e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi eyini ani ecozu nyaka esuzu nyazaru beni.

English: The government has provided ten kilograms of maize to each person.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewadde buli muntu kilo kkumi eza kasooli.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ehereize buri muntu kiro ikumi z'ebicoori.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo kilo apar me anywagi bot ngat acel acel
Ateso: Ejaiki apugan ikiloi ikany lu ekirididi kanginitunganan.
Lugbara: Gamete awa kaka kilo mudri 'ba alu alu ni.

English: The government should try to maintain the amount of food supply towards refugees.
Luganda: Gavumenti eteekeddwa okugezaako okukuuma omuwendo gw'emmere gw'esaasaanya eri abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, eshemereire kureebangu yaaguma neegabira empungi omuhendo gw'eby'okurya ogurikwingana.
Acholi: Gamente omyero pe odwok piny rwom me cam ma poko bot luring ayella
Ateso: Ekot apugan atamakin akoranakin etiai lopo inyamat kangul nejaas ikerai.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma o'bi nyaka 'bani fele emunyale eyini ri ma omgbo ma tambazu angu aluria

English: Refugees do not have enough food to sustain their lives.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu tebalina mmere emala kubeezaawo bulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu empungi, tibaine by'okurya ebirikumara kubabaisaho.
Acholi: Luring ayela pegitye ki cam ma oromo
Ateso: Emamete ikerai inyamat lu edolitos kanu ajaria.
Lugbara: Emunyale eyini nyaka cani eyini ani ecozu eyi ma edri ta mbazu ku.

English: Are you an orphan?
Luganda: Oli mulekwa?
Runyankore: Ori efuuzi?
Acholi: Ibedo latin kic?
Ateso: Irai ijo ikoki?
Lugbara: Mi emvua ni?

English: The government needs to provide enough water for domestic use and agricultural purposes.
Luganda: Gavumenti yetaaga okuwa amazzi agamala okukozesebwa awaka ne mu nsonga z'obulimi n'obulunzi
Runyankore: Gavumenti, eshemereire kuheereza amaizi agarikumara kukozesa omumaka hamwe n'omumirimo y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Gamente omyero onen ni pi tye ma oromo pi tic paco ki pur
Ateso: Ekot apugan aijanakin akipi edolitos kanu aitwasam ore ka akorio.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma fe yi ma omgbo capira 'diyi ayuzaru akua azini agirikica ni.

English: The government will provide farmers with drought-resistant crops.
Luganda: Gvaumenti ejja kuwa abalimi ebirime ebitakosebwa kyeeya.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neija kuheereza abahingi,embibo erikugumira ekyanda.
Acholi: Gamente obi poko kodi ma dong kadi wa ikare me oro
Ateso: Ekot apugan aijaikin akoriok ikorion lu ikanyete akolong.
Lugbara: Gamete ni mu 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ni ori 'wipi etuka si ku 'diyi awa.

English: Teachers in Arua lack the competence to provide education services.
Luganda: Abasomesa mu Arua tebalina maanyi kuwa buweereza bw'ebyenjigiriza.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa omuri Arua, tibatendekirwe kurungi okubaasa kuheereza omumirimo y'obwegyese.
Acholi: Lupwonye ma tye Arua gipeke ki kero me tic maber
Ateso: Isisianakinak luko Arua emamiatatar keda aisisianakin na abeit.
Lugbara: Imba'ba Arua 'diyi ma omgbo onita muke ri fezu ri cani ku

English: Students in primary schools are not performing very well.
Luganda: Abayizi mu masomero ga pulayimale tebakola bulungi nnyo.
Runyankore: Abeegi, omumashomero ga puraimare, tibarikukora gye.
Acholi: Lutino kwan ma I primary pe gity ka timo maber
Ateso: Idwe lu osomeroi luka epuraimare mam iswamaete ejok.
Lugbara: Sukulu anzi primaria 'diyi aga ki ni muke ku.

English: Teachers have failed to come up with the necessary mechanisms to improve education services.
Luganda: Abasomesa balemeddwa okujja n'enkola ez'etagisa okutumbula obuweereza bw'ebyenjigiriza.
Runyankore: Abegyesa tibabaasize kurugayo n'enkora nungi y'okubaasa kwimusya omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese.
Acholi: Kati ki yoo maber me pwony ongayo lupwonye-oo
Ateso: Epikosi isisianakinak aitolomun ewai lo ikeunet ewai loka asioman.
Lugbara: Imba'ba eyi o'bi geri onita otuzu 'diyi esu ti

English: Teachers equipped students with skills and knowledge.
Luganda: Abasomesa baawa abayizi obukugu n'okumanya.
Runyankore: Abegyesa, bakabangura abeegi n'emyoga hamwe n'obwengye.
Acholi: Lupwonye gu miyo ngec ki lutino
Ateso: Apotu isisianakinak oremokisi idwe aitutuoro keda acoa.
Lugbara: Imba'ba eyi fe sukulu anzi eyini onita azini ondua e'yo ndundu 'yezu 'diyi

English: People need to be educated about the significance of education.
Luganda: Abantu beetaga okusomesebwa ku bulungi bw'okusoma.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kwegyesibwa kugira ngu bamanye omugasho gw'obwegyese.
Acholi: Dano omyero ki pwony gi i kom ber pa kwan
Ateso: Ekotos itunga aisisianakino nuikamunitos ajokis naka aisisia.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma esu imbata orodri onita ni 'diyi ma dria ra.

English: Teachers should be committed to working to improve the quality of education.
Luganda: Abasomesa bateekeddwa okwewaayo okukola okulongoosa omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa bashemereire kukunda kukora, babaase kwimusya omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese.
Acholi: lupwonye omyero guket cwiny gi me tic pi ilo malo rwom me kwan
Ateso: Ekot isisianakinak arimarite aswam kec kanu aikeun adoketait na asioman.
Lugbara: Le imba'ba eyi ma 'ba asi azi eyini ri ma dria Onita ma omgbo otuzu.

English: The leaders informed teachers to ensure career guidance and lesson planning.
Luganda: Abakulembeze baategeeza abasomesa okufaayo ku kulambika abayizi ku mirimu n'okuteekateeka entabula y'essomo.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi bakamanyisa abegyesa ,okureeba ngu bahabura abeegi emishomo eibashemereire kutwara hamwe n'okutebekanisa ebibarikwenda kwegyesa.
Acholi: Lutela gu niango lupwonye me konyo lutino ngeyo ngo ma gimito bedo ki yubu pwonye gi maber
Ateso: Apotu engarenok olimokisi isisianakinak awanyun ebe ericitos kesi aswam kec ka aitemonokin ilosi aisisianakin.
Lugbara: Drice'ba eyi ai imba'ba eyi nezu ra kini eyi sukulu anzi eyini imbata fe afa eyini lezu ecazu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ru 'diyi ma dria dika eyi ma kilasi eyi otuzu

English: Leaders and school management should work together to achieve good performance.
Luganda: Abakulembeze n'akakiiko okaddukanya essomero bateekeddwa okukolera awamu okufuna enkola ennungi.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi hamwe n'obukiiko oburikureeberera amashomero, bashemereire kukorera hamwe, okureeba ngu abeegi baakora gye.
Acholi: Lutela ki wegi gangi kwan omyero gutii kacel pi nongo adwoki me pwonye mabeco
Ateso: Ekot engarenok ka eyaitene lo esomero aswam nepepe kanu aikeun asioman.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba eyi ma nga azi tualu ambo sukulu eyini 'diyi pie agata muke 'diyi esuzu

English: Children should be well fed to be attentive in class.
Luganda: Abaana bateekeddwa okuliisibwa obulungi okussaayo omwoyo mu kibiina.
Runyankore: Abeegi bashemereire kurya kurungi, kugira ngu bagume bahurikiize omu kibiina.
Acholi: Omyero ki pit lutino maber wek guket cwinygi iot kwan
Ateso: Ekot idwe aitan ejok tetere epupete ejok.
Lugbara: Le anzi nyiri eyi ma nya nyaka muke eyini ani ecozu asi 'bazu kilasia ra beni.

English: The schools should provide pupils with something to eat.
Luganda: Amasomero gateekeddwa okuwa abayizi ekyokulya.
Runyankore: Amashomero gashemereire kuheereza abeegi ekyokurya.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero gumi ki ki lutino gin acama
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi aijanakin idwe iboro lu enyamete.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma fe sukulu anzi eyini afa nyaza ci.

English: Some schools failed to produce a single first grade.
Luganda: Amasomero agamu gaalemererwa okufulumya omuyizi n'omu ayitidde mu ddala erisooka.
Runyankore: Amashomero agamwe tigarabaasize kutungayo gureedi y'okubanza emwe.
Acholi: Gangi kwan mukene pe gunongo first grade
Ateso: Apotu isomeroi icie ipikosi adumun eguredi losodit.
Lugbara: Sukulu azi eyi ofu anzi gradi aluzuri ma alea kuye

English: The schools should involve parents and learners in the planning process.
Luganda: Amasomero gateekeddwa okuteeka abazadde n'abayizi mu nkola y'okuteekateeka.
Runyankore: Amashomero gashemereire kutwariramu abazaire n'abeegi omu nteekateeka zaago.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero guti ki tam pa lutino ki pa lunyodo ikare me kati ki yub
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi aiswamanar auriak ka idwe kowai lo aitemonokin nu ebeit aswam.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma su tipika eyi sukulu anzi eyi pie e'yo otita ni 'diyi ma alea indi

English: The parents should directly get involved in the learner's performances.
Luganda: Abazadde bateekeddwa okwetaba butereevu mu nkola y'abayizi.
Runyankore: Abazaire bashemereire kuba nibamanya emyegyere y'omwana.
Acholi: Lunyodo omyero guribe ikonyo dongo pa lutino gi igang kwan
Ateso: Ekot auriak ajaut toma akiro nuikamunitos eswamae lo esisiak.
Lugbara: Le tipika eyi ma su eyi e'yo anzi eyi ma agata ni 'diyi ma alea indi

English: Students should be sensitized about the significance of education in their lives.
Luganda: Abayizi balina okumanyisibwa ku mugaso gw'okusoma mu bulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abeegi bashemereire kuhutuurwa ahamugasho gw'obwegyese omumagara gaabo.
Acholi: Omyero ki niang lutino i kom ber pa kwan ikwo gi
Ateso: Ekot esisiak aicor nuikamunitos ajokis na asioman kaijar kec.
Lugbara: Le sukulu anzi eyi ma esu imbata orodri onita ni eyi ma edri ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra.

English: The district officials look at providing enough food and quality education.
Luganda: Abakungu ba disitulikiti batunuulira kubaga emmere emala n'okusoma okw'omutindo.
Runyankore: Abakungu aha disiturikiti, bashemereire kuta omutima ahakuheereza abaana ebyokurya ebirikumara, hamwe nokutaho omutindo murungi gw'ebyobwegyese.
Acholi: Lutic me district miti gi tye me poko cam ki neno ni rwom me kwan tye malo
Ateso: Eteete eswamak luko disitrikt ewai lo ijanakinet inyamat lu edolitos ka asioman na abeit.
Lugbara: Azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi le nyaka ecopi capira ri fezu tualu onita muke ri be

English: The district has transferred inconsistent teachers from the district.
Luganda: Disitulikiti eggye abasomesa abakola obubi mu disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ehindwiire abegyesa abarikukira kwosha munonga batarikuhamira ahamirimo yaabo.
Acholi: District okobo lupwonye ma peke ka tic maber
Ateso: Ejula edisitrikt isisianakinak lu mam iswamaete ejok nenicie.
Lugbara: Distrikiti oja imba'ba ecopi azi ngapi muke ku 'diyi engazu distrikiti 'da ma alea risi te

English: The parliamentarian was charged with unlawful disappearance from police custody.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yavunaaniddwa ogw'okuva mu kaduukulu ka poliisi nga tagoberedde mateeka.
Runyankore: Omuny'eishengyero akajunanwa omushango gw'okubura omukaduukuru ka poriisi ateine rusa.
Acholi: Ki moro adot me me lwi woko ki ot buc pa abili iwi lamember me parliament
Ateso: Aponi itepeseni emeeba loka airabet kanu aisi kopolis.
Lugbara: Ba ombe azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da erini apazu polisi eyi ma dria risi rukusa kokoru risi

English: The parliamentarian was charged after being arrested.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yavunaaniddwa oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa.
Runyankore: Omuny'eishengyero akajunanwa ahanyima y'okukwatwa.
Acholi: Ki moro adot i kom inge make
Ateso: Aponi itepesenai emeeba loka airabet akaulo na ekamunere.
Lugbara: Ba ombe azita paliamenti ni 'da 'bani eri bizu 'bo ri ma vutia

English: Various people were arrested after stoning the presidential motorcade.
Luganda: Abantu ab'enjawulo baakwatibwa oluvannyuma lw'okukuba amayinza emmotoka za pulezidenti.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi bakajunanwa ahanyima y'okuteera emotoka z'omwebembezi weihanga amabaare.
Acholi: Kimako dano mapol ikare ma kicelo mutoka pa ladit lobo
Ateso: Aponi ikamai itunga luegelegela kanu aibiribir imotokan lokapolon akwap.
Lugbara: Ba obi 'ba karakara eyi polisia 'bani purezidenti ma mutukari vizu onisi 'bo ri ma vutia.

English: The police should handle citizens with care.
Luganda: Poliisi erina okukwata abatuuze n'obwegendereza.
Runyankore: Poriisi eshemereire kutwara kurungi abatuura gye, n'obwegyendesereza.
Acholi: Abili omyero omak anywali i yo maber
Ateso: Ekot ipolisin ayangarite itunga ejok.
Lugbara: Le polisi eyi ma aa kari anzi eyi be inzita si

English: The policemen arrested the member of parliament.
Luganda: Owa poliisi yakutte omubaka wa paalamenti.
Runyankore: Aba poriisi bakakwata memba weishengyero.
Acholi: Abili omako la member me parliament
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin ikamasi emeeba loka airabet
Lugbara: Polisi 'da eyi bi azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da

English: The parliamentarian will be charged in the courts of law.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti ajja kuvunaanibwa mu mbuga z'amateeka.
Runyankore: Omunyeishengyero naija kujunanwa omu kooti z'ebiragiro.
Acholi: Kibi cwalo la memba me parliament I court ka winyo adot matye i kome
Ateso: Eponio emeeba loka airabet aitepesen kadieket na ikisila.
Lugbara: Ba mu eri ji kotia duani ma drilea

English: People were informed to provide security for the members of parliament.
Luganda: Abantu baategezebwa okuwa ababaka ba paalamenti obukuumi.
Runyankore: Abantu bakamanyisibwa ngu bateho eby'okwerinda ahabw'abakiiki b'omwishengyero.
Acholi: Ki niango dano me miyo gwok ki lamemba me parliament
Ateso: Aponi olimokinai itunga aijaikin ayuara nejaas imeeban luka airabet
Lugbara: Ba ai o'bi eyi ageitema fezu azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyini

English: The court should grant the parliamentarian a court bail.
Luganda: Kkooti eteekeddwa okuwa omubaka wa paalamenti akakalu ka kkooti.
Runyankore: Kooti eshemereire kuheerezaomunyeishengyero ebaruha y'okumurekura.
Acholi: Omyero court oyee lega pa lamemba me parliament me aa ki ibuc kadi bed ni pwod pe ki ngolo kop i kome
Ateso: Ekot adieket aijaikin emeeba loka airabet abwoario.
Lugbara: Le koti ma fe rukusa 'bani azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da ofuzu polisia risi

English: The parliamentarian was charged and tried in Arua.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yavunaanibwa era n'agezesebwa mu Arua.
Runyankore: Omuny'eishengyero, akajunanwa kandi orubanja rwe rwahurirwa omuri Arua.
Acholi: Ki moro adot i kom la memba me parliament dok kicwalo I court Arua
Ateso: Aponi itepesenai emeeba loka airabet kosodete aipu emusago ko Arua.
Lugbara: Ba ji azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da kotia Arua dika 'ba ombe eri Arua

English: The parliamentarian pleaded not guilty before the chief magistrate's court.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yeewozaako obutaba na musango mu maaso g'omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu.
Runyankore: Omuny'eishengyero, akeehozaho nk'otaine mushango omu kooti y'omuramuzi omukuru.
Acholi: Langol kop onongo ni la memba me parliament onongo peke ki bal
Ateso: Mam aponi odumunai emeeba loka airabet adiakarit atubon lo adieket.
Lugbara: Azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da kini i awi e'yo 'bani i tozu 'da 'ye kuye

English: The member of parliament was granted a non-cash bail of fifty million.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yateebwa ku kakalu k'obukadde ataano ez'obutaliiwo.
Runyankore: Omuny'eishengyero akarekurwa na shiringi obukaikuru makumi ataano, ezitari za buriho.
Acholi: Lamemba me parliament ki yee ni omede ki wiyo lok i kom inyim langol kop ma nongo pe ibuc iwel me million pyerabic ma pe kome
Ateso: Aponi obwounai arai olacakinai emeeba loka airabet ka alimokin aitac imilionin akaisakany mere cash.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ofu memba kolosenini ꞌda arujoarisi silingi milioni kalitowi ꞌbani aje ofele kurisi.

English: The prosecutor advocated for strict bail terms.
Luganda: Omuwaabi yasabye akakalu akalimu obukwakkulizo obukakali.
Runyankore: Omuhababi wa gavumenti akamwehanangiriza ngu agume akuratire ebiragiro byokurekurwa kooti.
Acholi: Langol kop oloko i kom bedo ki cik matek ma doro kit me yee ki joo ma koko tye i komgi pe bedo ibuc
Ateso: Akoto lo ewosai ebe ijaikinai emeeba loka airabet iwaitin lu etionor abwounia.
Lugbara: ꞌBa azi ngapi makata ma alia omvele purosekiutaruri obi azita ꞌbani ꞌba ofuzu arujoarisi sendesiri ma vuti kililiru

English: The judge adjourned the case to another date.
Luganda: Omulamuzi yayimirizza okuwulira omusango okutuuka olunaku olulala.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi akongyezayo omushango ahaizooba erindi.
Acholi: Langol kop ojuku winyo lok meno naka wa inino mukene
Ateso: Abu atubon isiekik emusago itoni aparan acie.
Lugbara: Duani 'da edri kesi 'da ma o'du mba o'du nduni si

English: Arua taxi park will become irrelevant if there is consistency in shortage of power.
Luganda: Ppaaka ya Arua tejja kuba na mugaso singa enaagenda mu maaso nga teba na masannyalaze.
Runyankore: Arua taxi paaka , neija kureebeka nk'eteine mugsho, amashanyarazi kugaragyende omumaisho garikurugaho.
Acholi: Taxi Park me Arua konye bi doko peke ka ni mac mede ki rweny kuman
Ateso: Ebuni aswam amamun kotoma naedumunere amotokan nuka Arua arai inyikokit akim amamus.
Lugbara: Takisi paki Arua ri ni mu eca orodri koko e'yo aci ako ni 'di ka mu drile.

English: Taxi operators should create cooperative unions.
Luganda: Abavuzi ba takisi bateekeddwa okutondawo ebibiina by'obwegassi.
Runyankore: Abarikukora emirimo ya Taxi, bashemereire kukora ekibiina.
Acholi: Ludwo taxi omyero guyub dul me biacara ma ribo gi
Ateso: Ekot itunga lu atakisin adukun asosaitin.

Runyankore: Omwebembezi wa Disiturikiti, akeehakana ebyabaire nibigambwa kubi aharurembo.

English: The park will have a big shopping mall.

Lugbara: Angu ambo afa ozizu azini afa jezuri ni mu adri paki 'da ma alea ci

Runyankore: Minisita, niwe areije kuba omugyenyi mukuru eizooba eryo.

Luganda: Abaana mu byalo basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kusoma.

English: He urged the community to continue supporting the boys till they finish their studies.
Luganda: Yasaba abantu okwongera okuwagira abalenzi okutuusa lwe bamaliriza emisomo gyabwe.

English: The mother of the boys was grateful for the opportunity given.

Runyankore: Abazaire tibarikubaasa kushashura fiizi z'omwoojo omu siniya.

English: The village football team lost to the visitor's team last weekend.
Luganda: Ttiimu y'ekyalo ey'omupiira yawangulwa ttiimu engenyi ssabbiiti ewedde.

English: All the teams hold the sixth place in the table standings.

English: Proline football club is one of the best clubs in Uganda.

English: The football match ended in a draw.

English: An organization has confirmed to inject three million shillings into women's football.

English: The football team failed to reach the finals despite all efforts.

English: The teams are to play a loser's match tomorrow.

English: There are a lot of land grabbing cases in Uganda nowadays.

English: The piece of land is located near the airfield.

Runyankore: Eitaka eryo, nirishangwa haihi n'ekishaayi ky'endegye.

Ateso: Alupok ngun idunyasi keda esawe lo idegei.

English: The old man wants the government to compensate him for the land it took.

Runyankore: Omugurusi nayenda ngu Gavumenti emurihirire eitaka eri yatweire.
Acholi: Muzee ni mito ni gamente ocule pi ngom me ma gu kwanyo
Ateso: Ekot epolon apugan atacakin nges alupok nu abu apugan oyanga.

English: Police requested the family to vacate the land as early as possible.
Luganda: Poliisi yasabye famire eve ku ttaka mu bwangu ddala.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekashaba famire okuruga ahaitaka bukiri kare, nk'oku kirikubaasika.

English: We were not aware that part of our land belonged to the Airfield.
Luganda: Twali tetumanyi nti ekitundu ku ttaka lyaffe kya kisaawe kya nnyonyi.
Runyankore: Tukaba tutarikumanya ngu ekicweeka kimwe ahaitaka ryeitu, kikaba kiri ekyekishaayi kyendegye.
Acholi: wan onongo pe wangeyo ni but ngom wa tye pa joo me bar dege
Ateso: Mam iso ijeni ebe atutubet na alupok kosi eraas nu esawe lo idegei.
Lugbara: Ama nini ndra kini nyaku amavileri ma woko azi ndege pari niri ku.

English: When a building is marked, it's an indication that it's to be demolished.

Acholi: Ka inen kiketo alama i kom ot, enuni nyutu ni kibi turu-oo
Ateso: Karai igiritai aduketait, itodunit ebe elosio atiaikin kwap
Lugbara: ꞌBa ka alama ꞌba jo azini ma rua ci, ꞌda ece kini ꞌba mu eri andi te.

English: The government asked them to show proof of ownership of the land.
Luganda: Gavumenti yabasaba okulaga obukakafu ku bwannannyini ku ttaka.
Runyankore: Gavumenti, ekabashaba ngu boorekye obuhame ngu eitaka n'eryaabo.
Acholi: Gamente olego gi me kelo gin ma nyutu ni ngom meg gi
Ateso: Abu apugan olimok kes aitodun ajenanut na ilopet alupok.
Lugbara: Gamete ai eyi afa azi ecopi e'dapi ra kini eyi nyaku 'da ma ipika adaru 'diyi ri e'dazu

English: They have lived on this land since childhood.
Luganda: Babadde ku ttaka lino okuva obuto.
Runyankore: Batwiire ahaitaka eri kuruga omu buto.
Acholi: Gubedo ingom eni nicake I tino
Ateso: Eboyoto kesi alupok kanu agear editeu.
Lugbara: Eyi aa'ki nyaku 'da ma dria e'dozu mva si.

English: The government has finalized plans to compensate people affected by the airport construction.
Luganda: Gavumenti emalirizza enteekateeka z'okuliyirira abatu abaakosebwa okuzimbibwa kw'ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti yaaherize kukora enteekateeka z'okurihirira abantu abarabanisibwemu okwombeka ekishaayi ky'endegye.
Acholi: Gamente otyeko yub me culo joo ma orwenyo ngom gi pi yubu bar dege
Ateso: Adau apugan akapanakin kanu aitac itunga lu aponi ilongilongai kanu aiduk airport.
Lugbara: Gamete de otuta ꞌba ndege pari ꞌbani sileri ma eꞌyoni yi bizu ra ꞌdiyi ofezuri ꞌbo.

English: The land is one of the biggest assets our grandfather left us with.
Luganda: Ettaka kye kimu ku by'obugagga ebisingira ddala jjajja waffe omukyala bye yatulekera.
Runyankore: Eitaka nikyo kyobugaiga ekirikukirayo obukuru, eki shwenkuru yatusigiire.
Acholi: Ngom eni obedo gin ma dit loyo ma kwaro wa oweko wa kede
Ateso: Eraas alupok idiopet kotoma abar na abu papaakosi inyeikina iso.
Lugbara: Nyaku 'da lonyi ambo ndeni ama a'bi ni ndra ku amani 'diyi ma azi

English: Their father played a role in the political history of Uganda.
Luganda: Taata waabwe yakola omulimu mu byafaayo by'ebyobufuzi bya Uganda.
Runyankore: Ishe akakora omurimo muhango omuby'obutegyeki bwa Uganda.
Acholi: Baba Gi otimo tic madit I lok me cung iwibye I Uganda
Ateso: Abu papakec iswamate nuepolok noi kotoma akiro nukolo nuko Uganda.
Lugbara: Nyaku eri orodri amboru ama aꞌbipi yini kule amaniri ꞌi.

English: He asked the government to at least take a few metres of the land.
Luganda: Yasaba gavumenti waakiri ettwaleko mmita ntono ku ttaka.
Runyankore: Akashaba Gavumenti, ngu haakiri, atwareho mita nkye z'eitaka.
Acholi: En okwayo gamente me olotoo tero metres manok me ngom
Ateso: Abu ngesi olimok apugan ayangar imitai idis lu alupok.
Lugbara: Eri ai gamete ni cika lu mita azi eyi 'duzu were engazu nyaku 'da vu

English: We almost have nothing, and they want to take it from us.
Luganda: Kumpi tetulina kye tulina ate baagala kulitutwakako.
Runyankore: Haihi twine busha, kandi nibenda nibenda kutwihaho n'aku twine.
Acholi: Cok wapeke ki gin mokeken dok en manok ma odong ni bene gi mito tero ne kibot wa
Ateso: Isubit iso bala emamei ibore ejai da, konye ekotosi kesi ademar iso.
Lugbara: Ama vu afa azi adanisi yo te eyi le vini eri 'du ama vu risi te

English: The government chose this land as suitable for the location of the Airfield.
Luganda: Gavumenti yalonda ettaka lino ng'eddungi okussaako ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ekatoorana eitaka eri, ngu niryo rishemereire kuzaho ekishaayi ky'endegye.
Acholi: Gamente oyero ngom eni macalo kama opore pi yubu bar dege
Ateso: Abu apugan oseu alupok nu kwape aiboisit na ibecokino kanu esawe lo idegei.
Lugbara: Gamete pe nyaku 'di angu muke ndeni ndege pari ni ecozu aa'zu ri ru

English: The land is a remembrance of the former president of our country.
Luganda: Ettaka kijjukizo ky'eyaliko pulezidenti w'egganga lyaffe.
Runyankore: Eitaka n'ekiijusyo ky'owabaire ari omwebembezi wa Uganda.
Acholi: Ngom eni tye macalo nipoo i kom ladit macon me lobo wa
Ateso: Eraas alupok nu iyiitunitere lokolo
Lugbara: Nyaku 'diri purezidenti kari amavile 'dini oku ri ma e'yo egazu

English: The officials claim the land belongs to the government.
Luganda: Abakungu bagamba nti ettaka lya gavumenti.
Runyankore: Abakuru nibagira ngu eitaka n'erya Gavumenti.
Acholi: Lutic waco ni ngom eni pa gamente
Ateso: Ebalas eswamak ebe eraas alupok nu apugan.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'da eyi 'yo kini nyaku 'dari gamete ni.

English: We didn't get any answers about the allegations from the police spokesperson.
Luganda: Twetafuna kwanukulwa kwonna ku byogerebwa okuva ew'omwogezi wa poliisi.
Runyankore: Tituratungire ekyokugarukwamu kyona aha bigambo ebyarugire aha mugambirizi wa poriisi.
Acholi: Pe wanongo lagam mokeken i kom adot matye kibot lalok pa abili
Ateso: Mam iso apotu adumutu adio abongonokineta nuikamunitos nu abala eraban lo polis.

English: The officer didn't reply even when we tried to reach him through text messages.

Lugbara: Ba aa'pi 'dani ma azi gbi asikari 'da eyi ma aluri.

English: The police discovered the suspect's bow and arrow.
Luganda: Poliisi yazudde akasaale k'ateberezebbwa.
Runyankore: Abaporiisi bakajumbura omwambi nobuta bw'omusibe.
Acholi: Abili gunongo atero ma kitiyo kwede ni
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin odumutu ekojo edaran.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi esu agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ma 'ye azini gondia ra.

English: It is unclear why the suspect shot at the policeman.
Luganda: Tekinnategerekeka lwaki ateberezebwa okuzza omusango yakubye omuserikale.
Runyankore: Tikirikwetegyerezibwa ahabwenki omusibe yarashire omuporiisi.
Acholi: Pe ngene pingo ngati ocello abili
Ateso: Mam ecaete nu agumia edaran epolisit.
Lugbara: E'yo agu 'bani egale eza e'yo ri ni polisi 'da gbizu ri were ozizaru.

English: Police are gathering more evidence against the suspect.
Luganda: Poliisi ekyanonyereza ku gwe bateberezza okuzza omusango.
Runyankore: Abaporiisi bariyo nibongyera kurundaana obujurizi oburikurumiriza omusibe.
Acholi: Abili tye ka gamo caden madwong i kom ngo ma otime
Ateso: Ewutas ipolisin atukun ajenanut naepol kanu aitosa edaran.
Lugbara: Polisi yi éyo eti ondaria drile agu ꞌbani ega eza eꞌyori ma dria.

English: The community worked with police to capture the suspect.
Luganda: Abatuuze baakolaganye ne poliisi okufuna ateberezebbwa okuzza emisango.
Runyankore: Abaporiisi bakakorengana na poriisi, okukwata omusibe.
Acholi: Lwak gutiyo ki abili pi mako latin bal
Ateso: Apotu itunga iswamanaros keda ipolisin kanu aikamun edaran.
Lugbara: Ongulumu 'da nga azi tualu polisi eyi be agu e'yo ezapi 'da bizu.

English: The officer that was shot is now in good condition.
Luganda: Omusirikale e yakubiddwa essasi ali mu mbeera nnungi kati.
Runyankore: Ofiisa ou barashire hati arigye.
Acholi: Abili ma kicelo ni dong kwo ne petye ma rac
Ateso: Epolisit lo agumitai ejai aijar ke atamakin.
Lugbara: Polisi 'bani gbi 'da ma rua ecadi were muke 'bo.

English: The officer was transferred to the nearby hospital.
Luganda: Omuserikale yatwaliddwa mu ddwaliro ery'okumpi.
Runyankore: Ofiisa bakamutwara omwirwariro eriri haihi.
Acholi: Kitero abili ni iot yat matye cok
Ateso: Aponi oyangarai epolisit adekis na ayapie.
Lugbara: Ba oja polisi 'da arojo azi nduni ma alea.

English: The refugees were given food and shelter.
Luganda: Abanoonyi b'obubudamu baawereddwa emmere n'ewokusula.
Runyankore: Empungi zikaheebwa eby'okurya n'oburaaro.
Acholi: Kimoyo cam ki kabutu ki luring ayella
Ateso: Aponi ijaikinai ikerai inyamat keda neperon.
Lugbara: Ba fe emunyale 'da eyini nyaka azini angu lazu.

English: The community donated to the refugees living in the region.
Luganda: Abatuuze baagabye obuyambi eri ababundabunda ababeera mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Abantu bakahwera empungi ezaabaire ziri omukyanga ekyo.
Acholi: Lwak gumiyo jami ki luring ayella matye I kabedo gi
Ateso: Apotu itunga ajaikisi ikerai agangat katutubet.
Lugbara: Ongulumu eyi fe afa ndundu eyi emunyale aa'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.

English: Food was the major basic need provided to the refugees.
Luganda: Emmere kye ky'etaago ekikulu ekyaweereddwa abanoonyi b'obubudamu.
Runyankore: Empungi zikaba nizikira kwetenga eby'okurya.
Acholi: Cam aye pole kimiyo ki luring ayella
Ateso: Araas inyamat iboro lu apolok aponi ijaikinai ikerai.
Lugbara: Nyaka eri afa lele aa'zu edri ru okporu ndeni 'diyi ma azi 'bani fele emunyale eyini ri i.

English: They donated to the most vulnerable teams.
Luganda: Bawadde obuyambi eri tiimu ezisinga obwetaavu
Runyankore: Bakahwera tiimu ezaabaire zitarikwebaasa.
Acholi: Kimiyo cam ki joo ma onongo dong gitye magoro loyo
Ateso: Aponi igangakinai lu ajaasi erono noi.
Lugbara: Ba fe afa ndundu eyi amuti tambaza lepi ndeni 'diyi dri.

English: The old are considered more vulnerable than others.
Luganda: Abakadde batwalibwa okuba nga be basinga obutaba na mwasirizi okusinga abalala.
Runyankore: Abakuzire omumyaka nab'okwegyendesereza kukira abandi.
Acholi: Ludito kineno calo wai gi goro me loyo dano mukene
Ateso: Lu emojongitos kes lu ejaas erono.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba depi 'diyi ne 'ba tambaza lepi 'diyiru ndeni aga 'ba azi 'diyi.

English: Farmer groups will benefit from the donations.
Luganda: Ebibiina by'abalimi bijja kuganyulwa mu buyambi.
Runyankore: Guruupu z'abahingi, niziija kugasirwa omu buhwezi.
Acholi: Jami ma kimiyo ni obi konyo gurup pa lupur
Ateso: Epote igurupun lu akoriok aimedaun kotoma agangat.
Lugbara: Amuti 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini 'diyi nga mu orodri esu afa ndundu fele 'da eyi vu ra.

English: The farmer groups will receive agricultural support.
Luganda: Ebibiina by'abalimi bijja kufuna obuyambi bw'obulimi.
Runyankore: Guruupu z'abahingi niziija kutunga obuhwezi omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa
Acholi: Lupur gubi nongo kony me pur
Ateso: Epote igurupun lu akoriok adumun agangat na iboro kalu akoru.
Lugbara: Amuti 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni 'diyi ma atita agirikica niri esu ra.

English: It rains during the planting season.
Luganda: Enkuba ettonya mu biseera by'okusiga.
Runyankore: Enjura neegwa omu siizoni y'okubyara.
Acholi: Kot cwee ikare me pur
Ateso: Etepenenei kapak kana ewere.
Lugbara: Ozo ni 'di sa'wa ori sazu ri si.

English: The refugees will receive rice.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bajja kufuna omuceere.
Runyankore: Empungi niziija kwakiira omukyeri.
Acholi: Luring ayella kibi minigi mucele
Ateso: Apote ikerai adumun emuceri.
Lugbara: Emunyale 'dayi mu mucele esu.

English: The community thanked the donors for their support.
Luganda: Abatuuze beebazizza abagabi b'obuyambi.
Runyankore: Abantu bakasiima abagabi ahabwobuhwezi.
Acholi: Lwak opwoyo joo ma ominigi jami
Ateso: Apotu itunga isiyalamikisi luko ojokotau kanu agangat kec.
Lugbara: Ongulumu 'da fe awa'difo 'ba afa fepi 'dayi dri atita eyini fe risi.

English: Peaceful donation encourages other groups to help the refugees.
Luganda: Okugaba obuyambi okw'emirembe kusikiriza abantu abalala okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Okugaba omu busingye, nikuheereza guruupu ezindi omuhimbo gw'okuhwera empungi.
Acholi: Miyo jami iyo me kuc tyelo kor joo mukene me konyo luring ayella
Ateso: Aigangakin kotoma ajokis isinyikoni icie itunga da aingarakin ikerai.
Lugbara: Afa fele asianzu siri ni ava fe amuti azi 'diyini azakoma fezu emunyale eyini.

English: The refugees thanked God for sending donors to help them.
Luganda: Ababundabunda b'ebaziza Katonda olw'okubasindikira abagabi b'obuyambi okubayamba.
Runyankore: Empungi zikasiima Ruhanga, ahabw'okwohereza ab'okubahwera.
Acholi: Luring ayella gupwoyo gamente pi cwalo joo ma minigi kony
Ateso: Apotu ikerai imalata Edeke kanu aijukun luka ojokotau aingarakin kes.
Lugbara: Emunyale 'dayi fe Munguni awa'difo erini 'ba afa fe'ba 'diyi ma ti epezu emuzu eyi ma aza kozu risi.

English: The refugees said she now has food to feed her child.
Luganda: Ababundabunda baagambye kati alina  emmere ey'okuliisa omwana we.
Runyankore: Empungi zikagira ngu hati aine ebyokurya byokugaburira omwana we.
Acholi: Laring ayella ni owaco ni dong tye ki cam me pito lutino ne.
Ateso: Ebala aberu adiope ebe kwana ejaas ngesi keda inyamat lu itanis ikoku ke.
Lugbara: Emunyale 'da kini eri vu curu'do nyaka fezaru i ma mva ni ci.

English: A refugee said he will now be able to feed his family of six.
Luganda: Omunoonyiboobubudamu yagambye kati ajja kuba asobola okuliisa famire ye ey'abantu omukaaga.
Runyankore: Empungi ekagira ngu obwahati, neebaasa kuriisa eka y'abantu mukaaga.
Acholi: laring ayella owaco ni dong obi twero pito jo abicel ma I gange
Ateso: Abala ediop etunganan ebe kwana epedori ngesi aitan ekale ke lo itunga ikanyape.
Lugbara: Emunyale azi kini i eco di curu'do nyaka fe i ma familia 'ba be azia ri nira.

English: The refugee expressed his joy after receiving food.
Luganda: Omunoonyiwoobubudamu yalaze essanyu oluvannyuma lw'okufuna emmere.
Runyankore: Empungi ekooreka okushemererwa ahanyima y'okutunga ebyokurya.
Acholi: Laring ayella onyutu yom cwiny ne pi nongo cam
Ateso: Abu ekerait iyalamikin akaulo na adumun inyamat.
Lugbara: Emunyale 'da aa ayikosi erini nyaka esuzu 'bori ma vutia.

English: More members are encouraged to donate to the refugees.
Luganda: Bamemba abalala bakubiriziddwa okugaba obuyambi eri abanoonyiboobubudamu
Runyankore: Abantu abandi nibashabwa kugabira empungi.
Acholi: Ki cuku cwiny joo mukene me miyo jami ki luring ayella
Ateso: Itunga luipu isinyikokitai aigang ikerai.

English: The refugees have been affected by the coronavirus.
Luganda: Abanoonyibo'obudamu bakoseddwa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Empungi zinyangaraziibwe endwara ya korona.
Acholi: Two corona odiyo kwo pa luring ayella
Ateso: Etolitol ekorona ikerai.
Lugbara: Emunyale eyi esu candi azo korona nirisi ra.

English: The huge numbers make the refugee camp very vulnerable during coronavirus.
Luganda: Obungi bw'abantu bufuula enkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu okubeera mu katyabaga mu biseera by'akawuka ka kaolona.
Runyankore: Ahabw'okugira ngu empungi nibaba bari baingi kaampu, nibaba bari omu kabi kahango, k'okukwatwa endwara ya Korona.

Ateso: Enaba loepol noi lo ikerai ibwaikit kes ationis na aikatun ekorona.
Lugbara: Kalafe angiri 'diyi fe angu emunyale eyini aa'zu 'diyini ecazu okpo kokoru azo korona niri si

English: The donors will have to provide more than just the refugees' basic needs.
Luganda: Abagabi b'obuyambi bajja kugabira abanoonyiboobubudamu ebintu ebyetaagisa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo ebisukka kw'ebyo bye beetaaga.
Runyankore: Abahi b'obuhwezi baine kwongyera ahabintu ebi barikugabira empungi.

Ateso: Ekot lu ojokotau aigangakin ikerai keda iboro luipu
Lugbara: ꞌBa afa fe ꞌba ofe kokoru ꞌdiyi nga fe aga emunyale yini leleri ra.

English: Selected women will receive sanitary towels.
Luganda: Abakyala abalondeddwamu b'akufuna obuwero obukozesebwa mu nsonga z'ekikyakala.
Runyankore: Abakazi abamwe, nibaija kutunga sanitare paadi.
Acholi: Mon ma kiyero gi ni kibi minigi bongi ma konyo gi ikare me two dwe gi
Ateso: Angor nu eseunitai epote adumun ataulon.
Lugbara: Oku opeza 'diyi mu padi eyi esu ni

English: The nightguard shot a soldier.
Luganda: Omukuumi w'ekiro yakubye omujaasi essaasi.
Runyankore: Abakuumi b'ekiro bakarasha omuserukare.
Acholi: Lagwok kabedo me diwoo ni ocello lamwony
Ateso: Abu edaran lo akware ogum ekiarit.
Lugbara: Agu ageitema fepi inisi ri gbi asikari azi.

English: The residents handed the member to the police.
Luganda: Abatuuze bawaddeyo mutuuze munabwe eri poliisi.
Runyankore: Abatuuragye bakatwara memba aha poriisi.
Acholi: lwak gumiyo latim bal bot abili
Ateso: Apotu lu atutubet ikopakisi ipolisin edaran.
Lugbara: Ba aa'pi 'da 'diyi fe agu azi aa'pi 'dani polisi eyidri.

English: The officer was shot on the head.
Luganda: Omuserikale yakubiddwa essasi ku mutwe.
Runyankore: Ofiisa akateerwa eisasi aha mutwe.
Acholi: Kicelo abili iwiye
Ateso: Agumitai esilikalet akou.
Lugbara: Ba gbi polisi 'da eri ma drifa.

English: The police retrieved the weapon.
Luganda: Poliisi yazudde ekkisi.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekazoora ekikwato.
Acholi: Abili gunongo gin lweny ma gitiyo kwede
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin odumutu ejisoit.

English: They are not sure why the man shot the policeman.
Luganda: Tebannakakasa lwaki omusajja yakubye omuserikale essaasi.

English: The community was appreciated for the good work done.
Luganda: Abatuuze baasiimiddwa olw'emirimu emirungi gye bakola.
Runyankore: Abantu bakasiimwa ahabw'omurimo ogu baakozire.

English: The wounded soldier is now out of danger.
Luganda: Omusirikale eyatusibwako ebisago akubye ku matu.

Acholi: La mwony ma onongo awano dong kwo ne tye maber
Ateso: Epolisit lo ikangasitai ejai atamakin.

English: The wounded soldier will go for a head scan.
Luganda: Omujaasi alina ebisago wa kugenda akeberebwe omutwe.
Runyankore: Omuserukare owahutaaziibwe naija kugyenda bamute omu sikani y'omutwe.
Acholi: Ki bi menyo wii abili ma onongo awano ni
Ateso: Ebeit epolisit lo ikangasitai alosite kanu awanyanario akou.
Lugbara: Asikari bile esupi 'da ni mu acia arojoa 'bani ani eri ma drifa andrizu.

English: The community member shot the policeman in the head.
Luganda: Omutuuze w'omukitundu yakubye omuserikale essaasi ku mutwe.
Runyankore: Omuntu w'omukyanga akarasha omuporiisi omu mutwe
Acholi: Ngati ocelo abili iwiye
Ateso: Abu etunganan ogum epolisit akou.
Lugbara: Agu azi aa'pi ongulumu 'da ma alea ni gbi polisi azi drifaa.

English: He was shot while on curfew patrol.
Luganda: Yakubiddwa essasi nga ali mu kikwekweto kya kafiyu.

Acholi: Kicele i kare cawa opotoro
Ateso: Egumitai ngesi ejai aimaniman kapak na ekalitini.
Lugbara: Ba gbi eri sa'wa polisi eyini angu andrizu 'bani ani lezu o'bi eyi ma aciki kurisi.

English: The officer was referred to another hospital.

Ateso: Aponi aijukarai epolisit adekis acie.

English: They were not sure of who shot the officer.
Luganda: Babadde tebakakasa ani eyakubye omusirikale essasi.

Acholi: Pe gi ngeyo ngat ma ocelo abili
Ateso: Mam kesi ajenete yen agumi epolisit.

English: The shot soldier was not in critical condition.

Runyankore: Omuserukare ou barashire, akaba atari kubi munonga.
Acholi: Lamony ma kicelo ni pe tye marac tutwal
Ateso: Epolisit lo agumitai mam ajai erono.
Lugbara: Asikari 'bani gbi 'da eri onzi onzi ku

English: They decided to take his injury seriously regardless of what it looked like.
Luganda: Baasazeewo okutwala obuvune bwe nga nsonga nga tebafudde ku ngeri gye bufaananamu.
Runyankore: Bakasharamu kutwara obuhuta bwe nk'obw'amaani, oihiremu nk'oku bwabaire nibushushwa
Acholi: Gutero awano ma onongo ni macalo gin ma pire tek ka ineno kit ma onongo tye kwede
Ateso: Aponi oyangarai akangas ke kwape na arono noi araida ajai eipone lope ajaar.
Lugbara: Eyi 'du eri ma nya'biliko eyi okporu eyini ta tro e'dazu onzi onzi ku ra ti

English: The police are on ground to find out who shot the policeman.
Luganda: Abaserikale bali mu kunonyereza okuzuula ani yakubye munaabwe essasi.
Runyankore: Poriisi eriyo necondooza okumanya owarashire mutaahi waabo.
Acholi: Abili tye kayenyo nga ma otimo tim me cello abili ni
Ateso: Ejaas ipolisin aingicun yen agumi epolisit.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi aci a'di gbi polisi azi 'da ni yari ma eti ondaria .

English: He advised the community to take the curfew seriously.
Luganda: Yawabudde abatuzze okutwala kafiyu nga nkulu.
Runyankore: Akarabura abantu, okutwara eshonga za kafyu nk'ezamaani.
Acholi: En okwayo lwak me tero lok me curfew calo gin ma pire tek
Ateso: Abu ngesi icorak itunga ayangarite akiro nuka ekalitini kwape nuepolok.
Lugbara: Eri ai ongulumu eyi sa'wa 'bani lezu 'ba ma aciku ri 'duzu okporu.

English: The locals are advised to respect the curfew.
Luganda: Abantu ba bulijo basabiddwa okugondera kafiyu.
Runyankore: Abantu bahakyaro, okukuratira ebiragiro bya kafyu.
Acholi: Kilego lwak me woro cik me curfew
Ateso: Icorakitai itunga arimarite nuka ekalitini.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni imbata inzita fezu sa'wa 'bani lezu 'ba ma aciku ri ni.

English: The police arrested the man who sells bows and arrows.
Luganda: Poliisi yakutte omusajja attunda obusaale.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekakwata omushaija orikuguza obuta n'emyambi.
Acholi: Abili omako ngat ma cato atero
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin ikamutu etunganan lo agwelanari ikojoi.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi biki agu 'ye eyi ozipi gondia eyi beri ci.

English: The security team checked the policeman's health status.
Luganda: Abakuuma ddembe bekenenyezza bulamu bw'omuserikale.
Runyankore: Tiimu yab'ebyokwerinda, ekakyebera amagara g'omu poriisi okugabaire gari.
Acholi: Lugwok ber bedo gu neno yot kom laco ni
Ateso: Apotu lu ayuara olototo awanyun ejautene lo epolisit.
Lugbara: Amuti ageitema ni 'da eyi o'bi polisi 'da ma rua ala.

English: The suspect was taken to the police.
Luganda: Ateberezebwa okuzza emisango bamutute ku poliisi.
Runyankore: Orikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro, akatwarwa aha poriisi.
Acholi: Kicwalo ngat ma byek me timo bal i kome bot abili
Ateso: Aponi oyangarai edaran polis.
Lugbara: Ba ji agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da polisia.

English: The community was advised to use bow and arrows for the right reasons.
Luganda: Abatuuze basabiddwa okukozesa obusaale awasanidde.
Runyankore: Abantu bakahaburwa okukozesa obuta n'omwambi, ahashonga ezirikuba zihikire.
Acholi: Ki lego lwak me tic ki atero i yo maber
Ateso: Aponi olimokinai itunga aitwasam ikojoi koipone kalo ebeitor.

English: A few coronavirus patients were discharged.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona abatono baasibuddwa.
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba korona bakye, bakasiibuurwa.
Acholi: Lutwoo corona mogo ki kwanyo gioo ki ki I ot yat
Ateso: Aponi otwarai adekak icie luka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba ebipi adripi azo korona niri be 'diyi ma azi were ni eyi arojoa risi ra.

English: The patients were discharged from the hospital.
Luganda: Abalwadde baasiibuddwa okuva mu ddwaliiro.
Runyankore: Abarwaire bakasiibuurwa kuruga omwirwariro.
Acholi: Ki kwanyo lutwoo ki iot yat
Ateso: Aponi otwarai adekak adekis.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba ebipi adripi azoru 'dayi arojoa risi ra.

English: The patients are from another country.
Luganda: Abalwadde bava munsi ndala.
Runyankore: Abarwaire nibaruga omwihanga erindi.
Acholi: Lutwo ni giaa ki ilobo mukene
Ateso: Eraas adekak lu acie akwap.
Lugbara: Ba azoru 'dayi enga Kari azi nduni ma alea.

English: The hospital is managing the coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Eddwaliro likola ku balwadde b'akawuka ka ssenyigga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Eirwariro, nirikora aha barwaire ba korona.
Acholi: Ot yat tye ka tic i kom lutwo Corona
Ateso: Idari adekis adekak luka ekorona.
Lugbara: Arojo 'dani 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma ta mba.

English: Some patients were discharged from the hospital.
Luganda: Abalwadde abamu baasiibuddwa okuva mu ddwaliro.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abamwe, bakasiibuurwa kuruga omwirwariro.
Acholi: Lutwoo mukene ki kwanyo gioo ki iot yat
Ateso: Aponi otwarai adekak icie adekis.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba azi ebipi adripi azoru 'diyi ma azi eyi arojoa risi ra.

English: Five of the patients were truck drivers.
Luganda: Abataano ku balwadde babadde bavuzi ba bimotoka bi lukululana.
Runyankore: Bataano ahabarwaire, bakaba bari abavugi b'ebimoota ebihango.
Acholi: Lutwoo abic ikingi gubedo ludwo mutoka madongo
Ateso: Araas adekak ikany iderepan lu alorin.
Lugbara: Ba azoru 'da eyi ma towi ri eyi dereva Lorri eyini 'diyi.

English: Most coronavirus patients are from the community.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona  abasinga bavudde mu kitundu
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba korona abaingi, nibaruga omukyanga.
Acholi: Pol lutwo corona gubedo dano matye ikin lwak
Ateso: Adekak luipu araas lu eponitos otunga.
Lugbara: Ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma pari engazu ongulumu ma alea.

English: The number of patients will rise if not handled well.
Luganda: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde gujja kulinnya singa tebakwatibwa bulungi.
Runyankore: Omuhendo gwabarwaire niguza kweyongyera, baaba batabukwasire kurungi.
Acholi: Wel lutwo obi mede ka pegi neno loke maber
Ateso: Ebuni enaba lo adekak aiyatakin arai mam itingio ejok.
Lugbara: Ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tura 'ba ka e'yo nde ma aza ko kililiru ku ria.

English: Another patient was discharged today.
Luganda: Omulwadde omulala yasiibuddwa leero.
Runyankore: Omurwaire ondiijo yasiibuurwa erizooba.
Acholi: Gki kwanyo latwo mukene tin
Ateso: Aponi otwarai adekan ecie ilolo.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba azi ebipi adripi azoru ni andru ra.

English: It is getting harder to treat patients.
Luganda: Kifuuse kizibu okujjanjaba abalwadde.
Runyankore: Okuragurira abarwaire, kugyenzire nikuguma.
Acholi: Tye ka doko tek me tic i kom lutwo
Ateso: Elosi ationun amukian adekak.
Lugbara: Eri curu'do eca ewaru drile aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri.

English: There is not enough space to accommodate patients.
Luganda: Tewali kifo kimala wakukuumira balwadde.
Runyankore: Tihariho mwanya ogurikumara abazaire.
Acholi: Kabedo petye ma oromo me gamo lutwo
Ateso: Emamei apak na edolit kanu aiperikin adekak.
Lugbara: Pari cani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu ku.

English: The nurses do not have coronavirus protective equipment.
Luganda: Abasaawo tebalina bikozesebwa bimala mu kwetangira kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abanaansi tibaine bikwato by'okukoresa eby'okubarinda Korona.
Acholi: Lu nurse pe gitye ki jamo ma gwoko gi i kom nongo two corona
Ateso: Emamiatatar anasin keda iboro lu ayuara kanejai ekorona.
Lugbara: Nasi 'da eyi vu afa sule rua tambaza fepi azo korona nirisi 'diyi yo.

English: The hospital confirmed that the released patients were now well.
Luganda: Eddwaliro lya kakasizza nti abalwadde abasiibuddwa baabadde bawonye bulungi.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rikahamya ngu abarwaire abu basiibwiire, hati bari kurungi.
Acholi: Ot yat omoko ni lutwo ma ki kwanyo gioo ni kwo gi petye maber
Ateso: Abu adekis itigogongo ebe adekak lu aponi otwarai angaleutu.
Lugbara: Arojo 'da ai ra kini 'ba 'bani ofule ebipi adripi azoru 'diyi di curu'do muke.

English: The discharged patients will be followed up in case of any health changes.
Luganda: Abalwadde abasiibuddwa bajja kusigala balondoolwa okumanya ebibafaako.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abasiibwirwe, nibaza kubakuratirira ku haakugira ekyahindukaho aha magara gaabo.
Acholi: Joo ma ki kwanyo gi ni kibi bedo ka lubu kor gi me neno kit ma jami tye kwede
Ateso: Adekak lu aponi otwarai kes eponio atupakinit karai ejaunos aijulakineta.
Lugbara: Ba nga 'ba ebipi adripi azoru 'bani ofu arojoa si 'diyi ma vuti obira e'yo azi ka i e'da ria

English: The mayor requested the health facility to be kind to the patients.
Luganda: Omukulu w'ekibuga yasabye abasawo okubeera ab'ekisa eri abalwadde.
Runyankore: Meeya akashaba abairwariro okugirira abarwaire embabazi.
Acholi: Mayor okwayo joo me ot yat me mako lutwo i yo maber me woro
Ateso: Abu emeya ilipite adekis aitimit adekak.
Lugbara: Meya 'da ai azi'ba arojoa 'dayi aa'zu asi alasi 'ba azoru 'diyi be.

English: Coronavirus patients were isolated.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona baayawuliddwa.
Runyankore: Abarwaire b'endwara ya korona, bakashororwa.
Acholi: Lutwo corona kipoko gioo ki i kom lutwo mukene.
Ateso: Aponi ogitarai adekak lu ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba Co 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma esele 'ba azo korona niri koko 'diyi vusi

English: The health team was commended for a job well done.
Luganda: Abasawo baasiimiddwa olw'omulimu omulungi gwe bakoze.
Runyankore: Tiimu yabashaho, ekasiimwa ahabw'omurimo ogubaakozire gye.
Acholi: ki pwoyo dul pa lutic yoto kom pi tic maber ma gutimo
Ateso: Aponi ituroi eswamak lu adekis kanu aswam kec.
Lugbara: Ba fe amuti dakitari eyini 'da dri awa'difo azi onyiru eyini 'ye risi.

English: The government promised to support medics.
Luganda: Gavumenti yasubizza okukwatirako abasawo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ekaraganisa kuhwera abashaho.
Acholi: Gamente Ocike me konyo lutic yoto kom
Ateso: Abu apugan isumunite aigang eswamak lu adekis.
Lugbara: Gamete ti dri atita fezu azi'ba arojoa 'diyi dri.

English: Successfully treated patients were discharged.
Luganda: Abalwadde abawoonye baasiibuddwa.
Runyankore: Abarweire abaraguriirwe gye, bakasiibuurwa.
Acholi: Lutwo ma gucang ki kwanyo gi woko
Ateso: Adekak lu emukeun aponi otwarai.
Lugbara: Ba ofu 'ba ebipi adripi azoru te atita esupi ra 'diyi ra.

English: The government was requested to bail business owners on their debts.
Luganda: Gvumenti yasabiddwa eyambe ku bannannyini biziness ku mabbanja.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ekashabwa kuhweera abaine bizinesi aha mabanja gaabo.
Acholi: Ki lego gamente me konyo lutim biacara ki peko me banya gi
Ateso: Aponi ilipai apugan abwoun lu agwelanarak kotoma obajai kec.
Lugbara: Ba ai gamete ni tujari ipika eyi ma azakozu eyi ma mari eyi ofezu

English: They used up their capital during the coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Baakozesa ssente z'entandikwa mu kaseera k'ekirwadde bbynansi ekyakawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Esente zaabo za bizinesi, bakazikoresa omu bwire bwa Korana.
Acholi: Guutiyo ki capital gi weng ikare me poto pa two corona
Ateso: Apotu kesi itwasamasi ikapun kec lu ebiasara apakio nu ekorona.
Lugbara: Eyi ayuki eyi ma robia tujari 'yezuri sa'wa azo korona niri vurisi ra.

English: Business owners are requesting for tax waivers.
Luganda: Ba nnannyini bizinesi basaba kukenderezebwa ku musolo.
Runyankore: Abaine bizinesi, nibashaba ngu babaiheho emishoro.
Acholi: Lutim biacara gitye ka lego gamente me kwanyo mucoro ma omyero gucul
Ateso: Ilipitos agwelanarak olemarai esolo kanejaas kesi.
Lugbara: Tujari ipika eyi ai 'bani eyidri musoro ofeza lizu te.

English: Several businesses have been affected by this coronavirus situation.
Luganda: Bizinesi nnyingi zikoseddwa embeera eno ey'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Bizinesi nyingi, ziteganisiibwe embeera y'endwara ya korona.
Acholi: Biacara mapol onongo peko pi poto pa two corona
Ateso: Apotu ibisineses luipi itolutolunos kanu ekorona.
Lugbara: Tujari karakara eyi esu candi e'yo azo korona nirisi ra.

English: Businesses have made losses during the coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Bizinesi zifiiriziddwa mu kaseera kano ak'ekirwadde ky'akawuka ka ssennyiga omukwambwe.
Runyankore: Bizinesi zifereirwe amagoba, ahabw'endwara ya korona.
Acholi: Biacara mapol gu goyo loss pi poto pa two corona
Ateso: Abu atwaniar ojaun obiasaran luipu kapak na ekorona.
Lugbara: Tujari karakara eyi avi orodri eyi ra sa'wa azo korona niri vurisi.

English: The government should provide businesses with better coping methods in this coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okuteekawo embeera esobozesa abantu okuyita mu kaseera kano ak'akawuka ka kolona ku mirimu gyabwe.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kutaho embeera eririkubaasisa bizinesi kugumizamu n'omu bwire obu obw'endwara ya korona.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omi diro manyen me timo biacara ki otim biacara ikare me two corona eni
Ateso: Ekot apugan aijaikin obiasaran iwaitin lu epedorota abongokin kapak naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma otu tujara onyiru ꞌbano eco ti ta sawa koronani ꞌdi ma alia ra ꞌdiyi ꞌi.

English: Business owners complained of the high bank interest rates.
Luganda: Ba nnanyini bizinesi bemulugunya olw'amagoba ga bank kwe beewolera okuba amangi.
Runyankore: Abaine bizinesi nibetomboitwa aha magoba ga banka maingi.
Acholi: Otim biacara gukok pi rwom me magoba matye malo ma wegi bank ongolo iwi Lim adena
Ateso: apotu agwelanarak ongurianata kanu etiai loepol lo ilonin ko obank.
Lugbara: Tujari ipika eyi onu robia Erojo eyini oli omgbo angirisi 'diyisi

English: Business owners don't have money to pay taxes.
Luganda: Ba nnannyini bizinesi tebayina nsimbi kusasula misolo.
Runyankore: Abaine bizinesi tibaine sente z'okushashura emishoro.
Acholi: Wegi biacara peke ki cene me culu pi mucoro
Ateso: Emamete agwelanarak ikapun lu itacet esolo.
Lugbara: Tujari ipika eyi vu robia musoro ofezu yo.

English: Lack of business activities negatively affects the community.
Luganda: Ebbula ly'ebikolwa by'obusuubuzi likosa abatuuze.
Runyankore: Emirimo y'eby'obushubuzi ku erikuba etariho, kiine oku kirikutamba abantu eikono.
Acholi: Bedo peko pa tic me biacara tye ki adwoki marac i kom lwak
Ateso: Amamus na ebiasara nes itolitoli aijar na itunga.
Lugbara: Yeta tujari ni 'diyi ma ako ni ongulumu eyi 'ye onzi

English: The community requested for reduced electricity bills.
Luganda: Abatuuze baasaba bakendereezebwe ku miwendo gy'amasannyalaze.
Runyankore: Abantu bakashaba kubatubiza aha bishare by'amashanyarazi.
Acholi: Lwak gulego ni kidwok piny wel cul pi mac
Ateso: Apotu itunga ilipata aitidisiar itiaisinei lu akim.
Lugbara: Ongulumu 'da ai 'bani aci ma aje esizu

English: The government should listen to business owners to help reduce poverty levels.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okuwuliriza bananyini bizinesi kiyambeko okukendezza obwavu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eine kuhurikiza abashubuzi, ebaase kuhwera omu kutuubya obworo.
Acholi: Gamente omyero owiny lok pa wegi biacara wek okony idwoko piny rwom me can
Ateso: ekot apugan apupokin nu ebalas agwelanarak kanu aitidisiar ibakor.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma eri e'yo tujari ipika eyi ma tia alio ma omgbo esizu.

English: The management should improve administration investigation.
Luganda: Akakiiko akakulembera kalina okulongoosa okunonyereza kw'abakozi.
Runyankore: Abakuru bashemereire kwimusya omutindo gw'okucondooza.
Acholi: Ludor tic omyero guyub yoo me kwed I gang tic

Lugbara: Le ꞌba driceꞌbaru ꞌdiyi ma out geri yini eꞌyo eti ondazuri ra.

English: The Church of Uganda owns the hospital.
Luganda: Eddwaliro lya kkanisa ya Uganda.
Runyankore: Eirwariro  eri n'ery'ekanisa ya Uganda.
Acholi: Ot yat obedo pa kanica me church of uganda
Ateso: Erai adekis naka ekanisa loko Church of Uganda.
Lugbara: Arojo 'dari kanisa ambo Uganda niri ni.

English: Decisions will be made after consulting the bishops.
Luganda: Okusalawo kujja kukolebwa oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ku balabirizi.
Runyankore: Nibeija kusharamu ahanyima y'okubuuza ba Biishopu.
Acholi: Kibi moko tam inge lok ki bishop

Lugbara: Ba nga peta eyi pe 'ba ka e'yo nze Bisopia eyi be 'bo ria

English: The staff struck because of unpaid salaries.
Luganda: Abakozi bekalakaasa olw'emisaala egitannaba kusasulirwa.
Runyankore: Abashaho bakediima ahabw'obutashashurwa mishaara.
Acholi: Lutic gujemo pi mucara ma pe onongo ki culu gi
Ateso: Apotu eswamak olungata aswam kanu iropito.

English: One person can not make decisions for the whole community.
Luganda: Omuntu omu tasobola kusalirawo batuuze bonna.
Runyankore: Omuntu omwe tarikubaasa kushariramu abantu boona.
Acholi: Ngat acel pe twero moko tam pi lwak lung
Ateso: Mam idiope itunganan epedori alemunun nuiswama kanuka itunga kere.
Lugbara: Ba alu econi peta pe ongulumu dria rini ni ku

English: The hospital structure has been revised.
Luganda: Ekizimbe ky'eddwaliro kidabiriziddwa.
Runyankore: Enkora y'eirwariro, ehindwirwemu.
Acholi: Yoo me tic iot yat kiloko
Ateso: Aponi inyogorai nuka aduketait na adekis.
Lugbara: Ba oja driceza arojo niri ra

English: Members have exaggerated hospital issues.
Luganda: Abatuuze basavuwazizza ensonga z'eddwaliro.

Acholi: Lwak gumedo lok i kom peko me otyat dok tutwal
Ateso: Apotu itunga iyatanakisi nu amamete toma akiro nu adekis.

English: There are disagreements amongst the church leaders.
Luganda: Waliwo obutakkanya mu bakulembezze b'ekkanisa.
Runyankore: Abebembezi b'ekanisa bainemu obutaikirizana.
Acholi: Telo tol tye ikin lutela me Kanica
Ateso: Ejai angeronoro kiding engarenok lu ekanisa.
Lugbara: Erita ako eyi drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ma eselea ci

English: They started an investigation to help both parties involved.
Luganda: Batandikawo okunonyereza okusobola okuyamba enjuyi zombi ezibirimu.
Runyankore: Batandikire kubuririza babaase kuhwera ebaju zombi ezirikukwatwaho.
Acholi: Gubedo ki yub me kwed wek okony joo ariyo ni
Ateso: Apotu kesi ogeutu aingic kanu aingarakin iwaitin kere.
Lugbara: Eyi e'do e'yo eti ondaza mupi amuti 'da eyi ma aza kopi iri tro ni i

English: There is a huge communication gap between the two parties.
Luganda: Waliwo obutakwatagana bungi mu by'empuliziganya wakati we'njuyi zombi.
Runyankore: Hariho obutakorengana ahagati y'abantu babiri.
Acholi: Peko me bur madit me kubu lok tye ikin joo ariyo ni
Ateso: Epol alalau na ejai kiding iwaitin kalu iyarei.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ongulumu iri ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ma eseleaa esele coza eꞌyo nzezaniri eri angiri

English: Foreigners have offered support to the hospitals.
Luganda: Abagwira bawadde amalwaliro obuyambi.
Runyankore: Abaheeru baheire irwariro obuhwezi.
Acholi: Joo ma ilobo ma woko gumiyo kony bot ot yat
Ateso: Apotu itunga lu okinga ijaikisi agangat adekisia.
Lugbara: Kari anzi suru azi 'diyini ri fe atita arojo eyini

English: Increased staff will ensure service efficiency.
Luganda: Abakozi abeyongeddeko bajja kusobozesa emirimu okutambula obulungi.
Runyankore: Okwongyera aha muhendo gw'abakozi, nikiija kutereeza enkora.
Acholi: Medo well lutic obi weko rwom me tic mede malo
Ateso: Eswamak lu iyatakina itolomunete eswamae loajokan.
Lugbara: ꞌBani aziꞌba yi ma kalafe otuzu rari ni nga fe azakoma fele azi tiari ma omgboni tuzu ra.

English: The hospital has not received foreign aid for a while now.
Luganda: Kitutte akaseera ng'eddwaliro terifuna buyambi kuva mu nsi z'ebweru.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rimazire obwire ritarikutunga obuhwezi kuruga aheeru.
Acholi: Ot yat pwod pe onongo kony ki ilobo ma woko pikare malac dong
Ateso: Mam adekis edumunit agangat kokinga adaun apak.

English: The hospital runs effectively despite the number of staff available.
Luganda: Eddwaliro litambula bulungi si nsonga omuwendo gw'abakozi abaliwo.
Runyankore: Eirwariro nirikora gye n'obu riraabe riine abakozi bakye.

Ateso: Iswamai adekis ejok ilema aikidiokus na eswamak.

English: Staff salaries should be revised.
Luganda: Emisaala gy'abakozi girina okukyusibwamu.
Runyankore: Emishaara y'abakozi eshemereire kutereezamu.
Acholi: Omyero ki lok wel mucara pa lutic oo
Ateso: Ekot aikeun iropito eswamak.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma andri nga azi'ba eyi ma musara o'diru.

English: The hospital staff was advised to be patient with the team.
Luganda: Omukozi w'eddwaliro yasabiddwa okubeera omugumiikiriza eri banne.
Runyankore: Abakozi beirwariro bakahaburwa kugira okugumisiriza.
Acholi: Kilego latic me ot yat me miyo kare mo ki dul pa joo ni
Ateso: Aponi icorai eswamak lu adekis atitingikit keda etimu lo.
Lugbara: Ba fe azi'ba arojoa 'da eyini aa'zu asi e'yeresi amuti 'dari be.

English: The hospital staff requested for a salary raise.
Luganda: Abakozi b'eddwaliro baasabye bongezebwe omusaala.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'eirwariro bakashaba ngu babongyere omushara.
Acholi: Lutic me ot yat gu lego ni kimed mucara gi
Ateso: Elipitos eswamak lu adekis aikeuno na iropito.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojoa 'da eyi ai 'bani eyi ma musara otuzu.

English: The hospital is a non-profit making organization.
Luganda: Eddwaliro kitongole ekitakola magoba.
Runyankore: Eirwariro n'ekigombe ekitarikukorera magoba.
Acholi: Ot yat obedo dul ma pe tiyo pi magoba
Ateso: Erai adekis na mam iswamai ameda.
Lugbara: Arojo 'dari amuti azi orodri robia niri esupi ku ni.

English: Eye patients were considered outcasts in the region.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'amaaso baboolebwa mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Abarwaire b'amaisho, bakaba nibareebwa nk'ecuubwa omu kyanga ekyo.
Acholi: Lutwo wang kinene gi macalo joo ma kony gi peke I kabedo meno

Lugbara: Kari ꞌdi ma woko ꞌdo ma alia, ꞌba ndra ꞌba mile azo be ꞌdiyi la ꞌba ꞌbani galesi ꞌdiyi ru.

English: The bed capacity of the hospital has increased.
Luganda: Omuwendo gw'ebitanda ogw'eddwaliro gweyongedde.
Runyankore: Omuhendo gw'ebitanda omwirwariro gweyongyeire.
Acholi: Kimedo wel kabut me ot yat meno
Ateso: Eyatakinos itadan kadekis.

English: The government offers annual support to the hospitals.

English: Cameras have been put in place to reduce the crime rate.
Luganda: Kamera ziteekeddwawo okukendeezza ku bumenyi bw'amateeka.
Runyankore: Za kamera ziteirweho okubaasa kukyendeezi okuhenda ebiragiro.

Ateso: Aponi ibwaikinai akameran kanu aitidisiar akoko.

English: Cameras are being installed across the country.
Luganda: Kamera ziri mu kuteekebwawo okwetoloola eggwanga.
Runyankore: Za kamera zisimbirwe okwetoroora eihanga.
Acholi: Kitye ka keto camera kaweng ilobo ni
Ateso: Ewutai aibwanakin akameran aiboisio nuipu akwap.
Lugbara: Ba kamera eyi osuria kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

English: They installed more cameras than they had originally planned.
Luganda: Bataddewo kamera nnyingi okusinga ze baali bategese okuteekawo mu ntandikwa.
Runyankore: Bakongyera obwingi bwa za kamera, okukira ahari ezo, ezibabaire bateekateekire.

Ateso: Apotu kesi ibwaikisi akameran nuipu adepar nu sek aomitai.
