English: The camera installation process started on Thursday.
Luganda: Omulimu gw'okuteekawo kamera gwatandika ku lwakuna.
Runyankore: Omurimo gw'okusimba zacamera, gukatandika aha rwa kana.
Acholi: Kicako keto camera iceng angwen
Ateso: Ageuno aibwanakin akameran na iwongonet.
Lugbara: E'yo 'bani eyi osuzuri e'do ndra o'du su si.

English: The installed cameras are not working.
Luganda: Kkamera ezaatekebwawo tezikola.
Runyankore: Za kamera ezasimbirwe tizirikukora.
Acholi: Camera ma ki keto ni petye ka tic
Ateso: Akameran nu ibwaikitai mam iswamaete.
Lugbara: Kamera 'bani osule 'dayi ngani azi ku.

English: The cameras will monitor accidents and crimes.
Luganda: Kkamera zijja ku lawuna obubenje n'obuzzi bw'emisango.
Runyankore: Za kamera niija kurebuuza butandu n'ebihagaro.
Acholi: Camera obi neno peko me gudi ki bal ma time
Ateso: Apote akameran aingic akangasia ka iboro luarokok.
Lugbara: Kamera 'dayi mu drileonzi eyi one tualu e'yo onzi eyi be.

English: The cameras were installed in trading centres.
Luganda: Kkamera zateekebwa mu bubuga.
Runyankore: Za kamera zikasimbwa omumyanya y'amaduuka.
Acholi: Ki keto camera I trading centre
Ateso: Aponi akameran ibwanakinai aiboisio nukagwelanar .
Lugbara: Ba osu kamera eyi angu tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma alea

English: The cameras will replace eyewitnesses.
Luganda: Kkamera zijja kusikira abajulizi.
Runyankore: Za kamera niziija kuza omumyanya y'abajurizi abareeba nagaabo.
Acholi: Kamera obi leyo kawang caden ma dano
Ateso: Apote akameran aburokin eteok akonye.
Lugbara: Kamera 'da eyi mu 'ba e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi nepi milesi ra 'diyi ma pari 'du.

English: The cameras will be used to trace vehicle number plates.
Luganda: Kkamera zijja kukozesebwa okulaba namba puleeti z'emmotoka.
Runyankore: Za kamera niziija kukoresibwa okutunga enamba z'emotoka.
Acholi: Kibi tiyo ki camera me neno number me mutoka
Ateso: Aponio akameran aitwasam amoya inabai lu amotokan.
Lugbara: Ba mu kamera 'dayi ayu mutukari eyi ma namba pileti eyi onezu.

English: The installation of cameras will start in towns.
Luganda: Okuwanika kamera kujja kutandika mu bibuga.
Runyankore: Okusimba za kamera, nikwija kutandikira omu ndembo.
Acholi: Kibi cako keto camera I town
Ateso: Aibwanakino na akameran ebeit agear kotaunin.
Lugbara: Ba mu kamera eyi ma osuta e'do tawuni eyi ma alea.

English: The member of parliament donated a tonne of maize.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti yawaddeyo kilo lukumi ez'akasooli.
Runyankore: Omukiiki omwishengyer akagaba taani y'ebicoori.
Acholi: Member me parliament omiyo anywagi kilo alib acel
Ateso: Abu emeeba lokairabet ijaik agangat na tonne ediope lo ekirididi.
Lugbara: Memba koloseni niri fe kaka kilo alifu alu.

English: They also donated hoes and maize seeds.
Luganda: Era baagabye enkumbi n'ensigo za kasooli.
Runyankore: Bakagaruka baagaba efuka n'embibo y'ebicoori.
Acholi: Gu miyo kweri ki anywagi bene
Ateso: Apotu kesi bobo igangakisi keda imelekes ka ikinyom lu ekirididi.
Lugbara: Eyi fe vini e'bu eyi kaka ori pie.

English: The seeds were handed directly to the farmers.
Luganda: Ensigo zawereddwa abalimu buterevu.
Runyankore: Embibo ekaheebwa abahingi.
Acholi: Kimiyo kodi magi atir bot lupur
Ateso: Aponi ikinyom ikoparai nejaas akoriok.
Lugbara: Ba fe ori 'dayi trua 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri.

English: The funds received will be used in a fight against coronavirus.
Luganda: Ensimbi ezaafuniddwa zijja kukozesebwa mu kulwanyisa akawuuka ka ssenyigga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Esente ezitungirwe niziija kukoresibwa kurwanisa endwara ya korona
Acholi: Cene ma obino kibi tiyo kwede me lweny i kom two corona
Ateso: Ikapun lu edumunitai eponio aitwasam aitijio ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba mupira robia esule 'diyi ayu a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be.

English: Recent donations will be towards coronavirus.
Luganda: Obuyambi obuyise bujja kuyambako eri akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Ebintu ebiherize kuheebwayo, nibiija kukora aha nshonga za korona.
Acholi: Jami ma kibedo kamiyo ne cok coki kibi tiyo kwede i kom two corona
Ateso: Agangat na edumunitai pac eraun kanu ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba mupira robia fele o'diru 'diyi ayu azo korona nirisi.

English: The hospital received a computer to register patient records.
Luganda: Eddwaliro lyafunye kompyuta okuwandiika ebikwata ku balwadde.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rikatunga kompyuta eyokuhandiika ebirikukwata ahabarwaire.
Acholi: Odi yadi gunongo compute me coyo lutwo
Ateso: Abu adekis odum akomputa kanu aiwadika ikiroria adekak.
Lugbara: Arojo 'da esu komputa e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma tambazu

English: The community was requested to use the funds properly.
Luganda: Abatuuze baasabiddwa okukozesa obulungi ensimbi.
Runyankore: Abantu bakashabwa kukoresa kurungi esente.
Acholi: Ki kwayo lwak me tic ki cene i yo maber
Ateso: Aponi olimokinai itunga aitwasam ikapun ejok.
Lugbara: Ba ai ongulumu 'da robia ayuzu geri kililiru risi.

English: Some of the money will be given to the security forces.
Luganda: Ensimbi ezimu zijja kuwebwa abakuuma ddembe.
Runyankore: Esente ezimwe niziija kukoresibwa ab'ebyokwerinda.
Acholi: Cene mukene kibi miyo ki lugwok ber bedo
Ateso: Icie kotoma okapun kangul oponio aijaikin lu ayuara.
Lugbara: Ba mu robia 'da ma azi fe 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi dri.

English: The leader will use the money to aid his constituency during the coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Omukulembeze ajja kukozesa ensimbi okuyamba ekitundu ky'akiikirira mu kaseera k'ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Omwebenbezi naija kukozesa sente okuhwera ab'omu kicweka eki arikujwekyera omu bwire bw'oburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Latela obi tiyo ki cene eni me konyo dano I kabedo ne ikare me two corona
Ateso: Ebuni engarenon aitwasam ikapun aingarakitor itunga lu aiboisit ke kapak na ekorona.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'da ni mu robia 'da ayu angu erini opi nyazu paliamentia ri ma aza kozu sa'wa azo korona niri ni 'disi

English: The leader used her money to fuel ambulances meant for use because of coronavirus.
Luganda: Omukulembeze omukyala yakozesezza ssente ze okuteeka amafuta mu mmotoka ez'okutambuza abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi, akakozesa esente ze okuta amajuta omu ambyurensi ey'okukozesa ahabwa corona virus.
Acholi: Latela otiyo ki cene ne me keto mooo I ambulance pi two corona
Ateso: Abu angarenon itwasam ikapun ke aituranakina amotokan nuadekis akinyet nu itwasamao kanu ekorona.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'da ayu i ma robia odu tozu ambulansi ayule azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma alea

English: The region leader bought seven ambulances.
Luganda: Omukulembeze w'ekitundu yaguzze emmotoka musanvu ezitambuza abalwadde.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi w'ekyanga, akagura ambyurensi mushanju.
Acholi: Latela me twok piny owilo ambulance abiro
Ateso: Abu engarenon lo aiboisit ogwel amotokan nuadekis akanyarei.
Lugbara: Agu angu 'da ma dri cepiri fe ambulansi eyi towi.

English: Some leaders donated farm seeds and materials.
Luganda: Abakulembezze abamu baagabye ensigo ez'okusiga n'ebikozesebwa.
Runyankore: Abebembezi abamwe, bakagaba embibo z'okuhinga, n'ebintu.
Acholi: Lutela mukene gumiyo kodi ki jami me tic
Ateso: Icie engarenok apotu igangata keda ikinyom ka iboro icie.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azi 'diyi fe ori eyi tualu afa azi ayule ndundu amvu ni 'diyi pie.

English: District members are not following the coronavirus guidelines.
Luganda: Abakozi ba disitulikiti tebagoberera biragiro byassibwawo kulwanyisa kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abakozi ba disiturikiti, tibarikukuratira ebiragirio ebyatairwe kwerinda korona.
Acholi: Joo me district pe gitye ka lubu cik pa gamente i kom two corona
Ateso: Eswamak luko disitrikt mam etupitos aicoreta nuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba distrikitia 'diyi obini azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma vuti ku.

English: Candidate classes will report at the beginning of June.
Luganda: Abasomi mu bibiina ebya kamalirizo bajja kuddayo ku ntandiikwa y'omwezi gw'omukaaga.
Runyankore: Abeegi abari omu bibiina ebyakamaririzo nibaija kuza aha mashomero, aha ntandikwa y'okwa mukaaga.
Acholi: Joo matye I class abiro, angwen ki abicel gubi cako kwan I acaki me dwe me abicel
Ateso: Esisiak lu ebeit angetakin ebeit abongor ageunet na olap lo ikanyetape.
Lugbara: Sukulu anzi depi dede 'diyi go sukulua imba azia ni e'doria

English: The school was used to isolate coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Essomero lyakozesebwa okukumiramu abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Eishomero rikakoresibwa okuraguriramu abarwaire ba korona.
Acholi: Kitiyo ki gang kwan me gwoko jo ma kinongo gi ki two corona
Ateso: Aponi itwasamai esomero agitaritor adekak luka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba ayu sukulu 'da 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma tambazu 'bani ani eyi ma esele cozu 'ba azi rua ala be 'diyi pie

English: About fifty-one people have been isolated.
Luganda: Abantu nga ataano mu omu be bayawuddwa mu balala.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikuhika haihi ataano n'omwe babashorwaire.
Acholi: Cok cok dano pyera abic wiye acel ki kipokogi ki i kin dano mukene
Ateso: Nepetai itunga akaisakany kes agitar.
Lugbara: Ba'ba 'ba ogogo kali towi ni eyi aa'zu a'dule eyini ani eyi ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi be ku

English: The quarantine centre has already reached its maximum.
Luganda: Awakumirwa abalwadde b'akawuka ka ssenyigga omukambwe wajudde.
Runyankore: Omwanya gwa karantiini, gwaherize kuhikwamu enamba y'abantu eshemereire kukomwaho.
Acholi: Kama ki gwoko iye joo ma byek me two corona ni dong opongoo
Ateso: Aiboisit na idarere adekak ekorona nes elelebun.
Lugbara: Angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule eyini ani eyi ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi be ku ri ga 'bo

English: About four more people have joined isolation.
Luganda: Abantu abalala nga bana beegasse ku baawuliddwa.
Runyankore: Abantu abandi haihi bana baaherize kushororwa.
Acholi: Dano angwen mukene ki cwalo gi ikagwoko dano me corona
Ateso: Itunga iwongon kes bobo alomasi aiboisit na egitaritai adekak.
Lugbara: Ba azi su ni eyi mu angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule 'da ma alea

English: The regional leaders strongly rejected the use of schools for coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'ebitundu baagaanira ddala eky'okukozesa amasomero nga ebifo by'abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi b'ekyanga, bakangira kimwe enteebekanisa y'okukoresa amashomero okutwarwamu abarwaire ba korona.
Acholi: Lutela me twok piny gikwero tutwal tim me tic ki gangi kwan me gwoko jo me two corona
Ateso: Apotu engarenok lu aiboisit ogiroto aitwasamao na isomero kanu adekak lu ekorona.
Lugbara: Drice'ba angu 'da ni 'diyi gaki 'bani sukulu eyi ayuzu 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi nirisi .

English: The patients will stay in their homes.
Luganda: Abalwadde bajja kusigala ewaka waabwe.
Runyankore: Abarwaire nibaija kuguma omu maka gaabo.
Acholi: Lutwo gubi bedo I gangi gi
Ateso: Apote adekak asalakin oreria kec.
Lugbara: Ba azoru 'diyi mu aa eyi ma aku eyi ma alea.

English: The quarantine centres are flooded with patients.
Luganda: Ebifo bya kalantiini bikubyeko abalwadde.
Runyankore: Emyanya ya karantiini eijwire abarwaire.
Acholi: Kama ki gwoko iye dano ni opong ki utwo corona
Ateso: Aiboisio nu idarere adekak elelebunos adekak.
Lugbara: Angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule 'diyi ga 'ba eyisi tre

English: They should speed up the identification of coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Balina okwanguyaako okuzuula abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Enkora y'okumanya abarwaire ba korona, eshemereire kukorwa ahonaaho.
Acholi: Omyero guru tic me niang joo ma gubedo lutwo corona
Ateso: Ekot kes aisunyakite airereunun itunga lu edekas ekorona.
Lugbara: Le eyi ma otu 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma esuta ma sipidi.

English: Suspected cases are monitored for fourteen days.
Luganda: Abateeberezebwa okuba abalwadde balondoolebwa okumala ennaku kkumi na nnya.
Runyankore: Abarikuteekwateekwaho kugira oburwaire bwa korona, nibabareebuuza kumara ebiro ikumi na bina.
Acholi: Jo ma byek tye i komgi ni ki bedo ka neno kit ma gibedo kede pi nino apar wiye angwen
Ateso: Itunga lu eomitai ebe edekasi kes ebeit awanyanar adaun aparasia atomonangon.
Lugbara: Ba 'bani ega azo be 'diyi one o'du mudrini su

English: Schools should not be used as quarantine centres.
Luganda: Amasomero tegalina kukozesebwa nga bifo bya kukuumiramu balwadde.
Runyankore: Amashomero tigashemereire kukoresibwa nk'emyanya y'okurindiramu abarwaire ba korona.
Acholi: Pe omyero ki tii ki gangi kwan me gwoko joo corona
Ateso: Mam ebeit isomeroi aitwasam kwape aiboisio nu idarere adekak ekorona.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ayu sukulu eyi angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule 'diyiru ku

English: The government should get independent quarantine centres.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okufuna ebifo bya kalantiini ebyetongodde.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kutunga emyanya yaayo ey'okureeburizamu abarwaire.
Acholi: Gamente omyero onong ka gwoko dano me Corona obed kama pat
Ateso: Ekot apugan adumun aiboisio kec bon nu adekak ekorona.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma esu angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule 'diyi ma azi pa tupi eyisi ni eyi

English: Coronavirus patients are being treated in a regional hospital.
Luganda: Abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona bajjanjabirwa mu ddwaliro ly'ekitundu.
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba korona bariyo nibaragurirwa omwirwariro ry'ekyanga.
Acholi: Kitye ka tic i kom lutwo corona I odi yadi madongo pa gamente
Ateso: Adekak ekorona kes imukeo adekisia nuapolok.
Lugbara: Ba azo korona niri be 'diyi aro esu arojo amburi ma alea.

English: Refugees are looking for ways to enter the country.
Luganda: Abanoonyi b'obubudamu banoonya ngeri ya kuyingira mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Empungi ziriyo nizironda oburyo bw'okutaaha omwihanga.
Acholi: Luring ayella tye ka nongo yo me donyo ilobo
Ateso: Etamitos ikerai amoote iwaitin lu ilomunet akwap wok.
Lugbara: Emunyale eyi geri nda efizu kari 'di ma alea.

English: Refugees get involved in animal grazing and cross-border farming.
Luganda: Abanoonyiboobubudamu beenyigira mu kulunda ensolo n'okulima okusukka nsalo.
Runyankore: Empungi nizejumbira omukuriisa ente, hamwe n'okuhinga barikutabuuka ensharo.
Acholi: Luring ayella gicako tic me kwato lee ki pur manongo ngolo wang lobo
Ateso: Eraas ikerai lu icokiete akituk kiding okoruon.
Lugbara: Emunyale eyi e'yo anyapa oceza ni 'diyi 'ye tualu amvu 'yaza boda ndundu eyi ma alea ri ni 'diyi be indi

English: People have been advised to stop taking bribes.
Luganda: Abantu baweereddwa amagezi okukomya okulya enguzi.
Runyankore: Abantu bahabwirwe okurekyeraaho kutwara ebituga.
Acholi: Ki lego dano me juku gamo kitu kidogo
Ateso: Aponi olimokinai itunga apalar aijajatoi ikapun.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌba yi dri embata fe afa ti razu ꞌdiyi aꞌizu ku.

English: The member of parliament disagrees with the decisions made for his country.
Luganda: Omubaka wa paalamenti awakanya okusalawo okukoleddwa ku ggwanga lye.
Runyankore: Omukiiki omwishengyero, tarikwikiriza ebiteiso ebi bateisiize eihanga rye.
Acholi: La mp ni pe cwako tam ma kimoko pi lobo ni
Ateso: Abu emeeba lokairabet ogironoros keda aomisio nu etolomuno kanu akwap ke.
Lugbara: Azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da ati ni peta 'bani pe kari erivileri ni 'diyi ku

English: He doesn't want to carry public funds.
Luganda: Tayagala kukwata nsimbi za gavumenti.
Runyankore: Tarikwenda kubiika esente z'omuhi w'omushoro.
Acholi: En pe mito wot ki lim pa lwak
Ateso: Mam nges ekoto aitingite ikapun itunga.
Lugbara: Eri leni robia o'bi eyini 'diyi 'du ku

English: Money meant for Coronavirus will be used for its exact purpose.
Luganda: Ssente ezirina okuba ez'akawuka ka kolona zijja kukozesebwa omulimu gwazo.
Runyankore: Esente ezitairwe kukoresibwa kukora aha nshonga z'endwara ya korona, niziija kukoresibwa omurimo gwazo.
Acholi: Cene ma kimiyo pi two corona kibitimo ki en tic enuni ki kome
Ateso: Ikapun lu ekotoi kanu ekorona kes ebeit aitwasam kanu aswam kangipekangin.
Lugbara: Ba mu robia 'ba ni 'ba ayuzaru e'yo azo korona nirisi 'diyi ayu e'yo nde 'yezu ogogoru i.

English: He promised to follow the rules backed by the law.
Luganda: Yeeyama okugoberera ebiragiro ebiri mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Akaraganisa okukuratira ebirikushebwa ebiragiro.
Acholi: En ocike me lubu cik ma ki keto
Ateso: Esumunit ngesi aitup ikisila kwa ejatatar.
Lugbara: Eri owi i e'yo o'bale azita palaa 'diyi ma vuti obizu.

English: He returned the money to the parliament as requested by the speaker.
Luganda: Yazza ssente mu paalamenti nga bwe yasabibwa sipiika.
Runyankore: Akagarurayo esente omwishengyero nk'oku sipiika yaashabire.
Acholi: En odwoko cene cen I parliament kit ma lalok madit me parliament owaco kwede
Ateso: Abu ngesi inyaka ikapun airabet kwa abalar eraban.
Lugbara: Eri ogo robia 'dari vule paliamentia anzenzea ei ni ai ri le.

English: I will not follow an illegal directive by the president.
Luganda: Sijja kugoberera kiragiro kya pulezidenti ekimenya amateeka.
Runyankore: Tindikwija kukuratira ekiragiro ky'omwebembezi weihanga ekitahikire.
Acholi: Pe abi lubu cik mokeken ma turu cik kibot gamente
Ateso: Mam eong abuni aitup nu ebala lokapolon akwap nu emamete okisila.
Lugbara: Angani e'yo azi purezidenti ni 'yole azita palaa ku ni ma vuti obi ku.

English: It is not legal to return the money we received.
Luganda: Tekiri mu mateeka okuzza ssente ze twafuna.
Runyankore: Tikiri biragiro okugarura sente ezi twayakiriire.
Acholi: Dwoko cene enuni obedo tim ma turu cik
Ateso: Mam edolit ainyakar ikapun lu idumunit oni.
Lugbara: Eri adrini azita palaa ku amani robia amani esu ri ogozu vule.

English: He was thanked for returning the money to parliament.
Luganda: Yeebazibwa olw'okuzza ssente mu paalamenti.
Runyankore: Akasiimwa ahabw'okugarura sente omwishengyero.
Acholi: Kipwoye pi dwoko cene enuni cen
Ateso: Aponi aisiyalamikinai nges kanu ainyakar ikapun airabet
Lugbara: Ba fe erini awa'difo erini robia 'da ogozu vule paliamentia risi.

English: He said he would rather take the money home instead of the parliament.
Luganda: Yagamba kisingako okutwala ensimbi ewaka mu kifo kya paalamenti.
Runyankore: Akagira ngu haakiri esente naazitwara omuka, okukira okuzigarura omwishengyero.
Acholi: En owaco ni twora otee cene enuni gang me kaka dwoko ne I parliament
Ateso: Abala ngesi ebe edolit nges ayangar ikapun ore itia airabet
Lugbara: Eri kini eri cika i ni robia 'da jizu akua aga i ni jizu paliamentia ogogo.

English: The community thanked him for returning the money.
Luganda: Abantu mu kitundu baamwebaza olw'okuzzaayo ssente.
Runyankore: Abantu bakamusiima ahabw'okugarura sente.
Acholi: Lwak gupwoye pi dwoko cene enuni cen
Ateso: Apotu itunga isiyalamikisi nges kanu ainyakar ikapun.
Lugbara: Ongulumu 'da fe erini awa'difo erini robia 'da ogozu vile risi.

English: It is only morally upright to return the money.
Luganda: Kya mpisa okuzzaayo ssente
Runyankore: N'ekintu kirungi okugarura sente.
Acholi: Obedo tim maber me dwoko cene enuni
Ateso: Ejok ainyakar ikapun.
Lugbara: Eri e'yo mukeni robia 'dari ogozu vile.

English: He said it was intelligent to return the Parliament's money.
Luganda: Yagamba kyali kya magezi okuzzaayo ssente za paalamenti.
Runyankore: Akagira ngu kikaba kiri eky'obwengye okugarura esente z'eishengyero.
Acholi: En owaco ni obedo tic me kwiri me dwoko cene enuni I parliament
Ateso: Ebala ngesi ebe erai nu acobeu ainyakar ikapun lu airabet
Lugbara: Eri kini eri onduaru 'ba azi ni paliamenti ma robia 'da ogozu vile.

English: The team was requested to return the money as soon as possible.
Luganda: Ttiimu yasabibwa okuzzaayo ssente mu bwangu ddala nga bwe kisoboka.
Runyankore: Tiimu ekashabwa kugarura sente ahonaaho nk'okukirikubaasika.
Acholi: Ki lego gurup meno me dwoko cene enuni cut cut
Ateso: Aponi olimokinai etimu ainyakar ikapun atipet.
Lugbara: Ba ai amuti 'da robia 'da ogozu mbeleru.

English: Only five people returned the money.
Luganda: Abantu bataano bokka be bazzaayo ssente.
Runyankore: Abantu bataano bonka, nibo bagarwiire sente.
Acholi: Dano abic keken aye gudwoko cene enuni
Ateso: Itunga ikany bon apotu inyakasi ikapun.
Lugbara: Ba towi eyi ogoki lu robia 'da ni.

English: The donations received will be used to purchase agricultural products.
Luganda: Obuyambi obwafunibwa bujja kukozesebwa okugula ebiva mu bulimi ne mu bulunzi.
Runyankore: Obuhwezi obwareesirwe, nibwija kukoresibwa okugura ebirikuruga omubuhingi.
Acholi: Cene ma kimiyo ni kibi tiyo kwede me wilo jami ma mite Ipur
Ateso: Agangat na adumunio eponio aitwasam agwelia iboro lu akoru.
Lugbara: Ba mu robia 'bani fe 'dayi ayu afa agirikica ni 'diyi jezu.

English: They donated food to the poor.
Luganda: Baagabira abavu emmere.
Runyankore: Bakagabira abooro eby'okurya.
Acholi: Kimiyo cam ki lucan
Ateso: Apotu kesi ijaikisi agangat nejaas lu ican.
Lugbara: Eyi fe nyaka 'ba alioru 'diyi dri.

English: The task force agreed to buy food for poor people.
Luganda: Ttiimu yakkirizza okugulira abaavu emmere.
Runyankore: Akakiiko akahiirwe obujunaanizibwa kakaikiriza kugurira abantu abooro eby'okurya.
Acholi: Joo madoro lok me corona gu yee ni kiwil cam pi lucan
Ateso: Abu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce  ocam egwelet inyamat kanu itunga ku ican.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi ai nyaka jezu 'ba alioru 'diyini

English: The team should receive agricultural produce from members of parliament.
Luganda: Ttiimu erina okufuna ebirime okuva mu babaka ba paalamenti.
Runyankore: Tiimu eshemereire kwakiira ebyokurya kuruga ahabakiiki beishengyero.
Acholi: Gurup omyero onong kac kibot lumemba me parliament
Ateso: Ekot etimu aijaun ikorion kanejaas imeeban luka airabet
Lugbara: Le amuti 'da ma esu afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi engazu azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyi vu

English: They said that they did not receive enough food.
Luganda: Baagamba nti tebaafuna mmere emala.
Runyankore: Bakagira ngu tibaratungire eby'okuruya ebirikumara.
Acholi: Guwaco ni pe gunongo cam me oromo
Ateso: Ebakasi kesi ebe mam edumunitos inyamat lu edolitos.
Lugbara: Eyi yo ki kini eyi esuni nyaka caku.

English: The money should be given to the task force.
Luganda: Ssente zirina okuweebwa akakiiko akakozi..
Runyankore: Esente zishemereire kuheebwa ab'akakiiko.
Acholi: Cene ne omyero ki mii ki joo ma tye ka doro lok me corona
Ateso: Ekot ikapun aijaikin atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce .
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe robia 'da drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi dri

English: What a declaration used for?
Luganda: Okulangirirwa kukozesebwa mu ki?
Runyankore: Ekirangiriro nikikozesibwa nkahi?
Acholi: Lok me tye ki tiyo kwede me ngo?
Ateso: Inyobo aswam aitijenaret?
Lugbara: ꞌBa eꞌyo aꞌizasi aꞌdi ꞌye ya?

English: The public was furious that some people didn't want to return the money.
Luganda: Abantu baanyiiga olw'abantu abamu obutaagala kuzzaayo ssente.
Runyankore: Abantu bakagira ekiniga ngu abamwe bakaba batarikwenda kugarura esente.
Acholi: Lwak igi owang pien ni joo mukene onongo pe mito dwoko cene
Ateso: Akadakitos itunga kanu mam icie akototor ainyakar ikapun.
Lugbara: Awoko nya o'bi eyi e'yo 'ba azi eyini awizu robia 'ogozu vile kuye risi.

English: The public attacked those that failed to return the money.
Luganda: Abantu baalumba abo abaalemererwa okuzzaayo ssente.
Runyankore: Abantu bakarumba abo abaabaire batarikwenda kugarurayo esente.
Acholi: Lwak okato mage i kom jo ma okwero dwoko cene
Ateso: Apotu itunga osurokisi ngul lu mam enyakaritos ikapun.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi aa awoko si 'ba awipi robia 'da ogopi vile ku 'diyi be.

English: The people of the community should receive essentials as promised by the government.
Luganda: Abantu b'ekitundu balina okufuna ebyetaagisa nga gavumenti bwe yabasuubiza.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omukyaro bashemereire kutunga ebirikwetengwa nk'oku Gavumenti yaraganiise.
Acholi: Lwak omyero gunong jami ma mite kit ma gamente ocike kwede
Ateso: Ekot itunga aijaun iboro kwape esumunitor apugan.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma esu afa ndundu orodriru 'diyi engazu gamete vu ra

English: The task force managed to contain the spread of diseases in the district.
Luganda: Akakiiko akalabirizi kaasobola okufufugaza endwadde obutasaasaanira mu disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Akakiiko kakabaasa kuzibira okujanjaara kw'oburwaire omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Joo ma doro lok kom two corona gunongo yoo me jwiko nyaa pa two corona
Ateso: Abu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce opedo aitikitik awea na adeka kodisitrikt.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi o'bi azo eyi ma ereta distrikitia ri atri ra

English: She handed over the twenty million shillings.
Luganda: Yabakwasizza obukadde bw'ensimbi abiri.
Runyankore: Akahayo obukaikuru makumi abiri.
Acholi: En omiyo cilling milion pyera aryo
Ateso: Abu ngesi ijaik imilionin akaisarei.
Lugbara: Eri fe robia silingi milioni kali iri 'da ra.

English: The leader said he was still planning to return the money.
Luganda: Omukulembeze yagamba nti yali akyateekateeka kuzzaayo ssente.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi akagira ngu akaba naakikora enteekateeka z'okugarurayo sente.
Acholi: Latela owaco ni onongo pwod tye kayube me dwoko cene ne cen
Ateso: Abala engarenon ebe arongo ngesi ekapanakin ainyakar ikapun.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'da kini i nga po'di mu robia 'da ogo ogo.

English: The funds were provided to fight against coronavirus.
Luganda: Ensimbi zaaweebwayo okulwanyisa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Esente zikaheebwayo okurwanisa endwara ya korona.
Acholi: Kimiyo cene me lweny i kom two corona
Ateso: Ejaikitai ikapun kanu aitijio ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba fe robia 'dari a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be.

English: The money was handed over to the task force.
Luganda: Ssente zaaweebwayo eri akakiiko akafuzi.
Runyankore: Esente zikaheebwa akakiiko.
Acholi: Kimiyo cene bot joo ma doro lweny i kom two corona
Ateso: Aponi ikapun ikopakinai atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce.
Lugbara: Ba fe robia 'da drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi dri

English: The money was used to fight coronavirus.
Luganda: Ssente zaakozesebwa okulwanyisa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Esente zikakoresibwa kurwanisa korona.
Acholi: Kitiyo ki cene me lweny i kom two corona
Ateso: Aponi ikapun itwasamai aitijio ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba ayu robia 'da azi ngazu azo korona niri be.

English: The court decided to take back the money.
Luganda: Kkooti yasalawo okuzaayo ssente.
Runyankore: Kooti ekasharaho kugarurayo sente.
Acholi: Court omoko ni ki dwok cen cene
Ateso: Abu adieket inyaka ikapun.
Lugbara: Koti ai asi robia 'da 'duzu vile.

English: The health sector will use the money.
Luganda: Ab'ebyobulamu bajja kukozesa ssente.
Runyankore: Ekitongore kyebyamagara, nikiija kukozesa sente.
Acholi: Ministry me yot kom aye obi tiyo ki cene
Ateso: Ebuni ewai lo angaleu aitwasam ikapun.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri ni mu robia 'da ayu ni.

English: The health sector will make great use of the money.
Luganda: Ab'ebyobulamu bajja kukozesa bulungi ssente.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'ebyamagara, nikiija kukozesa sente omubintu bingi.
Acholi: Ministry me yot kom obi tiyo kicene ni maber
Ateso: Ebuni ewai lo angaleu aitwasam ikapun ngul koipone kalo ebeitor.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri ni mu robia 'da ayu geri kililiru risi.

English: The health sectors need to face masks and gloves.
Luganda: Ekisaaawe ky'ebyobulamu kyetaaga masiki ne giravu.
Runyankore: Ebitongore byeby'amagara, biine kugura za masiki na giraavu.
Acholi: Ministry me yot kom omyero onong mask ki gloves
Ateso: Ekotosi iwaitin lu angaleu aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume ka amopiran nu akan.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri le gilavu osule dria 'diyi masiki osule tia azini omvua 'diyi be ra.

English: The district should spend money on quarantine centres.
Luganda: Disitulikiti erina okusaasaanya ssente mu bifo bya kalantiini.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti eshemereire kukozesa sente aha myanya ya karantiini.
Acholi: Gamente omyero oket cene ikabedo kama ki gwoko iye jo corona
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt aitwasam ikapun kanu aiboisio nu idarere adekak ekorona.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma ayu robia 'da angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule 'diyi ma dria

English: Development partners are providing fuel to the ambulances.
Luganda: Bannamikago be bawa amafuta g'emottoka ezitambuza abalwadde.
Runyankore: Abakwataniise omuby'entunguuka nibagaba amajuta ga ambyurensi.
Acholi: Lumi kony ki gamente gitye ka konyo gamente ki moo me ambulance
Ateso: Ingarakitos egangitok aituranakin akinyet amotokan nuadekis.
Lugbara: Amuti ndundu e'yo angu ezoma niri ni 'diyi odu fe ambulansi eyini

English: Fuel is necessary if the ambulances should be on standby.
Luganda: Amafuta getaagisa singa emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zirina okuba obulindala.
Runyankore: Amajuta nigetengwa za ambyurensi zaaba ziri ez'okuguma zitebeekaniise gye kuhwera.
Acholi: Moo pire tek pi ambulance me yube me tic
Ateso: Epolok nu akinyet noi kanu amotoka nadekis akerit.
Lugbara: Odu eri orodriru ambulansi eyini aa'zu ngonde azini pa dria

English: The task force was thanked for the great work done.
Luganda: Akakiiko akalabirizi kebazibwa olw'omulimu omulungi ogwakolebwa.
Runyankore: Akabondo kakasiimwa ahabw'omurimo muhango ogukozirwe.
Acholi: Kipwoyo joo ma doro lok kom corona pi tic maber ma gutimo
Ateso: Aponi isiyalamikinai atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce kanu aswam najokan.
Lugbara: Ba fe drice'ba korona niri ni 'diyini awa'difo azi onyiru eyini 'ye risi

English: He brought the money back home.
Luganda: Yakomezzawo ssente ewaka.
Runyankore: Akagarura esente omuka.
Acholi: En odwoko cene ni cen
Ateso: Abu ngesi inyaku ikapun ore.
Lugbara: Eri eji robia 'dari akua vile.

English: The leaders were advised to be an example to their community.
Luganda: Abakulumbeze basabiddwa okubeera eky'okulabirako eri abatuuze baabwe.
Runyankore: Abebeembezi bakahaburwa ngu babe eky'okureeberaho kirungi omubyanga byabo.
Acholi: Ki kwayo lutela me nyutu kit mabe kibot lwak
Ateso: Aponi icorai engarenok araut awanyunet nejaas itunga kec.
Lugbara: Ba ai drice'ba eyi aa'zu eceta ru eyi ma ongulumu eyidri.

English: The money will be used for coronavirus related issues.
Luganda: Ssente zijja kukozesebwa ku nsonga ezeekuusa ku kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Esente niziija kukozesibwa aha nshonga ezikwatiraine na korona.
Acholi: Kibi tiyo ki cene ne i kom lok ma kwako two corona
Ateso: Eponio aitwasam ikapun kanuikamunitos ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba mu robia 'da ayu e'yo azo koronani 'diyisi.

English: They were condemned for disobeying presidential orders.
Luganda: Baavumiriddwa lwa kumenya biragiro bya mukulembezze.
Runyankore: Bakajumirirwa ahabw'okuremwa kworobera ebiragiro by'omwebembezi weihanga.
Acholi: Ki kok i komgi pi kwero lubu cik pa ladit lobo
Ateso: Aponi kes otubokinai kanu aimeng aicorakineta lokapolon akwap.
Lugbara: Ba fe eyini panga eyini azita purezidenti ni o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku risi

English: The incident started on Sunday morning.
Luganda: Ensonga yatandise ku makya ga ssande.
Runyankore: Ekintu kikabaho aha sande omukasheeshe.
Acholi: Gin eni ocake iceng cabit odiko
Ateso: Egeunitos nu nasabiti tipuruc.
Lugbara: E'yo 'da e'do sabatusi o'bitisi.

English: They had gatherings despite being warned about coronavirus.
Luganda: Baalina enkungaana wadde nga baabalabula ku kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Bakakora enteerane, n'obu baaraabe barabwirwe aha bikwatiraine na korona
Acholi: Gumede ki gure kadi bed ni ki ciko gi pi two corona
Ateso: Atukokina kesi konye odaunitete aikwenyar kanuikamunitos ekorona.
Lugbara: Eyi oku eyi ongulumuru 'bani ta tro eyini bile ndu liza fezu azo korona nirisi ra ti.

English: They were arrested for having a football match.
Luganda: Baasibwa olw'okuzannya omupiira.
Runyankore: Bakakwatwa ahabw'okwejumba omu muzaano gw'omupiira.
Acholi: Ki mako gi pi tuku odilo
Ateso: Aponi kes ikamarai kanu abolia emopira.
Lugbara: Ba obi eyi eyini mupira abala avizu risi.

English: The youth wanted to grab a gun from the police officer.
Luganda: Abavubuka baali baagala kunyakula mmundu ku mupoliisi.
Runyankore: Eminyeeto ekaba neeyenda kujakura embundu kuruga aha muporiisi.
Acholi: Bulu onongo mito mayo muduku kibot abili
Ateso: Akotosi atumunak ademun emudu kanejai epolisit.
Lugbara: Ba ode 'dayi leki osu pa engazu polisi azi vu.

English: The police released live bullets to the crowd.
Luganda: Poliisi yafulmya amasasi aga ddala mu bantu.
Runyankore: Abaporiisi bakarasha amasasi omu bantu.
Acholi: Abili kucelo ricac i kom lwak
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin inomanasi imudun nejaas itunga.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi ogbi osu efi ada 'diyi o'bi eyi trapi 'da ma alea.

English: They transferred him to another hospital.
Luganda: Baamukyusa ne bamutwala mu ddwaliro eddala.
Runyankore: Bakamwoheereza omwirwariro erindi.
Acholi: Ki kobe me tere iot yat mukene
Ateso: Aponi ngesi ijularai adekis acie.
Lugbara: Ba ji eri arujo nduni ma alea.

English: They continued investigating the matter.
Luganda: Baagenda mu maaso n'okunoonyereza ku nsonga.
Runyankore: Bakagumizamu barikubuuririza aha nshonga.
Acholi: Gumede ki kwedo ngo ma otime
Ateso: Inyikokitos kesi aingic ngun.
Lugbara: Eyi mu drile e'yo 'da ma eti ondazu.

English: The youth were advised to remain calm and composed.
Luganda: Abavubuka baawabulwa okusigala nga bakkakkamu.
Runyankore: Eminyeeto ekahaburwa kuguma n'obutereera kandi etarikutiina.
Acholi: Ki lego bulu me bedo mot
Ateso: Aponi icorakinai atumunak asalakin inapakina.
Lugbara: Ba ai 'ba ode 'da eyi aa'zu e'yere.

English: The police will arrest any disobedient youth.
Luganda: Poliisi ejja kusiba abavubuka abatali beetoowaze.
Runyankore: Poriisi neija kukwata omunyeeto weena oine engyesho mbi.
Acholi: Abili obimako bulu mokeken ma turu cik
Ateso: Epote ipolisin aikamar edio atumunan lo emengerana.
Lugbara: Polisi ni mu 'ba ode ci azita vuti obipi kuri bi ci.

English: One of the members died after the incident.
Luganda: Omu ku kibinja yafa oluvannyuma lw'ebyaliwo.
Runyankore: Omwe ahari ba memba, akafa kyaheza kubaho.
Acholi: Ngat acel otoo inge peko megudu time
Ateso: Abu ediope etunganan otwana akaulo na akangas.
Lugbara: Ba 'da eyi ma aluri dra e'yo i 'yepi 'da ma vutia.

English: The body was recovered on a Monday morning.
Luganda: Omulambo gwalabika ku Bbalaza ku makya.
Runyankore: Omutumbi bakagureeba aharw'okubanza omukasheeshe.
Acholi: Ki nongo lyel iceng baraja odiko
Ateso: Aponi odumunai akuwan ke nabalasa tipuruc.
Lugbara: Ba esu avu 'da o'du alu ma o'bitisi.

English: He was accused of stealing a motorcycle.
Luganda: Yavunaanibwa ogw'okubba ppikippiki.
Runyankore: Bamujunaana okwiba Pikipiki.
Acholi: Ki dote pi kwalo piki piki
Ateso: Etoroniaritai nges kanu akoko epikipik.
Lugbara: Ba to eri pikipiki ma ogu si.

English: Her son's death saddened her.
Luganda: Okufa kwa mutabani we kwamunakuwaza.
Runyankore: Okufa kw'omutabani kukamusaasa.
Acholi: Too pa wode ocwero cwinye tutwal
Ateso: Abu atwanare okooke itakadikisi nges.
Lugbara: Eri ma mvi ma dra fe eridri candi saaru.

English: He was surprised by the death of his brother.
Luganda: Yawuniikirizibwa okufa kwa mugandawe.
Runyankore: Okufa kwa mwene nyina kukamutangaaza.
Acholi: Too pa omine omako wiye tutwal
Ateso: Abu atwanare onaceke isiriengu nges.
Lugbara: Eri eca osuta si eri ma adri ma dra si.

English: My brother is innocent, and it will be proven in courts of law.
Luganda: Muganda wange talina musango era kijja kukakasibwa mu kkooti z'amateeka.
Runyankore: Mwene maawe taine rubanja, kandi nikiija kuhamibwa omu kooti z'ebiragiro.
Acholi: Omera petye ki bal dok court obi nongo kumeno
Ateso: Mam onaceka ediakarit, ido eponio angicun kadieket na ikisila.
Lugbara: Ma adri 'ye e'yo 'da kuye dika koti ni nga esu 'dale.

English: The boy passed on without being tried.
Luganda: Omulenzi yafa nga tannawozesebwa.
Runyankore: Omwojo akafa batakamucwereire mushango.
Acholi: Awobi ni oto ma pe giwinyo adot ma kiketo i kome I kot
Ateso: Abu esapat otwana komam epupitai emusago.
Lugbara: Agupiamva 'da dra de nga po'di 'ba ji eri kotia ku.

English: He was lively before he was imprisoned.
Luganda: Yali mulamu bulungi nga tannasibwa.
Runyankore: Akaba aine amaani obu yaabaire atakasibirwe.
Acholi: Onongo kome yot ma pwod pe ki tweye
Ateso: Arai ngesi loajok erongo ewena.
Lugbara: Eri ndra ari aci be de nga po'di 'ba jini eri arujoa ku.

English: He had bruises on his face but let us wait for the medical report.
Luganda: Yabadde n'enkwagulo mu kyenyi kye naye ka tulinde alipoota y'abasawo.
Runyankore: Akaba ahonagurikire ahamaisho, kwonka reka turinde ripooti ya poriisi.
Acholi: En ononge tye ki bur iwange ento kong wakur winyo adwoki me kwed pa abili
Ateso: Ajaas nges amusungun oreet konye edareutu ber apapulai nu adekis.
Lugbara: Eri vu nya'biliko eyi ndra eri ma andretia ci te 'ba ma te nga e'yo dakitari ma tia ri.

English: The officials explained that the boy sustained injuries on his face.
Luganda: Abakungu bannyonyola nti omulenzi yafunye ebisago mu maaso.
Runyankore: Abakungu bakashoborora ngu omwojo akahutaara ahamaisho.
Acholi: Abilli guwaco ni awobi ni onongo awano iwange
Ateso: Ebalas eswamak ebe ajaas esapat arwoma oreet.
Lugbara: Azi'ba 'da eyi 'yo kini agupiamva 'da esu nya'biliko eyi i ma andretia

English: The medical report will disclose what happened to the boy.
Luganda: Ebbaluwa y'eddwaliro ejja kulambika kiki ekyatuuse ku mulenzi.
Runyankore: Ripoota y'eirwariro, neija kworeka ekyabaire aha mwojo ogwo.
Acholi: Adwoki me kwed pa daktari obi nyutu ngo ma otime tin
Ateso: Ebuni eripoti lo adekis aitodun nu opotu otakanikisi esapat.
Lugbara: E'yo dakitari eyini esu ri ni nga a'du e'yo 'ye agupiamva 'da ni yari ofu ra.

English: The officers will be arrested if the boy was tortured.
Luganda: Abaserikale bajja kusibibwa singa omulenzi aba nga yatulugunyizibwa.
Runyankore: Ba ofiisa nibaija kukwatwa, omwojo ku araabe yabonabonesiibwe.
Acholi: Kibi mako abili kace inen kinongo ni awobi ni ki unu auna
Ateso: Aponio arocun ipolisin arai ibungatai esapat.
Lugbara: Ba nga polisi 'da eyi obi ra 'ba ka esu 'ba fe agupiamva 'da ni candi ra ria.

English: The family should follow legal procedures as they lay the boy to rest.
Luganda: Ab'enganda balina okugoberera enkola y'amateeka nga baziika omulenzi.
Runyankore: Ab'ekika bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro baaba nibamuziika.
Acholi: Joo pa awobi ni omyero gutii ki yoo me cik kung nongo gikano kome
Ateso: Ekot ekale atupakin emusago akaulo na ainuk esapat.
Lugbara: Le famila 'da ma azita kotini 'diyi ma vuti eyini agupiamva 'da saria.

English: The district police commander accepted to follow up on the incident.
Luganda: Omuserikale akulira disitulikiti  yakirizza okulondoola ebyaliwo.
Runyankore: Orikuduumira poriisi omu Disiturikiti, akaikiriza kucoodooza ekyo ekyabaireho.
Acholi: Ladit wi abili oyee me lubu kor lok eni
Ateso: Abu distric polis komanda ocamu atupakin nu akangas.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi ma ambo distrikitia ri ai e'yo 'da ma vuti ondazu ra.

English: The police are waiting for the medical report from the doctor.
Luganda: Poliisi erinda alipoota y'eddwaliro okuva ew'omusawo.
Runyankore: Poriisi erindiriire ripoota kuruga omwirwariro.
Acholi: Abili tye ka kuru adwoki me kwed pa daktari
Ateso: Idaritos ipolisin eripoti lo amukian kanejai emuron.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi nga e'yo dakitari ma tia ri te.

English: The boy's injuries were self-sustained.
Luganda: Omulenzi ebisago ye yabyetuusaako.
Runyankore: Obuhuta bw'omwojo, niwe yabweteireho.
Acholi: Awobi ni oketo awano ni i kome en kene
Ateso: Edumunit esapat amusungun kanuke bon.
Lugbara: Agupiamva 'da esu i ma nya'biliko 'dayi ceni.

English: The police should have protected him from himself.
Luganda: Poliisi yandi mukumye obutabeera yekka.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekaba eshemereire kumubangira.
Acholi: Abili onongo omyero ogwok en i kom en kene
Ateso: Ti ipolisin eyuaritos nges mam aikangasikin bon.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi ndra erini ta mbazu fe eri ma ngulupi vurisi.

English: People are recovering from coronavirus.
Luganda: Abantu bawona akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abantu bariyo nibakira oburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Dano tye kacang i kom two corona
Ateso: Ewutas itunga angaleun ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba eyi atita esu azo korona nirisi.

English: The patients will be deployed to the consulate.
Luganda: Abalwadde bajja kutwalibbwa ku yaffesi y'omubaka w'ensi.
Runyankore: Abarwaire nibaija kutwarwa aha kitebe ky'entumwa.
Acholi: Kibi nyutu lutwoo eni bot lacung wi dwa me lobo mukene
Ateso: Eponio aijukanar adekak aiboisitikec bon.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga ꞌba azoru ́diyi ma ti pe muzu pari eꞌyo eti ondazuri ma alia.

English: Uganda had a task of ensuring their safety.
Luganda: Uganda yalina ekkatala ery'okukakasa nti bali bulungi.
Runyankore: Uganda ekaba eine omurimo gw'okubarinda gye.
Acholi: Lobo uganda onongo tye ki tic me gwoko gi
Ateso: Ajaas Uganda keda aswam na ayuarite kes.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri ma azi ndra nezu kini eyi esu tambaza ra

English: People have to stay in quarantine for fourteen days.
Luganda: Abantu balina okubeera mu kalantiini okumala ennaku kkumi na nnya.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kumara omu karantiini ebiro ikumi na bina.
Acholi: Dano omyero gubed kama joo corona bedo iye pi nino apar wiye angwen
Ateso: Ebeit itunga asalakite okalitini adaun aparasia atomonaongon.
Lugbara: Ba le 'ba eyi ma aa angu 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule 'diyi ma alea o'du mudrini su

English: Coronavirus patients are responding well to the medicine.
Luganda: Eddagala likola bulungi ku balwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba korona, omubazi nigubakorera gye.
Acholi: Yat tye ka tic maber i kom lutwo corona
Ateso: Ejaas adekak luka ekorona atamakin ecamunit adeka ekia.
Lugbara: Aro azo korona niri ni azi nga 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua muke.

English: People must observe the covid nineteen guidelines.
Luganda: Abantu balina okugoberera ebiragiro ebikwatagana ku kirwadde kya covid.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro ikumi na mwenda ebirikubarinda Korana.
Acholi: Dano omyero gulub cik ma kwako two corona
Ateso: Ekot itunga atupite aicoreta nuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma obi azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma vuti.

English: The government should not disclose the identity of coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Gavumenti terina kwasanguza bikwata ku balwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Gavumenti teshemereire kworeka ebirikukwata aha barwaire ba korona.
Acholi: Gamente omyero pe onyut lok kom lutwo bot lwak
Ateso: Mam apugan alimor ikiroria adekak ekorona.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma ofu 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma ru ku.

English: The hospitals in Arua have the capacity to handle covid nineteen patients.
Luganda: Amalwaliro mu Arua galina obusobozi obukwasaganya abalwadde ba covid-19.
Runyankore: Amarwariro g'omuri Arua, nigabaasa kukora ahabarwaire ba korona mwenda bonka.
Acholi: Ot yat me Arua tye ki jami weng ma mite me tic i kom lutwo corona
Ateso: Adekisia nu Arua epedorete aidar adekak ekorona.
Lugbara: Arojo Arua 'diyi ma okpo ca 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma tambazu ra.

English: The medical department and the people are working together to contain the virus.
Luganda: Ekitongole ekijjanjabi wamu n'abantu bakolera wamu okusobola okufufugaza akawuka.
Runyankore: Abairwariro, hamwe n'abantu, nibakorera hamwe okuzibira korona.
Acholi: Lutic yoto kom ki lwak tye katic matek me lweny i kom two corona
Ateso: Iswamai ewai lo angaleu nepepe keda itunga aitikitik ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba alata ni 'diyi azi nga tualu o'bi eyi be azo korona niri ma omgbo ndezu.

English: The minister commended the health practitioners for the outstanding job they are doing.
Luganda: Minisita yeebazizza abasawo olw'omulimu omusukkulumu gwe bakola.
Runyankore: Minisita akasiima abashaho, ahabw'omurimo ogu barikukora.
Acholi: Minister opwoyo lutic yot kom pi tic maber ma gitye katimo ne
Ateso: Abu eminista itur eswamak lu adekis kanu aswam kec najokan.
Lugbara: Minisita 'da fe awa'difo azi'ba alata ni 'diyini azi onyiru eyini 'ye risi.

English: People were worried that they might contact coronavirus.
Luganda: Abantu baali beeraliikirivu nti bayinza okukwatibwa akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abantu bakaba berarikiriire ngu nibabaasa kukwatwa korona.
Acholi: Dano obedo ki lworo ni gubi nongo two corona
Ateso: Akadakitos itunga ebe epedorete kesi aikatun ekorona.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi ndra orisi kini eyi eco nga azo korona niri esu ra.

English: Ugandans are testing positive of the global pandemic in West Nile.
Luganda: Bannayuganda mu West Nile bakakasiddwa okuba n'ekirwadde ekitawaanyizza ensi yonna.
Runyankore: Omu kicweka kya West Nile, abanya Uganda kubarikukyeberwa bashangwa baine oburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Anywali uganda gitye ka nongo gi ki two ma opoto ni I West nile
Ateso: Inwakunono itunga luko West Nile adeka na iriamit akwap na.
Lugbara: Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi azo korona niri esu woko WestNile niri ma alea.

English: The medical department should test all contacts of coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Ekitongole ekijjanjabi kirina okukebera abatabagana n'abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara, kishemereire kukyebera boona abaineakakwaate n'omurwaire wa Corona.
Acholi: Daktari omyero gupim joo weng ma gurwate ki ngat ma ginongo ki two corona
Ateso: Ekot ewai lo angaleu ainwak itunga kere lo agongas keda adekak.
Lugbara: Le woko alata niri ma o'bi 'ba dria i ecipi 'ba azo korona niri be ra 'diyi ma ari ra.

English: The truck drivers are the major source of coronavirus in the country.
Luganda: Abavuzi biroole be basinga okusibukako akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abavugi ba roore, nibo barikukira kurugiriraho oburwaire bwa korona omwihanga.
Acholi: Ludwo mutoka madongo en aye dong giloyo kelo two corona
Ateso: Etekerak alorei kes luipu eyaunenete ekorona akwap wok.
Lugbara: Dereva mutukari ambu 'diyi onzupi 'diyi azo korona niri eji kari 'di ma alea ndeni.

English: People should maintain law and order.
Luganda: Abantu balina okukuuma amateeka n'obutebenkevu.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro n'obutereera.
Acholi: Dano omyero gulub cik ma kwako two corona
Ateso: Ekot itunga aidar ikisila ka ainapakina.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma obi azita eyi ma vuti.

English: The priest was badly injured.
Luganda: Omusumba yalumiziddwa bubi nnyo.
Runyankore: Omusesorodooti akahutazibwa kubi.
Acholi: Padi onongo awano marac adida
Ateso: Abu ekimat imusungun erono.
Lugbara: Padre 'da esu nya'biliko eyi onzi onzi.

English: The accused denied the police charges.
Luganda: Omuwawaabirwa yeegaana emisango gya poliisi.
Runyankore: Orikujunaanwa akeehakana omushango.
Acholi: Ngat ma kimoro adot i kome ni okwero adot meno woko
Ateso: Abu lo iwosatai ogir emusago.
Lugbara: Agu 'bani to 'da ga agata e'yo 'bani i tozu 'dasi ci.

English: The prosecutor had motives in the case.
Luganda: Omuwaabi wa gavumenti yalina ebigendererwa bye mu musango.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi akaba aine ebigyendererwa omu mushango.
Acholi: Langol kop obedo ki miti ne ilok enuni
Ateso: Ejaas lo ewosan keda nuke acie.
Lugbara: ꞌBa purosekiutaruri ma asiꞌbaza ndra kesi ꞌda ma dria ci.

English: The accused is of old age who cannot serve a prison sentence.
Luganda: Omuwawaabirwa mukadde nnyo tasobola kukola kibonerezo mu kkomera.
Runyankore: Orikujunaanwa, akuzire omu myaka, tarikubaasa kuza omu kihome.
Acholi: Ngat ma adot tye i kome ni otegi tutwal dok pe twero tyeko mwaka mapol ibuc
Ateso: Erai lo iwosatai lo emojongit mam epedori angetakin awenio ke.
Lugbara: Agu 'bani to 'da ma eli angiri erini ani ecozu aa'zu ombezaru arujoa ku.

English: The judge almost failed to give a sentence because it was between priests.
Luganda: Omulamuzi kata alemererwe okusala ekibonerezo kuba omusango gwali wakati w'abasumba.
Runyankore: Omuramuzi akaba ari haihi kuremwa kuha ekifubiro, ahabw'okuba bakaba bari abasesorodooti.
Acholi: Langol kop onongo cok ngolo lok oloye pien ni onongo tye iki padi ariyo
Ateso: Adiakit atubon aimen atubokin je awenio naarai ajai kiding na imakio ekanisa.
Lugbara: Duani 'da o'bi e'yo liza fe ti a'dusikuni e'yo 'dari padre eyi ma eselea.

English: There is no evidence to pin the defendant.
Luganda: Tewali bujulizi bulumiriza muwawaabirwa.
Runyankore: Tihariho bujurizi bwona, oburikurumiriza kihababirwa.
Acholi: Caden peke i kom ngat ma kingolo kop iwiye ni
Ateso: Amamei ajenanut na etubokinere lo iwosatai.
Lugbara: Afa azi ecopi e'dapi kini agu 'bani to kotia 'da eza e'yo ra ada ni yo

English: The state attorney was against granting the accused a court bail.
Luganda: Omuwolereza wa gavumenti yali awakanya eky'okweyimirira omuwawaabirwa.
Runyankore: Omuhorereza wa Gavumenti, akaba naahakanisa eky'okurekura omusibe aha biragiro bya kooti.
Acholi: The state attorney was against granting the accused a court bail.
Ateso: Mam ewosan apugan akoto ocamakinai lo iwosatai alakunio.
Lugbara: ꞌBa makata ma alia omvele mundutisi State Attoney ruri ga ꞌba arujoari ofu ko sendesi si.

English: The defendant's lawyers filed for the court bail.
Luganda: Bannamateeka b'omuwawaabirwa baasaba okweyimirirwa mu kkooti.
Runyankore: Ba puriida ba kihababirwa, bakashaba okurekurwa kwa kihababirwa.
Acholi: Lupirida pa ngat ma ki dote ni gu miyo kwac ni kigonye ki ibuc kung nongo winyo lok i kome pwod mede anyim
Ateso: Apotu ipulidan kalo iwosatai ilipata alakunio ke.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani toleri vile loya ꞌdiyi si waraga ꞌaizu ꞌbani eri ofuzu sendesi ni.

English: Defence lawyers explained that their client has a right to legal processes.
Luganda: Bannamateeka abawoloreza bannyonnyola nti mukama waabwe alina eddembe okuyita mu mitendera gy'amateeka.
Runyankore: Ba puriida, bashoborora ngu omuntu waabo, aine obugabe kuhozesibwa.
Acholi: Lupirida pa ngat ma adot tye i kome ni guwaco ni dano gi tye ki twero me nongo ber pa yoo me cik matye
Ateso: Apotu ipulidan itatamata ebe ejaas ekc etunganan keda apedor na apupokinio.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani toleri vile loya ꞌdiyi kini eri ma drilemgbo ci eꞌyo dria yi ꞌyepi makata ma alia ꞌdiyi esuzu.

English: The priest is too old for a prison sentence.
Luganda: Kabona mukadde nnyo okubeera mu kkomera.
Runyankore: Omusesorodootii, n'omugurusi munonga tarikubaasa kusibwa.
Acholi: Padi ni otii tutwal ma pe gi romo miyo pwod me bedo ibuc
Ateso: Emojongit ekimat ekanisa noi ne mam epatanar atubokinia.
Lugbara: Padre 'da de ambamba 'bani eri ombezu arujoa.

English: The defendant's lawyers stated that they want to see justice served.
Luganda: Bannamateeka b'omuwawaabirwa baagamba nti baagala okulaba obwenkanya nga bukolebwa.
Runyankore: Ba puriida ba kihababirwa, bakagira ngu nibenda kureeba oburinganiza omu mushango.
Acholi: Lupirida pa ngat ma adot tye i kome ni guwaco ni gimito neno ka adaa bedo tye ilok eni
Ateso: Apotu ipulidan kalo iwosatai eketakinos ebe ekotosi kesi ekisil iswama.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ꞌbani toleri vile loya ꞌdiyi kini yi le ne ꞌba ꞌye eꞌyo ta sipi azita palaari ra.

English: The hospital has successfully treated coronavirus patients.
Luganda: Eddwaliro limalirizza bulungi okujjanjaba balwadde ba ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Eirwariro, riraguriire abarwaire ba korona bakiira.
Acholi: Ot yat otiyo maber i kom lutwo corona
Ateso: Apedo adekis amukian adekak lu ekorona.

English: The district task force has intercepted all the positive cases in the district.

Runyankore: Akakiiko akateirweho kurwanisa korona omu disiturikiti, katangire abarwaire ba korona boona omu disiturikiti.

English: The task force has ensured that the positive cases are quarantined and treated.

Runyankore: Akakiiko aka kahamize ngu boona abaine korona, batwarwa omu karantiini.
Acholi: joo ma doro lok me corona gutimo tek me neno ni
Ateso: Abu atukot naka itnga luingaranakinete luce itijena ebe ngul kere lu ejatatar keda ekorona elosio aidar okalitini.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi ne ra kini 'ba dria azo korona niri be 'diyi aa a'dule azini eyi aro esu

English: The medical department and the taskforce have received immense support from the government.
Luganda: Ekitongole ekijjanjabi n'akakiiko akalabirizi bifunye obuyambi bungi nnyo okuva mu gavumenti.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara hamwe nakakiiko ako, batungire obuhwezi bwingi kuruga omu Gavumenti.
Acholi: Joo ma doro lok me corona ki daktari gunongo kony madit kibot gamente
Ateso: Abu ewai lo amukian ka atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce  odum agangat kanejai apugan.
Lugbara: Arakala e'yo aro niri ni ri tualu drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi esu atita amboru engazu gamete vu

English: The medical personnel have handled and contained coronavirus pandemic.
Luganda: Abajjanjabi bakwasaganyizza n'okufufugaza ekirwadde kya ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'omu irwariro, babaasize kukora ahaburwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Lutic yot kom gutiyo maber i kom two corona
Ateso: Apotu eswamak lu adekis itingata ka aitikitik adeka na ekorona.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'di a'di azo korona niri be, dika eyi nde azo nde ma okpo ra

English: The minister explained that doctors are capable, committed, focused and experienced.
Luganda: Minisita yannyonnyodde nti abasawo basobola, beewaddeyo,bali ku mulamwa era bamanyirivu.
Runyankore: Minisita akashoborora ngu ba dokita nibabaasa, nibafayo kandi eki barikukora nibakimanya.
Acholi: Minister owaco ni lutic yoto kom gitye ki kero ki diro me tic, gi keto cwiny gi dok bene dong gutiyo pi kare malac
Ateso: Abu eminista otema ebe eraas imurok lu epedoritos, iswamaete, itekoro ido emisiaritos.
Lugbara: Minisita ece kini dakitari yi ꞌba ecopi ra, asi ꞌbapi ra , angu lupi eꞌyo kililiruri vu, azini eꞌyo onipi angiri ꞌdiyi.

English: Health workers should have their salaries increased.
Luganda: Abasawo balina okwongezebwa emisaala.
Runyankore: Emishaara y'abashaho eshemereire kwongyezibwa.
Acholi: Omyero kimed mucarapa lutic yoto kom
Ateso: Ekot aiyatakin eropit eswamak lu adekis.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma otu azi'ba alatani 'diyi ma musara ra.

English: Health workers should remain dedicated because they have a big role to play.
Luganda: Abasawo balina okusigala nga banyiikivu kubanga balina omulimu munene nnyo ogw'okukola.
Runyankore: Abashaho baine kuguma nibakora n'amaani, ahabwokuba omurimo nimuhango.
Acholi: Lutic yoto kom omyero guket cwinygi katic pien ni tic gi dwong tutwal
Ateso: Ekot eswamak lu adekis asalakite egogongikitos aswam naarai ejai kes epelu loepol.
Lugbara: Le azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma owi eyi sa'wa driasi a'dusikuni azi eyini ri azi azi okporu ni i

English: The task force sensitized people to carry out social distancing.
Luganda: Akakiiko akakubirizi kaasomesa abantu okukuuma amabanga wakati waabwe.
Runyankore: Akakiiko akateirweho, kakamanyisa abantu ngu baine kugira enkora eya otampika haih
Acholi: Joo ma doro lok me corona gulego dano me bedo mabor ki joo mukene
Ateso: Abu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce isisianak itunga alaikina kanejaas itunga icie.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi fe o'bi eyini imbata eyi ma esele cozu ci

English: The health workers have been cognizant and have handled the virus effectively.
Luganda: Abasawo babadde bamanyi kye bakola era bakutte bulungi akawuka ka ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Abashaho nibamanya eki barikukora, kandi babaasize kukora aha burwaire bwa korona.
Acholi: Lutic yoto kom wang gi obedo twolo dok gutiyo i kom two corona maber tutwal
Ateso: Apiriaka lem eswamak lu adekis ido emukeete lem adekak lu ekorona ejok.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi adri ondua be dika eyi nde azo korona niri ma okpo geri kililiru risi

English: We analyzed the patients and did everything so that they could recover.
Luganda: Twekenneenya abalwadde era ne tukola buli kimu basobole okuwona.
Runyankore: Tukashwijuma abarwaire, twakora kyona ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu baakira.
Acholi: Waneno lutwo ni maber dok watimo jami weng malare me neno ni gucang
Ateso: Apotu iso erereonosi adekak ka aswam nu ipedori kere kanu awanyun ebe engaleunete.
Lugbara: Ama andri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua sa'wa driasi dika a'ye e'yo dria eyini ani atita esuzu

English: The doctor commended the hospital workers for performing well.
Luganda: Omusawo yeebazizza abakozi b'eddwaliro olw'okukola obulungi.
Runyankore: Dokita akasiima abakozi beirwariro ahabw'okukora gye.
Acholi: Dakta opwoyo lutic me ot yat pi tic maber ma gutimo
Ateso: Abu emuron itur eswamak lu adekis kanu aswam ejok.
Lugbara: Dakitari 'da fe awa'difo azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini azi eyini 'ye muke risi

English: Refugee leaders have been trained and equipped with skills to handle the virus.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'abanoonyi b'obubudamu batendekeddwa ne baweebwa obukodyo bw'okukwasaganya akawuka.
Runyankore: Abebeembezi b'empungi, batendekirwe kandi baheebwa ebirikubaabasisa kukora aha korona.
Acholi: Lutela pa luring ayella ki pwonyo gi ki diro weng ma mite me tic i kom two corona
Ateso: Etutuor engarenok lu ikerai kanu aitikitik ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba fe drice'ba emunyale eyini 'diyini imbata azini ondua eyini ecozu azo 'da ndezu

English: The religious organisations have equipped people with skills to curb the virus.
Luganda: Ebitongole by'eddini biwadde abantu obukodyo bw'okwekuuma eri akawuka.
Runyankore: Ebigombe by'ediini, bitendekire abantu oku barikubaasa kurwanisa korona.
Acholi: Dule me dini gumiyo ki dano ngec weng ma mite meneno ni two pe onyaa
Ateso: Apotu iriongeta lu idiinin itutuosi itunga iwaitin lu itikitikere ekorona.
Lugbara: Amuti e'yo aita ni 'diyini 'diyi fe o'bi eyini ondua ecozu azo 'da ndezu

English: People have been educated and trained to handle the virus in Arua.
Luganda: Abantu babanguddwa n'okutendekebwa okwenganga akawuka mu Arua.
Runyankore: Abantu begyesiibwe kandi batendekwa omuringo gw'okurwanisa korona omuri Arua.
Acholi: Ki pwonyo dano i kom kit me tic i kom two Corona I Arua
Ateso: Adaun itunga aisisianakin ka aitutuor aitikitik ekorona ko Arua.
Lugbara: Ba fe o'bi eyini onita azini imbata geri eyini ecozu azo 'da ndezu ri ma dria Arua.

English: The religious organisation has given training facilities to the refugee leaders.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'ebyenzikiriza kiwadde abakulembeze b'abanoonyi b'obubudamu ebikozesebwa mu kutendeka.
Runyankore: Ebigombe by'ediini bihereize abebembezi b'empungi ebikwato by'okukoresa omu kutendeka abantu.
Acholi: Dule me dini guyubu ka pwonyo dano ikabedo kama luring ayella tye iye pi lutella gi
Ateso: Abu erionget lo ediini ijaik engarenok lu ikerai iboro lu itutuonerere.
Lugbara: Amuti e'yo aita niri ni 'da fe afa imbata ni 'diyi drice'ba emunyale eyini 'diyi dri

English: The organisation informed refugees on how to curb the spread of the virus.
Luganda: Ekitongole kyamanyisa abanoonyi b'obubudamu engeri y'okuziyizamu akawuka okusaasaana.
Runyankore: Ekigombe kikamanyisa empungi oku bashemereire kurwanisa korona.
Acholi: Dul eni oniango luring ayella i kom yoo me gengo two corona
Ateso: Abu erionget itijenik ikerai eipone lo etikitikere ekorona.
Lugbara: Amuti 'da fe emunyale eyini imbata geri 'bani ecozu azo 'da atrizu 'diyi ma dria

English: The government has encouraged social distancing, washing hands and putting on masks.
Luganda: Gavumenti ekubirizza abantu okwewa amabanga, okunaaba mu ngalo n'okwambala zi masiki.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neehiga abantu kutahikaana, okunaaba omungaro, n'okujwara za masiki.
Acholi: Gamente ocuku cwiny lwak me bedo mabor ki dano, lwoko cing gi ki ruku mask
Ateso: Abu apugan isinyikok nuka alaikina, ailot akanin ka ainap aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume
Lugbara: Gamete ai 'ba eyi esele cozu, dri ojizu azini masiki eyi suzu ci

English: People should not touch their eyes, nose and mouth.
Luganda: Abantu tebalina kwetwata ku maaso, ennyindo n'omumwa.
