Acholi: Lutela pa district cwiny gi ocwer pien tim eni onyuti goro ma meg gi
Ateso: Akadakitos engarenok lu edisitrikt naarai itodunit ngin amamus kec apedorit.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi eca awoko si a'dusikuni e'yo 'da e'da eyi ma okpo ako eyi

English: The task force has failed to efficiently and effectively plan for the district.
Luganda: Akakiiko akafuzi kalemereddwa okuteekateekera disitulikiti mu bwangu era mu bulungi.
Runyankore: Akakiiko karemirwe kukora gye enteekateeka za disiturikiti.
Acholi: Dul ma ki keto me tic gin tic oloyo gi me yubu plan maber
Ateso: Epiko atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce  aswam nu ebeit ejok kanu edisitrikt.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi o'bi otita eyi 'ba distrikiti ni kililiru ti

English: The people do not have hope in the leadership at the district.
Luganda: Abantu tebakyalina ssuubi mu bukulembeze ku disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Abantu tibaine matsiko omu bwebembezi oburi aha disiturikiti.
Acholi: Lwak peke ki gen i kom tela me district
Ateso: Emamiatatar itunga keda amuno na engarenok ko disitrikt.
Lugbara: O'bi eyi ma asi'baza driceta distrikitia ri ma alea yo.

English: The man died in hospital.
Luganda: Omusajja yafiira mu ddwaliro.
Runyankore: Omushaija akafeera omwirwariro.
Acholi: Lacoo ni otoo ki iot yat
Ateso: Abu etunganan otwana adekis.
Lugbara: Agupi 'da dra arojoa.

English: She did everything to save her life.
Luganda: Yakola buli kimu okuwonya obulamu bwe.
Runyankore: Akakora kyona ekirikubaasika, okujuna amagara ge.
Acholi: En otimo jami weng me laro kwo pa latwo
Ateso: Abu ngesi iswama nu apedori kere kanu ayuun aijar ke.
Lugbara: Eri 'ye e'yo dria ecozu eri ma edri pazu.

English: Health workers will not be intimidated because their duty is to provide health services.
Luganda: Abasawo tebajja kutiisibwatiisibwa kubanga omulimu gwabwe kugaba mpeereza za bujjanjabi.
Runyankore: Abashaho tibarikwija kutiinisibwa, ahabw'okuba omurimo gwaabo n'okujanjaaba.
Acholi: Lutic me yot kom pe bi bedo ki lworo pien tic gi obedo miyo dano kony me yot kom
Ateso: Mam eswamak lu adekis eponio aitukurian naarai aswam kec erai amukian itunga.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ngani mu aa orisi kuri a'dusikuni eyi ma azi eri azakoma rua ala ni 'diyi fezu o'bi eyidri

English: Non-government organisations have been forced to participate in containing the virus.
Luganda: Ebitongole bya nakyewa bikakiddwa okwetaba mu kutangira akawuka.
Runyankore: Ebitongore ebitari bya Gavumenti, bigyemesereziibwe kwejumba omu kurwanisa Korona.
Acholi: Dul tic ma pe jenge i kom gamente ki diyo gi me neno ni kwidi pe oket
Ateso: Iriongeta icie kes aremokin ajaikin akiro nu aitikitik adeka.
Lugbara: Ba omi amuti gamete ni ku dika orodri robia niri esupi ku 'diyi azi ngazu azo korona niri ma ereta atrizu okposi

English: The district lacks funds do facilitate service provision.
Luganda: Disitulikiti terina nsimbi za kuddukanya buweereza.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti teine sente z'okuhwera omukureeta obuheereza.
Acholi: District peke ki lim me konyo tic
Ateso: Emamete edisitrikt ikapun lu itwasamao kanu aswamisinei.
Lugbara: Distrikiti 'di vu Robia azi eyi ngazu yo

English: Organisations which help the district will be rewarded while those who fail will be penalized.
Luganda: Ebitongole ebiyamba ku disitulikiti bijja kusiimibwa so nga ebyo ebiremereddwa bya kubonerezebwa.
Runyankore: Ebitongore ebirikuhwera disiturikiti nibiija kuheebwa ebiconco, kandi ebyo ebireije kuremwa, nibiija kufubirwa.
Acholi: Dul tic ma padi padi ma konyo gamente kibi culu gi ento magukwero konyo gamente ki bino keto pwod iwi gi
Ateso: Iriongeta lu ingarakitos edistric kesi eponio airop dodo ngul lu mam eponio aitatac.
Lugbara: Ba nga mu amuti distrikiti ni azakoma fepi ra 'diyi ni feta fe dika azi awipi distrikiti ni azakoma fepi ku 'diyi mu panga esu

English: The district received aid at the district level.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yafuna obuyambi ku ddaala lya disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ekatunga obuhwezi, aharurengo rwayo.
Acholi: District onwongo kony irwom pa district
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt odum agangat adoketait na edisitrikt.
Lugbara: Distrikiti esu azakoma fele distrikiti eyini ri.

English: The district acquired protective materials for Covid nineteen.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yafuna eby'okwesabika eri ekirwadde kya covid.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti, ekatunga ebikwato by'okuzihwera kwerinda endwara ya Covid-19.
Acholi: District onongo jami me gwoke i kom two corona virus
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt odum iswamasia lu ayuaritor ekorona.
Lugbara: Distrikiti esu afa tambaza fepi azo korona nirisi 'diyi ra.

English: The district and the organisation have got a standing relationship.
Luganda: Disitulikiti n'ekitongole birina enkolagana ennywevu.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti hamwe n'ekitongore, bikagira enkorengana.
Acholi: District ki dul tic i komtwo corona gi tye ki wat maber
Ateso: Edisitrikt keda erionget ejaas keda abwoetait na eswamae.
Lugbara: Amuti ꞌdari pi ma eselea disitrikiti be agyi azini ni nga kiri muria drile.

English: The district received soap which will help in facilitating hand washing.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yafuna sabbuuni ajja okuyamba mu kunaaba engalo.
Runyankore: Disiturikitie katunga esabuuni erije kubahwera okunaaba omungaro.
Acholi: District onongo cabun ma bi konyo dano me lwoko cingi
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt odum esabunyu lo ingarakini kanu ailosia akanin.
Lugbara: Districti esu sabuni ngapi azakoma fepi e'yo dri ojiza niri ma alea ri ra.

English: The district needs people to work together and contain the virus.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yetaaga abantu okukolera awamu okufufugaza akawuka.
Runyankore: Abantu omu za disiturikiti baine kukorera hamwe kubaasa kurwanisa endwara ya korona.
Acholi: District tye ka mito dano me wek gi tii kacel me gengo two ket ikin dano
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt itunga aswam nepepe kanu aitikitik adeka.
Lugbara: Distrikiti ai o'bi eyi azi ngazu tualu azo korona niri ma okpo ndezu.

English: The district called upon all stakeholders to help in handling the virus.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yayitayo abo be kikwatako bonna okulwanyisa akawuka.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ekashaba boona abu kirikukwataho, okuhweera omunkora y'okurwanisa akakooko.
Acholi: District olwongo dano weng ki dul tic weng me miyo kony pi gengo kwidi ket
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt ilip itunga kere aingarakin kowai lo aitikitik adeka.
Lugbara: Distrikiti ai 'ba ambo kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dria azakoma fezu a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be

English: The district explained why health workers need to be supported.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yannyonnyola  lwaki abasawo beetaaga okuwagirwa..
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ekashoborora ahabwenki abashaho bashemereire kuhwerwa.
Acholi: District owaci dano tyen lok me nyutu ni lutic me yot kom mito kony
Ateso: Ebu edisitrikt atatam ibore ekototor eswamak lu adekis aingarakino.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikitia 'diyi nze e'yo afa ndundu lepi azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma esu atita ra ri ma dria

English: The district will ensure proper distribution, allocation and accountability.
Luganda: Disitulikiti ejja kufaayo ku kubunyisa, okugabanya n'embalirira.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti neeza kureeba ngu hariho engaba hamwe n'embaririra nungi.
Acholi: District obineno ni ki poko jami me konyo tic ma ber kede ki miyo adwogi me tic maber
Ateso: Ebuni edisitrikt awanyun akorio, ejanakine ka eipone lo itwasamatere iboro.
Lugbara: Disitrikiti ni nga ne kililiru kini ꞌBa awa afa yi kililiru ra azini ꞌba ece eꞌyogeri ꞌbani yi ayuzu ꞌdiyi ma dria kililiru ra.

English: The health workers have obtained the protective equipment used in treating patients.
Luganda: Abasawo bafunye eby'okwesabika ebinaakozesebwa mu kujjanjaba abalwadde.
Runyankore: Abashaho batungire ebikwato by'okwerinda aha murimo gwabo gw'okuragurira abarwaire.
Acholi: Lutic me yot kom gunongo jami ma konyo gi me gwoke i kom kwidi kagi tye ka miyo kony bot dano ma kom gi lit
Ateso: Adumutu eswamak lu adekis iswamasia lu ayuara kanu aimukia adekak.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu afa osule rua tambaza esuzu azo si 'diyi eyini ani aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri ri 'bo.

English: The district needs to establish ambulance services in the area.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yetaaga okuteekawo empeereza y'ambyulensi mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti neeza kutaho obuheereza bwa ambyurensi omukyanga ekyo.
Acholi: District omyero gunen ni kiketo kony me ambulance ikabedo man
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt aitolomun ejanakine lo ambiulensin kaiboisit.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma eji ambulansi eyi angu 'da ma alea ra.

English: The district has to improve service delivery at the district.
Luganda: Disitulikiti erina okulongoosa obuweereza ku disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti, eine kwongyera aha buheereza omukyanga ekyo.
Acholi: District omyero gunong yoo me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony
Ateso: Ebeit edisitrikt aitojokar ejanakine kodisitrikt.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma otu e'yo azakoma fezu o'bi eyidri distrikitia ri ra.

English: The district has to mobilize and inform people about the spread of covid nineteen.
Luganda: Disitulikiti erina okukunga abantu n'okubasomesa ku kusaasaanyizibwa kwa ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti, eine kumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata kujanjaara kw'oburwaire bwa Korona.
Acholi: District omyero orwee lwak dok omi itgi ngec i kom nya pa Corona
Ateso: Ebeit edisitrikt atukokin ka aitijenikin itunga nu awea na ekorona.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma oku o'bi eyi dika ma fe eyini imbata azo korona niri ma ereta ma dria.

English: The government has delayed transferring funds to the district.
Luganda: Gavumenti eruddewo okusindikaa ssente ku disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ekyerereirwe kwoheereza sente aha disiturikiti.
Acholi: Gamente orii kicwalo cente bot district
Ateso: Eyap apugan aijukar ikapun odisitrikt.
Lugbara: Gamete eza sa'wa robia edrizu distrikitia ra.

English: The police should be brought into play to enforce the covid nineteen guidelines.
Luganda: Poliisi eteekeddwa okuleetebwa mu nkola ekwasise ebiragiro ebyasibwawo okulwanyisa ssenyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Poriisi eshemereire kubitaahamu, ekareeba ngu ebiragiro bya Covid ikumi na mwenda byateebwa omu nkora.
Acholi: Omyero ki mi abili me konyo neno ni dano tye ka lubu cik ma kwako gwoke i kom kwidi
Ateso: Ekot ayaun ipolisin kanu abuikin itunga atupite aicoreta nuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ofi polisi eyi e'yo azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma vuti obiza niri onezu indi.

English: The district should deploy more officers to arrest people who do not follow the guidelines.
Luganda: Disitulikiti eteekwa okusindika abakungu abalala okukwata abantu abatagoberera biragiro.
Runyankore: Poriisi eshemereire kwongyera aha muhendo gwa ba ofiisa baayo, okukwata abantu abatarikukuratira ebiragiro.
Acholi: District omyero gu ket lugwok cik ma pol me mako dano ma pe tye ka lubu cik ma lube ki gwoke i kom kwidi
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt abwaikin ipolisin luipu aikam itunga lu mam etupitos aicoreta.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma o'ba polisi eyi dika 'ba azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma vuti obipi ku 'diyi bizu.

English: People are at risk of contracting the virus.
Luganda: Abantu bali ku bunkenke bw'okukwatibwa akawuka.
Runyankore: Abantu bari omukabi k'okukwatwa korona.
Acholi: Dano twero nwongo kwidi man iyo ma yot
Ateso: Ejaas itunga ationis na aikatun adeka.
Lugbara: Ba eyi eco azo korona niri esu ra

English: The Christians are still conducting prayers and are not afraid of the virus.
Luganda: Abakulisitu bakyasaba era nga tebatidde kukwatibwa kawuka.
Runyankore: Abakristaayo bariyo nibakiza omu kushaba kwabo bateine kutiina akakooko ka korona.
Acholi: Lukristayo gi tye ka cito ilega kun gi pe lworo kwidi
Ateso: Erongo ikuristayon itolosete ailipasinei ido mam ekuriaka adeka.
Lugbara: Kuristiani eyi nga po'di mu izita eyi be drile dika ori ndeni eyi azo korona nirisi ku.

English: People are not concerned about the existence of the coronavirus.
Luganda: Abantu tebafuddeeyo ku kubeerawo kw'akawuka ka ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Abantu tibarikutiina okukwatwa endwara ya korona.
Acholi: Dano pe tye ka paro ni two ni tye
Ateso: Mam itunga epodokitos nu ajaut naka ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba eyi asikini azo corona niri ma e'yosi ku.

English: Some people are still engaging in public gatherings.
Luganda: Abantu abamu bakyetaba mu nkungaana ez'olukale.
Runyankore: Abantu bakiriyo nibakora enteerane z'abantu baingi.
Acholi: Dano mukene pwod gi tye ka cito ika gure
Ateso: Icie itunga erongo etukonokinos.
Lugbara: Ba azi 'diyi nga po'di eyi oku ongulumu eyi ru.

English: The district should inform people about the dangers of coronavirus.
Luganda: Disitulikiti eteekeddwa okumanyisa abantu obulabe obuli mu kawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Za disiturikiti zishemereire kumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha kabi ka korona.
Acholi: District omyero guwac kidano rac pa corona virus
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt aitijenikin itunga atiokisio nu ekorona.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti eyi ma olu o'bi eyini onzi azo korona niri vu 'diyi ra.

English: People should have respect for their lives and those of others.
Luganda: Abantu bateekeddwa okuwa obulamu bwabwe ekitiibwa n'obwabalala.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kuheereza amagara gaabo, hamwe n'agabandi ekitiinisa.
Acholi: Dano omyero obed ki woro pi kwo gi ki kwo pa dano mukene
Ateso: Ekot itunga ayongite aijar kec keda lucie itunga
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma aa inzita be eyi ma edri eyini azini 'ba azi 'diyi ma edri eyini indi .

English: The people should engage in activities that control the spread of the virus.
Luganda: Abantu bateekeddwa okwetaba mu bikolwa ebiziyiza okusaasaana kw'akawuka ka ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kwejumba omu mirimo erikuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka korona.
Acholi: Dano omyero gubed iyub me neno kit me gengo ket pa two corona
Ateso: Ekot itunga aswam aswamisinei nu itikitikete awea na ekorona.
Lugbara: Le o'bi eyi ma 'ye e'yo ecopi azo korona niri ma ereta atripi ra 'diyi.

English: The people who did not heed the presidential directives were warned.
Luganda: Abantu abatafaayo ku biragiro bya pulezidenti baalabulwa.
Runyankore: Abantu abatarakuratiire ebiragiro by'omwebembezi weihanga, bakaraburwa.
Acholi: Dano ma pe obedo ka gwoko lok pa ladit lobo ki ciko gi
Ateso: Aponi ikwenyarai itunga lu mam atupitos aicoreta lokapolon akwap.
Lugbara: Ba fe bile ndu liza 'ba azita purezidenti ni o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obipi ku 'diyini ra.

English: Everyone should follow the covid nineteen guidelines.
Luganda: Buli omu ateekeddwa okugoberera ebiragiro ebikwata ku ssennyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Buri omwe ashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro ebyateirweho kurwanisa covid ikumi na mwenda.
Acholi: Dano weng omyero gulub jami me atiya malube ki gengo kwidi
Ateso: Ekot nginitunganan atupite aicoreta nuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Le 'ba dria ma obi azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma vuti.

English: Anyone who does not respect the guidelines will be arrested.
Luganda: Buli yenna atagondera biragiro ajja kusibibwa.
Runyankore: Buri omwe otarikworobera biragiro neija kukwatwa.
Acholi: Ngat mo keken ma pe olubu cik ki bi make
Ateso: Yen mam etupit aicoreta ebeit arocun.
Lugbara: Ba nga 'ba azita o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obipi ku 'diyi obi ci.

English: The religious leaders are not above the law and should follow the health guidelines.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'eddiini tebali waggulu w'amateeka era balina okugoberera ebiragiro eby'abobulamu
Runyankore: Abebembezi b'ediini, tibari haiguru y'ebiragiro kandi bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara.
Acholi: Ludito dini weng tye ite cik me lobo dok bene omyero gulub jami me atiya me gengo kwidi
Ateso: Engarenok lu idiinin mam ejaas kuju na ekisil ebeit kes atupite aicoreta nu angaleu.
Lugbara: Azi'ba kanisa ni 'diyi aa'ni azita drilea ku dika le eyi obi azita alata ni 'diyi ma vuti.

English: Arua diocese heed to the guidelines and the church activities were suspended.
Luganda: Obulabirizi bwa Arua tebwafaayo ku biragiro era emirimu gy'ekkanisa ne giwummuzibwa.
Runyankore: Obureeberezi bwa Arua bukorobera ebiragiro, kandi emirimo y'ekanisa, ekemerezibwa.
Acholi: Diocese me Arua gugwoko cik dok gure pa lwak ite kanica ki jukuoo
Ateso: Abu edaiosis lo Arua otup aicoreta kosodi ekanisa aitamamun aswamisinei nu ekanisa.
Lugbara: Dayasesi Arua niri obi azita o'bale 'diyi ma vuti 'bani ani 'yeta kanisa ni 'diyi atrizu nga ci

English: The police have failed to enforce the coronavirus guidelines effectively.
Luganda: Poliisi eremereddwa okukwasisa obulungi ebiragiro by'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Poriisi eremirwe kuhamya ngu abantu nibakuratira gye ebiragiro ebyatairweho kwerinda korona.
Acholi: Miyo dano lubu cik ma kwako gwoke i kom two oloyo abili
Ateso: Epikosi ipolisin abuikin itunga aitup ikisila lu ekorona ejok.
Lugbara: Arumadreyi o'bi azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma tamba ti.

English: The district and police should communicate to the people before they take action.
Luganda: Poliisi ne disitulikiti biteekeddwa okutegeeza abantu nga tebannabaako kye bakolawo.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti hamwe na poriisi, bashemereire kugambira abantu, batakagizire ekibaakora.
Acholi: District ki abili omyero gumi dano ngec ma pud pe gu timo gin mo keken.
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt ka ipolisin aitijenikin itunga erongo kes egeuna airoc.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti azini polisi eyi ma nze nga e'yo o'bi eyi be raka eyi ma e'do e'yo 'ye yeta si ndo.

English: The police have started arresting people who have not followed the established procedures.
Luganda: Poliisi etandise okusiba abantu abatagoberedde mateeka agaateekebwawo.
Runyankore: Poriisi etandikire kukwata abantu abatakuratiire enkora eteirweho.
Acholi: Abili dong tye ka mako dano ma pe tye ka lubu cik ma ki keto
Ateso: Ageutu ipolisin airoc itunga lu mam etupitos nu adaun aitolomun.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi e'do ba azita o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obipi ku 'diyi obi 'bo.

English: People are more concerned about their businesses and not their lives.
Luganda: Abantu byafaayo nnyo ku bizinensi zaabwe okusinga obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibafa ahari bizinesi zaabo munonga, okukira amagara.
Acholi: Dano tye ka paro ka jami kun pe gi gwoke i kom kwidi
Ateso: Epodokitos itunga nuka agwelanar kec konye mere nu aijar kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyi asi ndeni eyi ma tujari eyi si aga eyini asizu eyi ma edri siri ra.

English: Leaders have not sensitized and mobilised people enough.
Luganda: Abakulembeze tebamanyisizza bantu na ku bakunga kimala.
Runyankore: Abebembezi tibamanyise abantu, n'okubegyesa ekirikumara.
Acholi: Lutela pe gupwonyo dano maber
Ateso: Mam engarenok eramitos ka isisianakin itunga ejok.
Lugbara: Drice'ba eyi okuni azini feni nga o'bi eyini imbata caku.

English: The police have confiscated property of people who have failed to obey the directives.
Luganda: Poliisi eboye ebintu by'abantu abalemereddwa okugondera ebiragiro.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekwasire ebintu by'abantu abatakuratiire ebiragiro.
Acholi: Polici otyeko mako jami pa dano ma pe obedo ka lubu cik
Ateso: Apotu ipolisin odemasi itunga iboro lu mam atupitos aicoreta.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi obiki 'ba azita vuti obipi ku 'diyi ma afa eyi ci.

English: People will be forced to obey the covid nineteen directives.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kukakibwa okugondera ebiragiro bya ssenyiga omukambwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibaija kugyemwa kworobera ebiragiro bya covid ninenteen.
Acholi: Ki bi miyo dano lubu cik tetek
Ateso: Ebeit abuikin itunga aitup aicoreta nu ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba nga o'bi eyi omi azita o'bale azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma vuti obizu.

English: People who are giving out inaccurate information about the virus will be arrested.
Luganda: Abantu abawaayo amawulire agatali matuufu ku kawuka bajja kusibwa.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikuheereza amakuru gatahikire agarikukwata aha kakooko ka korona, nibaza kukwatwa.
Acholi: Dano ma pe tye ka miyo lok ma pe tye ada ma kwako kwidi ki bi mako gi
Ateso: Itunga lu elimonokinete akiro nu mam edolitos nuikamunitos ekorona eponio arocun.
Lugbara: Ba nga 'ba e'yo enzoru ri erepi azo korona niri ma dria 'diyi obi ci.

English: People do not believe that the established guidelines will control the virus.
Luganda: Abantu tebakkiriza nti amateeka agaateekebwawo gajja kuziyiza akawuka.
Runyankore: Abantu tibarikwikiriza ngu ebiragiro ebiteirweho, nibiija kurwanisa akakooko.
Acholi: Dano pe giyee ni cik ma kiketo obi gengo two
Ateso: Mam itunga ecamunitos ebe aicoreta nu itolomunitai itikitikete ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba eyi ai ni kini azita o'bale 'diyi eco azo korona niri ma okpo nde ra ri ku.

English: The hospital has limited its accessibility to only specific people.
Luganda: Eddwaliro likirizaako abantu batono okuliyingiramu.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rikyenderize abantu abarikuzayo, obwahati nihataahamu abantu bakye abamanyirwe.
Acholi: Oot yat pe tye ka miyo dano ma pol me donyo kunu
Ateso: Abu adekis itidisia itunga alosenen ilema ngul bon lu ecamakitai.
Lugbara: Arojo 'da ai lu 'ba were eyini ecozu muzu arojoa ni.

English: People want to help their friends who need support.
Luganda: Abantu baagala okuyamba mikwano gyabwe egyetaaga obuyambi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibenda kuhwera bataahi baabo abarikwetenga obuhwezi.
Acholi: Dano tye ka mito miyo kony bot lurem gi ma tye ka mito kony
Ateso: Ekotosi itunga aingarakin ipapero kec lu ekotosi agangat.
Lugbara: Ba eyi le atita fe eyi ma agyipika atita lepi 'diyini.

English: The hospital management does not want people to congest in the hospital wards.
Luganda: Abaddukanya eddwaliro tebaagala bantu kwefuutiika mu bisenge by'abalwadde.
Runyankore: Abarikukurira eirwariro, tibarikwenda abantu baingi kwerundaana omu woodi z'eirwariro.
Acholi: Dul ma loyo oot yat pe tye ka mito ni dano omyero pong ioot yat
Ateso: Mam eyaitene lo adekis ekoto itunga aipues adekis.
Lugbara: Driceza arojo niri leni 'ba e'yi ma tra eyi arojo ma wadi eyi ma alea ku.

English: No one is allowed in the hospital premises without proper handwashing and sanitizing.
Luganda: Tewali akkirizibwa mu ddwaliro nga tanaabye bulungi ngalo na kukozesa sanitayiza.
Runyankore: Tihaine omuntu weena orikwikirizibwa omwirwariro atabandize yanaaba omungaro nari yaakoresa sanitaiza.
Acholi: Pe ki yee dano kakamo keken iot yat teki pe olwoko cinge maleng kede odunyu cinge ki sanitizer
Ateso: Mam ecamakitai idio itunganan adekis komam ilosit akanin ka aisanitising.
Lugbara: Ba ai ni 'ba azi arojo ma angua dri ojiza koko azini dri efiza aro edele ewa si omvele sanitiza ruri koko ku.

English: The hospital should limit the number of visitors in the hospital wards.
Luganda: Eddwaliro liteekeddwa okukendeeza ku nnamba y'abagenyi abagenda mu woodi z'eddwaliro.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rishemereire kukyendeeza abagyenyi abarikuza omu woodi zaryo.
Acholi: Oot yat pe myero oye dano mapol me limo lutwo iward
Ateso: Ekot adekis aitidisiar enaba lo ipejok ko woodin lu adekis.
Lugbara: Le arojo ma esi omu mupi arojo eyi ma wadi eyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ra.

English: The hospital has put forward various guidelines to combat the virus.
Luganda: Eddwaliro litaddewo ebiragiro eby'enjawulo okulwanyisa akawuka.
Runyankore: Eirwariro, riteireho ebintu bingi by'okukuratira kurwanisa korona.
Acholi: Oot yat omoko cik ma pol me gengo kwidi
Ateso: Ebwaiki adekis nuipu nuitupitono kanu aitikokin adeka.
Lugbara: Arojo 'da o'ba azita ndundu eyi azo 'da ma okpo ndezu.

English: No one is allowed to deliver food personally for admitted patients.
Luganda: Tewali n'omu akkirizibwa kutwalira balwadde ku bitanda mmere.
Runyankore: Tihaine omuntu weena orikwikirizibwa kutwarira ebyokurya abarwaire abari aha bitanda.
Acholi: Pe ki ye dano mo keken me miyo cam ki kome bot latwo ioot yat
Ateso: Emamei yen ecamakitai ayangar inyamat nejaas adekak lu iperikitai.
Lugbara: Ba ai'ni 'ba azi ni nyaka ejizu ceni 'ba azoru 'bani 'ba Kitanda dria arojoa 'diyini ku.

English: The ministry of health directed all hospitals to restrict the entry of people.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu yalagira amalwaliro gonna okumyumyula ku bantu abayingira.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'anmagara, ekaragiira amarwariro okuzibira abantu abarikutaahamu.
Acholi: Ministry ma loyo yot kom owaci oot yat weng me miyo dano manok donyo iot yat
Ateso: Abu erionget loka angaleu icorak adekisia kere mam acamakite itunga tai tai.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri fe arojo eyini azita 'ba eyi ma acita arojoa ri ombezu ci

English: Every patient will have one attendant strictly.
Luganda: Buli mulwadde ajja kuba n'omujjanjabi omu yekka.
Runyankore: Buri murwaire weena, naikirizibwa kugira omujanjaabi omwe.
Acholi: Latwo acel acel bi bedo ki dano acel keken ma tye kagwoke ioot yat
Ateso: Ngin adekan ebeit ajaut keda idiope edaran bon.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba azoru ri ma agei tepi ri ni lu nga mu adri alu

English: The ministry wanted to prevent hospitals from harbouring the disease.
Luganda: Minisitule yali eyagala kuziiyiza malwaliro okukungaanya obulwadde.
Runyankore: Minisiture ekaba neeyenda kuzibira amarwariro okutaahirirwa oburwaire.
Acholi: Ministry me yot kom onongo mito gengo odi yadi bedo kama two dwong iye loyo
Ateso: Akoto erionget aitikokin adekisia mam adumun adeka.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alata niri le ndra azo 'da ma awi arojo eyi ma alea ku

English: All hospitals are in emergencies.
Luganda: Amalwaliro gonna gali mu bwerinde.
Runyankore: Amarwariro goona, nigakora aha bihikiirizi.
Acholi: Ot yat weng tye ka tic i kom peko ma ngole atura
Ateso: Adekisia kere ejaas keda atiokisio nu engeso.
Lugbara: Arojo woro ovu ewaru e'tota mbeleru lepiri pie

English: The hospitals will no longer provide health services for simple sicknesses.
Luganda: Amalwaliro tegajja kuba na kujjanjaba bulwadde bwangungu.
Runyankore: Amarwariro nigeija kurekyera aho kuragurira endwara ezitaine maani.
Acholi: Oot yat dong pe bino miyo kony pi two ma tino
Ateso: Mam bobo adekisia imukeete adekasinei nudidika.
Lugbara: Arojo eyi ngani mu aro fe azo werea 'diyisi ku.

English: Patients who recover quickly are discharged to create space in the wards.
Luganda: Abalwadde abawona amangu basiibulwa okusobola okusigazaawo ebifo mu zi waadi.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abarikurahuka kukira, nibasiiburwa kugira ngubarekeho omwanya.
Acholi: Lutwo ma gi bi cang oyot oyot ki bi dwoko gi gang me weko ka bedo pi lutwo mukene
Ateso: Adekak lu engaleunete atipet etwario kanu anyaun apak owoodin.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba atipi 'bo 'diyi ofu mbeleru angu zizu wadi eyi ma alea.

English: Some people lost their lives as they tried to break out of prison.
Luganda: Abantu abamu baafiirwa obulamu bwabwe nga bagezaako okutoloka mu kkomera.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi bakaferwa amagara gaabo, barikugyezaho kutoroka omu kihome.
Acholi: Dano mukene gurwenyo kwo gi ka gi tye ka temo lwi ki buc
Ateso: Apotu icie itunga otwakiasi aijar kec etamitos aisi ojera.
Lugbara: Ba azi eyi avi eyi ma edri eyini leria aparia arujoa si.

English: The police are still searching for ten other inmates who escaped.
Luganda: Poliisi ekyanoonya abasibe abalala kkumi abaatoloka.
Runyankore: Poriisi ekweise nehiiga abandi basibe ikumi abatorokire.
Acholi: Abili pwod tye kayenyo mabuc apar ma olwi
Ateso: Eringa polis emoi iwenan itomon lu opotu okerata.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi nga aru azi mudri apapi te 'diyi ndanda.

English: The security at the prison was lax.
Luganda: Obukuumi ku komera tebwali bw'amaanyi.
Runyankore: Abebyokwerinda ababaire bari ahakihome, tibarateiremu maani.
Acholi: Gwoko kuc ibuc onongo pe tye maber
Ateso: Ejalijala isilikalei luko ojera.
Lugbara: Ageitema arujo 'da ma alea ri ndra okpo kokoru.

English: Some prisoners wanted to runway from coronavirus.
Luganda: Abasibe abamu baayagala okudduka akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Abasibe abamwe, bakaba nibenda kuhunga kutakwatwa Korona.
Acholi: Mabuc mukene onongo tye ka mito ngwec me gwoke i kom kwidi
Ateso: Akotosi icie iwenan akerit kanuka ekorona.
Lugbara: Aru azi 'diyi le ndra apa azo korona nirisi.

English: The police will make sure that the remaining prisoners are recaptured.
Luganda: Poliisi ejja kufuba okulaba nti abasibe abasigadde bakwatibwa.
Runyankore: Poriisi neija kureeba ngu abasibe abasigaire bagaruka bakwatwa.
Acholi: Abili obineno ni mabuc mukene ki nongo gi
Ateso: Ebeit polis awanyun ebe ikamunio iwenan lu ideuna.
Lugbara: Le polisi eyi ma ne ra kini 'ba aru azi apapi ra te 'bani nga esu ku 'diyi ebi ra

English: The prisoners are living in poor conditions.
Luganda: Abasibe bawangalira mu mbeera mbi.
Runyankore: Entuura y'abasibe teboneire.
Acholi: Mabuc gitye kabedo ki kwo ma pe ber
Ateso: Ejarete iwenan koipone kalo aronon.
Lugbara: Wura aru 'da eyini aa'zu ri ocokoru.

English: Prisoners were discontented.
Luganda: Abasibbe tebaali bamativu.
Runyankore: Abasibe bakaba batamazirwe.
Acholi: Mabuc onongo igi pe yom
Ateso: Akadakinitos iwenan.
Lugbara: Ba aru ru 'dayi aa'ni ndra ayikosi ku.

English: The prisoners could no longer endure the congestion in prison.
Luganda: Abasibe baali tebakyayinza kwebeera mugoteeko oguli mu kkomera.
Runyankore: Abasibe bakaba batakibaasa kugumira omwijuzo ogwabaire guri omu kihome.
Acholi: Mabuc onongo pegitwero kanyo pien buc onongo opong mada
Ateso: Mam bobo iwenan apedoritos angirikin eingony lo amabusu.
Lugbara: Aru 'da eyi econi 'di ndra omita eyini eyi omizu arujoa 'da ma ti ta drile ku.

English: The patron of the escapees remained behind.
Luganda: Eyakulemberamu abaatoloka mu kkomera yasigala mabega.
Runyankore: Owabaire akuriire abatorokire, akasigara enyima.
Acholi: Dano ma loyo wi mabuc ma ongweco en pe ocito
Ateso: Abu lo engarenikit lu asiak osalak kau.
Lugbara: Aru apapi 'diyi ma ambo awi vele

English: The Uganda prison service heed to the presidential directives.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'amakomera kyafaayo ku biragiro by'omukulembeze w'eggwanga.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'ebihome omu uganda, kikoorobera ebiragiro by'omwebembezi weihanga.
Acholi: Dul ma loyo buc ilobo Uganda gugwoko lok pa ladit lobo
Ateso: Abu Uganda prison otup nu abala lokapolon akwap.
Lugbara: Arakala arujo eyini omvele Uganda prisons service ri ni azita purezidenti ni o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obi.

English: The Uganda Prison service should recruit more security officers.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'amakomera kiteekeddwa okuyingiza abaserikale abalala.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'ebihome omu uganda kishemereire kwongyera aha muhendo gwa ba ofiisa baayo.
Acholi: Dul ma loyo buc ilobo Uganda mito ni gi med wel dano mak gwoko lubuc
Ateso: Ekot Uganda prisons aitolom icie isilikalei.
Lugbara: Le arakala arujo eyini omvele Uganda prisons service ri ma fe azi 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi ma azi eyidri drile.

English: Christian based organisations have also rendered support to the district.
Luganda: Ebitongole eby'esigamye ku bukulisitu nabyo biwaddeyo obuyambi eri disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Ebigombe ebirikugyendera ahansi y'obukuristaayo, nabyo bihereizeyo obuyambi aha disiturikiti.
Acholi: Dul ma pe gi jenge i kom gamente ma gubedo lukricitayo bene gumiyo kony bot district
Ateso: Apotu iriongeta luka ikristayon ijaikisi agangat odisitrikt.
Lugbara: Amuti kristiani eyini 'diyi fe vini atita distrikiti ni ra

English: The Christian organisation established a handwashing point at the orphanage.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'abakulisitu kyateekawo awanaabirwa engalo mu bamulekwa.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'akristaayo, kikatandikaho omwanya gw'okunaabiramu engaro ahamaka agarikurindirwamu efuuzi.
Acholi: Dul pa lukricitayo guketo kalwoko cing ika ma kigwoko lutino kic
Ateso: Abu erionget lo ikristayon itegea aiboisit na ilosere akanin kane idarere ikokiok.
Lugbara: Amuti Kristiani eyini 'da 'ba afa dri ojizu 'diyi aku emvua eyini 'da ma tia.

English: The health officer explained that they are ready to battle with the virus.
Luganda: Omukungu w'ebyobulamu yannyonyodde nti beetegefu okulwanyisa akawuka.
Runyankore: Ofiisa w'ebyamagara, akashoborora ngu beteekateekire kurwanisa akakooko.
Acholi: Dano maloyo yotkom owaco ni gi tye atera me lweny i kom kwidi
Ateso: Abu emuron itatam ebe ekapakina kesi ejie keda adeka.
Lugbara: Azi'ba alata ni 'da kini eyi ngonde a'di 'dizu azo 'da be

English: The municipal council has ensured that hand washing terminals are all over the place.
Luganda: Akakiiko ka munisipaali kafuba okubunyisa awanaabirwa engalo buli wamu.
Runyankore: Municipal council, ehamize ngu emyanya y'okunaabiramu engaro, eyetorwaire omwanya.
Acholi: Municipal council guketo ka lwoko cing ikabedo weng
Ateso: Abu ekansulo loka emunisipaliti  itigogongo ebe ejaunos aiboisio nu ilosere akanin atutubena kere.
Lugbara: Azi'ba munisipaliti ni 'diyi ne ra kini afa dri ojizu 'diyi angu 'da ma alea dria dria

English: The market management has been directed to display sanitizers to control the virus.
Luganda: Akakiiko akaddukanya akatale kaalagiddwa okulaga zi sanitayiza okwewala okusaasaana kw'akawuka.
Runyankore: Abarikukurira akatare, bahabwirwe ngu sanitaiza bazite omumyanya erikureebeka okubaasa kurwanisa akakooko.
Acholi: Dul ma loyo cuk kiwaci gi ni omyero guket sanitizer kama leng me gengo kwidi
Ateso: Aponi icorakinai eyaitene lo esokoni asipokite sanitisers kanu aitikitik adeka.
Lugbara: Ba ai drice'ba cu ni 'diyi afa omvele sanitayiza ru 'diyi fezu o'bi eyini ayuzaru azo korona niri ma ereta atrizu

English: People were told to embrace handwashing, sanitizing and social distancing.
Luganda: Abantu baagambibwa okwaniriza okunaaba mu ngalo, okukozesa sanitayiza n'okwewa amabanga.
Runyankore: Abantu bakahaburwa kwikiriza bakanaaba omungaro, kukozesa sanitaiza, hamwe n'okutairira haihi n'abandi.
Acholi: Ki miyo dano tam me lwoko cing gi, tic ki sanitizer kede me bedo mabor ki dano ma ingeti
Ateso: Aponi olimokinai itunga ailosenen akanin, aisanitising ka alaikina.
Lugbara: Ba ai o'bi eyi dri ojiza, dri efiza sanitayiza eyisi ri azini esele coza eyi lezu.

English: Local organisations are increasing on the number of handwashing terminals in the area.
Luganda: Ebitongole mu bitundu byeyongedde okussaawo ebifo ewanaabirwa engalo mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Ebitongore ebiri omwihanga  bikweise nibyongyera aha myanya y'okunabirwamu engaro, omu kicweka ekyo.
Acholi: Dul tic ma ikin paci gi tye ka keto ka lwoko cing ma pol
Ateso: Iyatanakinete iriongeta aiboisio nu ilosere akanin kaiboisit.
Lugbara: Amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi afa dri ojizu 'diyi ma kalafe otu angu 'da ma alea

English: The people should be ready for the virus before it reaches the district.
Luganda: Abantu bateekeddwa okwetegekera akawuka nga tekannatuuka mu disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kweteekateekyera akakooko, katakahikire omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Dano omyero obed atera ma kwidi pwud pe oo idistrict
Ateso: Ekot itunga akapakina kanu adeka erongo edolo odisitrikt.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma otu eyi azo 'da ni de nga po'di ecani distrikitia ku

English: The market management will work with the people to facilitate safety in the market.
Luganda: Abaddukanya akatale bajja kukolagana n'abantu okuteekawo obutebenkevu mu katale.
Runyankore: Abarikwebembera akatare, nibeija kukorengana n'abantu okuhweera eby'okwerinda omukatare.
Acholi: Lutela me cuk bi tic ki dano me neno ni dano tye ka gwoke
Ateso: Ebuni eyaitene lo esokoni aswam keda itunga kanu ayuaritor esokoni.
Lugbara: Drice'ba cua 'diyi mu azi nga tualu o'bi eyi be tambaza cu ma alea ri nezu

English: The prison authorities identified the master planner of the prison escape.
Luganda: Ab'obuyinza mu kkomera baazuula eyakuulira okutoloka mu kkomera.
Runyankore: Abarikukurira ekihome, bakabaasa kumanya owakozire enteekateeka z'abasibe kutoroka.
Acholi: Dul ma loyo oot buc gunongo ngat mu kelo doro wi lubuc me lwi ki ibuc
Ateso: Apotu apedorosio nuka aidaris ongicutu lo etemonokini nuka aisi ojera.
Lugbara: Drice'ba arujo ni 'diyi esu agu e'yo aru eyini apazu ri ma eti otipi ri ra

English: A convict of life imprisonment was the architect of the escape plan.
Luganda: Gwe baasiba amayisa ye yabaga entegeka y'okutoloka.
Runyankore: Omuntu owashariirwe kusibwa amagara ge goona, niwe yateireho oburyo bw'okutorosya abasibe.
Acholi: Dano ma onongo ki ngolo kop me bedo ibuc pi mwaka weng me kwone en aye udoro wi mabuc me ngwec
Ateso: Ewenat lo atubokitai amaisa nges lo etemonokini nu aisi.
Lugbara: Agu azi 'bani ombe arujoa kpere erini dra ni gba otita aru eyini apazu 'da ni

English: He convinced prisoners that they needed to do something about their unfair situation.
Luganda: Yamatiza abasube nti beetaaga okubaako kye bakolawo ku mbeera y'onutali bwenkanya.
Runyankore: Akareetera abasibe kwikiriza ngu nibabaasa kugira eki baakora, aha muringo mubi ogu barikutuuramu.
Acholi: Lacoo ni omiyo mabuc tam me timo gin mo ma twero konyo gi i kom peki ma gin tye ka kato ki iye
Ateso: Abu opedo aisiner iwenan ebe ebeit kes amoun nuiswama kanu ejautene kec loaronon.
Lugbara: Eri obe aru 'da eyi aizu kini le eyi ma 'ye e'yo azi wura eyini aa'zu 'da ma dria ra.

English: There were many security gaps at the prison.
Luganda: Waaliwo ebituli bingi mu by'okwerinda by'ekomera.
Runyankore: Omu kihome hakaba harimu ebihengyere bingi.
Acholi: Jami ma kemo gwoko kuc ibuc onongo pe tye maber
Ateso: Apol ejalijal kotoma awenis
Lugbara: Esele coza e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ndra arujo 'da ma alea karakara

English: Some prisoners were killed on the spot while others succeeded in their attempt.
Luganda: Abasibe abamu baabattirawo so ng'abalala bawangula mu kikolwa kyabwe.
Runyankore: Abasibe abamwe, bakeitwa ahonaaho barikushohora, kandi abandi bakabaasa kutoroka.
Acholi: Mabuc mukene ki neko gi ikare me lwi ento mukene ongweco
Ateso: Aponi icie iwenan oyarai kanepekanen kosodete icie apedor akerite.
Lugbara: Ba o'di aru azi 'diyi 'da ogogo te azi 'diyi apa nyingirikiki.

English: The three prisoners have been charged with murder.
Luganda: Abasibe abasatu baavunaaniddwa ogw'obutemu.
Runyankore: Abasibe bashatu, bashariirwe ogw'obwiisi.
Acholi: Mabuc adek oturu cik me nek
Ateso: Aponi itepeseni iwenan iuni kanu eyarit.
Lugbara: Ba ombe aru na 'da eyi 'e'yo eyini 'ba azi 'dizu risi.

English: Some prisoners refused to escape.
Luganda: Abasibe abamu baagana okutoloka.
Runyankore: Abasibe abamwe, bakanga kutoroka.
Acholi: Mabuc mukene pe oye ngwec ki ibuc
Ateso: Apotu icie iwenan ogiroto akerit.
Lugbara: Ba aru ru 'diyi ma azi eyi gaki apakosi.

English: The prison force is still searching surrounding places to find the escapees.
Luganda: Abakuumi b'ekkomera bakyanoonya mu bifo ebyetoolodde ekomera okuzuula abaatoloka.
Runyankore: Abaserukare bebihome, bariyo nibacondooza emyanya eyetorwaire okureeba abatorokire.
Acholi: Joo me prison pwod tye ka ngiyo ikabedo ma cok cok pi nongo mabuc ma gulwi
Ateso: Erongo luko awenis irereete aiboisio aimo lu asiak.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi nga po'di angu enyia 'da 'diyi onda 'ba aru ru apapi 'dayi ndazu.

English: The prison force has joined hands with the community to search for escaped prisoners.
Luganda: Abakuumi b'ekkomera beegattidde wamu n'abantu okusobola okunoonya abasibe abaatoloka.
Runyankore: Abaserukare b'ebihome, bakwatanisize hamwe n'abantu okuronda abasibe ababuzire.
Acholi: Joo me prison tye ka tic kacelo ki lwak me nenongo kom mabuc ma gulwi woko ni
Ateso: Apotu luko awenis imorikikinos keda itunga aimo iwenan lu opotu osiata.
Lugbara: Polisi eciki dri 'ba ongulumu ma alea 'diyi pie 'ba aru ru apapi 'dayi ndazu.

English: The prisoners took advantage of the police's negligence and escape.
Luganda: Abasibe bakozesa omukisa gw'obulagajavu bwa poliisi n'ebatoloka mu komera.
Runyankore: Abasibe bakakozesa omugisha gw'okugira ngu poriisi terikufayo, batyo baatoroka.
Acholi: Mabuc gutiyo ki goro pa lutic me mabuc ma ongongo tye ka gwoko gi ka gu lwii
Ateso: Apotu iwenan ikamutu arerengu na ejalijal lo ipolisin.
Lugbara: Ba aru ru 'dayi ayu polisi 'da ma aniako apazu.

English: How many coronavirus cases are confirmed in Uganda?
Luganda: Tulina abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona bameka mu Uganda?
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba Korona omu Uganda nibangahi?
Acholi: Dano adi ma kinongo gi ki two corona I Uganda?
Ateso: Adekak idi lu ekorona itigogongoritai ko Uganda?
Lugbara: Ba azo korona niri be kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ca si?

English: The director of human rights is suing the police for violation laws.
Luganda: Omukulu w'ekitongole ekirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu kivunaana poliisi olw'okutyoboola amateeka.
