Lugbara: E'yo aci ni olizu ri ma omgbo ni nga tura e'yo yi ma omgbo ni esizu yi Alio Victoria niri ma alea ra risi.

English: The low levels of water have greatly affected the power generation.
Luganda: Obutono bw'amazzi bukosezza nnyo enkola y'amasannyalaze.
Runyankore: Amaizi makye garabaniisemu omurimo gw'okukora amashanyarazi.
Acholi: Dwok piny pa rwom me pii obedo ki adwoki marac i kom yub me buku mac
Ateso: Aikidiokor na akipi nes etolitol aitolomunono na akim.
Lugbara: E'yo eyi ma omgbo ni cazu ku ri fe e'yo aci ako niri ni ecazu enya enya

English: The power plant was established to develop industrialization in that area.
Luganda: Ekkolero ly'amasannyalaze lyazimbibwa okukulaakulanya amakolero mu kitundu ekyo.
Runyankore: Eikorero ry'amashanyarazi eryo rikatandikwaho otunguura eby'amakorero omu mwanya ogwo.
Acholi: Kiyubu ka buku mac wek okony ki tic pa factory ikabedo meno
Ateso: Edukitai edam lo akim kanu aitopoloria aswam na icuman kotoma aiboisit.
Lugbara: E'yo aci ako niri ni nga mu adri ogogo wiki iri 'dipi

English: The loading shedding will take a period of two weeks.
Luganda: Amasannyalaze gajja kubula okumala wiiki bbiri.
Runyankore: Amashanyarazi nigaija kurugaho kumara esande ibiri.
Acholi: Mac bedo ka orweny obi mede pi kare maromo cabit ariyo
Ateso: Edauni akim elemanar aojau na isabitin iyarei.
Lugbara: E'yo aci ni olizu ri ni nga wiki 'du iri.

English: Dams will be built to raise the water levels and create a lake for storing water.
Luganda: Amabibiro gajja kuzimbibwa okwongera ku bungi bw'amazzi n'okutondawo ennyanja y'okutereka amazzi.
Runyankore: Za daamu niziija kwombekwa okwongyera obwingi bw'amaizi hamwe n'okukora enyanja y'okugabiika.
Acholi: Dam kibi yubu wek okony I med rwom me pii inam ki bene yubu nam mukene kama kibi gwoko iye pii
Ateso: Eponio aiduk dams kanu aikeuna akipi ka anyaun aboisit na idarere akipi.
Lugbara: ꞌBa nga dami yi si yi ma omgbo otuzu azini angu edezu yi alioru yi ma tambazu.

English: They have suffered financial loss because of loading shedding.
Luganda: Bafiiriziddwa mu byenfuna olw'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze.
Runyankore: Bafereirwe sente, ahabw'amashanyarazi kurugaho.
Acholi: Gunongo loss pi mac ma obedo ka rweny tere tere
Ateso: Atwakiasi kesi ikapun kanuka alemanar na akim.
Lugbara: Eyi avi orodri robia niri ra e'yo aci ni olizu risi

English: The district leaders are looking for a solution to load shedding.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ku disitulikiti banoonya eky'okukolera ebbula ly'amasannyalaze.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bariyo nibaronda oburyo bw'okuzibira eibura ry'amashanyarazi.
Acholi: Lutela me district tye ka yenyo yoo me giko peko me mac ma rweny tere tere
Ateso: Emoete engarenok lu edisitrikt ewai lo itananget alemanar na akim.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikitia 'diyi geri nda e'yo aci ni olizu ri ma aza kozu.

English: There is a meeting tomorrow to lay strategies of restoring electricity in their area.
Luganda: Waliyo olukiiko enkya olw'okutema empenda z'okuzza amasannyalaze mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Nihaija kubaho orukiiko nyenkyakare, okreeba okubarikubaasa kugarura amashanyarazi omukyanga kyaabo.
Acholi: Kacoke tye diki me neno kit me tic i kom peko me mac ikabedo eni
Ateso: Ejai moi airiamun kanu aipet iwaitin lu inyakakinere akim aiboisit.
Lugbara: Mitingi azi drusi ci e'yo nzezu geri ecozu aci ogozu vele angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria

English: Some leaders don't do what they are assigned to do.
Luganda: Abakulembeze abamu tebakola kyabaweebwa kukola.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi abamwe, tibarikukora ebibashemereire kukora.
Acholi: Lutela mukene pegi timo gin ma kiwaco itgi ni gutim
Ateso: Icie engarenok mam iswamaete nu icorakitai kes aswam.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azi eyi 'yeni e'yo fele 'yele eyidri 'diyi ku.

English: The district leaders wrote a letter to the power company expressing their dissatisfaction.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baawandiikidde ekitongole ky'amasannyalaze ebbaluwa nga balaga obutali bumativu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakahandiika ebaruha omukitongore barikworeka okwetomboitwa kwabo.
Acholi: Lutela me district gucoyo waraga bot company me mac kun gi nyutu cwer cwiny gi
Ateso: Apotu engarenok lu edisitrikt iwadikata ebaluwa nejai ekampuni lo akim aitodiar angurian kec.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi si waraga kamboni aci ni 'da eyi dri e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi ecezu

English: They cannot tolerate the load shedding any more.
Luganda: Tebakyasobola kugumiikiriza bbula lya masannyalaze wadde n'akatono.
Runyankore: Tibarikubaasa kwikiriza kwihwaho amashanyarazi omurundi ogundi.
Acholi: Pe gitwero yee tim me mac bedo ka rweny kare ki kare
Ateso: Mam kes epedoritos bobo atitingikite kanu elemanarere akim.
Lugbara: Eyi econi e'yo aci ni olizuri ma ti taa drile ku.

English: We are not getting any response from the power suppliers.
Luganda: Tetufuna kuddibwamu kwonna okuva nu babunyisa amasannyalaze.
Runyankore: Titwiine ekiturikuhurira kuruga aharyabo abarikutuheereza amashanyarazi.
Acholi: Pe watye ka nongo lagam mokeken kibot company me mac
Ateso: Mam idumunit adio abongokinet kanejaas lu akorak akim.
Lugbara: Ama esuni nga o'duko engazu 'ba aci fepi 'diyi vu ku

English: The minister donated three ambulances to the district.
Luganda: Minisita yawadde disitulikiti emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde ssatu.
Runyankore: Minisita, akagabira disiturikiti emotoka za ambyurensi ishatu.
Acholi: Minister omiyo ambulance adek bot district
Ateso: Abu eminista ijaik edisitrikt agangat naka amotokan nuadekis.
Lugbara: Minisita 'da fe ambulansi eyi na distrikiti dri.

English: The district leaders received the ambulance with joy.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baayanirizza emmotoka etambuza abalwadde mu ssanyu.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, emotoka bakazaakiira n'amashemererwa.
Acholi: Lutela me district gugamo ambulance ki yom cwiny madit
Ateso: Apotu engarenok luko disitrikt ijautu amotokan nuadekis keda aiyalama.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikitia 'dayi ai ambulansi 'dari ayikosi.

English: It is costly to access the health facilities in our area.
Luganda: Kya buseere okufuna obujjanjabi mu kitundu kyaffe.
Runyankore: Nikitwaara esente nyingi, oktunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omukicweeka kyaitu.
Acholi: Wel me nongo kony me yot kom tye malo tutwal icaro eni
Ateso: Epol etiai adumun amukian adekisia nu atutubet kosi.
Lugbara: Eri ajeru arojo eyi esuzu amavile angu ri ma alea.

English: The community highly appreciated her for the donation.
Luganda: Abantu baasiima nnyo kye yawaayo.
Runyankore: Abantu bakamusiima munonga, ahabw'obuhweezi obuyabaheire.
Acholi: Lwak gupwoye tutwal pi mic ma omiyo
Ateso: Apotu itunga isiyalamikisi nges noi kanu agangat ke.
Lugbara: Ongulumu 'da ovu awa'difo feza be eridri feta erini fe 'dasi.

English: In the case of referral, the patient is to cater to the fuel cost.
Luganda: Singa omulwadde abeera asindikibwa mu ddwaliro eddene, ateekeddwa okusasula ebisale by'amafuta.
Runyankore: Omurwaire kwarikwoherezibwa omwirwariro erindi, naaba aine kweshashurira ezamajuta.
Acholi: Ka inen ki kobo latwo me cito iot yat mukene, en aye omyero culu pi moo
Ateso: Karai ejaun aijukario adekis acie, ebeit adekan alemun ikapun lu akinyet.
Lugbara: Ba ka 'ba azoruni ma ti pe arojo nduni ma alea, eri azi 'ba'da ni odu mutukari ma alea ri ma aje ofezu.

English: It is good for a mother to plan for her pregnancy.
Luganda: Kirungi maama okuteekerateekera olubuto lwe.
Runyankore: Nikirungi, omuzaire kweteekatekyera omwana okiri omunda atakazairwe.
Acholi: Obedo gin maber pi mego me yube pi ic mamege
Ateso: Ejok aberu akapanakin kanu apotu ke.
Lugbara: Eri orodriru ayia ni otita eyi 'bazu i mva tambaza ni.

English: The district leader thanked her for having a kind and giving heart.
Luganda: Omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yamwebazizza olw'omutima gwe ogw'ekisa era omugabi.
Runyankore: Mukuru wa Disiturikiti akamwebaza ahabw'okugira omutima murungi gw'okugaba.
Acholi: Latela me district opwoye pi kit maber en tye kwede
Ateso: Obu engarenon lo edisitrikt isiyalamik nges kanu etau kalo ajokan lo ekori.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikiti niri fe eridri awa'difo erini adrizu asi ala azini asi fetaru ri be risi.

English: She gave back to the community as a token of appreciation for voting her.
Luganda: Yaddiza abantu nga akasiimo kw'okwebaza okumulonda.
Runyankore: Akagarurira abantu ekiconco , kyokubeebaza ahabw'okumuteerera akaruuru.
Acholi: En dwoko cen bot lwak macalo yoo me nyutu pwoc pi gin yero en
Ateso: Abu ngesi igangak arai ainyakak nejaas itunga kwape ainakinet na aseun nges.
Lugbara: Eri fe afa ongulumu 'dani awa'difo fezu eyidri eyini voti 'bezu erini risi

English: Leaders should go back on the ground and know the challenges their people are facing.
Luganda: Abakulembeze balina okuddayo mu bantu okutegeera okusoomoozebwa abantu baabwe kwe basanga.
Runyankore: Abebembezi bashemereire kugaruka omubyanga byaabo, bakamanya oburemeezi bw'abantu baabo.
Acholi: Lutela omyero gudok cen itedero ka niang peko ma dano ne tye ka kato ki iye
Ateso: Ekot engarenok alosit itoni ocaaloi kwap kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejatatar itunga.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba eyi ma go ongulumu eyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo ewaru eyi ma 'ba eyini esu 'diyi onizu beni

English: Every day many women and girls die from preventable causes of pregnancy and childbirth.
Luganda: Buli lunaku abakazi n'abawala bafa olw'embeera y'embuto eyinza okwewalibwa ne mu kuzaala.
Runyankore: Buri izooba abakazi n'abaishiki nibafa barikuzaara ahabw'oburemeezi obu barikutunga biine enda nari barikuzaara kwonka obwakubaire nibwetantarwa.
Acholi: Jwi mon ki anyira gi too pi peko ma twero juke me yacu ki ikare me nywal
Ateso: Kanginiparan etwakete angor keda apesur adekasinei nu epedorio aitikitik nu apotuu ka aidoun.
Lugbara: O'du driasi, oku karakara eyi tualu ezoanzi be odra dra iecipi mva mbaza be azini mva osiza be 'bani eco atri ra 'diyisi.

English: We appreciate you for the strong woman you are.
Luganda: Tukusiima olw'okubeera omukyala omugumu.
Runyankore: Nitukusiima ahabw'okuba omukazi w'amaani.
Acholi: Wapwoyi pi dako matek ma ibedo
Ateso: Iturit iso ijo kanu araut aberu na igogong.
Lugbara: Ama fe mi dri awa'difo tu mini aa'zu oku asi okporu ni i risi.

English: Trust is something that two people in a relationship can build together.
Luganda: Obwesigwa ky'ekintu abantu ababiri mu mukwano kye basobola okuzimbira awamu.
Runyankore: Obwesigwa n'ekintu ekirikubaasa kwombekwa abantu babiri abaine rukundo.
Acholi: Gen obedo gin ma dano ariyo matye iwinye gitiyo me yubu ne
Ateso: Amuno erai ibore yen edukunete itunga iyarei lu imorikikina.
Lugbara: Asi ꞌba za ꞌba driari eri eꞌyo ꞌba iri yini eco ꞌye tualu rani

English: Some leaders forget about the people who voted them to be where they are.
Luganda: Abakulembeze abamu beerabira abantu abaabalonda okubeera we bali.
Runyankore: Abebembezi abamwe, nibakira kwebwa abo ababatereire akaruuru akababahikize omubwebembezi.
Acholi: Lutela mukene wigi wil i kom joo ma oyero gi me bedo loc
Ateso: Engarenok icie imurokinete itunga lu aseunete kes alosite nejaas kesi.
Lugbara: Drice'ba azi eyi e'yo avi 'ba ndra eyi pe pi cazu angu eyini aa'zu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria te.

English: He renovated all the roads in his constituency.
Luganda: Yalongoosa enguudo zonna mu kitundu kye ky'akiikirira.
Runyankore: Akahunduuza enguuto zoona ezabaire ziri omu omu kyanga eki arikujwekyera.
Acholi: En oroco gudu weng matye I constituency
Ateso: Abu ngesi itemonok irotin kere lu aiboisit ke.
Lugbara: Eri ede nzila angu erini patuzu ri ma alea 'diyi dria o'diru

English: Because of her kind heart, she felt her people needed the ambulance.
Luganda: Olw'omutima gwe ogw'ekisa, yawulidde nti abantu be beetaaga emmotoka etambuza abalwadde.
Runyankore: Ahabw'okugira omutima murungi, akareeba ngu abantu be nibetenga emotoka ya ambyurensi.
Acholi: Pi kite maber, en otamo ni dano ne mito ambulance
Ateso: Kanuka etau ke lo esiana, abu ngesi opup ebe ekotosi itunga ke amotoka nadekis.
Lugbara: Eri ma asi alasi, eri ega kini eri ma 'ba leki ambulansi 'da ra.

English: He revealed that ambulances are among the items exempted from taxes.
Luganda: Yannyonnyodde nti emmotoka etambuza abalwadde eri mu bintu ebitaggyibwako misolo.
Runyankore: Akagamba ngu ambyurensi tizirikushashura mishoro.
Acholi: En owaco ni ambulance obedo ikin mutoka pa pe gi culu mucoro i komgi
Ateso: Abu ngesi otema ebe eraas amotokan nuka adekis icie kotoma oboro lu alemar osolo.
Lugbara: Eri lu o'bi eyidri kini ambulansi eyi ngani mu musoro ofe ku

English: Selling off one vehicle was the only alternative she had.
Luganda: Okutundako emmotoka emu kye kintu kyokka kye yabadde nakyo.
Runyankore: Okuguzaho emotoka emwe, nikyo kintu ekindi ekiyabaire aine kukora.
Acholi: Cato mutoka acel obedo yoo ma onongo en tye kwede keken
Ateso: Agwelar ediopet komotokan nes bon ewai lo ajatatar ngesi.
Lugbara: Mutukari aluri ozizu ri lu ndra e'yo ci erini eco 'ye ra ri i.

English: Electrification helps to reduce poverty.
Luganda: Okubunyisa amasannyalaze kiyamba okukendeeza obwavu.
Runyankore: Okureeta amashanyarazi, nikibaasa kuhwera okukyendeeza ahabworo.
Acholi: Mac konyo I dwoko piny rwom me can
Ateso: Arucio na akim ingarakini aitidisiar ibakor.
Lugbara: E'yo aci ayuzu ri ni Alio ma omgbo esi

English: As a woman, I know the suffering mothers go through while giving birth.
Luganda: Ng'omukazi, mmanyi okubonaabona bamaama kwe bayitamu nga bazaala.
Runyankore: Nyowe nk'omukazi, nimanya okubonabona, oku abakazi barikurabamu, baaba nibazaara.
Acholi: Macalo mego, angeyo can ma mon nongo ikare me nywal
Ateso: Kwape aberu, ajeni eong ican lu itoritos angor kapak kana aidoun.
Lugbara: Mani aa'zu okuru risi, ani candi ayia eyini nya osiria ri ra.

English: Many pregnant mothers have to walk for long distances to access health facility.
Luganda: Bamaama b'embuto bangi balina okutambuza engendo empanvu okufuna obujjanjabi.
Runyankore: Abazaire baingi abaine enda, nibagyenda engyendo ndaingwa ,okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.
Acholi: Mon ma oyac ma dwong omyero guwot ibor piny kanongo kony me yot kom
Ateso: Angor nuipu nu epotiete ejai alosite akej amairon nuipu kanu amoun adekis.
Lugbara: Okporovu karakara 'diyi aci angu zoza eyi ma alea ecozu arojo eyi esuzu.

English: The ambulances were distributed to different hospitals in the district.
Luganda: Emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zaaweereddwa malwaliro ag'enjawulo mu disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Emotoka za ambyurensi, zikagabwa omumarwariro agatari gamwe, omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Kipoko ambulance bot odi yadi mapat pat matye I district
Ateso: Aponi okorokorai amotokan nuadekis adekisia nuipu kodisitrikt.
Lugbara: Ba awa ambulansi 'dayi arojo ndundu distrikiti ma alea 'diyi ma alea.

English: The celebration will take place at the district headquarters.
Luganda: Ekikujjuko kijja kubeera ku kitebe kya disitulikiti ekikulu.
Runyankore: Omukoro gw'okujaguza, nigwiija kuba aha kitebe kikuru kya disiturikiti.
Acholi: Yub me kwer obi bedo I gangkal me district
Ateso: Ebuni ainumunum ajaikin oboma lo odisitrikt.
Lugbara: Ba mu ayiko zuza 'da 'ye 'distrikiti ma ofisi ambo ri ma alea.

English: This day will be celebrated annually.
Luganda: Olunaku luno lujja kukuzibwanga buli mwaka.
Runyankore: Eizooba eri, niriija kukuzibwa buri mwaka.
Acholi: Nino eni kibi kwero mwaka ki mwaka
Ateso: Eponio ainumunum aparan ngol karu.
Lugbara: Ba mu o'du 'di inzi eli driasi.

English: Many weddings have been rescheduled or even cancelled due to the pandemic.
Luganda: Embaga nnyingi zikyusiddwa oba n'okusazibwamu olw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Embaga nyingi bazihinduriire ebiro, kandi ezindi bazishazamu ahabw'oburwaire.
Acholi: Kiloko nino me nyom maleng mapol mukene bene ki ngolo woko pi poto pa two
Ateso: Ipetai luipu esiyekar arai mam ekisar kanu adeka.
Lugbara: Ba oja bita kanisa karakara 'diyi ma o'du eyo kaniku 'ba anzu eyi te e'yo azo korona nirisi.

English: Through engineering, many people are employed.
Luganda: Okuyita mu bwa yinginiya, abantu bangi balina emirimu.
Runyankore: Okurabira omubya ingyiniyaringi, abantu baingi batungire emirimo.
Acholi: Pi diro me bedo engineer, dano mapol onongo tic
Ateso: Kanuka engineering, adumutu itunga luipu aswamisinei.
Lugbara: Geri azi inginiya eyini 'diyisi, 'ba karakara eyi azi be.

English: When natural habitats are destroyed, the environment is degraded.
Luganda: Ebitonde bwe bittibwa obutonde buba bwonooneddwa.
Runyankore: Obuhangwa kuburikusisikara, ebitwehinguririize bicuukuuka.
Acholi: Ka gibalo cwec matye ikabedo wa calo yadi gi dago, kabedo wa bale
Ateso: Karai isiarisiari aiboisio nu ejariata iboro, emunaun ejautene lo akwap.
Lugbara: ꞌBa ka pari afa adroni oꞌbaleni ꞌdiyini aꞌazuri eza, ecekini ama ꞌda angu ama ageyiari eza.

English: Climate change and water scarcity is also another problem faced by engineers.
Luganda: Enkyukakyuka y'embeera y'obudde n'ebbula ly'amazzi nabwo buzibu obulala bayinginiya bwe basanga.
Runyankore: Empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe neibura ry'amaizi, nakyo nikimwe ahaburemeezi bwa ba ingyiniya.
Acholi: Loke pa piny ki nok pa pii bene obedo peko mukene ma engineers nongo
Ateso: Aijulujuleta nu ekuse ka etepe kosodi aikidiokus na akipi nes ationis acie itoritos engineers.
Lugbara: Angu mile ma ojatani vini ocoko fe inzinia yini yi ma ako pie indi.

English: Technology opens up doors of new opportunities to do business.
Luganda: Tekinologiya aggulawo enzigi z'emikisa empya okukola bizinensi.
Runyankore: Tekinorogye, neereetaho emiringo misya endiijo ey'eby'obushubuzi.
Acholi: Diro me tet yabo yoo pi gum manyen me timo biacara
Ateso: Engaari etatai ikekia lu arerengu na aswam ebiasara..
Lugbara: Ondua afa eyi edezuri ni drileba o'diru 'diyi eji tujari 'yezu

English: Religious leaders are working hand in hand in the development of our village.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'nzikiriza bakolera wamu okukulaakulanya ekyalo kyaffe.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi b'ediini bariyo nibakorera hamwe, okutunguura ekyaro kyaitu.
Acholi: Lutela dini tye ka tic kacelo me kelo dongo lobo icaro wa
Ateso: Iswamaete engarenok lu idiinin nepepe kanu aitopol ecaalo wok.
Lugbara: Drice'ba e'yo aita nisi 'diyi azi nga driadria amavile calo ri ezozu.

English: I want to know what it takes to be an engineer?
Luganda: Njagala okumanya ki ekyetaagisa okufuuka yinginiya?
Runyankore: Ninyenda kumanya ebirikwetaagwa, okubaasa kuba ingyiniya.
Acholi: Amito niang ngo ma mite me doko engineer
Ateso: Akoto eong ajenun nu abeit aswam kanu araun eijinia
Lugbara: Ale ta ni ecazu inginiyaru eri le a'duni?

English: Social gathering has been restricted to stop the spread of coronavirus.
Luganda: Enkungaana z'abantu ziteekeddwako obukwakkulizo okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka ka kolona.
Runyankore: Enteerane z'abantu baingi zizibiirwe, okubaasa kwerinda korona.
Acholi: Guru pa dano kijuku pi gengo nya pa two corona
Ateso: Agiri nuka atukonokin kanu aitikitik awea na ekorona.
Lugbara: Ba atri okuta ongulumuru 'diyi azo koronaniri ma ereta atrizu.

English: In cases where public safety is concerned, it requires an engineer to be licensed.
Luganda: Bwe kituuka nga obulamu bw'abantu bulina okufiibwako, kyetaagisa yinginiya alina layisinsi.
Runyankore: Eby'okwerinda kwabantu byaba kugyenderwaho ingyiniya ashemereire kuba aine ebaruha erikumwikiriza.
Acholi: Ikabedo ma lworo tye pi kwo pa dano, mite ni engineer obed ki waraga ma yee ite tic
Ateso: Kowaitin lu epodokitere nuka ayuara, ekot eijinia orai lo iwadikauna
Lugbara: E'yo o'bi eyi ma aa'ta alari ni 'diyi ma alea, eri le inginiya eyi ma karatasi fele azi ngazu ri ma adri ci.

English: She sued the contractor over the badly made roof on her house.
Luganda: Yawaabidde eyaweebwa ttenda olw'akasolya k'enju ye akabi akaakolebwa.
Runyankore: Akahababira owaabaire apateine, ahabw'okushakaara kubi enju ye.
Acholi: En odoto company me gedo pi bati ma kiyubu marac iwi ode
Ateso: Abu ngesi iwosa adukon kanu aiduk atuluru na etogo ke erono.
Lugbara: Eri to 'ba jo sipiri geri onzi 'bani eri ma jodri sizu risi.

English: The leaders have organised a training for all the engineers in the community.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ategese okutendekebwa kwa bayinginiya bonna mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Abebembezi batebekaniise omushomo gwa ba ingyiniya boona omukyanga.
Acholi: Lutela guyub pwonye pi engineers ducu matye ikabedo
Ateso: Etemokisi engarenok aitutuoro naka ijinias kere kaiboisit.
Lugbara: Drice'ba 'dayi otu imbata azi inginiya ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyini dria.

English: Every engineer is responsible for any careless work done.
Luganda: Buli yinginiya avunaanyizibwa ku mulimu gw'obulagajjavu ogukolebwa.
Runyankore: Buri ingyiniya, najunanizibwa ahamurimo gwona ogukozirwe kubi.
Acholi: Engineer mokeken kekem ki tic marac ma en otimo
Ateso: Ngol engineer nes ikemunitos nu adio aswam naka aronon.
Lugbara: Inginiya dria ni pa tu azi 'bani nga cirisi risi ni.

English: The community stands to gain a lot by exposing young girls to engineering.
Luganda: Ekitundu kijja kufunamu nnyo nga kiyigiriza abawala abato obwa yinginiya.
Runyankore: Ekyanga nikigasirwa munonga, kukirikwikiriza abaishiki kuhinduka ba ingyiniya.
Acholi: Lwak nongo jami ma beco tutwal ka guweko lutino anyira gudoko engineers
Ateso: Ebeit itunga aimedaun noi kowai lo ayangar apesur aswam eijiniaring
Lugbara: Ongulumu 'da ni nga orodri ambo ni esu eyini ezoanzi nyiri eyi suzu azi inginiya eyiniri ma alea risi.

English: Teachers should teach students how to embrace engineering and not fear it.
Luganda: Abasomesa balina okusomesa abayizi okwagala obwa yinginiya baleme kubutya.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa bashemereire kuhabura abeegi okukunda koosi ya ingyiniyaringi , barekye kutiina.
Acholi: Lupwonye omyero onong yoo me weko lutino maro tic me bedo engineer ento pe lworo ne
Ateso: Ekot isisianakinak aisisianakin esisiak eipone lo itinget aswam naka eijiniaring komam akurian.
Lugbara: Le imba'ba eyi ma imba sukulu anzi eyi azi inginiya eyini ri lezu dika eri orizu ku.

English: Street lights make people feel safe at night.
Luganda: Ebitaala by'oku nguudo bireetera abantu okuwulira nga batebenkevu ekiro.
Runyankore: Ebitaara byahanguuto nibyongyera ahakwerinda kw'abantu nyekiro.
Acholi: Mac ma bedo iteng gudu weng dano woto labongo lworo
Ateso: Ijaikitos akimian nu orotin itunga aipup ayuara kware.
Lugbara: Aci osule nzila 'diyi fe 'ba eyini aa'zu ageitema be inisi.

English: That jungle is a home for criminals and drug dealers.
Luganda: Ekibira ge maka g'abamenyi b'amateeka n'abakozesa ebiragalalagala.
Runyankore: Ekibira ekyo nibiika abakozi b'ebihagaro n'abarikukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko.
Acholi: Bunga ni obedo ka kane pa omat jai ki lutim aranyi
Ateso: Erai abuwa ere itunga kalu arokok keda lu ikee.
Lugbara: Jere 'dari aku ni ogua eyini azini 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyini.

English: It makes the streets feel safer and more secure, especially for women.
Luganda: Kifuula oluguudo okubeera olutebenkevu era olutaliiko bulabe naddala eri abakyala.
Runyankore: Nikihwera aha enguuto kutaba ez'akabi omu kwerinda, namunonga aha bakazi.
Acholi: Weko gudu bedo maber dok mon pe bedo ki lworo idi wo
Ateso: Ijaikit irotin araut lu eyuara, kacut kanu angor.
Lugbara: Eri fe nzila eyini aa'zu muke azini ageitema be tutuni oku eyini.

English: Street lights allow traders to operate for longer hours.
Luganda: Amataala g'oku nguudo gakkiriza abasuubuzu okukolera essawa empavuko.
Runyankore: Ebitaara byahanguuto nibituma abashubuzi baakora eshaaha nyingi.
Acholi: Mac me iteng gudu weko lutic tiyo pi kare malac
Ateso: Akimian nu orotin ijaikitos agwelanarak aswam adaun isawan luipu.
Lugbara: Aci osule nzila 'diyi fe 'ba afa ozipi 'diyini azi ngazu sa'wa ezu eyini.

English: Smoke from the local lamps affects human health.
Luganda: Omukka okuva mu munakutadooba gukosa obulamu bw'abantu.
Runyankore: Omwika ogurikuruga omutaara ezamajuta n'etadooba, nigushiisha amagara g'abantu.
Acholi: Ito ma aa ki itara pe ber pi yot kom wa
Ateso: Apuru na itolomete atabasan emunari aijar itunganan.
Lugbara: Acika engazu lamba eyi vuri onzi rua ala ni.

English: Thieves are likely to choose a place that looks like there is no security.
Luganda: Ababbi batera okulonda ekifo ekirabika nga temuli bukuumi.
Runyankore: Abashuma nibakunda emyanya erikureebeka ngu teine by'okwerinda.
Acholi: Lukwo gumaro cito ikabedo manen calo peke ki lugwok ber bedo
Ateso: Eminas ikokolak aseun aiboisit na esubit bala emamei ayuara.
Lugbara: Ogua eyi tutuni angu e'dapi ageitema koko 'diyi pe i.

English: When the criminals are arrested, they bribe the police to release them.
Luganda: Abazzi b'emisango bwe bakwatibwa, bagulirira poliise ebate.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'ebihagaro ku barikukwatwa, nibatugira poriisi ngu ebarekure.
Acholi: Ka kimako otim bal, gimiyo kito kidogo bot abili ma weko ki gonyo gioo
Ateso: Karai ikamun itunga luarokok, egwelete ipolisin kanu alacakin kes.
Lugbara: Ba ka 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi obi 'bo, eyi polisi eyi je robia si eyi ofuzu.

English: The district doesn't have money for the maintenance of the security lights.
Luganda: Disitulikiti terina ssente za kuddaabiriza bitaala bya kunguudo.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti teine sente z'okukozesa okukanika amataara g'eby'okwerinda.
Acholi: District peke ki cene me tic i kom mac ma iteng gudu
Ateso: Emamete edisitrikt ikapun lu itemonokinet akimian nu orot.
Lugbara: Distrikiti vu robia aci ageitema ni 'diyi edezu yo.

English: Bulbs with shorter lifespan need to be often replaced.
Luganda: Amatala agatawangala geetaaga okukyusibwanga buli kadde.
Runyankore: Za barubu ezitarikumara omwanya mureingwa ziine kuguma nizigarurwaho.
Acholi: Mac glob matiyo pi kare manok omyero ki bed ka loko gi tere tere
Ateso: Igulopun lu mam eyangaikinete aojau ekot alemanar ibwaikinete icie.
Lugbara: Eri le 'ba oja gilopu edri be alia 'diyi sa'wa driasi

English: Five men have been arrested over theft of street lights.
Luganda: Abasajja batano bakwattiddwa ku by'okubba amataala g'oku nguudo.
Runyankore: Abashaija bataano, bakwasirwe ahabw'okwiba ebitaara byahanguuto.
Acholi: Kimako coo adek pi kwalo mac ma iteng gudu
Ateso: Arocun ikiliok ikany kanu akoko akimian nu orot.
Lugbara: Ba obi agupi azi eyi towi e'yo aci osule nzila ri ma ogu si.

English: He advised that it's less costly to use solar street lights.
Luganda: Yatuwa amagezi nti si kya buseere okukozesa amataala g'amaanyi g'enjuba.
Runyankore: Akagira ngu tikirikutwara esente nyingi, okukoresa amashanyarazi ga soora ahanguuto.
Acholi: En owaco ni tic ki mac ma tiyo ki diro solar iteng gudu pe tero cene madwong
Ateso: Abu ngesi itijena ebe edite etiai aitwasam akimian nu orot nu esola.
Lugbara: Eri fe imbata kini eri aje kokoru ndeni aci osule nzila solar ru 'diyi ayuzu i.

English: The district put in funds for the installation of lights, but they were not purchased.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yawaayo ssente okuteekayo amataala naye tegaagulibwa.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ekahayo esente z'okwakisa amashanyarazi, kwonka ebyoma tibiraguzirwe.
Acholi: District omiyo cene pi keto mac me teng gudu ento pe kiwilo gi
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt ibwaik ikapun kanu abwainikina akimian, konye mam aponi ogwelai.
Lugbara: Distrikiti fe robia aci eyi osuzu te 'ba awini eyi je kuye.

English: Very soon, the lights will begin to function.
Luganda: Mu bwangu ebitala bijja kutandiika okukola.
Runyankore: Omu bwire butari bwa hare, amashanyarazi nigaija kwaka.
Acholi: Cocok ni mac obi cako tic
Ateso: Eyapie akimian ageun aica.
Lugbara: Ace were aci 'da eyini e'dozu azi ngazu.

English: Solar lights were installed but the batteries where stolen at night.
Luganda: Ebitala by'amannyi g'enjuba by'ateereddwayo naye amanda gabbiddwa ekiro.
Runyankore: Bakataho amashanyarazi ga soora, kwonka zabature bakaziibamu nyekiro.
Acholi: Ki keto mac solar ento ki kwalo battery neoo idi wo
Ateso: Aponi ibwainikinai akimian nu esola konye aponi okokwarai abaturen kware.
Lugbara: Ba osu aci solar ru 'diyi ra te 'ba ogu eyi ma batteri eyi inisi te.

English: We are patiently waiting for the installation of the street lights.
Luganda: Tulindiridde n'obugumiikiriza okuteekayo ebitala by'oku nguudo.
Runyankore: Turindiriire n'okugumisiriza, okuhisya obu barituteeraho amataara gahanguuto.
Acholi: Watye ka kuru mac me teng gudu ma kibi keto ni
Ateso: Ititingikit iso aidarite aibwainikino na akimian nu orotin.
Lugbara: Ama aci nzila 'diyi ma osuta te asi e'yeresi.

English: Our town has the best roads in the whole town.
Luganda: Akabuga kyaffe kye kisinga enguddo enungi mu kibuga kyonna.
Runyankore: Orurembo rwaitu rwiine enguuto ezirikukirayo oburungi omu disiturikiti yoona.
Acholi: Town wa tye ki gudu maber loyo I town kany
Ateso: Ejaas etaun wok keda irotin luajokak noi kaiboisit kere.
Lugbara: Angu amavileri ma nzila eyi ala ndeni tawuni 'di ma alea.

English: Women are free to participate in the politics of the country.
Luganda: Abakyala ba ddembe okwenyigira mu byobufuzi by'eggwanga.
Runyankore: Abakazi baine obugabe okwejumba omuby'obutegyeki bw'eihanga.
Acholi: Mon tye agonya me bedo tye I tella wibye me lobo eni
Ateso: Ejaas angor keda ailajara na ajaut toma politiks lu akwap kana.
Lugbara: Oku eyi driwala be pa tuzu politiki kari niri ma alea.

English: The committee is calling upon members to clear their contribution in time.
Luganda: Akakiiko kayita bannakibiina okumalayo obuyambi bwabwe mu budde.
Runyankore: Akakiiko nikashaba ba memba boona kushashura esente zaabo, bukiri kare.
Acholi: Committee tye ka kwayo dano me cwalo ajog gi con
Ateso: Enyarite ekomiti imeban aitac aisumuneta kec kotoma apak.
Lugbara: Komiti 'da ai o'bi eyi eyini robia atita fezu 'diyi fezu sa'wa dria

English: The women leaders in the district already fulfilled their pledges.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'abakyala mu disitulikiti baamaze kutuukiriza obweyamo bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi babakazi omu disiturikiti, baaherize kuhikiiriza byona ebibaraganiise.
Acholi: Lutela pa mon idistrict dong gucobo cike me ajog gioo
Ateso: Adautu engarenok nu angor odisitrikt aitodolikin aisumuneneta kec.
Lugbara: Drice'ba okuru distrikiti ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo ndra eyini eyi owizu 'diyi 'bo

English: The district traders' association has provided all the chairs required for the function.
Luganda: Ekibiina ky'abasuubuzi mu disitulikiti bawaddeyo entebe zonna ezeetaagisa ku mukolo.
Runyankore: Ekibiina ky'abashubuzi omu disiturikiti, kiheireyo entebe ezirikwetengwa aha mukoro.
Acholi: Dul pa otim biacara I district omiyo kom ma mite pi yub
Ateso: Abu edisitrikt traders association ijaik icolongo kere lu akotoi kanu epucit.
Lugbara: Amuti 'ba afa ozipi 'diyini distrikitia ri fekome lele omu 'dani 'diyi dria ni.

English: Today's function has attracted more guests compared to the one of last year.
Luganda: Omukolo gwa leero guleese abantu bangi okusinga ku gw'omwaka oguwedde.
Runyankore: Omukoro gwerizooba gwayejumbwamu abantu baingi okukira omwaka oguhweire.
Acholi: Dano dwong iyub eni ka iporo ki ma imwaka ma okato ni
Ateso: Epucit lo alolo engalau ipejok luipu adepar lo okaru aje.
Lugbara: Omu andru ri tra omu eyi aga eli ajerisi ri ra.

English: Women have been trained in many income-generating activities throughout the year.
Luganda: Abakyala batendekeddwa emirimu mingi egivaamu ssente okuyita mu mwaka gwonna.
Runyankore: Abakazi batendekirwe omumirimo mingi erikureeta entasya okumara omwaka gwoona.
Acholi: I mwaka nio weng Ki pwonyo mon ki diro ma pat pat me timo biacara
Ateso: Etutuor angor kotoma aswamisinei nuipu nu itolomunenete ikapun kokaru kere.
Lugbara: Oku eyi esu imbata geri ndundu 'bani ecozu robia esuzu ra 'diyi ma dria eli 'disi ndulu.

English: Some of the big shops in the city are owned by women.
Luganda: Agamu ku madduka agasinga obuneene mu kibuga ga bakyala.
Runyankore: Zimwe aha duuka empango omururembo n'ezabakazi.
Acholi: Dukan mukene madong I city kany obedo pa mon
Ateso: Icie kotoma oidukai lu ejaas osite eraas lu angor.
Lugbara: Dukani azi ambo tawuni eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ipika eyi oku eyi.

English: The image of women has improved compared to the past.
Luganda: Ekifaananyi ky'abakyala kirongoose bw'ogeraageranya ku dda.
Runyankore: Ekishushani ky'abakazi kihindukire, okukira oku kyabaire kiri kare.
Acholi: Kit ma kineno kede mon oyube-oo ka iporo ki kare macon
Ateso: Ekeun kwana ekiror lo angor adepar ne sek.
Lugbara: Geri 'bani oku eyi nezuri otu i ra aga eli driori pi ma alea ri ra.

English: Women have financially supported their husbands in developing their families.
Luganda: Abakyala bayambyeko abaami baawe mu byenfuna okukulaakulanya amaka gaabwe.
Runyankore: Abakazi bahwereire munonga baibabo n'esente omu kutunguura amaka gaabo.
Acholi: Mon omiyo kony i yo me lim bot cog gi idongo gangi gi
Ateso: Engarakisi angor ikiliok kec kowai lo ikapun kanu aiteteun ikalia kec.
Lugbara: Oku eyi fe atita geri robia nirisi eyi ma agupi eyi dri eyini eyi ma Familia eyi ma edri oturia.

English: Women's day is celebrated every year in March across the country.
Luganda: Olunaku lw'abakyala lukuzibwa buli mwaka mu mwezi gwa Mugulansigo okwetooloola eggwanga.
Runyankore: Ekiro ky'abakazi, nibakijaguza omu kwezi kwakashatu okwetoroora eihanga ryona.
Acholi: Ki kwero nino pa mon mwaka ki mwaka idwe me adek I lobo ni lung
Ateso: Aparan na angor inuminumio ngol karu olap lo iuniet kakwap.
Lugbara: Ba o'du oku eyiniri inzi imba nasi eli driasi kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

English: The committee has organized for women with disabilities.
Luganda: Akakiiko kateekeddeteekedde abakyala abaliko obulemu.
Runyankore: Akakiiko katebekanisiize abakazi abatarikwebaasa.
Acholi: Committee okati ki yub pi mon ma lugoro
Ateso: Etemoki ekomiti nuka angor nungwalasik.
Lugbara: Komiti 'da 'ba otuta eyi oku aco be 'diyini indi

English: Women planted over one tree in last year's celebrations.
Luganda: Abakyala baasimba omuti ogusukka ogumu mu kujaguza kw'omwaka oguwedde.
Runyankore: Abakazi bakahinga emiti erikurenga ahari gumwe, omu mikoro y'omwaka oguuhweire.
Acholi: Mon gupito yen ma kato acl imwaka ma okato ni
Ateso: Apotu angor iraikisi ekitoi kapak naka ainumunum okaru je.
Lugbara: Oku eyi sa pati eyi aga alu ra ayiko zuza eli ajerisi 'diyi ma alea.

English: Beekeeping is a profitable business in Uganda.
Luganda: Okulunda enjuki bizinensi erimu ssente mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Okuriisa enjoki, n'omurimo gurikurugwamu amagoba omu Uganda.
Acholi: Gwoko kic obedo biacara ma kelo magoba I uganda
Ateso: Aipit awo erai na ejai ameda ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Tujari anyu tambazu ri eri tujari azi orodriruni i kari Uganda niri ma alea.

English: Educational seminars help learners to pass well.
Luganda: Semina z'okusoma ziyamba abayizi okuyita obulungi.
Runyankore: Semina z'ebyobwegyese nizihwera abeegi okuhika kurungi ebigyezo byabo.
Acholi: Seminar pa lutino kwan konyo iweko lutino kato peny maber
Ateso: Iseminas luka aisisia ingarakitos esisiak aitub ejok.
Lugbara: Otita onita ni 'diyi anzi onita onipi 'diyi ma aza ko agazu kililiru

English: Government schools in our area performed well last year.
Luganda: Amasomero ga gavumenti mu kitundu kyaffe gakola bulungi omwaka oguwedde.
Runyankore: Amashomero ga Gavumenti omukicweeka kayaitu, gakakora gye omwaka oguhweire.
Acholi: Gangi kwan pa gamente ma I kabedo wa gutimo maber imwaka ma okato ni
Ateso: Apotu isomeroi lu apugan iswamata ejok aboisit kosi okaru je.
Lugbara: Sukulu gamete ni amavile anguri ma alea 'diyi 'ye muke eli ajerisi.

English: Mathematics was poorly done in the whole district.
Luganda: Essomo ery'okubala lyakolebwa bubi mu disiulikiti yonna.
Runyankore: Okubara kukakorwa kubi omu disiturikiti yoona.
Acholi: Cura otime marac I district lung
Ateso: Iswamatai aimar erono kodisitrikt kere.
Lugbara: Ba ye namba muke ku distrikitisi ndulu.

English: The educational officer thanked teachers for the good work done.
Luganda: Akulira ebenjigirza yeebazizza abasomesa olw'omulimu omulungi gwe bakoze.
Runyankore: Orikukurira eby'obwegyese omu disiturikiti, akasiima abegyesa, ahabw'omurimo gw'amaani ogwakozirwe.
Acholi: Ladit wi pwonye I district opwoyo lupwonye pi tic maber
Ateso: Abu education ofisa isiyalamik isisianakinak kanu aswam kec najokan.
Lugbara: Azi'ba onita ni 'da fe imba'ba eyini awa'difo azi onyiru eyini 'yerisi

English: Some schools were so disappointed with bad results.
Luganda: Amasomero agamu gaggwamu nnyo amaanyi olw'okukola obubi.
Runyankore: Amashomero agamwe gakahwa amaani ahabw'ebyarugire omu bigyezo ebyabaire bitabonaire.
Acholi: Gangi kwan mukene cwiny gi pe obedo yom ki adwoki me peny
Ateso: Apotu icie isomeroi okadakisi kanu abongunoto akiro eroko.
Lugbara: Sukulu azi 'diyi esu candi amboru agata muke ku 'diyisi

English: No single candidate scored four in our village this year.
Luganda: Tewali muyizi n'omu yafunye nnya mu kyalo kyaffe omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Tihaine mwana owatungire ina omukyaro kyaitu omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Petye latin kwan mokeken ma onongo agwen I peny ma okato ni
Ateso: Emamei esisian lo abu odum aongon kocaalo kosi okaru lo.
Lugbara: Sukulu mva azi esupi su amavile calo ri ma alea eli 'disi ni yo.

English: Girls have performed better than boys this year.
Luganda: Abawala bakoze okusinga abalenzi omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Abaishiki bakozire gye okukira aboojo omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Anyira gutimo peny maber loyo awobe-oo
Ateso: Eswamata apesur ejok adepar isap okaru lo.
Lugbara: Ezoanzi eyi 'ye muke aga agupianzi eyi pie eli 'disi.

English: The best school in the district got forty-four aggregates.
Luganda: Essomero eryasinze mu disiulikiti lyafunye obubonero ana mu buna.
Runyankore: Eishomero eryakozire gye munonga omu disiturikiti, rikatunga obubonero makumi ana na buna.
Acholi: Gang kwan maber loyo idistricty onongo lutino pyera ngwen ma gunongo angwen
Ateso: Esomero lo iswamat ejok odisitrikt abu odum amakesin nuka aguriget akaisangon iwongon.
Lugbara: Sukulu distrikitia muke ndeniri esu kalafe driari eyi kali su drini su

English: The educational officer has advised teachers to set weekly tests for better results.
Luganda: Akulira ebyenjigiriza awadde abasomesa amagezi okuteeketeeka ebigezo by'okwegezaamu buli wiiki olw'obubonero obulungi.
Runyankore: Orikukurira eby'obwegyese omu disiturikiti, ahabwiire abeegyesa , okutaho ebigyezo ebya buri wiiki kugira ngu abaana bakore gye.
Acholi: Latic pwonye me district omiyo tam ki lupwonye me miyo pwony me cabit ki cabit ki lutino gi
Ateso: Abu educational ofisa icorak isisianakinak aise aingito na kangol sabiti kanu adumun amakesin nuajokak.
Lugbara: Azi'ba onita ni 'da fe imba'ba eyini imbata eyi ma sukulu anzi eyini obeta eyi fezu wiki driasi

English: Some headteachers have been demoted due to poor performance.
Luganda: Abakulu b'amasomero abamu bassiddwa eddaala olw'okukola obubi.
Runyankore: Bakuru bamashomero abamwe, bagarwirwe ahansi, ahabwamashomero gaabo kukora kubi omu bigyezo.
Acholi: Ludito gang kwan mukene ki dwoko rwom gioo pi peny ma otime marac
Ateso: Apolok isomeroi icie aponi ijesunai kadoketait napolon kanu aswam erono.
Lugbara: Ba nze dricere azi eyi azi dricereniri ma alea si ra azi ye muke kurisi.

English: When he gets good grades, the headteacher is highly praised for his efforts.
Luganda: Bw'afuna obubonero obulungi, omukulu w'essomero yeebazibwa nnyo olw'amaanyi ge.
Runyankore: Ku aratungye za gureedi nungi, mukuru weishomero naaza kusiimwa, ahabw'amaani agateiremu.
Acholi: Ka en okato maber, ladit gang kwan nongo pwoc
Ateso: Ne edumuna ngesi iguredin luajokak, iturio apolon esomero noi kanu agogongu ke.
Lugbara: Eri ka aga muke, dricere ni rukuza esu okpo erini 'ba risi.

English: Research shows that children learn very fast when taught in their mother language.
Luganda: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti abaana bakwata mangu nga basomeseddwa mu lulimi lwabwe oluzaaliranwa.

English: Teachers in village schools are fond of dodging work without genuine reasons.

English: The school with the best performance last year declined this year.

English: The school has maintained its position in the district for five years.

Ateso: Edar esomero adoketait ke odisitrikt adaun ikaru ikany.

English: Because of the poor performance, parents are forced to change their children schools.
Luganda: Olw'okukola obubi, abazadde bakakibwa okukyusa amasomero g'abaana baabwe.

Ateso: Kanu eswamae loaronon, ejulasi auriak idwe kec osomeroi icie.

English: Lack of enough qualified teachers in the district leads to poor performance.
Luganda: Ebbula ly'abasomesa abatendeke abamala mu disitulikiti kireetera okukola obubi.
Runyankore: Eibura ry'abegyesa abatendekirwe omu disiturikiti abarikumara, nirituma abeegi baakora kubi.

Lugbara: Imba'ba karatasi be 'diyi ma ako ni fe agata ni adrizu muke ku ni.

English: Church founded schools have a feeding plan for their children.
Luganda: Amasomero agali ku musingi gw'ekkanisa galina enteekateka y'okuliisa abaana baago.

English: Three of the cabinet ministers come from our district.

English: One of the topmost former leaders of this country came from our village.

Runyankore: Omwe aha beebembezi b'eihanga abarikukirayo, abayebembeireho eihanga eri, akaba naaruga omu kyaro kyaitu.

English: Majority of farmers grow crops for sale.
Luganda: Abalimi abasinga balima ebirime nga bya kutunda.
Runyankore: Abahingi baingi nibahinga eby'okuguza.
Acholi: Pol pa lupur gi puru jami me acata
Ateso: Akoriok luipu ekoriete ikorion lu igwelara.
Lugbara: Ba abari amvu 'yapi 'diyi nyaka 'ya ozizaru.

English: One of the main leisure activities for men in Uganda is drinking alcohol.

Runyankore: Gumwe aha muringo gw'abashaija ogw'okweshemeza omu Uganda, n'okunywa amaarwa.

English: School children who eat porridge during lunchtime doze during afternoon lessons.
Luganda: Abaana b'essomero abalya obuugi mu budde bw'ekyemisana basumagirira mu masomo g'akawungeezi.
Runyankore: Abeegi abarikunywa obuhunga omu shaaha za kyamishana, nibagwejegyera omu kibiina  omu shaaha z'eihangwe.

English: Many learners' miss exams due to parents' failure to pay school fees.
Luganda: Abayizi bangi basubwa ebigezo olw'abazadde okulemererwa okusasula ebisale by'essomero.
Runyankore: Abeegi abaingi nibafeerwa kukora ebigyezo, ahabw'abazaire kuremwa kushashura ebishare by'eishomero.

English: Children with bad peer groups have higher chances of failing academically.
Luganda: Abaana abalina emikwano emibi balina emikisa mingi okulemererwa mu kusoma.

English: Parents should ensure that children do their homework every day.

English: Proper upbringing of a child yields good results.

English: Some students were caught and punished for entering a disco hall.

English: Some entertainment centres have been closed down for allowing young girls in.

Ateso: Aboisio acie nu isiyalaere aponi ogolokinai kanu acamanakin apesur nudidika.

English: Girls in rural areas engage in sexual acts at an early age.

Runyankore: Amashomero nigaheereza abeegi emirimo y'okukora okumara wiikendi yoona.
Acholi: Gangi kwan wego lutino bedo katic ikare ducu I jami me gang kwan itum pa cabit ducu
Ateso: Ijanakinete isomeroi esisiak aswam apak na ewiiken kere.

English: Some stubborn students escape from school before time.
Luganda: Abayizi ab'effujjo abamu batoloka mu ssmero ng'obudde tebunnatuuka.
Runyankore: Abaana abaine engyesho mbi, nibatoroka ahaishomero eshaaha zitakahikire.

English: I would rather put my child in a boarding school than a day.

English: Parents need to be very strict on the movements of their children.

English: The officer sensitized parents on the dangers of learning on an empty stomach.

English: A good teacher makes learning interesting to students.

English: Some schools have a big number of pupils and small class rooms.

Runyankore: Amashomero agamwe gaine abaana baingi kwonka giine ebibiina bikye.
Acholi: Gangi kwan mukene tye ki wel lutino madwong ento odi kwangi tino
Ateso: Icie isomeroi ejaas keda idwe luipu ido odisiak atukono.
Lugbara: Sukulu azi diyi ma alea sukulu anzi ma kalafe angiri te kilasi jo yi were

English: The management has built houses for all teachers in school.

Runyankore: Eishomero ryombekyeire abegyesa amaju ahaishomero.

English: In that year the school recorded the best performance ever.
Luganda: Mu mwaka ogwo essomero lye lyasinga okukola obulungi ennyo.

Ateso: Kokaru angol abu esomero iswama ejok noi adepar.

English: The football federation registers new teams every season.
Luganda: Ekibiina ky'omupiiira kiwandiisa ttiimu empya buli sizoni.

Ateso: Iwadikaenene erionget lo emopira itimun luitetiak kangin pak.

English: It requires a lot of money to sponsor a team in a league.

Runyankore: Nikyetengyesa esente nyingi, okushashurira tiimu omu mpaka.

English: The football federation gave instructions to the new team yesterday.

Acholi: Dul ma doro tuku odilo I lobo omiyo cik bot team manyen laworo
Ateso: Abu erionget lo emopira ijaik etimu loitetet aicoreta.
Lugbara: Amuti mupira eyi ma avita onepiri fe azita eyi amuti mupira avizu efupi o'diru 'dani aje

English: Many youths have benefited from football talent in Uganda.

Runyankore: Eminyeeto mingi egasiirwe omu taraanta y'omuzaano gw'omupiira omu Uganda.
Acholi: Bulu mapol gunongo ber pe mic me tuku odilo
Ateso: Atumunak luipu emedautu kotoma aipet emopira.
Lugbara: Ba ode karakara eyi esu orodri mupira avita si kari Uganda niri ma alea.

English: All football clubs have supporters all over the country.

Runyankore: Kiraabu z'omupiira zoona ziine abashagiki okwetoroora eihanga.
Acholi: Club me tuku odilo tye ki joo ma cwako gi ilobo ni lung
Ateso: Ikilabun kere ejaas keda egangitok kec kakwap kere.

English: The leader has rewarded the national football team for their excellent performance.
Luganda: Abakulembeze asiimye ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere olw'okukola obulungi.
Runyankore: Omwebembezi ahareize tiimu y'eihanga ekiconco ahabw'okukora gye munonga.

English: The football federation picks talented players from all corners of the country.
Luganda: Ekibiina ky'omupiira kiggya abazannyi ab'ebitone okuva mu z'eggwanga lyonna.
Runyankore: Ekibiina ky'omupiira nikitooranamu abazaani abaine etaraanta kuruga omu shonda zoona z'eihanga.
Acholi: Dul ma doro tuku odilo yero lutuku ku I kabedo weng matye I uganda
Ateso: Eseunene erionget loka emopira aboliak lu emisiaritos katutubena kere nuka akwap.
Lugbara: Amuti mupira ma avita onepi kari ma alea ri ni 'ba mupira avipi muke 'diyi o'du kari 'di ma woko eyi ma alea dria.

English: Some people are always left behind in developmental matters in their communities.
Luganda: Abantu abamu balekebwa emabega mu nsonga z'enkulaakulana mu bitundu byabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu abamwe, nibabareka enyima omushonga z'entunguuka omubyanga byabo.

Ateso: Icie itunga elakanikino okau akiro kanu apolo kaiboisio kec.

English: The club goalkeeper was falsely accused of defiling a fifteen-year-old girl.

English: The region needs a stadium to host friendly matches as a way of practising.

Runyankore: Ekyanga ekyo, nikyetenga ekizaaniro ekirikubaasa kuhikwamu empaka eza rukundo, omumuringo gw'okwegyezamu.

Runyankore: Omwe ahabanyamakuru ababandize kukora ahaby'omupiira omu Uganda, afiire okweezi okuhweire.
Acholi: Lacoo lok angeya i kom tuku ma ocako i lobo Uganda otoo i dwee ma okato
Ateso: Ediopet kotoma kalu ageunak airot iyemuto lu emopira abu otwana olap je.
Lugbara: Agu 'ba e'dopi e'yo sipi mupira tuza ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea oko ri ma azi dra imba aje risi .

English: Our football club has won the district tournament of the year.
Luganda: Ttiimu yaffe ey'omupiira gw'ebigere ewangudde empaka za disitulikiti ez'omwaka.
Runyankore: Kiraabu yaitu y'omupiira, esingire omumpaka za Disiturikiti ez'omwaka.
Acholi: Dul tuku odilo wa oloyo tuku odilo me dictrik me mwaka ni
Ateso: Abu ekilabu kosi lo emopira iteleka abolobol na odisitrikt okaru je.
Lugbara: Amuti amavile mupira avizu ri nde abala distrikiti ni eli 'di vuri ni

English: The federation of football has awarded the best players of the season.
Luganda: Ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere kisiimye abazannyi abasinze mu sizoni.
Runyankore: Ekigombe ky'omupiira kisiimire abazaani abarikukirayo oburungi omu siizoni.
Acholi: Dul ma doro tuku odilo omiyo mic ki lutuku mabeco loyo i kare me pyem
Ateso: Abu erionget loka abolia emopira orop aboliak lu ejokuka akere kotoma apak ngin.
Lugbara: Amuti mupira tuza onepiri fe feta anzi mupira avipi muke ndeni abala ebipi alipi 'diyi ma alea 'diyini

English: New football clubs in the league have few supporters compared to old ones.
Luganda: Ttiimu z'omupiira empya mu liigi zirina abawagizi batono bw'ogeraageranya n'enkadde.
Runyankore: Kiraabu nsya z'omupiira eziri omu mpaka, ziine abashagiki bakye okugyeragyeranisa n'enkuru.
Acholi: Dul tuku odilo manyen gitye ki lucwak ma nok ka iporo ki dul tuku odilo madong guri
Ateso: Ikilabun lu itetiak kotoma abolia ejaas keda egangitok lu ikidioko itirian ijo keda lumojong.
Lugbara: Ba atita fepi amuti mupira tuza avipi abala 'da ma alea o'diru 'diyini 'diyi ma kalafe were aga amuti e'dopi avipi drioru 'diyi ra

English: To be a successful footballer, you need to be talented and disciplined.
Luganda: Okuba omusambi w'omupiira omuwanguzi, weetaaga okuba n'ekitone wamu n'empisa.
Runyankore: Okuhinduka omusinguzi omu by'omupiira, oine kuba oine omwoga kandi oine engyesho nungi.
Acholi: Me bedo latuku ma ber omyero ibed ki mic me tuku ki woro bene
Ateso: Kanu araut abolian emopira lo ejokuna, ekot ijo orai atalanta ido orimarite.
Lugbara: Aa'zu 'ba mupira tupi agapiri ru, le mi adri feta Munguni fe Mupira tuza niri be azini le mi adri drionzi kokoru.

English: The coach promised to lead the club to victory in the forthcoming season.
Luganda: Omutendesi yasuubizza okutuusa ttiimu ku buwanguzi sizoni ejja.
Runyankore: Kooki araganiise kwebembera kiraabu akagihisya ahabusinguzi omu siizoni erikwiija.
Acholi: Lapwony tuku ocike me kelo loc i dul tuku eni i kare me pyem ma bino
Ateso: Esumunit ekooc aisipedor ekilabu aitelekar kotoma abolobol na ebunit.
Lugbara: Imbapi mupira ni 'da owi i nezu ra kini amuti mupira avizu 'da ni nga nde abala emupi 'diyi ma alea ra

English: Our team has lost all three games played so far.
Luganda: Ttiimu yaffe esudde emipiira gyonna esatu egyakazannyibwa.
Runyankore: Tiimu yaitu esingirwe omu mizaano eshatu eibaherize kuzaanaho.
Acholi: Dul tuku wa ki goyo gi pi tuku adek kulu dong
Ateso: Aponi itelekarai etimu kosi kotoma aboliasio auni kopana.
Lugbara: Ba nde amuti amavile ri abala erini avi na 'diyi ma alea dria

English: He used the official car for his own personal needs.
Luganda: Yakozesezza emmotoka y'ekitongole olw'ebigendererwa bye.
Runyankore: Akakoresa emotoka y'omurimo ahabintu bye nk'omuntu.
Acholi: Otiyo ki mutoka me ka tic pi cobo miti ne kene
Ateso: Abu ngesi itwasam emotoka lo eyapesi kanu aswam ikeboro bon.
Lugbara: Eri ayu mutukari azi niri e'yo eri ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'yezu

English: He went into hiding after reportedly embezzling funds.
Luganda: Yeekwese oluvannyuma lw'ebigambibwa nti yakumpanya ssente.
Runyankore: Akaza kweshereka ahanyima y'okugambwa ngu akaiba esente.
Acholi: En okane woko ingee kwalo cente
Ateso: Abu ngesi oker aingop akaulo na aimidicar ikapun.
Lugbara: Eri e'do i ozi ozi erini robia e'yo orodriru ni 'yezuri oguzu 'bori ma vutia

English: In what urgent situations can police enter my home?
Luganda: Mbeera ki etalinda poliisi mw'eyinza okuyingirira mu maka gange?
Runyankore: Nenki ekyaaho naaho, ekirikubaasa kureeta poriisi omuka yangye?
Acholi: Ngo ma twero weko Abili donyo i otta?
Ateso: Kojautene ali epedoriata ipolisin alomar oreka?
Lugbara: E'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru polisi eyini ani ecozu efizu ma vile akua ra 'diyi ngo eyi?

English: His office was responsible for supplying leguminous seeds to groups in the community.
Luganda: Woofiisi ye ye yali evunaanyizibwa ku kubunyisa ensigo z'empeke eri ebibinja mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Ofiisi ye ekaba nejunanizibwa okugaba embibo omu guruupu z'abahingi.
Acholi: Dog ticce onongo okeme ki poko kodi me apita bot lwak
Ateso: Eyapesi ke nes ekamunitos nu aikor ikinyom ogurupun kotoma atutubet.
Lugbara: Eri ndra azi ofisi erivileri ni ori eyi awazu amuti ongulumu ma alea 'diyini

English: The group leaders claim to have made payments in the cashier's office.
Luganda: Abakulira ebibiinja bagamba nti baasasula mu woofiisi y'omuwanika.
Runyankore: Abarikwebembera guruupu nibagira ngu bakashashura omu ofiisi ya kashiya.
Acholi: Lutela me gurup guculu cente bot lagam lim
Ateso: Ebalas engarenok lu egurupu ebe etacitos ikapun oyapesi loetacere.
Lugbara: Drice'ba amuti 'da ni 'diyi 'yo kini eyi ofe robia agu robia trapiri vile ofisi'a

English: The cashier disappeared with the company money worth five hundred Ugandan shillings.
Luganda: Omuwanika yabula ne ssente za kampuni ezibalirirwamu nnusu bitaano eza Uganda.
Runyankore: Kashiya akabura n'esente za kampuni ezirikwingana emitwaro makumi ataano eza Uganda.
Acholi: Lagam lim orweny ki cente me Kampani maromo cilling alib miya bic
Ateso: Abu ekasia oolio keda ikapun lu ekampuni luedolete ilukumin akwatakany.
Lugbara: Agu robia trapiri avi kamboni ma robia be ogogo silingi elifu turu towi

English: The beehive suppliers complained that they had not been paid.
Luganda: Abatunzi b'emizinga gy'enjuki beemulugunyizza nti tebannasasulwa.
Runyankore: Abarikugaba ebihumi by'enjoki baketomboitwa ngu bakaba batakashashwirwe.
Acholi: Lugwok kic gu kok ni pud pe kiculu gi
Ateso: Apotu lu akorete amoliga ongurianata ebe mam kes atacitai.
Lugbara: Ba anyu toro awapi 'dayi onuki kini 'ba ofeni nga eyi ku

English: He persuaded the group leaders to make cash payments in his office.
Luganda: Yasikirizza abakulembeze b'ebibinja okusasula ssente ezoobuliwo mu woofiisi ye.
Runyankore: Akabeihabeiha abeebembezi ba guruupu ngu bashashure omu ofiisi ye.
Acholi: En odiyo lutela me gurup me culu cente i opici ne.
Ateso: Abu ngesi ingainga engarenok lu egurupu atacenen ikapun oyapesike.
Lugbara: Eri obe drice'ba amuti 'da ni 'diyi robia ofezu ofisi erivileri ma alea

English: Some of the villages never received the seeds, yet they made payments.
Luganda: Ebyalo ebimu tebyafuna nsigo ate nga byasasula.
Runyankore: Ebyaro ebimwe tibiratungire mbibo kandi byashashwiire.
Acholi: Caro mukene pe gunongo kodi kadi bed ni guculu cente
Ateso: Mam icaaloi ice apotu kodumutu ikinyom, konye kodaunitos aitac.
Lugbara: Calo azi 'diyi awini ori sazaru 'diyi esu kuye de esu eyi ofe robia ra

English: There is no reason why bee suppliers have not received the money.
Luganda: Tewali nsonga lwaki bakitunzi b'enjuki tebannaba kufuna nsimbi.
Runyankore: Tihariho nshonga ahabw'enki abareesire enjoki batakashashwirwe sente.
Acholi: Tyen lok mo keken peke pi tito pingo lugwok kic pud pe gunongo cente gi

English: The cash office was handed over to the accountant.
Luganda: Woofiisi y'ebyensimbi yaweereddwayo eri omubalirizi w'ebitabo.
Runyankore: Ofiisi nerikwakiira esente, ekaheebwayo ow'omubazi w'ebitabo.
Acholi: Kimiyo opici me cente bot lakwan lim
Ateso: Aponi ikopakinai eyapesi lo ikapun nejai akaunt.

English: He was supposed to present a hand over-report.
Luganda: Yali ateekeddwa okwanjula alipoota y'okuwaayo yafesi.
Runyankore: Akaba ashemereire kworeka ripooti y'okuhayo.
Acholi: En omyero omi waraga ma nyutu kor ticce bot ludito i kare me weko tic

English: Police don't tolerate people who exploit others in society.
Luganda: Poliisi tegumiikiriza bantu batyoboola eddembe lya bannabwe mu kitundu.

English: The company opened a case against him.
Luganda: Kampuni yamuggulako omusango.
Runyankore: Kampuni ekeiguraho omushango erikumujunaana.
Acholi: Kampani oyabo adot i kome
Ateso: Abu ekampuni opukok nges emusago
Lugbara: Kamboni 'da to eri kesi azi ma alea

English: Their search was unfruitful.
Luganda: Tebaaganyulwa mu kunoonyereza kwabwe.
Runyankore: Tihaine ekyarugire omukufuuza kwaabo.
Acholi: Kwed ma kitimo pe onyako nyige

English: He will be highly charged for embezzlement of public money.

Acholi: Kibidote pi kwalo cente pa lwak

English: The police have opened a general enquiry file to investigate the allegations.
Luganda: Poliisi egguddewo fayiro okwongera okunoonyereza ku ebyo ebigambibwa.

English: The journalists tried to reach him, but all his phone numbers were off.
Luganda: Bannamawulire baagezaako okumufuna, naye ennamba z'amasimu ge gonna tezaaliko.
Runyankore: Abanyamakuru bakagyezaho kumuhikiirira, kwonka esimu ze zoona zikaba zitariho.

Acholi: Ki pwonyo gi lok kom tic ki bank ki gwoko lim

English: Last year my sister bought a piece of land from her savings.

English: Some banks offer lower interest rates to their customers.

English: She called for unity among the women groups.
Luganda: Yakubiriza obumu mu bibiina by'abakyala.
Runyankore: Akashaba guruupu z'abakazi okukwatanisa.

English: There is a group of women who earn money from cake baking.

English: Most Ugandan women spend a lot of money on cosmetics.

English: Farming is very profitable in rural areas.

Lugbara: Amvu 'yaza eri orodri eji saaru angu calo ru 'diyi ma alea

English: She has used the money to start up a vegetable garden on one acre of land.

English: In rural areas, women still don't have access to the financial system.

Runyankore: Omu myanya y'ebyaro, abakazi nahati tibarikubaasa kwehisyaho obuheereza bw'esente.

Ateso: Kocaaloi, mam angor edolonokinete aingadisia.

English: The church has established a hospital on one of its land in town.

Runyankore: Abakristaayo, nibahweera amakanisa gaabo n'esente omukukora emirimo yaago.

English: Among all churches in Uganda, the catholic church has more land.

English: Over two hundred children were baptised by the bishop last Sunday.

English: He was arrested for stealing church land.

Acholi: Kimake pi kwalo ngom pa kanica

English: Centenary bank is a project for catholic church.

Luganda: Gavumenti yawaayo ensimbi mu kuddaabiriza ekiggwa ky'abajulizi.

English: The stream had consistent waters which were even used for irrigation purposes.
