Acholi: Dano adek otoo pi two ebola
Ateso: Itunga iuni apotu otwakata ebola ko Kasese.
Lugbara: Ba kalafe na ni eyi odra azo ebola nirisi distrikiti Kasese niria

English: Uganda is at risk since there is an ebola outbreak in the neighbouring countries.
Luganda: Uganda eri ku bwerinde olw'amawanga agagirinaanye okufuna ekirwadde ky'ebola.
Runyankore: Uganda eri omu kabi, ahabw'okugira ngu ebola ebarukireho omu mahanga agatwetorwaire.
Acholi: Lobo Uganda tye kama rac pien ni two ebola tye i lobo ma ingete
Ateso: Ejai Uganda ationis naarai ebwanguna ebola kakwapin nu idunyare.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri eri e'yo ma alea e'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu kari inyia inyia 'diyi ma alea 'borisi.

English: The ministry of health has been able to contain the epidemic.
Luganda: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kisobodde okulwanisa ekitwadde.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara ebaasize kukora aha muzibwe.
Acholi: Minictry me yot kom obedo ki kero me lweny i kom two eni
Ateso: Abu erionget loka angaleu opedo aitikokin adeka.
Lugbara: Okalamvu alataniri o'bi azo ongulumu eyini candi fepi 'da ma aza ko ra

English: The vaccine from the world health organisation is effective though insufficient.
Luganda: Edagala erigema okuva mu kitongole ky'obulamu eky'ensi yonna lijjanjaba lwakuba terimala.
Runyankore: Omubazi kuruga omu kitongore ky'ensi yoona eky'eby'amagara nigukora, nobu guraabe gutarikumara.
Acholi: Yat agwera ma dul world Health Oganaijecon okelo ni tiyo ento pe romo dano weng
Ateso: Ekato loka Erionget Loka Angaleu Kakwap Kere iswamai ilema mam ilosikino.
Lugbara: Aro soza engazu amuti e'yo rua alata ni onepi wudrikuru ma alea ri vuri eri azi nga muke te eri cani ku

English: Arua district lacks finances to prevent the spread of the Ebola virus.
Luganda: Disitulikiti ya Arua telina nsimbi zimala kutangira kusaasaana kw'akawuka ka Ebola.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ya Arua, teine sente kuzibira okujanjara kwa Ebola.
Acholi: Arua dictrikpeke ki cente me lweny i kom two Ebola
Ateso: Emamiatatar Arua keda apiyai nu itikitiket awea naka ebola.
Lugbara: Distrikiti Arua niri robia yo ecozu azo ebola niri ma ereta atrizu

English: The ministry should establish facilities to enable districts to fight disease outbreaks.
Luganda: Ekitongole kirina okuteekawo ebifo okusobozesa zi disitulikiti okulwanyisa okubalukawo kw'ebirwadde.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kutandikaho emyanya y'okujanjabiramu, okubaasisa za disiturikiti okurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara.
Acholi: Minictry omyero oyub kabedo me tic pi konyo districts lweny i kom two ma poto atura
Ateso: Ekot erionget aitolomun aiboisio kanu aisipedor idisitriktan aitiji abwangun na adeka.
Lugbara: Le okalamvu alataniri ma esu geri distrikiti eyini ani ecozu a'di 'dizu azo efupi 'diyi pie 'diyi ra

English: The people of Arua are on alert after an ebola outbreak in Congo.
Luganda: Abantu b'omu Arua bali bulindaala oluvannyuma lwa Ebola okubalukawo mu Congo.
Runyankore: Abantu ba Arua beteekateekire bwanyima y'okubarukaho kwa ebola omuri congo.
Acholi: Dano me Arua gitye atera ingee winyo kwena me poto pa two ebola i congo
Ateso: Ekapakina itunga luka Arua akaulo na abwangunor ebola ko Congo.
Lugbara: Ba distrikiti Arua niri ma alea 'diyi mile be mgbo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu kari Congo niri ma alea 'borisi

English: Ebola is a very dangerous disease which can lead to loss of life.
Luganda: Ebola bulwadde bwa bulabe obusobola okuleetera okufirwa obulamu.
Runyankore: Ebola n'endwara y'akabi munonga, erikubaasa kwita.
Acholi: Two ebola rac totwal pien twero kelo too
Ateso: Erai ebola adeka naronon na eyari.
Lugbara: Azo ebola niri eri azo azi okporu ecopi fepi 'bani edri avizu ra ni i

English: There is compulsory handwashing for everyone who accesses the hospital premises.
Luganda: Waliwo okunaaba engalo okw'obuwazze ku buli muntu anaayingira mu ddwaliro.
Runyankore: Buri omwe orikuza ahairwariro aine kunaaba omu ngaro.
Acholi: Dano weng ma donyo iot yat omyero gulwok cingi
Ateso: Ejai ameet ailot akanin kangin itunganan kere yen elosi adekis.
Lugbara: Dri ojiza azitaru ni 'ba dria fipi arojoa ri ni ci.

English: Ugandans should be ready to battle with the ebola outbreak.
Luganda: Bannayuganda bateekeddwa okuba abeetegefu okulwanisa okubalukawo kwa ebola.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda bashemereire kweteekateeka okurwanisa okubarukaho kwa ebola.
Acholi: Anywali Uganda omyero guyube me lweny i kom two ebola
Ateso: Ekot itunga luko Uganda akapakina aitiji abwangun naka ebola.
Lugbara: Le kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma aa ngonde a'di 'dizu azo ebola ni efupi 'di be

English: All people leaving and accessing the hospital must wash their hands.
Luganda: Abantu bonna abafuluma n'abayingira eddwaliro balina okunaaba engalo zaabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikuruga omwirwariro n'okuzayo, bashemereire kunaaba engaro zaabo.
Acholi: Dano matye ka aa onyo donyo iot yat omyero gulwok cing gi
Ateso: Itunga kere lu elosete ka anyoun adekis ekot ailo akanin kec.
Lugbara: Le 'ba dria fipi arojoa azini fupi arojoa si 'diyi ma oji eyi ma dri ra

English: The hospital will carry out proper documentation about the patients.
Luganda: Eddwaliro lijja kuteeka mu buwandiike ebikwata ku balwadde babwe.
Runyankore: Eirwariro niriija kuhandiika aha barwaire, nk'oku kirikwetenga.
Acholi: Ot yat obi bedo ki yoo maber me coyo lok kom lutwo
Ateso: Elosi adekis aidar aiwadikaeta nu adekak.
Lugbara: Arojo ni nga mu e'yo siza kililiru ri 'ye 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria

English: The hospital personnel have been equipped with protective equipment to fight off Ebola.
Luganda: Abakozi b'omu ddwaliro baweereddwa eby'okwekumisa okulwanyisa Ebola.
Runyankore: Abarikukora omwirwariro, baheirwe eby'okubabangira okurwanisa ebola.
Acholi: Kimiyo jami me tic ki lutic me ot yat wek okony gi me lweny i kom two Ebola
Ateso: Abu eyaitene lo adekis okapakin keda iswamasia lu ayuara kanu aitijio ebola.
Lugbara: Ba fe azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini afa tambaza fepi azosi sule ruatia pi 'diyi eyini ani a'di 'dizu azo ebola niri be

English: The hospital management has established simple clinics to manage Ebola cases.
Luganda: Abaddukanya eddwaliro baateekawo obulwaliro obutono okubayamba okulwanisa Ebola.
Runyankore: Abarikukurira eirwariro, bateireho oburwariro obukye okukora aha barwaire ba Ebola.
Acholi: Ludito me ot yat madit guyubu ka tic matino tino me konyo lweny i kom two ebola
Ateso: Abu eyaitene lo adekis itolomu idekisia ludidika kanu aitikokina ebola.
Lugbara: Driceza arojo niri e'do kiliniki omgbo were si 'diyi azo ebola niri ma aza kozu

English: Arua district has not succumbed to the Ebola outbreak.
Luganda: Disitulikiti ya Arua tennabalukamu kirwadde kya Ebora.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti ya Arua tekatungireyo omurwaire wa Ebola.
Acholi: Two ebola pe oyello dictrikme Arua
Ateso: Mam edisitrikt loka Arua edumunitor adeka naka ebola.
Lugbara: Distrikiti Arua niri esuni nga azo ebola niri ku

English: People suspected of having Ebola are put in quarantine.
Luganda: Abantu abasuubirwa okuba ne Ebola batekebwa mu kalantiini.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikuteekwateekwaho kuba baine Ebola, nibatwarwa omu karantini.
Acholi: Dano ma byek me bedo ki two ebola tye i komgi ki poko gioo i kom dano mukene
Ateso: Itunga lu eomitai ebe ejatatar keda ebola egitario kes aiboisit acie.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba 'bani ega azo ebola niri pie 'diyi ma ta mba a'dule 'ba aziri pi vusi re.

English: People have embraced hand washing as a way of stopping the Ebola outbreak.
Luganda: Abantu baanirizza okunaaba engalo ng'engeri y'okukomya okubalukawo kwa Ebola.
Runyankore: Abantu baikiriize eky'okunaaba omungaro, nk'omuhanda gw'okuzibira okujanjara kwa Ebola.
Acholi: Dano gumako lwoko cing macalo yoo me gengo nya pa two ebola
Ateso: Ecamutu itunga nu ailot akanin kwape ewai lo itikokinet ebola.
Lugbara: Ba eyi ai dri ojiza geri 'bani ecozu azo ebola niri atrizu ra ni ru

English: All suspected contacts are traced and quarantined to prevent further spread of ebola.
Luganda: Abasuubirwa okubeerako n'abaazuulibwamu ebola baalondoddwa ne bateekebwa mu kkalantiini okwewala okusaasaana kwa Ebola.
Runyankore: Abantu abarikuteekwaho kuba bahikaine n'omurwaire, nibasherurwa batwarwa omu karantiini okuzibira ebola okweyongyera kujanjara.
Acholi: Joo ma byek tye ni gubedo ki latwo ebola ki poko gioo ki dano mukene me gengo nya pa two corona
Ateso: Itunga kere lu eomitai ebe ejatatar keda ebola emouno kosodete agitar kanu aitikokin aweario na adeka.
Lugbara: Ba 'ba dria 'bani ega eci i 'ba azo pie 'diyi pie ra 'diyi onda dika 'ba eyi ma esele co 'ba azi 'diyi vurisi te azo ebola niri ma ereta drile ri atrizu

English: Ebola brings about high fever, bleeding through the ears, nose and mouth.
Luganda: Ebola aleetera omusujja omungi, okuvaamu omusaayi mu matu, mu nnyindo ne mu kamwa.
Runyankore: Ebola neereeta ekitengo ky'amaani, okujwa omu matu, omu nyido n'omukanwa.
Acholi: Two ebola kelo lyeto, mol pa remo ki wang, um ki dog
Ateso: Eyauni ebola emusuja lo epol noi, aiwi akumes, aki ka akituk.
Lugbara: Ebola ni rua driza eji tualu ari raza bilesi, omvusi azini tisi ri be

English: Health facilities will be installed to prevent the spread of Ebola in the country.
Luganda: Ebifo ebijjanjabirwamu bijja kussibwawo okutangira okusaasaana kwa Ebola mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Amajanjabiro nigiija kwombekwa, okuzibira okujanjara kwa ebola omwihanga.
Acholi: Kibi yubu odi yadi pi gengo nya pa two ebola
Ateso: Eponio aiduk iboro lu adekis kanu aitikitik awea naka ebola kakwap.
Lugbara: Ba mu arojo omgbo weresi 'diyi e'do azo ebola niri ma ereta kari 'di ma alea ri atrizu

English: The country registered three Ebola cases in Kasese.
Luganda: Eggwanga lyafunye abalwadde ba Ebola basatu e Kasese.
Runyankore: Eihanga rikatungayo abarwaire bashatu omuri Kasese.
Acholi: Ki nongo dano adek ki two ebola i kasese
Ateso: Abu akwap wok iwadika itunga iuni lu apotu odumutu ebola.
Lugbara: Kari 'di esu 'ba azi eyi na azo ebola niri be distrikiti Kasese niria

English: The people travelled to Congo to attend a burial where they succumbed to ebola.
Luganda: Abantu baagenze e Congo okuziika gye baafunidde obulwadde bwa ebola.
Runyankore: Abantu abagiire Congo kuziika, niyo bakwatirwe ebola.
Acholi: Joo ni gucito iyik mo congo kama gutoo iye pi two ebola
Ateso: Ejaasi itunga lu opotu olototo Congo aida konye apotu otwakata ebola.
Lugbara: Ba 'da eyi mu ndra dra azi ma alea kari Congo niri ma alea eyini ani azo ebola niri esuzu ndo

English: The government will establish new infrastructures in Arua.
Luganda: Gavumenti ejja kuteekawo ebintu ebigasiza abantu awamu mu Arua.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neija kutaho eby'ombeko bisya omuri Arua.
Acholi: Gamente obi jami mukene Arua
Ateso: Ebuni apugan aiduk aiboisio acie nuitetiak Arua.
Lugbara: Gamete ni mu afa o'bi eyini ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi si Arua

English: People will get opportunities to engage in business activities.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kufuna omukisa okwenyigira mu byobusuubuzi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibeija kutunga omugisha gw'okwejumba omu by'obushubuzi.
Acholi: Dano gubi nongo gum me timo biacara
Ateso: Epote itunga adumun arereng kanu aswam ebiasara.
Lugbara: Ba eyi nga drileba eyi esu 'yeta tujari ni 'diyi 'yezu

English: People will get capital and increase their income levels.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kufuna entandikwa bongere ku nnyingiza yaabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibeija kutunga esente z'okutandika emirimo entaasya eyeyongyere.
Acholi: Dano gubi nongo cente me cako biacara ma obi medo i kom cente gi
Ateso: Epote itunga adumun ikapun kanu aiyatakina ebiasara kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyi nga robia tujari e'dozu ri esu eyini ani robia eyini esule ri ma omgbo otuzu beni

English: People will engage in economic activities which will boost their financial capability.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kwenyigira mu byobusubuzi ekijja okutumbula obusobozi bwabwe mu byensimbi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibeija kwejumba omu mirimo y'eby'entaasya, erije kubabaasisa kutunga sente.
Acholi: Dano gubi timo biacara ma obi medo lim i cing gi
Ateso: Epote itunga aswam aswamisinei nu eyaunete ikapun nuda ikeunete iriagon kon.
Lugbara: Ba eyi 'yeta robia esuzu 'diyini 'diyi 'ye eyini ani robia eyini esu ri ma omgbo otuzu

English: The government has to increase its support towards the refugees.
Luganda: Gavumenti eyongedde ku buyambi bwayo eri abanoonyiboobubudamu.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera obuhwezi obu erikuha empungi.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omed kony ma miyo ki luring ayella
Ateso: Ekot apugan aiyatakin agangat ke najaas ikerai.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma otu atita erini fe emunyale eyini ri ma omgbo ra

English: People lack the income to provide for the needs of their children.
Luganda: Abantu tebalina ssente kutuusa byetaago eri abaana baabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu tibaine sente z'okuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'abaana baabo.
Acholi: Dano peke ki cente ma mite pi cobo miti pa lupaco gi
Ateso: Emamete itunga ikapun lu ingarakinet idwe kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyivu robia eyini ecozu afa eyi ma anzi eyini le 'diyi fezu ra ri yo

English: The project will ensure effectiveness in service provision.
Luganda: Pulojekiti ejja kufaayo ku kutuusa amangu obuweereza.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti neija kureetaho obuheereza burungi.
Acholi: Yub eni obi neno ni yoo me miyo kony oyubu
Ateso: Ebuni epurojekt aitojokar ejanakine.
Lugbara: Otita 'di ni mu fe azi ngaza o'bi eyini ri ni ecazu ewakokoru

English: There is proper documentation for the project beneficiaries.
Luganda: Waliwo enkuuma ebiwandiiko by'aabagenda okuganyulwa mu pulojekiti.
Runyankore: Hariho ebihandiiko ebihikire, eby'abantu abareije kugasirwa omu purogyekiti.
Acholi: Coc tye maber pi joo matye i yub eni
Ateso: Idaritai aiwadikaeta nu itunga kalu emedautu.
Lugbara: Kokobi 'bani ede kililiru 'ba mupi orodri esupi otita 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri ci

English: The government has facilitated the establishment of schools, bridges, solar panels in Arua.
Luganda: Gavumenti eyambyeko mu kuzimba amasomero, entindo n'amasannyalaze g'enjuba mu Arua.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ehwereire omu kwombeka amashomero, entindo hamwe na soora pano omuri Arua.
Acholi: Gamente otelo yub me gedo gangi kwan , wii pem ki mac ma aa ki iceng i Arua
Ateso: Abu apugan igang adukio na isomeroi, idaracan, isolai.
Lugbara: Gamete ofe robia 'bani sukulu, daraza azini solar eyi sizu Arua ri ni

English: The government has equipped people with hands-on techniques in stove making.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewadde abantu eby'okukozesa mu kukola ssigiri nga bakozesa emikono gyabwe.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ehereize abantu emyoga omu kukora esigiri.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo ngec i kom diro me yubu cigiri bot lwak
Ateso: Abu apugan isisianak itunga aswam asigirin.
Lugbara: Gamete fe 'ba eyini ondua ecozu sigiri eyi edezu drisi ri ma dria

English: The project will benefit only the people of West Nile.
Luganda: Pulojekiti ejja kuganyula bantu bokka ab'omu West Nile.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti neija kuhwera abantu ba West Nile bonka.
Acholi: Yub eni obi bedo pi joo me westnile keken
Ateso: Ebuni epurojekt aitojok itunga luko West nile bon.
Lugbara: Otita 'da ni nga mu adri orodriru lu 'ba westnilea 'diyi dri

English: Four sub-counties in Arua will participate in the project.
Luganda: Emiruka ena mu Arua gijja kwetaba mu pulojekiti.
Runyankore: Amagomborora ana omuri Arua, nigeija kwetaba omu purogyekiti.
Acholi: Sub kaunti angwen i Arua gubi bedo i projek eni
Ateso: Itemwan iwongon luko Arua kes epote ajaikin toma opurojekt
Lugbara: Joago su Arua 'diyi mu 'yeta 'ye otita 'da ma alea ni

English: The project will enhance agricultural productivity.
Luganda: Pulojekiti ejja kwongera ku makungula mu byobulimi.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti neija kutungura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Yub eni obi tyelo kor lok me pur
Ateso: Ebuni epurojekt aikeun nuka akoru.
Lugbara: Otita 'da ni mu afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ma omgbo otu

English: People will improve their standards of living.
Luganda: Abantu bajja kutumbula embeera z'obulamu bwabwe.
Runyankore: Abantu nibeija kugira entunguuka omu ntuura yaabo.
Acholi: Kwo pa dano obi yube
Ateso: Epote itunga aikeun adoketait na aijar kec.
Lugbara: Ba eyi nga geri eyini edri nyazu 'diyi ma omgbo otu

English: The government has facilitated Arua regional referral hospital with an ambulance.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewaddeyo  emmotoka etambuza abalwadde mu ddwaliro lya Arua regional referral.
Runyankore: Gavumenti ehereize eirwariro rya Arua erihango ambyurensi.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo mutoka Ambulance ki ot yat madit Arua
Ateso: Abu apugan igang adekis naka Arua keda amotoka nadekis.
Lugbara: Gamete fe Arojo ambu Arua ri ni ambulansi.

English: The government aims at handling emergency cases in the district.
Luganda: Gavumenti eruubirira kukwasaganya mu bwangu bantu abali mu mbeera embi mu disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Gavumenti negyenderera okukora aha ndwara ezaaho naaho omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Gamente mito tic i kom peko ma nongo kony mite iye-oo oyot oyot i distrik
Ateso: Itereikit apugan aitemokin nuka engeso ko disitrikt.
Lugbara: Gamete 'ba asi ecozu e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu

English: The government has also ensured that refugee-hosting communities have better health services.
Luganda: Gavumenti efuddeyo n'okulaba nga ebifo ebisengamu abanoonyiboobubudamu biba n'obujjanjabi obulungi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti egarukire yareeba ngu ebyanga ebirikwakiira empungi byatunga obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara.
Acholi: gamente bene otimo tek me neno ni joo mabedo ikabedo ma olworo camp bene ginongo kony me yot kom maber
Ateso: Etacau apugan ebe itunga lu ijaunitos ikerai ebeit adumun amukian na abeit.
Lugbara: Gamete ne vini ra kini ongulumu emunyale eyini angu fepi 'diyi ma alea arojo wura mukeni eyi ci

English: The ambulance will help refugee communities to have access to better medical services.
Luganda: Emmotoka etambuza balwadde ejja kuyamba ebitundu ebirimu abanoonyiboobubudamu okufuna ebyobujjanjabi ebirungi.
Runyankore: Ambyurensi neija kuhwera ebyanga ebirimu empungi okutunga obuheereza burungi bw'ebyamagara.
Acholi: Ambulance obi konyo luring ayella ginongo kony me yot kom maber
Ateso: Ingarakini amotoka nadekis ikerai adumunun amukian na abeit.
Lugbara: Ambulansi 'da ni mu azakoma fe ongulumu emunyale eyini 'diyi dri eyini ani ecozu azakoma kililiru fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu

English: There will be a reduction in maternal and neonatal rates because of improved medical facilities.
Luganda: Wajja kubaawo okukendeera ku muwendo gw'abakyala abafiira mu ssanya n'abaana abafa nga baakazaalibwa olw'obujjanjabi obulungi.
Runyankore: Abakazi abarikufa nibazarara hamwe n'ahanyima y'okuzaara, nibaza kukyendeera ahabw'obuheereza bw'eby'amarwariro kweyongyera.
Acholi: Wel mege ma too ikare me nywal onyo yacu obi dwogo piny pi odi yadi mabeco
Ateso: Edisiaros atwakisia nuka nuatoto nu edook ka imukerun naarai ejokunar amukian.
Lugbara: Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi wura muke 'diyi nga dra ayia eyini azini anzi nyiri eyini ri ma omgbo esi

English: Ambulance services should be readily available for the people.
Luganda: Obuweereza bw'emmotoka ezitambuza balwadde bulina okubeerawo eri abantu.
Runyankore: Obuheereza bwa ambyurensi bushemereire kubaho, abantu baaba nibabwetaaga.
Acholi: ambulance omyero obed tye pi dano weng
Ateso: Ekot ejanakine loka abiolosin oraas nu ejaas otunga nginipak.
Lugbara: Le ambulansi eyi ma aa sa'wa driasi ngonde o'bi eyini

English: The ambulance is well equipped with first aid services.
Luganda: Emmotoka etambuza balwadde ejja kubaamu eddagala eritaakiriza abalwadde.
Runyankore: Ambyurensi neeba erimu ebintu byona ebirikukoresibwa omu bujanjabi bw'okubanza.
Acholi: Ambulance tye ki jami weng me cako tic i kom latwo ka ki tere iot yat
Ateso: Ekapakitai abiolosin keda iboro lu amukian lu atipet.
Lugbara: Ambulansi 'da ni nga mu adri afa ayuzaru azakoma fele mbeleru 'diyiniri pie

English: Uganda has an underdeveloped ambulance system.
Luganda: Uganda erina enkola y'emmotoka ezitambuza balwadde embi.
Runyankore: Enkora ya ambyurensi omu Uganda tekatunguukire.
Acholi: Yoo me tic pa Ambulance i lobo Uganda pwod goro
Ateso: Uganda nes erongo emamiatatar ewai lo amotoka nadekis lo etenit.
Lugbara: Kari Uganda niri ma arakala ambulansi eyini ri ma omgbo ca ku

English: The government will provide ambulances countrywide.
Luganda: Gavumenti ejja kugaba emmotoka ezitambuza balwadde okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neija kugaba za mbyurensi omwihanga ryona.
Acholi: Gamente obi poko ambulance i lobo ni-oo weng
Ateso: Ebuni apugan akorar amotokan nuadekis akwap kere.
Lugbara: Gamete ni mu ambulansi eyi fe kari 'di ma alea ndulu

English: Ambulances should be operated by skilled health care practitioners.
Luganda: Emmotoka etambuza abalwadde erina kuddukanyizibwa omusawo omukugu.
Runyankore: Za ambyurensi zishemereire kukoresibwa abashaho abatendekirwe.
Acholi: Ludiro tic yoto kom aye omyero guti i Ambulenc
Ateso: Ekot amotokan nuadekis orai itunga lu epol aijen kes eyaitos.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ambulansi ma alea azi ngapi 'diyi ma aa 'ba azi ngapi e'yo rua alanisi muke ni eyi

English: The hospital replaced the old ambulance with the new one.
Luganda: Eddwaliro lyasikizza emmotoka etambuza abalwadde enkadde n'empya.
Runyankore: Eirwariro rikagura ambyurensi ensya, okuza omumwanya gw'enkuru.
Acholi: Ot yat owilo ambulance manyen me leyo ka wang ma con ni
Ateso: Abu adekis ogwel acie amotoka nadekis aburokin namojong.
Lugbara: Arojo 'da eji ambulansi oku 'da ma paria ambulansi o'di ni

English: Hospitals should be well facilitated to handle all kinds of health issues.
Luganda: Amalwaliro galina okutekebwatekebwa ebintu okusobola okukola ku ndwadde zonna.
Runyankore: Amarwariro gashemereire kuhebwa ebintu eby'okukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara byona.
Acholi: Odi yadi omyero gubed ki jami weng ma mite pi tic i kom peko me twoo mo keken
Ateso: Ekot adekisia aigangit kanu apedor atiokisio nu adekasinei kere.
Lugbara: Le afa dria orodriru ayuzaru 'diyi ma aa arojo eyi ma alea ci eyini ani azo wura ndundu eyi ma aza kozu beni

English: Hospitals lack the income to take ambulances for maintenance.
Luganda: Amalwaliro tegalina ssente kutwala mmotoka zitambuza balwadde kuddaabirizibwa.
Runyankore: Amarwariro tigaine sente z'okureeberera ambyurensi.
Acholi: Odi yadi peke ki cente me yubu ambulance
Ateso: Emamiatatar adekisia keda ikapun lu itemonokinet amotokan nuadekis.
Lugbara: Arojo eyivu robia ambulansi eyi jizu edezaru 'diyi yo

English: Ambulance services will reduce mortality and maternal cases.
Luganda: Empereza z'emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zijja kukendeeza ku bantu abafa n'abakyala abafa nga bazaala.
Runyankore: Ambyurensi niziija kukyendeeza okufa kw'abaana n'abakazi.
Acholi: Ambulance obi konyo me juku too pa mege ikare me nywal ki yaco
Ateso: Itidisiarete amotokan nuadekis atwakisia nu itunga keda nu angor nu edook.
Lugbara: Ambulansi eyi nga e'yo 'ba eyini odrazu azini ayia eyini odrazu osiria 'diyi ma omgbo esi

English: The police should arrest all people encroaching on wetlands.
Luganda: Poliisi erina okukwata abantu bonna abeesenza mu ntobazi.
Runyankore: Poriisi eshemereire kukwata abantu boona abarikutaahirira ebisharara.
Acholi: Abili omyero omak dano weng matye i kabedo ma dago dago
Ateso: Ekot ipolisin arocun itunga ngul kere lu emunanarete isama.
Lugbara: Le polisi eyi ma obi 'ba dria fipi aa'pi angu yiru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi

English: Human activities alongside the river have affected the river capacity.
Luganda: Emirimu egikolebwa ku mabbali g'omugga gikoseza entambula y'omugga.
Runyankore: Emirimo y'abantu haihi n'emigyera, ereteire amaizi kukyendera.
Acholi: Tic ma dano tiyo inget nam ma mol ni obalo kero pa nam enuni-oo
Ateso: Aswamisinei nu itunga kariri na icilena lu ecilet emunasi ewai lo akipi.
Lugbara: Yeta 'ba eyini yi rapi rara 'diyi ma kalatia 'diyi eza 'yi nde eyi ma omgbo ra

English: The region has a poor supply of water.
Luganda: Ekyalo kirina entambula y'amazzi embi.
Runyankore: Ekyanga tikiine maizi agarikumara.
Acholi: But piny eni petye ki pii maromo
Ateso: Emamiatatar aiboisit keda akipi nu ejokuka.
Lugbara: Angu 'da ma alea yi ma esuza eri were muke ku

English: People have limited access to water services.
Luganda: Abantu tebalina mazzi gamala.
Runyankore: Abantu tibarikubaasa kuhikwaho gye obuheereza bw'amaizi.
Acholi: Pe yot ki dano me nongo pii
Ateso: Mam itunga edumunenete akipi nu edolitos.
Lugbara: Geri 'ba eyini ecozu yi esuzu 'diyi were

English: The people of Arua have shortages in water for domestic use.
Luganda: Abantu b'omu Arua balina ebbula ly'amazzi g'okukozesa awaka.
Runyankore: Abantu ba Arua, tibaine maizi agarikumara kukoresa omuka.
Acholi: Dano me Arua cane ki yenyo pii me tic i paco
Ateso: Itunga luko Arua mam edumunenete akipi nu edolitos kanu aitwasam.
Lugbara: Yi ayuzaru e'yo akua 'diyisi ri ma omgbo ca 'ba Arua 'diyini ku

English: People have engaged in business activities alongside the river.
Luganda: Abantu beenyigidde mu byobusuubuzi ku mabbali g'omugga.
Runyankore: Abantu bejumbire omu mirimo y'obushubuzi haihi n'omugyera.
Acholi: Dano gutimo biacara inget pi nam ma mol ni
Ateso: Apotu itunga olomasi akiro nu agwelanar ariri na icileta
Lugbara: Ba eyi e'do 'yeta tujari ni 'diyi yi rapi rara 'diyi ma kalatia

English: The government should establish strict laws for people encroaching on the wetlands.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okuteekawo amateeka amakakali ku bantu abasenga mu ntobazi.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kutaho ebiragiro by'amaani, aha bantu abarikutaahirira ebisharara.
Acholi: Gamente omyero oket cik matek i kom dano ma donyo ingot ma i dagu
Ateso: Ekot apugan aitolomun ikisila lu egogong kanu itunga lu emunaritos isama.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma 'ba azita okporu ni eyi 'ba fipi aa'pi angu yiru 'diyi ma alea 'diyini

English: There is flooding along the Osu stream in Arua.
Luganda: Waliwo amataba ku mugga Osu mu Arua.
Runyankore: Aha mugyera Osu omuri Arua, hariho okushandara kw'amaizi.
Acholi: Wang pi me Osu i Arua opong ki pii
Ateso: Ejai ebulone ariri na ecilet loka Osu ko Arua.
Lugbara: E'yo yi ni tizuri eri yi osu ni Arua ri ma alea ci

English: People should be sensitized about the importance of wetlands.
Luganda: Abantu balina okutegeezebwa ku mugaso gw'entobazi.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kwegyesibwa aha mugasho  gw'ebisharara.
Acholi: Omyero ki wac ki dano ber pa dagu
Ateso: Ekot itunga aisisianakino nuikamunitos ajokis naka isama.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe o'bi eyini imbata orodri angu yiru 'diyiniri ma dria

English: There is a change in rain patterns because of environmental degradation.
Luganda: Waliwo enkyukakyuka mu nkuba efunibwa olw'okukozesa obubi obutonde.
Runyankore: Hariho empinduka omu migwere y'enjura, ahabw'okusisikara kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi.
Acholi: Aloka loka ikit ma kot cwee kede pi bale pa kabedo waa lapore tongo bunga
Ateso: Ejai aijulakinet kowai lo etepe kanu amunario na akwap.
Lugbara: Sa'wa ozo ni 'dizu 'diyi oja eyi ra e'yo amani angu ama agei 'diyi ezazu risi

English: National environment management authority should intervene to conserve the wetlands.
Luganda: Ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku butonde bw'ensi kirina okuvaayo okutaasa entobazi.
Runyankore: Ekitongore ky'eihanga ekirikureeberera obuhangwa bw'ensi, kishemereire kwimukiramu, kikarinda ebisharara.
Acholi: Dul me National Environment Management Authority omyero onen ni otimo gin mo me gwoko dagu
Ateso: Ekot erionget loka isama adedengar kanu ayuar isama.
Lugbara: Le amuti National environment management authority niri ma efi tambaza fezu angu yiru 'diyini

English: Most of the wetlands in Arua have been encroached on by the people.
Luganda: Entobazi ezisinga mu Arua zaasengemu abantu.
Runyankore: Ensharara ezirikukira obwingi omuri Arua,zitahirirwe abantu.
Acholi: Dano me Arua guwilo ngom i kabedo ma dagu tye iye
Ateso: Isama luipu kotoma Arua adautu itunga alomakin.
Lugbara: Ba eyi fi aa angu yiru 'diyi ma abari Arua 'diyi ma alea

English: People connive with leaders to occupy the wetlands.
Luganda: Abantu beekobaana n'abakulembeze okusenga mu ntobazzi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibakorengana n'abebembezi okutuura omumyanya y'ebisharara.
Acholi: Lwak winye ki lutela pi wilo ngom ikabedo kama obedo dagu
Ateso: Eswamanaros itunga keda engarenok kanu aiduk osama.
Lugbara: Ba eyi ti eci drice'ba eyi pie aa'zu angu yiru 'diyi ma alea

English: Leaders are not concerned about the consistency in environmental degradation.
Luganda: Abakulembeze tebeefiirayo ku kwonoona obutonde bw'ensi okugenda mu maaso.
Runyankore: Abebembezi tibarikufayo ahabuhangwa bw'ensi oburikuguma nibusisikara.
Acholi: Lutela pe gitye ka paro pi kit ma piny tye ka bale kede
Ateso: Mam engarenok epodokitos nuikamunitos amunanario naka ejautene lo akwap.
Lugbara: Drice'ba eyi 'bani asi e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma ezata ni muzu drile ri ma dria ku

English: Leaders have failed to enforce environmental laws.
Luganda: Abakulembeze balemereddwa okussa mu nkola amateeka agafuga obutonde.
Runyankore: Abebembezi baremirwe kutaho ebiragiro by'obuhangwa bwensi omu nkora.
Acholi: Ket cik ma gwoko cwec ongayo wang lutela-oo
Ateso: Epikosi engarenok abuikin itunga ikisila lu eyuaritos ejautene lo akwap.
Lugbara: Drice'ba eyi o'bi azita o'bale angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi 'ba 'yeta ma alea ti

English: Some areas have been well protected and conserved.
Luganda: Ebitundu ebimu bisobodde okukuumibwa n'okulabirirwa obulungi.
Runyankore: Emyanya emwe erinzirwe kurungi.
Acholi: Kabedo mukene ki gwoko gi maber
Ateso: Acie aiboisio eyuaritai lem ejok ka aidar.
Lugbara: Ba mba angu azi 'diyi ma ta kililiru

English: Population pressure in the area has brought about the destruction of the wetlands.
Luganda: Omuwendo gw'abantu omungi mu kitundu guviiriddeko okusaanyaawo entobazi.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi omu kyanga nibo bareesireho okushiisha ebisharara.
Acholi: Nyaa pa well dano ikabedo oweko kicako balo dagu
Ateso: Aipues na itunga kaiboisio nes ayau amunario naka isama.
Lugbara: E'yo 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea tutu ri fe 'bani angu yiru 'diyi ezazu

English: People should desist from buying land in wetlands.
Luganda: Abantu balina okukomya okugula ettaka mu ntobazi.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kwetantara okugura eitaka omu bisharara.
Acholi: Dano omyero gu gik wilo ngom i dagu
Ateso: Ekot itunga ainyekikin agwela alupok nu ejaas osama.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma ku nyaku jeza angu yiru 'diyi ma alea ri ja

English: Investors are constructing infrastructures in wetlands.
Luganda: Bamusigansimbi bazimba bizimbe mu ntobazi.
Runyankore: Abarikwenda kutandikaho amakorero, bariyo nibombeka omu bisharara.
Acholi: Lutim biacara tye ka wilo ngom i dagu
Ateso: Itunga lu eyaunenete nuka apol edukete osama.
Lugbara: Ba angu ezoma ejipi 'diyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi si angu yiru 'diyi ma alea

English: Arua and Koboko established the environmental police to protect and conserve the environment.
Luganda: Arua ne Koboko zassaawo poliisi y'obutonde okusobola okukuuma n'okulabirira obutonde bw'ensi.
Runyankore: Arua na Koboko bakataho poriisi erikujunanizibwa aha buhangwa bw'ensi, ebaase kuburinda.
Acholi: Arua ki Koboko gu cimo abili ma gwoko cwec wek gu gwok cwec ma ikabedo gi
Ateso: Apotu Arua ka Koboko itolomutu erionget loka polis lo ikamunit nuka ayuarit ka aidar ejautene lo akwap.
Lugbara: Distrikiti Arua ni azini Koboko ni 'diyi e'doki polisi angu ama agei ri niri tambaza fezu angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ni

English: The government will restore the wetlands in Nebbi and Malacha.
Luganda: Gavumenti yaakununula ntobazi eziri mu Nebbi ne Maracha.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neija kugaruraho ebisharara omuri Nebi na Maracha.
Acholi: Gamente obi roco dagu matye i Nebbi ki Maracha
Ateso: Ebuni apugan ainyakakin isama aiboisio nuka Nebbi ka Maracha.
Lugbara: Gamete ni mu angu yiru Nebbi'a azini Maracha'a 'diyi ogo vele

English: The destruction of the environment affects the ecosystem and water retention.
Luganda: Okusaanyaawo obutonde bw'ensi kikosa ebintu ebiberamu n'enkuuma y'amazzi.
Runyankore: Okusisikara kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi, nikireeta oburemeezi ahabintu ebirikutuuramu hamwe n'okukwata amaizi.
Acholi: Balo kabedo wa dwoko piny kero pa ngom me gwoko pii
Ateso: Amunario naka ejautene lo akwap emunari aijar na iboro luegelegela ka aikidiokor na akipi.
Lugbara: E'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ezazu ri ni afa oli mukeri edepiri 'ye onzi tualu yi tambaza be

English: The ministry of water and environment has preserved over five thousand wetlands.
Luganda: Ministule y'amazzi n'obutonde bw'ensi ekuumye entobazi ezisoba mu nkumi ettaano.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'amaizi n'obuhangwa bwensi egarwireho ebisharara ebirikurenga enkumi itaano.

Ateso: Abu erionget loka akipi ka ejautene lo akwap idar isama lu edeparete ilukumin ikany.
Lugbara: Okalamvu yi ni azini angu amani aa'zu alenia ri niri mba angu yiru ogogo elifu towi 'diyi ma ta

English: The government has provided income to facilitate the restoration of wetlands in the country.
Luganda: Gavumenti ewadde ensimbi ez'okuyambako mu kuzzaawo entobazi mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eheireyo esente ez'okuhwera omu kuhunduuza ebisharara omwihanga.
Acholi: Gamente omiyo cente pi roco dagu ducu matye i lobo ni
Ateso: Ejaiki apugan ikapun kanu aigangia ainyakakino naka isama
Lugbara: Gamete fe robia e'yo angu yiru 'diyi ogozu vele kari 'di ma alea ri ma aza kozu

English: There are increasing cases of child neglect in the area.
Luganda: Emisango gy'obutalabirira baana gyeyongera mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Okunageijura abaana kweyongyeire omukyanga.
Acholi: Adot mapol tye i kom tim me kwero paro pi lutino i kabedo eni
Ateso: Epuata imusagon lu apalunit nuka idwe kotoma aiboisit.

English: Early marriages are rampant in the area.
Luganda: Okufumbirwa kw'abaana abato kususse mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Abaishiki okushwerwa bakiri bato kweyongyeire omu kyanga.
Acholi: Nyomo lutino con dwong totwal ikabedo eni
Ateso: Apolor alinganakino na edukone.
Lugbara: Aku e'doza drioru 'diyi ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea angiri

English: Men lack the income to meet the basic needs of their families.
Luganda: Abasajja tebalina nsimbi kutuukiriza eby'etaago by'amaka gaabwe eby'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
Runyankore: Abashaija tibaine sente z'okukora aha byetaago by'omu maka.
Acholi: Coo pe gitye ki cente me miyo jami ma mite ki lu ot gi
Ateso: Emamiatatar ikiliok keda ikapun kanu lu itodolikinet ipudesia lu ikalia kec.
Lugbara: Agupi eyivu robia afa aku eyivile 'diyini le 'diyi jezu yo

English: Fathers should get involved in taking care of their homes.
Luganda: Abaami balina okwenyigira mu kulabirira amaka gaabwe.
Runyankore: Abashaija bashemereire kwejumba omu kureeberera amaka gaabo.
Acholi: Coo omyero gubed tye i gwoko paci gi
Ateso: Ekot auriak ajaut akiro nu aidar ireria kec.
Lugbara: Le ata eyi ma tupa e'yo aku tambazu 'diyi ma alea indi

English: Husbands and wives are always having conflicts at home.
Luganda: Abaami n'abakyala batera okubeera n'obukuubagano mu maka.
Runyankore: Abakazi n'abashaija, nibatuura baine entongane omu maka.
Acholi: Coo ki mon ipol kare gi bedo ki tele i gang gi
Ateso: Ikiliok keda angor engolopasi duc okalia kec.
Lugbara: Agupi eyi tualu Oku eyivile 'diyi pie sa'wa driasi aa ngiringirisi akua

English: There is rampant drug abuse in the district.
Luganda: Okukozesa ebiragalalagala kussuse mu disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Okukoresa emibazi erikuktokooza obwonko, kweyongyeire omu disiturikiti.
Acholi: Rwom me nywaro tic ki yat tye ka nyaa totwal
Ateso: Epol aimat na ikee kodisitrikt.
Lugbara: Aro onzi eyi ma ayuza distrikiti 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu

English: Mothers work hard and forget about their children.
Luganda: Bamaama bakola nnyo ne beerabira abaana baabwe.
Runyankore: Abakazi nibakora munonga bebwa abaana baabo.
Acholi: Mege tiyo matek dok wigi wil oo i kom lutino gi
Ateso: Iswamaete nuatoto noi imurokinete nu idwe kec.
Lugbara: Ayia eyi azi nga okposi eyini ani e'yo avizu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma dria te

English: Women drink a lot of alcohol in the area.
Luganda: Abakazi banywa nnyo omwenge mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Abakazi omu kyanga nibanywa munonga amarwa.
Acholi: Mon ma i kabedo ni gimato kongo totwal
Ateso: Emasete angor ajon noi katutubet.
Lugbara: Oku eyi ewa mvu saaru angu 'da ma alea

English: Women have neglected their responsibilities at home.
Luganda: Abakazi basuddewo obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe mu maka.
Runyankore: Abakazi banageijwire obujunanizibwa bwabo omu maka.
Acholi: Mon ojalo pi tic gi ma pacu-oo
Ateso: Elokonyata angor aswamisinei kec kotoma oreria.
Lugbara: Oku eyi adi azi eyivile akua 'diyi te

English: People should avoid drug abuse.
Luganda: Abantu balina okwewala okukozesa ebiragalalagala.
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kwetantara okukoresa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko.
Acholi: Dano omyero gu gik nywaro tic ki yadi
Ateso: Ekot itunga aisac aimat ikee.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma ku aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuta ja

English: Fathers should be sensitized on how to help youths engage in useful activities.
Luganda: Bataata beebalina butya bwe bayinza okuyamaba abavubuka okwenyigira mu bintu ebiyamba.
Runyankore: Ba ishe b'abaana, bashemereire kumanyisibwa oku bashemereire kuhwera eminyeto okwejumba omu mirimo ey'omugasho.
Acholi: Omyero ki pwony wege ki diro me konyo bulu timo jami ma ber pi gi
Ateso: Ekot luapapa aisisianakin eipone lo ingarakinet atumunak alomar aswamisinei nu itojokete.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe ata eyini imbata geri eyini ecozu azakoma fezu 'ba ode eyini eyini ani 'yeta orodriru 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria

English: Alcohol consumption leads to a high rate of domestic violence.
Luganda: Okunywa omwenge kivaako obutabanguko mu maka obw'ekika ekya waggulu.
Runyankore: Okunywa amarwa, nikireeta okubonabonesa abantu omu maka kurugirira akakikura ky'abantu.
Acholi: Mato kongo medo rwom me tim gero
Ateso: Amat ajon eyangauni amumu naepol okalia.
Lugbara: Ewa mvuza ni fe ngiringiri aku eselea ri ma omgbo ni tutu

English: He praised his community for being brave.
Luganda: Yatenderezza abantu b'omu kitundu olw'okuba abavumu.
Runyankore: Akasiima abantu be ahabw'okuba emanzi.
Acholi: En pwoyo dano ne pi nyutu tek cwiny
Ateso: Abu ngesi itur ike itunga kanu acobeu .
Lugbara: Eri epi ongulumu ivileri eyini aa'zu ori kokoru risi

English: One community member laughed at his comment.
Luganda: Omutuuze omu yeesekerera kye yayogera.
Runyankore: Omutuuragye omwe akashekyerera eki yagambire.
Acholi: Ngat acel ma ikabedo ne onyero tam ma en omiyo
Ateso: Abu emeba lo otunga ke okweni kanu akiro ke.
Lugbara: Ba azi ongulumua alu ni gu e'yo erini nze risi

English: They formed a football club in the region.
Luganda: Baagunjaawo ttiimu y'omupiira gw'ebigere mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Bakatandika kiraabu y'omupiira omu kyanga.
Acholi: Gu yubu dul tuku me odilo me but piny
Ateso: Apotu kesi odukutu ekilabu atutubet.
Lugbara: Eyi e'do amuti mupira tuza avizu ri angu 'da ma alea

English: There was a football game in Northern Uganda.
Luganda: Waaliwo omuzannyo gw'omupiira mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Hakaba hariho omuzaano gw'omupiira omu matemba ga Uganda.
Acholi: Tuku odilo mo obedo tye i kumalo me Uganda
Ateso: Ajai abolia emopira ko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
Lugbara: Mupira tuza ma abala azi ndra kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea ci

English: They constructed a football stadium for their fans.
Luganda: Baazimbira abawagizi baabwe ekisaawe ky'omupiira gw'ebigere.
Runyankore: Bakombeka ekizaaniro ky'omupiira.

Ateso: Apotu kesi odukutu eisawe kanu amaak kec lu emopira.

English: The football players prepared for the major games.
Luganda: Abasambi b'omupiira beetegekera emizannyo egy'amaanyi.

Luganda: Yatugambye okukolera awamu.
Runyankore: Akatugambira ngu tukorere hamwe.
Acholi: En owaco itwa ni watii kacelo
Ateso: Abu ngesi alimok iso aswam kwape etimu.
Lugbara: Eri 'yo amani ama ma nga azi tualu amuti ru

English: A new committee was elected.
Luganda: Akakiiko akapya kaalondebwa.
Runyankore: Akakiiko akasya kakatooranwa.
Acholi: Kiyero committee manyen
Ateso: Aponi oseunai ekomiti loitetet.
Lugbara: Ba pe Komiti azi o'diru ni i

English: Democracy should be practised.
Luganda: Demokolasiya alina okuteekebwa mu nkola.
Runyankore: Enkora y'obw'ebebembezi burungi, eshemereire kubaho.
Acholi: Omyero loc alwak obed tye
Ateso: Ekot aitolot epugae loajokan.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma 'ba gamete o'bi eyiniri 'yeta ma alea

English: They disrespected me at the party.

Acholi: Gunywara ki i yub me kwee ma obedo tye
Ateso: Apotu kesi itisilito eong opucit.
Lugbara: Eyi 'ye inzita ako mabe omu 'da ma alea

English: They urged us to respect each other.
Luganda: Baatusabye okuwangana ekitiibwa.
Runyankore: Bakatushaba kuheerezana ekitiinisa.
Acholi: Kilego wa me wore
Ateso: Aponi alimokin iso ayonganara.
Lugbara: Eyi ai ama inzita fezu amani amama eselea

English: New employees were recruited.
Luganda: Abakozi ababya baaleeteddwa.
Runyankore: Abakozi basya bakataahamu.
Acholi: Kicoyo lutic manyen
Ateso: Aponi itolomai eswamak lu itetiak.
Lugbara: Ba eji azi'ba o'diru ni eyi

English: The corrupt workers were stopped from working.
Luganda: Abakozi abalya nguzi baayimiriziddwa okukola.
Runyankore: Abakozi abashomankuzi bakemerezibwa aha mirimo.
Acholi: Kijuku tic pa lutim camcana
Ateso: Aponi itapalarai eswamak luka ecamusana kotoma aswam.
Lugbara: Ba oga azi'ba anyamgbolo be 'diyini azi si

English: There is no discrimination in my village.
Luganda: Ku kyalo kyange tekuli kusosola.
Runyankore: Omu kyaro kyangye tiharimu kushoroora.
Acholi: Apoka poka peke icaro wa
Ateso: Emamei atiakatiaka kocaalo ka.
Lugbara: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi gbuzu kala ri mavile calo ri ma alea yo

English: My job application was rejected.
Luganda: Ebbaluwa yange esaba omulimu yagaanibwa.
Runyankore: Ebaruha yangye y'okushaba omurimo, tereikiriziibwe.
Acholi: Ki kwero waraga na me lego tic wa woko
Ateso: Aponi ongeroi alipan ka na aswam.
Lugbara: Ba ga ma waraga mani Sile azi esuzu risi.

English: They declared some new districts this year.
Luganda: Baalangirira disitulikiti ezimu empya omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Bakarangirira za disiturikiti ensya omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Kiyabo distrik mukene manyen i mwaka ni
Ateso: Aponi itijenarai icie kotoma odisitriktan luitetiak okaru lo.
Lugbara: Ba ede distrikiti azi o'diru ni eyi eli 'disi

English: People were called for job interviews.
Luganda: Abantu baayitiddwa okugezesebwa ku mulimu.
Runyankore: Abantu bakeetwa kukora intavyu z'emirimo.
Acholi: Ki lwongo dano pi interview me tic
Ateso: Aponi iwororai itunga kanu aswam aingito na adumun aswam.
Lugbara: Ba omve 'ba eyi emuzu obeta azi esuzu 'diyi 'yezu

English: They constructed a new bridge.
Luganda: Baazimba olutindo olupya.
Runyankore: Bakombeka orutindo rusya.
Acholi: Guyubu wii pem manyen
Ateso: Apotu kesi odukutu edaraca loitetet.
Lugbara: Eyi si daraza o'diru ni

English: The town centre is not secure enough.
Luganda: Ekibuga si kitebenkevu ekimala.
Runyankore: Ebyokwerinda omu rurembo ahagati, tibirikumara.
Acholi: Rwom me ber bedo i town pe tye maber
Ateso: Mam kiding na etaun eyuara ejok.
Lugbara: Tawuni ma ageitema cani ku

English: Are you self employed?
Luganda: Wekozesa?
Runyankore: Noyekozesa?
Acholi: in itiyo piri keni?
Ateso: Ijo irai lo iswamai nukon bon?
Lugbara: Mi azi nga mi ma ngulupi ogogoru?

English: I keep my money in the bank.
Luganda: Ntereka ssente zange mu bbanka.
Runyankore: Esente zangye ninzibiika omu banka.
Acholi: Agwoko cente na i bang
Ateso: Engadi eong ikapun ka aingadis naka ikapun.
Lugbara: Ma robia mavileri ma ta mba erojo ma alea

English: I was forced to resign.
Luganda: Nakakibwa okuwummula ku mulimu.
Runyankore: Nkagyemeserezibwa kurekura omurimo.
Acholi: Kidiya me weko tic
Ateso: Aponi abuikin eong aiyengun.
Lugbara: Ba fe mani azi ku okposi ale maniri kokoru

English: People travel long distances to Namugongo to celebrate Martyr's Day
Luganda: Abantu batambula engendo empanvu okugenda e Namugongo okukuza olunaku lw'abajulizi.
Runyankore: Abantu nibagyenda engyendo ndaingwa barikuza Namugongo okujaguza eizooba ry'abajurizi.
Acholi: Dano woto pi bor piny me cito ka kwero nino pa lucaden i Namugongo
Ateso: Elosete itunga amairon nu eojak itoni Namugongo kanu ainumunum aparan naka Martyrs.
Lugbara: Ba eyi aci angu ezuru 'diyi ma alea muzu Namugongo'a o'du 'ba 'bani o'di e'yo aita nisi 'diyiniri inzizu

English: We need to be united even with our different political affiliations
Luganda: Twetaaga okubeera obumu newankubadde tulina enjawukana mu byobufuzi.
Runyankore: Twine tukwatanisa nobu turaabe nitwikiririza omubi biina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana.
Acholi: Omyero waribe kadi bedni pe wa tye i dul me cung iwibye marom
Ateso: Ekot oni aimorikikina keda wok itunga lu opatei kalu egelegela.
Lugbara: Le ama ma eci ti tualu amani ta tro aa'zu amuti politiki ni ndundu ni eyi ma alea ra ti

English: Leaders need to do more to bring services to their constituencies
Luganda: Abakulembeze beetaaga okukola ennyo okusobola okutuusa empeereza mu bitundu bye bakulembera.
Runyankore: Abebembezi baine kukora ekirikukiraho ,okuhisya obuheereza omu bicweeka byaabo.
Acholi: Lutela omyero gutim tic matek me neno ni dongo obedo tye
Ateso: Ekot engarenok aiyatakin aswam kanu ayaun ejanakine aiboisio kec.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba eyi ma nga azi drile nezura kini 'ba azi nga angu eyivile opi nyaza ni 'diyi ma alea ra

English: Different political parties need to have a consensus for the country's good
Luganda: Ebibiina byobufuzi eby'enjawulo byetaaga okuba n'entegeka ku lw'obulungi bw'egwanga.
Runyankore: Ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana, baine kwikirizana ahabw'oburungi bw'eihanga.
Acholi: Dule me cung iwibye ma pat pat omyero guribe pi ber pa lobo
Ateso: Ekot ipatei luegelegela acamanar kanu ajokis na akwap.
Lugbara: Le amuti ndundu politiki ni 'diyi ma eci ti kari 'di ma muke ni

English: Regular government inspection is important to ensure service delivery
Luganda: Okulambula kwa gavumenti kwa mugaso okusobola okufuna obuweereza.
Runyankore: Gavumenti okuguma neerambura, nikihwera okuhamya ngu obuheereza bwahika ahabantu.
Acholi: Gamente omyero obed ka neno tic ma tye ka time tere tere wek rwom me miyo kony ki lwak obed ber
Ateso: Arai emeet apugan aminiman iboro ejok kanu awanyun ebe ejai ejanakine
Lugbara: Azi pamvu oneza gamete niri eri muke nezu kini azi nga o'bi eyidri ri eri kililiru

English: Opposition and government should work together in service delivery
Luganda: Ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti wamu ne gavumenti balina okukolera awamu mu kutuusa empereza.
Runyankore: Abarikuhakanisa hamwe na Gavumenti, bashemereire kukorera hamwe omukuhikiiriza obuheereza.
Acholi: Gamente omyero otii ki dule cung iwibye ma jemo i kom gamente ka odwogo ilok me miyo kony ki lwak
Ateso: Ekot opposition keda apugan aiswamanar nepepei kanu aijanakin.
Lugbara: Le 'ba amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyi ma nga azi tualu gamete be azi ngazu o'bi eyidri

English: Areas represented by opposition members rarely get government services
Luganda: Ebitundu ebikiikirirwa ab'oludda oluvuganya tebitera kufuna buweereza bwa gavumenti.
Runyankore: Ab'omu bicweka ebirikujwekyerwa abanyeishengyero abarikuhakanisa Gavumenti, tibarikukira kutunga obuheereza bwa Gavumenti.
Acholi: Kabedo matye ki lutela ma jemo i kom gamente ipol kare pe gi nongo kony
Ateso: Aiboisio nu ebwoikitos imeban luka oposition mam idila adumunun aijanakino.
Lugbara: Gamete ni tutuni azi nga omgbo were si angu 'ba memba koloseni ni 'diyini aa'zu amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dricepi niri ma alea ku 'diyi ma alea

English: Incumbents usually win the next election due to their popularity
Luganda: Abali mu bukulembeze batera okuwangula okulonda okuddako olw'etuttumu lyabwe.
Runyankore: Abarikuba besimbireho kandi aribo bari omuntebe, buriijo nibasingura omukaruuru akarikwiija, ahabw'okugira ngu nibamanywa munonga.
Acholi: Lutela ma tye iloc ite kare ni ipol kare giloyo kwi pi yweka gi
Ateso: Idila lu lem ejaas sek oicolong aitelekanar aseo kanu ajenara kec.
Lugbara: Ba ebi pi adripi Memba koloseni ni ni 'diyi tutuni opeta eyi agani e'yo 'bani eyi nizu saaru risi

English: People need to follow up on the progress of district projects
Luganda: Abantu beetaaga okugoberera ku ntambula ya pulojekiti za disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Abantu baine kukuratira purogyekiti za Gavumenti nk'okuzirikugyenda.
Acholi: Dano omyero gulub kor tic matye ka time i yub matye i distrik
Ateso: Ekot itunga atupakinit elose lo iboro ko disitrikt kec.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma obi otita distrikiti ni 'diyi ma zota ma vuti ra

English: Party defectors usually don't last long in their new parties
Luganda: Abawakanya enteekateeka z'ebibiina tebatera kuwangaala mu bibiina byabwe ebipya.
Runyankore: Abarikuruga omu bibiina by'obutegyeki, tibarikukira kuhangarira omuri ebyo, ebi barikuba bagiiremu.
Acholi: Joo ma kobo party ma gicwako ipol kare pe gi rii i party manyen ma nongo gudonyo iye
Ateso: Itunga lu abwotak opatei icie mam duc eyangaikinete apak opatei kalu itetiak.
Lugbara: Ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi ojapi 'diyi aa'ni tutuni amuti eyini fizu o'diru 'da ma alea siri ku

English: Tribalism is dangerous in politics since it brings about division
Luganda: Okusosola mu mawanga kwa bulabe mu by'obufuzi olw'okuba kuleetawo enjawukana.
Runyankore: Okwebembeza eby'enganda , nikibi omubyobutegyeki ahabwokuba nikireeta okwebaganisamu.
Acholi: Apoka poka me kaka pe ber i cung iwibye pien kelo apoka poka
Ateso: Erono atiakatiaka kotoma atekerin emunari politiks
Lugbara: E'yo azi suruni 'diyi onzi saaru politiki'a a'dusikuni eyi awata eji eji

English: Being a politician means being ready to make sacrifices
Luganda: Okubeera mu nnabyabufuzi kitegeeza kuba mwetegefu kusaddaaka
Runyankore: Okuza omu by'obutegyeki, nikimanyisa ngu oine kugira ebi wafeerwa.
Acholi: Bedo la cung wibye nyutu ni itye atera me jalo pi jami mogo
Ateso: Araut epolitisian apolouke akapakina aipal iboro luipu.
Lugbara: Aa'zu 'ba politiki niri ru ri ma efile kini mi nga e'yo karakara eyi owi edeta ru

English: The president often awards his allies with ministerial positions
Luganda: Pulezidenti atera okuwa abali ku luuyi lwe ebifo by'obwa minisita .
Runyankore: Omwebembezi w'eihanga, buriijo naasiima banywani be, arikubaheereza emyanya y'obwa minisita.
Acholi: Ladit lobo i pol kare miyo gum ki joo ma cwake me doko minicita
Ateso: Eropenen duc lokapolon akwap ike itunga keda aiboisio nu araut iministan.
Lugbara: Purezidenti ni tutuni agyipika ivile 'diyi 'ba minisita eyi ru

English: The government should put more emphasis on vocational schools
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okuteeka essira ku masomero g'ebyemikono.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kuta amaani ahamashomero g'eby'emikono.
Acholi: Gamente omyero oket miti ni i kom gangi kwan me tic diro me cing
Ateso: Ekot apugan aibwaikin agogongu toma osomeroi lu itutuonorere.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma 'ba okpo sukulu afa edele drisi 'diyini 'diyi ma dria

English: Students in rural areas face the problem of travelling long journeys
Luganda: Abasomi mu bitundu eby'omukyalo bafuna ebizibu eby'okutambula engendo empavu.
Runyankore: Abeegi omu byaro, baine oburemeezi bw'okugyenda engyendo ndaingwa.
Acholi: Lutino kwan ma tye i caro gitye ki peko me wot pi boo piny
Ateso: Esisiak luko ocaaloi ejaas keda ationis na alosit irotin lu elwaka.
Lugbara: Sukulu anzi engazu calo eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru acizu angu zoza eyi ma alea ri esu

English: Best candidates at the district level are awarded government scholarships
Luganda: Abayizi abasinga ku ddaala lya disitulikiti baweebwa sikaala za gavumenti.
Runyankore: Abeegi abarikukora gye aharurengo rwa Disiturikiti, nibaheebwa ebiconco by'okushashurirwa Gavumenti omwishomero.
Acholi: Lutino kwan ma timo peny maber i rwom me district, gamente minigi gum me kwan nono
Ateso: Esisiak lu iswamaete ejok kodisitrikt ijainikino asioman na igangit apugan.
Lugbara: Sukulu anzi agapi muke ndeni distrikiti'a 'diyi drileba sukulu lazu pirini engazu gamete vu 'diyi esu

English: The government should increase the budget for rural schools
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okwongera ku mbalirira y'amasomero ag'omu byalo.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera aha mbaririra y'esente ezirikuheebwa amashomero g'omubyaro.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omed cente ma kimiyo ki gangi kwan ma i caro
Ateso: Ekot apugan aiyatakin ebajet loka isomeroi lu ocaaloi.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma otu bajeti sukulu calo'a 'diyi niri ra

English: Parents and school administration should always work together
Luganda: Abazadde wamu nabatwala amasomero balina okukolera awamu
Runyankore: Abazaire n'abarikureeberera amashomero, buriijo bashemereire kukorera hamwe.
Acholi: Lunyodo omyero gutii kacelo ki ludito me gang kwan
Ateso: Ekot auriak keda eyaitene lo esomero aswam nepepei.
Lugbara: Le tipika eyi ma nga azi tualu driceza sukulu ni 'diyi pie

English: The ministry should reduce registration fees so that more students can sit exams
Luganda: Minisitule erina okukendeeza ku bisale by'okwewandiisa buli muyizi asobole okutuula ebibuuzo.
Runyankore: Minisiture eshemereire kutuubya aha bishare by'okwehandikisa kugira ngu abaana baingi bakore ebigyezo.
Acholi: Minictry omyero odwok piny wel cente ma lutino kwan culu me coone pi timo peny wek lutino mapol onong gum me timo peny
Ateso: Ekot erionget aitidisiar ikapun lu aiwadikao tetere esisiak luipu iboikinos aingito.
Lugbara: Le okalamvu onita niri ma esi robia ru sizu obeta eyi 'yezu ri ra sukulu anzi karakara eyini ecozu obeta eyi 'yezu ra beni

English: Schools should often renovate dormitories to improve student accommodation facilities
Luganda: Amasomero galina okudaabiriza ebisulo by'abayizi emirundi egisinga okulongoosa ensula y'abayizi .
Runyankore: Amashomero buriijo gashemereire kuhunduuza oburaaro bw'abaana kugira bagire oburaaro burungi.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero gubed ka roco kama lutino butu iye tere tere
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi aitemonokin itogoi lu eprete esisiak kanu aitojokar apero naka esisiak.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma ede angu sukulu anzi eyini lazu 'diyi inyia inyia wura sukulu anzi eyini lazu ri otuzu

English: It takes effort from both teachers and students to deliver excellent academic performance
Luganda: Kyetaagisa abasomesa n'abayizi okutekaamu amaanyi okusobozesa ensoma ennungi.
Runyankore: Okukora n'amaani okw'abeegi n'abegyesa nikhwera amashomero kukora kurungi.
Acholi: Cwalo winye ikin lupwonye ki lutino kwan pi lutino me timo peny maber
Ateso: Eyangaikini aswam naepol kanu isisianakinak ka esisiak aikeun eswamae loajokan atukot.
Lugbara: Eri le okpo engazu imba'ba eyi vu tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie agata muke 'diyi ofuzu

English: Teachers often use past papers to prepare students for examinations
Luganda: Abasomesa batera okukozesa ebigezo ebyayita okutegeka abayizi okuyita ebigezo.
Runyankore: Abegyesa nibakira kwejunisa empapura ezakozirwe enyima kutebeekanisa abeegi kukora ebigyezo.
Acholi: Lupwonye ipol kare gitiyo ki karatac me peny ma okato con me yubu lutino kwan gi pi peny
Ateso: Itwasamaenenete isisianakinak apapulai nu aingito numojong kanu aitemonokino idwe aswam aingito.
Lugbara: Imba'ba eyi tutuni karatasi obeta ni 'drio 'diyi ayu anzi eyi otuzu obeta eyini

English: Schools should teach vocational skills to their students to fight unemployment
Luganda: Amasomero galina okusomesa abayizi amasomo g'ebyemikono okulwanyisa ebbula ly'emirimu.
Runyankore: Amashomero gashemereire kwegyesa abeegi eby'emikono,kugira ngu barwanise eibura ry'emirimo.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero gumi ngec me tic diro cing wek walweny i kom bedo peko pa tic
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi aisisianakin idwe ikoosin kanu aitiji amamus na aswamisinei.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma imba sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyini afa edele drisi 'diyi ma azi ecozu a'di 'dizu azi ako be

English: Informal education such as carpentry is good for creating jobs
Luganda: Enjigiriza etali ya ssomero nga obubazzi nnungi mu kutondawo emirimu.
Runyankore: Okwegyesa abantu emirimo y'engaro, nk'okubeija, nikirungi omu kureetaho emirimo.
Acholi: Pwonyo diro mogo calo payo bawo konyo totwal me poko tic
Ateso: Ekoosi kwapenat aike ejok kanu aswamisinei.
Lugbara: Onita afa edele drisi 'diyini ekile ondua afa eyi edezu mbawu siri le 'diyi muke azi eyi edezu

English: Religious leaders play an important role in district politics
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'eddiini bakola omulimu mukulu mu byobufuzi bya disitulikiti.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi b'ediini, nibakora omurimo muhango, omu by'obutegyeki bwa disiturikiti.
Acholi: Lutela dini gitiyo tic madit i kom lok me cung iwibye i district
Ateso: Eraas engarenok lu idiinin lu epol ajokis kowai loka politiks lu odisitriktan.
Lugbara: Drice'ba eyo aitanisi 'diyi azi okporu ni nga politiki distrikiti niri ma alea

English: School fundraisings are often aimed at improving infrastructure
Luganda: Okusonda kw'amasomero ebiseera ebisinga kuluubirira kutumbula bizimbibwa.
Runyankore: Okurundaana esente aha mashomero, nikugyenderera okuhunduuza ebyombeko.
Acholi: Yub me jogo cente i gangi kwan i pol kare kitimo ki miti me yubu jami i gangi kwan
Ateso: Atukio na ikapun kosomeroi erai kanu aitojokara aduketa
Lugbara: Ba tutuni robia tra sukulu'a 'diyi ayu afa siza eyi otuzu

English: Schools built on a religious foundation are good for instilling morals in their students
Luganda: Amasomero agazimbidwa kumusingi gw'eddini malungi mu kussa empisa mu bayizi baabwe.
Runyankore: Amashomero agombekirwe aha musingye gw'ediini, ni marungi omu kwegyesa abeegi emicwe.
Acholi: Gang kwan ma kanica aye oyabo ipol kare gi konyo totwal i pwonyo lutino ki kit maber
Ateso: Isomeroi lu iraunitai kokiroria luka ikanisan ejokuka kanu aisisianakina idwe iponesio.
Lugbara: Sukulu 'bani sile e'yo aitaniri ma dria 'diyi muke adriza ala imbazu sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma alea

English: Construction is an expensive sector hence quality assurance is paramount
Luganda: Okuzimba kintu kya buseere n'olw'ekyo okukuuma omutindo kikulu.
Runyankore: Okwombeka n'omurimo gurikutwaara esente, nahabwekyo, gushemereire kukorwa kurungi.
Acholi: Biacara me gedo obedo gin ma tero cente madwong, ci omyero ngiyo rwom me tic obed tye
Ateso: Erai ewai lo aduko lo epol etiai aso ebeit awanyun ebe ikiara adoketait.
Lugbara: Afa ndundu eyi ma sita eri afa azi ajeru ni i, azi ngaza muke ri ni ani aa'zu e'yo okporu ni i

English: On-campus teacher accommodation is good for student-teacher relations
Luganda: Okuzimba ennyumba z'abasomesa ku masomero ku masomero kirungi okunyweza enkolagana wakati w'abasomesa n'abayizi.
Runyankore: Oburaaro bw'abegyesa okuba aha mashomero, nikirungi aha kukorengana n'abeegi
Acholi: Yub me weko lupwonye bedo tye i gang kwan konyo totwal i yubu wat ikin lutino kwan ki lupwonye
Ateso: Ejok isisianakinak keda esisiak apero osomero eyauni ajanara najokan.
Lugbara: E'yo imba'ba eyini aa'zu sukulu'a ogogo ri eri muke aa'ta sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea imba'ba eyi pie ri ni

English: Churches often fundraise money to renovate their infrastructure
Luganda: Ekkanisa zitera okusonda ensimbi okuddabiriza ebizimbe byago.
Runyankore: Amakanisa nigakira kurundaana esente z'okutereeza ebyombeko.
Acholi: Kanica ipol kare bedo ki yub me jogo cente me yubu jami
Ateso: Etukete duc ikanisan ikapun kanu aitemonokino aduketa kec.
Lugbara: Kanisa eyi tutuni robia tra engazu o'bi eyivu afa eyini ndundu 'diyi sizu o'diru

English: We always need to reflect and thank God for what he has done for us
Luganda: Bulijjo twetaaga okwefumiitiriza ne twebaza Katonda olw'ebyo byatukoledde.
Runyankore: Buriijo nitwetenga okwiijuka, kandi tuasiima Ruhanga ebyatukoreire
Acholi: ipol kare omyero watam dok wapwoo lacwec pi jami ma en otimo piwa
Ateso: Ekot duc oni aomomanar kosodete aisiyalamikin Loasuban kanu eswamaiki ngesi oni.
Lugbara: Le ama ma ega e'yo azini ama ma fe Munguni awa'difo e'yo erini 'ye amani 'diyisi

English: Christians need to come together in prayer during this pandemic
Luganda: Abakrisitaayo beetaaga okukungaana awamu mu ssaala mu kirwadde bbunansi kino.
Runyankore: Abakristaayo nibetenga kweteeranira hamwe omu kushaba, ahabw'endwara eriho.
Acholi: Lucristayo omyero guribbe i lega i kare man me poto pa two
Ateso: Ekot ikuristayon aimorikikin ailip nepepei kapak na adeka kana.
Lugbara: Le kristiani eyi ma eci ti tualu izita ma alea sa'wa azo korona niri ni 'disi

English: We are all Ugandans even with our religious differences
Luganda: Ffenna tuli bannayuganda newankubadde tulina enzikiriza ez'enjawulo.

Acholi: Wan weng wabedo anywali me Uganda kadi bed ni dini wa pat
Ateso: Irai oni itunga luko Uganda araida igelegela oni kotoma odiinin.
Lugbara: Ama dria kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi amani ta tro aa'zu dini ndundu eyi ma alea ra ti

English: Churches should run tree-planting campaigns to preserve the environment
Luganda: Amakanisa galina okussawo enkola y'okusimba emiti okukuuma obutonde.
Runyankore: Amaramizo gashemereire kutaho ehururu z'okubyara emiti, okurinda obuhangwa bw'ensi.
Acholi: Kanica omyero gubed ki yub ki me pito yadi wek gu gwok cwec me ikabedo gi
Ateso: Ekot ikanisan aitolot nuka aira ikito kanu ayuar ejautene lo akwap.
Lugbara: Le kanisa eyi ma 'ye otita pati sazu 'diyi angu amani aa'zu aleni'a 'diyi ma tambazu

English: Sunday school services have been suspended due to the pandemic
Luganda: Amasomero g'abaana ku makanisa gawereddwa olw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
Runyankore: Okushomesa sande sikuuru kukemerezibwa ahabw'endwara eriho.
Acholi: Ki juku guru pa dano igang lega pi two ma opoto
Ateso: Aponi itobwounai atukono nu idwe luka asioman naka naesabiti kanu adeka.
Lugbara: Ba atri 'yeta sande sukulu ni 'diyi ci e'yo azo korona nirisi

English: Church communities should engage in developmental projects such as piggery
Luganda: Ebibiina mu makanisa birina okwenyigira mu pulojekiti ezikulaakulanya nga ey'okulunda embizzi.
Runyankore: Amakanisa gashemereire kwejumba omu purogyekiti ezirikureeta entunguuka, nk'okutunga empunu.

Ateso: Ekot itunga lu ekanisa alomar opurojektin lu itolomete ikapun kwapenat aipit ipegei.
Lugbara: Le ongulumu kanisa ni 'diyi ma 'ye 'yeta angu ezoma ni 'diyi ekile ngurube eyi ma tambaza le

English: Christians should donate to their church communities for church projects
Luganda: Abakulisitaayo balina okuwaayo mu bibiina byabwe okuwagira pulojekiti z'ekkanisa.
Runyankore: Abakristaayo bashemereire kugaba omu makanisa gaabo, kugira ngu za purogyekiti zigyende omu maisho.
Acholi: Lucristayo omyero gumi jami pi yub ma kanica tye katimo ne pi lwak
Ateso: Ekot ikuristayon aijanakin agangat okanisa kec kanuka ipurojektin luka ekanisa.
Lugbara: Le kristiani eyi ma fe afa ongulumu kanisa ni 'diyini otita kanisa ni 'diyi 'yezu

English: People in business and the church should join hands and start developmental projects
Luganda: Abantu mu bizinensi ne mu kkanisa balina okukolera ewamu ne batandikawo pulojekiti ezikulaakulanya.
Runyankore: Abantu abari omubyobushubuzi hamwe n'ekanisa, bashemereire kukorera hamwe, batandike purogyekiti ez'entunguuka.
Acholi: Lutim biacara ki joo joo me kanica omero gu rib cing gi dok gucak timo jami ma kelo dongo lobo
Ateso: Ekot agwelanarak keda ekanisa aimorikikin kosodete ageun ipurojektin lu eyaunete ikapun.

English: East African countries should work together on matters of trade
Luganda: Ensi z'omu bugwanjuba bwa Africa zirina okukolera awamu mu nsonga z'ebyobusuubuzi.
Runyankore: Amahanga g'omuburengyerwizooba bwa Africa, gashemereire kukorera hamwe kugira ngu gatandikeho za purogyekiti z'entunguuka.
Acholi: Lobe Me East Africa Omyero gutii kacelo i jami ma kwako biacara
Ateso: Ekot akwapin nuka east Africa aswam nepepe kanu agwelanar.
Lugbara: Le kari East Afrika ni 'diyi ma nga azi tualu e'yo tujari ni 'diyisi

English: Churches need regular donations to run their activities
Luganda: Amakanisa geetaaga obuyambi buli kaseera okuddukanya emirimu gyazo.
Runyankore: Amakanisa nigetenga obuhweezi okutwara omumaisho emirimo yaago.
Acholi: Dano omyero gubed ka miyo jami ki kanica wek tic gi omede anyim
Ateso: Ekotos ikanisan ameet aijanakino ikapun kanu aitolosio aswamisinei kec.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe kanisa eyini robia inyia inyia eyini 'yeta ndundu eyivile 'diyi 'yezu

English: People should donate land for church projects such as agriculture
Luganda: Abantu balina okuwaayo ettaka eri pulojekiti z'ekkanisa ng'obulimi n'obulunzi
Runyankore: Abantu bashemereire kugabira ekanisa eitaka ry'okukoreraho obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Dano omyero gumi ngom pi yub me kanica lapore yub me pur
Ateso: Ekot itunga aijaikin ekanisa alupok kanu ipurojektin ke kwapenat akoru.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma fe nyaku otita kanisa ekile agirikica le 'diyini

English: We need to be united in christ so we can live holy lives
Luganda: Twetaaga okuba obumu mu Krisito tusobole okubeera mu bulamu obutukuvu.
Runyankore: Twine kukwatanisa omuri kristo, kugira ngu tugume tujunirwe.
Acholi: Omyero waribe wuni i christo wek wa kwo kwo maleng
Ateso: Ekot oni aimorikikina kotoma kuristo tetere oni irai lukalaunak.
Lugbara: Le ama ma eci ti tualu Yesu'a amani ani aa'zu edri muke 'diyi ma alea beni

English: Church staff require nearby accommodation for easy access to the church
Luganda: Abakozi b'omu kkanisa beetaaga okusula okumpi bayanguyirwe okutuuka ku kkanisa.
Runyankore: Abakozi b'ekanisa nibetenga obutaaho haihi nayo, kugira ngu bagume nibahikayo juba.
Acholi: Lutic me kanica omyero gunong ot matye cok wek obed yot it gi me bino i kanica
Ateso: Ekoto itunga lu iswamaete okanisa apero ne eyapie tetere epatana alosenen okanisa.
Lugbara: Le azi'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ma aa kanisa ma agei inyia eyini ani muzu kanisa ewakokoru beni

English: Most church buildings need to be renovated.
Luganda: Ebizimbe by'amakanisa ebimu byetaaga kuddaabirizibwa.
Runyankore: Ebyombeko by'ekanisa ebingi nibyetenga kugarurwa busya.
Acholi: Pol pa odi lega pa lucristayo mito aroca
Ateso: Ikanisan luipu ekotos aitemonokino.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ede Jo kanisa ni 'diyi ma abari eyi o'diru

English: Some health workers have been accused of stealing government drugs.
Luganda: Abasawo abamu bavunaaniddwa ogw'okubba eddagala lya gavumenti.
Runyankore: Nikigambwa ngu abashaho abamwe nibaiba emibazi ya Gavumenti.
Acholi: Ki doto lutic yoto kom mogo pi cato yadi pa gamente
Ateso: Icie kotoma eswamak lu adekis itoroniaritai kanu akoko ikee apugan.
Lugbara: Ba to azi'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma azi eyi e'yo gamete ma aro oguzu risi

English: Drug theft in hospitals leads to drug shortages.
Luganda: Obubbi bw'eddagala mu malwaliro buleetera ebbula ly'eddagala.
Runyankore: Okwiba emibazi omu marwariro, nikigireetera kukyendeera.
Acholi: Kwo pa yadi i ot yat kelo weko nok pa yadi bedo tye
Ateso: Akoko na ikee adekisia eyangauni aikidiokus na ikee kadekis.
Lugbara: Aro eyi ma ogu arojo eyi ma alea ri ni fe aro eyini cazu ku ni

English: Some hospital staff vandalise equipment to swindle funds for new purchases.
Luganda: Abakozi b'amalwaliro abamu bonoona ebikozesebwa basobole okufuna obuyambi bw'ebintu ebipya.
Runyankore: Amarwariro agamwe nigashiisha ebintu kugira ngu gaheebwe esente z'okubikanika
Acholi: Lutic mukene me ot yat gi balo jami wek gukwal cente ma kimiyo pi wilo manyen
Ateso: Icie kotoma eswamak lu adekis elemanarete iboro, ekokoete ikapun kanu agwela icie.
Lugbara: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma azi eyi aga ayuzaru 'diyi eza eyini ani robia afa o'diru eyi jezuri oguzu beni

English: Regional hospitals often lack funds to run their activities.
Luganda: Amalwaliro g'ebitundu gatera okubula ebikozesebwa okuddukanya emirimu gyago.
Runyankore: Amarwariro g'ebyanga, nigakira kuburwa esente z'okutwara emirimo omu maisho.
Acholi: Odi yadi madong me twok piny ipol kare pe gi bedo ki cente ma oromo pi tic gi
Ateso: Adekisia nuapolok etapit ikapun amamus kanu aitolosio aswamisinei kec.
Lugbara: Arojo ambo 'diyivu robia tutuni 'yeta eyini 'diyi 'yezu yo

English: Most corrupt officials find a way of escaping justice by burying evidence.
Luganda: Abakungu abali b'enguzi abasinga banoonya engeri y'okudduka obwenkanya nga baziika obujulizi.
Runyankore: Abashomankuzi abamwe nibashereka obujurizi, kugira ngu bareke kujunanwa.
Acholi: Pol pa lutim cam cana pe gi nongo pwod pien ni giwilo caden ma tye i komgi ni
Ateso: Icie eswamak lu ecamusana edumunenete iwaitin lu inacet emusago kowai lo aibwar ekisibit.
Lugbara: Azi'ba anyamgbolo ru 'diyi geri e'yo liza kililiru ri niri atri eyini e'yo e'dapi kini eyi ezaki e'yo ra ada ri zizu ci risi

English: Hospital top management should do more to fight corruption in hospitals.
Luganda: Abatwala  eddwaliro ab'okuntikko balina okukola ennyo okulwanyisa enguzi mu malwaliro.
Runyankore: Abarikwebembera amarwariro, bashemereire kukora munonga okureeba ngu bamaraho obushomankuzi.
Acholi: Ludito me odi yadi omyero gulweny matek i kom bal me cam cana
Ateso: Ekot engarenok lu adekis aswam agogong kanu aitiji ecamusana adekisia.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba arojo ni okpo angiri be 'diyi ma nga azi drile a'di 'dizu anyamgbolo arojo eyi ma alea ri be

English: Health officials should have a good relationship with the people they serve
Luganda: Abasawo balina okubeera n'enkolagana ennungi n'abantu be baweereza.
Runyankore: Ab'ebyamagara bashemereire kugira enkorengana nungi n'abantu abu barikuheereza.
Acholi: Lutic yot kom omyero gubed ki wat maber ki lutwo gi
Ateso: Ekot eswamak lu adekis ajanara ejok keda itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
Lugbara: Le azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma aa wura muke si 'ba eyini azi ngazu eyidri 'diyi pie

English: People don't trust doctors who work in community clinics.
Luganda: Abantu tebeesiga basawo abakolera mu malwaliro g'ebitundu.
Runyankore: Abantu tibarikwesiga badokita abarikukora omu marwariro g'ekyaro.
Acholi: Dano pe geno daktari ma tiyo i odi yadi matino pa gamente

Lugbara: Ba eyi 'bani asi dakitari azi ngapi kiliniki o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku

English: Health officials need to be regularly audited to fight corruption.
Luganda: Abasawo balina okubalirirwa entakera okulwanyisa enguzi.
Runyankore: Ab'ebyamagara bashemereire kuguma nibabaririrwa okubaasa kurwanisa obushomankuzi..
Acholi: Omyero ki bed ka ngiyo kor tic pa lutic yot kom tere tere me giko bal me cam cana
Ateso: Ekot ameet awanyanar itabon eswamak lu adekis kanu aitiji ekorapusion.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma andri azi pamvu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyiniri sa'wa driasi a'di 'dizu anyamgbolo be

English: It's a good idea to install spies in government hospitals to investigate corruption.
Luganda: Kirowoozo kirungi okuteeka bambega mu malwaliro ga gavumenti okunoonyereza ku buli bw'enguzi.
Runyankore: Nikirungi okutaho bambega omu marwariro, bacondooze aha bushomankuzi.

Ateso: Erai aomisioit na ejok aibwanakin angicak adekisia nu apugan kanu ecamusana.

English: Ugandans should be sensitized on how they can help reduce corruption in hospitals.
Luganda: Bannayuganda balina okumanyisibwa ku butya bwe bayinza okukendeeza enguzi mu malwaliro.
Runyankore: Abanya Uganda bashemereire kwegyesibwa, oku bashemereire kuhwera omu kutuubya obushomankuzi omu marwariro.

English: Top health officials should champion the fight against corruption in hospitals.
Luganda: Abasawo ab'okuntikko balina okukulemberamu okulwanyisa enguzi mu malwaliro.
Runyankore: Abakozi omu marwariro bashemereire kwebembera kurwanisa obushomankuzi omu marwariro.

Ateso: Ekot eswamak luapolok adekis aingarenikin kowai lo aitiji ecamusana adekisia.
Lugbara: Le azi'ba arojo ni okpo angiri be 'diyi ma ce a'di anyamgbolo be ri ma dri ni

English: Hospital equipment should be regularly maintained for better service.

Runyankore: Ebyoma by'okukoresa omumarwariro, bishemereirev kuguma nibireebererwa gye, ahabw'obuheereza burungi.

Ateso: Ekot duc ameet aitala ka aitemonokin iboro lu adekis kanu ejanakine loajokan.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ede afa arojo'a 'diyi inyia inyia azi ngazu kililiru

English: Surveillance cameras should be installed to fight health equipment theft.
Luganda: Obukuumi bulina okuteekebwawo okulwanyisa obubbi bw'ebintu ebyeyamisibwa mu kujjanjaba.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kuteebwa za kamera omu irwariro, kugira ngu ebintu by'amarwariro birekye kwibwa.

Ateso: Ekot aibwanakin acuman nu engicete kanu aitikokin akoko na iboro lu adekis.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma osu afa kameraru ecozu angu onezu diyi a'di 'diza afa ayuzaru arojo'a 'diyi ma oguzaniri 'dizu

English: Stolen equipment is usually resold on the black market.
Luganda: Ebintu ebibbibwa bitera okuddamu ne bitundibwa ku bbeeyi etakkirizibwa mu mateeka.
Runyankore: Ebyoma ebirikuba bibiirwe, buriijo nibiguzibwa omukatare k'eshuma.
Acholi: Gemi tic ma ki kwalo pole ki caro iwi ali woko

Lugbara: Ba tutuni afa ayuzaru 'bani ogule 'diyi ozi cu nile ku 'diyi ma alea

English: Corrupt health officials should be severely punished by seizing their assets.
Luganda: Abasawo abalya enguzi balina okubonerezebwa ddala nga babowa ebintu byabwe.
Runyankore: Abakuru omu amarwariro abashomankuzi, bashemereire kufubirwa munonga obwo barikukwata ebintu byabo.

Ateso: Ekot aitisilanar eswamak lu adekis lu ecamusana kowai lo ademanar iboro kec.

English: The state should protect whistleblowers who report corruption.
Luganda: Gavumemti erina okutaasa abaloopa obuli bw'enguzi.

Lugbara: Le gamete ma fe tambaza 'ba e'yo anyamgbolo niri olupi 'diyini

English: Clear financial loss due to corruption needs to be reported by the authorities.
Luganda: Okufiirwa mu by'enfuna okweyolekerawo olw'obuli bw'enguzi kwetaaga okuloopebwa mu b'obuyinza.

Acholi: Lutic omyero guwac ni gurwenyo cente macalo adwoki me cam cana ka inen gitye ka nyutu adwoki me tic gi
Ateso: Atwanario na ikapun kanu ecamusana ekot olimorai nejai apugan.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba eyi ma to e'yo robia ni avizu e'yo anyamgbolo nirisi 'diyi ra

English: Proper investigation measures need to be put in place to fight drug theft.
Luganda: Emitendera gy'okunoonyereza emirungi gyetaaga okuteekebwawo okulwanyisa obubbi bw'eddagala.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho oburyo bw'okucondooza kurungi, okubaasa kurwanisa obushuma bw'emibazi.
Acholi: Omyero yoo me kwed ma ber obed tye pi lweny i kom kwo yadi
Ateso: Ekot aibwaikin iwaitin lu abeit lu engicere kanu aitiji akoko na ikee.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ofu geri e'yo eti ondazu kililiru 'diyi a'di 'dizu aro eyi ma ogu be

English: There are allegations of doctors stealing and selling drugs to private pharmacies.
Luganda: Waliwo ebyogerebwa eby'abasawo okubba n'okutunda eddagala mu matundiro g'eddagala ag'obwannannyini.
