Acholi: Koko tye i kom lutic yoto kom kwalo yadi ci gi cato bot joo ma cato yadi woko
Ateso: Elimilimitai ebe ekokoete imurok ka agwelanar ikee lu itunga.
Lugbara: E'yo azi efupi dakitari eyini aro oguzu azini ozizu dukani aro ozizu gameteni ku 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria ri ci

English: There's a lack of enough specialists in the medical field.
Luganda: Waliwo ebbula ly'abakugu mu kisaawe ky'ebyobulamu.
Runyankore: Hariho eibura ry'abakugu omu marwariro.
Acholi: Peko me nok pa ludiro tic yoto kom tye
Ateso: Ejai ekadakada lo ipirioitin kowai loka amukian.
Lugbara: Ba e'yo nipi azo eyi ma dria angiri 'diyi ma kalafe arakala rua ala niri ma alea were

English: The government should construct more maternity health facilities.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okuzimbawo ebifo ebirala awazaalirwa.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera kwombeka amarwariro agarikuragurira abakazi b'enda.
Acholi: Gamente omyero omyero omede ki yubu ka colo pa mon
Ateso: Ekot apugan adukun iwoodin icie lu idoere kadekisia.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma si arojo azakoma fezu okporovu eyini 'diyi ma azi dika

English: Lack of enough funding greatly affects regional hospitals in rural Uganda.
Luganda: Ebbula ly'ebyetaagisa ebimala likosa nnyo amalwaliro g'omu bitundu mu byalo bya Uganda.
Runyankore: Eibura ry'esente ezirikumara, nikiteganisa amarwariro omu byaro bya Uganda.
Acholi: Nok pa cente balo tic pa odi yadi madongo pa gamente matye i twok piny ma pat pat
Ateso: Amamus na ikapun emunarit adekisia nuapolok ocaaloi luko Uganda.
Lugbara: E'yo robia ni cazu ku ri ni arojo ambo kari Uganda niri ma angu calo ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi 'ye onzi

English: More transparency is needed to account for procured health equipment.
Luganda: Obwerufu obusingako bwetaagisa okubalirira ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi ebifunibwa.
Runyankore: Amazima gashemereire kweyongyera omu kuheereza embaririra y'ebyo ebirikuba biguzirwe omu marwariro.
Acholi: Adda mite ka odwogo ilok me nyutu machine ma kiwilo pi tic i odi yat
Ateso: Ekot aitacaunit noi nuka iboro kalu egwelio kanu amukian.
Lugbara: Le e'yo ada ma omgbo ma aa angiri 'bani ani e'yo ada nzezu geri afa ayuzaru arojo'a 'diyi ma ayuta niri ma dria

English: Anti-corrupt officials need to find ways of not being corrupted themselves.
Luganda: Abakungu abalwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi beetaaga okunoonya engeri z'obutalya nguzi nga bo.
Runyankore: Abakungu abarikurwanisa obushumankuzi, bashemereire kuronda oburyo bw'okutahinduka abashumankuzi bo bonka.
Acholi: Joo ma lwenyo i kom cam cana omyero gunong yoo me gwoke wek pe kibal wigi
Ateso: Ekot awanyun iwaitin lu mam emunarere eswamak lu itijiete nuka ecamusana.
Lugbara: Le azi'ba anyamgbolo ru ku 'diyi ma esu geri eyini ecozu ecazu anyamgbolo ru ku 'diyi

English: More scholarships should be awarded to needy students to grow our health workforce.
Luganda: Sikaala endala zirina okuweebwa abayizi abali mu bwetaavu okukuza enkola yaffe mu byobulamu.
Runyankore: Abeegi abooro bashemereire kwongyera kuheebwa obuhwezi omukwega , kugira ngu amarwariro gagire abashaho abarikumara.
Acholi: Omyero ki mede ki miyo gum me kwan me nono bot lutino pa lucan wek wa med wel lutic yoto kom
Ateso: Ekot aijanakin asioma natitai luipu nejaas esisiak lu icanas kanu aiyatakin enaba lo emukiak.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe drileba sukulu lazu pirini ri sukulu anzi amavile 'diyini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi amavileri ni ani zozu beni

English: Students need to be educated about the various scholarship opportunities available.
Luganda: Abayizi beetaaga okusomesebwa ku mikisa gya sikaala egiriwo.
Runyankore: Abeegi bashemereire kumanyisibwa emigisha y'okwegyera busha erikuba eriho.
Acholi: Omyero ki rwee lutino kwan i kom gum me kwan me nono ma padi padi ma tye ni
Ateso: Ekot esisiak aicorio nuikamunitos asioman natitai luegelegela.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe sukulu anzi eyini imbata drileba ndundu sukulu lazu pirini 'diyi ma dria

English: Students offering arts subjects should also be catered for regarding scholarships.
Luganda: Abayizi akola amasomo ga atisi nabo balina okufiibwako bwe kituuka ku sikaala.
Runyankore: Abeegi abarikutwara amashomo agatari ga sayansi nabo bashemereire kuteekwateekwaho, omushonga z'okushomera busha.
Acholi: Lutino kwan ma gi kwano lok me arts omyero bene kimi itgi gum me kwan nono
Ateso: Esisiak lu iswamaete aisisiaeta luka arts ekot aigangakit kowai loka asioman naka aitai.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma ega e'yo sukulu anzi afa sayanisi ru ku 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria indi drileba sukulu lazu pirini 'diyi ma e'yo eyi ma alea

English: Parents have a stake in discussing student sponsorship facilitation.
Luganda: Abazadde balina kye bakola mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kuvujjirira ku sizaala y'omuyizi.
Runyankore: Abazaire baine omwanya omu kuhanuura aha muringo gw'abeegi kuhwerwa, bakeegyera busha.
Acholi: Lunyodo omyero bene gubed tye ilok me miyo kony me kwan nono ki lutino gi
Ateso: Ejaas auriak keda aswam na aitemitem akorio naka agangat na asioman nejaas esisiak.
Lugbara: Tipika eyi ma pari agbatara gbaria drileba sukulu lazu pirini fele sukulu anzi eyini ri ma robia ma dria ci

English: Lack of information leads to low scholarship applications in rural areas.
Luganda: Obutafuna bubaka kireetera okusaba sokaala okuba wansi mu bitundu by'ebyalo.
Runyankore: Okuremwa kuhikwaho amakuru, nikituma abeegi baremwa kuhayo okushaba kwaabo, kugira ngu basomere busha.
Acholi: Nok pa ngec i kom yub me kwan nono oweko lutino manok icaro aye gunongo gum eni
Ateso: Amamus na adumunun akiro eyangauni aikidiokus na esisiak lu ocaalo mam alipan agangat.
Lugbara: O'dukoti ako ni fe 'ba waraga sipi drileba sukulu lazu pirini 'diyi esuzu 'diyi ma kalafe were angu caloru 'diyi ma alea

English: Higher education is expensive, which leads to increased school dropouts.
Luganda: Okusoma okwa waggulu kwa buseere ekireetera abawanduka mu masomero okweyongera.
Runyankore: Emishomo aha rurengo rwaheiguru, neetwara esente nyingi, ekirikureetera abeegi kuruga omu mashomero.
Acholi: Wel me kwan i rwom ma malo oweko dano mapol weko kwan-oo
Ateso: Aisiom na okuju epol etiai, nes eyaunit alakanakinio na esomero.
Lugbara: Onita dria leri eri ajeru erini ani fezu 'ba sukulu kupi ja 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu

English: Student scholarships should be extensively advertised so that nobody misses out.
Luganda: Sikaala z'abayizi zirina okulangibwa ennyo waleme kubaawo asubwa.
Runyankore: Okushomera busha kw'abeegi, kushemereire kurangwa, kugira ngu hatakagira owasigara enyima.
Acholi: Omyero ki pok ngec i kom gum me kwan nono wek dano wek dano weng ongee
Ateso: Ekot alimonor nuka asioman nakatitai luka esisiak tetere emameun yen etwaniari.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma nze e'yo drileba sukulu lazu pirini 'diyiniri ma dria saaru 'ba azi ni ani ecezu ku beni

English: Most scholarships for higher learning are offered in government institutions.
Luganda: Sikaala ezisinga mu kusoma okwa waggulu zitera kugabibwa mu matendekero ga gavumenti.
Runyankore: Emyanya y'okushomera busha omu bibiina ebyaheiguru erikukira obwingi, neegabwa omu matendekyero ga Gavumenti.
Acholi: Pol pa gum me kwan nono i rwom me kwan ma malo ki miyo i gangi kwan pa gamente
Ateso: Scholarships luka asioman naka okuju ijanakino kosomeroi lu apugan.
Lugbara: Ba tutuni drileba sukulu dria leri lazu pirini ri fe angu onita ni gamete ni 'diyi ma alea

English: Rural students need to be given access to scholarship information.
Luganda: Abayizi b'omu byalo balina okuweebwa obubaka ku sikaala.
Runyankore: Abeegi b'omubyaro, bashemereire kuheebwa omugisha gw'okumanya ebirikukwata ahakwegyera busha.
Acholi: Lutino kwan matye i caro omyero ki mi it gum me nongo ngec i kom yub me kwan nono
Ateso: Ekot aijanakin esisiak lu ocaaloi akiro nuka asioman nakatitai.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe sukulu anzi calo'a 'diyini o'dukoti drileba sukulu lazu pirini ndundu 'diyi ma dria

English: The government needs to do more on ensuring rural education quality is stepped up.
Luganda: Gavumenti erina okukola ennyo okulaba nti omutindo gw'okusoma mu byala gutumbulwa.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kwongyera kukora kihango, okureeba ngu eby'obwegyese omu byaro byaimusya omutwe.
Acholi: Gamente omyero otim tek me neno ni rwom me kwan i caro ki ilo malo
Ateso: Ekot apugan aswam nuipu kanu awanyun ebe ikeuno asiman na ocaaloi.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma nga azi dika nezu ra kini onita calo'a ri ma omgbo tura

English: Various stakeholders have discussed how best to enrol more students under scholarships.
Luganda: Abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo bakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku butya bwe bayinza okwongera ku bayizi abali ku sikaala.
Runyankore: Abu kirikukwataho abaingi, bahanwire aha muringo murungi ogu barikubaasa kwongyera abaana ahankora y'okwegyera busha.
Acholi: Dano mapol guloko i kom kit me weko lutino mwadong tiyo ki gum me kwan nono
Ateso: Apotu itunga itatamata eipone lo itolomere esisiak luipu kowai loka asioman nakatitai
Lugbara: Ba ambo ndundu 'diyi gbaki agbatara geri muke ndeni anzi eyi esuzu drileba sukulu lazu pirini 'diyini ri ma dria

English: Good nutrition helps children grow and be active at school.
Luganda: Endya ennungi eyamba abaana okukula obulungi n'okuba ajagujagu ku ssomero.
Runyankore: Endiisa nungi neehweera abaana kukura gye, kandi bakakora kurungi omu mashomero.
Acholi: Cam maber weko lutino dongo maber dok bene komgi bedo mit i gang kwan
Ateso: Ainyam najokan ingarakini idwe apolo ka aswam ejok osomero.
Lugbara: Nyaka nyaza muke ri ni fe anzi nyiri eyini zozu azini aa'zu rua viriviri be sukulu'a

English: A balanced diet is essential for proper child growth.
Luganda: Emmere erimu ebirungo byonna nnungi mu kukula kw'omwana.
Runyankore: Ebyokurya ebiine ebiriisa byona, nibihweera abaana kukura kurungi, kandi bakakora kurungi ahaishomero.
Acholi: Cam matye ki moc cam weng obedo gin ma mite pi dongo pa latin
Ateso: Aijul eode ejok kanu apolo na ikoku.
Lugbara: Nyaka ndundu eyi ma nyaza eri muke anzi eyini zozu muke

English: More sensitization is needed to educate parents on proper child feeding.
Luganda: Okumanyisibwa kungi kwetaagisa okusomesa abazadde ku ndya y'abaana ennungi.
Runyankore: Abazaire baine kwongyera bakegyesibwa aha ndiisa nungi y'abaana.
Acholi: Omyero ki mede ki rweyo lunyodo i kom kit me pit maber pi lutino gi
Ateso: Ekot aisisianakin auriak ejok eipone lo itanere idwe ejok.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe tipika eyini imbata drile geri anzi eyini nyaka fezu muke 'diyi ma dria

English: Schools need to revise their meal plans and feed students on a balanced diet.
Luganda: Amasomero geetaaga okuddamu okutunula mu nteekateeza z'ebiriibwa bawe abayizi emmere erimu ebirungo byonna.
Runyankore: Amashomero gaine kugaruka getegyereze enkora y'okuriisa abeegi ebyokurya ebiine ebiriisa byona.
Acholi: Gangi kwan omyero gulok yoo gi me pito lutino dok gucak miyo lutino cam matye ki moc cam weng
Ateso: Ekot isomeroi ainyogor aitemonokineta nu itanyamere esisiak kowai lo aijul eode.
Lugbara: Le sukulu eyi ma oja geri sukulu anzi eyini nyaka fezu ri ra eyini ani sukulu anzi eyini nyaka wura ndundu eyi fezu beni

English: Regular sensitization is a measure to eliminate malnutrition in families.
Luganda: Okumanyisibwa entakera luwenda lw'okumalawo endya embi mu maka.
Runyankore: Okuguma nihabaho okwegyesa abantu, nikyo kirikubaasa kumaraho emiriire mibi omumaka.
Acholi: Rweyo lwak obedo yoo me lweny i kom peko me netu
Ateso: Asioman naka atitai naka okuju ijanakino kosomeroi lu apugan.
Lugbara: Imbata feza inyia inyia ri eri geri 'ba eyini adazu familia eyi ma eselea ri atrizu

English: A balanced diet isn't something for only the rich but is a fundamental right.
Luganda: Emmere erimu ebirungo byonna si kintu eky'abagagga bokka wabula ddembe lya buli omu.
Runyankore: Okurya ebyokurya ebirimu ebiriisa byona, tikirikorwa kyabagaiga bonka, n'obugabe bwa buri omwe.
Acholi: Cam matye ki moc cam weng pe obedo pi lulonyo keken ento obedo twero pa latin
Ateso: Mam aijul eode erai kanu itunga luabarak bon erai kanu itunga kere.
Lugbara: Nyaka wura ndundu eyi ma nyata adrini e'yo azi 'ba mali be 'diyini ni ku te drilemgbo amboru 'ba dria niri i

English: Good feeding is essential for a student's academic performance.
Luganda: Endya ennungi ya nkizo mu kusoma kw'abayizi.
Runyankore: Okurya urungi n'okwomugasho ahakweega urungi omwishomero.
Acholi: Cam maber mite pi latin me kato peny
Ateso: Ainyam najokan ejok kanu esisiak aswam ejok atukot.
Lugbara: Nyaka nyaza muke ri eri okporu sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ni

English: Foods rich in proteins are good for body growth and are essential in a balanced diet.
Luganda: Emmere ezimba omubiri nnungi mu kukula kw'omubiri era ya nkizo mu mmeere erimu ebirungo byonna.
Runyankore: Ebyourya ebirikukuza n'okugarura busya omubiri, nibirungi ahakukura gye kandi nibyetengwa omumiriire yoona.
Acholi: Cam ma tye ki moc cam me protein gibeco pi dongo kom dok bene omyero gubed i cam matye ki moc cam weng
Ateso: Inyamat lu edukete akwan ejokuka ido ejaas keda iboro luipu lu ekot akwan.
Lugbara: Nyaka afa puroteini ruri pie omgbo angirisi 'diyi muke rua ni zozu dika eyi orodriru nyaka wura ndundu 'diyi ma nyata ni

English: Agricultural projects such as piggery have proved to be beneficial to communities.
Luganda: Pulojekiti z'obulimi nga okulunda embizzi zoolese nti za muganyulo eri ebitundu.
Runyankore: Purogyekiti z'eby'obuhingi, nk'okuriisa empunu, bireebekire biri ebyomugasho omu bantu.
Acholi: Gwoko lee macalo opego obedo biacara maber
Ateso: Ipurojektin lu akoru kwape aipit ipegei emedaikisi itunga noi.
Lugbara: Otita agirikica ni ekile ngurube eyi ma tambaza le ri e'da eyi ma orodri ongulumu eyini ri ra

English: There's a digital divide between people living in towns and those in remote areas.
Luganda: Waliwo okugabanyizibwamu mu bantu ababeera mu bibuga n'abomu byalo bwe kituuka ku mayengo.
Runyankore: Hariho embaganiza ahagati y'abantu abarikutuura omubyaaro , hamwe naabo abarikutuura omu ndembo.
Acholi: Diro me technology opoko kin dano ma bedo i town ki dano ma icaro
Ateso: Ejai atiakaku naepol kiding itunga lu iboyete otaun keda itunga lu ocaaloi.
Lugbara: Esele coza geri intaneti nirisi ni 'ba tawuni'a 'diyi ma eselea 'ba calo'a 'diyi pie ri ci

English: Regular antenatal visits are essential for expectant mothers.
Luganda: Okukyalira ebifo awalabirirwa ab'embuto kya nkizo eri bamaama ab'embuto.
Runyankore: Nekyomugasho, abakazi abaine enda kuguma nibaza omu marwariro.
Acholi: Limo ot yat ikare ki kare obed gin maber pi mon ma oyac
Ateso: Ameet alosenen adekis ipotie ejok kanuka angor nu eyapie aidoun.
Lugbara: Acizu arojo'a inyia inyia ri eri orodriru ayia okporovu ru 'diyini

English: People are advised to eat protein-rich foods such as meat and fish.
Luganda: Abantu baweebwa amagezi okulya erimu ebirungo ebizimba omubiri ng'ennyama n'ebyennyanja.
Runyankore: Abantu nibahaburwa kuguma nibarya ebyokurya ebiinemu embangirizi y'omubiri, nkenyama hamwe n'ebyenyanja.
Acholi: Kilego dano me camo cam matye i moc cam proten lapore rec ki ringo
Ateso: Icorakitai itunga ainyam inyamat lu edukete akwan kwape akiring ka agaria.
Lugbara: Ba fe 'ba eyini imbata nyaka afa 'ba rua sipi diyi be tre ekile eza azini e'bi le 'diyi nyazu

English: Malnutrition results in stunted growth among children and adults
Luganda: Endya mbi ereetera okuzingama mu baana n'abantu abakulu.
Runyankore: Okurya kubi, nikurugwamu okuguna kw'abaana n'abantu abakuru.
Acholi: Neto balo dongo pa latin ki dano madit bene
Ateso: Adeka naka aligirir ijaikini idwe ka itunga luapolok agengerer epoloete.
Lugbara: Adata ni fe anzi nyiri azini 'ba 'wara eyini zozu aliaru.

English: Research should be done on how to address the issue of malnutrition.
Luganda: Okunoonyereza kulina okukolebwa ku butya ensonga y'endya embi gy'erina okumalibwawo.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kubaho okucondooza ahaby'endiisa.
Acholi: Omyero ki tim kwed i kom kit me juku peko me two neto
Ateso: Ekot aitolot aingic kanu eipone kalo itikokinet adeka naka aligirir.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma onda e'yo eti geri ecozu e'yo adata niri ma aza kozu ri ma dria

English: Demonstration farms have proven to be important for agricultural research.
Luganda: Ennimiro eziyigirizibwako zoolese nti za mugaso mu kunoonyere za ku byobulimi.
Runyankore: Faamu ez'okwegyeraho zishangirwe ziri ez'omugasho omu kucondooza ahaby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.
Acholi: Poto magitiyo kwede me nyutu kit me pur okonyo totwal i kwed me pur ki gwoko lee
Ateso: Ejokuka amusirin nu itetemonerere nuka akoru kotoma esitesenin lu engicere nuka akoru.
Lugbara: Ba esu amvu ecetaru 'diyi orodriru e'yo ondazu e'yo agirikica niri ma dria

English: More funds should be allocated to Agricultural research to ensure food security.
Luganda: Obuyambi obusinga bulina kuteekebwa mu kunoonyereza ku byobulima okusobola okulaba nti waliwo emmere emala.
Runyankore: Okucondooza ahaby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, kushemereire kwongyerwamu esente, okubaasa umaraho eibura ry'eby'okurya.
Acholi: Omyero kimed cente ma ki keto i kwed me pur ki gwoko lee wek cam obed tye pi lwak
Ateso: Ekot aijanakin ikapun luipu orionget lo engici nuka akoru kanu ayuaritor inyamat.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma fe robia azi dika e'yo ondazu e'yo agirikica niri ma dria nyaka ma tambaza nezu

English: Cultural leaders can be used to sensitize their communities on proper nutrition.
Luganda: Abakulembeze mu buwangwa basobola okukozesebwa okusomesa abantu baabwe ku ndya ennungi.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa, nibabaasa kukoresibwa, okuhabura abantu baabo aha bikwatiraine n'endya nungi.
Acholi: Lutela tekwaro omyero gu rwee lwak gi i kom cam maber
Ateso: Epedorio aitwasam engarenok luka atekerin aicor itunga kec enyame loajokan.
Lugbara: Ba eco drice'ba suruni 'diyi ayu imbata fezu ongulumu eyidri 'diyini e'yo nyaka nyaza muke ri niri ma dria ra

English: More effort should be put in to address malnutrition in rural areas.
Luganda: Amaanyi mangi galina okutekebwamu okumalamu endya embi mu byalo.
Runyankore: Hashemereire kwongyerwamu amaani maingi okubaasa kukora ahabyendiisa , omumyanya y'ebyaro.
Acholi: Omyero ki med kero me lweny i kom two neto icaro
Ateso: Ekot aibwaikin agogong naepol kanu aitanangia adeka naka aligirir.
Lugbara: Le 'ba ma 'ba okpo drile e'yo adata angu calo niri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu

English: Cancer remains a silent killer in Uganda; therefore, we should all be screened.
Luganda: Kkookolo asigala nga atta abantu mu kimugunyu mu Uganda, n'olw'ekyo tulina okukeberebwa.
Runyankore: Oburwaire bwa Kokoro bugumire buri oburwaire obwesherekire omu bantu omwihanga rya Uganda; nahabwekyo, twena twine kukyeberwa.
Acholi: Kanca pud tye two ma neko dano laling laling, dok wan weng omyero wacit wapime
Ateso: Erongo adeka naka ekansa eyari etitio ko Uganda; kanu angun ekot oni kere awanyanario.
Lugbara: Azo cancer niri eri azo 'ba o'dipi e'yeresi kari Uganda niri ma alea ni, le di ani ama ma andri ama ma ruati ra

English: Breast cancer sensitization can be done in schools to reach larger groups of girls.
Luganda: Okumanyisibwa ku kkookola w'amabeere kusobola okukolebwa mu masomero okutuuka ku bibinja by'abawala ebinene.
Runyankore: Okuhutuura abantub ahari kookora y'amabeere, nikubaasa kukorwa omumashomero , okureeba ngu obutumwa bwahika ahabantu baingi.
Acholi: Omyero yub me menyo pi two cancer ma mako cak obed tye ikin lutino anyira
Ateso: Aisisianakino kanu ekansa lo ikisin epedorio aswam osomeroi kanu adolokin apesur nuipu.
Lugbara: Ba eco imbata azo cancer ba niri vuri 'ye sukulu eyi ma alea ra ecozu cazu ezoanzi karakara eyivu beni

English: Cancer patients from villages find it hard to go to the Uganda Cancer Institute.
Luganda: Abalwadde ba kkookolo okuva mu byalo bakaluubirizibwa okugenda ku ddwaliro lya kkookolo.
Runyankore: Abarwaire ba kokoro kuruga omu byaro, nikibagumira okuhika aha irwariro eririkugurira abarwaire ba kokoro ery'omu Uganda.
Acholi: Lutwo Kanca matye i caro ginongo tek pa wot ka nongo yat i Uganda Cancer Institute
Ateso: Adekak lu ekansa ocaaloi etionikit alosit adekis naimukiere ekansa ko Uganda.
Lugbara: Ba azo cancer niri be engazu calo eyi ma alea 'diyi eri esu mbazaru muzu arojo Uganda cancer institute niri ma alea

English: The ministry of health needs to establish a regional cancer institute.
Luganda: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu yeetaaga okuteekawo eddwaliro lya kkookolo mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Minisiture y'eby'amagara, eshemereire kutaho irwariro er'okuragurira abarwaire ba kokoro omu byanga.
Acholi: Gangkal me yot kom omyero oket odi yadi me two kanca i twok piny weng
Ateso: Ekot erionget loka angaleu adukun adekis napolon na ekansa.
Lugbara: Le okalamvu alataniri ma sita arojo cancer niri kari ma woko dria ma alea ra

English: The district needs to obtain land for the establishment of the institute.
Luganda: Disitulikiti yeetaaga okufuna ettaka okussaako ekifo.
Runyankore: Minisiture eine kutunga eitaka ery'okwombekaho irwariro ry'abarwire kokoro.
Acholi: dictri komyero onong ka ngom kama kibi keto iye ot yat enuni
Ateso: Ekot edisitrikt adumun alupok kanu adukun adekis.
Lugbara: Le distrikiti ma esu Nyaku arojo cancer niri sizu

English: The district leaders have to be united to improve service delivery.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ku disitulikiti balina okuba bumu okutumbula obuweereza.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi ba Disituriiti, baine kukwatanisa babaase kuhisya obuheereza aha bantu.
Acholi: Lutela me dictri komyero guribe wek kony ma kimiyo ki lwak obed ber
Ateso: Ekot engarenok luka edisitrikt aimorikikin kanu aitojokar ejanakine.
Lugbara: Le drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ma eci ti tualu azi ngaza o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu

English: People need to go for medical check-ups frequently.
Luganda: Abantu beetaaga okugendanga okukeberebwa buli kaseera.
Runyankore: Abantu baine kuguma nibaza omu marwariro kukyeberwa.
Acholi: Dano omyero gucit ka pime iot yat tere tere
Ateso: Ekot itunga alosenen kanu awanyanario duc.
Lugbara: Le 'ba eyi ma aci arojo'a azo eyi ma rua 'diyi andrizu inyia inyia

English: There is another type of cancer, but it mostly affects children.
Luganda: Waliwo ekika kya kkookolo ekirala naye kisinga kukwata baana.
Runyankore: Hariho ogundi muringo gw'endwara ya kokoro, kwonka neekira kukwata abaana.
Acholi: Tye two kanca mukene ma pole mako lutino
Ateso: Ejai bobo aputo na ekansa, konye esuronokini idwe.
Lugbara: Azo cancer niri ma wura azi nduni ci te eri tutuni anzi nyiri eyi 'ye

English: The district has increased its efforts to fight off cancer.
Luganda: Disitulikiti eyongeddemu amaanyi okumalawo kkookolo.
Runyankore: Disiturikiti eyongyeire amaani g'okurwanisa kokoro.
Acholi: dictri komedo kero me lweny i kom two kanca
Ateso: Eyataki edisitrikt agogong kanu aitiji ekansa.
Lugbara: Distrikiti o'tu okpo erini a'di 'dizu azo cancer niri be ri ra

English: The district leaders agreed to establish a regional cancer institute.
Luganda: Abakulembeze ba disitulikiti bakkaanyizza okusaawo eddwaliro lya kkookolo mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Abebembezi ba Disiturikiti, beikiriize kutandikaho irwariro ry'abarwaire ba kokoro omu byanga.
Acholi: Lutela me dictrikgu yee me yubu otyat me cancer matye pi twok piny eni
Ateso: Apotu engarenok luka edistrikt ocamanaros adukun adekis napolon na ekansa.
Lugbara: Drice'ba distrikitini 'diyi ai'ki arojo azo cancer ni kari ma woko siri sizu ra

English: The leaders should inform people about the causes of cancer.
Luganda: Abakulembeze balina okutegeeza abantu ku bireeta Kkookolo.

English: People are frightened because of the yellow fever outbreak in the area.

Runyankore: Abantu batiinire, ahabw'okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka.

Lugbara: Distrikiti azo yellow fever niri be 'diyi Moyo i azini Bulisa i

English: People were advised to report any person with symptoms of yellow fever.

English: There is deforestation in Moyo district.

English: Land wrangles are very common in Uganda today.

Acholi: Lara ngom dwong totwal i Uganda ite kare ni
Ateso: Epol eiguro lo alupok ko Uganda ilolo.

Luganda: Palementi era etonzeewo amasaza amapya.

Acholi: Lweny tye ikin lutela ma icaro wa

Acholi: i kato ki iyer, lwak gubi yero latela gi
Ateso: Kotoma aseo, epote itunga aseun engarenon lo ekotosi.
Lugbara: Opeta eyisi, ongulumu ni nga drice'ba eyini lele ri pe

English: She asked them to bring proof of the allegations towards her.
Luganda: Yabasaba okuleeta obukakafu bw'ebimwogerebwako.

Acholi: En owaco ni gukel caden matye i kome ni

Lugbara: Eri ai eyi e'yo e'dapi kini i'ye e'yo 'bani i tozu 'diyi ra ada ri ejizu

English: For now, she is the woman leader of the two districts.
Luganda: Mu kaseera kano ye mukulembeze w'abakyala mu disitulikiti ebbiri.
Runyankore: Obwa hati, niwe mwebembezi w'abakazi omu disiturikiti ibiri.
Acholi: Pi cawa ni, en aye obedo latela pa mon icaro gi

English: People in our region should always live together as one.
Luganda: Abantu mu kitundu kyaffe balina okubeera obumu.
Runyankore: Abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu bashemereire kutuura nk'omuntu omwe.
Acholi: Lwak me kabedo wa omyero gukwo kacelo ikare weng

English: For a region to have economic growth, there must be cooperation among the residents.
Luganda: Ekitundu okukulaakulana mu by'enfuna, walina okubaawo enkolagana mu batuuze.

Luganda: Abakulembeze bayina okubeera ab'ekisa mu bo n'abantu be bakulembera.

Luganda: Omukulembeze w'abakyala yatukubirizza okukolera awamu olw'ekiruubirirwa ekinene.

English: Students should get knowledge about sexual education.
Luganda: Abayizi bayina okufuna obubaka ku by'okwegatta.
Runyankore: Abaana bashemereire kumanya ebirikukwata ahamagara gaabo g'okuzaara.
Acholi: Lutino kwan omyero gunong ngec i kom butu imit
Ateso: Ekot esisiak adumun acoa naikamunit aelo.

English: There is a high rate of dropouts in our schools today.
Luganda: Okuwanduka mu ssomero kuli waggulu nnyo mu masomero gaffe leero.
Runyankore: Abaana baingi nibaruga omu mashomero gaitu ebiro ebi.

English: Poverty is one of the leading causes of school dropouts in Uganda.
Luganda: Obwavu kye kimu ku bisinga okuviirako okuwanduka mu ssomero mu Uganda.
Runyankore: Obworo nibwo burikureetera abeegi kuruga omu mashomero omu Uganda.
Acholi: Can aye gin acel matye ka weko lutino weko kwan ite kare ni
Ateso: Ican kes imaritai koboro kalu eyangaunitos idwe alakanakin esomero.
Lugbara: Alio ni e'yo azi okporu fepi anzi eyi ma ku sukulu ni ma azi.

English: We should always encourage children to remain in school.
Luganda: Tuyina okukubirizanga abaana basigale mu ssomero.

Ateso: Ejai aitapalaunite nuka asioman na apesur ko Africa
Lugbara: Atita 'bani fele ezoanzi eyini sukulu lazu ri suru afrika niri ma alea were

English: The organization educates children about abstinence and sexually transmitted diseases.

Runyankore: Ekitongore nikyegyesa abaana okureka eby'okuteerana, hamwe n'okubagambira akabi akari omundwara ezirikuruga omukuteerana.

English: Can we reduce violence among young children?

English: I will help my daughter to achieve her dreams.

English: Garbage is collected from our homes every week at an agreed fee.

Acholi: Ki gamo yugi ki ipaci wa cabit ki cabit i wel me cente mo

English: The council has set up rubbish pits in all centers to maintain cleanliness.

English: The council hired private trucks to speed up the garbage collection process.

Ateso: Abu ekansulo ipagisa ilorei kanu aibwokonor agasia.

English: Some council officers take advantage of situations for personal gains.
Luganda: Abakungu b'akakiiko abamu bakozesa embeera ng'omukisa okufuniramu nga bo.
Runyankore: Baofiisa bakakiiko, nibakikoresa nk'omugisha, barikweyendeza ebyabo.
Acholi: Lutic me council mukene gi tiyo ki peko matye me cobo miti gi

Luganda: Abatuuze baanenyezza kansala w'ekibuga olw'okulwawo okukungaanya kasasiro.

Ateso: Apotu itunga itoroniasi ekansila lo otaun kanu aiyap aibwokor agasia.

English: The council officers punished people who throw garbage in road trenches.
Luganda: Abakungu b'akakiiko baakangavuudde abantu abasuula kasasiro mu myala gy'oku nguudo.

Ateso: Apotu ikansilas itisilasi itunga lu ecakete agasia orot.
Lugbara: Azi'ba kanisulu ni 'diyi fe panga 'ba okurunya 'bepi angu yi ni razu nzila tia 'diyi ma alea 'diyini

English: Market officers are directly in control of everything including garbage collection.
Luganda: Abakungu b'akatale bavunaanyizibwa butereevu ku buli kintu omuli n'okukungaanya kasasiro.
Runyankore: Abarikukurira obutare, nibajunanizibwa ahakureeberera buri kimwe oteiremu n'okurundaana kasasiro.
Acholi: Lutic me cuk tiyo tic weng ma kwako coko yugi
Ateso: Eswamak lu ikamunitos nu esokoni kes itingitos aswamisinei kere aimoriarite airit agasia.
Lugbara: Driceza cu ni 'diyi e'yo dria ma drilea, e'yo okurunya trazu ri alenia indi

English: Entebbe is one of the cleanest towns in the country.
Luganda: Entebbe kye kimu ku bibuga ebisinga obuyonjo mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Entebbe n'emwe aha ndembo ezirikukirayo obuyonjo omuwihanga.

Ateso: Entebbe nes erai etaun lo elai kakere.

English: The inter religious council is the body that unites all religious leaders in Uganda.

Runyankore: Ekibiina ekirikugaita amadiini, n'akakiiko akarikugaita abeebembezi b'ediini omu Uganda.

Lugbara: Kanisulu dini dria eyiniri ni amuti azi ti ecita ejipi drice'ba e'yo aitanisi kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri

English: A Moslem has to make a holy pilgrimage to Mecca to be called Hajji.
Luganda: Omusiraamu ayina okulamaga olugendo olutukuvu e Mecca okuyitibwa Hajji.
Runyankore: Omusiraamu aine kutayayira orurembo orwa Mecca, abaase kwetwa Hajji.

English: The Moslems fasting period is called Ramadan.
Luganda: Ekisiibo ky'abasiraamu kiyitibwa Ramadan.
Runyankore: Obwire bw'ekisiibo kyabasiraamu, nibabweeta Ramadan.
Acholi: Kare me kwee pa cilam kilwongo ni Ramadan
Ateso: Apakio nu isibata isiramun enyaritai Ramadan.

English: One of the leaders of our town was in office for twenty years.
Luganda: Omu ku bakulembeze b'ekibuga kyaffe yali mu woofiisi okumala emyaka abiri.
Runyankore: Omwe aha beebeembezi omu rurembo rwaitu, akamara omu ofiisi emyaka makumi abiri.

Ateso: Ediopet kotoma ongarenok lu otaun wok adau ikaru akaisarei ko oyapesi.

English: A man cuts his neighbor's hand after quarreling over their land boundaries.

English: Possession of guns without government permission is against the law.

Runyankore: Okugira embundu oteine rusa rwa Gavumenti, nikihenda ebiragiro.
Acholi: Bedo ki muduku labongo twero pa gamente obedo gin ma turu cik
Ateso: Ajaut keda imudun komamei alasisi na apugan erai abilit ekisil.
Lugbara: Aa'zu osu be rukusa gamete niri kokoru ri eri azita palaa ku

English: The leaders signed a peace agreement to end bloodshed among their people.
Luganda: Abakulembeze bassa emikono ku ndagaano y'emirembe okukomya ekiyiwamusaayi mu bantu baabwe.
Runyankore: Abebembezi bakata omukono aha ndagaano y'obusingye, okumaraho okusheesha eshagama omu bantu baabo.
Acholi: Lutela gu keto cingi iwinye me juku oony pa remo ikin dano gi
Ateso: Apotu egarenok idokoto akanin acamanara kanu aitanangia abukor na aokot kotunga kec.

English: Police arrested a group of youths who attacked their fellows in their neighborhood.

Runyankore: Poriisi ekakwata guruupu y'eminyeeto eyatahiriire bataahi baabo ababaherereire.

Ateso: Apotu ipolisin orocutu egurupu lo atumunak lu apotu osurokisi ikec itunga oidunyet kec.
Lugbara: Polisi eyi obiki 'ba ode azi zopi eyi ma agyipika eyi ma dria angu eyivileri ma agei 'diyi ra

English: Residents attacked a rich man who attempted to grab part of their land.
Luganda: Abatuuze balumbye omusajja omugagga eyagezaako okubba ekitundu ku ttaka lyabwe.
Runyankore: Abatuuragye bakataahirira omugaiga owagyerizeho kutwara eitaka ryabo.
Acholi: Lwak okato i kom la lonyo mo ma otemo mayo ngom gi
Ateso: Apotu itunga osurokisi loabaran lo atamit arobiar alupok kec.

English: Countries with poor leadership lag behind in development.
Luganda: Ensi ezirina obukulembeze obubi zibeera mabega mu nkulaakulana.
Runyankore: Amahanga againe obwebeembezi bubi, nigasigara enyima omuby'entunguuka.

Ateso: Akwapin nu mam epugae ejok ejaas kau kowai lo apol.

English: The minister of local government announced new cities this year.
Luganda: Minisita wa gavumenti z'ebitundu yalangirira ebibuga ebipya omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Minisita wa Gavumenti z'ebyanga, akarangirira endembo nsya omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Gangkal me gme tedero oyaro kamaleng citi manyen i mwaka ni
Ateso: Abu eminista loka apuganasia nu okwap olimo isitei luitetiak okaru lo.
Lugbara: Minisita local government niri lu aku amboru o'diru 'diyi eli 'disi

English: A good working relationship yields positive results in the community.
Luganda: Enkolagana ennungi evaamu ebintu ebirungi mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Enkorengana nungi ahagati y'abakozi, nerugwamu ebirungi omu kyanga.
Acholi: Tic maber matye ki wat maber kelo adwoki maber i kabedo moni
Ateso: Aiswamanara najokan eyauni ameda naejok otunga.
Lugbara: Aa'ta azi tia muke ri ni agata muke 'diyi eji ongulumu ma alea

English: Our village chairman is fair to all residents in the community.
Luganda: Ssentebe w'ekyalo kyaffe mwenkanya eri abatuuze bonna mu kitundu.
Runyankore: Mukuru w'entebe o'ekyaro kyaitu, ni murungi aha batuuragye boona omu kyanga.
Acholi: Kit won kom wa ber i kom dano weng ma i kabedo wa

English: The national anthem reminds Ugandans to stay united at all times.
Luganda: Oluyimba lw'eggwanga lujjukiza bannayuganda okubeera ekimu ebiseera byonna.

English: The district committee organised a farewell party for the chairman.
Luganda: Akakiiko ka disitulikiti kaategese akabaga akasiibula ssentebe.

Ateso: Abu edisitrikt komiti itemok epucit kanu lokapolon eicolong.
Lugbara: Komiti distrikiti niri otu omu azi kuzuri 'Bili ei 'da ni

Luganda: Minisita w'ebyobulamu ye yali omugenyi omukulu ku mukolo.
Runyankore: Minisita w'eby'amagara, niwe yaabaire ari omugyenyi mukuru ahamukoro.

Ateso: Eminista loka angaleu nges arai epejonon lo angosibib kopucit.
Lugbara: Minisita alataniri ndra omu inzile inzi omu 'da ma alea ri i

English: A few years back, Ebola killed many people in northern Uganda.
Luganda: Myaka mitono emabega Ebola yatta abantu bangi mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
Runyankore: Emyaka mikye enyima, Ebola ekeita abantu baingi omu matemba ga Uganda.
Acholi: I mwaka ma pe dwong totwal ma okato, two ebola oneko dano mapol i kumalo me Uganda
Ateso: Okaru idis kau, abu adeka naka ebola oyar itunga luipu ko nyakoi nako Uganda.
Lugbara: Eli azi ndra alipi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, azo ebola niri o'di 'ba karakara eyi kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea

English: I heard people saying that Ebola is spread by monkeys.
Luganda: Nawulira abantu abagamba nti Ebola asaasaanyizibwa nkima.
Runyankore: Nkahurira abantu barikugira ngu enkyende nizo zirikureeta endwara ya Ebola.
Acholi: Awinyo ka dano waco ni ayom aye kobo two ebola
Ateso: Apupunit eong itunga ebalasi ebe idokolen kes ekorete ebola.
Lugbara: Ma eri 'ba eyini 'yoria kini oyua eyi ezo ebola niri awa ni

English: This disease spreads so easily from one person to another.
Luganda: Obulwadde buno busaasaana mangu okuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala.
Runyankore: Endwara neejanjaara juba kuruga aha muntu kuza aha ndiijo.

Ateso: Erai na adeka na ewea atipet anyoun kanejai ituan idiope itoni icie.
Lugbara: Azo 'di ni i'awa 'ba eyi ma eselea ewakokoru

English: Some Ugandan soldiers came back from Congo with the disease.
Luganda: Abajjaasi ba Uganda abamu baakomawo okuva e Congo n'ekirwadde.

English: People who died of Ebola were buried by specific people appointed by the government.
Luganda: Abantu abaafa Ebola baaziikibwa abantu ab'enjawulo abaalondebwa gavumenti.
Runyankore: Abantu abaisirwe Ebola, bakaziikwa abantu abamanyirwe abateirweho Gavumenti.

Ateso: Itunga lu apotu otwakata ebola apotu itunga luitutuoritai ido oseunite apugan kes anukete.
Lugbara: Ba gamete ni ope ni 'diyi sa ndra 'ba odrapi azo ebola nirisi 'diyi ni

English: Lacor hospital in Gulu did a commendable job in treating Ebola patients.
Luganda: Eddwaliro lya Lacor mu Gulu lyakola omulimu ogw'ettendo mu kujjanjaba abalwadde ba Ebola.

Lugbara: Arojo Lacor ni Gulu'a ri 'ye azi onyiru aro feria 'ba azo ebola niri pie 'diyini

English: The ministry organizes workshops aimed at improving health workers' performance.

English: Some diseases need people to be very careful to survive them.

Ateso: Acie adekasinei ekot itunga acoite noi kanu aijar.
Lugbara: Azo azi 'diyi le 'ba eyi ma aa milesi eyini ani azo nde eyi esuzu ku

English: The number of people who have tested positive for tuberculosis is scaring.
Luganda: Omuwendo gw'abantu abazuuliddwamu obulwadde bw'akafuba gutiisa.

Ateso: Enaba lo itunga lu enwakun eluera itukuriani.
Lugbara: Kalafe 'ba 'bani esu azo Tibi niri pie ri eri oriori ru

English: Signs and symptoms of some diseases confuse patients.

English: Health workers must attend to patients with proper protective gears.

English: Schools dismiss some students because of their bad conduct.

English: The inspector appealed to teachers to show a good example to learners.

Lugbara: Agu azi pamvu sukulu eyi ma alea ri onepiri ai imba'ba eyi adriza ala e'dazu anzi onita onipi 'diyini i

English: The school disciplinary committee punished a student for disrespecting teachers.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ebyempisa ku ssomero kaabonerezza omuyizi olw'obutawa basomesa kitiibwa.
Runyankore: Akakiiko k'eishomero akarikukora ahaby'emicwe, kakafubira omwegi, owaaremirwe kuheereza omwegyesa ekitiinisa.
Acholi: Dul ma ngiyo kit lutino kwan omiyo pwod ki latin moni pi kwero woro lupwonye

Lugbara: Komiti adriza muke onepiri fe sukulu mva azi ni panga erini imba'ba eyi inzizu ku risi

English: Schools are preparing finalists for next year`s national examinations.
Luganda: Amasomero gateekerateekera abayizi abali mu bibiina eby'akamalirizo ebigezo by'eggwanga lyonna omwaka ogujja.

Ateso: Itemonokinete isomeroi esisiak lu angetakinak aingito okaru ngol.
Lugbara: Sukulu eyi anzi depi dede 'diyi otu obeta asizu eli drusirisi 'diyini

English: The local council is doing everything possible to keep our village organised.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ekyalo kakola kyonna okisobola okukuuma ekyalo kyaffe nga kitebenkedde.
Runyankore: Akakiiko k'ekyaro kariyo nikakora ekirikubaasika okureeta obutereera omukyaro kyaitu.

Ateso: Iswamai ekansulo nu epedori kere kanu aidar ecaalo wok otenite.

English: Traders are not comfortable with the rent charges in city markets.

Ateso: Mam agwelanarak esiposi kanu etiai lo ikapun lu ipagisaere kosokonin lu osite
Lugbara: Ba afa ozipi 'diyi aa'ni ayikosi robia 'bani ofe renti ruri cu aku ambo eyi ma alea 'diyini risi ku

English: The government has established modern market structures in big towns.

Runyankore: Gavumenti eyombkire ebyombeko birungi by'akatare, omu ndembo empango.

Ateso: Adukoki apugan isokonin lu itegelikina otaunin luapolok
Lugbara: Gamete si cu eyi wura o'diru eyi si tawuni ambo 'diyi ma alea

English: The city authority officers have confiscated the street vendor's properties today.
Luganda: Abakungu b'akakiiko akaddukanya ekibuga bawambye ebintu by'abasuubuzi b'oku nguudo leero.
Runyankore: Abarikukwatisa ebiragiro omu ndembo, erizooba bakwata ebintu byabo abarikuguriza aha nguuto.

Ateso: Apotu eswamak lu eyaitene lo esite ikamasi iboro agwelanarak lu orotin ilolo.
Lugbara: Azi'ba ofisi Aku ambori ma drilea ri ni 'diyi obiki 'ba afa ozipi nzila tia 'diyi ma afa eyi ci o'du andru risi

English: Most of the markets in Uganda lack enough space for expansion.
Luganda: Obutale obusinga mu Uganda tebuyina bibangirizi we buyinza kugaziyirizibwa.
Runyankore: Obutare bwingi omu Uganda, tibwine myanya erikumara okubushanjuura.

Ateso: Isokonin luipu ko Uganda emamei apak na ilosikina kanu aitanyanyario.

English: Business owners have several financial obligations to be fulfilled daily.
Luganda: Bannannyini bizinesi bayina obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ebyensimbi obw'enjawulo obulina okutuukirizibwa.
Runyankore: Abashuubuzi baine obujunanizibwa bwingi  burizooba okugira eki bashashura.
Acholi: Lutim biacara gitye ki jami madwong ma mito cente nino ki nino
Ateso: Ikulepek ibisinesin ejaas keda iboro lu ebeit kes atacanar ngin paran.
Lugbara: E'yo i'ecipi robia be lepi tujari eipika ma 'ye eyi o'du driasi 'diyi karakara

English: Three market vendors were arrested for undermining the orders of the authority.
Luganda: Abasuubuzi b'omu katale basatu baakwatiddwa olw'okuziimuula ebiragiro by'ekitongole.
Runyankore: Abakozi bashatu omu katare bakwasirwe ahabw'okujooga ebiragiro ebyabahairwe.
Acholi: Kimako lucat adek pi kwero winyo lok pa joo ma keto cik itic
Ateso: Aponi orocunai agwelanarak iuni kanu amengit apedorosio nu eyaitene.
Lugbara: Ba obi 'ba afa ozipi cu'a na ni eyi eyini azita driceza ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku risi

English: The city authority has given vendors a two months grace period to vacate the streets.
Luganda: Ekitongole ekiddukanya ekibuga kiwadde abasuubuzi ebbanga lya myezi ebiri okuva ku nguudo.
Runyankore: Ebiragiro by'orurembo, bihereize abashuubuzi emyeezi ebiri kugira ngu babe nibeteekateeka okuruga aha nguuto.
Acholi: Joo ma keto cik icity gumiyo kare me dwee aryo ki lucat me weko teng gudi
Ateso: Ejaiki eyaitene lo esite agwelanarak ilapio iyarei anyoun korotin.
Lugbara: Driceza aku ambo niri fe 'ba afa ozipi 'diyini imba iri nzila eyi kuzu

English: Women vendors complained to the market officers about sharing toilets with men.
Luganda: Abasuubuzi abakyala beemulugunya eri abakungu b'akatale ku ky'okugabana kaabuyonjo n'abaami.
Runyankore: Abakazi, abashubuzi omukatare, nibetomboitwa ahabw'okukoresa ebihorooni hamwa n'abashaija.
Acholi: Lucat ma mon gu kok i kom tim me weko gi bedo ka leyo coron ki coo
Ateso: Apotu agwelanarak nungor ongurianata nejaas eswamak lu esokoni kanu aimor icolonin keda ikiliok.
Lugbara: Oku afa ozipi cu'a 'diyi onuki driceza cu niri ma tia e'yo eyini coroni eyi ayuzu tualu agupi eyi pie ri ma dria

English: Sometimes the city council delays to collect garbage from the markets.
Luganda: Ebiseera ebimu akakiiko akaddukanya ekibuga kalwawo okukungaanya kasasiro okuva mu butale.
Runyankore: Obumwe n'obumwe, site kanso nekyerererwa kurundaana kasasiro kuruga omu butare.
Acholi: ikare mukene joo ma coko yugi icity gi galle ki coko yugi
Ateso: Acie apakio iyapi esite council alemar agasia kosokoni.
Lugbara: Sa'wa azinisi kanisulu aku ambo niri ni sa'wa eza okurunya cu ma alea ri trazu

English: Markets need security guards to prevent thieves from stealing peoples merchandise.
Luganda: Obutale bwetaaga abakuumi okutangira ababbi okubba ebyamaguzi by'abantu.
Runyankore: Obutare nibwetenga abaserukare b'okuzibira abashuma kwiba ebintu by'abashuubuzi.
Acholi: Lugwok kuc ki ber bedo omyero gubed tye i cuk wek lukwo pe gukwal jami pa lucat
Ateso: Ekotos isokonin edarak kanu aitikitik ikokolak akoko iboro itunga.
Lugbara: Cu eyi le azi'ba ageitema ni 'diyi ra ogua eyi atrizu 'ba eyi ma afa eyi oguzu risi

English: The health officer advised all food stuff sellers to always keep their stalls clean.
Luganda: Omukungu w'ebyobulamu yawadde abasuubuzi amagezi abatunda emmere bonna okukuuma emidaala gyabwe nga miyonjo.
Runyankore: Ofiisa w'eby'amagara akahabura abarikuguza eby'okurya ngu buriijo bagume nibayonja emyanya yaabo.

Ateso: Abu eswaman lo angaleu icorak lu egwelanarete inyamat kere aidar iboro kec olaete.
Lugbara: Azi'ba rua ala ni 'da fe imbata 'ba dria nyaka ozipi 'diyini angu eyini afa ozizuri ma tambazu alaru

English: The town council closed a number of markets because of poor toilet facilities.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kaggala obutale obuwelako olwa kaabuyonjo embi.

English: Local market sells a variety of items at a cheaper price.

Acholi: Cuk ma itedero gi cato jami mapol iwel ma lapiny
Ateso: Egwelanario iboro luegelegela kosokoni kotiai lo edite.
Lugbara: Cu 'ba angu azi ma alea 'diyini 'diyi afa karakara eyi ozi aje weresi

English: Local markets don't discriminate between the rich and the poor.
Luganda: Obutale bw'omu byalo tebusosola wakati w'omugagga n'omwavu.

Acholi: Cuk ma itedero pe gi koyo lucan ki lulonyo
Ateso: Mam isokonin lu okau eseete luican keda luabarak.
Lugbara: Cu angu azi eyi ma alea 'diyi coni 'ba mali be 'diyi ma esele 'ba alioru 'diyi pie ku

Luganda: Obutake bw'oku mabbali g'enguudo obusinga tebulina bifo bimala kusimbamu bidduka.
Runyankore: Obutare bwingi obwaha rubaju rw'enguuto, tibwine myanya y'okuzaagizamu ebiiruka.

Ateso: Isokonin lu orotin luipu emamei ne esiponokino imotokan.

Ateso: Ejepete itunga ikito kanu aicwe atotole.

Runyankore: Gavumenti eshemereire kuta ebitaara ahanguuto zoona, okutuubya ahabihagaro.
Acholi: Gamente omyero oket mac iteng gudi weng wek rwom me timo bal odok piny
Ateso: Ekot apuagan aibwaikin akimian orotin kere kanu aitidisiar ebenyit.
Lugbara: Le gamete ma osu aci ageitema ni 'diyi nzila dria eyi ma dria e'yo onzi ma omgbo esizu

English: Local leaders work jointly with police in fighting crimes in communities.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'ebitundu bakolera wamu ne poliisi okulwanyisa obuzzi bw'emisango mu bitundu.
Runyankore: Abeebembezi b'ebyanga, nibakorera hamwe na poriisi okurwanisa ebihagaro omu byaro.
Acholi: Lutela tedero gitiyo ki abili me lweny i kom timo bal
Ateso: Iswamaete engarenok nepepei keda ipolisin kanu aitiji ebenyit kotunga.
Lugbara: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyini 'diyi azi nga tualu polisi eyi pie a'di 'dizu e'yo onzi pie ongulumu eyi ma alea

English: The army recovered many guns from local civilians in the Northern region.
Luganda: Amagye gaazudde emundu eziwerako mu bantu ba bulijja okuva mu kitundu ky'obukiikaddyo.
Runyankore: Amahe gakaiha embundu nyingi omubantu bekyaro , omu matemba ga Uganda.
Acholi: Mony ogamo muduku mapol kibot civilian i kumalo me Uganda
Ateso: Abu ajore ikamu imudun kanejaas itunga ko nyakoi nako Uganda.

English: Many people lose their lives because of armed robberies in the country.
Luganda: Bangi bangi bafiirwa obulamu bwabwe olw'ababbi abakozesa emmundu mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Abantu baingi nibafa ahabw'abashuma abarikukoresa embundu omwihanga.
Acholi: Dano mapol too pi luyak matiyo ki muduku
Ateso: Itunga luipu etwanianarete aijar kec kanu ikokolak lu imudun kakwap.
Lugbara: Ba karakara eyi eyi ma edri avi ogua ogu ogupi osu si 'diyivu kari 'di ma alea

English: The government has done enough sensitization on sexually transmitted diseases.
Luganda: Gavumenti ekoze okumanyisa okumala ku ndwadde z'obukaba.
Runyankore: Gavumenti eshomesize ekirikumara, ebirikukwata aha ndwara ezirikuruga omu kuteerana .
Acholi: Gamo orweyo dano totwal i kom two ma kobo ibutu imit
Ateso: Esisianaki apugan nuilosikino nuka adekasinei nu ikopas aelo.
Lugbara: Gamete 'ye otita mile oziza ni omgbo angirisi ri azo esule ali o'baza si 'diyi ma dria

English: The government allocates enough funds for health services every year.
Luganda: Gavumenti eteeka ssente ezimala mu byobulamu buli mwaka.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neetaho esente ezirikumara kukora ahaby'amagara buri mwaka.
Acholi: Gamente miyo cente ma oromo pi kony me yot kom mwaka ki mwaka
Ateso: Ekoranakini apugan apiyai nu edlitos owai loka angaleu ngol karu.
Lugbara: Gamete ni robia capira ri fe azakoma fele e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyini eli alu alu vusi

English: Some patients don't complete their treatment doses.
Luganda: Abalwadde abamu tebamalaayo ddoozi zaabwe.
Runyankore: Abarwaire abamwe tibarikumarayo doozi z'emibazi ezirikuba zibahairwe.
Acholi: Lutwo mukene pe gityeko mwonyo yat gi
Ateso: Icie adekak mam engetanakinete amukian kec.
Lugbara: Ba azoru 'diyi ma azi eyi deni aro eyivile 'diyi ku

English: Most people go to medical centres when their sickness is serious.
Luganda: Abantu abasinga bagenda mu malwaliro ng'obulwadde bunyiinyiitidde.
Runyankore: Abantu abaingi nibaza omu marwariro, endwara zaabo zaheza kuba kubi munonga.
Acholi: Joo mukene gicito iot yat ka two otany totwal
Ateso: Itunga luipu elosenenete adekisia nudidika konye opol adeka noi.

English: Organizations work closely with the health ministry in controlling the spread of diseases.
Luganda: Ebitongole bikolera wamu n'ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu kutangira ensaasaana y'endwadde.
Runyankore: Ebitongore, nibikorera hamwe na minisiture y'eby'amagara, omukuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara.

Ateso: Iswamaete iriongeta keda erionget loka angaleu kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei.

English: The pandemic has made it difficult for some patients to pick treatment.

Runyankore: Oburwaire oburiiho butumire abantu baremererwa kwakiira emibazi yaabo.
Acholi: Poto pa two eni oweko odoko tek pi dano me nongo yat gi
Ateso: Etotoliki adeka na ekorona itunga luipu alosenen adumunun amukian.
Lugbara: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapi 'di fe aro e'duza ni ecazu ewaru 'ba azoru 'diyi ma azi eyini

English: Many people fear to do tests for some killer diseases.
Luganda: Abantu abasinga batya okwekebeza ezimu ku ndwadde zi nnamutta.
Runyankore: Abantu abaingi nibatiina kwekyebeza endwara ezimwe.

Ateso: Ikuriaka itunga luipu alosit ainwakio kanu adekasinei nu eyarete.
Lugbara: Ba karakara eyi 'ye orisi eyi ma rua o'bizu azo okporu 'diyi ma azi eyisi.

English: On following the doctor's advice, he has lived longer with the diseases.
Luganda: Mu kugoberera ebiragiro by'omusawo, awangadde n'obulwadde.
Runyankore: Omu kukuratira obuhabuzi bw'omushaho, abaasize kuhangaara n'endwara.
Acholi: En orii ki two ni i kome pien ni olubu lok pa dakta
Ateso: Kowai lo atupite aicoreta emuron, ajar ngesi noi keda adeka.
Lugbara: Erini imbata dakitari niri ma vuti obizu risi, eri aa azo 'da be sa'wa ezu.

English: Many children in the country are orphans because of this disease.
Luganda: Abaana bangi mu ggwanga bamulekwa olw'ekirwadde kino.
Runyankore: Abaana baingi omwihanga n'efuuzi, ahabw'oburwaire obu.
Acholi: Lutino mapol gudoko kic i Uganda pi two eni
Ateso: Idwe luipu kakwap eraas ikokiok kanuka adeka.
Lugbara: Anzi nyiri karakara kari 'di ma alea 'diyi emvu anzi eyi azo 'di ma e'yosi

English: The number of people living with the virus increases annually.
Luganda: Ennamba y'abantu abawangaala n'akawuka yeeyongera buli mwaka.

Ateso: Enaba lo itunga kalu ejarete keda ekurut iyatas ngol karu.
Lugbara: Ba aa'pi azo 'di pie 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu eli alu alu vusi

English: Patients in rural areas find it hard to get drugs.

Ateso: Etionikit adekak lu ocaaloi adumunun ikee.

Ateso: Ejaas atumunak lu pesur ationis na aikatun ekurut.

English: Some health centres lack enough testing items for the virus.
Luganda: Ebifo ebijjanjabirwamu ebimu tebirina bintu bimala ebikebera kawuka.

English: Once you start taking these drugs, you do it throughout your life.
Luganda: Bw'otandika okumira eddagala lino okikola obulamu bwo bwonna.

Lugbara: Ika e'do aro 'diyi oki 'bo, mi eyi oki edri mivileri ma alea dria

English: The national medical store has few branches in the country.
Luganda: Etterekero ly'eddagala ery'eggwanga lirina amatabi amatono mu ggwanga.
Runyankore: Ekitongore kyeihanga ekirikujunanizibwa ahakubiika emibazi, kiine amataagi makye omwihanga.

Ateso: Ejaas national medical store keda ateneik adis kakwap.
Lugbara: Amuti National medical stores niri ma arakala eyi kari 'di ma alea were

English: Many people have ignored the control measures of sexually transmitted diseases.
Luganda: Abantu bangi tebafaayo ku ngeri z'okwetangira endwadde z'obukaba.
Runyankore: Abantu abaingi tibafiireyo kwerinda endwara ezirikuruga omu kuteerana.

Ateso: Enacata itunga luipu iwaitin lu itikitikere adekasinei nu ikopas aelo.
Lugbara: Ba karakara eyi adi geri tambazani azo esule ali o'baza si 'diyini 'diyi te

English: Local leaders have organised many seminars for the youth about the virus.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'ebyalo bategese emisomo gy'abavubuka egikwata ku kawuka.
Runyankore: Abebembezi b'ebyaro, batebekaniise emishomo y'eminyeeto, okubeegyesa  aha kakooko.

English: Journalists were given skills on how to capture news during political rallies.
Luganda: Bannamawulire baaweebwa obukodyo ku ngeri y'okusaka amawulire mu nkungaana z'ebyobufuzi.

Ateso: Aponi ijaikinai arotak iyemuto acoa na ikamet iyemuto kapak naka aseo.

English: This is the third time he`s being arrested for car theft.

English: Car theft is very rampant in the country these days.
Luganda: Obubbi bw'emmottoka bweyongedde mu ggwanaga ennaku zino.
Runyankore: Okwiba motoka kukanyire munonga omwihanga ebiro ebi.

English: Many stolen cars were rescued by police last year.

English: He gave police a full list of his partners in crime.

English: Uganda revenue authority keeps a record of all vehicles in the country.

English: Owners of the recovered vehicles are pleased with police efforts.

English: Some cars are stolen in public places like bars as owners are drinking.

English: A certain vehicle stolen in Uganda was found in the neighbouring country.
Luganda: Emmotoka emu yabbibwa e Uganda yasangiddwa mu nsi ey'okumuliraano.

English: He was one of the best musicians in Northern Uganda.

Lugbara: Eri ndra 'ba ongo ngopi kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea muke ndeni 'diyi ma azi

English: Indeed, he was a man of people and a good person.

Acholi: ilok ada en onongo obedo dano ma lawat dok ngat ma kite ber
Ateso: Abeit ba arai ngesi etunganan lo itunga ka etunganan lo ajok.
Lugbara: Adaada, eri ndra o'bi eyi ma 'bani dika 'ba muke ni

English: His fans will always remember him.
Luganda: Abawagizi be baakumujjukiranga.
Runyankore: Abaabaire nibamukunda, nibaija kuguma bamwijukye.
Acholi: Wii joo ma onongo mare pe bi wil i kom en
Ateso: Epote duc itunga aiitunun nges.
Lugbara: Ba atita fepi erini 'diyi nga eri ma e'yo ega ra

English: He was thirty-one years old when he died.
Luganda: Yafiira ku myaka asatu mu gumu.
Runyankore: Obu yaafa akaba aine emyaka makumi ashatu na gumwe.
Acholi: En onongo tye ki mwaka pyera dek wiye acel ikare ma otoo
Ateso: Arai ngesi lo ikaru akaisauni idiope ne atwania.
Lugbara: Eri dra de esu eri ma eli kali na drini alu

English: Before his death, he sang many songs in his language.
Luganda: Nga tannafa yayimba ennyimba nnyingi mu lulimi lwe.
Runyankore: Atakafiire, akeshongora ebyeshongoro bingi, omururimi rwe.
Acholi: Mapwod pe otoo, en owero wee madwong i leb gi
Ateso: Erongo nges etwana, ewooit ngesi ikososinei lu angajep ke.

English: Most of his songs had educational messages.
Luganda: Ennyimba ze ezisinga zaalimu obubaka obuyigiriza.

Ateso: Ikososinei ke luipu ajaas keda akiro nu icorete.
Lugbara: Ongo erivile 'diyi ma abari ma alea ndra o'dukoti onita ni 'diyi

English: Some musicians sing songs that provoke others to quarrel with them.
Luganda: Abayimbi abamu bayimba ennyimba ezisoomooza abalala okuyombagana nabo.

Ateso: Icie awook ewoete ikososinei lu itakadikinete icie acelakin keda kes.
Lugbara: Ba ongo ngopi 'diyi ma azi eyi ongo awoko fepi 'ba azi 'diyini eyini ani awazu eyi ma eselea 'dinile 'diyi ngo

English: The minister called upon musicians to always live an exemplary life.
Luganda: Minisita yasaba abayimbi okubeera ekyokulabirako mu bulamu.
Runyankore: Minisita akahabura abeshongozi ngu buriijo babe eky'okureeberaho.
Acholi: Minista olego lugo wer me bedo lanyut maber

Lugbara: Minisita 'da ai 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi edri ecetaru 'diyi aa'zu i sa'wa driasi

English: He loved and respected other artists in all ways.

Ateso: Amina ngesi ka ayongite awook icie koponesio kere.

English: His music promoted peace and love among people in the region.

English: He has left a legacy for the people of Uganda, especially in the north.

English: There are few gospel artists in the district.

Runyankore: Gavumenti neeshorooza esente ezirikurenga obukaikuru rushanju kuruga omu mishoro buri mwaka.
Acholi: dictrik jogo cente ma kato million miya abiro ki pyera bic mwaka ki mwaka i mucoro
Ateso: Etukunenei apugan apiyai nu edeparitos imilionin akwatakanyarei kanejaas alemak esolo ngol karu.
Lugbara: Gamete ni robia Uganda niri tra milioni turu aziri ma drilia engazu 'ba musoro ofepi 'diyi vu eli alu alu vusi

English: A portion of this money is spent on improving health services.
Luganda: Ekitundu ku ssente zino zisaasaanyizibwa mu kutumbula byabulamu.
Runyankore: Ekicweka ky'esente ezi, nikikora aha kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.
Acholi: But cente eni kitiyo kwede me tic lok me miyo kony me yot kom
Ateso: Atutubet na apiyai kanu itwasamao kanu aitojokara amukian.
Lugbara: Ba robia 'di ma azi ayu azakoma fele e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi otuzu

English: The committee chairman calls for transparency during the allocation of these funds.
Luganda: Ssentebe w'akakiiko asabye obwerufu mu ngabanya y'obuyambi buno.
Runyankore: Mukuru w'entebe yakakiiko, naashaba abantu okuba abeesigwa omu kukozesa esente ezi.
Acholi: Won kom me committee waco ni omyero ada obed tye i kare me poko cente eni
Ateso: Abu eceyaman loka ekomiti ilip eswamae loajokan kapak na akorakinere ikapun lu.
Lugbara: Bili ei Komiti niri ai 'ba eyi aa'zu e'yo ada be sa'wa robia awazu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu risi

English: Government funds talent developing activities in schools.
Luganda: Gavumenti eteeka ssente mu kutumbula ebitone mu masomero.
Runyankore: Gavumenti neehayo esente ez'okuhwera omu kutungura emyoga omu mashomero.
Acholi: Gamente miyo cente pi yub me dongo mot pa lutino kwan ki i gang kwan
Ateso: Apiyai nu apugan itolomete aswamisinei nu atalantan kosomeroi.
Lugbara: Gamete ni atita robiani fe e'yo talanta ezozu pari onita ni diyi ma alea

English: All schools are to participate in the district music competitions without fail.
Luganda: Amasomero gonna ga kwetaba mu mpaka z'okuyimba awatali kulemererwa.
Runyankore: Amashomero goona nigaija kwejumba omu mpaka z'okweshongora eza disiturikiti.
Acholi: Gangi kwan weng omyero gubed tye i pyem wer i kin gangi kwan ma i district
Ateso: Ebeit isomeroi kere ajaikin abolobolo naka aiwo ko odisitrikt komam atwaniar.
Lugbara: Le sukulu dria eyi ma fi abala ongo ni distrikiti ni 'diyi ma alea ece kokoru

English: Sports activities in our school are done in the second term.
Luganda: Ebyemizannyo mu ssomero lyaffe bikolebwa mu lusoma olwokubiri.
Runyankore: Eby'emizaano omu ishomero ryaitu, nibikorwa omu taamu yakabiri.
Acholi: Yub me pyem tuku bedo tye i gang kwan wa i term me aryo
Ateso: Itolosio aboliasio kosomero kosi atamu na iyareit.
Lugbara: Ba 'yeta avita ni 'diyi 'ye amavile sukulu ri ma alea tamu iri si

English: Teachers play a greater role in training pupils in sports activities.
Luganda: Abasomesa bakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kutendeka abayizi ebyemizannyo.
Runyankore: Abeegyesa nibakora omurimo muhango omu kutendeka abeegi omu by'emizaano.
Acholi: Lupwonye tiyo tic madit loyo i pwonyo lutino ki lok me tuku i gang kwan
Ateso: Iswamaete isisianakinak aswam naepol noi aitutuonor idwe kotoma aboliasio.
Lugbara: Imba'ba eyi azi okporu ndeni 'diyi nga sukulu anzi piraimaria 'diyi imbazu 'yeta avita ni ndundu 'diyisi

English: Our sports teacher has been transferred to the neighbouring school.
Luganda: Omusomesa waffe ow'ebyemizannyo akyusiddwa n'atwalibwa ku ssomero erituliraanye.
Runyankore: Omwegyesa waitu ow'ebyemizaano, ahinduriirwe omwishomero erituhereraire.
Acholi: Ki kobo lapwony me tuku me gang kwan wa kitere kamu kene
Ateso: Aponi ijularai esisianakinan wok lo aboliasio osomero lo idunyasi keda oni.
Lugbara: Ba oja amavile imbapi avita eyi ma drilea ri sukulu azi amavile sukulu ri ma jo ejele ru ni ma alea

English: The district sports team reached the finals last year.
Luganda: Ttiimu y'ebyemizannyo eya disitulikiti yatuuka ku mpaka z'akamalirizo omwaka oguwedde.
Runyankore: Tiimu y'emizaano eya disiturikiti, ekahika aha kamaririzo omwaka oguhwaire.
Acholi: dul tuku pa dictrikme tuku guoo i agikki me pyem ma otimme i mwaka ma okato
Ateso: Abu etimu lo aboliasio lo edisitrikt odol abolia na awasia okaru je.
Lugbara: Amuti avita eyini distrikiti niri ca abala asizuri ma alea eli ajerisi ra

English: We are expecting a better performance in this year's sports competition.
Luganda: Tusuubira okukola obulungi mu mpaka z'ebyemizannyo omwaka guno.
Runyankore: Twine amatsiko ngu nibaza kukora kurungi omu mpaka z'emizaano omwaka ogu.
Acholi: Watye ki gen ni wabi timo maber i pyem tuku me mwaka eni
Ateso: Ebeit iso aswam ejok kotoma abolobol na aboliasio nu ekaru kalo.
Lugbara: Ama asi'baza be agata muke ni ma dria abala avita eyini eli 'di vurisi
